title: Booking.com: Hotels & Travel
description:
Save on your next trip with the Booking.com app! Find great hotel or apartment deals and book in just a few minutes. You can also book flights, rental cars, and more through the app.

- Book your whole trip in one app (accommodations, flights, car rentals, taxis and attractions)
- Stay flexible with free cancellation (available at most properties)
- 24/7 customer service in more than 40 languages
- No booking or credit card fees
- Chat directly with your property in the app
- Enjoy mobile-only discounts by booking in the app
- Use filters to easily find the perfect place out of millions of available accommodations 
- Get paperless confirmation of your reservation 
- Manage your bookings on the go, making changes whenever and wherever you want
- Discover local attractions and make the most of your trip
- Share your experience and get local advice on our Travel Communities forums

Access millions of accommodations
From cozy country homes to funky city apartments, find the perfect place out of millions of available accommodations. Our app offers hotels, apartments, bed and breakfasts and more.

Quickly find the perfect place to stay
Filter hotels by price, review score, WiFi quality, and other things important to you. Search cheap hotels by city, attraction, landmark, or hotel name. Special requests? Pet-friendly hotels? We have filters for everything. You can also compare your favorite accommodation options side by side to ensure you get the best price and quality.

Deals for any budget
Discover daily accommodation deals and save on your next hotel, apartment, or villa booking.
Get exclusive mobile-only discounts of 10% or more on select properties when you book in the app. Find your ideal accommodation at an ideal price.

Stay flexible with free cancellation
Change of plans? Not a problem. You can cancel for free at most hotels, apartments and other properties on Booking.com. And the app makes things even easier ‚Äî it only takes a few taps to cancel, and you‚Äôre free to find a place that better suits your needs.

Last-minute travel
Heading somewhere in a hurry? With the app, you can quickly book hotels at the last minute (as well as far in advance). Finding a place in short order has never been easier. Our app allows you to search for properties nearby, fill in a few details, and secure your reservation. You can also change, cancel, or make additional reservations on the go.

Jet off with the perfect flight
Book domestic or international flights on the go with ease. The app allows you to search thousands of airfare deals per day. Plane tickets available for all major airlines and destinations.

Hit the road with car rentals
Car hire has recently been added to the app. Whether you just need a ride to explore your destination, or you‚Äôre going on an epic road trip, the Booking.com app can help. Rent a car from all the major companies and hit the road!

Reserve taxis with ease
Book in advance for a seamless connection from the airport to your destination. You can also book taxis to and from other pick-up points, such as hotels and local attractions.

Find and book a great experience
Whether you‚Äôre looking for attraction or museum tickets, boat tours and walking tours, you can book experiences online in minutes, with free cancellation on many options. 

Get and share tips with other travelers
Connect with fellow travelers, share your experiences, and get local advice on the best accommodations, attractions, and more. Discover new experiences and plan your trip with our app.

title: Hopper: Flights, Hotels & Cars
description:
The Hopper app has helped over 100 million travelers find and secure the best price on flights, hotels, homes and car rentals - each and every time they book their trips.

Book Flights, Hotels, Homes & Rental Cars 
Find millions of flights, hotels, homes, rental cars (and cute bunnies) ‚Äì all in one app. Book your trip safely and securely, in just a couple taps and a swipe. 

Always Get the Best Price 
You can watch a trip right in the app and we‚Äôll send you a notification when it‚Äôs the best time to buy ‚Äî recommending you to book now, or maybe wait just a little longer.

Easily Find The Cheapest Travel Dates 
Simply search your preferred destination and use Hopper‚Äôs color-coded deals calendar to easily find the cheapest travel dates for your trip.

Not Ready to Book Right Away?
Hopper lets you freeze the price, so that you never miss a travel deal. For a small fee, take the time you need to finalize your plans, or wait for your next paycheck to come in. If the price goes up, you only pay the price you froze it at. But if the price goes down, you just pay the lower price. 

Travel with Confidence
Avoid fees and frustration! Make any trip flexible with Hopper‚Äôs Cancel and Change for Any Reason plans. Get instantly rebooked without extra costs if your flight is delayed or you miss a connection with Hopper‚Äôs Flight Disruption Guarantee. Travel stress free with 24/7 access to Hopper‚Äôs Customer Support. 

Help the Planet, One Booking at a Time. 
With every booking that occurs on Hopper, we pledge to plant 2 trees to offset the carbon footprint. To date, we‚Äôve planted over 31 million trees. 

Hopper has no ads, no spam, and no stress ‚Äî just accurate predictions and travel deals.

So what are you waiting for? Start saving money with the bunny today. Download Hopper for free now, and let‚Äôs start planning your next trip!

Hopper Love
‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúThe 10 Best Free Apps for Air Travel Junkies‚Äù - TIME
‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúThe Most Downloaded OTA in the U.S. in 2021‚Äù - Apptopia 
‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúThe app helps travelers find the cheapest flights, hotels and rental cars.‚Äù - The Points Guy
‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúCompared to exact searches on Expedia, Kayak and Orbitz, we regularly found that the deal quoted on Hopper was the best‚Äù - Travel and Leisure
‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúHopper can be a better option than direct booking for those who need more flexibility.‚Äù - The Wall Street Journal
‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúFind me a hotel on Hopper!‚Äù - The Late Late Show with James Corden
‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúTravel Unicorn Hopper First Came for Expedia. Airbnb Is Next‚Äù - TechCrunch
‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúHopper is committed to offsetting the carbon emissions of every flight and hotel stay it sells.‚Äù - Forbes, The Top 100 Most Customer-Centric Companies of 2022

Say Hello to the Bunnies
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/hoppertravel
Instagram: @hopper
Twitter: @hopper
Website: http://www.hopper.com

Need support? Head over to https://help.hopper.com to find answers to frequently asked questions. You can also reach us toll-free at +1-833-933-4671 if calling from US or Canada, or at +1 (347)-695-4555 if calling from outside the US or Canada.

title: Wanderlog - Travel Planner
description:
Wanderlog is a free travel app (with an optional subscription) for planning every kind of trip, including road trips and group travel: create a trip itinerary, budget costs, organize flight and hotel reservations, view places to visit on a map, and collaborate with friends. With an optional subscription, you can also export your trip to Google Maps and link your Gmail account. After your trip, share a travel guide to inspire other travelers.

- See flights, hotels, and attractions in one place (like TripIt and Tripcase)
- View plans on a travel map & map your route (like Roadtrippers)
- Rearrange the order of places easily by drag-and-drop
- Planning a road trip? Add unlimited stops for free, optimize your route, view times & distances between places, and export places to Google Maps
- Planning group travel? Invite friends and collaborate in real-time just (like Google Docs)
- Automatically import reservations by forwarding emails or connecting your Gmail
- Add things to do from top guides with 1 click (like Tripadvisor and Google Trips/Google Travel)
- Access your trip plans offline
- Add notes and links to your stops
- Have your trip plans automatically sync across devices
- Set budget, track expenses, and split bills with a group

-------

SEE IT ON A MAP

Every time you add a place to visit, it‚Äôs immediately pinned on your Google Maps-based travel map. No need to pull up different travel apps and websites to organize plans and see them on a map - you can do it all in the Wanderlog trip planner app! Plus, if you‚Äôre visiting points in order, lines will connect the different pins on the map so you can see your route (perfect for road trips!). You can also export all your places to Google Maps too.

STORE PLANS OFFLINE

All your plans are automatically stored offline on the Wanderlog travel planner app - especially helpful during a road trip with poor signal and international travel.

GET ON THE ROAD

Looking for a road trip planner? Travelers can plan their trips and stops with Wanderlog. See your route on a map, or try our route optimizer to automatically rearrange and plan your route to save travel time. See estimated times & distance traveled between places to make sure it all fits, and total time and distance traveled for a given day to make sure you‚Äôre not driving too long. Plus, you can add unlimited stops along your road trip for free.

COLLABORATE WITH FRIENDS

For group travel planning, add your tripmates with their email address or by sharing a link to the itinerary. Like for Google Docs, everyone can collaborate in real-time. Set permissions and choose whether people can edit or just view your travel plans.

STAY ORGANIZED

Access flights, hotels, and attractions in one app. Forward flight and hotel confirmation emails to import them directly into your trip plan, or connect your Gmail to automatically add them. Prefer to keep high-level plans? Make generic lists like ‚ÄòThings to do‚Äô and ‚ÄòRestaurants‚Äô you want to eat at. Traveling on a tight schedule and want to create a detailed itinerary? Organize your day by adding start (and end) times, perfect for keeping track of tickets and reservations.

GET INSPIRATION & INFORMATION

For each place, see key info like a description and picture of the place, average user ratings with links to reviews, opening hours, address, website, and phone number. Stay inspired by exploring top travel guides from the web that feature viewpoints, attractions, and restaurants, and from lists from Google Trips and Google Travel, as well as by other Wanderlog users, and add things to do from those guides to your trip plan with 1 click.

CONTROL YOUR SPENDING

Set a budget for yourself or a group. Take control of your spending and keep track of all expenses. For a group trip, split a bill with other people and easily calculate the cost. Keep a record of who paid for what, how much everyone owes or is owed, and settle debts between tripmates.
releaseNotes: Wanderlog is more reliable: we fixed various small issues, and also launched the Dream Trip Contest for a chance to win a $1,000 trip to anywhere in the world! We also fixed a bug related to manually adding reservations and Chinese translations.

It has almost everything you would need for travel in one app. I would suggest to add the option to make a reservation at the places you add to your itenerary üòä | I like that this app allows me to plan ahead for my vacation by helping me find not only a place to stay but how to get there and things to do at the location. The app keeps me organized as well as within my budget and prepared for when the time comes! | I have only used the free version of the app but I like how easy it is to use and I have all the information needed at the tip of my finger! | This app was perfect for us as we organized our family trip to South Korea. We visited 3 cities during our 14-day stay and I absolutely loved that we had everything organized from lodging to airplane info, to popular tourist attractions, and restaurants in one place that everyone had access to. I rated this app 5 stars because it really saved us time from having to research tons of attractions as it would always suggest options when we were planning our trip. I liked how the map feature allows you to visually see the course mapped out for the daily itinerary. That way we could see if we needed to adjust our plans if something was out of order. It was also easy to rearrange the items on our list. I appreciated how it allowed us to use Kakao maps although I will say we preferred using Naver maps because there was more English translation available. My only suggestion would be to have Naver Maps as an available option to go to when trying to get directions for South Korea trips as it would help an older person like me to travel, but my teens had no issues with copying/pasting addresses from Kakao to Naver and they were able to manage this app with finesse. | Well-conceived travel app for those of us who plan, and even for those who don‚Äôt!  It‚Äôs intuitive to use, and seems to be well connected with primary resources for your choices on what and how to prioritize the places you want to experience.  LOVE that the itinerary provides the amount of time and mode(walking/automobile) of getting around, so you know what‚Äôs involved in getting from place to place.  I feel very prepared for our upcoming long weekend in Charleston, SC. | I planned the whole trip using the web version. Now I'm using the iOS and every single action is causing a tool tip popup i have to dismiss

It also caused the app to crash which i have to launch the app again, causing the tool tips to reappear forcing me to build a budget or whatever

JUST LET ME USE THE APP

I can't stand this | I didn‚Äôt know this existed until a few months before our trip to London, but I was so glad to find it.  I am a bit of a spreadsheet nerd, but once everything was transferred into the app I didn‚Äôt reference my spreadsheet anymore.  I love it!  It kept me organized prior to and during the trip.  I loved how everything was in one location.  Highly recommend! | Super easy to use and share with your group! We love it! | My friend and I live in different cities but are planning a girls getaway to a locale that neither of us have been to before. This app has been the BEST resource we could have dreamed of! It allowed us to collaboratively explore ideas of sites to see, places to go, things to do and the map feature allowed us to plot out of all the options which were close together for creating an itinerary. The ease of having websites and hours for all of these options also helped structure our trip plan. And the expense tracking, while there could be some very minor enhancements, has been great for her to make reservations so I know exactly what I owe her. I have recommended this app to so many people already and I will never plan another trip without it! And honestly the app has been almost as fun to use as we hope the trip itself will be! 10/5 stars! | after update the appÔºåit‚Äôs start to crush everytime I opened app, I can‚Äôt use it anymore. Please fix! | Available features even for the free version are great, but I‚Äôve experienced way too many issues trying to use the app. Constantly freezes or looses connection. | First time using, couldn‚Äôt proceed due to random ‚ÄúSomething went wrong try again later‚Äù errors. Ironically, their sign up and pay prompts work fine, just not the actual functionality of the app. Happened on both iPhone and Mac. Back to OneNote.

Seriously chill on the guided tour. If you need literally 25 constant pop-ups that don‚Äôt let people use the tool until they click-off, you have a UX problem and the guided tour is a poor frustrating pop-up bandaid. | Loved using Wanderlog to navigate 16 days in Australia... Gave me the confidence to be my own travel agent. We had 9 flights 5 Airbnbs and multiple excursions. Loaded them all easily in Wanderlog via forwarded emails and we were in our way! Thank you for a great app! | I don‚Äôt even use all the functionality, but I bought the plan just to support the developers. 
It‚Äôs well designed and highly useful for a trip. It won‚Äôt make a difference to your travel budget, and save you tons of time! 

i‚Äôm in Japan, using it now, and can honestly say it‚Äôs the best travel app I‚Äôve ever asked | I've been using this app for several months, still figuring out the many features. I would like a little more hand-holding for new users - maybe a larger FAQ section or a sample trip. And it's awkward if you have to change your arrival and departure dates - I wound up moving every day's activity forward manually. Love the mapping feature - it shows what's near what, bus routes or walking time, etc! | This is my go to app to plan for trips! Love being able to save different places in lists and then add to daily itinerary. Let‚Äôs me easily see how to get to different places and let me family friends know where we plan to go for the day. | Love this app ‚Äî great UI!! | This is a fantastic app to track all of our travel plans, budget, and mapping between destinations. LOVE that is available off line! | Extremely slow and unresponsive | Just downloaded this today and wish I had found this sooner! Well done devs! I agree with others that the UI is a little bit cluttered and the pop-up tool tips are very annoying, however overall it‚Äôs a GREAT app for those who want to be organized and collaborate with others on a trip! I love seeing all the places we want to check out on the map so we can make efficient plans for each day of our trip. I did take one star away from my rating because this app eats up an INSANE amount of battery, even on WiFi. I also found that the response time of the app started to really slow as I added more places to my lists. I would have to click things 2-3 times before the behavior registered. Not sure why that would be and I‚Äôm hoping it‚Äôs just a temporary glitch. If that does not improve I will likely remove the app. :( | I used the app for my trip to Spain and it was exactly what I wanted/needed!! Super user friendly. All I had to do to upload hotel/train/airline information was email my ticket confirmations. I was able to map out my whole trip itinerary and have everything I need for my trip all in one place. I‚Äôve been telling all my planner friends about it. | I love the way I can put all thing in one place for a trip‚Ä¶places to stay, eat, stores, museums, everything! | They put everything I‚Äôd want in a travel planner and made it better and more efficient. And most importantly, USABLE! | It has all the things I require for my travel. From syncing my reservations to putting them on map. Suggesting things to do in neat format to having a to pack list that I can customize. 

Truly amazing app. | I have used this app for every trip we make - super super helpful. | I‚Äôve been cobbling together travel planning solutions for years, with varying degrees of success and always a bunch of clunkiness and frustration. But Wanderlog not only has everything one needs to plan, it‚Äôs very well packaged, looks good, is fun to use, and is rock solid! Plus the cost of a pro account was very reasonable given the work and consideration the team has put into the app; upgrading was a no-brainer for me. Thanks! | I‚Äôve tried a lot of trip planner apps on desktop and iPhone and none have come close to the functionality and simplicity of this app. | You can create the itinerary and track expenses at the same time! | Free version provide enough information and nicely saves travel ideas in one place. I use it also for local eatery and sightseeing.  Love map feature | This app is truly life changing. I wish I would have known about it when it first came out. 

It lets me plan my entire vacation so easily. From spending days on planning down to just a couple house. It has every single thing I need out want when it comes to travel planning. Thank you!! ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è | I hate that bait and switch. Don‚Äôt ask for my email for a free app and then try to charge me. Garbage. | While there are many options and resources on this app it isn't intuitive for suggesting places and then suggesting which day they should be scheduled when on a multi day trip. Tips kept popping up while trying to explore. I really got tired of being asked, "do you want to book a hote?" I really didn't want to book one until I understood where and when I would be going. The AI feature was nice but there again only some what helpful if you didn't want one of the options. I kept having to return to the beginning to get back to the suggested itinerary. I really am better off just using a map app to plan a route and google each location for info. When planning a trip you don't always have the time to take a class/hrs if you tube, to learn to navigate this app. | I was using an excel spreadsheet and manually looking up the distance between places to plan our trip to Iceland which involves a lot of stops around the ring road. WOW has this made life easier since discovering it. I am a big fan and can‚Äôt stop telling people how easy it is to use and how happy I am about it! | I love Wanderlog!! This app is so useful for planning trips. I am amazed at the depth of features. I love the ability to track expenses, super useful to stay on budget and also to share expenses when traveling with others. The ability to send emails with my flight and lodging info, the AI chatbot, recommendations of things in the area, ability to add to the itinerary and rearrange is all incredible. A delightful user experience üòç This is my new favorite app! | I‚Äôm loving the functionality of this app and how seamlessly it interacts with other maps and email. Update: I had an issue with printing an itinerary, but Wanderlog replied and issue now solved. Thumbs up for customer care! | The app itself is alright, but it doesn‚Äôt let you listen to music or audio in the background, which the app itself has no noise. Might seem small but I find it annoying to the point I use a different app, hopefully they fix soon. | My girlfriend and I used this app to plan our Europe trip and for referencing information/tickets/etc. throughout the trip and it was super helpful! We got the premium version for the trip. | Peter was quick to respond to a request for help navigating the email portion of the site so we could plan our triptogether. Thank you. | It helped us not only plan our trip but also keep track of all the details of vacation.   I was able to set up an itinerary that helped keep all of our plans on track without missing anything.  It was easy to move plans around to different times and days depending on our mood and timing. | I love this app because it‚Äôs such a great way to plan a trip, you‚Äôre able to place all the things you want to do on a list in whatever sections you‚Äôd like, create an itinerary, collaborate with your friends to make sure you‚Äôre all getting in on the plans, and even see all the places you want to go in perspective on a map!!! It takes away the need to do your own research on where things are located by each other and saves you so much time. Love this app so much and won‚Äôt plan a trip without it!!! | It makes planning for trips so much easier, especially with the map feature. I love that I can use the map to avoid spending more time running around than actually doing things. I may use other websites and apps to get ideas for things to do but this is the one that helps finalize my daily itineraries. Highly recommend it! | Searched for ‚Äúvacation planner‚Äù in the App Store and found this absolute GEM. I suffer from a lot of analysis paralysis and get overwhelmed when there are lots of options, especially if I don‚Äôt even know where to start/how to organize. Planning a vacation seems like a burden to me (the exact opposite of what a vacation should be!). I have yet to start planning my own vacations, but vividly remember my mom with printouts of directions, maps, and handwritten novels of advice and travel tips, attractions, restaurants, etc when planning our excursions. This app will definitely help me overcome my fears and help me plan the incredible vacations my mom used to plan!! | I have enjoyed using the app for a group trip. Features I appreciate:
1) a place to put hotel information where everyone can see so that they aren‚Äôt asking you questions about the stay you booked
2) a budget sharing feature. Everyone can see the cost of an activity. 
3) A place to put things you would like to see AND a daily itinerary. I like that I can put everything I‚Äôd like to see and I can put must see activities on the daily itinerary.
4) adding notes! Wow this is so helpful. Many things are closed on Mondays at our destination. I would have put things on our itinerary that wouldn‚Äôt have been available.
Also others can add to the notes too. Keeping everyone communicating well.
5) I like that I can just add others to my list via their email!

title: Tripadvisor: Plan & Book Trips
description:
** Be one of the first to try the beta version of our newly-launched AI itinerary builder, offering personalized recs powered by traveler tips and reviews. **

As a travel guidance company, Tripadvisor brings people, passions and places together. We aim to help make you a better traveler, from travel planning, to booking, to taking a trip. The app lets you get the most out of your trip‚Äîwhether you‚Äôre planning or on-the-go. Discover where to stay, what to do and where to eat based on guidance from millions of travelers who have been there before. Find deals on hotels, book experiences, reserve tables at great restaurants and discover great places nearby. No matter what type of trip you‚Äôre looking to take, the Tripadvisor app makes planning it easy and also lets you guide others on their way.

GET TRAVEL GUIDANCE
‚Ä¢ Find millions of reviews about hotels, restaurants, tours, attractions and other experiences from travelers like you
‚Ä¢ Read articles and guides to discover new ways to experience a destination with tips from travel experts
‚Ä¢ Discover great deals on top-rated hotels, tours, activities, experiences and other things to do
‚Ä¢ Find great places to eat nearby and make restaurant reservations

ORGANIZE YOUR TRIP IN ONE PLACE
‚Ä¢ Use the updated Trips planning tool to save hotels, restaurants, and things to do
‚Ä¢ Get personalized recs with AI itineraries powered by reviews (beta)
‚Ä¢ See your saves on your custom map
‚Ä¢ Share and collab with your travel buds
‚Ä¢ Access mobile tickets for booked tours, attractions, experiences and other things to do

GUIDE OTHER TRAVELERS
‚Ä¢ Submit your own reviews and photos of places you‚Äôve visited to guide fellow travelers
‚Ä¢ Post and answer questions from like-minded travelers in the Tripadvisor forums
releaseNotes:
Improvements to the Trip planning product which allow travelers to:

 - Receive a custom AI itinerary backed by traveler reviews
 - View saves in an organized list within the saves tab
 - Build an itinerary by adding saves and organizing them by day
 - View saves plotted on a map

She was very knowledgeable of the area. She shared so much information with us. Her enthusiasm has made me curious to find out more information about the island. Funcion√°rios educad√≠ssimos, o Sr Bruce √© muito simp√°tico com as pessoas, deixa o ambiente mais alegre üëèüëè | Bohdi Terrace was an amazing dinner experience. title: Priceline - Hotel, Car, Flight
description:
Get exclusive app-only hotel deals, discounts on rental cars, and cheap flights all in one place, with the Priceline app.

Join millions of happy travelers who book great deals with us every day - download now!
 
NEW - Stay more, save more! Unlock Priceline VIP when you book and get our best prices on great hotels.

Still need a reason to download the app? Here‚Äôs 3:
 
1. Access to exclusive hotel deals found only on the app.
2. Everything you need in one place - low-priced hotels, cheap rental cars and discounted flights.
3. Personalized, relevant hotel recommendations - we have the travel deals that matter to you.

Our app is rated as Best App for Travelers by Travel + Leisure!

SERIOUS SAVINGS
You‚Äôll save up to 60% off with Express Deals¬Æ. Seriously. Plus, you save up to 50% off hotels when you unlock Priceline VIP.

SEARCH, FIND, BOOK
Finding the perfect one is easy as pie. Search by city, address or point of interest to book the most conveniently located hotels and rental cars. As you search more, we uncover even more deals just for you.

QUICK & EASY
Want to book in a matter of seconds? Our app features super-quick travel booking, especially when you‚Äôre signed in! We do fast well.

RENTAL CAR DEALS
Hit the road with rental car deals on 22 brands in 28,000+ locations. That‚Äôs how we roll.

CHEAP FLIGHTS
Travel across the globe with super deals on thousands of domestic and international flights across the globe. Pace yourself.

TRAVEL BUDDY
Easily access and make changes to your trip wherever you are with our My Trips feature. Need to check your booking on the go? Get all of your reservation and travel info right on your phone, even if you booked on your computer and even if you don't have service! My Trips works offline, too. Like magic.

Our app has your back. And it‚Äôs watching your wallet, too. Download now!

Priceline is part of Booking Holdings, which includes leading online travel brands such as Booking.com, Agoda, Kayak & OpenTable.
releaseNotes:
We are dedicated to always offering you the most competitive prices! Explore the enhancements we've implemented to enrich your booking process.

Create price watch alerts for flights and we‚Äôll notify you when the price changes so that you never miss a deal!

Generate personalized travel itineraries for your entire trip based on your preferences and travel style

Got a question or need trip inspiration? Talk to Penny- your GenAI-powered travel assistant!

We've fixed bugs and made changes aimed at enhancing the overall performance of the app
reviews:
Unable to cancel reservation due to conflict with the date I have called and emailed to no avail I will not be using Priceline again | Good app to book hotels,flights,and rentals. | Have NOT disappointed!!! No matter the location or source of travel needed (hotel, car, or flight). Can‚Äôt encourage others enough to use this. | Fair options, honest pricing, VERY easy to book. Pay later options not all the time but still great! You get  recognized for being a loyal customer & that makes me love this app more & more. | Beware of being ripped off and not receiving a refund even when services or products are never provided.  We added a rental car through Priceline only to find out the rental car company tried to charge us an additional $335 when we went to pick the car up.  We refused to pay the additional money and reported the rental car company to Priceline, but Priceline never refunded our money even though we never received a rental car.  To make matters even worse is that we were stranded at the off site rental company in Miami, Florida because they shuttled us there and almost every person picking up rental cars had the same issue.  We ended up going back to Enterprise Rent A Car and received top notch service. 
VERY DISAPPOINTED WITH PRICELINE!!! | How do I find them ? | Thanks a lot Joeane Valerie for understanding the issue and providing the prompt solution.I really appreciate the great customer service experience. | I truly praise God for Priceline, because during the pandemic, I was able to stay at incredible hotels, and now I still have those same incredible rates. I‚Äôve tried 6 times and keep getting the same message. I knew I should have stayed with Cheap Tickets. Their app actually works and their prices are cheaper!! Deleting Priceline ASAP! | If you have an issue with something going wrong with a hotel stay Priceline will find any reason even making one up to NOT compensate for the problem. First of all the automated service to connect with a live person is absolute garbage .. and when you actually get through it‚Äôs to the wrong department and answered by people whose spoken English is at times so difficult to understand .. I was surprised to and disappointed to say the least! What a total scam! I have traveled consistently for the past 13 weeks for work varying from M-F. And cannot believe how much extra I paid for hotels using your site! 
Also realized that I was placed in the worst ‚Äú or not updated‚Äù room in each hotel. So I started to do my research. Unbelievable! I spent thousands of dollars over the last 13 weeks of travel. SHAME ON YOU! | Always checks lower prices, never disappointed! | At first, I was a little skeptical on using this app but now I depend on it wherever I go, I use this app to get a better deal on hotels cars flights so now I use this app more than my bank account would like . | Great app, easy to use and better customer service than most airlines | Very simple and easy to book! Great application. Please add Known Traveller Number to the App. I was able to add it to my flight request when I signed in using the Priceline website. | I recently left a horrible review. Was asked to contact customer support‚Ä¶.well any booking issues goes through the sister company Booking.com. So still no help from Priceline. | I am a VIP Priceline member. By the time I placed a reservation with the third location showing availability- my client refused to reschedule a third time after I‚Äôd already had to reschedule twice and I lost a deal I‚Äôd been working on for three months because of the erroneous information in this app- to add insult to injury, I was charged for services that were never provided. ONE HAPPY MEMBER

When I got there, they didn‚Äôt have the vehicle I reserved but gave me a full size Chevrolet 4wheel drive truck. I could barely get into it because of how high off the ground it was. This was a horrible experience! I am not used to driving a vehicle this big. I had trouble finding places to park it. Very difficult in some places. Then to top it off, the gas mileage was unbelievable and the cost for fuel was way more than I had budgeted.

I booked it almost 2 months in advanceand his time is to come home and last minute they changed his deployment date so he couldn‚Äôt come home the full amount of time so I explained the situation to them and they said to me I had to pay $360 more to change his flight to back home a few days early I told him I‚Äôd never use Priceline again that they did not respect our military men and women. I am so disgusted I even was told in the beginning it would cost $99. OK I can deal with that but then come back and tell me 360 after we‚Äôre doing the booking is just wrong. This is out of our control, so why should we be punished for it? I‚Äôm done.

title: Expedia: Hotels, Flights & Car
description:
The Expedia app is an all-in-one travel companion where you can plan, book and manage your whole trip, plus earn rewards, in one place. Members instantly get discounted Member Prices on flights, hotels, cruises, car rentals, and activities. With our new rewards program, One Key‚Ñ¢, you can earn, combine and use OneKeyCash‚Ñ¢ rewards across Expedia, Hotels.com, and Vrbo. Dreaming of a beach vacation in Florida? Or a romantic getaway in Paris? Get more out of any trip with the Expedia app. 

One Key members save instantly:   
- Instantly save 10%* or more on over 100,000 hotels worldwide with Member Prices.   
- Price Tracking: Get notified if the price of a flight drops. 
- Price Drop Protection: Get refunded if the price of your flight drops after booking.** 
- Earn OneKeyCash in the Expedia app and get rewarded fast. 

In-trip extras as your status rises, like free room upgrades when available. 

Discover your next trip: 
- Search millions of flights, hotels, rental cars, packages, attractions, and more.  
- Add a hotel to your flight to save even more.  
- Choose from over 500,000+ hotels worldwide, including boutique and luxury hotels, airport hotels, hostels, B&Bs, vacation rentals, and resorts.  
- Read verified reviews you can trust. 
- Sort your search by price, free cancellation or no change fees, departure and arrival time, and more.  

Easy, smart trip planning: 
- Chat GPT integration: Get your travel-related questions answered with expert insight and personalized recommendations with the launch of our AI-powered trip planner. 
- Shareable Trips: Collaborate, plan and share trip information with others, all in one place.  
 
 Manage your whole trip in one app:  
- Free cancellation on most hotels.*  
- All your reservations in one place: view upcoming trip details, hotel information, and maps for directions.  
- Trip alerts: for flight delays, gate changes, hotel check-out times, and more. 
- Share itineraries with family and friends via email or text message.  
- Get inspired by our curated travel guides.  
 
Download the Expedia app now and join for free to enjoy One Key member benefits.   
 
 *Member Prices are available on select hotels to logged in members and app users. The discount will be applied to the price of selected hotels (excluding applicable taxes and other fees). Price predictions are not a guarantee. Available to One Key members on select routes.  Expedia‚Äôs usual booking Terms and Conditions apply and Reward Terms apply, see site for details. Free cancellation on most hotels. Some hotels require you to cancel at least 24-48 hours before check-in. See property pages on our app for details.   

 
** Available for a fee on select flights and free for Gold and Platinum One Key Members. Refund will be the difference if the price of your flight on Expedia drops. Terms apply. See site for details.  

 
The Expedia app uses information for analytics, personalization, and advertising. By using our app, you agree to our privacy and cookies policies.
releaseNotes: Thanks for exploring the world with Expedia as your on-the-go travel companion. This update contains bug fixes and performance improvements to make your digital experience as smooth as possible. Bon voyage, traveler!

title: KAYAK: Flights, Hotels & Cars
description:
KAYAK searches hundreds of travel sites at once to find exactly what you need for your trip, from cheap flights to great hotel deals and car rentals. Nonstop flight leaving at 9am? Sure. Pet-friendly vacation rental near the slopes? Yup. SUV rental for under $50/day? We're on it. Because we're travelers too and know that every trip is worth planning.

BOOK FLEXIBLY
Easily search, filter and sort your options to find the right travel offers for you - whether it's flights you can change with no fees, hotels, vacation rentals and car rentals with free cancellation, the cheapest deal, or the most comfortable seat.

SAVE MONEY
Get mobile-only rates and Private Deals on the app. Set Price Alerts to find out when prices drop, and use Explore to discover new destinations within your budget.

EVERYTHING IN ONE PLACE
This is more than just a travel app. Our Trips tool keeps your plans in order. Get alerts for flight and gate changes, access boarding pass on and offline and plan out and share your itinerary, all from one place. Use Guides to create, collect and share daily itineraries, tips and impressions along the way.

COMPARE FLIGHT DEALS FROM 900+ SITES
‚Ä¢ Take the stress out of trip planning. Find flexible flight offers with no change fees.
‚Ä¢ Search with flexible dates up to +/- 3 days to see when's the best time to fly.
‚Ä¢ Filter options based on stops, airlines, departure times, cancellation policies, amenities & more.
‚Ä¢ Save your preferences to see your favorite airlines and hotels first (and skip ones you don't like).
‚Ä¢ Book at the right time. Price Forecast lets you know whether you should wait or book now.
‚Ä¢ We'll even show you Hacker Fares which pair together two one-way tickets for a round-trip flight (and save you $$).

FIND A RENTAL CAR THAT FITS YOUR TRIP
‚Ä¢ Search from over 70,000 locations to find the perfect car rental for your trip.
‚Ä¢ Filter your rental car search by vehicle type including hybrids and electric vehicles, offers with unlimited mileage, enhanced cleaning and much more.
‚Ä¢ Risk-free booking: Find car rentals with a free cancellation policy so if plans change, you can easily rebook.

HOTELS, VACATION RENTALS AND UNIQUE STAYS FROM THOUSANDS OF SITES
‚Ä¢ Compare all sorts of accommodation, from five-star resorts to holiday homes and boutique hotels.
‚Ä¢ Looking for a staycation? Uncover deals on amazing places to visit right here in the USA.
‚Ä¢ Stay flexible by easily filtering for hotel deals and vacation rentals with free cancellation.
‚Ä¢ Unlock Private Deals and exclusive mobile-only rates for even more savings.

EXPLORE: Discover new destinations on your budget
‚Ä¢ Whether you have $300 or $3,000 to spend, Explore lets you set a budget and shows you where in the world you can go.

TRIPS: All your travel plans in one place.
‚Ä¢ Keep all your plans organized in one travel app, regardless of where you booked.
‚Ä¢ Forward your booking confirmation emails to trips@kayak.com or sync your Gmail or Outlook account.
‚Ä¢ Use our Flight Tracker to stay up-to-date on any flight's progress, with real-time status updates, gate change & baggage claim notifications.
‚Ä¢ Check your Trip Stats to see how far you traveled, your top cities, and how many times you've been around the world.
‚Ä¢ Your traveler data is safe and secure - meaning you never have to re-enter your booking and credit card info.
‚Ä¢ Share your vacation plans with family & friends.
‚Ä¢ No signal, no problem. View your itinerary and notes with no internet connection.

MEASURE YOUR BAG
‚Ä¢ AR measuring tool lets you know if your carry-on bag complies with the policy of the airline you're flying with.

PRICE ALERTS: Never miss a deal
‚Ä¢ Let us do the searching for you. Create a Price Alert and we‚Äôll notify you when the price drops.

Download the KAYAK travel app now and get ready for your next travel adventure!
releaseNotes: Few things in life are guaranteed: death, taxes‚Ä¶ and now, getting a great deal on your flight. That last one is thanks to KAYAK PriceCheck, our newest feature that lets you double-check a flight's price with just a screenshot. So no matter where you look, simply upload a pic of the flight/price to our app and we'll search hundreds of sites for a better price. You can send your gratitude in the form of a cheese-of-the-month club, preferably.

title: Skyscanner ‚Äì travel deals
description:
Skyscanner makes planning your next trip easy.
No matter where you are ‚Äì search for flights, hotels and car rental deals to anywhere in the world, on the move. Save time and money by comparing and booking from your favorite travel brands like Spirit Airlines, United Airlines, and American Airlines all in one place, too. There are no booking fees or hidden charges ‚Äì just the best prices. Here‚Äôs how to use our app: 

Find inspiration
Can‚Äôt decide where? Perfect. Start by exploring everywhere first. Tap ‚ÄúEverywhere‚Äù in our search bar to find cheap flights literally anywhere around the world and get ideas for your next vacation.

Filter your search
Know what you‚Äôre looking for? Use our smart filters to search by flight duration, airline, number of stops, travel class, departure and arrival times.

The best time to fly
You‚Äôve chosen where it will be, now to find the best dates to book your vacation. Our calendar view breaks down the cheapest dates in a chosen month so you can find the right flight deal. Not ready to book yet? Set up a Price Alert and we‚Äôll let you know when the flight price changes so you‚Äôre always booking at the right time.

The right hotel at the right place
Thought we were just about cheap flights? Nope, we‚Äôve got your stay covered too. Compare and book cheap deals from thousands of hotels, resorts, apartments, motels and hostels all over the world. Or find rooms near your current location and grab a last-minute deal for your next vacation. 

Rent a car
Choose where and when to pick up your car rental, and we‚Äôll show you cheap prices and deals. You can filter your search by vehicle type, fuel type and features. And our Fair Fuel Policy flag will make sure you‚Äôre not paying too much on fuel ‚Äì we‚Äôve got your back.

Book with who you trust
Compare all your top travel brands in one place ‚Äì Spirit Airlines, United Airlines, American Airlines, JetBlue, Frontier Airlines, Delta, Ctrip, Expedia, Kiwi.com, Trip.com, Agoda and more. Plus, get recent reviews on our travel partners from our community of travelers. 

No added fees ever
Did we mention we don‚Äôt charge any booking fees? Never. None at all.

Save your flights
Want to look but not ready to book? No problem. We have a ‚Äúsaved‚Äù feature where you can ‚Äúheart‚Äù flights or hotels you like. Then it‚Äôll show up on your trips, so you can pick up where you left off and get booking. 

Why Skyscanner?
‚óè	The Telegraph; ‚ÄúThe only 20 travel apps you‚Äôll ever need‚Äù
‚óè	The New York Times; ‚ÄúApps for Travelers Dreaming of Their Next Trip‚Äù
‚óè	Elite Daily; ‚Äú7 holiday travel apps that‚Äôll let you jingle around the world‚Äô
‚óè	Pocket-lint; ‚Äú4 apps to get you ready for summer‚Äù

Let‚Äôs get social
‚óè	Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/skyscanner 
‚óè	Instagram: @skyscanner 
‚óè	Twitter: @skyscanner
‚óè	LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/skyscanner/
‚óè	Website: www.skyscanner.net
releaseNotes: This update includes a filter to search the cheapest month to fly. If you don‚Äôt know which month to take your trip, you can easily find the cheapest month to fly to a certain destination. Just tap ‚ÄúSearch Anytime‚Äù when selecting your dates and we‚Äôll show you the cheapest price available for flights in each month over the next year. Up, up, and away!

title: Airbnb
description:
FIND YOUR PERFECT STAY WITH AIRBNB CATEGORIES
Explore our curated collections of homes chosen for their style, location, or nearby activities. Whether you‚Äôre looking for a cozy cabin with views or apartments by the beach, Airbnb Categories helps you find places to stay that are right for your trip. 

CUSTOMIZE YOUR SEARCH WITH 100+ FILTERS
Narrow down your choices easily with filters that help you book homes that meet your needs. Search by certain amenities, like pools and fireplaces, or filter for confirmed accessibility features, like step-free bedroom access.

MANAGE ALL YOUR TRAVEL DETAILS EASILY
The Airbnb app keeps all your essential trip info in one convenient place, so you can quickly revisit or share your travel details with others. You‚Äôre also able to chat with your Host and receive up-to-the-minute booking updates, making it easier to get there, get inside, and get connected to wifi.

TRY FUN EXPERIENCES LED BY LOCALS
Airbnb Experiences are fun activities led by Hosts. They‚Äôre a great way to immerse yourself in a new place with a local expert as your guide. Browse both in-person and online options, whether you want an Experience that gets you out and about or one you can enjoy from the comfort of your couch. Book, save, or share your favorites‚Äîall with the Airbnb app.

IT‚ÄôS NEVER BEEN EASIER TO AIRBNB YOUR HOME
As a new Host, Airbnb Setup matches you with an experienced Superhost in your area who‚Äôll provide one-to-one help from your first question to your first booking‚Äîby phone, video call, or chat. You‚Äôll also have one-tap access to Community Support agents to guide you through anything from account issues to billing support.
releaseNotes: Feel at home wherever you travel with Airbnb. We‚Äôre always working to better your experience through improvements and updates to the app.

I tried booking 4 hotel rooms with a specific host just for her to decline each request and tell me that the dates weren‚Äôt available, even though the site was showing it was available for when I needed it. This person had over 100 apartment units available to book on the Air bnb site. I asked if any were available and she told me NO. Not to mention my account got restricted because they suspected fraud since I tried booking 4 apartment units back to back. I contacted customer support 3 times about getting my account corrected. My account will be restricted for 10 days. They were no help what so ever. Their only solution was to have one of my guest book the apartment. I tried booking under my mothers Air bnb account just for me to have issues with her account as well. I ended up on the phone with air bnb 3 times on behalf of her account. My experience has been horrible. I have given up. I recommend using another app like Vrbo. This experience was extremely unexpected. And not to mention this was my FIRST TIME BOOKING WITH AIR BNB. I have heard good things about air bnb so this was very unexpected. | This is a review of the Airbnb app only not the service. 

The app is the best version they‚Äôve ever released! I can do pretty much everything for my cell phone. It‚Äôs intuitive and lacks the clutter that every other booking app has her hosts. | I‚Äôve had several good experiences with Airbnb, and when things go smoothly, it can be a great experience.  But when hosts misrepresent their properties, or act out of bad faith, Airbnb does surprisingly little to step in and address the issues.

We recently had a trip where the host listed the size of their home to be 50%+ bigger than it actually was. When we reported it to Airbnb, they said there was little they could do and any refund would have to come willingly from the host (who obviously declined to give any money back).  The host was clearly acting in bad faith and admitted the place was not as large as advertised, and Airbnb continued to let him list it without issue (my hunch is that he makes Airbnb a significant amount of money through his dozens of properties, and they don‚Äôt want to ruffle his feathers).

After a lot back and forth with Airbnb support, they offered to refund $9 on a $5,000. Unbelievable.

The system works when everything is good, but when anything else happens, be prepared for Airbnb to leave you stranded and keep your money. | In an app, like this, it would be basic functionality to allow the users to hide properties which they don‚Äôt like.
Anytime, I have to search for a rental, it‚Äôs like finding a needle in a haystack.
I keep going over the same properties over and over and then just give up and book a hotel. Lol. | Six of us traveled together and booked an airbnb. Three out of six come home with bedbug bites. I provided clear photos to customer support seeking for a solution, but they refuse to step in, claiming unless I have photos of the bedbug, they can‚Äôt do anything. Knowing bedbug bites takes few days to show plus we had a short trip, this seem like Airbnb is protecting the host. We stepped back and said if they can‚Äôt issue any refund, at least temporarily suspend the host to protect other users. Airbnb refuses again. So travelers, don‚Äôt use airbnb ‚Äî your safety is NOT protected!! Go get a hotel room instead | Our family booked a condo in Cambridge Ma March 13-17.  The owner Adam was not allowed to do short term rentals in this building (Airbnb‚Äôs).  I have evidence showing this from the building owner and management.  The apartment was extremely dirty and had a horrible smell.  Airbnb asked for proof.  So I returned to the apartment and took timestamp photos.  The owner(Adam) disputed the claims/photos.  Saying I doctored the photos.  Airbnb refused to provide a refund.  I would NOT use Airbnb. | I have been a loyal airbnb customer for 5 years. I will never use airbnb again. I heard people say they dont like airbnbs because they are never clean . Now I see what everyone means. My last 3 airbnbs have been disgusting and each time it gets worse. The worse part about airbnb  is they take the HOST side before the consumer and we pay all the money. They don‚Äôt compensate you for the dirty and unsafe listing. Airbnb support told me my host was being to kind for refunding me for the days after I cancel my airbnb ! As she should because I wont be there !!!! The blatant disrespect has lost a loyal customer. Airbnb should be ASHAMED ! | I rented an apartment and I got a notice of the host not paying rent. When I contacted air bnb they said they couldn‚Äôt do anything! I paid way more than the actual rent, since I had the bill, and was shocked to know Air Bnb couldn‚Äôt do a thing! I had to handle it with my host, is what they said. Why do I pay a service fee then? How can you allow someone to post a rental if it‚Äôs not paid for on the host side? The customer service has gone downhill dramatically in the last year. So many issues with so many properties and they never help. After 6 years I am done with this app. Hotels at least are more accountable than this platforms and it‚Äôs rentals. | So Awesome | This company is a scam, it has absolutely no customer service. I have several issues with the app itself and for a stay I did using the app. I am chatting on the app and random people come and say they will work on the case but fee mins later they are gone and no updates for several days. Chat bot keeps asking do you still need help but that dumb bot doesn't see that airbnb has done nothing. I have called and talked to actual people but they say they will work but nothing is done by them as well. I previously reported issue to executive team and that person said let me work on it and get back to you but it has been more than a month and no one has responded. Disgusting app experience and with the staff of airbnb | I have used airbnb for years. They decided to remove my account with no further explanation, asked for an appeal and the information they based this decision on. Just denied my appeal and removed my account unfairly. This app was great, has been horrible this past year. | Don‚Äôt download this. For some reason it needed a card put in then it took $22 from my account. Very annoying | after years of dealing with discrimination, terrible customer service, rates above market price, and a platform that puts its hosts above its guests, I just had my last negative experience. Verbo and hotels.com are better in every way. | They don‚Äôt care anymore. 
Customer service will leave you hanging with no way to escalate issue to upper management. 

What are we suppose to do now | I had decent experience with airbnb. My issue comes in with the ‚Äúreview‚Äù system. I don‚Äôt feel it is fair that the app urges us to give the host a good review or it won‚Äôt be posted, but the host can write a bad review about the customer and it gets posted with no issues. Plus we have to ‚Äúdispute‚Äù a negative review through support which takes forever if it even happens. It‚Äôs very dishonest and unfair to current and future users. All reviews about the host should be posted, good or bad because all reviews get posted about the customer no matter if it‚Äôs good or bad. I will not use the app anymore because of this. I deleted my account. | Verification system threw up random error messages on browser when trying to verify phone number.
Then after I try on the app it says I can‚Äôt confirm for 24 hours?!
Talked to customer service representative but they were VERY unhelpful. | I have used Airbnb for 6 years. On 4 different occasions I have booked an Airbnb 5+ months out from my scheduled trip and then had the hosts cancel on me right before. This year, Airbnb allowed the host to cancel on me 2 days before my trip leaving me to panic and scramble to find a new one. I tried numeorus times reaching out for assistance and got nothing in return. I can no longer rely on Airbnb, there is no point in booking one since hosts can cancel whenever. The hosts have too much power and Airbnb does nothing to protect or assist renters. | Just felt bitter about recent encounter with Airbnb. I had an excursion planned in Europe and my flight was cancelled in Amsterdam‚Äôs ‚Äî thanks KLM. I didn‚Äôt make a flight and Airbnb would not try to workout a deal and charged $250+ even though it wasn‚Äôt our fault.
Peace, 
Max | Idk what I would do without airbnb honestly ! Wether it's for traveling , work, vacation, or lifestyle good or bad! It's definitely worth booking through, no resort fees or security deposits ! | 2 of the last 3 times I used AirBnB, the listings seriously misrepresented the property. One claimed to have 3 bathrooms; in actuality the property had only 1 toilet. The other claimed to be oceanfront / beachfront; in actuality it was ~1 or 2 blocks from the beach. (The 3rd one was honest and wonderful). 
I don‚Äôt know if I‚Äôll use AirBnB again. It‚Äôs a risk. Owners seem fine with making stuff up and AirBnB seems not to have any mechanism to ensure accurate listings, they try to get you to ‚Äúwork it‚Äù with the owner. | When things go wrong your on your own.  They will not protect you and you will not get your money back, we call this a scam in business.  
What a joke.  They used to be good but now have no moral compass.  Sad. | I had a host accept my alternate stay and she never refunded my money back. I called Airbnb Support and she didn‚Äôt respond to them. I lost out on $687.09 . The Customer Service is in India so you will not get any help with that either. If the host withheld your refund, the host can negotiate what they want to give back. This is company is not about the customer it‚Äôs about the host. | I don‚Äôt know how people afford to book Airbnbs anymore. The fees are just out of control. Between the cleaning and booking fees, it‚Äôs literally half the price if you stay at a hotel.  Airbnb please reign this in and go back to basics. As far as the app, filtering options are limited‚Ä¶and quite inaccurate. If I search for waterfront, I‚Äôm not interested in your property that‚Äôs a 1 mi drive to the water. üôÑ | At lease at a hotel you can hold someone accountable and/or get a refund if the host doesn‚Äôt hold up their end of the deal. AirBnB does not have any interest in your complaints or concerns. The rental could be completely wrong, full of bugs, mold, and you will be stuck for the duration. Don‚Äôt take my word for it, just research AIRBNB nightmares and you‚Äôll find that this organization is completely corrupt and the hosts are more often than not dishonest in their listings and Airbnb does not verify that listings are as advertised. A scheme all the way to the top. I lost months of funds while traveling due to booking extended stays at a string of listings that fell very short of expectation, including the bugs and mold. It was too late once I realized that no matter what listing I ended up at, none of them were as advertised and the company told me too bad. Video evidence, pictures. Didn‚Äôt matter. They just assumed it was in bad faith. They tell you to settle it on site with the host. They‚Äôll tell you the host has THE ENTIRE DURATION of your stay to resolve the issue. Even if they make no effort to resolve the complaint, it still counts. RUN FOR YOUR LIFE. | Why do you hide addresses? I‚Äôm trying to book a place and I want to look up on a map how close it is to trails. Your built in map doesn‚Äôt show the trails so I need the address to look on a trail map. In the end I didn‚Äôt book through this app. Hiding the address is shady! Hotels don‚Äôt hide their address. I booked a hotel instead! Completely stupid business model! | The idea that Airbnb allows their host to charge crazy high cleaning fees is ridiculous. You should not be allowed to charge a daily cleaning unless you are cleaning daily!!!
