title: Visited: Travel Map With Lists
description:
Beat your own travel stats. Get inspired to visit exotic new destinations. Track your experiences around the world as you tick off your bucket list.

MAP YOUR TRAVELS
-Design your personal travel map by displaying countries, states / provinces / regions and cities of where you have been or want to visit.

GET INSPIRED
-Visualize your future travels by swiping through beautiful photos and adding them to your wishlist.

TRAVEL ITINERARY

- Wondering where to travel next? We got you covered. Select different destinations and places based on travel lists, experiences and inspirational photos. We'll show you which countries have the highest numbers of places you wish to visit. So you can go down the list and optimize your travel plans. 
- Picking your next travel destination just got a lot easier with the Visited App!

TRAVEL BUCKET LIST
-Keep up with your travel life goals by selecting all the countries of the world that you want to visit.
-Add travel journal notes by country of your travel dates, points of interest or personal memories.

KEEP TRACK OF YOUR TRAVEL JOURNEY
-Share your personalized stats with others! You can share your travel ranking, percentage of the world seen and countries you‚Äôve visited.
-See your top 5 most frequently visited countries.
-Create regional maps for over 20 countries, including United States, Canada, Australia, Germany, UK, Russia, France and others.

TRAVEL EXPERIENCES
-Want to see how many of the worlds‚Äô capital cities you have been to? Or how about how many art museums you‚Äôve visited? Using the list feature, check off places you have been to or want to visit by category. Lists include: African Safaris, Capitals of the World, Wonders of the World, Pyramids, Culinary Experiences, Ancient Sites, Churches, Greek & Roman Ruins, Cruise Ports, Beer Destinations, Palaces, US national parks, Ski Slops, World's Top Beaches, Shopping Destinations, LGBTQ+ Destinations, Popular Hiking Trails, Lakes, Bridges, Snorkelling/Diving Locations, Chocolate Destinations, Castles, Wine Regions, Kids Attractions, Temples, Mountain Ranges, Rock Climbing Locations, Monasteries, Opera Houses, Funicular Railways, Waterfalls, Volcanos, Mosques, US National Monuments, Hot Springs, Tunnels, US Memorial, Dance Shows, Deserts, Famous Prisons, Canal Cruises, Formula One Circuits, Top Surf Spots, Underground Cities, Whale Watching Spots, Synagogues, Caves, US National Historic Site, Tennis Destinations, Film Festivals, US National Battlefields and Scotch Distillery Regions. 
 
-Track your experiences by country such as where you‚Äôve gone golfing, snorkelling/diving, skiing, wine tours and others.

FULLY CUSTOMIZABLE
-Select different colors or design your own based on your travel type
-Pick fully accessible, high contrast colors for your map.
-Dark mode is supported to make the app easier to use while taking a red eye flight
-Adjust the sovereignty for disputed territories

SEE HOW YOU COMPARE TO OTHER TRAVELERS:
- Compare your travel stats with other global travellers or friends
- See the top 10 most popular countries to visit from your home city
- Share your travel map, stats and bucket list with your family and friends

Have you ever had a problem where you can‚Äôt actually remember all the countries you‚Äôve been to? That‚Äôs why we created Visited ‚Äì a simple and fun travel tracker. With Visited, you will be able to not only keep a log of all the countries, regions, and cities you‚Äôve been to, but you‚Äôll also be able to see your accomplishments beautifully rendered on a world map that you can share proudly. A digital scratch map if you will! You can also use Visited to plan your upcoming adventures by being inspired by breathtaking travel photos and building up your bucket list.
releaseNotes:
- Adding Video
- Adding New Lists
reviews:
We love to travel.  Middle class Texans, been to a lot nations, all 50 states and most of Texas‚Äô farm to market and back paved/unpaved roads. Aruba, Bonaire and Curacao on our wish list then at 87 we‚Äôll take a break. | The map is poor quality and hard to navigate but it gets the job. Zooming close enough to clearly see borders is frustrating on very small island countries. | If I purchase Visited Pro version, is it gonna be a monthly or yearly subscription? What additional features will be available? | STAY AWAY!! This app supports consumption of endangered species and exploitation of native cultures.  Travel apps are fun, and there are many many others that don‚Äôt do this. Choose a different one. | Can you please make the country flag size bigger. | I have never wrote a review EVER‚Ä¶ but this may be the WORST app I have ever gotten in my life. Very frustrating to work. I LITERALLY had to type where I lived over 5 times. I could not get passed it no matter what. I just want a simple app that tracks the places I‚Äôve been. Do NOT DOWNLOAD. | Nothing saves when I put it into the app. I emailed them months ago no response. Waste of money and I would like it back | Just keeps asking me what country I live in and what city. When hit next, it asks the same question. It‚Äôs an endless loop. | You have to pay the monthly subscription fee to even add the places you‚Äôve been. | This app is great for travel and aspirational travel planning. Lots of cool features, I ended up paying for the full package. Tech support was fast and helpful when I had an issue. | Love this app! I just wish it had some better options and visuals for sharing maps and progress with friends and on social media. | The best thing about this App is that the owner actually responds to multiple request to add cities!  Easy and fun way to track my visits to 54 countries to date‚Ä¶. Including many non-tourist destinations. | It used to be you zoom in and see the subdivisions of the country. They got rid of that and now you have to click the country, then click a few other things. Nowhere near as seamless. Please bring the old functionality back! | The site keeps asking me to update where I live and won‚Äôt do anything else. | I have fun marking off places I have visited and being able to see my progress.  Also, the developers are great, as I have provided feedback and content and the team updates the app as needed.  Great job! | How is possible that you has to agree to receive thousands of emails that you don‚Äôt want to use the app? Plus has to pay extra for add remove but no email scam chain? Blame on you. | Sorry, if I can‚Äôt even try the app without signing up for an email list, it is a non-starter. I should not be required to sign up for marketing junk mail before I even know if I like the app. If this gets fixed/changed then maybe I could give a better rating. | I have been traveling a lot in recent years & decided I wanted to start logging locations. This was the 2nd app I decided to try, but I couldn‚Äôt even get past the set up because it required me to choose my home city off a list that didn‚Äôt contain my home city. It did not offer any way to manually enter my home city, and no way to bypass that selection. So, needless to say, I deleted the app. | Recommend multiple family profiles so kids are encouraged to discover as much/more as their parents | The app doesn‚Äôt load | This app looks so cool, but when I try to sign up, there is an error that pops up on the screen. I used different emails too. I don‚Äôt know what‚Äôs wrong!

EDIT: The app is super helpful. The customer support was amazing. Thank you! | Well I‚Äôd like to review this app for its features or literally anything but I can‚Äôt even use it. I try to make an account and it won‚Äôt get off the loading screen. I‚Äôve uninstalled and reinstalled it multiple times. | Loved this app. But won‚Äôt load since the update yesterday! | I had been using this app and enjoyed it, but logged in today to a screen asking me to agree to a privacy policy. There was an additional checkbox asking permission for the app to send me promotional mail. I left it unchecked and submitted and was greeted with ‚ÄúWhoops! You must accept everything or delete your account. The two buttons to proceed were literally ‚Äúok‚Äù and ‚Äúdelete account‚Äù. I didn‚Äôt say ok. How insulting | Buggy. I downloaded this app and after 15 minutes of trying to see the scratched countries, I gave up. All I could see was a yellow dot where I live. I changed the water color and the whole map changed to that color except for the yellow dot. Waste of time. | Got this app to log the places I‚Äôve traveled to and even bought the almost $10 packet which includes no ads, unlocks cities, regions etc., of where you‚Äôve traveled. However, every time I wanted to save a city for example in Mexico, I wanted to log Cancun, Puerto Vallarta, Tulum.. it would not save no matter how many times I pressed the BEEN button. Even restarted my phone to make sure the issue was not on my end.

Please fix this! | I liked the app but even after you pay to get rid of the ads they force you to subscribe to advertising email list.  It‚Äôs either subscribe or delete your account, the only options, I deleted my account t.  I got fooled. | Seriously? 8.99 for this? You can not even exporta decent picture of where you have been in the map. | Useless if you‚Äôve only traveled domestically. | I‚Äôve tried multiple times, and even deleted the app, reinstalled it, and still no luck. | Get ready to be spammed. They sell your email and all sorts of weird malicious spam starts reaching out to you | This is a good way to keep track of world travels. It works great. | Just trying to record countries visited not give you all my info. Ugh. | So it good with the countries. I was trying to update cities I been and lived and it would let me add. It only updates countries. It also isn‚Äôt user friendly. I have to re-teach myself how to reset the city I currently live (still not accurate on my app). Also, something I can get over if the city updates work, is it has plenty of Territories as separate counties which love, but it picks and chooses which ones (such as Canadian territories not being separated from the country) and it also doesn‚Äôt acknowledge all disputed territory very well. For example Morocco on it‚Äôs map has territory that isn‚Äôt part of it, it is UN accurate, but if your going UN accurate, then a territories shouldn‚Äôt be separate. So Puerto Rico is part of the United States and not independent. I do prefer that it separates it. But I am annoyed that it picks and chooses for you who owns what land. To be honest I wouldn‚Äôt have even cared about most of this if the upgrades I paid for actually worked. | Have to enter cities and countries twice. For example; entering city as Barcelona in Spain won‚Äôt show Spain as a country visited. You must enter the country as a different entry. Not worth $8 or anything. A waste. | The app itself is fine. But to use it you must accept terms that you accept unlimited spam from them and their partners. There are other apps that don‚Äôt do that. There are plenty of websites that do not for free. | This app REQUIRES you to sign up and forces subscription (says you can op-out at anytime).

You can NOT op-out.  Apple should remove this app as a scam to customers. | I downloaded the app because it also has the list of places, food, capitals, parks, etc.  Unfortunately, the app is missing the option to filter searches. When searching for cities in the US, it shows a list of all the cities in alphabetical order and not by state - it would‚Äôve been convenient to filter the cities by state in addition to having a search. Also, when selecting the destinations visited under the list tab, it does not filter lista by ‚Äúbeen‚Äù or ‚Äúwant to visit‚Äù. | This is a good app and I even paid to remove ads and to unlock all the features. HOWEVER, it needs to give more control to the user. They collect so much of your personal information. It‚Äôs like either use it and let us collect these information, or leave it. Also, I was forced to sign up to their newsletter. It said I can withdraw from their newsletter at anytime but there is no option for that in the map. I paid for the premium features but you know what? Don‚Äôt. None of the premium features were worth it. Let me start off by cities. You can type and choose the cities that you‚Äôve been to and cities that you want to visit. But that is it. You can‚Äôt even see a list of those cities that you want to visit, let alone a map of it. Looks like they made it easy for them to collect our information. Inspiration doesn‚Äôt have anything. It said it would show travel photos. The only photo it shows is the thumbnail when you select from want/been. If you do download this app, please do go to privacy section and read the ‚ÄúWhat personal information do we collect?‚Äù Section. So far, what a waste of money it has been. If it gets improved, I will update my review. | After you setup your account, the app requires you to both (1) accept their privacy policy and (2) agree to receive marketing emails from them. If you do not do both, it offers a ‚ÄúDelete Account‚Äù option. If you choose that, it then tries to charge you $2.99, rather than simply deleting your data. | Absolutely cool, only one issue though; There should be an option for the places you have lived and where you are currently living to be different. | Be prepared to pay $8.99 the ONLY feature you get for free is to select your countries visited. All other content is to be paid for. There are tons of apps out there for free that will give you that. Save your money. | Can I change the email address associated with my account? | I love this app bec it lets me track the places I have been and gives me stats on the travel I have done ! | Love the app except for 1 part. It doesn‚Äôt show the different countries for the United Kingdom. England, Wales, Scotland, and Northern Ireland are all separate countries and should be counted as such. | App is trash and waste of time | The app seemed interesting. I downloaded it, installed it launched it. First thing that comes up it  asks for your email. App immediately uninstalled. When will developers learn that people don‚Äôt want to be violated to use their app? | X
  You job is uddvthyqhayhjia  ( f | Enjoying the new update with all of the new lists, but was hoping to have the National Parks list ONLY contain the 63 national parks and not all of the other preserves, lakeshores, etc. Would also be nice to have a total count number with the overall percentage that‚Äôs being listed. | I lost my previous traveling data once I had select the option for cities. I preferred states, not cities. I will not resubscribe.

title: Hotels.com: Travel Booking
description:
Find and book your perfect somewhere with the Hotels.com app.  
 
GET REWARDED THROUGH OUR APP  
- Access Member Prices* of 10% or more on over 100,000 hotels worldwide. 
- Join One Key‚Ñ¢, our travel program that unlocks a world of instant benefits and perks. 
- Earn OneKeyCash‚Ñ¢** and use this whenever you want and instantly save on your next trip on Hotels.com, Expedia and Vrbo when you book eligible hotel stays, flights, vacation rentals, car rentals, and more. 
- One Key Silver, Gold and Platinum members can enjoy extra perks at select VIP Access properties. 
 
FIND THE ONE THAT‚ÄôS JUST RIGHT FOR YOU 
- Choose from over 500,000 properties worldwide.  
- Whether you‚Äôre planning a short hotel stay, last minute weekend getaway, long vacation, business trip, or anything in between, we have a property for every kind of travel. 
- Enjoy the flexibility of free cancellation on most hotels***. 
- Compare hotel prices, ratings and amenities side-by-side using our comparison tool. 
- Use Trip Planner to organize your travel plans in one place. Save your favorite hotels, vacation rentals, resorts and more, and share these with friends and family.    
- See the hotel or vacation rental location on a map and read verified guest reviews. 

FAST, EASY, & SECURE BOOKING ON OUR APP  
- It only takes a few taps to book your hotel. 
- Pay now or later on most hotels. 
- Save your payment details to book future trips even faster. 
- Last minute hotel booking. 
 
OUR APP IS YOUR PERFECT TRAVEL COMPANION  
- Save your confirmation and access your hotel or vacation rental booking details anytime ‚Äì even offline. 
- Easily manage your hotel or vacation rental booking on the go. 
- Contact us or the hotel or vacation rental owner directly from the app. 
- Opt-in for push notifications and we‚Äôll send you updates about your hotel stay. 
 
*Member Prices are available on select hotels to logged in members and app users. The discount will be applied to the price of selected hotels (excluding applicable taxes and other fees). Subject to terms and conditions, see site for details.  
**OneKeyCash‚Ñ¢ is not redeemable for cash and can only be used on Expedia, Hotels.com and Vrbo.  
***Free cancellation on most hotels. Some hotels require you to cancel at least 24-48 hours before check-in. See property pages on our app for details.  
 
The Hotels.com app uses information for analytics, personalization, and advertising. By downloading our hotel app, you agree to our privacy and cookies policies https://hotels.com/customer_care/privacy.html.
releaseNotes: We continue to update our app to help you find your perfect somewhere.
reviews:
Booked me at a hotel that was dirty and would not refund my money when I checked out after one nite. The bathtub was dirty and the walls patched but not painted.  Not much more than a flophouse.  They are still recommending this hotel
. | I used to book every hotel stay through this app. Once they transitioned to the ‚Äúone key ‚Äú thing I simply use it as an aggregate platform to check prices. Otherwise I will never book anything through this app again. Fun fact: My European friends still get the old 10%. | Holiday inn needs to replace the mattress; they‚Äôre soft. | Horrible customer service they tell you to hold down the line they never get back on the line. They don‚Äôt try to help the cosplay at all on the phone the first issues you have they don‚Äôt care about it they just keep telling me they can‚Äôt do anything to help you out they don‚Äôt even try to help you out. | Enjoyed our stay‚Ä¶ staff easily available to answer questions. Room was clean.  Parking is convenient to the casino / hotel lobby.  We expected a coffee pot in the room‚Ä¶. But then again it is a casino. Only complaint is that the pillows were medium to hard.  If you like a soft fluffy pillow, bring your own. | on this app, you can search for things like pet friendly you can search for a hot tub you can search for gym. You cannot search for wheelchair accessible or at least I couldn‚Äôt find it easily and it wasn‚Äôt in the area where you could choose specific things. this is ridiculous almost every other travel app you can search by accessibility. I don‚Äôt know what‚Äôs going on at Hotels.com, but y‚Äôall need to hire more diversityand pick it up. This is going to get deleted off my phone. | This property is in need of a make-over.  The bed is not comfortable, the water has issues.  Ours dripped from the shower constantly, my brother‚Äôs room had a leak and they had to be moved.  The washer-dryer are very old and don‚Äôt work well.  Many of the dishes and knives are missing and/or broken.  And it visibly needs to be updated.  However, The property offers very nice things.  The pool, and lazy river are wonderful.  Loved the grill area, etc. | What I really like is the ability to narrow down my hotel choices by location, price, and features.
Unfortunately the newest version doesn‚Äôt help much in finding accessible rooms. | I have been using hotels.com app for years and it has been working great. For last few months, its been unresponsive most of the times and hangs. I have been trying to search for accommodation for my next trip for last 1 week but this app doesnt respond at all.  Have tried everything even removing and re-install but no help. To avoid this, I would moat likely start using different planner if this continues. | Forces you to make an account to view your booking. Also does not let you sort hotels by proximity to your destination. Runs slow when finding your booking. | I did not get any help when I tried to cancel.  Hotels.com told me to contact the property and the property told to contact hotels.com. Now I‚Äôm out money!! I even contacted the hotel property to cancel in the correct amount of time!! | There is a variety of rooms to choose from along with prices. All the rooms are clean not fancy, but they need travelers needs. They keep everything around the hotel clean and the prices are very good. | Just a horrible experience | Very clean and the service was excellent | I have been trying to change my Email to my new one. Cannot do this because it keeps sending code to old Email that does not exist anymore. Try to talk to somebody about this but will not allow me to talk to a real person. | The rewards are no longer worth it and the prices aren‚Äôt competitive. Now I use Agoda, Chase Travel (to maximize gaining rewards with CSR) or booking. | I had a bad experience with a hotel.  I wrote an honest review of the issues.  The review was never published. | The app and the website return errors when trying to update account email address. Customer service on the phone and in the chat can't update email address due to security issues and don't have the ability to report the issue to tech support to fix. I can no longer use hotels.com because I can't update my email address. | This has gone on for a long while the app shows no reservations , no One Key credit when mine is over $200 and honestly is worthless right now | The new rewards system isn‚Äôt great. 
The app is also more buggy and so much more slow after it‚Äôs change over. | I find the best deals and I really appreciate whenever a place I reserve is not acceptable they will help me in finding somewhere better | I‚Äôm not in favor of the new rewards program. The rewards credit we now get is almost nothing and leaves very little incentive for us travelers to use hotels.com
I will be looking at other options which is sad since I‚Äôve been with you for so long and my travels are extensive this year.

Sincerely,
Kobe Owens | You RUINED the rewards program for Hotels.com. This is now the last app I use when booking a hotel | I would like to see under trips tab only my pending bookings  not a mess of saved ones too . Booking .com only shows the ones I have booked !!!! | There was no was to adjust my stay by one night. I contacted the hotel and they said to contact hotel.com. There is not contact information for hotel.com. I travel every week and this is not a good option when booking hotel rooms. | I just wanna be able to search for hotels in the areas that I‚Äôm looking at without being shown, by force,hotels I wouldn‚Äôt even be interested in. Let us search on our own. | Not fair | I am not going to claim that I am an expert how to use the app 100%,and I shouldn‚Äôt have to be one !
I think the app is missing one crucial feature to be coming more useful.
Last night I was parked in front of the hotel and was ready to book it . Was on the last step to make a payment when i asked the another person about to walk in if the address shown on the hotel is the same as the one I am right now .
The answer was , no !
The mobile app first question is to choose the city I am going !
Not a good idea because I should be able to choose it on the map also! 
I usually pick it while I am in transit !
To enter just a city and search the hotel is not enough! It is if I am staying in one place more then one night ! But for those in transit, it‚Äôs a lot of work to figure out if I will be booking not far from the direction I am heading!
Google map offers to find gas stations, coffee shops, hotels in route, adding a stop ! 
This app is missing that option!
To be able to find a hotel on my route near by should be an easy task , but not while I am driving !
Lol | I believe this hotel is in a great location but it sure needs a lot of upgrades. The pillows and comforters are very old. It smells like mold, floor and carpet need replacing. It‚Äôs so bad because it‚Äôs been a place for many years that we have use when visiting family in Brentwood. | Won‚Äôt be using Hotels.com anymore‚Ä¶‚Ä¶ | Very disappointed, was not allowed to reschedule a hotel reservation prior to a surgical procedure. Due to blizzard conditions I couldn‚Äôt make it to Denver so will need to re-schedule hotel and procedure. | When my husband got to his room the bed looked like someone had been laying in it.  Pillows were disarray and covers pulled back sheets wrinkled.  Very disappointing and unacceptable! | Had a bad experience with hotel. | Why can t this be fixed!!! | The last hotel at got changed 10 dollars more for the second night | Can‚Äôt believe they will even allow people to stay at this hotel is beyond me. Walk into the first room and it literally smelled like cat pee and ammonia, I almost threw up upon walking in the room. Went to the front desk and the guy says sorry I‚Äôll give you another room. Walked into room number 2 and found that the comforter on the bed had what to appear sperm stains and blood stains. Walked to the front desk and asked when was the last time these rooms were cleaned his response was today. lol yeah right!!! So I asked them to cancel my reservation they did and held the charges. So never again will I even think of staying at another one of there locations. I don‚Äôt wish this upon anyone. | Clean, inside and out. Hard wood floors nice better than carpet. Area felt safe. Good coffee and hard boiled eggs, yogurt, and other small breakfast items were included. Attentive staff. | Since they changed to one key I lost all of my old points | My OneKey points were not received after my recent booking! | I had always used hotels.com and had been happy with them until I cancelled a reservation  with them a few months back and they charged me a cancellation fee despite the fact that I canceled in the time allowed. I repeatedly asked for a manger to call me and no one ever did. One of the agents was blatantly   Dishonest saying they called the manager of the hotel and couldn‚Äôt reach her .. I have the email where the manager stated she told them to issue my refund because I NEVER should have been charged (late cancellation fees are imposed if you cancel after the time allowed and don‚Äôt stay at the property) I cancelled in enough time and I stayed at the property so there was no reason to ever be charged. It was troubling that I could never speak to a live person despite my numerous requests.. I was able to chat and email with the representative. I would NEVER DO BUSINESS WITH AN ORGANIZATION that would treat their customers this way .  I used them frequently before this incident and never would have imagined being treated this way. | Hair on the pillow cases and pubic hair on the sheets- disgusting.  Had to get sheets & pillow cases brought to room so I could change the dirty sheets.  The room as a whole was not cleaned.  Front desk person didn‚Äôt even try to make it right.  No gesture of any sort.  The hotel had a beautiful courtyard outside our room & the hotel ‚Äúlooked nice‚Äù.  But it was dirty.  I shouldn‚Äôt have to clean pee of toilet seat right when I get in room.  Gross, gross, gross!!! | I would like to know who goes out and rates these hotels, where we just stayed was not a a 8.4 the service was wonderful, but the bed, the box spring was broken or something and sink  was cracked, and the shower something was wrong with the hot and cold, it certainly was not an 8.4, I‚Äôm beginning not to trust hotels.com, I would like to know do you really have a team go and check out these hotels before giving it a rating. | We were in town for a funeral. Made a reservation at the last minute for 2 days because the final plans had not been made. When we got to the hotel the plans were made and we only needed the room for 1 night. I thought it would be no problem to cancel the 2nd day.
They said that I got a special rate and if I canceled it would cost me double for one night then for two. I thought it was a crappy thing to do considering the reason we were there.
The rooms were nice, clean and comfortable and the service was great but we will never stay again in any of your hotels because of this situation. | Everyone was super nice from check in to breakfast to cleaning crew!!! Felt safe, great location, clean and hot breakfast food was good. | The app and site give a clear search of areas and true value for your money. With true reviews, it helps avoid some of the worst ‚Äú cheap‚Äù rentals and find the right place for a good deal! 
J Sellers | The hotel was very beautiful and comfortable the only thing I‚Äôll say about it was the tv wasn‚Äôt in the spot it supposed to had been I feel y‚Äôall needs to replace the tv on the wall across from the bed instead of it being on the side cause it was very difficult for the guest to see the tv or if yall will like for it to stay there at least get a wall unit where it is possible for the tv to pull out and turn around for the guest to see it they do have wall units for the tv to pull out and turn different directions left and right but other than that I loved it I will come back again I had an beautiful weekend stay like I said I‚Äôll give yall ah 4 star cause I really enjoyed myself but if yall fix that issue yall will have ah perfect 5 stars | I have deleted and reinstalled this app three times on 3/23/24 and 3/24/24 and I still can‚Äôt login. The app will launch, but when you click the login button, you are told, ‚Äúsomething went wrong on our end‚Äù. | I chose the hotel because it is very convenient to the main entrance to Disneyland. I was very happy with other aspects of our stay, including the most helpful desk staff and the very nice room. | Customer service 100% 5star
Complete team service 100% 5star 
Breakfast 2star 
Location 3star 
Bed/Room 4star 
Shower floor 1star 
The shower floor cracked and made loud noises while showering. 
Cleanliness 5star | If I could give negative stars I would. They failed to properly advertise exactly where the hotel was, and after being a loyal customer for 20 years would not refund my money. Minutes after I booked. Hundreds of dollars lost. They do not care about you and the rewards system is a joke.

title: TripIt: Travel Planner
description:
Join nearly 20 million travelers on the world's highest-rated travel planner app for trip and itinerary organization!


TRAVEL ITINERARY

As soon as you book a flight, hotel, rental car or other travel plan, simply forward it to plans@tripit.com and we‚Äôll automatically add it to your comprehensive itinerary. Seamlessly sync travel plans to your calendar or share them with anyone you choose.


RESERVATION DETAILS

No more frantically searching through your inbox for important details about your travel plans, like when your flight gets in or the confirmation number for your hotel. Find them in a flash with TripIt ‚Äî even when you‚Äôre offline. Access this information hands-free with Siri shortcuts!


Upload PDFs, photos, boarding passes, digital passport QR codes and more to your travel itinerary, so you can track everything in one place.


MAPS AND DIRECTIONS

The TripIt app includes all the map-related tools you‚Äôll need on-the-go (it‚Äôs great for road trips).

-	Plot out your entire trip on Google Maps or Apple Maps
-	Quickly pull up transportation options and driving directions between two points (powered by Rome2Rio)
-	Easily locate the closest restaurants, parking, ATMs and more


TRIPIT PRO

For roughly the price of checking your bags, upgrade to TripIt Pro to access exclusive travel perks all year long. When you upgrade, TripIt Pro will do all this for you (and more!):


‚Ä¢ Share real-time flight status alerts and check in reminders
‚Ä¢ Notify you if you're eligible for a refund if your fare price drops after booking
‚Ä¢ Track your reward programs and alert you if points are expiring
‚Ä¢ Navigate you through the airport with interactive maps
‚Ä¢ Keep you informed when a potential disruption may impact your trip


Your iTunes account will be charged when the purchase is confirmed. Your TripIt Pro subscription will be good for 1 year, and automatically renew each year at $48.99 unless you turn off auto-renew at least 24 hours before your term ends. To manage your subscription, including auto-renew, visit iTunes Account Settings.


FREE TRIPIT PRO FOR SAP CONCUR USERS

If your company uses SAP Concur, you may receive complimentary TripIt Pro benefits that most travelers have to pay for. Make sure you‚Äôre connected to TripIt to get itineraries created for you as soon as you book, and receive a complimentary subscription to TripIt Pro, if you‚Äôre eligible.


For more information, see the TripIt User Agreement (https://www.tripit.com/uhp/userAgreement) and Privacy Policy (https://www.tripit.com/uhp/privacyPolicy).
releaseNotes: ‚Ä¢ Introducing our newest TripIt Pro feature, Risk Alerts! Get proactive alerts about events that have the potential to disrupt your trip, so you can modify your itinerary if needed and still enjoy your trip. Alerts may cover inclement weather, unplanned airport closures, protests or strikes, public health events, and more. Enable these push notifications by toggling ‚ÄúRisks and Disruptions‚Äù to ‚ÄúOn‚Äù within Settings.
reviews:
Love it | Love to organize my trips on this app. Added bonus with Tripit Pro- they notify you if price changes on your flight allowing you to request refund! Love it | There are certainly areas to grow.  But, from my experience this the best and easiest app to use.  I do wish when I send confirmations for events such as concerts, sporting events, tours or excursions it would do a better job in adding to the plan with the appropriate event type. 

My wife and I share the travel planning.  This really helps us keep track of what‚Äôs been purchased and what still needs to be addressed.

 In the future I could imagine this app or a competitor leveraging machine learning and/or AI to do something special.  Probably would get purchased by one of the big players in the space like Expedia or booking.com | Love the one stop shop for tracking all my business travel

One thing. I wish that when I check into to flights it would allow me to add the boarding pass to my apply wallet, but I have to go on the website to do that, rather than TripIt. I mainly fly southwest so it may just be with that airline. | I‚Äôm having trouble importing new trip details from my emails on file. Not sure why this stopped happening. | TripIt is my favorite travel app. I don‚Äôt know how they do what they do, but they always beat the airlines when it comes to providing flight delays, cancellations, and gate change notifications. if you travel a lot, TripIt Pro definitely is worth it. | I‚Äôve planned two trips in a few weeks. I‚Äôve used this app and it has made them so easy. I have coordinated a trip for three people with three different airline itineraries, nightly dinner at six different locations for the week, to and from transportation and events. Talk about an easy effort, everything set up automatically and I was able to email it to the folks involved! Thank you for creating an app that actually does what it says it‚Äôs going to do and works so effectively!! | Simple and easy to coordinate hotel/car/flight information. Simple to look back and find the info as well. | I have had this app for about a year and I love, love, love it. I usually have several trips in the planning stage. This app lets me keep track of everything in one place. I easily see exactly what I have booked from flights, hotels, tours, restaurant reservations, theater performances and just about anything else. It is easy to use and edit any change of plans. I have recommended this app to friends. I am so glad I have this app. | It has been a great help to me in organizing my trips. | Oh my God I just learned about this app today and played with it for 10 minutes and it‚Äôs so helpful to organize my itinerary and saved me a lot of manual work. I‚Äôm totally impressed. | I have almost 4 million seat miles on AA.  I use this for every trip business and personal.  Saves a ton of time and it organizes everything involved in travel.  It‚Äôs awesome. | This travel app is absolutely amazing!
Create a trip and send confirmation emails to input!  Helps you catch errors, make sure you have no gaps, etc. includes all transportations, reservations, lodging etc with all the info you need in it. | Was seriously loving this app to plan a big trip with the family. Lots of planes, trains, hotels to keep track of. Once I realized the max PDF files was 3 with the free version I immediately upgraded to Pro to then only find out that they once again maxed out at 25 uploads. Geez‚Ä¶. It was my main reason for paying! | This is the best app ever I shared it with two friends that are not Internet savvy, and they are very excited to use this for their upcoming European trip.  My friend and I are able to share our updates and I love the expansions on each location that provides more detail that we don‚Äôt have to look up. I do wish they could add some sort of budget where you could see the total of your budget at the top or something but other than that it‚Äôs amazing. It‚Äôs a great app they can be used with, anything you‚Äôre doing on your trip and I love the chronological order | I‚Äôve been using KAYAK for a while to plan and share trip information, but it isn‚Äôt a perfect tool, so I thought I‚Äôd try TripIt for a while. 

It is easy to add your plans to TripIt, just forward it reservation emails; Kayak does this too. You can also enter or change details manually. Tripit is somewhat better than kayak for this. 

With TripIt, it is easy to share a trip with participants who can update the trip with you (e.g. one person works on transportation, another on lodging, etc). The whole trip collaboration thing is easier with TripIt than KAYAK. 

The subscribed calendar support in KAYAK is much better than TripIt. With KAYAK you can see all your trips, including flights and lodging, on your device calendar. I can easily see how my trips fit into all my other plans. Other people can see my trips on their calendars too. I just share a calendar link with friends and family so they can see where I am and how to reach me on their own device calendars without using the kayak app at all; they like that. 

Tripit also supports subscribed calendars, but doesn‚Äôt include the detailed plans. This is a showstopper for me; it should be straightforward for TripIt to improve their support, but until they do, I‚Äôll stick with KAYAK. | My account has an odd email added to it, and with every click I get an error. It‚Äôs been less then 10 min since downloading it and I want out | I‚Äôve used this app for years and never cease to be impressed by how easy it makes keeping track of travel plans.  Especially because I travel a lot. | This app makes organizing travel simple. I email my confirmations to the app and it organizes my itineraries. I‚Äôve planned complicated itineraries for a few weeks in Europe with tour guides, show tickets, hotels, drivers, trains and planes.  The app keeps it all organized and recommends options near where I‚Äôll be. It‚Äôs really awesome. | I love this app. | I love having all of my trip information in one place. I also appreciate the refund feature for flights if the price goes down. I will upgrade my stars when the app knows when I send a cancellation email that the trip information is to be upgraded accordingly. Also, the connection time is deceiving because it doesn‚Äôt take into account when a flight boards, only when it departs. | Been a subscribed user for as long as I could remember. This app is my trusted and favorite travel companion. Highly Recommended. | How can anyone travel without this app? All you do is email your itinerary with whatever on It (airplane, hotel, rental car, tours...) it automatically separates everything and puts it all order Gives you updates on your flight and when it's time to check in. Also gives you option to locate airport lounges or even alternate flights if your plans change. Fantastic app. | I like much of what Tripit does. My big problem is that it does not capture all of my trips. Which makes it useless some of the time. Perhaps I‚Äôm doing something wrong but not sure how to fix it. | Love the app.  Makes it so easy to keep all the details of a trip organized. 
A suggestion would be to allow me add my wife as a second traveler on a trip. | Have been using TripIt for business and personal travel for years. So convenient. Flights, cruises, car rentals, lodging, and restaurant reservations all in one place for easy one stop access. One tap and I can review all my future travel plans. Sometimes I get flight updates before the airline app notifications. I forward info to others as needed and can still put it all in my calendar. But having it all in one place is great. | I was expecting a lot more beyond pulling reservation information from my emails the app doesn‚Äôt offer much in addition. I expected it would provide directions from one hotel to the next without having to retype the addresses of each. | TripIt pushes status notices and delay information to me so I don‚Äôt have to go to the Airline site | I really want to use this app, but I can‚Äôt even create an account.  It asks for me to put in my Home City, but when I enter it I keep getting an error.  The type goes red and it doesn‚Äôt accept my entry. | I Love Tripit ‚ô•Ô∏è‚ô•Ô∏è‚ô•Ô∏è

I love how it puts everything of my trip in order and according to the correct time, plus much more. My flights, car rentals, hotels, even extra events which don‚Äôt have email confirmations, e.g. ‚ÄúDinner with Mary at 6pm‚Äù.  Tripit has simplified my life and lowered my stress level. ü§ó

Thank you Tripit. | Really good way to keep details of a trip organized. | Fantastic app keeps all my information in order. Lodging information, tours, rental cars all with phone numbers, prices, confirmation numbers all in one place. The mapping function was invaluable. | This app is great. My only complaint is the max # of attachments. It allows only 20 pics and/or docs attached to any one itinerary in the PRO version. I easily max this out on a trip with more than 8 days. And then I have to use other ways to track down my excursion tickets and reservations, etc. 
Make PRO unlimited please. | I used the free version and decided to upgrade to pro when it went on sale. I use this for my trip from California to Vietnam, this is an amazing app that I would highly recommend to everyone traveling! | All you need is this super user friendly app to put together all you trips and activities. Love how easy it is to use the app and how up to date with airlines they are. I also love their response rate on tech support. Best money spent on any app. | This was one of the top rated trip organizers, but downloading the app, I couldn‚Äôt create a new account. Going to the website, couldn‚Äôt create new account. In both instances, it tried  to match the details I entered to an existing account‚Ä¶ which doesn‚Äôt exist yet!  Then it wanted me to log in using Google, only for the exact same thing to happen. I don‚Äôt have time for this sort of nonsense and I no longer trust this is a safe or secure website or app. | I have been using this for years & don‚Äôt know what I would do without it. It makes traveling so easy with all the information at your fingertips. It‚Äôs so easy to forward itineraries & it imports them perfectly. Best ever! | I‚Äôve been using this app for several years. I have been a general user and a Pro user at different times. I don‚Äôt see much benefit in being a Pro user. Airport maps can be googled, and I‚Äôm not sure what the other ‚ÄúPro‚Äù benefits are, but it‚Äôs not much different from using the app without that.

It is nice to have all my travel stuff in one place, but I used the Notes app to keep track before I had TripIt; TripIt does save a little time, when it works. Unfortunately it‚Äôs ‚Äúimport plans‚Äù feature doesn‚Äôt work a lot of the time, even when you would think it would, like when you make a reservation to park at LAX like thousands of people do every week. (I reported this over a month ago and it still has not been fixed)

Anyway, in my opinion the app is worth using, but the Pro benefits are not worth paying for. | When I traveled to Europe on a two month trip last fall, TripIt kept me organized and sane. I moved around to many locations and my itinerary was constantly changing. I don‚Äôt know how I possibly could have kept all the details straight without TripIt‚Äôs help, For me, it‚Äôs an essential in my toolbox. | Works well, it helps me keep all of trip details in one location. Very effective for my 10 day multi-city vacation and works well with other apps. Easy to send my itinerary to the app. | Love Tripit!!!! | My husband and I travel a ton. I travel a lot for work, and then we travel with our two young children multiple times a year. I used to maintain Google docs and manually update all the details to make sure we had a stress free trip. This replaces all that manual work, and it‚Äôs SO CONVENIENT to see everything in one place, in chronological order. Sometimes it even gives more information than you get from the airline apps. I can‚Äôt tell you the number of times my husband and I talk about how great this app is. It‚Äôs literally every trip. Our last trip my husband said he‚Äôd delete the mail app on his phone before he‚Äôd delete trip it. Just download it. There is nothing better out there. | Love this app. Keeps all my trip info in one place, easy to use as well. | I subscribed to the pro version now and this has been a great help over the years. Let‚Äôs you keep your trip very organized and an unexpected benefit has been able to go back and look up a trip in the past and sometimes has reminded me of things I had forgotten, I‚Äôve never had a ride to customer service yet which is a great thing in and of itself and there seems to be constant improvements. | This is great! | I have been using TripIt as an important part of my travel planning & execution since 2010. The free version offers a lot of value and I held off on paid subscription for a long time but started paying last year and enjoying the benefits inc. Inner Circle feature so I don‚Äôt have to manually share every trip with my family every time. Big supporter of TripIt over the past 14 years. | The continuous log in cycle never ends so what‚Äôs the point of the app if I‚Äôm never able to actually log in to use it? | We‚Äôre full time travelers and use TRIP IT to remind us of upcoming trips, hotel stays, auto rental locations etc. It‚Äôs super friendly, easy to use and allows us to communicate our plans to family keeping them informed of changes. Highly recommend. A PLUS, it keeps track of changes on flight schedules and let‚Äôs us know when we can upgrade seats. | This app is impossible to set up, clunky to try and use, and gets everything wrong. I have no idea why anyone would want to use it. Just worthless. | We usually have multiple trips in a year and it helps us to keep everything organized for each trip. We‚Äôve also enjoyed the upgraded version with real time flight info and airport information!

title: Cheapflights: Flights & Hotels
description:
The Cheapflights app helps you search, compare and book cheap flights, hotels and rental cars from hundreds of airlines, travel agents and accommodation and car rental providers globally. We‚Äôre a team of passionate, savvy explorers here to make it easy for you to find the cheapest flights, hotels & car rentals for your next travel destination.

With Cheapflights you can:

‚Ä¢        Compare cheap flights, hotels and rental car offers from hundreds of airlines and travel agents worldwide.
‚Ä¢        See the cheapest days to fly with our Price Calendar.
‚Ä¢        Save and compare results from your search and book later.
‚Ä¢        Log in and save your search preferences for a faster, more personal experience across all your devices.

Millions of people find cheap tickets with us every year. Want to be one of them? Whether you have your eye on last minute flights, domestic flights, international flights, cheap airline tickets and low-cost airfare, the cheapest flights and deals are just a download away.

Our flight comparison service is simple and completely free to use. All you need to do is search, filter and book your trip. We will then send you directly to the airline or travel agent to book your plane tickets without any hidden fees.        
_____________________________________
SEARCH FLIGHTS, HOTELS, VACATION HOMES AND CAR RENTALS FROM HUNDREDS OF SITES
‚Ä¢        Search and compare cheap flights to your destination for free.
‚Ä¢        Find just what you‚Äôre looking for by searching by city or airport.
*        Find more than just plane tickets. Search thousands of sites to find the best rental car and hotel deals for you.
*        Looking for.a staycation? Uncover deals on amazing places to visit nearby.

FILTER YOUR OPTIONS AND FIND EXACTLY WHAT YOU'RE LOOKING FOR
‚Ä¢        See only options that fit your price range, airport, airlines, number of stops, take-off and landing times.
‚Ä¢        Filter results by cheapest, quickest, or a happy balance between the two.
‚Ä¢        Save results from your search to compare and book later.
‚Ä¢        Log in to apply your search criteria across all your devices for a seamless experience.
*        Take the stress out of trip planning. Find flexible flight offers with no change fees.

TAKE THE STRESS OUT OF TRAVEL PLANNING        
‚Ä¢        Take a look at checked baggage and seat reservation fees so you‚Äôre always prepared before booking.
‚Ä¢        Stay up-to-date on maximum carry-on or hand-luggage sizes and weights to avoid extra baggage costs.
‚Ä¢        See a snapshot of your selected travel dates and times so you can review before booking.
‚Ä¢        When you‚Äôve found your perfect flight tickets, we will send you directly to the airline or travel agent to book.
_____________________________________

        
So, let‚Äôs get started. Go ahead and download the Cheapflights app now and search for any city or airport, anywhere in the world.

title: Trip Scout - My Travel Planner
description:
The New York Times, USA Today, and Travel & Leisure have said Tripscout is THE essential app for the modern traveler. 


Discover a destination like a local insider and plan the perfect trip with your personalized, always up-to-date travel guide - and it‚Äôs 100% FREE! 
 
See why the world‚Äôs top travelers plan their trips with Tripscout:

1. THE BEST TRAVEL ARTICLES & VIDEOS ARE HANDPICKED FOR YOU:
Discover the best articles and videos from top publishers and local influencers for YOUR trip so you can stop filtering through irrelevant recommendations, sponsored ads, and out of date guidebook content.

2. TURN INSPIRATION TO ACTION WITH TRAVEL PRO EFFICIENCY:
Every restaurant, cafe, shop, or site featured in the content is mapped to our 100M+ points of interest so you can efficiently save anything you discover with one tap, compare photos and local tips from recent travelers, and easily stitch together a full, personalized itinerary and map on your phone.

3. A PERSONALIZED EXPERIENCE THAT PUTS YOU FIRST:
The best travel content is not one-size-fit all and we personalize all content based on your actual trip dates, budget, interests, and travel companions to make sure you‚Äôre always in-the-know on the experiences you care about.

4. TRAVEL GUIDE & MAPS WORK COMPLETELY OFFLINE
Travel stress-free by downloading your entire travel guide and map offline so you don‚Äôt have to worry about using data when traveling overseas or cruising at 50,000 feet in airplane mode.

Hundreds of travel bloggers and publications have featured Tripscout as the essential resource for the modern traveler and have given our apps some very high endorsements, such as:

-- ‚ÄúBasically the best thing ever for travelers.‚Äù - Conde Nast Traveler
-- ‚ÄúHelps travelers explore the local side of the city‚Äù - USA Today
-- ‚ÄúPerfect for the curious traveler‚Äù - American Airlines
-- ‚ÄúMakes travel easier, but just as exciting.‚Äù - Forbes 
-- "Finally, a travel app that‚Äôs purposefully, blissfully simple‚Äù - Travel+Leisure

Keep exploring and stay curious! 

P.S. You can review our terms of use and privacy policy together at: https://tripscout.co/privacypolicy/

title: trivago: Compare hotel prices
description:
The trivago app is the easy way to search and compare hotel prices from your favorite booking sites so you can find a hotel or accommodation in the location you want, with the amenities you need, and for a deal you‚Äôll feel amazing about.

- Compare accommodation prices from major booking sites with one search
- Get exclusive mobile rates on your phone or tablet
- Get price drop alerts for your favorite hotels
- Save favorite accommodations and compare them side-by-side
- Read aggregated guest reviews from multiple booking sites
- Search over 5 million properties in more than 190 countries and find amazing hotel deals

No matter what type of traveler you are, or what type of budget you have, the trivago app makes your hotel search simpler than ever.

Compare prices from hundreds of booking sites
With trivago, you don‚Äôt just search for hotel offers in your dream vacation destinations, you also get to compare prices from the major booking sites like Expedia, Hotels.com, Accor, ZenHotels, Booking.com, Trip.com, Priceline, TravelUp, Orbitz, HotelTonight, and more. With over 5 million hotels and other accommodations to choose from worldwide, finding the right stay at the right price doesn‚Äôt get much easier than this.

Mobile rates for deal-hunters on the go
The trivago app features deals on hotels that you can only access on your mobile device ‚Äî something all you deal-hunters out there won‚Äôt want to miss out on. Just search for your hotel like you normally would, and keep an eye out for the ‚Äúmobile rate‚Äù badge to know when you‚Äôve found a special deal.

Get a heads-up when prices drop
Have a trip coming up and want to try and book your stay for cheap? Now you can sign up for price drop alerts on the trivago app to stay on top of price changes for your favorite hotels. Instead of constant searching, you‚Äôll get notified as soon as prices drop so you can act fast and get an awesome deal.

Save favorites and compare them side-by-side
Whether your dream hotel is pet-friendly, has late-checkout, offers free cancellation, or includes a breakfast buffet, the trivago app makes it easy to save your favorite stays. When you feel like booking your trip, you can compare hotels from your favorites list side-by-side to see how they match up before making your decision, so can always be confident you got the right stay at the right price.

Real talk from real guests
Along with always-updating price information, the trivago app aggregates guest ratings from major booking sites to give you the best understanding of real-world experiences at each hotel. The trivago rating index creates a combined score of available ratings so that you can see what other guests have to say, and always be ready to book your room with confidence.

5 million hotel beds and counting
With over over 5 million properties in more than 190 countries, you can find the perfect stay for every trip on the trivago app. Find rooms at boutique hotels, luxury hotels, airport hotels, hostels, bed and breakfasts, lodges, vacation rentals, resorts, and everything in between with one simple search.

Download trivago‚Äôs free app today and start searching, comparing, and saving on your next adventure.

Visit trivago.com for more info.

title: Orbitz Hotels & Flights
description:
Use code SAVEAPP10 for 10% off on select hotels in the app.

Free cancellation on most hotels. Because flexibility matters.

Orbitz is the #1 way to book travel on your mobile device. The Orbitz app lets you quickly and easily search and book flights, hotels, rental cars, activities. Plus, join Orbitz Rewards and start earning Orbucks on your flight and hotel bookings that you can instantly redeem on hotels in the app.

EARN MORE
-App bookers earn 4% on hotels and 2% on air! 
-Plus find last-minute hotel rooms nearby and save 30% with mobile exclusive deals! 

HOTELS
- Last minute hotel bookings welcome and free cancellation available!
- Pay when you book or when you arrive at the hotel. 
- Find hotels around you on an easy-to-use map view.
- Review descriptions, photos and amenities from verified hotel guests.
- Securely store your payment details for easier and safe bookings. 

FLIGHTS
- Save even more on your flight with our combined one-way fares and get a single price for two separately issued tickets.
- Search and book round trip or one-way flights.
- Enter a departure date and destination, and your trip-ready. Book now!

CARS
- Search thousands of cars to find cheap, quality rentals. Save big when you book in-app!
- Plan round trip rentals from any airport in the world to make your vacation, holiday or getaway a total breeze.

ACTIVITIES
- Attraction tickets without the lines.
- Book local tours.
- Book Airport shuttles.

MY TRIPS
- View your record locator, gate information, and upcoming trip details on the go.
- Plan your own vacation packages with activities, hotels, cars, and more.
- Explore Groupon valuable travel information.

Orbitz envisions a world where all are welcomed. No matter who they are, who they love, or where they‚Äôre going. For 20 years we‚Äôve led the way in advocating for LGBTQIA equality and inclusion in travel. 

Visit our LGBTQIA travel hub (Orbitz.com/pride) to search and book LGBTQ-welcoming hotels, view our LGBTQIA events calendar, get travel inspiration, and more!

SAVEAPP10 coupon code Terms & Conditions
Subject to the restrictions set out in these terms and conditions, the 10% promotion code may be applied to a qualifying stand-alone hotel (not a hotel booking in combination with any other product such as flight + hotel, or flight + hotel + car) booked on a mobile device or the Orbitz app by March 31, 2022, for 1 or more nights for travel by September 30, 2023. Qualifying bookings instantly receive 10% off at check-out through the use of the promotion code. Customers are limited to one redemption of this promotion code and up to a maximum savings of $150 per booking. 

After one booking, this promo code will not be able to be used again, even if the booking is cancelled. Exclusions may apply and most major hotel chains are excluded. The promotion code cannot be redeemed against taxes, supplier fees, cancellation or change fees/penalties, administrative fees or other miscellaneous charges, which are the sole responsibility of the customer. Discounts are not redeemable for cash for any reason. Promotion codes are non-transferable, not for resale, and cannot be combined with other offers or used for any booking previously made. Any attempt at fraud will be prosecuted to the fullest extent of the law. Void where prohibited, taxed or restricted by law. Orbitz reserves the right to change or limit the promotion in its sole discretion. Usual booking terms and conditions apply (https://www.orbitz.com/p/info-other/legal.htm) and all bookings are subject to availability.

The Orbitz app uses information for analytics, personalization, and advertising. By using our app, you agree to our privacy and cookies policies.

title: Packr Travel Packing List
description:
Save time before going on a trip with Packr! Packr will help you pack your suitcase for each trip. The packing list is based on your destination (city, country or region), travel dates and activities.

‚óÜ PACKING CHECKLIST ‚óÜ

Packr creates a packing checklist for your suitcase from 24 pre-defined activities.
Based on length of stay, weather and planned activities, your packing list will be ready in no time. This is the perfect tool for your summer vacations, long week-ends, road trips and even camping.

‚óÜ LESS STRESS ‚óÜ

Every journey is different, each traveler has his own habits. Packr learns from each of your trips to organize the packing checklist, and adjusts the items based on your previous trips.
You will never forget to pack THAT thing again !

‚óÜ BETTER PREPARED ‚óÜ

A quantity can be set for each item, some items' quantity will be automatically adjusted to the length of your stay.
You can also create your own packing lists.

‚óÜ PRACTICAL FEATURES ‚óÜ

Premium users can synchronize trips on all devices such as iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch.
You can also share the checklist with your travel companions or print it out.


Packr has already travelled several thousand times around planet Earth packing over a million items in each traveller's suitcase.

Packr has been used for trips to cities like Paris, London, Barcelona, New York City, Montreal, Berlin, Majorca... And countries like France, United Kingdom, Spain, Greece, USA, Italy, Canada, Germany and 1000+ more locations.


Terms of Use:
https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
releaseNotes:
Packr version 2.6 is now available.


‚óÜ New features & enhancements ‚óÜ 

Offline mode is now available.

Faster loading of images on the Home Screen.

10 new activity icons.

Easily add custom items to the default lists with a long press in the packing list.

Icons are now grouped by category when adding a new list.

Renaming default list items is now available for Premium users.


‚óÜ Bug Fixes ‚óÜ 

- Fixed minor issues with offline mode.
- Fixed item count when editing the packing lists.
- Fixed crash when adding/editing a List/Activity.
- Fixed "Laundry" button not displaying its correct active state.
- Fixed duplicating a trip to make an identical copy.
- Fixed Contact Us form not sending the message.
- Fixed crashing on Apple Silicon devices.
- Custom pictures can now be selected from the Photo gallery.
- Fixed renaming items in the packing list.
- Fixed trips not appearing for certain timezones.
- Fixed weather not loading correctly.
- Fixed printing of the packing list.
- Fixed TripIt connection.
- Fixed nearby attractions not showing up.



Love the app? Rate us! Your feedback keeps Packr engine running.
Have a question? Tap "Contact us" in the app or send us an email: hello@packr.app
reviews:
I packed everything more quickly than usual and I didn‚Äôt forget anything. Will keep using it | I travel a few times per year so I am not a huge traveler. But I did not find this app user friendly. Maybe it just didn‚Äôt suit my needs but I‚Äôm not impressed. | It has lists that auto populate based on the length of your stay, weather, etc but I really want to just attach my own things in addition, reservations, activities, restaurants. Maybe I just don‚Äôt understand this app. And it has nothing to explain it | Not $3, but $3 a month. Super annoying setup where you can just start making a list, you have to put in dates, destinations, and type of trip. I‚Äôm looking for a packing list app that lets me input my own lists. Keep it simple. | I‚Äôve been using this app for many years and I‚Äôve been very happy. I only use it once or twice a year and it was free before. I don‚Äôt mind paying to keep the app but now it‚Äôs wanting me to pay $20 a year. I would be happy to pay $20 just to have the app forever but there‚Äôs no way I‚Äôm going to pay that every year.I‚Äôm very disappointed because I really liked this app | This app told me to bring a scarf to Disneyland this weekend. It‚Äôs not going to be cold enough. You need to change your app and only tell people to bring a scarf when it‚Äôs below freezing. | Very basic packing list. It is good to include power adapters, health insurance card, but neglects things like an umbrella, hat and jacket and small scissors. Also ‚Ä¶for a long trip it suggested 15 shirts ‚Ä¶which is ridiculous. I take no more than 5 shirts even if going for months. Clothes can be washed. 
I don‚Äôt see any reason to pay for this app. It‚Äôs ok I suppose if you don‚Äôt already have a packing list of your own. There are many better packing lists for free on websites. | The way the ads appear and they way the interact (close ads overlap, etc), the app is unusable. | Used to be great. Now it‚Äôs just ads. How can an app about packing have so many ads? It‚Äôs insane. They also deleted all my old packing lists, so I can‚Äôt even reference those. Time to find another app. | I downloaded it and immediately opening the app my phone was overloaded with ads inside the app. Absolutely do not like this app at all | I recommend this app to everyone. I particularly hate packing because it‚Äôs so stressful, but the customized activity lists make packing a breeze. | Don‚Äôt like being forced to watch an ad to use the app | If dobt get premium sibscriptions doesnt seem like you can do much | Update: After using this for a weekend trip, this may not be the app for me. It is extremely frustrating that every time I open the app, it prompts me for an update. However, the App Store does not have an update.

But then all my lists keep getting put out of alphabetical order. This is annoying to find to check out and try to pack. Then items will be added to a person when creating a trip and it is not on the list that I have so where did it come from?

I will be looking for about her app.

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî

I am searching for a good packing list. While this one is okay, it is frustrating. I have spent all day trying to load it up with our trips and it is just not user friendly. It is constantly putting my lists out of alphabetical order. So for me to sort it manually within each list and trip is just annoying. I also wish that I could easily remove a person from a trip and changing from multi-trip to single when duplicating a trip. | Updating my review because now there‚Äôs offline mode. Great app! | This app makes it so easy to put together a list for packing. As someone who struggles to stay organized, this app helps so much with providing suggested items per planned activity. SO much better than trying to make sure I think of everything on my own. I undoubtedly will either forget something or overpack planning it on my own. | This app is extremely helpful. It customizes your packing lists for the weather at your destination (and can update this). It also customizes it for your planned activities and duration of stay. It is a great way to make sure that you have what you need and don‚Äôt forget anything. it is by far the best list of this sort that I have encountered. The only small improvement I might suggest is for long trips on which you will be washing every few days, it would be helpful if you could specify the number of days between each washing so that the app knew what to recommend for packing. Nevertheless, it does a great job. | I‚Äôve never used another tool, but this one has everything I need ‚Äî pre-built lists, weather forecast and the ability to customize. Love it! | I have used Packr on iPhone and iPad for years. I did not realize there was a Mac app until recently so I downloaded it.

I have tried different packing list apps and packing list methods over the years including a spreadsheet, Notes, a Word document, and other packing list apps. I even tried Macsparky's Reminders packing list idea. I always come back to Packr. Why have I tried other apps if I like Packr? Because I like to try new apps! But I will not stray again. Packr just works for me. I ike that I can make different lists for different needs for different trips and reuse them over and over. 

Thank you for a great app! | I created my trip, selected the categories and when I submitted to continue, it gave me the option to either pay $3/mo or $20/yr for premium or watch an ad. I opted for the ad, because I hadn‚Äôt gotten far enough into the app to know if I like it. The full screen, 10-second ad counted down but then it was done, the ad wouldn‚Äôt close! The little ‚Äúx‚Äù was there in the top right corner but it didn‚Äôt work. I closed and relaunched the app twice, re-created the trip (because it wasn‚Äôt saved), and the same thing happened. I could have written out my entire packing list on paper in the time I wasted trying to make this app work. So disappointed. | This app is great, and it just keeps getting better. It works wonderful for multi city vacations or just quick getaways. One of my favorite features is saving customizable list. This allows me to have specialists for each of my trip needs, from camping in the mountains to water sports at the lake. Plus I can add my personalized photo to the top of the trip. | Used to be able to create a new default list with icons to choose.  Not saving new lists or adding an icon.  I thought you could add more than one trip photo. Can't find information on a huge venue tourist site in a city. | I like the concept of Packr but one major flaw. Really wanted to love it because I travel for work a ton and need customized packing lists. The idea is great but the execution is just not there. | Use basically every trip | Very basic app for the price | After creating your trip, you‚Äôre met with a full screen advertisement that can‚Äôt be closed even after the allotted time. The X button is unresponsive. | I purchased Packr Premium several years ago and absolutely love it. I had a problem when I deleted this app off of my iPad and thought I had lost all my lists, but the developer fixed it within a day. I use this app for all of my trips because I love the weather forecasts which help me know how to pack. I also have saved customized packing list for different activities like backpacking or international travel. I have recommended this app to several travel buddies who were green with envy when they saw all it could do. If you travel, it‚Äôs worth every penny. | I was packing for Coachella and this made my life so much easier because I was dealing with a health problem that made me very uncomfortable and not feel like myself. I really like the layout of this app. Sometimes it can get confusing with lists and removing stuff in lists it asks you if you want it removed forever, i just ignore them and it seems to work out fine since i dont really need to pack for trips that frequently. It works well for when you want an app that‚Äôs not your Notes or Reminders app | This app is my CONSTANT GO TO to help me with my business and pleasure travels!
THANK YOU for being such an AWESOME APP!!!!!!!! | I‚Äôve several other packing list apps and have settled on Packr. It just does packing lists and does it really well. I highly recommend it. USELESS GARBAGE. | You can‚Äôt get to the packing list.  Watch an ad that allows you to advance but the button to advance to the list page doesn‚Äôt work.  Honestly, it‚Äôs an app that tells you how many pairs of socks you should bring on a 3 day trip, why the ads?  Delete immediately. | it crashes on my macbook. too bad. I had used in the past | I am a very heavy packer. Though I‚Äôm still this way, this app has helped me improve greatly. It‚Äôs been 5-Starts since I bought it and has continued to be with updated and new features added | Do not download. Lists aren‚Äôt generated. | Do not have what I need | It might just be me. I love the app, but I‚Äôm not sure how I see the other family members I added. title: GetYourGuide: Travel & Tickets
description:
Download the GetYourGuide app to discover and book unforgettable travel experiences anywhere in the world

Whether you're planning a vacation or looking for last-minute things to do in any destination, we make booking tours, day trips, and activities easier than ever. Choose from culture, food, adventure, nature, and more experiences.

Maximize your trip with exclusive access to the world's top attractions and museums, find the highlights and hidden gems, and keep up with last-minute travel deals using the app ‚Äî we make travel planning easy, and making memories easier.

Find over 75,000 experiences

Booking tickets for unmissable sights has never been easier ‚Äî experience the Colosseum, Eiffel Tower, London Eye, TV Tower, Sagrada Familia, and more.

Discover expert-guided tours ‚Äî explore unforgettable travel highlights in Paris, Dubai, London, Florence, New York City, Berlin, Vienna, New Orleans, Cancun, Tuscany, Lisbon, and more. Our app will be your city guide for destinations around the world, and our local experts help you get fully immersed.

Travel with flexibility

Reserve now, pay later ‚Äî save your place for popular experiences early and make your payment at a later date.
Instant confirmation ‚Äî whether you're booking tours in advance or need last-minute tickets, receive your tickets and booking confirmation instantly.
Offline tickets ‚Äî Conveniently access your booking information offline. Download, store, and present your tickets on your mobile device

Book with confidence

24/7 customer service ‚Äî Easily find help when you have questions. We offer customer service by email, phone, and in the app across multiple languages.
Flexible cancellation ‚Äî Don‚Äôt stress if your plans change. We offer free cancellation up to 24 hours before your activity for most bookings.

With tours and activities for any interest, you can plan your trips your way. Dive into nature and explore fjords in Norway, try local cuisine across Europe, or uncover fascinating history in the United States.

Whether you're living the magic of the wizarding world on a Harry Potter experience, savoring delicious culinary delights on a food tour of Barcelona, booking top rated tours to see the Vatican, or following a city guide through Berlin, we guarantee you'll find something unforgettable to do ‚Äî make the most of your travel and leisure time.

Uncover the top tourist activities in the world's bucket-list destinations:
Book museum tours and tickets in Rome, food trips through Naples, trekking in Iceland, river cruises around Prague, outdoor adventures in Bali, sightseeing in Budapest, and more.

Use the app as a travel planner or for travel guidance, then book travel experiences for the world's must-see highlights with excursions and last-minute tickets.

Tell us how we‚Äôre doing
Leave us a review if you‚Äôre enjoying your GetYourGuide app experience or head over to our help page for further assistance: www.getyourguide.com/contact
releaseNotes:
We update our app every few weeks to ensure that searching for activities feels like being upgraded to first class. Here's a quick overview of what the app team has been up to:

Bugs? Bashed
Crashes? Banished
Design? Beautified

Has our hard work paid off? Tell us what you think by leaving a review.

Something not quite right with the app? Head over to our help page for further assistance: getyourguide.com/contact

title: CheapOair: Cheap Flight Deals
description:
With our app, you can easily book flights, hotels, accommodations, and car rentals‚Äîall in one place! Plan your ideal trip and book your travel accommodations with ease. Our app provides a secure booking process, allowing you to make reservations in no time. Download it today and embark on your next adventure! 

 
Discover a World of Travel Deals: 

Whether you're planning a weekend getaway or a road trip adventure, our app provides access to countless travel offers and deals to suit your budget and preferences. With just a few taps, you can get great deals on flights, hotels, accomodations, and car rentals so you can plan your vacation for less. 


Explore a Wide Selection of Airlines: 

From major carriers to regional favorites, our app features a wide selection of airlines to choose from, allowing you to find the perfect travel deal for your needs. Whether you're looking for budget-friendly options or luxurious amenities, our app has something for everyone! 


Seamless Booking Experience: 

Booking your next travel adventure has never been easier thanks to our user-friendly interface and intuitive design. Browse through our extensive range of offers and deals, compare airfares, and book your preferred travel accommodations‚Äîall from the comfort of your mobile device! Whether you're booking a last-minute getaway or planning a dream vacation, our app streamlines the booking process for a stress-free experience. 


Flexible Booking Options: 

We understand that every traveler is unique, which is why our app offers flexible booking options to suit your preferences. Whether you prefer to book online or seek personalized assistance, our app has you covered. With just a tap, you can easily book your travel accommodations online or choose to speak with one of our customer service representatives for expert guidance and support. Whatever your booking preference, our app will give you the freedom to plan your travel your way! 

 
Safe and Secure Transactions: 

Because keeping your personal information and payment details safe is our priority, we use the latest encryption technology to safeguard your data so your transactions are protected at all times. Whether you're booking a flight, hotel, accomodation, or car rental, you can book with confidence knowing that your information is in good hands. 


Expert Travel Advice: 

Planning your next adventure is easier than ever with our app's expert travel recommendations. From destination guides to insider tips, you will find valuable insights and information to help you make the most of your trip. Whether you're looking for the best restaurants, attractions, or activities, our app has everything you need to plan the perfect itinerary. 


Endless Vacations and Getaways:  

With our app, vacation possibilities are practically endless. Whether you're dreaming of a relaxing beach retreat, an adrenaline-fueled adventure, or a cultural getaway, our app offers plenty of options to suit every traveler's wanderlust. Explore exotic destinations, discover hidden gems, and create unforgettable memories‚Äîall with the convenience of our flight booking mobile app! 

 
Download Our App Today: 

Ready to take your travel experience to new heights? Download our mobile app today and start exploring a whole world of travel offers and deals. Your next adventure is just one tap away!
