title: CLEAR - Travel & Experiences
description:
Meet CLEAR, an identity company that powers safer, easier entry through airport security and arenas across the country. With identity verification technology that confirms you are you, CLEAR unlocks a world of joyful experiences by removing friction from your everyday life.

Think of this app as CLEAR in your pocket: Take control of airport travel and get to your gate on time‚Äîevery time‚Äîwith Home-to-Gate. Easily find CLEAR locations to skip long lines and get into your favorite games and events faster. Plus, build your verified CLEAR identity, which keeps your personal records in one secure place.

No matter the journey or the destination, CLEAR keeps you moving.

Your Privacy is Our Priority:
Using CLEAR is completely opt-in: we keep your data secure and protect your privacy. Transparency and security are at the center of everything we do‚Äîthat means keeping you in control of your own personal information. You will know when CLEAR is asking for your information, what information we‚Äôre asking for, and how it will be used. 

Have a question or feedback about the CLEAR app? Send us a note at CSLeadership@clearme.com.

Follow @CLEAR on Twitter and Instagram for exciting updates, news, and more.
releaseNotes:
This release includes the removal of our HealthPass and Vaccine Card features as we continue to shift focus away from COVID-era functionality and towards a best-in-class travel companion app. As always, we‚Äôve also included a set of bug fixes & improvements. 

No matter the journey or the destination, CLEAR keeps you moving. Smooth travels!

I can not take a clear photo of my drivers license with the app‚Äôs built in camera setup. I have an Apple iPhone 15 Pro Max and have no issues using other apps to take a photo of my different forms of ID. 

The app‚Äôs built in camera setup keeps making the photos come out blurry. The phone is perfectly stable and it doesn‚Äôt matter if I get closer or farther away from my ID, the photos just come out blurry. My ID is on a solid black background with no light glare, great natural lighting and it still can‚Äôt take a non-blurry photo. 

There is no way to use my Apple iPhone 15 Pro Max macro mode for better photo enhancements like I can for any other photo I take using phone which makes no sense. 

Also, the app does not allow you to upload a photo of your ID that‚Äôs already on your phone. I have perfectly clear, close-up, front and back photos of all my ID cards and passport in my phone‚Äôs photo library. Why you have to take a photo and can not upload them makes no sense. 

This app description acts like it‚Äôs so high tech and professional but these are basic features for any app in 2023. I don‚Äôt understand how an app with these issues could have made it to release. This tells me the developers have not and do not test their apps prior to release. 

There are multiple other reviewers with the same issue but clearly nothing has been done. If the developers of this app read my entire review‚Ä¶ PLEASE correct these simples issues asap. | signing up for this will steal hundreds of dollars from you monthly, they wont let me cancel my subscription no matter how much i contact them, i‚Äôm considering to sue them

title: CheapTickets Hotels & Flights
description:
Free cancellation on most hotels. Because flexibility matters.

The CheapTickets app for iOS offers the ability to search and securely book the same selection of cheap flights, hotel rooms, rental cars and activities offered on CheapTickets.com. Plus, join our CheapCash loyalty program and start earning CheapCash on select flight bookings that you can instantly apply toward hotels in the app!  Use our convenient travel tools to view upcoming trip details, access address information and get maps for directions, receive alerts for flight delays, gate changes, hotel check-out times and more.  You can also find last-minute hotel rooms nearby and save 40% with mobile exclusive hotel rooms! 

HOTELS 
- Last minute hotel bookings welcome and free cancellation available!
- Pay when you book or when you arrive at the hotel. 
- Find hotels, motels, and inns around you on an easy-to-use map view.
- Review descriptions, photos, user ratings, and amenities from verified hotel guests.
- Sort results by deals, price, or reviews.
- Securely store your payment details for faster, easier, and safe bookings. 

FLIGHTS 
- Save even more on your flight with our combined one-way fares and get a single price for two separately issued tickets.
- Search and book round trip or one-way flights.
- Sort flights by price, time, or duration from any airline.
- Enter a departure date and destination, and your trip-ready. Book now!

CARS 
- Search thousands of cars to find cheap, quality rentals. Save big when you book in-app!
- Plan round trip rentals from any airport in the world to make your vacation, holiday or getaway a total breeze.

CheapTickets offers a simple, secure booking process, and 24x7 customer support. Use our convenient travel tools to view upcoming trip details, access address information and get maps for directions, receive alerts for flight delays, gate changes, hotel check-out times and more.

The CheapTickets app uses information for analytics, personalization, and advertising. By using our app, you agree to our privacy and cookies policies.

title: Google Translate
description:
Translate between up to 133 languages. Feature support varies by language:
‚Ä¢ Text: Translate between languages by typing
‚Ä¢ Offline: Translate with no internet connection
‚Ä¢ Instant camera translation: Translate text in images instantly by just pointing your camera
‚Ä¢ Photos: Translate text in taken or imported photos
‚Ä¢ Conversations: Translate bilingual conversations on the fly
‚Ä¢ Handwriting: Draw text characters instead of typing
‚Ä¢ Phrasebook: Star and save translated words and phrases for future reference

Permissions notice:
‚Ä¢ Microphone for speech translation
‚Ä¢ Camera for translating text via the camera
‚Ä¢ Photos for importing photos from your library

Translations between the following languages are supported:
Afrikaans, Albanian, Amharic, Arabic, Armenian, Assamese, Aymara, Azerbaijani, Bambara, Basque, Belarusian, Bengali, Bhojpuri, Bosnian, Bulgarian, Catalan, Cebuano, Chichewa, Chinese (Simplified), Chinese (Traditional), Corsican, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dhivehi, Dogri, Dutch, English, Esperanto, Estonian, Ewe, Filipino, Finnish, French, Frisian, Galician, Georgian, German, Greek, Guarani, Gujarati, Haitian Creole, Hausa, Hawaiian, Hebrew, Hindi, Hmong, Hungarian, Icelandic, Igbo, Ilocano, Indonesian, Irish, Italian, Japanese, Javanese, Kannada, Kazakh, Khmer, Kinyarwanda, Konkani, Korean, Krio, Kurdish (Kurmanji), Kurdish (Sorani), Kyrgyz, Lao, Latin, Latvian, Lingala, Lithuanian, Luganda, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Maithili, Malagasy, Malay, Malayalam, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Meiteilon (Manipuri), Mizo, Mongolian, Myanmar (Burmese), Nepali, Norwegian, Odia (Oriya), Oromo, Pashto, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Punjabi, Quechua, Romanian, Russian, Samoan, Sanskrit, Scots Gaelic, Sepedi, Serbian, Sesotho, Shona, Sindhi, Sinhala, Slovak, Slovenian, Somali, Spanish, Sundanese, Swahili, Swedish, Tajik, Tamil, Tatar, Telugu, Thai, Tigrinya, Tsonga, Turkish, Turkmen, Twi, Ukrainian, Urdu, Uyghur, Uzbek, Vietnamese, Welsh, Xhosa, Yiddish, Yoruba, Zulu

They will also say they hope to get around to it like they have for other African languages, but sadly the countries which once tried to erase the existence of these languages have long since been fully featured on the app.

title: Atlas Obscura Travel Guide
description:
Find your adventurous spirit, get off the beaten path and discover unique places to experience near and far, all contributed by Atlas Obscura‚Äôs global community of explorers. 

---

EXPLORE THE MAP
We‚Äôve plotted the entire Atlas Obscura database in a single map, allowing you to easily find unique places nearby or to help plan your next trip.

GET THE BACKSTORY
Learn what makes each place so unique. Each entry has detailed information, photos, and tips from the community.

PLAN & TRACK YOUR ADVENTURES
Create custom lists to organize your itinerary or bucket list. Also, use the ‚ÄúBeen There‚Äù feature to track your progress exploring the wondrous world of Atlas Obscura.

ADD YOUR DISCOVERIES
Contribute new places to be published in Atlas Obscura, and share photos and tips from your travels with the community.

BROWSE BY INTEREST
Explore Atlas Obscura by whatever fascinates you. From history and architecture to art and natural wonders, get lost in the never-ending collection of off-the-beaten-path places.

If you‚Äôre enjoying our app, please take a moment to rate us in the app store. For bug reports or suggestions, reach out at appfeedback@atlasobscura.com, or visit us on Twitter at @atlasobscura where we‚Äôll report any major issues.

Stay curious,

Atlas Obscura
releaseNotes: This release improves how we show pins for places a user has marked as "Been There" or "Want to Go"
reviews:
We use AO all the time during our travels. There are so many cool things to do and see. We recommend it to any of our friends that are traveling. Great app. | I installed it and to its credit it did have some neat information. It‚Äôs locked in the position where it installed and can‚Äôt be moved. I tried to uninstall it and I cannot. It‚Äôs been he only app on my phone that isn‚Äôt iPhone proprietary that doesn‚Äôt allow it to be uninstalled. I don‚Äôt trust this app and want it gone. | enjoy it on a daily basis. this is the way i start my day. we bought the boxed book set too. | Honestly the community is amazing but the app is so riddled with bad ux and ui decisions like why are yall making an api call every time i change a filter just make the whole thing when i hit done?? Hire me to fix your app i am begging you | Love this site!! I use it everywhere I travel and enjoy seeing and experiencing more things than the average tourist. I am always amazed at the awesome Sites and little known destinations that they have compiled. I even used it near my house in upstate New York and despite living in the area for 44 years, still found cool places I‚Äôd never heard of or been to. I tell everyone that is going anywhere to use Atlas Obscura | Atlas Obscura is not just an app; it‚Äôs a magic carpet ride to the most extraordinary corners of our planet. Its user-generated content brings to light the less trodden paths and uncovers sights and landmarks that traditional guides often overlook. This app is the epitome of adventure and discovery, perfect for those yearning to explore beyond the ordinary.

The interface of Atlas Obscura is intuitive, making it easy to navigate through its vast network of wonders. Whether you‚Äôre a seasoned traveler or a curious explorer in your backyard, the app tailors its discoveries to suit your location and interests. It‚Äôs like having a knowledgeable friend in your pocket, always ready to show you something fascinating.

One of the most striking features of Atlas Obscura is the diversity of its content. From awe-inspiring natural formations to quirky roadside attractions, the app covers an eclectic mix of places that are both informative and entertaining. Each location is accompanied by detailed descriptions, user reviews, and often, mesmerizing photographs that stir the wanderlust in you.

Moreover, the app fosters a sense of community among users. You can contribute by adding new locations, sharing your experiences, or offering tips, which makes Atlas Obscura a living, evolving atlas of the world‚Äôs wonders. This communal aspect adds depth to the app, making it more than just a guide‚Äîit‚Äôs a platform for sharing and discovery.

However, it‚Äôs important to note that while Atlas Obscura opens the door to hidden gems, some locations might require careful planning to visit. The app does a great job in providing essential information, but it‚Äôs always wise to do additional research, especially for remote or less accessible places.

In conclusion, Atlas Obscura is a treasure trove for adventurers and curious souls. It‚Äôs an invitation to step off the beaten path and plunge into a world of fascinating discoveries. For anyone looking to spice up their travels with unique, offbeat destinations, this app is a must-have. It‚Äôs not just about places; it‚Äôs about experiencing the myriad stories and wonders that our world has to offer. | I absolutely swear by using this app when I travel to find amazing sightseeing and experiences and real world "Easter eggs"... but it isn't without its frustrastions:

- Currently, newly marked places I've visited no longer give me a grey flag. This makes it confusing to see where I should go next. I tried uninstalling and reinstalling even, to no avail.
- After awhile with the app in use, you'll get an error message "something went wrong" and can't mark anything, and you'll need to restart the app and refind the location to mark. I've had this problem since I started using this a whole year ago and it is still not resolved!!

Also, as a suggestion, I like that places that are permanently closed are still featured, but could be helpful to give them a distinguished color marker, like red or something (but still allow gray flag for those who visited before shutdown). 

Also, when clicking "Directions", it uses my Google Maps, but would be nice if it have me the option to use Apple Maps instead (like Happy Cow app lets me do). 

I want to give it 5 stars, but these bugs sometimes break my flow while I'm exploring. | Good content for atlas obscura but really the app needs some work. Jerky, hangs, not usable at times. | Never fails to enlighten and inform with fascinating articles. | I‚Äôve only been working with the app for a couple of hours but I‚Äôm finding it very difficult to navigate.  It‚Äôs not intuitive, its slow and clunky. I‚Äôm finding basic tasks,  like adding the countries I‚Äôve been to,  really hard to complete.  Maybe it‚Äôs me, and I just need more time with it but I still feel like it shouldn‚Äôt be this hard to work with. | I love Atlas Obscura, and this app is overall wonderful but I sure wish links would open in the app rather than my browser | Only got this yesterday - it‚Äôs great. Helps with vacation planning in a big way. | I love the website and the content, but the app is janky. One major issue is it hangs when trying to filter results. | This app works well and the information is great! I have so many places I want to see and so many I‚Äôve seen and I can put both in separate lists. | Awesome app for the travel who likes off the beaten path. Only downside is the actual map, hard to use on a iPhone. | I travel a lot for work and my photography hobby, and I *love* going to the places I see on this app. Doing so helps me learn about the history, architecture, ecosystems, and sometimes reveals photo opportunities I wouldn‚Äôt have found on my own. It also keeps growing as people add sites so if I go to the same city multiple times there are sometimes new suggestions to check out. I love it! | My family and I love this app. They were many times that we went on vacation and ran out of things to do so we open the app and search for surroundings. | I love atlas Obscura, but the app is glitchy. When you are trying to view places, it won‚Äôt let you click the lists and clicking a hashtag doesn‚Äôt work very well either. | Earth‚Äôs most exciting travel app. You‚Äôre shortcut to what is interesting and off the beaten path. | We just had a wonderful lunch there. The wait went by quickly the food was delicious. Best of all our server, Claudia was delightful. Highly recommend First Watch. | Great app, fun when you travel to a new place! 
Cleveland Rocks! | One of the top 10 apps on the App Store. The store would not be complete without it. | A must-have for any avid traveller. Full of surprising finds and always interesting to explore! üåè üåé üåç | My scoring of 0 was completely wrong. 
5 Baby! | Love road trips and unusual attractions. This is a perfect road trip companion! | Hard to figure out and save routes and attractions | After starting a list, the newly created one doesn‚Äôt appear in selection to add other locations. Also no way to delete lists. | Any time I go anywhere, I check with Atlas Obscura to see what else I could see there | Would like to see an iPad version of the app.  The content is great and a more advanced search would be fantastic! | I‚Äôve used this app and their website to find the lesser known attractions. I love the history and stories. You will too! I tell all my friends and family about this whenever they say they are traveling . | Glad this is finally in app form, but sad the add location feature is broken since I know some wonderful nooks and crannies | The app is really hard to navigate and is missing features from the website. It‚Äôs a completely different experience, so if you like the site you probably won‚Äôt like the app and vice versa | I love the obscurity | I would love to hear a podcast or read about the Tarahumara abilities to run and how they live | Trying to add places I‚Äôve been to the map, not working. | The world has nothing but bad news, or so it seems.  This is a reason to turn on the iPad. | Right out of the gate it‚Äôs my first time using the app and it will not simply load when I try to pick an interest to search ü§¶‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è. Closed the app and tried again and it still just sits on the loading categories screen and never loads anything. WTH? | AO is an amazing resource | This app is my favorite now! I love seeing new interesting places to check out of just admirer. Make a Bucket list! Lol very well made and beautiful pictures to boot! | Traveling in London and Paris, and this app has amazing info for finding the most interesting and unusual sites. But if you want to use the app features (been there, want to go, new place, etc) it often doesn‚Äôt work. It just says to try again, and again and again. | Look I love atlas obscura and I use this app literally all the time. Also, the loading takes a really long time with the ad at the start, like 1-2 minutes. It crashes often, or forgets my login info and I have to restart the app. In general, it‚Äôs not very good. Also there should be a rating system for entries- some things on here aren‚Äôt really fit for the ‚Äúobscura‚Äù definition, like boring historians get lost, get cooler, find better spots that fit here not just random history factoids that amuse you but nobody else. If you want to add a place it has to go through a review, whom knows how long that takes. I am not wasting anymore of my time with this app | I use Atlas Obscura on all my travels.  I‚Äôve shared it with many friends.  Truly a highly useful app. | Is this app meant to be useable past the home page? | So glad this exist!! | It has been fun finding out of the way spots. | Always interesting. Always compelling. A brief spot of intelligence in a normally bleak and absurd landscape. Once the features on the app are wrinkle-free, I think it‚Äôs a great resource to find new and exciting things to do, even in your home town! | It‚Äôs been my favorite source to visit different places üòé

title: United Airlines
description:
Meet the United app 
 
From planning, to booking, to day of travel, we‚Äôve got you covered.  

On our app you can: 
‚Ä¢ look for flights across our global network and book them easily for yourself, or your friends and family
‚Ä¢ check in for your flight and get your boarding pass before you get to the airport
‚Ä¢ change seats, or flights, if something better becomes available
‚Ä¢ make sure you‚Äôre prepared for your trip with our Travel-Ready Center
‚Ä¢ add your bags, drop them at bag drop shortcut, and track them along your journey
‚Ä¢ use our built-in terminal guide to find your gate and navigate the airport with ease
‚Ä¢ watch movies, play games, and pay for inflight snacks and drinks while you‚Äôre in the air
‚Ä¢ enroll in MileagePlus or manage your MileagePlus account and use your miles to book award travel in our app
‚Ä¢ talk, text or video chat with an agent if you have any questions about your trip
‚Ä¢ figure out your next move if your flight is delayed or cancelled
releaseNotes: We‚Äôre always trying to give you the most up-to-date info about your trip via Live Activities and in this release, you‚Äôll now be able to get your personalized steps through the airport from Terminal Guide (including where to get dropped off, where to drop off your bag and more), all from your lock screen.
reviews:
Step by step | Super good your airline thank you | My husband and I are both members of United Airlines and card holders. We will be canceling our membership. Our United Club passes were not honored in Punta Cana. I reached out several times to have our passes extended so we could use them on our next trip. We never received them. Next we saw a $125 credit to change our flights to next day, once we were in WiFi range, we went back on the site within an hour. The same seats were all available however the rates were doubled. I contacted customer service and received no assistance. I asked to use miles to make the change and was told no. There is no point in keeping this membership. The customer service is poor. The airline has terrible press in their planes. I just don‚Äôt see any point in continuing this membership. Meanwhile, Southwest, AA and Hawaiian airlines have been more than accommodating when anything has come up throughout the years. | I get an error on the app, "Payment cards and passes in Wallet will not work automatically while "United" is in use", and can't add boarding passes to the Wallet using the app (though it works fine from the united.com site). This is the only place I could find to send this feedback. | I had a seat change and received 4 emails, 4 texts, plus app notifications. The page has NO text, and blue and white option buttons have no text. Thus it had me going around in the same loops of questions. Finally, when I hit the white button it let me out; I was able to proceed. I have no idea of what I clicked on. Tell your developers the is some bug there. | Can‚Äôt remember having a nonstop flight! Love it! | Loved | Haven‚Äôt travelled in several years but the only issue with the app so far is it doesn‚Äôt access credit cards on my device for faster payment | Excellent | Excellent airline and service | For international travelers, impossible to make a credit card payment for baggage unless you have a USA phone number and USA address. today notice while checking into the flight I was tricked via internet travel agency into a basic economy flight. I would never buy such ticket on international flights. I‚Äôve flown enough in my life never to purchase such ticket | Could not check bag in advance. The senior member of the boarding crew did a superlative job keeping customers in the lounge waiting for news on departure.  The line of communication was excellent. The screenshot of my boarding pass said the wrong terminal and wrong gate up until the time of the flight. | Very low as when I asked for assistance with getting baggage tags and the representative messed up and I was over charged $200. | United has always been a 5 star app, but with the recent release I am no longer able to simply track my incoming flight and see if it‚Äôs left the prior gate or is delayed. The track my plane using flight aware is completely useless as it provides no information that is needed to track my flight.   It‚Äôs fine as an add on, but as a frequent flyer I need the details.  United is no longer and all in 1 app and I will now have to find something yo use alongside it.  This is a huge disappointment and inconvenience. | Didn‚Äôt let me check bag. Could barely understand the service agent and she was inexperienced and had to talk to supervisor 4 times because she had no idea how her own system worked.

title: Viator: Tours & Attractions
description:
If you‚Äôve landed on this page, you were probably looking for world-class travel experiences with traveler-minded flexibility and convenience. That‚Äôs just what we do here at Viator. In the off chance that you just stumbled on this page without knowing who we are (the internet can be like that sometimes), then allow us to introduce ourselves:

Hello, we‚Äôre Viator.

As the leading marketplace for travel experiences, we believe that making memories is what travel is all about. And with 300,000+ experiences at your fingertips‚Äîeverything from simple tours to extreme adventures (and all the niche, interesting stuff in between)‚Äîyou're guaranteed to make memories that will last a lifetime. 

With industry-leading flexibility and last-minute availability, it's never too late to make any day extraordinary.

We‚Äôre always working on ways to make our app offering even better for travelers like you, with more convenience, more benefits, and more flexibility‚Äîall so you can focus on the fun stuff: experiencing the world in new and unexpected ways.

What does that mean for this version of the Viator app? In short, we‚Äôre taking everything about Viator and adding into a mobile app you can take anywhere in the world. But let‚Äôs go long, since we have the space:

MANAGE MY BOOKINGS
In this update, we‚Äôve introduced a Manage My Booking hub, where you can make quick and easy updates to all of your bookings, in one place. Need to add, remove, or edit traveler info? Tap that Edit button. Need to change the date and time of your experience? Tap that Edit button. Need to message your tour operator for changes? ‚Ä¶Tap that Edit button. 10 points for Gryffindor. 

VIATOR REWARDS
We are THRILLED (sorry, got carried away) to announce our new rewards program with our travel community. With Viator Rewards, each time you book with Viator, you‚Äôll earn cash rewards after your experience. The best part? You can use them to save actual money on future bookings. Do more. Earn more. Redeem more. Repeat. Simple as that! 

MORE VIATOR APP FEATURES:

Book and manage your trip on the go:
‚Ä¢	Access to our amazing selection of tours and activities before and during your trip
‚Ä¢	Easily access tickets offline
‚Ä¢	Modify, edit, or cancel your bookings on the go
‚Ä¢	Get same-day notifications to your activity with directions to your departure and pick up points
‚Ä¢	Free cancellation up to 24 hours in advance

Easy trip planning:
‚Ä¢	Read millions of reviews from Tripadvisor and our Viator travel communities
‚Ä¢	Contact tour guides directly for easy communication
‚Ä¢	Create wishlists of all tours & activities you want to book

Flexible payment options:
‚Ä¢	Reserve now and pay later
‚Ä¢	Pay in installments with Klarna
‚Ä¢	Book with Credit Card, PayPal, Apple Pay

Exclusive app-only promos:
‚Ä¢	Take advantage of in-app messaging offering the latest promos and special offers

No matter what type of traveler you are, Viator will help you make memories that will last a lifetime.
But don‚Äôt just take it from us. Here‚Äôs what our travel community says about the Viator app:

‚ÄúSo easy & efficient. Even ol‚Äô guys like me can easily maneuver using the Viator app! Awesome!‚Äù
‚ÄúGreat app. Easy to navigate, lots of options and great info‚Äù

Rated 4.3/5 on Trustpilot with over 57,000 verified reviews

P.S. Having technical issues with the app? Please email mobileappsupport@viator.com

Join the Viator App Feedback Team
Share your thoughts about the Viator App to make it better for our travel community. https://www.userinterviews.com/opt-in/bTQXz4p6A6krCkVi475HFRm7

I always recommend it since. | We have always recommended and used Viator. | If you don‚Äôt know , this island can be expensive ,  but with this app I found all the amusement i was interested in for a very low exciting price so thank you so much for being so convenient towards my fun factor and my wallet. title: Pin Traveler: Travel Tracker
description:
Can‚Äôt remember the name of that place you visited last summer? Want to create a wishlist for your future travels? Pin Traveler is here to help you keep track of your trips all around the world and share them with whoever you want!

Keep track of countries, states, and cities on your map, and discover your travel stats. Effortlessly add details to your pins such as your travel dates, favorite restaurants, and points of interest. Share your world with friends and family with a single tap.

With Pin Traveler:
‚Ä¢ Search and Pin any city, country, or location, including states
‚Ä¢ See fun stats like your farthest or most visited pin
‚Ä¢ Share your map with friends and family
‚Ä¢ Create a wishlist of your potential future destinations or custom lists by using pin colors
‚Ä¢ Save the details of your trips to remember your favorite restaurants, shops, and sights
‚Ä¢ Add dates to your locations to view your trips in chronological order
‚Ä¢ Associate photos with your visits and locations
‚Ä¢ Synchronize your data across your various Apple Devices

Why you‚Äôll love Pin Traveler:
‚Ä¢ Specialization: Visiting one city doesn't mean you want to mark the entire country! With Pin Traveler, you have the full flexibility of choosing what you want to mark on your map
‚Ä¢ Personalization: Customize your map with options ranging from pin colors, using flags or map styles
‚Ä¢ Sharing: You can share an image of your travel map, or a link to our interactive web-map to share your pins with everyone you want
‚Ä¢ Privacy-focused: feel free to take your account private anytime restricting all access from outsiders
‚Ä¢ Built & Designed by a travel enthusiast, just like you

If you enjoy using Pin Traveler and would show us your support make sure to leave us a 5-star review!

For questions, comments, or support; send us an email at hello@pintravelerapp.com or use the feedback button in the app.

Stickers and in-app artwork created by Lucille Miao.

Instagram, Twitter: @PinTravelerApp
Website: https://pintravelerapp.com

==========================

Introducing Premium Membership
Free users are able to pin up to 50 pins for free and save 10 points of interest (such as restaurants, museums, etc.) per pin. They can also add an unlimited number of travel dates to their pins and change their pin colors/labels without any restrictions. Premium tier users have unlimited usage in all services along with the ability to upload an unlimited number of photos.

Premium tier subscription payments are made through your iTunes Account and automatically renew at the expiration of your membership period, starting at the end of your trial. Cancel at any time by turning off auto-renewal in your Account Settings at least 24 hours before the expiration of your membership period, any unused trial days will be forfeited.

Terms & Conditions: https://pintraveler.net/terms_of_use.pdf

==========================
releaseNotes:
3.12.0 Update - New Trips Page
- Exciting changes are coming to trips! In order to prepare ourselves better for the changes coming we are introducing a brand new Trip Details page that lets you see your photos full screen.
- Trips can now have dedicated cover photos.
- Wishlist transparency has been retired in place of lightly colored pins.
- Small UI tweaks to show more details about your trips and pins!
reviews:
This is such a great way to document and journal all of your travel | I love this app!  I have been anle to pin every place I have been  over my lifetime!  With the new categories you can now now customize it for your special places, like my UNESCO Wirld Heritage Sites. | I used to keep a travel map with pins, but it became awkward and outdated.  I looked for a replacement and found Pin Traveler when I'd just begun an island cruise to Greece.  I loved dropping pins for every island and historic site I visited.  I loved it so much that I purchased the Lifetime Membership within days of installing it. 

I gave it only four stars, as I sometimes find navigating the features awkward and non-intuitive.  Reading the help solves some of that, but my biggest hurdle is lumping pins into a single trip.  And once a pin is dropped, it's hard (for me) to add it to a trip.  I'm hoping a new feature including easy to create and edit multi-stop trips will be added.

Additionally, since Apple has made it possible for some iPhone apps to work on Macs as well, I have been trying this out on an M2 MacBook Pro. It seems to work well, is stable, and using the trackpad as a "pinch and drag" device works well. 

I hghly recommend thi app, and I look forward to the updates and improvements coming soon. | What a great app! I really like a record of places I‚Äôve traveled to. Thanks! | Amazing app that lets you track your travels! Customer support is swift and reliable! Doing it the ‚Äúold fashioned way‚Äù of pinning a world map was no longer working for me. I came upon the Pin Traveler app and quickly discovered that it is a great tool! Full disclosure, I recently needed to extend the app to my iPad and admittedly mistyped my email address. I reached out to the app owner and they were very swift and helpful! title: Uber - Request a ride
description:
Join the millions of riders who trust Uber for their everyday travel needs. Whether you‚Äôre running an errand across town or exploring a city far from home, getting there should be easy.

FIND THE RIDE YOU WANT
Find the perfect ride right at your fingertips! Uber is here to make your journey stress-free and enjoyable.

Pick from a wide range of products that the Uber app has to offer including: 
- UberX: Affordable rides, all to yourself
- Uber Green: Eco-Friendly
- UberXL: Affordable rides for groups up to 6
- Comfort: Newer cars with extra legroom
- Comfort Electric: Premium zero-emission cars
- Uber Pet: Affordable rides for you and your pet
- Black: Luxury rides with professional drivers
- Taxi: You now have the option to request a cab or a taxi on demand using Uber in select cities
- 2-wheels: Find a scooter to start riding roday 

UPFRONT PRICING
With Uber, you no longer need to worry about hidden costs or unexpected surprises. As you enter your destination in the app, you get upfront pricing and the estimated time of arrival.

SAFETY TOGETHER
Safety is a top priority at Uber. We have established comprehensive safety features to help ensure every rider and driver feels secure and comfortable.

AFFORDABLE PRICING
We‚Äôre doing all we can to make our pricing as transparent as possible.

- UberX Share: UberX Share connects you to other riders headed in the same direction. 
- Group Rides: Share the journey with friends.
- Split Fare: Don‚Äôt worry about doing the math later‚Äîsplit the cost evenly while you‚Äôre still on the ride. 

JOIN UBER ONE FOR EXCLUSIVE PERKS
Benefit from $0 Delivery Fee and up to 10% off eligible delivery and pickup orders, 6% Uber Cash back on eligible rides and a $5 credit if our Latest Arrival Estimate on your order is off. Other fees & terms apply. For more details see uber.com/uberone.

RESERVE RIDES IN ADVANCE
Need a ride at a specific time? No problem! Uber allows you to reserve rides in advance, so you can plan your day with confidence. 

GO GREEN
Uber is committed to building a sustainable future for our cities. With a growing fleet of electric and hybrid vehicles, you can choose eco-friendly rides to reduce your carbon footprint.

RENT CARS AND HAVE THEM DELIVERED TO YOU
Whether you need a car today or later, the online booking experience will help you find the right vehicle for a family vacation, a weekend getaway, airport travel, and more. You can have a rental car delivered to your door at the time and location of your choice with Valet, currently available in select cities.

MORE FEATURES
Delivery: Order food from your favorite restaurants through Uber Eats. Stock up on groceries, shop pharmacy, convenience and pet supplies and get them all delivered. 

Uber Connect: an easy, same-day, no-contact delivery solution that allows people to send items whether it‚Äôs a care package for a loved one or an item you sold online.

Transit: Say goodbye to complicated time schedules, hectic transfers, and unexpected waits while reducing your trip‚Äôs emissions.

Uber Charter: Book high-capacity group rides in vehicles seating 14-55 passengers, such as limo buses, luxury vans, and coach buses.

2-Wheels: Did you know you can also bike or ride a scooter with the Uber app?

Uber for Business: Manage and track business travel, meal programs, and more on one dashboard.

Uber Hourly: Keep a car and driver with you for hours. 

Uber Car Seat: Uber Car Seat provides one forward-facing car seat for a child who is at least 2 years old, 22 pounds, and 31 inches tall.

Get Started Now! Download the Uber app and create an account today. Uber is available in the following cities: Boston, DC, LA, New York, San Francisco, Vegas, Orlando, Chicago and more. Check if Uber is available in your city at https://www.uber.com/cities. Stay updated on the latest news, promotions, and offers by following us on Twitter at https://twitter.com/uber and liking us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/uber.
releaseNotes:
We update the Uber app as often as possible to make it faster and more reliable for you. Here are a couple of the enhancements you'll find in the latest update:

- Updates to improve localization across the app
- Various bug fixes & improvements
 ¬†
Love the app? Rate us! Your feedback keeps the Uber engine running.
Have a question? Tap Help in the Uber app or visit help.uber.com.

title: Fly Delta
description:
Welcome to Fly Delta, Delta‚Äôs award winning iOS app. With our dynamic Today screen which provides quick access to your boarding pass and other important day-of-travel information, Fly Delta makes travel easier than ever before.

‚Ä¢ Enroll in Delta's SkyMiles¬Æ program and earn miles every time you travel
‚Ä¢ Find, compare and book Domestic and International flights
‚Ä¢ Book SkyMiles award tickets
‚Ä¢ Purchase Delta Comfort+‚Ñ¢ seats and Trip Extras, including in-flight Wi-Fi, Priority Boarding and more
‚Ä¢ Reserve Preferred Seats like bulkhead and aisle
‚Ä¢ Rebook cancelled flights or missed connections
‚Ä¢ Manage your trips, profile and customize your travel preferences
‚Ä¢ Check your SkyMiles account balance and current Medallion¬Æ status
‚Ä¢ Check in, view your boarding pass and add it to Apple Wallet
‚Ä¢ Pay for checked bags and track their location
‚Ä¢ Check the latest flight status and receive flight and gate change notifications
‚Ä¢ Save a photo to remember your parking spot
‚Ä¢ Check your status on the upgrade or standby list
‚Ä¢ View or change your seat
‚Ä¢ Locate Delta Sky Club¬Æ lounges
‚Ä¢ View interactive airport maps, public transportation details and weather information
‚Ä¢ Get detailed info about our fleet and partners
‚Ä¢ Map flights en route with an interactive flight tracker
‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúToday‚Äù gathers everything you need for your day of travel into one convenient place
‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúNotifications‚Äù ensures you always have the latest flight updates, gate changes and more
‚Ä¢ View countdown to departure and arrival along with gate and baggage carousel information on Apple Watch

The Fly Delta app for iPhone and delta.com are always free to use on Delta‚Äôs Wi-Fi-enabled flights. Visit delta.com/app for more information.

When downloading the Fly Delta app, you agree that your personal data will be processed in accordance with Delta‚Äôs Privacy Policy which can be accessed via the link below or on our website at delta.com.
releaseNotes:
‚Ä¢	Copying your SkyMiles and Confirmation number is easier than ever - just look for the copy icon.
‚Ä¢	Expanded support for pre-select menus to partner airlines.
‚Ä¢	Continued enhancements to streamline the check-in process.
‚Ä¢	Minor enhancements & bug fixes to keep things running smoothly.

title: Agoda: Cheap Flights & Hotels
description:
Experience the world with Agoda, the ultimate app for booking your travel plans. Find cheap flights and affordable hotels in just a few taps! 

Booking international or domestic flights on Agoda is seamless. Discover countless airfare deals across 200 airlines worldwide. Our unique search engine compares flights and prices in near real-time  so you can book the best deal as soon as it drops.

Booking hotels, resorts, villas, homes, BnBs, and more is even easier now with over 3.9 million  accommodations available to book in 39 languages and currencies. Make the most of your hotel search with filters, hi-res photos, map views, local information, and over 28 million  verified reviews. On Agoda, you can even discover hotel rooms tailored to your travel needs and preferred budget. 

Want to earn? With Agoda Homes, you can become a host and start earning from your own property. 

Travel with confidence! See the world for less, with up to 80% off from Member Offers , Last-Minute Deals, and much more. Book a flight. Book a hotel. Book an unforgettable vacation with massive savings on Agoda. 

AGODA FEATURES
CHEAP FLIGHTS WITH JUST A TAP
- Search for affordable flights from over 200 airlines, flying to almost any destination
- Book flights knowing you‚Äôre getting a highly competitive price 
- Save your info and adjust your flight booking directly in the app

BOOK A ROOM EASILY 
- Choose from over 3.9 million  properties across the globe
- Reserve your next stay whether it‚Äôs a hotel, resort, villa, home, BnB, vacation rental, or anything in between
- Travel confidently! Read user reviews, view pictures, and browse local information

DEALS MADE FOR AFFORDABLE TRAVEL
- Save on trips with extraordinary deals on cheap flights and budget-friendly accommodations
- Plan your trip, travel, and fulfill your wanderlust without breaking the bank
- Enjoy a variety of special offers , with secret deals, discounts, and more

TRAVEL WORRY-FREE
-  Save your vouchers, details, and maps directly in the app for easy check-in and print-free travel
- Manage or edit your booking anytime, anywhere
- Need help? Agoda's Customer Support is available 24/7 in various languages to ensure your journey is both smooth and cost-efficient

releaseNotes:
Agoda now offers flights! Your trusted accommodation partner now brings you the very best updated deals on flights to your destination. So you can book your room and your flight from one great app, knowing you'll get the lowest price on both and 24/7 customer support. And with the Agoda Widget, you can stay on top of great deals and travel ideas!

Other recent improvements include:
- Find your next great destination with the Agoda Widget
- Send messages to a property when you have a question
- Easily recognize homes & apartments in search (pink stars)
- Host mode for Agoda Homes hosts (list your home on agoda.com/homes)

Explore, travel safely, and keep in touch!

title: Groupon - Local Deals Near Me
description:
Download Groupon and save up to 70% on the things you need every day. Find great deals on all the best stuff to eat, see, and do near you and around the world.

Whether you‚Äôre craving to try a new restaurant downtown, in need of a relaxing massage, looking for a new gym, or daydreaming about a hotel for a tropical getaway, Groupon has you covered with all the unique local experiences and discounts you could ever wish for. 

Get Access to Incredible Deals Near You 
‚Ä¢  Save up to 70% on 1,000s of local deals
‚Ä¢  Browse outstanding discounts and coupons for your favorite hair or beauty salon, pizza place, yoga studio, and more
‚Ä¢  Discover the hottest spots in your city including top-rated restaurants, spas, and gyms

Get Cash Back at Restaurants
‚Ä¢  Dine and get up to 30% cash back at participating Groupon+ restaurants.

Travel for Cheap
‚Ä¢  Find the fanciest hotels and travel to exotic destinations with Groupon Getaways
‚Ä¢  Always find something fun to do on your next trip by turning on your location settings

With the Groupon app you can:
‚Ä¢  Get promo codes and special savings alerts for deals near you, instantly on your mobile device 
‚Ä¢  Buy and redeem deals directly from your mobile device, no need to print vouchers or clip coupons
‚Ä¢  Read customer reviews and write your own
‚Ä¢  Share deals with friends and family
‚Ä¢  Use Apple Pay to buy deals with a single touch

Put down the coupon book and download Groupon to begin exploring the best that your city has to offer, with savings of up to 70%.

Groupon can provide you with real-time recommendations for great deals near you. As with any functionality of this type, continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life. 

Need help? Contact us at https://www.groupon.com/customer_support

title: American Airlines
description:
With the American Airlines app, you‚Äôre covered with the information you need exactly when you need it. Curious about traffic to the airport? Need a mobile boarding pass? Wondering where the closest Admirals Club¬Æ lounge is? All of this info and more is available at your fingertips.

- Lock Screen widgets: See your next trip's details right from the Lock Screen with our new dynamic widgets.

- Dynamic home screen: Knows where you are in your travel journey and gives you easy access to the right tools at the right time.

- Mobile boarding pass: Check in for your trip and retrieve your mobile boarding pass. No need to print, and it‚Äôs updated along the way.

- Flight updates: Get the latest flight updates by simply retrieving your trip and allowing American Airlines to send notifications to your mobile device.¬†

- Interactive terminal maps: Navigating airports is a breeze with our interactive terminal maps. Find the closest Admirals Club¬Æ lounge or get directions to your connecting gate.¬†

- AAdvantage¬Æ account details: Review all the details of your AAdvantage¬Æ account right from the app. Not an AAdvantage¬Æ member? Sign up today.

- Upgrade your seat: Request upgrades with ease. Want to see where you are on the list? The app displays the upgrade standby list within 4 hours of your scheduled departure.¬†

- Seat selection: Choose or change your seat within the app. Just pick the one you‚Äôd like and change it on the spot.¬†

- Track your bag: Know exactly where your bag is from the time it leaves your hands to when you extend the handle at your destination.¬†

- Save your trip: Your recently viewed trips are automatically saved in the app so you can easily grab the details for your next flight in seconds.

- Quick interactions: The American app utilizes Haptic Touch and is Apple watch compatible, giving you quick access to the most important info.¬†

- Wi-Fi access in the air: Don‚Äôt forget, on flights with Wi-Fi you can use the American app and aa.com at no cost.¬†

There‚Äôs a new group of flyers out there ‚Äì The World‚Äôs Greatest Flyers. They know that having the right travel tools makes for a great experience.

The sky‚Äôs the limit with the American Airlines sticker pack! Let friends and family know that you‚Äôre traveling, headed to the Admirals Club¬Æ lounge to take it easy before taking off, snapping photos at 30,000 feet or that you‚Äôve arrived.

Contact Us: 800-222-2377
releaseNotes: We‚Äôre continuing to work behind the scenes to improve your app experience.

The woman at the desk said I cannot check your bags you are late you should‚Äôve been here 45 minutes. I asked if I could carry the bags on she replied no one bag is too big. title: Hilton Honors: Book Hotels
description:
The Hilton Honors app has everything you need for the perfect vacation. Book a hotel, earn rewards, plan your trip, and so much more ‚Äî plus, it's free.

Top app features:
- View and manage your reservations in one place
- Check in before you arrive and go straight to your room (skip the front desk)
- Choose your room prior to your stay

- Earn Points with every stay and redeem them for free nights and perks with our partners
- Enjoy free WiFi, late checkout, and no charge for a second guest
- Achieve Elite member status and get perks like free upgrades, free continental breakfast or a Daily Food & Beverage Credit, and more

title: Culture Trip: Travel & Explore
description:
The Culture Trip app is your essential travel companion; wherever you are, wherever you go. Discover nearby recommendations hand-picked by global experts and local insiders, plan unique trips that are right for you, and easily book spot-on places to stay and experiences - all in one app.

Travel with Culture Trip and we help you get it right, before and during every precious trip. Because we are your trusted shortcut to booking travel that‚Äôs good, and makes you feel good.
 
THE WORLD‚ÄôS BEST BITS, HAND-PICKED BY US
Our recommendations are hand-picked by a global community of travel experts and local insiders - we know the best when we see it because we‚Äôve been doing this since 2011.
Our award-winning travel guides, stories, and videos give you an insider perspective on destinations around the world with lesser-known gems and unexpected highlights.

EASILY PLAN TRIPS THAT ARE RIGHT FOR YOU
My Plans: Wave goodbye to stacks of travel books. Collect trip inspiration in one place, and see everything on a handy map. Add your favourite travel guides and itinerary ideas, create wishlists of places to stay, and must-do experiences.
Near Me: The perfect tool to find local recommendations for the best things to do, areas to visit, places to stay, and more - wherever you are. Near me now includes a handy interactive map to help you pinpoint and book amazing places to stay and experiences around you!

BOOK WITH CONFIDENCE
Free cancellation: In these uncertain times, cancel or change for free on select properties and experiences.

Price-match guarantee: Find a better price on your booking and we‚Äôll match it. Simple.
 
Peace of mind: Our friendly team is on hand to help you with booking questions.

Just some of the reasons why the Culture Trip app has a 4.8-star rating and has been downloaded over 2.8 million times:

‚ÄúCulture Trip is like a crib sheet to the zeitgeist ‚Äì a whip-smart hybrid of magazine and travel site. You'll never feel out of the loop again.‚Äù ‚Äë App of the Day Feature, Apple‚Äú

Check out our reviews and ratings

¬© 2023 The Culture Trip Ltd.

title: Google Earth
description:
Create and collaborate on immersive, data-driven maps from anywhere, with the new Google Earth.
See the world from above with high-resolution satellite imagery, explore 3D terrain and buildings in hundreds of cities, and dive in to streets and neighborhoods with Street View's 360¬∞ perspectives.
releaseNotes:
Thanks for using Google Earth! This version includes bug fixes.
Our recent release brings a fresh new look, with new features to help you collaborate with others across devices, create maps on the go, and add photos from your camera to your maps.

title: Travelzoo Hotel & Travel Deals
description:
Find a great deal -- wherever you are, wherever you go -- with the free Travelzoo¬Æ app for your iPhone or iPod touch. Use the app to plan your flight and book your hotel, then once you‚Äôre on vacation, use it to find a deal for dinner, a spa day or fun activity. Join 30 million people worldwide and discover the latest travel, entertainment and local deals uncovered by our global team of Deal Experts.
¬†
With the Travelzoo iPhone app you can:
- Browse and purchase exclusive travel, entertainment, dining and spa deals directly on your phone, and save up to 65%
- View and redeem your vouchers on your phone
- Discover deals near you for hotels, restaurants, spas and events, mapped to your location
- View the latest Top 20¬Æ -- Travelzoo‚Äôs weekly best-of-the-best list of travel, entertainment and local deals
¬†
The reviews are in:
- 5 stars from our subscribers
- "App of the Week" by The Guardian, The Sunday Times and the Sunday Mirror
- "Top pick" by Travel + Leisure
- "...help(ed) take the stress out of a vacation" - SmartMoney
¬†¬†
Get exclusive deals in these international app editions:
- United States
- United Kingdom
- Canada
- Spain
- France
- Germany
- Australia
- Japan
- Hong Kong
- China
¬†
Feedback
- We welcome your input. For any issues found or improvement requests, email suggestions@travelzoo.com.
¬†
In Asia Pacific, the Travelzoo business is operated by Travelzoo (Asia) Ltd. and Travelzoo Japan K.K. under a license agreement with Travelzoo Inc.

title: Travelocity Hotels & Flights
description:
Get 10% off select hotels in app! Use code: APPONLY10

Free cancellation on most hotels. Because flexibility matters.

TRAVELOCITY APP FEATURES:

HOTELS
- Last minute hotel bookings welcome & free cancellation available!
- Pay when you book or when you arrive at the hotel. 
- Find hotels, motels, and inns around you on an easy-to-use map view.
- Review descriptions, photos, user ratings, and amenities from verified hotel guests.
- Securely store your payment details for faster, easier, and safe bookings. 

FLIGHTS
- Search and book round trip or one-way flights.
- Sort flights by price, time, or duration from any airline.
- Enter a departure date and destination, and your trip-ready.

ACTIVITIES
- Attraction tickets without the lines.
- Book local tours.
- Airport shuttles & more

MY TRIPS
- Share your travel plans with friends and family via Travelocity's itinerary sharing feature!
- View your record locator, gate information, and upcoming trip details on the go.
- Plan your own vacation packages with activities, hotels, cars, and more.

MANAGE
- Sign in through Facebook, and use the same account across all devices.
- Use the booking tracker to see your past, current and future bookings, even when you‚Äôre offline.
- Explore Groupon valuable travel information.

Travelocity gets you to your next destination cheaper than other apps thanks to the Travelocity Price Guarantee.

*APPONLY10 coupon code Terms & Conditions
Subject to the restrictions set out in these terms and conditions, the 10% promotion code may be applied to a qualifying stand-alone hotel (not a hotel booking in combination with any other product such as flight + hotel, or flight + hotel + car) booked on a mobile device or the Travelocity app by March 31, 2023, for 1 or more nights for travel by September 30, 2023. Qualifying bookings instantly receive 10% off at check-out through the use of the promotion code. Customers are limited to one redemption of this promotion code and up to a maximum savings of $150 per booking. After the booking, this promo code will not be able to be used again, even if the booking is cancelled. Exclusions may apply and most major hotel chains are excluded. The promotion code cannot be redeemed against taxes, supplier fees, cancellation or change fees/penalties, administrative fees or other miscellaneous charges, which are the sole responsibility of the customer. Discounts are not redeemable for cash for any reason. Promotion codes are non-transferable, not for resale, and cannot be combined with other offers or used for any booking previously made. Any attempt at fraud will be prosecuted to the fullest extent of the law. Void where prohibited, taxed or restricted by law. Travelocity reserves the right to change or limit the promotion in its sole discretion. Usual booking terms and conditions apply (see https://www.travelocity.com/p/info-other/legal.htm) and all bookings are subject to availability.

The Travelocity app uses information for analytics, personalization, and advertising. By using our app, you agree to our privacy and cookies policies.

title: Marriott Bonvoy: Book Hotels
description:
Book direct and enjoy exclusive offers with Marriott Bonvoy¬Æ to take the stress out of travel and find the best hotel deals.

Search hotels, resorts, and luxury destinations across 8,000+ hotels, 130+ countries, and over 30 brands. Join for free and earn rewards when you book with Marriott Bonvoy. 

Unlock extraordinary hotel deals, flexible trip planning, and travel ideas with the Marriott Bonvoy app!

BEST RATE GUARANTEE:
There are few guarantees in life. But our Best Rate Guarantee is one of the best. It ensures you‚Äôll always get the best rate when booking directly with Marriott. 

SEARCH HOTELS, BOOK STAYS, AND EARN REWARDS:
Search hotels and book your travel all within the app. Earn and redeem points for your stays booked directly with Marriott and reward yourself with a vacation.

FLEXIBLE CANCELLATIONS:
Need a last-minute hotel change? That‚Äôs why we offer flexible cancellation options to reassure you when booking your next stay with us. Use the app to adjust travel plans with ease. 

CHECK-IN TO YOUR HOTEL ON THE GO:
Check-in to your hotel from anywhere with Mobile Check-in. Let us know when you will arrive, and you'll get a notification when your room is ready.


MANAGE YOUR MARRIOTT BONVOY ACCOUNT:
Check your point balance, view your stay history, folio, and more.

ENJOY EXCLUSIVE MARRIOTT BONVOY HOTEL OFFERS:
„ÉªGet rewarded with instant benefits and exclusive perks for Marriott Bonvoy members.
„ÉªMarriott Bonvoy also offers free Wi-Fi for Bonvoy members at most hotels.
„ÉªNot a member yet? Download the app and join for free.

ORDER FOOD AND DRINKS AHEAD OF TIME:
Order ahead while you‚Äôre out exploring. Browse and order food and drinks from your hotel‚Äôs menu at participating properties, and it will be ready when you return.

CONTACTLESS CHECK-IN WITH ACCESS VIA MOBILE HOTEL KEY:
„ÉªNever worry about losing your key card again. Use your mobile device to open your hotel room and easily access any hotel amenity, like the parking garage, fitness center lounge, and pool.
„ÉªWith Mobile Key you can get to your room faster. Once opted in, we‚Äôll send you a notification to your phone or Apple Watch when your room is ready.

CONVENIENT WAYS TO CHAT DURING YOUR STAY:
„ÉªMobile Chat lets you talk directly to your hotel. Available just before, during, and even after your stay, ask the front desk for local recommendations, request amenities, and more while on-the-go.
„ÉªNeed something? Mobile Requests give you a list of amenities to choose from to customize your stay, or even ask for something you forgot, like a comb or toothpaste.


Marriott Bonvoy Hotel Brands: 

Use the Marriott Bonvoy app to book hotel stays with any of our 30+ brands, including AC Hotels by Marriott¬Æ, Aloft¬Æ Hotels, Autograph Collection¬Æ Hotels, Bulgari¬Æ, City Express, Courtyard¬Æ, Delta Hotels¬Æ, Design HotelsTM, EDITION¬Æ, Element¬Æ, Fairfield Inn & Suites¬Æ, Four Points¬Æ by Sheraton, Gaylord Hotels¬Æ, JW Marriott¬Æ, Le M√©ridien¬Æ, Moxy¬Æ Hotels, Marriott Executive Apartments¬Æ, Marriott Hotels¬Æ, Marriott Vacation Club¬Æ, Protea Hotels¬Æ, Renaissance¬Æ Hotels, Residence Inn¬Æ, Sheraton¬Æ, SpringHill Suites¬Æ, St. Regis¬Æ, The Luxury Collection¬Æ, The Ritz-Carlton¬Æ, TownePlace Suites¬Æ, Tribute Portfolio¬Æ, W¬Æ Hotels and Westin¬Æ Hotels & Resorts

title: Lyft
description:
Get where you‚Äôre going with Lyft.

Whether you‚Äôre catching a flight, going out for the night, commuting to the office, or running errands in a rush, the Lyft app offers you multiple ways to get there.

EASY TO USE
Enter your destination. See your route and ride cost up front. Choose Priority Pickup to get going quick. Boom. Done. Simple

CHOOSE YOUR WHEELS
Choose from Wait & Save, Priority Pickup, Bikes & Scooters, Lyft XL, Lyft Lux, Transit, or even Rentals.

AFFORDABLE RIDES
Our Wait & Save option helps you get around for less. And you can find the fastest public transit routes, too.

* Lyft ride types may vary by region. Check the app to see what is available in your city.
‚Äî
Prices vary based on market condition.

By downloading the app, you agree to allow Lyft to collect your device's language settings.
releaseNotes: Thanks for using Lyft! We update our app regularly to make your rides even better. Every update of our Lyft app includes improvements in speed and reliability, as well as bug fixes and performance improvements. As new features are released, we‚Äôll highlight those for you in the app.
reviews:
I like Lyft | They took away 60% of your trip pays | my was an amazing help and easy to idk with | Wali was very nice, never talked the whole ride unless I talked. I appreciate him . | The first experience was very well from communicating and the nice driver. | Rusty was a great driver.  He was quick and very friendly.  Hope to have him drive for us again. | I confirmed a ride at $36 for a 7mi ride, already surge price. The sec I got in the car it changed to $72. The driver even agreed it had to be a mistake and I‚Äôd just need to contact cs to get it fixed. 
Jokes on us- they don‚Äôt have customer service. 
Fine print in the policy says that if you have any more than a 10 sec delay between choosing and confirming the ride, it‚Äôs your fault if the rates just ‚Äúhappen‚Äù to double or triple. Meaning you agree to a ride at one price but they‚Äôre allowed to charge you something completely different if you miss the 10 sec window. 

The whole point of confirming is so we can check addresses and payment info and they use it as a tactic to straight up scam their customers. They charge whatever they feel like and unless you want to cancel your card, they get away with it.
Pathetic that we all just shout into the void and they just keep stealing money. Odd that all the 5 star reviews are actually trash feedback. Wonder what that‚Äôs about. | Hacked my card, charged me and now I can‚Äôt contact anyone for my money back 6 different charges over 20.00$ and no explanation. Never again | Great guy and nice driver. Was patient when I couldn‚Äôt find the spot he was parked at the airport | Nice talking money! | Good drivers and acceptable vehicles are so random‚Äî‚Äî I wish there were an app to request non-smoking interiors!‚Äî-I had to drive with the windows down in Wendy‚Äòs car. I got an instant headache, and couldn‚Äôt breathe for the smell of the stale ashtray smoke.!‚Äî-the worst! | I paid extra for priority pickup and my ride was an extra 5 minutes late. Surely that‚Äôs not how that is supposed to work? | Congratulations | Uber is expensive, unreliable, poor technology (does not remember regular places you‚Äôve been) - Lyft rules! | Diver helped with package to the front door | time after time Lyft fails and leaves me waiting absurd amounts of time due to inexplicable reassignments and other delays. the animated cars on maps are a complete fraud - these rides are NOT actually available. its time for this sham to go away. apps like Curb that partner with taxi services are infinitely more reliable, less expensive and often cleaner vehicles. | The CEO can‚Äôt even do math so why should their maps work. This company is goung down the drain fast! Just lousy!!!! | He was honest, outgoing, helpful, knowledgeable, cared about safety, one of the best drivers I have come across. I would like to have him in future trips if possible. | Best driver I‚Äôve ever had | She is so nyc | When I selected a destination, the app told me that the cab would pick me up in 4 minutes. When I confirmed, I received a message that a driver will be found in 1-5 minutes. I waited for 10 minutes, half of which was the app telling me ‚Äújust a few more seconds‚Äù to find a driver. I get it that times are only estimates, but what‚Äôs the point of estimates that aren‚Äôt even close!! | What a way to experience my first trip to Boston.  Our Lyft driver was very friendly.  This always makes the trip more special when you travel.  Thank you Lyft. | Jay arrived early, had a nice, clean car, and was a joy to talk to on my ride. | I had the worst experience while waiting outside in the rain for a driver. Clearly he doesn‚Äôt understand the app because he thought if he kept driving around I would be charged. Made me late to pick up my car from the mechanic before the shop closed and I‚Äôm soaking wet. I tried calling and texting the driver and never got a response. Also Lyft has no way to call them inside or outside the app. After 30 minutes of trying to chase down the driver in the rain soaking wet  I had gave up trying to get help from Lyfts help center and I canceled the ride. Now I have to wait who knows how long to get my refund so I can contact a real cab service . | A bit high. | Such as easy process.  First time user. Reserved ride. Driver early/on time. Chop chop. No hassle. Will definitely use Lyft again. One less hassle when taking a trip. | Great drivers, NEVER had an issue. However their gift card process is a terrible mess. My cousin is pregnant and may go into labor soon. Purchased a $50 gift card for her so she has means to the hospital if we‚Äôre not around. I tried buying the gift card on the app and it wouldn‚Äôt let me. Said I needed to add a new card even though I already had my bank card on there. Bought it through Amazon instead. She received it but when she went to try it out it won‚Äôt allow her and keeps asking for a new card too?! She already had her bank card, plus $50 gift card ‚Ä¶ but it keeps asking her for another card? We have both tried reaching out to Customer Service, but the only way is to go through a chat in the app. All they say is to add a new card. Won‚Äôt tell us what is wrong, just ask us to add a new card. This is ridiculous. At this point it feels like it would‚Äôve been better to choose a different company. | App response is fast, the rides are less expensive than ‚Äúthe other app‚Äù so far the cars have been very clean and the rides were safe. | Recommended | üîäADS NEED TOO BE BLOCKED I AM NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR ACCIDENTALLY SELECTING DUE TO MY DISABILITIES ‚ò∫Ô∏èDefinitely not user friendly and too many ADS while requesting rides. Rating drivers I wish it can be done at a later time, my first trip I had the most wonderful driver but because of the difficulties using I could not fill out all rating sections. Hey more confusion when requesting rides the list and rates looks different for AAR riders. SAFETY CHECK why doesn‚Äôt it come like text? I don‚Äôt use safari, it used too much data on my device. OH one more request can I rate my driver at a later meaning when I get home, it would be better rating procedure. Thanks. | Great service | Scheduled pickup. Driver was almost here then she dropped out. System allocated another driver, then another. Third driver was over 20 minutes behind the scheduled pickup time. | Erich | Thank you Lyft | Really nice driver great listener | Better than Uber | i took a ride of lyft for the airport. i normally pay $40 with tip. this time i was up charged $56. they send a 10 year old dirty car. inside the car it was really dirty and it smelled. on top of that the driver was unsafe making hard stops and hard accelerations. unfortunately i could not cancel as i was heading to the airport for a flight. i immediately contact lyft and was told i would get a measly 5$ credit‚Ä¶ i‚Äôm still flighting with my credit card to get my a refund. i do not recommend lyft because their customer service doesn‚Äôt work with clients and most of the time the cars are old and smell. | Not able to locate the pickup which was mentioned in the ride and the maps which was mentioned over there is showing a wrong path. Only able to get rides when requested from my car service department | Excelentes en tiempo, personal y calidad de servicio | The app sent the driver to the part of the airport, also I paid for a roomer car and did not get it.
