title: Waze Navigation & Live Traffic
description:
Waze is a community driven navigation app that helps millions of users get to where they‚Äôre going through real-time road alerts and an up-to-the-moment map. Thanks to our network of drivers, Waze saves you time by instantly alerting you to traffic, construction, crashes, police and more. From traffic-avoiding reroutes, real-time safety updates and low gas price alerts, Waze is a community of drivers helping other drivers.

With Waze you‚Ä¶

Get there faster: traffic-avoiding route updates
Avoid tickets: know where police, speedcams and redlight cams are located
More accurate ETAs: based on live traffic, construction, weather and more
Community-based navigation: real-time updates from other drivers
Save money: find the cheapest gas along your route
Avoid tolls: see toll pricing when you choose a route
Use Apple CarPlay: sync Waze to your car‚Äôs built-in display
Live Speedometer: get alerts when you‚Äôre speeding and avoid costly tickets
Customize your drive: get directions from your favorite celebs and characters
No app switching: use your favorite audio apps right from Waze

Drive safer and smarter, with Waze!

You can manage your in-app Waze Privacy Settings at any time. Learn more about the Waze privacy policy here, www.waze.com/legal/privacy.

Waze directions are not intended for emergency or oversized vehicles.
releaseNotes:
Saving time & avoiding traffic is even easier with this update:

Fixed bugs to ensure you can update gas prices in Waze successfully.
reviews:
When you‚Äôre in a time zone, traveling to another time zone, your destination time should reflect the appropriate time and the time zone that you‚Äôre arriving in. Waze dropped the ball, driving from California to Utah. We had to be in Utah by 4:30 PM. We were on track on time with 30 minutes to spare, unfortunately as soon as we hit the Utah border Waze changed the arrival time and we lost an hour and now we‚Äôve missed out on a huge opportunity.
   And minus one more star for Waze always overheating my phone, no other app causes my iPhone to overheat. | very inaccurate information | I use this app for years (now is 2024) and i like it very much. One thing I wish is  that the button for Saved locations will be placed on main screen | Waze has been integral to my daily commute over the past three years. Using the app on an almost daily basis, I have gotten well acquainted with the app's various features and quirks. The community-sourced aspect of the app has set it apart from the alternatives; however, the gap is beginning to close.

Waze's real-time user reports have always been the app's bread and butter feature. The extensive range of reports and verbal callouts has set Waze apart from its competitors. These reports have become an indispensable tool in avoiding hazards along my drives.

Despite the many positive features that crowd-sourcing information has brought to the app, there are many areas where this approach is starting to hold the Waze back. One of the main issues with the app has been its failure to display anticipated road closures. Often, I encounter roads where the state Department of Transportation has placed a construction report pin and indicates the road will be closed within the comments. Waze will still provide navigation through the closed road. Users can submit closure reports, but they will only be visible for a limited time. To indicate an extended closure, a high-level map editor must mark the closure. At this point, you have likely already encountered the closure and are scrambling to find a detour.

Furthermore, locating POIs in the app has become an increasingly arduous task. Trying to enter a destination without an exact address feels more akin to an old GPS unit than a modern app. In addition, the crowd-sourcing model has left several POIs in rural areas well out of date. When traveling on a trip, this can be particularly annoying if you are looking for somewhere to stop and eat or make a rest stop.

Recently, while using the app, I have experienced many inconsistencies in the user interface. Although UI updates can be expected, the intrusiveness while navigating has been excessive. Many features have changed on an almost weekly basis or have been intermittently broken.

Overall, these developments have led to a rather mediocre experience. For an app that has prided itself on navigation beyond normal situations, it has continually underperformed in my experience. | I loved having/using Waze on the occasion when I needed directions. As someone who has to meet clients and go to different locations from time to time it was very convenient and always spot on. 

Now we fast forward.. the new immediate integration with car play is beyond annoying and the worst update. I don‚Äôt need to know things in my way around town. I dont need to know how to get to someplace 10 miles away that I frequent. I know where my gym is; I don‚Äôt need directions. 

And more than anything.. I don‚Äôt need my battery destroyed all day because this app ‚Äúneeds‚Äù to be connected/running for ZERO reason. Later Waze | I have used Waze for several years now, and loved it. I upgraded my iPhone to a 12 and it makes my phone really hot. So much so that I‚Äôm afraid to use it for fear of damaging my phone. 
I would like to make a suggestion though. Please put a pause button on it. When we off for bathroom breaks, fuel, or food we have to listen to ‚Äúrecalculating‚Äù new turns, ‚Äúrecalculating ‚Äú over and over or turn it off. Pause would be great. | Bring back Morgan Freeman voice‚Ä¶ Best voice ever. | Use it all the time, works great | Firstly, I love this app and is my default! Living in Georgia we have a TON of trains! 

It would be sooooo helpful if there was a way for the app to give the option for an active train crossing and/or a time estimator for us to see if we need to reroute!

Just a suggestion üëçüèΩ | After the update, Waze is no longer warn speed traps or red light camera. It only shows (flashes) it on the map which is very dangerous for a driver to watch the road and see the maps on your phone at the same time. Please fix your bug. Thank you | Waze looks like it has upgraded all its reporting options on the App on my iPhone, but these options do not show up on my large CarPlay screen? Why can‚Äôt Waze make this happen? 

We as of today we know have detailed reporting available on the CarPlay screen, thank you! | The new update I‚Äôd great. The User Interface is much better, highly detailed map, much sharper. The new arrangement with the icons is the best yet. Being able to use police hidden, or other side through apple play is fantastic. All hazards under one location stead of going back and forth. Well done! | Used to me my one and only navigation app. Got a car with Apple CarPlay and can‚Äôt deal with the ridiculous GPS problems with Waze. Random location loss and incorrect navigation makes Waze unusable with CarPlay. It‚Äôs a shame. I guess I have to transition to Apple Maps. | Do the developers not do any testing? This latest several versions has a gap on the right hand side of the screen where there‚Äôs just nothing. It‚Äôs the backing of the map, with nothing drawn in. The report button is on top of this area so clearly they know that this portion of the screen exists. But there‚Äôs just nothing there. And then the vehicle indicator and navigation if you are using that‚Ä¶ Is left hand shifted in the remaining 2/3 of the screen that has the map. So the vehicle indicator is actually closer to the left-hand edge of the screen then it is to the center. Do they not look at this on multiple devices? Is there anyway to request that they actually test the program before they make changes?

They have made it much worse. | Apple Car Play - Intermittent SPEED LIMIT/SPEEDOMETER DISPLAY operation tried everything still displays intermittently‚Ä¶..NOTE:SPEED LIMIT/Speedometer all the time shows on phone just not on CarPlay‚Ä¶. | Person with a GIS degree here (geography/map data science). You need to return the map editor layer back to its original colors. Ever since google bought Waze functionality has been reduced in favor of making the map look pretty. The only reason I kept Waze was for it‚Äôs elaborate off road network because anyone can add to it. Waze was ironically very useful for intended offroading. Off road trails are now difficult to see while driving while using the map editor layer. This also makes it easier for normal drivers to accidentally start off-roading. So I guess we‚Äôll be sticking to Gaia GPS and editing through OpenStreetMaps for my off-roading needs and continue using Apple Maps, because has been significantly improved. Just two cents from someone who could probably do your job better. | I have been using the Waze app for several years and it‚Äôs accuracy is so much better than apple or Google maps IMO. It alerts me timely when I need to leave to get my daughter to doctors appointments and we arrive as planned‚Ä¶ and she has several appointments ALL OVER Southern California. Having other ‚Äúwazers‚Äù help update issues on the road is the best as it‚Äôs real time (most times) which helps drivers be safer and more aware of road conditions, accidents, and police. Highly recommended!!! | Love Waze and I use it all the time. Living in rural Georgia I always chuckled when Waze would say ‚Äúwatch out, roadkill on road ahead‚Äù. Miss that lighthearted option for a generic hazard. | App will NOT close when phone is connected to CarPlay. | Poor user experience. I cannot see the destination once waze is connected to CarPlay, and the route overview is hard to find. This can leads to extremely tricky situation when the user inputs the destination with Siri, and Siri misunderstands the words. I have no way no check if the destination is correct unless disconnecting and reconnecting the Carplay. Doing so can be very dangerous on highway. | This is a great app only 4 stars because it stopped giving audible alerts for speed and red light cameras, it pops up on the phone but you can‚Äôt see while driving It just stopped on its own I checked all the settings and there should be no reason it stopped giving the audible camera warnings unless it‚Äôs a glitch or they stopped it but overall a good app | Waze used to be magic for urban navigation. Over the last year it has continuously underperformed. Worse, it has sent me on wild goose chases down closed roads, wasting significant time. Apple Maps is now a much better app than Waze. I have deleted it from my phone. | The apps add a stop feature has been having issues the past few months the color used to be purple now it‚Äôs teal making hard to tell the difference with the already light blue route line, it also at many times not show a difference in color at all and you don‚Äôt get the same heads up and end up missing the spot | Its a very helpful feature to know if theres a stop sign up ahead or how many lights i need to pass before turning. I love this app but thats the only thing keeping me from edging to this app | Deliberately takes you through  traffic‚Ä¶glitches a lot switches address all the time‚Ä¶ app is garbage! | The app is great but I would like to see satellite mapping on Waze it would make it easier thank you Jacob Greenawalt | I love ways for long distance. That‚Äôs about the only time I‚Äôm using it and 90% of the time I‚Äôm running Apple Maps in the background. It‚Äôs for two simple reason. I can see stop lights and which lane to be in on Apple Maps. Although the lane designation isn‚Äôt always accurate because the city I live in the streets are constantly changing so I can imagine that‚Äôs difficult. Knowing where stop lights are and stop signs allows me to drive better as a driver knowing what sections to expect and what sections not to expect. It‚Äôs actually a huge part of driving knowing where and when those signs are. I love Waze and the little stuff you can do on it but that‚Äôs what separates Waze from being my daily GPS. We need icons for streets signs. There need to be stop light icons. | The only time that I get a message that charging of my iPhone battery is been put on hold is when I use this app.  My phone gets very warm when using this app. | This app makes you take 70 side roads instead of making it simple. Also it just led me into an hour of traffic in Boston instead of taking me a different way. Terrible | PLEASE let us mark road closures on apple CARPLAY!!! Save everyone the pain of unplugging their phone to do it in the app!!! | Everytime I open the app my ‚Äúmood‚Äù character is different. I do not log out and it‚Äôs been happening for a few weeks. Also, what happened to the animals by shoulder report option. Other than that great app | The app is great but the feature for finding gas stations is lacking. It does not give the option to list prices for diesel fuel. | Please bring back boy band voice guidance. I can not pay attention like I do with your new voice guidance. Boy band was funny, kept you awake and alert while driving. Please! | Decent app, used to like it before 12 cracked it. Do not use waze in atlanta GA you will regret it. | WAZE can no longer be trusted. Google made sure of that. An update is supposed to improve not hinder the operation of the app ‚Ä¶ which Google has failed to comprehend or ...   Google Maps have been wrong more than they have been right in my experience. WAZE NEVER took me down a narrow road that led to a dead end in the middle of nowhere! That‚Äôs why I got WAZE. And in my honest opinion that was probably why the WAZE program was written, because Google couldn‚Äôt deliver.  And they don‚Äôt like fun!! All the avatars are gone! How can it be real time time if can‚Äôt report safely? Google is purposely killing WAZE in my opinion by making it harder to report safely as in ‚Äòuse the app as intended‚Äô by requiring more time and ATTENTION to operate therefore rendering the original intent of the app useless. JMHO üò¢ | I like a lot of things about this app however I hate at the same time and end up not using cause if the phone is connected to my car once I add the address it doesn‚Äôt give me options to see routes available it just starts the navigation straight away and if I want to see the route I need to disconnect the phone while I am lost and driving and it‚Äôs very annoying, on the top off that when I disconnect from the car and  stop the navigation to see the route it immediately erase the address and I have to type all again or reselect the address that sometimes save on history sometimes not‚Ä¶ once again all that nightmare while I am driving!! It would be a better app if it would do like google does! | I like that Waze updates me on police officers and some traffic patterns. But it is extremely dangerous. It changes your patterns while driving shaving one minute off is not really doing me any help and pulling me through 300 additional stops again is not a fair option to choose from

Now, when ask me to change Rt, I had to do it on my car screen instead of my phone, which is even more dangerous and I can‚Äôt figure out the Rt pattern.

I wish there was an option to stop getting routed through neighborhoods. I don‚Äôt want 368. Turns the mental stress and load of that is 10 times worse than just sitting on the highway. For example, no way routing me through downtown Atlanta was better than keeping me on 285 and taking me straight to Smyrna.. Grammatical errors using voice to text | Traveling from Louisiana to Washington, got to the border of New Mexico and Colorado in Raton, when we pulled off to get food. We were traveling north with no issues. Tried to get back on the road and Waze directed us to start traveling south. I noticed pretty fast since all the signs said South I-25, and we turned around, but Waze continued to say we needed to make a uturn and head south. Our eta changed from 8:20pm before the stop to 10pm after. Since it kept telling us to do a compete 180¬∞, I decided to pull up Apple Maps to get directions and when I did it put us on the correct route with the eta being 8:33. So not only was it the complete wrong way and had us backtracking, it wouldn‚Äôt have even got us there faster but 1 and 1/2 hours later. This app is defunked if it can‚Äôt give the right directions, especially if other apps have the same reporting features as this one now. | Been using App for years; had many destinations saved, routes, drives, narrator voices; now, suddenly, with no warning, for no reason, all that info is gone, and I have to start over like the first day!
So disappointed! | Waze has helped me avoid traffic numerous times, but whenever I can‚Äôt avoid it, I add time to my ETA. The app always underestimates how much time you will spend in traffic. | ùïÄùï•'ùï§ ùïõùï¶ùï§ùï• ùïòùï†ùï†ùïï ùïûùï™ ùïóùï£ùïöùïñùïüùïïùï§ ùïíùïùùï§ùï† ùïùùï†ùïßùïñ ùïöùï• ‚ô°‚ù•‚ù¢‚ô•Ô∏é·úä | It‚Äôs so bad | I use the Waze app while traveling for business but my major issue is that it doesn‚Äôt give you a heads up as to what‚Äôs coming‚Ä¶ for example, it would be helpful if the app was able to say ‚Äúat the night light take a right‚Äù OR when I‚Äôm about to take and exit let me know what lane to be in before I actually exit, something like ‚Äúexit right and stay in the left lane‚Äù this way I don‚Äôt exit right and it‚Äôs a split exit with 2 routes to go and I got in the wrong lane which has happened.

I know the screen shows it but what if you can‚Äôt look at the screen because it‚Äôs heavy traffic? 

Just a recommendation. | Waze is one of those rare apps that i will go out of my way to write a review for. This app has saved from about 35 speeding tickets at this point and it‚Äôs the first thing i throw on when i drive. The routes are always efficient and the traffic data seems to be almost as accurate as google maps! I would say the only downside is the battery draw on your phone but if you have a charger and are using carplay, there is nothing to complain about. Would love to be able to mark hazards for other wazers from the other side of the road though! | The ‚Äúwhere to‚Äù disappears too quick when opening the app. | This app was awesome before the last update. The voice alerts for speed traps and red light cameras was great. Since the update, this feature is no longer available. Also, the app accesses your location even when you‚Äôre not using it. Please change everything back to how it was before this AWFUL update. | Waze stays open on my phone after I leave my car for some reason. I have to open it then close it to exit the app. If not caught it will drain battery | I have used Waze for years but finally had to delete this app because it requires location tracking to be enable and actually running at all times.   The only workaround is to disable location services whenever the app is not being used.   Its a shame because its otherwise a great app. | Had iPhone 7, worked great with CarPlay. Was a 5 star app. Upgraded to iPhone 15. Can‚Äôt report hazards, hazards aren‚Äôt announced, can‚Äôt get directions, it‚Äôs totally useless now. I‚Äôve tried uninstalling it, reinstalling it. Forgetting device on CarPlay, etc. can‚Äôt find information on user forums. | I enjoy the accuracy of the app I only wish that when you are arriving at your location, it will actually show the address and a picture of the location. For example, your destination is on the left or the right it literally just drops a pin in the middle of the block and it doesn‚Äôt show you that you‚Äôve arrived at said address it just tells you you‚Äôve arrived, there is no picture there is no address of which you put in. I use Waze a lot with Uber and it never gives me the final destination. I always have to switch over to Uber to see where the house is.

title: Luxury Escapes: Travel Deals
description:
Luxury Escapes: Best Deals on Hotels & Holidays 

Experience the luxury of the finest hotels, get incredible small-group tour packages, or book an all-inclusive family escape with the Luxury Escapes App. 

Our global team of experts search and negotiate exclusive travel deals for more than 7+ million Luxury Escapes, members giving you and your family better value on hotel bookings, holiday packages and a better travel experience. 

Why choose Luxury Escapes? 

~ With our Best Price Guarantee you‚Äôll know you‚Äôre getting the best deal 
~ Book with confidence: we have flexible cancellation policies to suit your needs
~ Our exclusively negotiated VIP inclusions mean you get more value for money spent 

Why download this App? 

~ Access the world‚Äôs best hotels and best holidays at unbeatable prices 
~ Exclusive member-only inclusions 
~ Save your most-loved offers to Trips 
~ Easily plan your perfect trip, all in one place 
~ Notifications about our latest hotel & holiday packages 
~ Make hotel bookings and tour bookings quickly and easily 
~ 24/7 Virtual Assistance for a hassle-free holiday

Download the app today and get the best travel Deals!
releaseNotes:
What‚Äôs new?

- Introducing our new 'Villas' carousel on the Explore page, highlighting handpicked properties that offer complete privacy
- Improvements to personalised recommendations in the 'Top picks' carousel on the Explore page
- Additional filters and sorting options in search and other listing pages

Also, includes bug fixes and improved performance.

title: Tripsy: Travel Planner & Guide
description:
Tripsy is a travel planner that helps you plan your entire trip in one place. You can share your itinerary with family and friends, receive flight alerts, store documents, and make wish lists of places to visit.

During the trip, the app helps you by providing a 10-day weather forecast, updated flight information, offline access to everything, time zone changes, and much more!
 
**WHAT EVERYONE IS SAYING:**
 
App Store Featured: ‚ÄúMaking the most of your holiday time requires some planning. With Tripsy, that‚Äôs plain sailing. Enter flight times, hotels, and places you want to visit, then share your itinerary with your travel mates with a tap of a button‚Äù.
 
MacStories: ‚ÄúTripsy does what I‚Äôve long wished for: offers a compelling trip planning experience in a modern app that takes advantage of iOS‚Äô core technology strengths.‚Äù
 
9to5mac: ‚ÄúThe app‚Äôs interface is extremely user-friendly, and it also offers data synching in the cloud, automation service, and Siri Shortcuts.‚Äù
 
**Tripsy is your ultimate travel companion**

Here are some of its key features:

‚Äì Organize all your travel information, from flights and hotels to restaurants and tours, in one place.
- 10-day forecast weather on your itinerary.
‚Äì Receive flight updates via push notifications and never miss a gate or time change again.
‚Äì Share your trip with friends and family and collaborate on itinerary planning.
‚Äì Store all your travel memories, from images and notes to videos and documents, and easily share them with guests.
‚Äì Automatically import reservations from over 700 providers, including Booking.com, Hotels.com, and major airlines.
‚Äì Sync your trip data with your calendar app to stay on top of all your activities and events.
‚Äì Get one-click access to popular mapping services like Waze, Google Maps, and Uber from any of your destinations.
‚Äì Stay informed with real-time flight alerts on departure and arrival times, terminals, gates, and baggage claims.
‚Äì Customize your travel itinerary with background images or colors that match your style.
‚Äì Configure each activity with the time zone you want, making the organization of your trip more practical.
‚Äì Explore exclusive travel itineraries curated by Tripsy with tips and insider information to make your trip as fruitful as possible.

With Tripsy, you can effortlessly plan your entire trip and stay organized every step of the way.
  
Tripsy is free, but we also offer a pro version called Tripsy Premium with unlimited trips, exclusive itineraries, cloud, documents, and more. Premium is available in monthly and yearly subscriptions, and a lifetime purchase option is available.
 
- View our Terms of Service at: https://tripsy.app/terms
- View our Privacy Policy at: https://tripsy.app/policy
releaseNotes: This update contains bug fixes and minor improvements.
reviews:
I am planning our anniversary trip, and I have to say this app is awesome. It not only allows me to add everything to a quick view schedule, but also allows me to add documents that I normally had to rewrite not notes on other apps. Ir can find your flights, carrier, hotel and resort! All in a nicely laid out interface. I use it on an iPad Mini and it looks awesome. | Setting an itinerary is an exercise in frustration as destination times refuse to save at least 40% of the time. When they do save, the app decides to change dates on relaunch. Needs work. | I love I can organize stuff for myself and collaborate on trips with my wife, and it supports everything. Tours, cruises, restaurants, adding files and photos, everything. And lots of clever features sprinkled throughout. Fantastic app. | I've been using TripIt (Pro) for years, but I've always found its interface cumbersome and confusing. While TripIt's new interface is better, I much prefer Tripsy for all my travel planning and tracking.  

Tripsy's clean visual design is beautiful and efficient. The main screen displays the most essential information for my trip or, when traveling, for the current leg of my journey. Details for any portion of the trip are usually just a click away. Tripsy has all the main features that you'd expect from a travel app, such as multiple ways to gather travel documents into a trip (search email, forward an email, Mac/iOS sharing, etc), integration with device calendars, support for multiple travelers and non-traveling planners, document upload, etc. TripIt still has an edge in integrations with other travel apps or services. I suspect Tripsy will add more partnerships as they grow and develop. If there is something you want or need to do in TripIt, Tripsy has the option to sync from  TripIt automatically. I used this option when I started using Tripsy, which made that initial transition (or even a trial) so much easier because I didn't need to reimport my documents for planned trips. 

Tripsy lost a few points in this review because of a few areas where it took effort to accomplish some tasks. There are some quirks in importing the cruise portion of a trip. Most cruise data was imported without a hitch; however, it didn't grab the departure time for days in port. I tried manually adding the departure times for a day in port, but it was annoyingly complex. I'd open the detail for a particular day, but I needed help figuring out how to add the departure time, or when I did, I could only choose from predetermined times. Eventually, I found that I had to select a predetermined time, save the changes, open the details again, scroll down to the proper date of my trip and then I could finally set the appropriate time. This problem doesn't happen often, but it is currently a pain. 

Overall, though, I love using Tripsy!! It is now my go-to travel app. | It really helps plan trips and only one person needs a subscription for everyone to collaborate in the app for a trip. | overall great program.  needs a slight interface overhaul (each day should be very subtle different color than others to easily differentiate them).  And I would highly recommend a calendar view. | If you have an itinerary already defined, this app may help document it.  But if you're actually planning and exploring options, it will get slow you down and make a mess in your calendar database.  Also, I got billed for a month even though I cancelled quickly. | Here are my issues so far-- 1) Multiple times, the entries I have put in and saved change on their own. Train times, for instance, will modify themselves to whatever they want (right now I have a train entry that leaves at 8:42PM and arrives at 8:42PM, despite putting in the accurate times). It is not a time change issue, either, they're just random times and AM/PM. This is very annoying and I'm about to give up on this tool. 2) We're flying halfway across the world and you have to scroll to see the map entirely, no way to zoom out and show the whole trip on the screen. You can zoom in...but you can't zoom out to show Florida and Australia on the same map screen. 3) I subscribed to a monthly plan and was surprised to have recently been charged for a year's access. It just seems like "Save" doesn't mean what you think it does in this app. I was really excited to get organized, but I think I'll have to look elsewhere, like TripIt. | Unable to even put in dated. Date Screen does not scroll to find the correct month. Figures a work around but once I put in the ending date, the program changes the start date so the trip is ony 1 day....unless I set the trip up without dates but it is difficult to add places for the new days. | Â¶ÇÊûúÂä†‰∏äÊØèÊÆµË°åÁ®ãËä±Ë¥πÂ§öÂ∞ëÈí±Ëøô‰∏™ÂäüËÉΩÂ∞±Êõ¥Â•Ω‰∫Ü | Tried to change to this because I was over trip it. Not pulling in the text from the email and when I search for what I need it keeps showing something in the wrong country. No thanks. Making my life harder | This product can do more to help plan for your vacation than the free platforms. Both this company and apple customer service are unwilling to listen and help resolve my issue with this platform. | This is a great travel planner APP. It works very well and is reliable. Their customer service is excellent as well. If you are looking for a travel planner APP with a lifetime purchase, just try this one! | I am offering 4-stars in this review solely based on the apps' potential and the current user interface design friendliness. The apps' current state and functionality is actually about a 2-star. I hope to update this review shortly to full 5-star based on some things getting taken care of.
Easier itinerary control - went to manually add (I didn't have easy access to the email), a pre-trip hotel stay near the airport for an early flight, and I couldn't do that because the app had already defined the trip as Thursday to Tuesday based on the flight, with me trying to add a Wednesday "activity". I had to go into the settings for the itinerary and change the beginning date. (A further annoyance, rather than just changing one date, once I set the new start, it also required the ending, rather than keeping it on the same by default. There should be a way when adding an activity to go ‚Äúoutside the dat boundary‚Äù and have the app automatically update the overall itinerary timeframe.
Side-note to above‚Ä¶ The share-to-Tripsy function in the Hilton app only brought hotel name and phone number, not the booked dates, res# or other actual booking details - another potential fix? I don‚Äôt know if that is Tripsy not importing correctly, or Hilton not exporting & sharing properly.
Better functionality required for the planning part of a trip. Right now, this app just kind of ‚Äúcatches‚Äù all the emails you forward it (or painfully add in manually). When you think of booking a trip, say a vacation getaway, there are many pieces to it (the very reason for this app). Resort, flights, transport from airport to resort, excursions while there, maybe a pre-trip hotel stay near the airport with park-and-fly arrangements. Not all that stuff is booked at once. So being able to easily add in each aspect that needs to be booked, and then have each of those activity icons color-coded on the itinerary page (ie. Red for needs booking, yellow for booked, green for booked and pre-paid) really is necessary. Being able to manually change the color of each activity icon would be a simple step. More complex would be adding in 2 checkboxes in the activity (or right-click / hold-click pop up menu) to indicate when it is booked and when it is paid. Next level of complexity would be for the app to automatically color code based on the details provided in the activity (company and res # fields filled out automatically determines ‚Äúbooked‚Äù status, I‚Äôm not sure how it would determine paid).
 
Again, overall I like the direction this app is going, but it really needs these updates to become the true ‚ÄúGo-To Travel Planner‚Äù. Currently, it is leagues beyond it‚Äôs main competitor. Enough that I subscribed to Pro for a year. But without these necessary changes, that subscription will not get extended. Yes, those changes are that necessary, and without them I will go back to Excel and OneNote to manage all my travel, as the app would be missing the ‚Äúease‚Äù functionality that it should have vs. a more manual process.
Hopefully the devs read this and put these ideas in place very soon. I am sure they have a ‚Äúroadmap‚Äù, but for true traveler functionality, these need to be inserted in the immediate stages of that roadmap.
Thanks guys! Keep up the great work!!! | Several of my trips that are complete on one device are showing up as one-day trips on days where I don‚Äôt have travel planned. For example, if I have a trip planned from 11-17 March, the trip shows up as 25-25 March on other devices and shared links. None of the activities are syncing across devices. Reached out to support several weeks ago but haven‚Äôt heard back and the issue still hasn‚Äôt been fixed. Just know that paying for the premium features is worth it when it works, but if it stops working you‚Äôll be dealing with awful customer support. I‚Äôve also never been able to get the import function to work. I like the interface though. | Âú∞ÂõæÂèØ‰ª•Â¢ûÂä†È´òÂæ∑ÂíåÁôæÂ∫¶ÂêóÔºü‰ª•ÂèäÊùøÂùóÂ¶ÇÊûúÂèØ‰ª•Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâÂ∞±Â•Ω‰∫ÜÔºåÊØîÂ¶ÇÊàëÔºåÂè™ÊÉ≥Áî® app Êî∂ÈõÜÈ§êÈ¶Ü„ÄÇÊóÅËæπÁöÑËØÅ‰ª∂ÂØπÊàëÊù•ËØ¥Ê≤°‰ªÄ‰πàÁî®„ÄÇÊàëÁõ∏‰ø°ÊúâËøôÊ†∑ÈúÄÊ±ÇÁöÑ‰∫∫‰πü‰∏çÂ∞ë„ÄÇ

"Can maps include options for Amap (È´òÂæ∑) and Baidu (ÁôæÂ∫¶)? Additionally, it would be great if users could customize categories. For example, I might only want to use the app to collect information about restaurants, and licenses nearby are not relevant to me. I believe there are many users with similar needs." | A great app that keeps all your travel plans in one place. A suggestion - would you please consider adding a feature that allows me to set to-do reminders for my trip? It would would be so helpful to be able to set a reminder then later received a push notification. Thank you!! | I was a long time TripIt user and Tripsy is better in every way imaginable | I had been searching for a good itinerary app ever since Google Trips shut down years ago. Tripsy is the best one I've used since then. The auto-import by email (for flights, hotels, cars etc) works great and has only gotten more reliable over the year I've been using it. The iOS and Mac apps are both super easy to use and visually appealing. | have you considered adding a "packing list" feature for our trips? | This is a great app. I have used it on multiple trips and I can‚Äôt live without it now. The only thing missing is that I would like a way to keep a packing list with a quantity field. So I can always make sure I have everything ready prior to a trip and before a return. | Sadly, was hoping this would be app that might work to share itinerary with other humans traveling with me without them having to buy. Nope. Also, had to manually enter 4 of 6 flts and 1 hotel. Even when trying to share from hotel app to create event had to manually enter data. All of this would be fine but when share itinerary with others it does not provide any details (times of flights, flt #, resv etc | Just got it and it provides no guidance as to how to use the app, how to upload reservations; adding guests seems impossible.... | This app is pretty good and very helpful. However I wish the native Mac app felt more Mac-like. As it is, it feels very much like a big iPhone app. I was hoping that planning my trip and making adjustments would have been much easier on my Mac, but I feel the UI and workflow is very limited since it feels like it is a scaled up iPhone app that does not adequately take advantage of the Mac. It is very good, but I wish it could better take advantage of what the Mac can allow for productivity! | Good app and looking forward to using it for future trips.  Would greatly appreciate a field for cost/expense.  We like to work withina budget and this would greatly help. | Searching and adding a flight is too clunky, taking too many steps. The whole UI feels huge like the buttons are massive, but it doesn't make it more usable. You can have different dates than your flights and it doesn't auto update the actual trip dates. You can accidentally add the same flight twice. Buttons aren't labeled, making the intended flow unclear. Basically feels like a more manual version of Kayak, since I'm not paying for the pro version so I can't do email sync. | I download Mac App and iPhone app. At first I ran into problem where the trip from Mac app does not sync. I email support and the Co-Founder responded to me and help diagnose the issue really fast. In face I never had this fast response from app developer before. And the step to diagnose and communication this is straightforward and sincere.

Apart from that, the app has intuitive user interface and easy to understand and can sync with multiple devices and with friends whom I shared the trip with. This eliminated the need to manually create initerary, which reduce times and free us to explore the activities instead. | Wowww. What a good travel app. Very easy going and with all the information and set up for the best experience travel management | I decided to try the app out because I'm looking for an app that can handle travel planning and has a nice UI, which this one does. 

However I noticed while creating an account that the form fields aren't labeled correctly so you can't auto-generate a password from Keychain.This is coming from a developer so I know how easy it is to integrate those small security features in form fields. This was the first red flag. 

So I made a temporary password and I thought I'd change it afterwards to a more secure password, but there's no option to change my password in the app? I read the other reviews about the support being non-existent, along with the developer not responding to feedback in the app store reviews makes me not trust the construction of this app, or being able to get basic support if something goes wrong (keep in mind this app has paid features). I just deleted the app after deleting my account. | The interface is beautiful but the actual implementaion is terrible. Tried several times to add an event and itinerary and it never showed up. I might have even duplicated the subscription in trying to fix the issue. My reccomendation is to go with TripIt. Not as pretty but it works. | Pro user here for a few years now. I absolutely love the planning aspect but the number of unresolved bugs is incredibly frustrating. Support is nonexistent, you won‚Äôt get an answer for weeks. There are issues with timezones, findings things, flight schedules, sync and many others. Each update breaks something. I am really unhappy at this point and will not renew our subscription next year. | A really solid travel organization app. All the nice features you want. If you travel it‚Äôs easily worth the subscription price. | I love this app and use it constantly. It has been a game changer for me. Very much appreciate the regular improvements. | I would have probably signed up for the paid service and enjoyed the app. However, I found a charge on my card via my apple account before ever using the app. Canceled subscription. | I have used this app twice this year - a two week trip to Spain, and a five week road trip of the east coast of the united states.  In both cases, I found myself a slave to the app. The cost of setting up parts of a trip, in terms of effort, was much greater than the benefit I got from it. I put this app in a drawer and only pulled it out occasionally. I am happy to let this infernal subscription expire until I MAYBE want to use it again in two years.

I like the app, kinda. It looked good at first. It is good at organizing itineraries, as long as those itinerary are AirBnB and organized tours and have a rigid order that will NEVER change. Other parts of my travel plan, like mapping, seem forced and clunky. I had to find ways to do these outside this app.

After a while I started treating this app as a wallet that held a collection of ideas. Adding and removing things from the itinerary took WAY too much effort. Items simply didn't like to move.

I guess I am not their target market. It is too much of a marginal benefit for me keep paying for. It would be worth a fixed charge with paid upgrades, but this is in no way such a life-changing app that I want to keep paying and paying for it. A folder with a collection of links and copies of my reservations works just as well.

Subscription cancelled. | It does not sync with phone and laptop and my phone is missing trips that i put on my laptop!
PLEASE FIX BECAUSE I LOVE THIS APP IF IT WOULD SIMPLY JUST DO THAT | I've been looking for something like Tripsy for a long time.  the closest thing has been tripit but Tripsy seems setup to add the functionality to be the travel suite everyone will use.  It does a pretty good job parsing emails but my AirBB reserveration didnt work. There doesnt seem to be an option for it monitor emails automatically.   It would be nice to be able to drag items from one day/time to another.   The search functionality for new evetns works well.   I love the map feature.  The whole app is worth it for this feature.    Support has been super responsive.  I'm looking forward to growing with them.  Finally theyre doing what no one else could. | I only see, weekly, monthly and yearly as option but not lifetime | Such a great app - but I wish it had 2 small things:

1. The ability to hide flight paths on the map view. I dont want the map to always default to a zoomed out view that doesn‚Äôt show many much relevant detail of the stuff I have planned in my actual destination 

2. The ability to add a location to the itinerary on a certain day, without having to assign it a specific time. I.e. ‚ÄúI want to go here on the second day of my trip, but I don‚Äôt care specifically when‚Äù | love all of the features, email forwarding, gate upates and overall viewpoints. great updates. | I love this app.  It has transformed how I travel!!  I tried out several different apps before finding Tripsy, but Tripsy has the best user interface.  The ability to view everything on the map has been so helpful when deciding what activity to do next based on proximity.  My only suggestion for improvement would be being able to create custom categories or activities.  Sometimes I‚Äôd like to be more specific than just something like ‚Äúfitness,‚Äù especially if we are doing lots fitness type activities in a single trip (golfing, hiking, etc). | I think I tried almost every group travel planning app in the store and on the web, and Tripsy is by far the best for group leisure travel planning. It handles all the fundamentals of planning a trip gracefully and intuitively, without the clutter and noise so prevalent in this category. 

I can think of a few nonessential features that Tripsy lacks, like expense tracking, shared check-lists, and ability to add notes to a date.

But Tripsy delivers on the fundamentals of travel planning ‚Äì which all work seamlessly and intuitively to provide a great user experience ‚Äì in a way that no other app currently does. Highly recommend! | Would not use anyone else! | Setting up two activities in a single day seems to be impossible | Definitely will continue to use this app. I love the in app map feature, makes it so easy to get to places. | I love the app, I used it for my trips with my friends. | I think the developer poured a lot of thought and effort into the app and I do believe that for other travelers it is a worthwhile investment if you need all your travel info in one place and shareable. That said you need not look further because this app has it all. Flights, hotels, and general itinerary management is great! I used the email function and the hit rate was pretty good. A couple hotel bookings didn‚Äôt go through but they were formatted oddly even for human reading so that is certainly not the fault of the ingest system. For standard booking (major airlines and chain hotels) flights and hotels it worked flawlessly. I really appreciated the sharing feature, I had the other family on the trip download the app and they were able to see and add to the itinerary, which was excellent. Overall a well executed app and it is probably well fitting if you need all your travel info in one app that you can share with others.

Post trip update: I want to continue using the app, but after having it for a trip we just didn‚Äôt need to use the functionality - I think I‚Äôm more organized already and it was a chore to move everything to the app rather than just use our existing calendar and weather apps. Also, I think based on the fact I already use Flighty for real-time flight notifications that extra feature wasn‚Äôt needed for me so  I turned off the flight info for the trip. For me it‚Äôs just not something I can see using, THAT SAID, the execution is great and it deserves 5 stars even if it doesn‚Äôt fit my use case. Excellent work, a pleasure to use. | What an app. Blows TripIt out of the water. Always updating and adding new features. Thanks! | When entering a hotel the dates are not visible. Also when changing the dates on an item it reverts back to the old date. These bugs are fixed then appear again. | Every single flight, hotel reservation, excursion conveniently located in one place chronologically. This app is a dream for anyone that wants to be organized or has a busy trip scheduled. Fabulous app, I just can‚Äôt say enough about it! I would recommend to all!

title: Trip.com: Book Flights, Hotels
description:
Trip.com is a ONE-STOP travel platform where you can access everything you need for great trips with loads of TRAVEL DEALS!

Get Trip.com NOW to get a perfect trip!

#Detailed Features List:

BOOK HOTELS AND FIND GREAT DEALS ON AMAZING STAYS!
On Trip.com, you can browse stays to suit your tastes from a total selection of more than 1.4 million options worldwide. Whether you're in the mood for a money-saving apartment stay or a luxury 5-star hotel, a cozy holiday inn or a fun-filled resort, it's easy to find the right accommodation.

BOOK FLIGHTS SEAMLESSLY WITH NO BOOKING FEES!
Flights to around 5,000 cities worldwide are available in the Trip.com app. Pick your preferred class ‚Äì or even book a chartered flight! The Trip.com app lets you filter by price, flight duration, travel time, airline, or number of stops. Pick a multi-city itinerary, and you can even fly into one city and out of another. With Trip.com it's easy to find your perfect flight.

BOOK TRAINS ACROSS THE WORLD, EASILY!
On the Trip.com app, you can now book trains for mainland China, Taiwan, Korea, UK, Italy, Spain, France, and Germany. We connect directly with train information centers for updated schedule information and prices. Our app lets you search quickly through available fares, saving you time and money.

RENT CARS AT THOUSANDS OF DESTINATIONS WORLDWIDE!
Rent cars on Trip.com and choose from all makes and models. With Trip.com, there's no need to drive the same car twice. Don't worry if your plans change, most cars can be booked flexibly with free cancellation.

BOOK TOURS AND TICKETS ON TRIP.COM AND SEE THE BEST OF YOUR DESTINATION!
From a trip to the Great Wall to a one-day Dubai stopover. Visit Disneyland, get skip-the-line passes for the Louvre, or take off in a hot air balloon. Whatever experiences a destination has to offer, you can find out what's happening and book your tickets, all on Trip.com.

BOOK AIRPORT TRANSFERS EASILY.
When you book airport transfers with Trip.com, your driver will be kept up-to-date with your flight schedule, so you can travel worry-free even in the case of flight delays. Free cancellation is available up to 24 hours before your scheduled pick-up time.

TRIP.COM: YOUR PERSONAL TRIP ADVISOR.
Trip.com is more than just a travel app where you can plan and book your next trip - it's a global community of travelers. You can share Trip Moments with like-minded adventurers, and get inspired by others in return. You can also find exciting travel lists and gourmet recommendations showing the best of everything from food to local activities.

Get Trip.com NOW to experience the seamless one-stop booking process and let your next adventure begin!

#More about the Trip.com app:

TRUSTED GLOBAL SERVICE:
- 20 different languages with payment available in 31 currencies
- 24/7 global call center with rapid response time
- 24/7 global SOS emergency response and Natural Disaster Relief Fund
- Trip.com service guarantee

Book with Trip.com NOW for great deals and service.

Have a good trip!
releaseNotes:
We've been working hard to improve the Trip.com app, to make sure you have the best trip possible. Here's what's new:

„ÄêTripGenie 2.0„Äë
TripGenie is an AI assistant created by Trip.com to help users with travel questions. Voice chat with TripGenie to get instant travel tips and personalized itineraries tailored just for you.

„ÄêChina Travel Guide„Äë
Planning a trip to China? Trip.com has everything you need. Search the keyword "China", to access Trip.com's exclusive 2024 China travel guide. From airport arrival to accommodation, transportation, sightseeing, shopping, payment solutions, and more, our travel guide will help you get the most out of your trip to China.

„ÄêTrip Map„Äë
Finding your way between airports, hotels, stations, and attractions too chaotic? Make Trip.com your travel assistant. Trip Map is a DIY feature you can use to visually display travel routes. Just tap to view your personal map, distances, and itinerary times, and even optimize your route.

„ÄêChuang Asia TH x Trip.com„Äë
Chuang Asia Thailand Dream Voyage Star Search! Search "Chuang Asia" and vote for your favorite trainees! The winners will have an extra sharing session during the show! 

We hope you love our new app version. If you need help or have any feedback, feel free to contact our online customer support or leave an app review.

Have a great trip! 

The Trip.com Team

title: HotelTonight - Hotel Deals
description:
Travel to the hotels we love, with deals you‚Äôll love. From top-rated luxury hotels to tried-and-true favorites to one-of-a-kind boutiques, we work with great hotels (and only partner with hotels where we‚Äôd wanna stay). 
 
On-the-go? Use our app to book travel deals so good we don‚Äôt offer them on the web. Experience the simplest hotel booking app ‚Äì just 3 taps and a swipe to book in under 60 seconds.
 
Don‚Äôt miss our Daily Drop deals, which rocks awesome jaw-dropping hotel discounts. Just swipe to unlock the extra special deal of the day and book your stay.
 
EVERYTHING YOU NEED IN A BOOKING APP
‚Ä¢ Weekend stay? Last minute trip? Dream vacation? Business trips? All good. Book tonight, next week, or up to 100 days in advance
‚Ä¢ We‚Äôve got the hookup for deals on last minute hotel bookings wherever you travel to
‚Ä¢ Select hotels offer cancellable rates ‚Äì only on our app. Look for the Cancellable badge before you book if you need travel flexibility
‚Ä¢ 24/7 customer support (from real, live, nice people) for every booking
 
FIND HOTELS EASILY
‚Ä¢ Hotel descriptions provide the three reasons why we love it (and why you will too)
‚Ä¢ Our categories (like Basic, Hip and Luxe) make it easy to book the perfect hotel, bnb, inn, resort or over-the-top suite
‚Ä¢ Find hotels by city, neighborhood or filter by your trip needs. Traveling with Fido? Toggle on ‚Äúpet friendly‚Äù
‚Ä¢ Need a second opinion? Find hotel ratings, stay reviews and photos from fellow bookers
‚Ä¢ Frequent Traveler? Favorite your usual hotels
 
HT PERKS PROGRAM
‚Ä¢ Loyalty is a breeze ‚Äì the more you book, the better your hotel deals get! Level up to claim more travel discounts and rewards
 
SOME TRIP IDEAS
‚Ä¢ Happy hour is never just an hour. Book hotel deals where tonight takes you
‚Ä¢ Skip the commute. With a same day last minute hotel deal, traffic can wait
‚Ä¢ Travel for business or pleasure - or both? Lock down biz travel then book another hotel night, it‚Äôs a vacation deal!
‚Ä¢ Group traveling made simple. Book multiple hotel rooms for the ultimate friends vacation
‚Ä¢ Summer road trips are fun. Find new hotels at every stop and enjoy the cheap discounts
‚Ä¢ Surprise! A last minute trip is the best gift. Book rooms and text the BFF ‚ÄúVegas, tonight‚Äù 
‚Ä¢ Invite a fellow traveler or two on your last hurrah, and book the most over-the-top rooms or VIP suite
‚Ä¢ Spontaneous travel decision? Booking a trip on a whim is fun with deals!
 
‚ÄúThe app made its name with last-minute deals, but you can plan as far as 100 days out and even score baller rooms for way less‚Äù - Conde Nast Traveler (2017)
 
Whether traveling near or far, searching for last minute trips and local hotel deals is easy!
 
Download the HotelTonight booking app today to stay at awesome hotels with great deals. Plan less and live more!
releaseNotes:
HotelTonight brings you amazing hotel deals for tonight, tomorrow and beyond! Hotels give us discounts on their unsold rooms and you get to book amazing hotels at great prices. Three taps, one swipe, and you are booked!

Download now to find deals so good hotels will not let us put it on the website.

In the latest update, we‚Äôve made performance improvements so it‚Äôs even easier and more fun to book a place on HotelTonight.

title: Yelp: Food, Delivery & Reviews
description:
Yelp has over 199 million reviews of businesses worldwide. Whether you‚Äôre looking for a new pizza place to try, a great coffee shop nearby, or need to book a haircut, Yelp is your local guide for finding the perfect place to eat, shop, drink, explore, and relax. The Yelp app is available for iPhone, iPad, and Apple Watch.

Yelp features:

Food Near You - Find Restaurants
‚Ä¢ Find the newest and hottest restaurants in your area
‚Ä¢ Make reservations, order delivery or pickup‚Äîall from your phone
‚Ä¢ Filter restaurant search results by price, location, open now, and more

Search for Nearby Businesses, Services, & Professionals
‚Ä¢ Discover great local businesses, from hair salons to trusted doctors and movers
‚Ä¢ Read millions of reviews by the Yelp community
‚Ä¢ Home need repairs? Find the best rated contractors and handymen
‚Ä¢ Find great deals offered by local businesses, get quotes instantly, and book appointments

Beauty - Pamper Yourself 
‚Ä¢ Find highly-rated salons, spas, massage therapists, and more
‚Ä¢ Book appointments through Yelp at the most relaxing staycation destinations

Search Filters 
‚Ä¢ Filter your search results by neighborhood, distance, rating, price, and hours of operation
‚Ä¢ Look up addresses and phone numbers, call a business, or make reservations directly from the app

Other Features
‚Ä¢ Read expert user reviews and browse through beautiful photos of each business
‚Ä¢ Write and read reviews, check-in to local businesses, upload photos and add tips for other Yelp users

Find local restaurants, read expert customer reviews, and start searching for businesses near you with Yelp. 

Need Help? Contact Yelp at https://www.yelp.com/support
Note: Continued use of GPS running can dramatically decrease battery life.
releaseNotes: Minor updates and improvements, making Yelp better for you one release at a time.

title: Eurostar Trains
description:
Eurostar and Thalys have joined forces under the Eurostar name and a single new-look app. Discover the very best deals, destination inspiration, and manage every booking with ease. Our app helps make your high-speed train trip simple, fast, and fun. And it‚Äôs available in English, French, Dutch, and German.

Here's what you can do with our app:

BOOK TICKETS
Snap up seats to over 100 destinations in France, Belgium, the Netherlands, and Germany.

STORE TICKETS
Keep your tickets safe and sound in the app or in your Apple Wallet.

GRAB CHEAP FARES
Find the cheapest fares with our Low Fare Finder.

MANAGE BOOKINGS
Manage your bookings on the go and change your travel dates, seats, or travel arrangements.

MANAGE CLUB EUROSTAR POINTS
Check your points balance or spend your points.

ACCESS CLUB EUROSTAR BENEFITS
Access exclusive discounts and benefits using your digital membership card.

RECEIVE LIVE NOTIFICATIONS
Allow notifications to receive live travel information and exclusive offers.

BEAT THE QUEUES
Certain Club Eurostar members can use the app to get access to our priority gates (depending upon your membership level).

ACCESS OUR EXCLUSIVE LOUNGES
Certain Club Eurostar members can use the app to get entry to our exclusive lounges (depending upon your membership level).

So, what are you waiting for? Download the Eurostar app now and take your trip even further.
releaseNotes:
We‚Äôve made a few improvements and fixed a few bugs to make our app even easier to use.  

We‚Äôre required by the UK government to collect Advance Passenger Information (API) for all passengers travelling to/from the UK. You can now complete this on our app.

title: momondo: Flights, Hotels, Cars
description:
Find, compare & book flights, hotels, and car rental with momondo‚Äôs beautiful all-in-one travel and reservation app

We believe that everybody should be able to travel - and there's no better place to start dreaming and planning than the momondo app. A beautiful, user-friendly design makes it easy to search and compare from hundreds of travel sites at once. Find just the right flight, hotel or car rental for your next vacation or business trip, at great prices. Save on travel deals with exclusive Mobile Rates available only on the app.

FIND THE BEST FLIGHT DEALS AVAILABLE FROM 900+ TRAVEL SITES
‚Ä¢ We search major airlines, low cost carriers and travel agencies to give you an easy overview of all the airfare options
‚Ä¢ We highlight airline ticket options with no change fees, to make it easy to book with flexibility
‚Ä¢ With this reservation app, you can make a flight booking directly from your device, wherever you are
‚Ä¢ Filter plane tickets by the factors that matter to you, including number of stops, departure and arrival time, duration, airlines and ticket type
‚Ä¢ Cheapest, quickest or best flight deal? With one click you can see which ticket is the best deal according to your needs
‚Ä¢ Not ready to book? Save your results for later, or share them via email or text
‚Ä¢ Search without worry - the prices you see are never affected by your searches
‚Ä¢ Beautiful and easy to use ‚Äì finding the perfect plane ticket doesn‚Äôt have to be tricky and dull

SEARCH THOUSANDS OF CAR RENTAL OFFERS AT ONCE
‚Ä¢ See rental car deals in 70,000+ locations
‚Ä¢ Filter your search to see eco-friendly options like hybrids and electric vehicles
‚Ä¢ Easily filter to only see car rentals with free cancellation and enhanced cleaning
‚Ä¢ Total transparency, no surprises -  see the total cost of your car rental up-front

SEE DEALS FROM 3M+ HOTELS AND ACCOMMODATIONS IN ONE PLACE
‚Ä¢ Search from all the major booking, accommodation, and rental comparison sites as well as individual hotel websites to find the best place to stay
‚Ä¢ Use our filter to find stays with free cancellation, so you can cancel and re-book a hotel or vacation rental for free if you find a better deal
‚Ä¢ See ratings based on millions of real guest reviews, so you know what everyone else is saying about a property before you book
‚Ä¢ Looking for something close to home? Get inspired with amazing hotel ideas in your area.
‚Ä¢ Find last minute hotel deals with the Around Me Tonight feature
‚Ä¢ Sort accommodation results by cheapest, closest, best review, or most popular
‚Ä¢ Search by the amenities that matter most to you
‚Ä¢ Beautiful and user-friendly ‚Äì finding a place to stay has never looked this good or been this easy

A PERSONALIZED SEARCH EXPERIENCE
‚Ä¢ Create your own momondo profile to keep everything the way you like it
‚Ä¢ Not just a reservation app. Save and sync your preferences, your search history and all your favorite flights and hotels
‚Ä¢ Search from one device ‚Äì and book from another.

LOOKING FOR INSPIRATION?
Not sure where to go? Our Explore feature makes it easy to find destinations within your budget. Your next best vacation destination may be somewhere you‚Äôve never even heard of!

Download the momondo travel app now and open your world
releaseNotes: We fixed some bugs here and there to make our app even better.

Searched for flights, and upon selecting one we liked, was redirected to a different site, ‚ÄúFlights Mojo.‚Äù If this happens to you, DO NOT purchase a flight from Flights Mojo, they are absolutely a scam company. After completing our reservation, we received an email that it was not complete until we called them. The number took us to a call center abroad where we are  informed that the flights we reserved are not available, and then the operator tried to extract more money for completely different flights through completely different cities. It was *extremely* difficult to leave the call with any assurances that we weren‚Äôt being charged, and we are still really worried about having given them credit card info. Other reviews of Flights Mojo online have nightmare stories about reservations cancelled and no refunds issued, demands for more and more fees as well as photos of identification and credit cards to be sent. Lots of people left high and dry when they try to use tickets. 
I have no idea if Momondo does any vetting for where it sends you with searches, but please be aware that in this instance they‚Äôre allowing a very sketchy company to solicit your financial information. | I have been looking at multiple airlines who fly to me requested destination and This app is only showing one option. ##For other users, please be careful for the third party booking websites momondo is directing you to, some may never refund your money even when promised. Read online for honest customer reviews before paying or book directly with the airline. | Really good in searching for cheap prices and it‚Äôs my go-to app for almost all my travel expenses | Wether it‚Äôs a room or a flight you‚Äôre looking for, I‚Äôve found, by far, the cheapest and yet high quality places and airlines through this app. | Excellent | I‚Äôve bought 2 plane tickets now using momondo and compared to the experience using other services e.g. KAYAK, momondo seems to have all the upsides and none of the downsides. The search API is responsive, searches don‚Äôt take terribly long (~1min), prices are legit and low, and the purchase pipeline is simple and streamlined. title: Steller: Plan & Book Trips
description:
Steller is a travel planning app that makes finding the best things to do easy and planning your next trip stress fee. 


PLAN YOUR NEXT TRIP
Our trip builder combines AI and the power of the human experience to help you create the perfect trip. Hidden gems, the hottest spots on Instagram, the must sees ‚Äì you can find, explore, and book them all in the Steller app. 

SEARCH ANY DESTINATION ON EARTH
Search and find travel videos and recommendations for any destination. Whether you‚Äôre looking for travel recommendations you can trust in San Diego or Kathmandu ‚Äî you‚Äôll find them on Steller. 

BE INSPIRED BY A GLOBAL COMMUNITY OF TRAVELERS
Want to explore a new destination, but don‚Äôt know anyone who has been there? Each destination on Steller has videos from real travelers allowing you to see it from different perspectives.


BOOK UNIQUE EXPERIENCES & FAVORITES 
Whether you‚Äôre looking for a unique experience or the most popular attractions you can book it in minutes on Steller.

FIND YOUR TRAVEL FAM
Connect with people like you who love to travel and explore the way you do. 


THE MAP YOU‚ÄôVE BEEN WAITING FOR
Zoom in on the Steller map to find something to do nearby. Map locations are infused with videos from real travelers giving you a sneak peek before you go. 


SWIPE UP FOR DETAILS
Wondering where a travel video is located? Swipe up to find the location, Google directions, and details about a place right inside Steller.


SAVE YOUR FAVORITES
Have a trip coming up? Save all your favorite recommendations, videos, places to stay, and things to eat to a trip. 

SHARE YOUR OWN VIDEOS
Took a trip and want to share about it? Ate at a restaurant that slaps? Had an experience you can‚Äôt keep to yourself? Upload a quick video and show the community.


BOOK A STAY
Places to stay at every price point. You may even discover some unique stays you won‚Äôt see anywhere else.


TRAVEL WITH CONFIDENCE
Reviews you can trust combined with videos from other travelers and the creators you love, means you‚Äôll know what to expect before you go. Steller gives you all the information you need to feel confident in your travel choices.


USE THE MAP
If you‚Äôre looking for somewhere to eat or something to do right where you‚Äôre at ‚Äî use the map on Steller to find something close by.


Terms of service ‚Äî https://steller.co/terms


Privacy Policy ‚Äî https://steller.co/privacy


Have feedback? Contact us at https://steller.co/contact
releaseNotes: Introducing Trips, our new trip planner to help you find the best places for your next trip. Explore thousands of trip recommendations shared by real travelers.
reviews:
Best travel site ever! | I like the idea of tracking travel locations but it seems to miss most cities so our multi city trip is hard to implement. So I guess it just isn't meant to be. Sad. I had high hopes. | Love sharing all my fav travel moments in one place. The new trips feature is cool for planning trips or sharing trip itineraries with friends. | Hello. There is a bug with the current (11.2.1) version of the Stellar app for iOS. If the user backs out (cancels out) of the Twitter authorization login, the user will is sent back to an unresponsive Stellar app. The app freezes until it is manually restarted or deleted and then re-downloaded. This is very odd, as I have never seem this happen with any other iOS app. Canceling out of the Twitter authorization prompt is usually the first thing I do. I have never seen an iOS freeze the way the Steller app does.

My Twitter account of @RandomiOSBugs tagged the @StellerStories account online. Please investigate this issue, thanks.

P.S. the Steller app‚Äôs Privacy Policy and Terms and Conditions links are not working on the Twitter authorization page either. | I used to love this app, I still do ‚Ä¶.

The format was far better when first created .

to create. | After falling out of love with so many social platforms, Steller give the experience feel without the pretentious vibes of some *cough* other platforms | This app was so easy to join and will definitely inspire you | Great for finding beautiful places to travel! | I'm

I‚Äôve seen all the changes.  Some I love, some irk me to no end!

The best thing about this app is that you can explore the world from your phone.  You can plan vacations, workaround and add to your bucket list without the hassle of talking to a travel agent or scrolling for hours on other social media networks.  

O probably should also mention that  it‚Äôs simple to use and easy to share content to other platforms.

Download it today! | So cool to see how this app has changed over the years. I remember this before search was even added. Keep up the great work :-) | I just started using the Stellar app this week and cannot put it down! I love adding stories and seeing the cool new places I want to visit. And soooo easy to use. I‚Äôve been looking for an authentic travel app and THIS.IS.IT! | I‚Äôve had major issues with this app from trying to create an account to trying to post my first post. It seems either something is wrong with their servers or with the app. The only way I have been able to get in was by using a VPN. Even then the functionality still isn‚Äôt there. Considering who built this app I find that very odd. | Screw the algorithms, ads, and noise of your other social apps. Steller is a simple and beautiful way to discover and create stories. Turn the camera roll on your phone into beautiful stories to share with families and friends. I use this for trip recaps, building my travel hit list, and discovering hidden gems and adventure ideas. I can‚Äôt recommend this app enough. It‚Äôs so fun and easy to use. | I love Steller for finding travel recommendations and keeping up with friends travels. The new feature, Moments, makes it even easier to share things on the go! Great way to connect with fellow creators üòç | This app was so great but I still can‚Äôt figure out why they had to make every page auto advancing. I‚Äôm having to pause every page and it makes the entire experience feel rushed. There are other apps for that. This should be for well told stories that deserve more than 2 seconds per page. | I started using Steller recently and I love it! It‚Äôs such a great way to share travel stories and it is also perfect for sourcing inspo and tips for upcoming trips. It works well, has all of the necessary features, and the user base is full of like minded individuals who love to travel, get outside, and explore. | Been on the App for les than thirty minutes and my mind is blown. Incredible content from real travelers. Bravo Steller. | I used to love this app when it launched but this has become hard to use and needlessly complicated to create. | App is wonderful but I really need to be able to turn the sound off. I have the sound turned off on my phone most of the time so I‚Äôm not disturbing anyone else nearby. But the music plays on every story with no way to turn it off. Have to turn the volume all the way down, then hope I remember to turn it back up later. Really a miss in an otherwise great app and platform. | I cant reset my password knowing my username. I haven't logged in for about a year and yet my account is viewable. 

None of possible emails (of 3) received any reset email. | This app is honestly amazing, all I want to figure out is how to move the frame around so the photo i want to post i can center the subject in the frame but I‚Äôm sure that‚Äôs coming. Love this app so far! | I have been searching for an app that I could switch to from IG, since IG has so many ads these days. Steller is stunning! It‚Äôs not as active as Instagram, but I love that there are no ads and I can choose who to follow without algorithm suggestions. | I love this app, but is there anyway to pay for the service so there will no longer be a watermark on the page if I repost to other social media accounts? It ruins the clean layout of the page, and that is why I use this app in the first place. | When I first stumbled on this app, I was a love! A beautiful story book play this year short simple stories through photos and an economy of words would be ideal for sharing. Unfortunately, it has a ludicrous Instacrap format to it that you cannot control the speed in which to consume it. If I wanted IG, I would‚Äôve just gone with the real thing, but since I am not 14, there‚Äôs no reason to go with it. Bring back the old storybook format! | I love Steller because I can tell stories and write through a social media app. I‚Äôve only done one post but I already love the app! So much fun, and very simple. It isn‚Äôt confusing at all. (That sounded sarcastic but it wasn‚Äôt, I‚Äôm serious) 100000% recommend. | I really wanted to use and love this app.... I created a story but was unable to upload it I reached out to stellar via Twitter. Someone reached out to me and tried to help but then dropped off the face of the earth it‚Äôs been over a month and I‚Äôve yet to hear from anyone. I‚Äôm close to deleting it at this point there‚Äôs just no point in having an app I can‚Äôt use. What‚Äôs worse your story doesn‚Äôt save on their sever so if I delete and reinstall the app I‚Äôll loose my story ..... so wish I could have enjoyed it but oh well it is what it is | This is all that you need. One app for all your Instagram stories need! | Para mi es la mejor aplicaci√≥n que he encontrado para escribir mis historias con fotograf√≠as. Las herramientas son f√°cil de utilizar y quedan muy bonitas una vez finalizado el trabajo. Saludos desde Costa Rica | Update: Since recent updates to app,
Some of the best previous features are gone. It is not as easy to format and select styles, captions, and even to import photos. 
A wonderful medium for sharing stories - art, photography, recipes - easy to use. Highly recommend for creatives and appreciation. | Love how Steller has some beautiful and simple templates to help share photos of my travels and add tips and notes about the destinations. The new map feature is helpful for finding unique spots to explore. I also love that the stories can be downloaded and shared easily to IG, making story creation useful for multiple platforms. | Minimalist visual storytelling. It's perfect, easy, and across multiple channels. Done. | I love this app... it‚Äôs clean, it‚Äôs classy very easy to maneuver. We all have A story to tell. Make it Stellar. | I just started doing this and I just read a review and I feel like the person had some very good points; it would be great to do little family skits and save them together and eventually combine all these skits to become a movie night actual mo a movie type bigger one you can include‚Äù just to have them in one place and all of the projects saved. I love checking out the stye 
This is not an option yet.  I also would like to change the theme for new videos etc.  Nonetheless, I will be using this one specifically probably more than a few Thera I‚Äôm will to train myself to use. Thanks overall. Looking forward to many acquaintances I love and we support each other. If you would like to pitch in too, show posts to others and get help when stumped, it‚Äôs all good. You‚Äôll belong. Children are encouraged to have interest in family stories. Not like is new grannies, and considered more than me and my family adventures aka best comedy to pee your pants from low bladder function.  Overall:    Thanks for all this! My new scrapbook project/ video family scrapbooking new is waiting to start. Too happy to form memories in an updated. | User experience is great with this app. Everything is where I expect I'm going to find it when navigating through it. I find that really important because apps that are easy to use keep me coming back. I'm really loving it! | It‚Äôs pretty cool! Lol helped me step my story and post game up a bit lol | Title ^

Otherwise great app, simple and not bloated. Minimalistic yet functional.
Love it. | One app I‚Äôve kept around on my iPhone but the iPad version is less than desired! Like half the apps available it does this weird non-full screen thing that has a black border that takes up 1‚Äù of of the screen on both sides! Until that‚Äôs fixed I‚Äôm iPhone only :( | Nice clean design layouts, and it‚Äôs perfect for me to get my artwork out there! Easy user interface. | This app is simple and straight to the point more articles should be like this versus beating around the bush | I‚Äôd been working on a post for stellar for quite some time, putting in hours of effort. 
Months later I went back to add other thoughts and pictures to this draft and it‚Äôs gone... 

I‚Äôm sooo upset. So much work done that I will never get back. 

Hoping Stellar will reach out with a solution. Hopefully they can recover it. | Love this app so much!!! | I can see how this could be a great way to share photos in a story format.
