title: Amtrak
description:
Discover the convenience of traveling with Amtrak. With the Amtrak app you can get simple and intuitive access to all the travel information you need, whenever you need it.

‚Ä¢ Show your eTicket while onboard, including multi-ride and monthly passes - no need to print
‚Ä¢ Purchase one-way, roundtrip, multi-ride and monthly tickets with dollars or Amtrak Guest Rewards points
‚Ä¢ Check train status
‚Ä¢ Find station information
‚Ä¢ Edit and manage your account profile
‚Ä¢ Save credit cards for quick checkout
‚Ä¢ Send your eTicket to Apple Wallet
‚Ä¢ And so much more...

With the Amtrak app, you can do it all right from your smart device.
releaseNotes: Thanks for choosing the Amtrak app. We continue to fix bugs and improve the experience. Please check for updates frequently to take advantage of the improvements.
reviews:
Cs is pretty poor and unwilling to help me move reservation | The app constantly lists different prices for the same ticket, spanning hundreds of dollars difference from minute to minute. It says it is processing a payment, only to get to the very last step and say that something went wrong and you need to try again. You are constantly caught in an endless loop of app malfunction. I‚Äôve wasted HOURS trying to book various tickets after hours, and the automated phone system is no better!! | This app periodically will show a certain ticket price when you go to book trains, but then will not allow you to check out at that listed price, it will tell you your ticket is no longer available. When you go back to book the ticket for the same time slot, you will find that your ticket price has risen ~$20. Pretty scummy app design / horrible user experience. | The app is just okay for finding trains but it won‚Äôt let me buy a ticket. This has happened twice now, where I go through all the steps and check all the boxes and the ‚Äòpurchase‚Äô button turns green. I press it and wait and try again and  ‚Ä¶. nothing happens. Have removed app and reinstalled. Same problem and so I have to use my computer and a browser. Like I said, my last 2 train trips and the app won‚Äôt work to buy tickets. I‚Äôve got an iPhone 14 and the latest everything. | I can't find anywhere in app to sign up for trip alerts.  Like the 3 hr delay today!   App says delayed. Nothing more. I received no notifications.  And app still shows original time for departure.
If someone sitting with me didn't tell me corrent updates I wouldn't even know. | Amtrak is my favorite mode of transportation | Can‚Äôt find my round trip tomorrow on this app and there appears no way to add it. | This message pops up every time o try to use the app. Pretty annoying. | Need to have text ability for ticket restorations.  This would be in addition to e-mail. | App keeps crashing. Had to go to website and use instead of app. | Amtrak always seems to have some sort of issue when it comes to payment. It has failed to process my cards time and time again. I‚Äôve called my bank to make sure it‚Äôs not an issue with my account, but it‚Äôs never a problem with the bank. Because of this glitch, I‚Äôve lost good seats multiple times. | Only lets you pay for a ticket with 1 payment method. So if you have a $100 visa card and want to pay for the rest of the ticket with a separate credit card you cant do it. | Why doesnt your site allow me to log out? I go to my account page but it refuses to go down to Log out | The profile tab on my iPhone is laid out such that the logout button is off the screen. There is no way to logout! I have to kill the app. Sheesh! | We just got off the California Zephyr in Chicago from Emeryville. I want to acknowledge an excellent car attendant, Rashid. 

Rashid, our genuinely nice Amtrak car attendant keeps everything clean and orderly in the car and prepares our beds after dinner for the night‚Äôs sleep. When you come back from breakfast, your rooms, your beds are made and everything is in order. He even makes a huge pot of coffee every morning! The best!! | Do not be fooled. The Phone app does not allow you to purchase tickets using your points. Repeat: the Phone app does not allow you to purchase tickets using your Amtrak points. They lied.

I wanted to purchase tickets to visit a dying friend up in New York City and use my points, there is no option using the phone app to use points. Amtrak is a liar and my 52,000 points are not available to be used using the Phone app at all. I will never use Amtrak for anything ever again. | Doesn‚Äôt make it easy to print a ticket. Had to turn receipt in. For work and could print it from app. | I can‚Äôt even seem to find a station that hosts even a slight default to be near where I‚Äôm trying to go but everywhere it says there isn‚Äôt any scheduled trip between those stations but then doesn‚Äôt tell you which ones can! And how close and far. Ridiculous | I used the app to modify my trip.  I selected the train, paid using Apple Pay, received the payment confirmation and then received an error message on the map that the transaction couldn‚Äôt be processed and to call customer service.  At the same time, my colleague made the same trip/train change with no issue. Less than five minutes later, I opened the app and made the same change but the price was $50 higher than the first attempt that was cancelled. | Love planning travel trips with you. | WAY too many emails!!!! | Worst possible transportation out there. Why is there no option for ZERO stars. (Long story short, I showed up early and somehow they left me behind while managing to put the fault all on me)!!!
First off, Amtrak is Never on time so if you don‚Äôt live a block away from the station it‚Äôs such an inconvenience. With my experience, in my opinion their main motive is transferring goods they have, therefore their care for the people who decide to use their transportation is absolutely terrible, (IN MY EXPERIENCE). Not only have I been miss treated on every occasion of riding Amtrak, I also pay an outrageous amount for a ticket, (mind you, us people are basically bonus pay since they drive the route anyways). With that being said, March 17th 2024 I had a friend with a train ticket which stated the train was suppose to arrive at 2 a.m. We woke up around midnight (I live an hr from the train station!). We checked the website when we woke up and found out the train had been delayed and was now expected to arrive around 5:30 a.m. We take a cat nap and wake up to check the time, now the estimated time was around 8 am. We now stay awake so we can keep an eye on the map and location of the train. Arrival time constantly changes, they constant break down or wait for another trade that had broke down. Finally, the train gets close enough we can trust the estimated time arrival. We leave with plenty of time, and arrive more than 30 minutes before the train. The train was arriving and before it stopped my friend got out of my car and got in the back seat to grab his belonging. The train stops as he grabs his last bad (we are about 60 ft from boarding location) the lady at the sandpoint train station who I believe stated to be the janitor, had yelled from less than 60 ft away ‚Äúhurry hurry the train is leaving!!‚Äù. Me completely dumbfounded that they hadn‚Äôt even came to a complete stop yet before saying they were leaving, told my friend to hurry up and get over there so he started to run. He was halfway (30 ft approximately still running) when I notice the train start to move, sure enough they continued moving leaving my friend behind (who mind you, had over payed for the ticket in the first place!!). I know the train is terrible, so I already have low expectations. This though, has pushed me to the point of leaving this review. I called to request reimbursement of the first ticket as well as a free new ticket for the next available train and yes got a new ticket scheduled for the next day, which was ‚Äúfree‚Äù from Amtrak. In my opinion that is not a free ticket, therefore I‚Äôm not (nor is my friend, who should be) is truly compensated for THEIR mistake. I understand mistakes happen, but this was no mistake and with less than 20 more seconds everything would have been fine and I would not have to drive 2 hrs round trip to bring him to the station for the second time. I will admit, he was not standing on the boarding platform, Just 60 or so ft away waiting in my car. If I must restate, the train DID NOT stop for more than 30 seconds and started to leave as my friend was walking up to the train. This is a long review so I don‚Äôt expect anyone to get this far but if you have I highly advice preparing for the most horrific public transportation experience, better yet figure out different transportation! My hopes is to spread awareness so they loose business and have no option but to treat the people better to maintain customers. | I recently downloaded the rewards app. It is simple enough to purchase tickets, however I have been purchasing Amtrak trips online the last three years for my daughter who is a student and always sent the trip details to both of our emails. 
The app does not give me the option to send the trip info to 2 emails. Since I am paying and she is traveling, it seems reasonable we would both need the details conveniently send to both cell phones/emails | Every city I put in come up no available train! No way to get from NY city to Portland Oregon by train? Gives no suggestions; nothing! I remember taking the train from NC to Seattle WA and enjoying it so thought I would take the train from PA to Portland Oregon but not possible according to the app. It will be just as nice of a drive. | I installed this app on my iOS17.4 about 1.5 hours ago. Every time I continue to the payment page, ‚Äúlogin expired‚Äù and I have to login again. Not only do I have to see that message every time (five times already) but I have to select OK three times to get out of the message! I‚Äôm not sure how confident I should be to board this train for a random or spontaneous tripü§∑‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è | doesn‚Äôt work | The system will not allow me to log  on keeps asking me to change my password and when I change it, it does not accept it. I am frustrated cause I‚Äôm trying to prepare a trip. | We‚Äôre on the eastbound Zephyr right now, trying to see if we‚Äôll get to Chicago in time to get to O‚ÄôHare in time to catch a flight. The app is either lying to us or has no clue. It says that the train left Emeryville at 7:47 two days ago. It really left after noon! FWIW, we did get good info yesterday. Today, fantasy. We‚Äôre using railrat today. | The title says it all!! Easy to use and accepts Apple Pay. Didn‚Äôt have to create a login to get a ticket. Amazing experience, thank you | The Amtrak app pauses my audio every single time I open the app. It‚Äôs not an audio app‚Ä¶ there‚Äôs no reason for this to happen. It‚Äôs a broken experience. | 1. After logging into the app (or website), I should be able to access my reservations without having to know the reservation #. That‚Äôs the point of logging in! So the user can find their reservation number and details. 

2. It‚Äôs not possible to print an eTicket from the app or website. Even Customer Service could not email an updated eTicket to me after they changed one segment of my trip. They said I‚Äôd have to ‚Äúask at the station.‚Äù (With fingers crossed, I guess!)

3. On the app, ticket information doesn‚Äôt show Arrival Dates ‚Äî just the time. 
Example: I‚Äôm traveling from Chicago to LA, and it shows ‚ÄúApril 9 Departure 2:50p‚Äù ‚ÄúArrival 8:00a.‚Äù 
When? The next day? Two or three days? How helpful is that? 

It would also be nice to be able to see the break down of stops on the way.

The main page of the app is cluttered with marketing stuff about ‚ÄúPutting Customers First,‚Äù which is exactly what the app does not do. If a customer has reached the point in Amtrak‚Äôs marketing ‚Äúpipeline‚Äù that they are using the app, it means they have or want to book travel and need to use the app to access their eticket and trip details‚Äî like which day they might be arriving at their destination. | I value the app in itself. I take advantage of tracking trains, and it seems to be accurate. However, the biggest issue is that I am not able to purchase tickets more than a few days in advance in the app. I went to the web browser to see if I could purchase tickets for a couple weeks in advance and it worked! So, developers, please fix this bug in the app! | Can‚Äôt find my trio | Just booked a trip thru the app.  Went back to retrieve info.  No upcoming trip.  I need the reservation number to locate‚Ä¶
Which I assumed would be in my upcoming trips.  App is not worth the time of creating an account | I usually have a good experience on Amtrak‚Ä¶ today was an exception. I have crutches and a boot. Didn‚Äôt ask specifically for disability seats and was given an assigned seat‚Ä¶ I asked the attendant if this was aisle or window. She barked Idk‚Ä¶ were full. Not true because coming from Philly to Wilson the disability seats were available just as on this return trip. She had to help with bags and didn‚Äôt seem to happy. I know the job is tough sometimes dealing with the public but a little courtesy and compassion goes a long way‚Ä¶during the trip I could have been more comfortable but wasn‚Äôt given that chance. I could have asked for better accommodation but decided I could make it. Thankfully, my seat-mate got off a few stops later and I was able to get the entire seat to elevate my foot. 
Sadly, she later got into a confrontational situation with another passenger whom needed to use the restroom during a layover. You don‚Äôt have to be nasty to inform customers if a service is not available. 
Hope the next experience will be better. 
Signed, Limpy Traveler | The app won‚Äôt let me purchase a train ticket. Fix it please | Worst app I‚Äôve ever used.  Tried multiple devices and website. Had to call an agent to buy a ticket. A complete waste of time. | This app has nothing going for it.  Everything is completely lacking in a step by step process of purchasing a ticket.  No steps seem to be recorded.  If you need to go back a step, relevant information is lost.  I spent more than an hour trying to book a two stage trip for two people and it‚Äôs nothing but problems. | Since the update today I have been having issues with the app opening and buttons not working. | I am disappointed to find I did not have the comfort of a business lounge after purchasing a business class ticket for my trip to and from Chicago. I was told I had to pay an additional $35.00 to sit in the Lincoln Room which is their business class lounge. I had a 5 hour wait before my departure and should not had to sit with several screaming babies, homeless people, and in over crowded noisy conditions.  My business class ticket meant nothing.  What a letdown.  The passengers deserve better for the extra money. | Prior receipts should be available through the app. Very inconvenient to have to submit a request and wait. | If anyone losses an iPhone with the eTicket on it, there is no way you can print it for backup. If there is a way, let us know. Amtrak‚Äôs iPhone app is worthless if you can‚Äôt print the eTicket. | Easy to use app! | The app is constantly having issues and not loading my train info no matter if I restart my phone or reinstall the app. It just shows an error message over and over | Booked roomettes across from each other but when we boarded one was given away.  Why bother booking together if it‚Äôs just a free for all.  Not the first time. | I‚Äôm NOT a computer person at all, but there App is pretty easy to schedule trips or cancel trips. Love Amtrak. | This use to be a great app then all a sudden you can‚Äôt book anything on here since early Feb 2024 the website doesn‚Äôt work anymore either please fix the problem it‚Äôs been weeks | What a horrible app. The train arrives an hr late but the status on the app does not even reflect that. | This app is useless when trying to book within 30 minutes of departure while standing on the platform looking at the train. | Thanks for improving seat orientation preferences, I guess? But I‚Äôd honestly prefer it if my trips would stop disappearing abruptly from the app‚Ä¶

title: Hostelworld: Hostel Travel App
description:
The world‚Äôs leading travel app & trip planner for backpackers on a budget who want to stay in the best hostels, have fun experiences and mix with like-minded travellers. With new friend-making features, it‚Äôs even easier to go from solo to social before your plane hits the runway. ¬†‚Ä®¬†‚Ä®¬†

Make new travel besties with super social features¬†
+ Instantly connect and chat with your fellow hostel travellers as soon as you book¬†
+ Share experiences that are right up your street by joining local chat groups based on your interests¬†
+ View travellers‚Äô profiles from around the world and see where people have adventured to¬†
+ See exactly who will be at your hostel when you are¬†
+ Build your own traveller profile & expand your travel network¬†
+ Share memes or discuss travel dreams: join our online community and find top tips for your next adventure¬†
¬†
Find affordable accommodation in unmissable locations¬†
+ Search from over 16,500 hostels in 180 countries¬†¬†
+ From cheap hostels in Europe to eco hostels in Southeast Asia¬†
+ Book private rooms or shared dorm rooms (mixed or all-female options available)¬†
+ Filter by location, price, room type, facilities and more on our booking app¬†¬†
+ The best hostels for any budget. Making travel possible for everyone.¬†‚Ä®¬†

Tried, tested and trusted travel app¬†
+ Helping backpackers and solo travellers ‚ÄòMeet the World‚Äô for over 20 years¬†
+ Real reviews from over 13 million+ passionate travellers¬†
+ Rated on value, location, atmosphere etc. by previous guests¬†‚Ä®¬†

Find events and experiences¬†
+ Discover hostel events and local plans¬†
+ Find FREE activities, helping you meet like-minded travellers¬†
+ Fun experiences to suit any backpacker or solo traveller. Walking tours, yoga, pub crawls and more¬†
+ Join a Roamies group tour to explore iconic destinations while staying in the world‚Äôs best hostels¬†
¬†
Packed with plenty of perks¬†
+ FREE cancellation available on all hostel bookings (we know travel plans can change)¬†
+ Use your location to easily find the perfect hostel stay near you¬†
+ Browse accommodation photos and view your future room¬†
+ Get access to your booking info 24/7 with or without internet access¬†
+ See where you‚Äôve been on the interactive ‚ÄòMy Map‚Äô feature¬†
+ Get inspired by our ‚ÄòTop Destination‚Äô feature and discover the best hostels in London, Amsterdam, Barcelona, Bangkok and more for a backpacking adventure or a gap year abroad¬†
¬†
Hostels for anyone, anywhere!¬†
¬†
Literally, anyone‚Ä¶¬†
+ Whether you‚Äôre a veteran backpacker, travelling around the world on a budget¬†
+ A gap year student on your first ever backpacking trip¬†
+ A solo traveller making friends in every corner of the world¬†
+ A group tour sharing crazy adventures together¬†¬†
+ Looking for cheap vacations, budget holidays or an epic backpacking trip¬†
¬†
Almost anywhere‚Ä¶¬†
+ Our easy-to-use travel app offers you the biggest choice of accommodation at the best prices, with exclusive travel deals¬†
+ Find accommodation across 180 countries worldwide¬†
+ Hostels on the beach, in the city, even in the jungle¬†
+ Book accommodation all over the world in an instant¬†
+ Book whenever, from wherever. Whether you‚Äôre backpacking in Thailand or exploring Italy, the USA or Spain‚Ä¶ Access to the world‚Äôs best hostels, 24/7!¬†‚Ä®¬†

‚ÄúHostels are the best way to travel and Hostelworld is the best way to find them.‚Äù - Elite Daily¬†
¬†
Want more travel tips and inspiration?¬†
For travel tips and backpacking inspiration, check out our blog and follow us on social media.¬†¬†
+ Hostelworld Blog¬†
+ Instagram¬†
+ TikTok¬†
+ Facebook¬†
+ Twitter¬†
+ Pinterest¬†
+ YouTube¬†
¬†
Please take a moment to review us on the App Store. Your feedback helps us improve our service for millions of travellers worldwide.¬†
releaseNotes: This version contains performance improvements and bug fixes.
reviews:
This app is really helpful for finding hostels in lots of locations with helpful reviews. However, the UX of the app is pretty terrible in my opinion. The search feature is inconvenient as you must select dates, # of guests, etc. What if I just want to see what my options are quickly? I shouldn‚Äôt have to fill out all of my trip details to see what hostels exist in a given location. Selecting dates and guest should be an option after you search a city. The wishlist feature is also not as helpful as it could be. I can‚Äôt figure out how to remove anything from a wishlist, and you can‚Äôt book directly from the wishlist- you have to find the hostel again through the annoying search. Not helpful. You also can‚Äôt edit a booking, only cancel and re-book (and they hold your deposit as long as they want to üòí) I think this app could be great with some improvements, but for now I only use it to find hostels and I book directly on their site. | Hostelworld has great options, and information.
It‚Äôs a pleasure to use this site.
Sincerely | Great app for finding hostels. Maybe a few updates to consider in the near future, when I done writing my review there‚Äôs no button to submit only to X out and deletes the review I was writing. The option to search and filter the reviews by multiple layers for example, female, age group 25-30, December 2023. | Great prices! | A friend referred me to this app as he had used it in his travels. I too highly recommend this app. I have had an overall wonderful experience with the app. Not only was I able to find hostels in *most* all the areas I wanted, I was also able to find things to do in the surrounding areas, at great prices might I add too. The only downside to the app on my end is I keep running into latency issues and app crashes. I have tried restarting the app and changing VPN settings and even turning my VPN off, ensuring the app is up to date, etc etc. the app still tends to lag a bit at random when my connect is fine otherwise on every other app in my phone. Then every now and then the app will crash. I still highly recommend this app, however, looking forward to figuring out this latency and crashing issue at some point. | Absolutely nuts trying to get any help with their product. I only use as a last resort. For the love of god, do not change your email address with them. They make it so hard. | Es un buen aplicativo seguro confiable que te brinda muchas opciones. | Nonstop popup notifications from chat rooms inside the app! | If a very poorly rated hostel gets a single 10 star review in a 6month period than that hostel will show up as 10 stars. You need to be very aware of what you are booking and read the reviews because it could appear as a 10 star hostel when in actuality they are as low as a 5 or 6 star (these are always dirty and disgusting even though hostelworld describes a hostel with a ‚Äúfailing‚Äù rating as ‚Äúgood‚Äù). So this makes the booking process more complicated instead of easier and puts you at great risk | I‚Äôve been with HW since its early days and have always supported the ease of booking through them. Lately their customer service seems to be going downhill and their turning into a megacorp. It is sad to see but seems true after my recent interactions with them. They make it more difficult to contact them and try to give you boilerplate responses‚Ä¶ book directly with properties when you can. | I have been trying to get a hold of hostel world staff about a reservation. There‚Äôs no number to call and they are quick to end the conversation over email. I will not be booking with this app again, I will be booking directly with the hostel. I am outraged with how poorly the communication works through this app. | I haven‚Äôt stayed yet | Makes life easier, more efficient and trusted for hostels.. the best | Started a dispute for a $400 charge to my account, they literally left me hanging with my request, and the hostel didnt even bother to reach out | I tried to change the dates of my trip (reduce the days) and hostelworld does not give me the option to change the dates, only cancel outright. I‚Äôm worried I‚Äôm about to be out hundreds of dollars.. | A website pops up after pressing the login button and there‚Äôs nowhere to put your username and password. Really embarassing | Easy to book great hostels. | So far easy to use and well organized | The cellular app doesn‚Äôt let me select Lets Go after I add how many guests | Don‚Äôt bother - booked wrong room and denied it even tho the room they said I booked had a different price and didn‚Äôt agree with what hostel said I booked. Also found same room for less with flexible terms and breakfast for less on booking They literally don‚Äôt care | Great app! Works all over the place! | Very user friendly and very descriptive. Reviews are key and even has a chat for travelers. | Cheap prices but they do not care about their customers! If you get unlucky and something happens, don‚Äôt count on them, even if you‚Äôre a loyal customer. Twice they let me down. The first: a hostel asked me to email them my card info before arrival despite making a deposit through Hostelworld. I‚Äôve stayed at dozens of hostels and was never asked for my card info prior to arrival. It seemed suspicious, so I asked them to have HostelWorld notify me directly if an action is needed. Instead, they canceled my reservation a few days before I arrived and HostelWorld wouldn‚Äôt refund my deposit. I had to book another place for 2x the price due to short notice. Second: Myself and two others were robbed within 1 week in the same hostel. I was robbed twice. The reception could have been more helpful by looking at hallway footage but said it would take too long! I left a factual & honest review for the hostel, warning others of the theft in respectful language, and HostelWorld deleted my review. | Hostel Makes a small globe comfortable and affordable. What more could one ask for? Happy New Year! | When I try to login via the app it redirects me to page to download app‚Ä¶then nothing happens | My reservations on Hostelworld app don‚Äôt show up later on the app.
I do receive an email from H confirming the reservation and another email from the hostel confirming the reservation. | I‚Äôve had the time of my life every time I‚Äôve traveled to Europe and Israel thanks to the easy and clean way to find accommodations! Thank again for all the help! | Every time I open the app it opens the browser and redirects me to the App Store. It‚Äôs annoying. | I have used this app in the early days and I still found it easy to use it‚Äôs platform! Over the years it has helped me so much to meet new people and see what‚Äôs around the area. Super helpful for solo Travelers and group travelers. A good heads up is that when you book anything here, it‚Äôs only reserving the space note that you will have to pay the rest when you check in. | why is the chat feature not working? nothing is loading | I keep getting redirected to redownload the app on the sign up page and when i click the link to ‚Äúopen app‚Äù it takes me to the app store. when i click the ‚Äúopen‚Äù option in the app store it takes me back to the same to options to ‚Äúdownload app from app store‚Äù or ‚Äúopen app‚Äù. it‚Äôs very frustrating since i‚Äôm trying to book something soon. | Great except for the utter lack of customer support these days. They seem to have axed the entire department and rely almost solely on automated emails pre-written responses in their help section. Good luck if you have any real issues. Booking 3rd party means any and all issues have to go through their customer support rather than the hostel‚Äôs. So youre boned if you need help | Pois eles indicam gosteis p√©ssimos na foto √© uma coisa mas a realidade outra | Thank you so much for making it easy to find last minute accommodation | Unfair booking policy‚Äôs with a hard to navigate app. Basically selected the correct dates however the app for some reason booked for the wrong month. Canceled minutes later however the fee was non refundable. I would recommend using hostel world to look at hostel reviews then googling the hostel and booking directly to save on the fee that Hostelworld charges. | Having the worst time of my life getting ahold of customer service to cancel my reservation and it won‚Äôt pop up in the app‚Ä¶ sooo??? | If in Denver, do it! Comfy beds, great staff, super clean and everything you need | The app is very slow and glitchy. Other than that the app is great | I have never been let down/disappointed by Hostelworld. From Israel to Thailand to Rome, I‚Äôve had consistently good experiences booking with ease through Hostelworld. Other travelers leave useful reviews and pictures are consistent with the actual hostels. I highly recommend this app, even for people who usually stay in hotels as sometimes private rooms in hostels are just as nice! | Why? | Won‚Äôt let me sign in, any attempt to create an account is not working either. | ‰∏≠‰ªãÂÖ¨Âè∏Ôºå‰∏çËÉΩÂèñÊ∂à‰∏çËÉΩÊîπÈ¢ÑÂÆö„ÄÇÁúüÁâõ | I have been using this for years but my last reservation was unpleasant. Both the hostel (Podshare Los Angeles) and the booking details in the Hostelworld app stated that CHARGES DUE UPON ARRIVAL (except for the Hostelworld fee which is billed as a deposit up front in order to secure reservation). I was charged in full by the hostel the same day. I have screenshots. Hostelworld customer service was useless and so was Podshare. | Ive tried logging in a million times, this app is a nightmare!!! It just keeps taking me back to the app store to download the app which i was already on in the first place!!!!!!!!!!! I even updated my phone thinking that could be the problem but no this app is just ridiculous | The app is extremely slow and buggy. It takes a few seconds to load anything in the app which can be extremely annoying when just checking things quickly. Lots of performance issues. When you open up a page of who is staying at your hostel, it must try and load every single person in the list at once rather than lazy loading. So, when I try to view a list of the 80 people staying at my hostel, the app freezes for a good 30 seconds before even showing the list. The messaging functionality is also extremely buggy and every chat is filled with ‚ÄúIs anyone else solo traveling?‚Äù, followed by a message like ‚ÄúI didn‚Äôt mean to send that‚Äù because everyone accidentally hits the quick chat things. | Messaging functionality is extremely buggy. Jittery scrolling, slow loading of messages. It‚Äôs almost unusable. Otherwise a great app | Wish I could use the app but it won‚Äôt allow me to sign in, even after deleting and reinstalling. I contacted customer service but they said they don‚Äôt know what the problem is. | I‚Äôm new to international travel, and to hostels as well. This app takes the hassle out of finding a suitable place to stay, regardless of what you‚Äôre looking for. Hostelworld‚Äôs straightforward user interface and built-in social network make it fun to use as well. I can easily connect with other travelers with similar interests wherever I go. This app willinstantly add value to your travel experience! ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è | Best value | This is a great resource to start off your search for hostels in wherever part of the world you‚Äôll be traveling in. But after that, just book at the actual hostel‚Äôs website. It‚Äôs a few more clicks (and i believe the shrugging you might have) but you‚Äôll save yourself a few bucks. Who knows, that what my takeaway would be üò≠

title: Vrbo Vacation Rentals
description:
Stay with Vrbo to get more stays. Introducing One Key, the first loyalty program from any major vacation rentals platform. One Key is a loyalty program that rewards you no matter how you travel. You‚Äôll earn rewards across Vrbo, Expedia, and Hotels.com, and you can redeem those rewards the next time you book an eligible vacation home, flight, a hotel, car rentals, and more. 
Whether you‚Äôre looking for an A-frame, a beach house, or a condo, it‚Äôs on Vrbo. Find the place for you and your people. 

‚Ä¢ EARN OneKeyCash‚Ñ¢ and use it across Vrbo, Expedia, and Hotels.com¬†
‚Ä¢ SEARCH for unique places to stay in 190+ countries 
‚Ä¢ PLAN and collaborate with your people using Trip Boards and group chat
‚Ä¢ BOOK securely from your phone or tablet
‚Ä¢ TRAVEL anywhere and share trip details with your group


With the Vrbo app, you can:

EARN
‚Ä¢ One Key is the first loyalty program from a major vacation rentals platform.
‚Ä¢ Book and earn rewards on vacation rentals.
‚Ä¢ Use OneKeyCash across Expedia, Vrbo, and Hotels.com. 

SEARCH
‚Ä¢ Browse private vacation homes complete with pools, backyards, and more. 
‚Ä¢ Find unique vacation homes not listed on other platforms. 
‚Ä¢ Filter by preference: price, location, amenities, and more.
‚Ä¢ See property photos and reviews at a glance.
‚Ä¢ Have questions about a property? Get quick answers from our virtual assistant. 
 
PLAN
‚Ä¢  Tap the heart icon to save and compare your favorites easily. 
‚Ä¢  Invite friends and family to join your Trip Board.
‚Ä¢  Leave comments and vote for your favorite properties.
‚Ä¢  Keep your trip conversations in one place and chat with your group in real-time from anywhere. 
 
BOOK
‚Ä¢ Have questions? Message the owner or manager to ask about the property.
‚Ä¢ Book and pay securely on the Vrbo app with your credit card.

TRAVEL
‚Ä¢ Quickly access important booking details like check-in instructions, WiFi passwords, and arrival information, even when offline.
‚Ä¢ Share important trip details with your people by adding them to your trip.
‚Ä¢ Access your conversations and message homeowners from your device anytime

Find the perfect vacation rentals with Vrbo.

Note: currency is displayed as USD in the property listings unless otherwise noted. Please visit www.vrbo.com/mobile for more information about the Vrbo app.
releaseNotes: We continue to update our app to help you find your perfect vacation home.
reviews:
We booked a VRBO for one night walking distance to NRG stadium in Houston to watch a Rolling Stones concert. We made the booking in early February and it was an instant confirmation booking. 42 days later the host cancels on us, claiming that they had another reservation. I went back to VRBO, and the property is listed for rent on the same date for $100 more. I talked to Vrbo multiple times, and they confirm that this is a bad practice but would do nothing to get the host to honor the original reservation. Instead, they‚Äôre trying to get me to book another property. I went back to booking reputable hotels. So long cheaters! | Required $59 insurance against property damage or refundable (at owners discretion) $1500 fee against damage, for four senior citizens staying for one night is uncalled for. | Easy to use and find great properties where we need them. | This condo is beautiful!!! Very clean with all new modern amenities. The living room looks right out onto the Banana River. There are docks  with the use of kayaks. It  is in a lovely quiet neighborhood. A short walk to the Coco Beach golf course and aquatic club. The Aquatic club has a beautiful 50 meter swimming pool, for us lap swimmers a real gem. We walked downtown in the evening to the restaurants. The public beach park is a short drive from the house with plenty of parking. We really enjoyed staying here and hope to return! | Received request for lengthy stay. Preapproved the request. Potential guest messages requesting direct contact to their email and phone number and that I accept payment in form of a mailed check. I declined this arrangement he suggested and contacted VRBO. Phone tech reported there was no way to know if the account was a real person or fraudulent. Reported had no way to contact account owner. Reported had no way to transfer my call to someone else that could accomplish those things. Clearly VRBO does not take fraudulent accounts seriously, which means they don‚Äôt take VRBO property owners protection against fraud seriously. 
This in addition to the fact that you charge higher fees than your competitor who DOES vet potential guests - I‚Äôm not sure that this is an app we will continue to utilize in the future. Disappointed is an understatement. | My biggest problem | This resort needs major updates!    Hot tub was broken the past 3 days.  Pools were cold and in need of refinishing.   Only 1 bartender at pool bar.   2 of the 4 elevators were broken.   People were stuck in it for 1/2 hour.  Front desk people were rude, especially Kyhon Flynt.   They let the teenagers run the place and when we complained he didn‚Äôt care.  He needs to be fired!  Old dirty carpet in hallway.   Our room was filthy, the balcony hadn‚Äôt been cleaned in years.   The balcony chairs were old and rusty.   The dining room chairs were falling apart.  The chair cushions and living room furniture was wore out and filthy.  The kitchen had an orange countertop from the 70‚Äôs.  The tub faucet was broken.   The water pressure was very poor.   The pots and pans were mis matched and handles falling off.  Very disappointing experience!   We won‚Äôt be back! | We had a wonderful stay at Cindie‚Äôs condo. Everything needed was there, and we relaxed on the deck and enjoyed the views and beaches. Wrapped up each day looking at the stars. | This was an amazing place to stay! | I am only wanting one email for my account and a password that is strong with a code check . Please every time. Thank You üòä | Spent a week in this condo.  Nicely appointed.  Brought too many clothes!  Owners care that you enjoy your time there! | The home was beautiful and clean. It was wonderful to be so close to the ocean‚Äîto wake up and go to sleep to the sound of ocean waves!  You may even see dolphins passing by. | We‚Äôve book and signed up using this site for the first time and overall site experience is poor at best. Can‚Äôt find our stay even after contacting support. I would not recommend this site nor do we plan to use in the future. | Many families visiting Puerto Rico stay in San Juan. Staying in this very clean home in Rio Grande we felt very safe. I cannot put in words how safe and relaxed we felt in this house.  Do not be afraid to venture out away from the hotels. Food trucks nearby with great food. Affordable prices for food and large enough portions to share.  People are super friendly. Host for house are the sweetest couple and really care about your comfort and enjoyment of Puerto Rico. They were always timely to respond to questions and help with any needed support. This home is a great location too many areas you will want to visit. It is close to National Forest, Family Adventure Park, beaches, and Old San Juan. Walmart and pharmacies close by too. I plan to visit Puerto Rico again and this would be a house I would stay in again. | This is a great place - if you are staying longer than a day or two you will need to get all the basics. | The unit was fine, cute and good location on the beach.  But the neighbors were smoking marijuana and we could not step foot onto the balcony because it smelled so bad. | The app constantly froze. 
Can‚Äôt do anything with it. | It‚Äôs a great location with oceanfront views of the beach and great views of the resort. Would definitely use the unit again. | I booked a hotel in Costa Rica for my honeymoon and got the hotel canceled by the owner after payment I contacted customer support and after three hours of being on the line still the issue is not resolved. They are trying to put me in one star and a half and two star hostel,because there are no more hotels in the area. I already booked activities that last me the whole day and they booked me one night and told me to figure out the second night and I will have to switch off hotels that doesn‚Äôt work as the time of the switch I will be on an activity. This has been the worst experience I‚Äôve ever ever had currently I‚Äôm still working on the case. My honeymoon is tomorrow and nothing is resolved. I tried to keep getting escalated, but the call centers are on the other side of the world. They say their escalations department are not in yet. | Location is fantastic and the space is clean and well kept.  The management was easy to deal with and we had no issues.  Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for location/hot tub and comfort! | I love VRBO. I‚Äôve had several successful bookings. However, the app has changed for the worse over the years. It is slow and cumbersome now. Open the app‚Ä¶slow. Login‚Ä¶slow. Multi factor authentication‚Ä¶slow. Property search‚Ä¶slow. Frustrating experience. The extra ‚ÄúOne Key‚Äù (Expedia and Hotels alliance) screens seem to exacerbate the suffering performance of the application. | I rented a home for a week in Mexico Beach Florida for 4/2025
The host cancelled it on me because they use the home that week but now I‚Äôm having a very hard time to get the insurance money back that I paid.
Check before you get caught up in this mess!!
Unhappy traveler | Easy to book with confidence | Great house, very clean. Only concern was with the warning about getting charged if we got makeup on towels wash clothes or linens, only then to see makeup stains on linens when we arrived( they had been washed). I wasn‚Äôt charged but I worried one of us would get makeup on a a wash cloth which seems like the purpose of a wash cloth. Other than this, all was great! | Loved the house. It was just like being at home. Well stocked with things you usually don‚Äôt find at a rental.  Easy check in and out. Easy keyless entry. The only suggestion we would make is the mattress in the bedroom on the main floor has seen it‚Äôs better days and lighting in this room was poor. The sofas were comfortable and plenty of towels and extras. Thanks for a wonderful stay and Thank you Maine for giving us one last big snow storm. | We loved the location as it was away from the touristy places and we had a car to take us wherever we wanted for the day.  We could go right outside our patio and snorkel and then hit up the local grocery store or restaurants like Calypso or Kaibo (Tuesday nights are great).  Barefoot beach was our favorite isolated and the most amazing coral. The place was clean, convenient and had everything we needed to feel at home for 5 days. | I cannot say enough good things about this VRBO.  First, the location is perfect.  We could walk everywhere.  We were four couples, old friends, so the four king bedrooms each with a bath were perfect.  We did not use the twin bed room, but it would be great for kids or singles in the same room.

Some of us have knee troubles, so the elevator was so appreciated, as well as the four designated parking spaces!

The living space was large and beautiful and clean. Though we had trouble with the TV, Gina was quick to respond and it was fixed quickly.  The kitchen was well equipped and spacious.  Best of all was the rooftop terrace.  We spent a lot of time up there, talking and enjoying cocktails with a view.

This was a pricey choice, but worth every penny.

Thank you Gina for a great stay in beautiful Savannah! | I literally canceled my reservation 10 minutes after I booked and a week later still have not received my refund! | Our trip here for Spring Break was perfect.  We actually asked to rent the house one extra day.  Luckily for us nobody else was booked to stay the next day at our house!
The lake was mostly frozen, so there was nothing to do on the lake but look out and be mesmerized.  The house was very accommodating besides needing more towels.  This house is very dated, but does not affect your stay.  Mostly on outside back wall!
Other then that it is a beautiful little set up and we plan on coming back during summer next time to see it in a different way. | You cannot search by property number. Not user friendly. Only a basic search by city and travel dates. | This is a review for their 3rd party travel protection. Poor communication, unclear verbiage. Literally never purchase it. I‚Äôm out my entire Vrbo after needing to cancel for reason out of my control. And after purchasing travel insurance. So I‚Äôm out  cost of my Vrbo as well as the additional cost of the travel insurance. | Intuitive and easy to navigate | San Miguel is one of the most beautiful, peaceful, tranquil places I have ever experienced!  The space is incredible!  The views are spectacular!  The owner is fabulous!  We had everything we needed, and, if not, Marci was very quick to fix that!  The place feels like you are on an island far away from the hustle and bustle of the rest of the world, but, if you need something, it is not far to go to get it!  Highly recommend!!! | It has gotten better though, amazingly it‚Äôs still this bad. | I have only used the other vacation app, but enjoyed using VRBO. I will use it again!

The fees seemed a little higher, although it may be because of the location | The 4br condo was excellent. Pretty new and very clean. Location was slightly remote, but a golf cart rental got us around town and was a lot of fun!  Only negative with the condo was two small items. Ice machine in frig did not work and oddly they had no bowls in the kitchen. Neither a bid deal. 

Nice bay view from the balcony and the pool area was really nice. 

Highly recommend Kim‚Äôs Kuban as a local breakfast sandwich spot. Really good and fairly close by. | We stayed a property in Sugar Mountain,NC beds were all super dirty no one would come out and reclean or call us back. Was told we would be refunded part of the money and that never happened. | I get many email notifications but they direct you to the APP. From there it is difficult to navigate. | Don‚Äôt use Vrbo because they do not sync their calendars up with other travel apps, causing double bookings, and then having your reservation canceled four hours before your arrival | Condo has everything I Needed for a comfortable Stay!! | Can‚Äôt get help for days!!! Airbnb is where I will go back to | Great time by all.  Great views. | Very clean and enough room for the whole family.  We had a great stay!! | Stop, please!!! | I don‚Äôt know what‚Äôs going on with this app suddenly. I‚Äôve never had issues before and now it keeps freezing and refreshing and doesn‚Äôt show results of searches. I‚Äôve tried uninstalling/reinstalling and done several hard refreshes on my apple phone. None of this has helped. | Nine old neighbors/friends met in hopes of finding joy, peace and happiness. Mission accomplished. Paradise on the Strand was exactly what we hoped for. It had cozy king sized beds, private bathrooms for each couple, quality linens, thoughtfully supplied in baths, kitchen and games, and a view that cannot be beat. We had so many wonderful moments on the upper and lower decks, around the ample dining table and cooking together in the great kitchen. We enjoyed the sound of the tides coming in and out, watching surfers grab a ride, and taking walks along the Strand to the end of the pier, restaurants and shops. In short, we had an amazing time. 

Monique was wonderful to work with and was quick to reply to our needs. This house - Paradise on the Strand - could not have been better named. | Can‚Äôt log in due to onekey ad! | The house was clean, spacious, and had everything we needed. Close to town and Ski Cooper. Games and Roku TV for everyone. Plus a bit of space to spread out. Backyard would have fun if the weather was warmer!  Would recommend to families!  Had a great time!  Thanks! | The owners Kim And Ian greeted me hello at day one‚Ä¶nearly 3 months ago, after traveling  from the USA just after Christmas in 2023 - with an intent of re- grounding myself, having spent decades in the corporate world on a global stage and raising two amazing adult daughters.

From the moment I walked into the cottage I knew I was at home - in part, because Kim and Ian made me feel immediately at home. They asked what I was needing in life at the moment and molded their approach to me accordingly. 

They are enormously graceful hosts, who know the balance of leaving people to do their thing, and are yet seamlessly always there if they‚Äôre needed. They are what I call, amazing hosts‚Ä¶Never intrusive but always available. 

They have made me feel like I was the most important person in the world‚Ä¶. although reading the guestbook on the cottage further led me to believe they collectively have an enormous capacity to do this for many. They are that good.

If you want to take respite in a place that is a bit magical with the stream rippling in the backyard as you sleep amidst a quiet, graceful interior design each night. Then this cottage for you.

With all my heart thank you, Kim And Ian! | I‚Äôd like to be able to search by a keyword not just location & number of people.

title: Roadtrippers - Trip Planner
description:
Are you ready to turn your road trip into an epic adventure? Roadtrippers is the #1 road trip planning app in the U.S. and Canada, with more than 38 million trips planned to date covering more than 42 billion miles. Whether you‚Äôre looking for an RV trip planner or just mapping out your next road trip, build your route in Roadtrippers and then use our turn-by-turn navigation to lead the way.

Explore millions of places, like local diners and quirky roadside attractions, or scenic points, national parks, and hotels. Get inspiration from our pre-made trip guides of some of the most interesting and once-in-a-lifetime routes you need to see at least once. No matter where you are, you‚Äôre always minutes away from something amazing!

Use Roadtrippers‚Äô free features to map out routes with three stops or less. And when you‚Äôre ready to take on bigger adventures, simply upgrade your membership to add up to 150 stops per trip and unlock other premium features like RV-friendly GPS navigation, members-only discounts, offline maps, trip collaboration access, customized map styles, and more!

Plus, any trips you‚Äôve saved or places you love will sync automatically across devices, and you can use CarPlay to easily navigate your route once you hit the road.

Note: Our content and coverage is currently focused in the USA and Canada only. Continued use of GPS running in the background can decrease battery life.

Terms of use: https://roadtrippers.com/tos
Privacy policy: https://roadtrippers.com/privacy-policy
releaseNotes:
We‚Äôre making it easier to find the perfect campground for your next trip!
‚Ä¢ Read campground reviews from other campers packed with lots of extra information just for RVers.
‚Ä¢ Find more than 150,000 new campground reviews on our map.
‚Ä¢ Overlay public land, cell coverage, and wildfire smoke on our map.
‚Ä¢ You have lots of new ways to filter your campgrounds on our map including cell service and elevation.
Happy camping!
reviews:
gotta get a subscription for more than one place on the route bruh | Turn by turn directions are inconsistent and  not enough lead time to make turns.   Does not appear to be Apple phone compatible | I find it difficult to use! | This was acceptable at $30/mth for access to 3 different apps, but when you only camp 6 times a year for it to double its cost for the same functionality, then tier off the value of the app with functions that brought you to the app in the first place is just price gouging. | This is a really good app. Definitely recommend it. Mostly an easy way to put a trip together, plan stops, construct a map. I would give it 5 stars except for a few very frustrating things that drag this app down. And could easily be fixed. I do understand that maybe it‚Äôs user error, but ‚Ä¶ When you are on a trip, you open the trip and it goes to your current location in Map View. However, when you open the List View for that trip, why doesn‚Äôt it go to your current location instead of starting from day one and you have to scroll all the way down until you find what you‚Äôre looking for. The way dates are managed is a complete nightmare. Changing the dates of an entire trip is such a hassle. And you cannot plan a trip without dates as once you add your first date, the app puts every single waypoint on a separate date!! Who thought that was a good idea?! You can add things that are not on the map already, but you can only add an address, you cannot label the address as to what it is. There are a lot of things that are not included on the map that I would like to add to my trips. And label with a name. This app is not a standalone app. You need other sources to complete the picture. Especially because there is a blue line indicating your route that completely covers up the highway numbers. Highway numbers are essential to trip planning. Also, can you update the gas pricing? It‚Äôs no where near accurate. And organize the trips into past and upcoming/future? | G Maps and this nav system come up with  same routes which is not conducive for RVs.  The previous togo rv nav system was way better | Not easy to start navigation - ridiculously hard to do. | Interesting app. Paid the $60 fee and used it for a single road trip. Was pretty useful at setting up driving routes and ranges, similar to the old AAA TripTik. Found some good restaurants and museums along the way. 

But it has mediocre UI/UX. It dumps a bunch of OTHER people‚Äôs road adventures into the place where you store yours. Whenever you open it, you have to go digging for the trip(s) you‚Äôre working on because Roadtrippers figures you more likely want to see what others have done in an area you aren‚Äôt even visiting and that‚Äôs more important than your own trip! 

Think about asking a friend to hand you your hammer and instead they hand you random other tools in your box until eventually your hammer shows up. And they repeat that over and over. Wouldn‚Äôt be relying on that friend for help, even worse if I were paying them. And that‚Äôs how I feel about the experience of Roadtrippers- $60 a year to have it throwing up random adventures from other people when I bought it to focus on my own trip(s) is absurd. I can find plenty of these types of stories in more detail on YouRube or other websites- I‚Äôm paying for this subscription for a ‚Äúprofessional‚Äù tool that focuses on MY road trips. Far too much noise and clunky navigation. 

The reason it went from a 3-star experience to a 1-star rating: apparently it‚Äôs rigged to make it impossible or near impossible to turn off the subscription. You follow a link from the app to log into their website, go to ‚Äúmanage subscription‚Äù or ‚Äúturn off auto renewal,‚Äù and it takes you to yet again ANOTHER website for a company called ‚ÄúStripe.‚Äù And does ‚ÄúStripe‚Äù let you manage your subscription or turn off auto renewal? NOPE. Stripe wants you to put in your email and they claim they will ‚Äúsend a link‚Äù so you can log in. And the link is good for 30 minutes. BUT- the link never arrives. Tried it twice. So, Roadpass/tripper and Stripe have apparently designed a rat trap where they can claim to let you turn off auto renewal, but there is no way to do so. 

Come the end of my subscription and if they try charging again, it‚Äôll be an instant chargeback with my bank. These sorts of schemes need to be called out for the fraud they are. And Apple may need to be advised this is going on behind the scenes, even though it‚Äôs a useful app, the trickery in preventing cancellation is abhorrent. | I was on auto renew. The price last year was 29.99 for unlimited plans with unlimited stops. It renewed for 35.99. Five more dollars, OK. But for three trips with 20 stops each. All the trios except for one have a lock sign on them, so the app isn‚Äôt even registering that I am a paying customer. There was no notice or email that the plan was changing. And of course no refunds. Will NOT be renewing | Used this app for the first time and it DID NOT take us to our Destination. Don‚Äôt trust it now and won‚Äôt use it again. Good thing my Trailer is on the small side or I would have had issues. | Killer app just learn how to used this app and it is worth every penny | This is annoying. I have logged out and logged back into my account but cannot see the trip I created on my desktop computer through the phone app. The phone app is not recognizing my user name or email and will not allow me to update it. Spent $60 on the annual membership for the premium package. | roadtrippers and campendium are supposed to be merged, but there is no campendium info here. | Very hard to understand what you actually have access to. Tried to sign up for all 4 apps but found out I only got Roadtrippers not Togo and Campendium like I wanted
Dallas Willard | Seems like developers might have forgotten about this project? I put in a 1,200 mile road trip and it couldn‚Äôt find a single gas station, a single hotel, almost anything really. It found 3 major historic land marks that almost everyone in the world has heard of‚Ä¶ so whats the point of this app then? And you want people to pay for something as well? It‚Äôs scary to see junk like this being advertised. Seriously, I feel like i‚Äôm living in the movie idiocracy sometimes. | Wow, I couldn‚Äôt even figure out how to use this app before I ran out of free tries and they wanted me to pay for the upgrade. Why do they assume you want to plan a trip starting from your house? I wanted to find out what things there were to do once I leave Austin on my way to Marfa in a couple of months. It kept putting my current location there and wouldn‚Äôt let me search between two points any other way. That‚Äôs how I lost all my free whatever they called them. Boo for this app. They don‚Äôt even explain how to use it properly! Nowhere at all do they explain me what I need to do. Going to delete it from my device! | Paid for a year because it looked like a cool app to help plan trips. I‚Äôve wasted so much time trying to learn it and never managed to get a trip planned. Most reviews on destinations are over 5-10 years old. Regretting paying for this!! Back to square one! | Whatever | The app as soon as you creat a account, you can‚Äôt do anything with a ‚Äúupgrade‚Äù I‚Äôd rather use Apple Maps. If I could give it a lower rating I would. | They bought some really good products and managed to screw them up . Overnight camping worked great now its almost worthless and some how most of the sights have disappeared overnight, pun intended | It appears that the subscription plans have changed, but I was still billed automatically for a tier that no longer provides access to my trips. I was auto billed $35.99 to renew my subscription, but now I can only view 2 of my trips. When I click on a lock icon covering all of my other trips, it prompts me to upgrade for an additional $50. I‚Äôve used this app for years, but no longer feel I can trust it. I‚Äôm out. | Best App ever for road trips | Please resurrect the standalone Campendium app. I don‚Äôt want or like RoadTrippers and fine the interface and review layout bloated and unhelpful. Campendium was clean and straightforward, achieving the goal of allowing me to easily find, judge, and choose campgrounds. Please admit your error and resurrect Campendium! | Very limited (Google map provides more for free) unless you pay their annual charge. | Are not visible once a trip is mapped. Can only see the type of highway‚Ä¶ interstate etc | This app has gone from 4 star to one star for me.  I am planning a trip now (February) for later this year and I cannot plan my route due to seasonal road closures.  The roads I need to take will be open during spring and summer months but I cannot plan my route now.   On top of this now the price goes up to $35 year.   I like this app but it is now not useful for me.   Especially now that the price is going up and I cannot plan my road trip.  I will be stopping my payment renewal. | Got road trippers so I could find camp grounds to stay over nightFirst time I go to use it I find out you have to have premium to find camp grounds | What happened???! Now you want to charge me even more for more trips and more stops? This makes me very upset - I went from unlimited access and now all my past trips are locked up and my current planning cannot add more stops because I‚Äôve reached 20 stops??!   WHAT??!! I LOVED Roadtrippers before this, but you‚Äôve lost a customer. I‚Äôve canceled my subscription. | Please fix the issue with the road numbers being hidden under the route lines on planned trips! | If you‚Äôre planning a road trip in Ireland, don‚Äôt bother with this application. | Love the app and how easy it is to add stops and find places to see. However, the exit and road numbers need to show on TOP of the blue route line. Cannot see the exit and road numbers and end up opening a different map app to see them. | I saved my own trip map long time ago, now I wanted to check it and I can‚Äôt, because I have to pay for membership to get my own information. I‚Äôd prefer delete the app with unexpected surprises. | We‚Äôve used Roadtrippers for a number of years & adventures with more on the way! Excellent for planning driving time/distance, discovering fun detours and exploring new places. We love the easy toggles for a quick change to turn off a waypoint and the ability to add dates to the route. All of our trips are saved with the year and name making it fabulously simple to look back with fond memories! YAY! | the options and features are promising but no matter how strong the WiFi and which browser i try everything loads like a black tank clogged with poop mountain | I used to love this app and used it a ton of times to plan our long road trips, but now it‚Äôs all glitchy and I keep getting error messages every time I try to add or remove a new waypoint. Very disappointing especially since I paid for the membership. | You can only add one stop and then you have to start paying for it. | Cannot get a live person to talk too. Roadtrippers did something to my account and can‚Äôt log on. And yes it‚Äôs good till December of 24. Had it for about 3 years and loved it till now. I guess time to find another vacation travel site. By contract, I have to keep Roadtrppers till December but I‚Äôm done | My dad showed me this app and now I‚Äôm hooked to plan out trips. Setting up is so easy to do and all the tools after playing around it‚Äôs really fun and easy to use | After Campendium was merged into this app i expected to see rich campground data like i did with Campendium premium. I won‚Äôt be renewing. | I have used Road Trippers for a few years. This renewal not only did the price increase, they made ‚Äútiers‚Äù! So while I paid $$ ($40 or so) it still has my trips I have spent months working on, locked for not paying for the ‚Äúpremium one‚Äù. Either I have to re start my road trips on a new app or pay road trippers even more money than I already paid for them to quit holding my trips hostage. 

I will never renew this subscription again due to this shady practice of theirs. It‚Äôs absolutely ridiculous and definitely not a way to keep people subscribing to your app. | This is my third and last year subscribing to this app.  When I went to renew this year, the price had almost doubled and instead of being allowed to plan 300 trips, I am only allowed to plan five.  So for $50 a year I can only keep 5 trips at a time, I didn‚Äôt understand that or I wouldn‚Äôt have renewed at all.  I used to put locations I would hear about in general trip for an area so that way I wouldn‚Äôt forget about the location when and if I was visiting the area but that‚Äôs no longer possible.  It‚Äôs a shame they had to get so greedy, this is no longer a good value for the money. | BEWARE:Roadtripper will lock you out of your trip, once you are part ways on your trip to force you to upgrade to their premium plan!  Not worth planning a trip with this app if it leaves you stranded.  I have a year subscription left, but will lose that money, since they locked me out half way through my trip. They are dirty bandits!!! | No customer service phone numbers only email which is frustrating when they have your account wrong yet they can‚Äôt figure it out. | Roadtrippers has ruined Campendium and I‚Äôm pretty bummed they will sunset that app for this crappy expensive one. I don‚Äôt care about road trip planning. I only care about finding campgrounds and Campendium did that in a straightforward way. I open the app, and there is a map using icons that make sense and are very legible. Could you at least steal the same interface from Campendium? And while I happily paid them $23.99/yr for that I won‚Äôt be paying a penny for Roadtripper when it renews in Sep ‚Äò24. And they want $60???!!!!! Also the emails have no instruction how to merge accounts. This is a horrible app merger functionally and financially. | To have used this app since around 2018/2019 and I have loved it, advocated for it and encouraged friends and family to upgrade for $30 per year. It was well worth it. I loved planning our trips, seeing fun things along the route and mapping out time. 

This year they doubled the price, I can no longer access all of those amazing trips I painstakingly spent hours creating. If you are going to increase the price you should at least be able to access the ones you previously planned without editing capabilities. I will no longer support or advocate for this app. What a disappointment. | If traveling in a country ar okay, but not if you have an Rv. | I plan an entire 14 trip into Canada and then log on and I have to pay a yearly payment to see the trip? What a waist of time, needless to say the features of app are lacking in general, POI‚Äôs aren‚Äôt even in the correct spot. What a stupid marketing plan to let people create a trip and then block them from seeing it unless they pay $49.99? Devs are clearly inexperienced and lacking basic app development skills. I‚Äôd suggest hiring a project manager with some experience in app rehabilitation. Good day, I‚Äôm gonna go find a better app. | I‚Äôm enjoying planning road trips on this. | Immediately starts pressing for upgrade and hinders the attempts to Delete the account | It has been now two years that I have made such amazing trips.
I have also recommend it to those who ask how I am making my vacation. Every year I make round trips . The best was Route 66. OMG what a trip that was. All because of being a member with Roadtrip.
From hotel reservations to visiting all the wonderful sights on the way.
Just write where, when and how many days you need.
If you want to make  the best vacation join RoadTripper. 
I‚Äôm 74 years old and it‚Äôs going to be my third year. If I can do it‚Ä¶‚Ä¶
Trust me you will have such a wonderful time designing your own trip.

title: MyTSA
description:
Named the Best Government Mobile App from the American Council for Technology and Industry Advisory Council, and earning TSA recognition as one of the Top 15 Government IT Innovators, ‚ÄúMyTSA‚Äù provides 24/7 access to information that passengers frequently request from TSA.

With ‚ÄúMyTSA‚Äù, you can:

+ Quickly search which items you can bring with you through the checkpoint onto the airplane.
+ Request live assistance from TSA through the AskTSA social media integration.
+ Check how historically busy the airport will be on your specific day and time of travel. 
+ Check crowd-sourced TSA security checkpoints wait times at the airport of your choice.
+ Add your own TSA security checkpoints wait time for others to see (NOTE: You must be at the airport in order to report wait times).
+ Check the delay information and current weather conditions at your favorite airports nationwide.
+ Consult the TSA Guide on how to prepare for and get through the security checkpoint quickly. 
+ Discover which airports and airlines support TSA PreCheck¬Æ, and learn how to sign-up.
releaseNotes: Bug fixes and improvements.
reviews:
It may show the average TSA times but is not accurate showing real time data. Do not rely on | The only reason you would download this app probably is to check security checkpoint wait times. And that‚Äôs where this falls the most short. 

It only gives an average wait time across the entire airport. At the minimum it should give times  per terminal. In  places like DFW where each Terminal has multiple security checkpoints, even more specific information is needed.

The funny thing is, some airport websites are able to give this information, so the data is available. Just not in this app. | I just downloaded this app but on searching for the airports I will be using no results come back. Location services are set to always | It does not update at all. | App won‚Äôt even load the list of airports, useless | This app does not recognize the names of any airports so you can‚Äôt use it. | Tried put 20 or more US international airports the app doesn‚Äôt recognize any | The app will
Not allow nor recognize any airports that I put in-
Philadelphia. Tampa, etc‚Ä¶
Very confusing- | This review has nothing to do with the app. It Hass to do with a total disregard for my belongings. My bag was searched, therefore lost in Philadelphia, and when I got it back, my bag was broken in five places, and all my belongings in my bag were thrown in like it was garbage, they even broke a very special oil that I have for my skin. I agree and understand that the bags have to be searched randomly, and I want that to be the case but to totally disrespect my personal items and throw my clothes and other items in like they had been tossed in the garbage can is unacceptable. | This app is ‚Äústuck‚Äù on download and I can‚Äôt stop it and it won‚Äôt restart | Over all, I would recommend the app. Currently there are some bugs that do need addressed. 
Example: if you go to the tab for ask TSA on the iPad, if you click on the tsa website. The app crashes. On a cellphone it goes to the website.
That is just one example. 
To me not being able to access what you need could be a problem. That is why I give 3 stars. | was flying out of atlanta and the wait times are not accurate. I would not rely on this app for wait times! from my experience it seems that the individual airport website may have more real time information. i almost missed my flight, since the wait was around an hour, and showed 15-30 min on the app! | I was hoping this app would tell me what time TSA precheck closes, but no such luck | Apparently this doesn‚Äôt locate airports in other countries. Couldn‚Äôt find Pearson located in Canada. | The app told me 0-15 minutes when I entered TSA. When I exited 45 minutes later the app still said 0-15 minutes. It is safe to assume that the same mouth breathers that work the checkpoints also do a terrible job maintaining their app. | App says Checkpoints 1 and 4 are open for TSA PreCheck, but both are closed and Checkpoint 1 doesn‚Äôt open until 4am according to an airport worker. | Shows generic wait times for security check (I.e. 5 minutes for TSA-pre and 25 minutes for regular)‚Ä¶ got to my flight at EWR and found TSA-pre CLOSED, and a 55 minute wait time for regular. Numerous people freaking out about possibly missing their flight. Better to delete the app and just arrive 2 hours early like 2019. | I downloaded this to see the wait time for security lines. It said 0-15 minutes. We waited at least 45. 
Instantly deleted the app. | Won‚Äôt let you post times! | Told me 0-15 minute wait. Took over 3 hours and missed my flight | There is nothing accurate about this app. | Great app very helpful | Why does TSA think that having the security wait times for the entire airport makes sense when it varies terminal by terminal? title: TravelPirates: Travel Deals
description:
Whether you‚Äôre looking for a last minute beach vacay, discounts on train tickets, rental cars, or cheap flights with a budget airline, TravelPirates has you covered! 

 ***Winner of World Travel Awards 2018***



How does the TravelPirates App work?

STEP 1 ‚Äì We find the best trips by identifying combinations of flights, hotels or vacation packages with the best price value
STEP 2 ‚Äì We post these travel deals on our TravelPirates App, including customization options such as departure airports, destinations, and travel dates
STEP 3 ‚Äì You book ‚Äì the faster the better as the best deals expire quickly!

What can you do on the TravelPirates App?

HOTTEST TRAVEL DEALS

Check out our latest deals to find the trip that best suits you! We always provide you with extensive information on destinations, prices, and accommodations. As we‚Äôve done all the hard work for you, you won‚Äôt have to research further. Simply click and book your dream vacation. The abundance of customization options regarding travel dates, departure airports, and destinations allows you to select the ones that suit your travel needs best.

TRAVEL DEAL CATEGORIES ‚Äì FLIGHTS, HOTELS, AND PACKAGES

Browse our travel categories to find the type of trip that you‚Äôre looking for. We have flight deals, hotel deals, vacation packages, and more! You can either have a look at our best deals across all categories or select the category that you‚Äôre interested in.

USE OUR SEARCH ENGINE TO FIND YOUR PERFECT TRIP

Haven‚Äôt found any travel deals for the destination you had in mind? Struggling to find a flight from your nearest departure airport? No worries! You can search for customized deals in the Booking section of the TravelPirates App. Search in our categories of Vacations, Flight + Hotel combinations, Flights only, Hotels only, and Rental Cars to find a trip that suits your needs.

TRAVEL ALERTS ‚Äì DON‚ÄôT MISS OUT ON YOUR DREAM VACATION

With our amazing travel alerts you'll never miss out on a deal again! This feature allows you to set up alerts based on your travel preferences. Simply choose your preferred destinations, departure airports, and budget. As soon as we find a deal that matches your requirements, we'll send you a notification.

USE THE FILTERS TO SEE TAILORED VACATION DEALS

If you have a clear idea of the trip you want, our filters will help you find the perfect vacation. For example, if you want to look at beach vacays in the Bahamas during July or low budget flights to New York City, then simply click on the filters and enter your requirements. You can filter by deal category, departure airport, destination and travel period.

THE TRAVELPIRATES APP CATERS TO ALL YOUR NEEDS

TravelPirates provides you with the best deals for cheap flights from well-known airlines including Delta, United, and Southwest.

We‚Äôll keep you updated on the latest travel deals, packages & last minute offers from renowned vendors, such as Expedia, Kayak or Skyscanner.

WE‚ÄôRE THERE FOR YOU

Have any questions about our app? Send us an e-mail at insert contact mail, we'll do our best to address your question as soon as possible!


Follow us on:
-Facebook www.facebook.com/Travelpirates
-Instagram www.instagram.com/travelpirates
-Twitter www.twitter.com/TravelPiratesUS

You can also sign up to receive our hottest deals via WhatsApp or FB Messenger: www.travelpirates.com/pages/whatsapp

Sign up for our newsletter and have the best vacation deals sent directly to your inbox: www.travelpirates.com/newsletter/subscribe

Are you a fan of our pirate app? Leave us a review in the App Store and tell us what you love about it!

So jump aboard our deal hunting pirate ship and book your perfect vacation today!

title: Cheap flights - WayAway
description:
Search for cheap airline tickets

- We analyze air tickets - we compare prices and layover options, finding the cheapest air tickets and the most convenient flight options (direct or with a comfortable layover).
- Searching for air tickets doesn't take much time - we filter and sort all the options for you. And you can buy cheap air tickets. How do you like the idea?
- You can subscribe to notifications about the cheapest air ticket, the most convenient one or the most direct flight (yes, this is possible as well). This way you can keep track of changes in the cost of plane tickets. As soon as the price changes, we will send you a notification.
- But these are not all of the subscriptions! You can also subscribe to the search for air tickets from your city and catch cheap tickets for a plane that flies in the most unexpected direction. What a surprise!
- We also have a "Price Schedule" - it helps you buy a cheap ticket if you are not tied to the departure date.
- And the "Price Map" - in case you have not yet decided on your destination. The map shows both domestic and international flights.
- We save the passengers' passport information so that next time booking a flight won't take much time.
- It's so comfortable to plan weekend trips with us, to fly on Saturday morning and to go back on Sunday evening.
- And maybe you want to see around during the stopover - we will tell you which option is the most convenient if you want to see another city during the trip (also this type of air tickets is cheaper).
- Our developers made app filters for any occasion, including for tickets with luggage and filtering for aircraft models.
- If you don't want to search for flights on exact dates, you can choose one or several months and we will find plane tickets in a given range.

By the way, it's not only plane tickets search. We can also search for:

- Accommodation with recommendations according to your interests: business trip, family, romantic, good for instagram and so on.
- Guided and self-guided tours.
- Cars and transfers to get from the airport to the hotel. And wherever else you want to go

Download the WayAway app now to start traveling and buy tickets.

*** The application from WayAway.com allows you to find the lowest possible cost of an air ticket. We do not sell anything, we help you find flights online with the best conditions.

Terms of use of the WayAway Plus subscription: https://wayaway.io/plus-terms-of-use

title: My Currency Converter & Rates
description:
My Currency Converter is the simplest, most beautiful currency converter you'll ever find. It supports over 150 different currencies from all around the world, ranging from the US Dollar to the Colombian Peso! It even supports BitCoin, LiteCoin and Dogecoin! If you're travelling, this really is a great app to use - you can find out how much your currency is worth in just a few short moments, even if you aren't connected to the internet!

FEATURES
- Over 150 currencies supported.
- One of the first converters to support BitCoin, LiteCoin and Dogecoin!
- Incredibly simple interface.
- Exchange rates are updated automatically - you don't have to do anything!
- "Switch" button to invert the currencies.
- Converts as you type (no need for a "Convert" button!)
- Uses 3 decimal places for greater accuracy!
- Find the current exchange rate of what you're converting.
- Optimized for the latest iPhone and iPad models.

Let us know if you have any comments or feedback! It's similar in nature to XE currency converter and Currency Converter Plus, but offers a lot more. This version is ad-supported.
