Also, the app lacks information on what gates to take, what floor or platform number to go to. | confused a little to bkk visitors

title: Couchsurfing Travel App
description:
You have friends around the world, you just haven‚Äôt met them yet. 

Couchsurfing is the best way to stay with amazing locals, make lifelong travel friends, or host travelers coming to your hometown. Over 12 million travel enthusiasts use Couchsurfing in more than 230,000 cities around the world.

Use the Couchsurfing app to plan and manage your trip itinerary.

Find hosts in your next destination
‚Ä¢ Browse the millions of local hosts offering a place to stay in thousands of cities and towns
‚Ä¢ Stay with and meet locals and have an authentic travel experience
‚Ä¢ Explore accommodations options near where you are right now, or near your future destination

Make New Friends
‚Ä¢ Discover thousands of fun events planned by other Couchsurfers in your hometown or in your next travel destination
‚Ä¢ Use Couchsurfing Hangouts to show you who‚Äôs nearby your current location and available to meet up right now 

Meet Travellers Without Traveling
‚Ä¢ Host or meet up with incoming travellers coming to your city
‚Ä¢ Can‚Äôt travel right now? Let new cultures and friends come to you 

And More
‚Ä¢ Easily create and manage a Couchsurfing profile 
‚Ä¢ Manage your incoming or outgoing requests, messages, and more
‚Ä¢ Add pictures to document your travel adventures
‚Ä¢ See which of your Facebook friends also have a Couchsurfing account
releaseNotes: Hey Couchsurfers! In this release, you'll find a few bug fixes and usability improvements.
reviews:
I had a Couchsurfing subscription for 1 year.  Before my account was set to renew, I cancelled it. However, they charged me anyway. The kicker is my account still says I have a free account and says that I shouldn‚Äôt have been charged. I was charged and don‚Äôt even have access to the service. To make matters worse, I reached out to the company thinking they could provide me with some clarity on why they charged me. They can‚Äôt even find the charge in their system. They keep telling me to reach out to PayPal and Apple. The charge was on my CREDIT CARD, not via PayPal or Apple. They don‚Äôt even know how their own system works. Extremely disappointed in Couchsurfing and I‚Äôve lost all faith in their company and app. Whatever you do, do NOT give them any credit card information. This company steals money from the people it claims to ‚Äúhelp.‚Äù | Couchsurfing, once hailed as the ultimate platform for travelers seeking free lodging and cultural exchange, has seen significant changes that have stirred mixed feelings within its community. The app, renowned for connecting like-minded adventurers and hosts around the globe, has transitioned from a completely free service to a model that now requires payment, a shift that has left many users disenchanted.

Historically, Couchsurfing stood out for its emphasis on cultural exchange and hospitality, fostering a sense of global camaraderie. It was a unique platform where the currency was kindness and the sharing of experiences, rather than money. Hosts opened their homes without any expectation of financial compensation, offering travelers a place to stay and local insights that enriched their journey.

However, the introduction of a payment requirement to use the platform fundamentally alters its original ethos. Users now must pay to verify their accounts or subscribe to access full features, including hosting or staying with others. This move, while understandable from a business sustainability perspective, has sparked a debate on the core values of Couchsurfing.

For long-time users, this shift feels like a departure from the community-first philosophy that made Couchsurfing special. The requirement to pay can be seen as a barrier that might deter new members and diminish the pool of available hosts and surfers, potentially impacting the rich diversity and vibrancy of the community.

Despite these changes, it's important to acknowledge the positives that remain. Couchsurfing continues to be a platform that can offer unparalleled opportunities for cultural exchange and making global connections. The app's functionality, user interface, and the breadth of its community still stand as strong points, providing users with the tools to explore the world in a more personal and profound way than traditional tourism allows.

In conclusion, while the transition to a paid model marks a significant shift in Couchsurfing's journey, the core appeal of connecting with locals and travelers worldwide persists. Users who are willing to pay may still find the app a valuable resource for authentic travel experiences. However, the platform may need to find a balance between financial sustainability and maintaining the spirit of community and openness that defined its early years to retain its place in the hearts of the global travel community. | If you express any kind of boundaries up front, you‚Äôll be met with nothing or aggression. Without boundaries expressed outright, you‚Äôll be flooded with hosts requests. Really shows the intentions of most hosts on the app. Have yet to meet another woman on it. | It functions ok on my iPhone but several things are strange, text fields overlapping, simply aesthetically off. I travel for a living and couch surfing has helped me to save money on hotels. I wish I there was a trip-routing feature on the app. | This app has given me wings to fly to Japan, Sweden, Germany, Kenya, Singapore, India and so many more places. 

I am eternally grateful to couchsurfing and the many wonderful people I met while on the journey. Live long and prosper, CS! | Excelente app para conocer, asistir y ayudar a amigos de todo el mundo. Los invito a conocer La Habana Vieja. Un abrazo desde Cuba. | It‚Äôs a great app for meeting friends and traveling new places. Unfortunately, you have to spend a lot of money to get verified, and the app is extremely buggy and poorly written. It frequently takes five seconds to do something very very simple. Or it will forget to notify you that you got a message. Very difficult and unpleasant to use. | Stole $60 from me over 6 years ago when I simply followed their instructions for verification. Never used the app after that because I won‚Äôt support scammers. They just tried running my credit card again. They should be charged with financial crimes. | This app is my favorite app of all time but I wish for using the app properly we wouldn‚Äôt need to make a payment | I‚Äôm not gonna pay for an app like this before i know if it works and isn't a scam. If you're gonna charge for your app charge in the app store, not after download and account setup. | When people ask me about Couchsurfing this is what I tell them‚Ä¶

‚ÄúIt‚Äôs like visiting your favorite cousin who happens to live where you want to travel most!

The future people you‚Äôll meet on here, are the kindest souls you could ever find. 
 What greater show of kindness is there than welcoming a complete stranger into your most private space [your home] ??

My experience:

Pick up from the airport 
Cooking meals & being introduced to foods you‚Äôd never taste
Guitar serenades
Salsa dancing
Deep late conversations 
Laughs until the sun rises.

These precious people are Ambassadors of there cities & countries, & they give you there time so that you can simply enjoy‚Ä¶ | I‚Äôve hosted in the past and had great experiences with travelers. I payed a lump sum to get verified and had to send pictures of my place‚Ä¶ which I was fine with. Now they are asking for a fee every month. I‚Äôd be willing to pay something when I had a guest but not a fee each month no matter what. | It is truly the buggiest app I‚Äôve ever used, and they charge for it! Disappointing, can‚Äôt wait for a better alternative to create a competition for them. | This is the best app to know more about different cultures and languages we feel like a big family helping each others around the world 
I really advise everyone to use it and share it | Hice el pago del a√±o y no se porque en la aplicaci√≥n aparece un correo electr√≥nico que no es el m√≠o, cuando intento cambiarlo en la app para poder confirmar mi cuenta y poder avanzar no me permite cambiarlo | Search by area on map instead of running multiple searches for myriad municipalities that converge on a given zone. | The best app for travelers | Knew about Couchsurfing for many years when it was just a website. Reconnected to it now that I‚Äôm back traveling and through this app. Glad it exists! | The app has significant bugs (like you can‚Äôt login from different devices and I had to contact administrators in order to update my email).  A lot of users are inactive too.  I cancelled my subscription after a couple days.  Definitely not worth it. | Dont download, they stole from me 56 euros for verification!!

They dont want to refund | I just reported this place to the Better Business Bureau. They charged my credit card for a lifetime membership and now I cannot log back into my account because they say it‚Äôs inactive. I‚Äôm not sure if it was a lifetime or if it was a year, but the point is that is really shady. The verification was only supposed to verify my identity. This company is bad. | Used this since 2007. Now they charge $3 even if you are hosting. Scammers.
App is always buggy on iPhone. The new ownership severely neglects and the wuality deteriorates as more and more hosts leave and more and more freeloaders flood in. Sad. | If there‚Äôs a subscription fee for using the service why not just saying it instead of calling it ‚Äúdonation‚Äù? How can I trust a company playing tricks like this? | I submitted a request to surf with an ambassador of the couchsurfing app which was denied with no comment. When I requested again for different days and inquired if his denial, he did the same thing again. I go to his reviews and see only white people and people of Spanish descent, so of course, I took this to be racially motivated. I left a review stating that Winston will approve or deny your request based on race and that was removed as they considered it ‚Äúbullying and harassment.‚Äù I‚Äôve had several interactions such as this and couch surfing always seems to back up the racist, coincidence huh? | CouchSurfing and its community is what the World needs more of!! I started 10 years ago and it changed my life. Now about the app: The good: The app keeps getting better. Features are really useful. I love that you can read the communication history after joining a Hangout chat. The bad: Bugs with notifications, I get notified sometimes hours after messages are sent. The messaging in Hangouts feature is quite slow, people quickly move to WhatsApp. I wish the feature "people traveling to your city" would also be in the app, and not only on the website. | The first thing this app wants is a per month fee (or per year) or else u can‚Äôt use the app. Then they encourage u to spend $60 to get verified so you‚Äôll be able to find a host faster. I paid $60 + $15 yearly fee = $75. I sent about 20 requests to ~ 20 hosts in Los Angeles area. I was rejected by all 20. I suspect it‚Äôs b/c I am new to couch surfing and don‚Äôt have any references. 

But then it begs the question‚Ä¶ How do I get references if hosts will not accept me??!! My advice to travelers wanting to save money - spend money on a well rated hostel eg use the Hostel World app. The $75 I spent is easily a one night stay at a top rated hostel | So what I‚Äôm seeing is the movement has been hijacked my greedy people,, seeing as you can‚Äôt access ANYTHING without paying first, uh yeah that‚Äôs called a scam people run away lol | Don‚Äôt used 
Don‚Äôt like Muslim and Arabic people 
Please give home 1 stars all time | Don‚Äôt pay anything! It blames COVID for lack of activity but, it seems to be just a way to get money because you can‚Äôt access the app until you pay. Then, you see no one has been active for 3-9 years!! Even the reviews are old! Luckily, I only paid for one month. | There needs to be a way to see past hangouts and the people that attended them. | This is the best travel app for solo travelers. So many opportunities to meet new people and make friends all over the world. | You have to pay up front before you can check it out. I'm not subscribing to something before I even know anything about it. | As the title said CSing is an amazing experience and you can meet incredible people around the world. | Can‚Äôt even see how the app works because they need money . no thanks . | This app forces you to contribute a donation before you get to even see the Home Screen. | they charge you a monthly subscription fee just to browse. once i used the search feature i realized many of the hosts are not active and have not been in years | I recommend app, cs help me open USA | I probably wouldn‚Äôt mind contributing for a good experience that helps me build a local social network, but not before I can even try it. | After signing up you can't use the app unless you pay $4 a month or $15 a year‚Ä¶ 

Otherwise the only thing you could do is delete the account or logout‚Ä¶

 i'm sure the idea is nice‚Ä¶ 

But the execution is terrible. | They ban you for whatever reason. But they are quick to take your money and not giving back a refund. You‚Äôre all a bunch a lunatic thieves | TSIA. Unable to use. | 1 star! : Contributions should be voluntary. I can‚Äôt even see the portal without a subscription.
I won‚Äôt pay for something I haven‚Äôt seen or know if I want. | The party is over | How do you check out something when the only option is to subscribe? I see peoples reviews talking about charges.. really seems like a scam. I was really excited to see this app but nothing to see here ü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è | Awesome üòé | Keeps refreshing itself before giving a ‚Äúsomething went wrong please try again later‚Äù I tried fully uninstalling and deleting all cached data | Every single time. Can't get in at all anymore. 100% of the time it crashes. | Can‚Äôt even search or check out the app without paying. Save yourself the time and don‚Äôt bother | They just want money and put COVID 19 as an excuse, don‚Äôt get it | Used to be a great thing. Shame on the owners for ruining a great community.

title: OpenTable
description:
The OpenTable app is your one-stop-shop for everything dining. Download today so you can:
Find more ways to dine with tables, takeout and experiences
Scan restaurant menus, photos, and millions of verified diner reviews from over 50,000+ restaurants worldwide
Find the best of your city (or plan your next trip!) with our editorial guides
Streamline your booking experience with new features such as direct messaging with restaurants and hot table alerts
releaseNotes:
Thanks for using OpenTable! 
In addition to bug fixes and performance improvements, our latest update includes the ability to use the OpenTable widget to see bookable restaurants and upcoming reservations directly from your iOS home screen.
reviews:
I made two other reservations several weeks ago got a notice that I had reservations and now I don‚Äôt see them very disappointing because I didn‚Äôt change them and now they are not visible to me | Lately making me confirm who I am with text AND email.  A bit of overkill that makes it easier to just call the restaurant and avoid the app. | This is my go to dining app. I even used it internationally! | We always have difficulty using Open Table when making reservations for our favorite restaurant. It‚Äôs so frustrating! | Always a delicious meal. The staff is absolutely wonderful and the drinks are the best. Try a martini‚Ä¶.you will love them. | Open table app is easy to use, can be added to your calendar and sends an email reminder

Been using it for years. | Alex was great.  Perfect mix of friendly and attentive. | The food is always excellent and the wine is fine. Service is also just right | This app is OK and if you book through it, there is seldom any problem at the restaurant you choose. No lost reservations, time or party size mix ups. BUT, the app can be frustrating. Click for a place ‚Äúnear by‚Äù and it skips places I know are members and within a few miles and shows places that are 40-50 miles away. That is just not ‚Äúnear by‚Äù. Another grand gaff, is showing restaurants that are nearby, but only if you are boating not driving. In Watch Hill RI, it shows me places in Long Island 20+ miles away by boat ü§® | I love Open Table as opposed to other apps like Yelp. Been using Open Table for at least 8-10 years.üëç | Open table is a great service. We use it all the time. Makes making reservations very easy. | So, I‚Äôm searching for a restaurant in Manchester, NH and when it kept bringing up only 3 options, even though there‚Äôs at least 5 since two other places came up when I searched for sushi or Italian. So I went to the search bar and tapped ‚ÄúAll restaurants‚Äù and then many more restaurants came up‚Ä¶ because the map jumped to Manchester, England. So, I tried expanding my search field to include concord NH. And then it brought me to Concord, Italy.

I understand Manchester is a miserable excuse for a city, but I was not expecting the app to suggest I take a transatlantic flight for dinner tonight lol | Love being able to go on vacation, and, in advance of arrival, being able to find great restaurants, and to easily make reservations too! Also love being rewarded with gift checks just by making my reservations online on Open Table!! I sometimes stumble upon a restaurant while driving, then will open Open Table on my phone, make a reservation, then walk in!! Works great, love seeing the menus, and the reviews in advance of arrival! Great app! Great time saver and planner! Denise & Tom Newport RI | Verification is getting harder than ever.. makes me want to rez directly | Love Bulla Gastrobar. Hate using Open Table for reservations!!! Open Table always requires a new account and cannot seem to keep track of a cell phone for reservations without an email associated. Then it needs a password associated with the email. Each time sending a 6 digit code to verify the phone and email work; why is a password needed if you just sent a code? | Love OT but it won‚Äôt let me reserve dinner before our speakeasy reservation. | So fun, efficient and fast making reservations on  open table! | OpenTable is a fantastic resource for travelers looking to discover and book great restaurants. Its convenience and helpful features make it a go-to platform for finding dining options while on the go. | Amazing | Louka never fails and always satisfies. Wonderful menu , ambience, educated staff and central to all that Beverly Hills has to offer.
Louka is the only true Greek restaurant in the area. Yes there are those that claim Mediterranean , none that serve your palate with a cuisine that has been awarded the 3rd healthiest in the world. A menagerie of Greek wines from Santorini and the mainland will surprise your palate and change your mind .
One of our favorites in Beverly Hills. This is not a corporate restaurant. It‚Äôs s one of a kind gem . | Open Table is very convenient for making and changing reservation for those restaurants that use it. | This app is so handy for getting a table and finding good places to eat | Not sure what I'd do without this concierge. Nearly 400 reservations, reviews that matter, and recommendations based on my preferences; what could be better? | I just got a notification reminding me about a reservation I made 8 years ago. Not every reservation is something I‚Äôd like to be remind of. This was creepy. | Love this app. | We have never had a bad experience here!  The steaks are always prepared to perfection and our service has been impeccable! | This is my first time on Open Table and I was surprised and happy to learn how easy it was to use.  Thank you! | But it finally works.  Why do I have to do 2-part Both vain a text and an e-Mail!? | That UI is a bit confusing.  Thought I had made reservation but no confirmation.
Had to poke around, just guessing, and finally got a confirmation. | Great tool with good information on restaurant of interest. Easy to make a reservation. | Very efficient system and extremely helpful information!! | Great experience! | Convenient way to nail a table even on busy weekends. | The app sends unwanted notifications, for marketing and unrelated to it‚Äôs. | Pretty useful, but obviously lacks the ability to filter in more than just the most basic ways. Take a look at your competitors and copy them. They know what they‚Äôre doing! | This app is very helpful when traveling out of town | Great app! Works well | Love this App!! So convenient and made easy to adjust to your accommodations with no issue!! | The open table app is a complete pain to use! | Love using the open table app.. It‚Äôs very convenient and has a lot of different restaurants to choose from! | We had a 6:00 reservation got seated at 6:35.   Then took forever to get waited on.  Then they forgot our salads. Then they brought our food much later.   Then it took another 10 minutes for our 2 kids food to arrive.  We I‚Äôll never go back‚Äî-to many other restaurants in the area that are clearly better!  Really a bummer. | Just ok. | While I use app mostly when I am traveling there is no substitute for getting fed on a busy night in town. | I use Open Table frequently to book reservations. | In general, my experiences with OpenTable are easy and successful. | This is the best app. I never go to a restaurant that I can‚Äôt make a reservation | Love Open Table!! I‚Äôve had it for years. I do wish they would add a way to filter for restaurants that gluten free menus or options. I get tired of call restaurants or scrolling through their menus. | I wish I knew what points were for. | Have a shot of Henny ready please lol | We have used open table for a number of high end restaurants‚Ä¶it is great!

title: Workaway Travel App
description:
FIND HOSTS AROUND THE WORLD
 
50,000+ opportunities. 170 countries. 1 community. 

Use the Workaway travel app to stay with thousands of local host families in over 170 different countries around the world. Use your time during your travels to give back and support local communities by sharing your knowledge. Over 50,000+ available opportunities.

App for verified travellers only (host app is coming soon!) Meet like minded travellers along the way, and find a travel buddy to plan your new adventures with. Join our unique travel community and share amazing stories and ideas! 
 
 
 
TRAVEL GLOBALLY, CONNECT LOCALLY


Looking for a way to give meaning to your travels and give back? Workaway is the leading community for language learning, cultural exchange, working holidays and volunteering in over 170 countries. From volunteering with beach clean ups on a deserted island in the Pacific to helping teach at a local school in Mozambique... there are thousands of communities around the world looking for help in exchange for an immersive cultural experience. Learn about local food, customs and traditions, while living abroad like a local. 


 
KEY FEATURES:


* Search from over 50,000+ opportunities and connect with local hosts from around the world to swap your skills for food and accommodation or even earn a wage while exploring local life. 
* Find local active hosts around your current location on a map, or near your future destinations
* Quick access to your personalised favourite host list
* Message the hosts you are planning on visiting and keep in touch with them while on the move
* Contact last minute hosts for immediate volunteering opportunities
* Login from your phone whenever and wherever to easily manage and update your profile or apply on the move
* Read reviews from other members and contact them for travel advice, tips, or ask them about their stay with hosts
* See other travellers near your current location or in the area you are planning on travelling to
* Chat and connect with like minded people and meet new friends along the way
* Find a travel buddy and connect your accounts to plan your next Workaway adventure, visit hosts and apply together
 
 
AVAILABLE HOSTS TO CHOOSE FROM:


NGOs, social enterprises, local farms, permaculture projects, families, schools, friendly individual locals and lots more‚Ä¶


Incredible variety of hosts from over 170 countries.
 
There‚Äôs a whole world of new experiences beyond the tourist trail waiting for you to discover. Join the world‚Äôs leading community for sustainable travel and cultural exchange!
 
Your feedback matters to us. Email us at support@workaway.info for any questions or suggestions.
releaseNotes: While you are deciding on which country and host to visit next, we‚Äôve been busy improving the app and fixing bugs to make your Workaway life on the road as easy as possible. This update includes bug fixes.
reviews:
I had an experience where the host turned out to be blatantly racist, and when I reported her profile, an investigation was never launched and I actually never even received a response from Workaway. She ended up leaving me a lower review (even though I would do extra work on top of a full day's work and go out of my way to be respectful as I was consistently being disrespected) and the only response I received from the Help Desk was that "reviews can't be changed once they're left". So, while unjust, my account will remain with that lower rating forever, and I've already had hosts decline me because of it. My case is also not the only one - I've head stories like this from others as well. Don't take it from me though - I would recommend doing your own research... At this point, my best option is to delete my account, and the membership fee is not refundable. | I have hosted several workers and this app is meant for work in exchange if stay and explore, well this app does not let host get help in small business it will cancel your profile and tell you ti hire locally, this is a work away app isn‚Äôt, it has the word work in their name, so pls hosts with Businesses to run avoid making a profile on this nonsense app and workers don‚Äôt look for work here you will not get paid for any host on here. Waste of time and efforts and money for workers. | I have several friends who use this app, and I don‚Äôt know what‚Äôs going on, but it will not let me create a profile or create an account. I don‚Äôt know if this is a glitch in the app or if there‚Äôs a completely different way to sign up that is just not known. | I‚Äôve been looking for opportunities farther than a month out and everything‚Äôs full. Hosts who have profiles saying they have availability all text back saying they‚Äôre full. The ID verification system wouldn‚Äôt accept my passport nor my license. It is frustrating and feels futile. I wish I hadn‚Äôt paid the $60 for us to use this app. It‚Äôs a nice idea though. | The fact that hosts register for free and backpackers have to ‚Äúpay‚Äù to sign up for this platform to work for hosts for free is already a goddamn unfairness. Useless platform, full of entitled and racist hosts. Honestly, I shouldn‚Äôt have even signed up, one of my biggest regrets. Such a waste of money. | I have found amazing volunteer opportunities with free accommodation, which have been great learning experiences. Very grateful for Workaway and would recommend it to any budget traveler or a person looking to gain more hands-on experience in a field they‚Äôre interested in! | Great App but instead of connecting you to the website when clicking on menus, build it into the app so it doesnt always refer you to another webpage to the certain menu. | I love using Workaway to find places to travel, but the app is really bad. It‚Äôs super frustrating to use. It has a ton of glitches, bad filters for looking for places and overall hard to use. | Unfortunately this app could be a great travel-networking app, but it ends up being just an exploitative experience. 
Working five hours a day, five days a week, often leaves the traveler without much time to do anything that is fun. The exception is when you get a host particularly good at taking their workawayers for local hikes, events and to nearby attractions as part of the schedule. But most f the time its just a person or business who wants to get free labor and push you along out the door as soon as they aren't. 

You have to really get a good host invested in making it a balanced experience, which in seven months of being a member and actively using the app, I've found 1 out of every 7 hosts actually are going to make it a good experience. 

So be careful, rate often, and choose wisely. | Work away blocked my account because they said I sent to many messages that was spam , Work Away  is a rip off and will not be good ‚Ä¶ until their app Works | The app needs a lot of work | Won‚Äôt let me log in. I log in just fine on my browser. Useless | Easy to use and a great way to make connections !   ‚ù§Ô∏è | It keep asking me to log in when I haven‚Äôt even made a account. It won‚Äôt show a make a account option either | I‚Äôm a verified member. I use the website with no problems all the time. But every time I try to login on the App, I fail to login. This has been going for months now. 

FIX IT for God‚Äôs sake. | Great ! | Very easy to use! | They have fake offers and inactive hosts to catch people to pay their membresy. They ask a very expensive fee to apply, I paid for it because they had 4 great opportunities. Just one of the hosts responded to say they were not hiring people because of covid. title: Air France - Book a flight
description:
Meet a pocket-sized travel assistant designed to help you at every step of your journey.





From booking a flight, checking in, and receiving real-time flight updates to managing your Flying Blue account, the Air France app is your must-have travel tool.





BOOK A FLIGHT

Book your ticket for any of our destinations using your preferred secure payment method. To save time on future bookings, simply add your contact information to your profile, and we‚Äôll prefill your details. 




OBTAIN YOUR BOARDING PASS

Check in, select your seat, and obtain your boarding pass directly in the app.




STAY INFORMED

Turn on notifications and get real-time flight updates and exclusive content about your destination. You can also share your flight status with your loved ones to stay in touch with those on the ground.




MANAGE YOUR BOOKING

Need to review your ticket conditions, update your contact information or make a last-minute change to your booking? Manage your booking seamlessly directly in the app.



ENHANCE YOUR TRAVEL EXPERIENCE

Go the extra mile and add one of our extra travel options to your booking with a simple click (seat selection, special meals, lounge access, and more).



A SPECIAL SERVICE FOR YOUR CHILD

Is your child traveling alone via the trusted Kids Solo service? Track and manage their journey directly in the app.



ACCESS YOUR FLYING BLUE ACCOUNT

Check your Miles balance, book a rewards flight, modify your profile, and access your virtual Flying Blue card!

title: Mobile Passport Control
description:
Mobile Passport Control (MPC) is an official application created by U.S. Customs and Border Protection that streamlines your CBP processing experience at select U.S. entry locations. Simply fill out your traveler profile, answer CBP inspection-related questions, and proceed straight to the ‚ÄúMobile Passport Control‚Äù lane at the airport or seaport. 

MPC is a voluntary program which can be used by U.S. Citizens, Canadian Citizen Visitors, Lawful Permanent Residents, and Visa Waiver Program Visitors at any of the supported airport and seaport locations found on our website: https://www.cbp.gov/travel/us-citizens/mobile-passport-control 

MPC provides a more efficient, secure in-person inspection process for the CBP Officer and the traveler, and shortens overall entry wait times. 


MPC can be used in 6 simple steps:

1. Create a traveler profile using biographic information from your passport; You can create a profile for all eligible members in a family group. Your profiles will be securely stored on your device completely free to be used for future travel.

2. Select your method of travel, select your port of entry and terminal (if applicable), answer CBP inspection-related questions, certify the truthfulness and accuracy of your answers, and, upon arriving at your selected port of entry, tap the ‚ÄúSubmit Now‚Äù button.

3. Capture a clear and unobstructed photo of each traveler (including yourself) that you added to your submission.

4. Once your submission is processed, CBP will send a virtual receipt back to your device.

5. Proceed to the MPC designated lane upon arrival and be prepared to present your passport and other relevant travel documents. Please note: MPC does not replace your passport; your passport will need to be presented to the CBP Officer.

6. The CBP Officer will complete the inspection. If further information is required, the CBP Officer will let you know.
releaseNotes:
Additions
- Added support for French localizations
- Added category for translation issues to customer support view

Fixes
- Fixed an incorrect Spanish translation for the word "Close"

title: Wego Flights & Hotels Booking
description:
Wego helps YOU to Get Inspired, Explore, and Plan Trips like never before!

Download the best travel app for booking cheap flights & hotels today! It‚Äôs totally free to use.

*Highlights*

*Full price transparency*

Specifically designed to help you find the lowest travel costs available online, Wego displays the total airfare or hotel rates clearly and upfront. By displaying taxes, surcharges and other associated fees, there are no surprises when you make your booking.

*Search & Book*

Wego app provides best-in-class search & booking experience ‚Äî the user experience is fast and intuitive, you get to compare flights & hotel rates from a comprehensive list of airlines, hotel brands and travel agents ‚Äî plus there‚Äôs a wide range of filtering & sorting options so you find exactly what you‚Äôre looking for.

*Explore All Destinations*

Wego comes packed with features that help you Get Inspired, Explore & Plan Trips like never before -- you can browse all possible destinations by popularity, weekend trips, visa requirements, cheap deals and themes -- this is perfect if you feel like travelling but do not have a particular place in mind yet.

*Plan The Best Time To Fly*

You can easily find the cheapest months to fly to a destination by using Wego‚Äôs Price Trends feature (powered by our price prediction model).  Price Trends shows you the lowest fares found in each month (for the period of the next 12 months), and from there you can easily select from a big range of flight deals.

*The Most Comprehensive Hotel Reviews*

Wego provides you with the most comprehensive set of hotel reviews ‚Äî we‚Äôve aggregated hotel reviews from all the top sources, TrustYou, Booking.com, Foursquare, HolidayIQ and TripAdvisor ‚Äî and presented it to you in one place, so that you can quickly and easily find out what all other users are saying about any hotels you wish to stay in.

*Featured In The Top New & Tech Publications*

Wego has been highlighted in many of the top news & tech publications in MENA, APAC & around the world, some of these include Techcrunch, Tech In Asia, Sky News Arabia, The Australian, CNBC Asia, Arabian Business, Khaleej Times, Al Bayan, Al Arabiya, and many more.

*Earn Cashback When You Shop, Dine & Travel*

[Currently available in UAE & Egypt] We've integrated MENA's favourite cashback app, ShopCash, right into the Wego app. This is great news, because now you can earn cashback on all your purchases, whether it be flights, hotels, online shopping or dining at your favourite restaurant. All of the cashback goes into your virtual wallet, which you can then withdraw for real money!

*More Awesome Features For YOU*

‚Ä¢ Available in over 20 languages - English, Arabic, Hindi, Bahasa Indonesia, French, Chinese and many more

‚Ä¢ Siri shortcuts - quickly search hotel tonight or access Wego exclusive deals with voice commands.

‚Ä¢ Integrated with ‚ÄúThe Entertainer‚Äù to bring you more offers for food & beverages, leisure & attractions, and beauty & wellness.

‚Ä¢ Recent searches - Wego saves them for you, so there‚Äôs no need to re-enter details

‚Ä¢ Full-featured hotel listings with latest rates, photos, amenities and guest reviews.

‚Ä¢ Hotel mapping functionality - find the perfect hotel combining price, location, star rating and guest reviews scores neatly presented on a map

‚Ä¢ Receive Price Alerts by email for that trip you‚Äôre planning
