title: Turo - Find your drive
description:
Turo is the world‚Äôs largest peer-to-peer car sharing marketplace where you can book any car you want, from a vibrant community of local hosts across the US, UK, Canada, France, and Australia. Whether you're flying in from afar or looking for a car down the street, searching for a rugged truck or something smooth and swanky, guests can take the wheel of the perfect car for any occasion, while hosts can take the wheel of their futures by building an accessible, flexible, and scalable car sharing business from the ground up.

Whether it‚Äôs a truck to help on moving day, a swanky exotic for a luxurious weekend away, or a classic cruiser for a picture-perfect road trip, with thousands of vehicles listed worldwide, Turo lets you find the perfect vehicle for your next adventure.

Upgrade your travel plans
‚Ä¢ Choose from a totally unique selection of cars and drive the perfect one for your trip
‚Ä¢ Book cars directly from local hosts
‚Ä¢ Safely access cars through a variety of contactless check-in options
‚Ä¢ Get the car delivered, and book trips on the go with a quick tap

Start your own car sharing business
‚Ä¢ Share your car and build a car sharing business with Turo
‚Ä¢ Start with a car you already own or buy one to share ‚Äî any car owner can start exercising their entrepreneurial muscles
‚Ä¢ Choose how many cars to share, scale your business up or down however you want, and decide how to reinvest your earnings
‚Ä¢ Whether you want to commit a lot of time or a little, you can earn at home or on the go, on your schedule, and divest any time
‚Ä¢ Rest easy with liability insurance from Travelers Excess and Surplus Lines Company backing each trip

Note: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
releaseNotes: Updates and fixes to make booking trips and managing listings on Turo easier.
reviews:
I‚Äôm so glad that this app exists. It‚Äôs a refreshing and welcomed process from the traditional rental. I love being able to choose a car based on my mood, the occasion or the destination. I‚Äôm always looking forward to my next ride! | I really enjoy rent for Turo. | It‚Äôs nice to have vehicle available in your own town. | My husband and I have hosted on turo for 2 years and have made Turo lots of money. We had a bad renter who didn‚Äôt return our car and stole it. In order to get it back we had to find it in the city, retrieve it ourselves, and there were remnants of drugs in the car and a floor mat had been lit on fire. We are working with Roman from Turo support who refuses to refund us for the total loss of our car. | I have used Turo 3 times now and everything has worked out great each time. You always get the car you choose and everyone so far has been very respectful and accommodating    Ron | I recently took a trip to Washington state and absolutely loved it. The host was very quick to respond when I had questions regarding pickup and drop off. 

However, after drop off, we encountered an issue. A smoking report was submitted by the host. Prior to our trip, I became familiar with the smoking policy, additional rules, and guidelines. Therefore, there was no smoking involved in the vehicle. We would never subject one of our passengers in the car, who is a few months pregnant, to any of that. Anyway, after Turo reviewed the images the host submitted, customer service informed me that I was going to receive a reimbursement for the misunderstanding. However, I was charged again. Why would customer service say they would refund me and yet follow through with it a day later? 

I‚Äôd like to remind you that the most difficult odor to eradicate anywhere is that of marijuana. I therefore requested further investigation that marijuana may have been present, but they hesitantly said that the dispute was resolved. Did they not value my voice? Since customer service gave me vague responses and never responded to my emails, they were little to no help. I found this incredibly frustrating, as I was falsely being accused of violating the smoking policy without any supporting documentation. It's absurd; the host's photos, which we truly wish we could attach, plainly depicted food crumbs and debris rather than marijuana! I would like to remind you that we visited a few trails and beaches where picking up debris from the rainfall, including moss, is inevitable. If Turo has ‚Äústrict smoking policies,‚Äù why would they solely rely on images to determine a violation?

I implore you, future guests, to advocate for yourself. I am 21 years old and believe I was taken advantage of due to my age because I can guarantee you that there was no smoking of any kind involved. So, please make sure to document everything! Take photos of the car's exterior and interior from all angles and in various lighting at pick up and drop off. Record the distance driven and the gas level before and after the drop-off. The most tedious areas of the vehicle were shown in the pictures that were sent along with the report the host submitted. Therefore, take photos of everything! Reconsider renting from here, it could cost you double, like our case. It has been two weeks since our trip and nothing has been resolved, but we are still in contact with Turo for this misunderstanding. 

To our host, I strongly advise you to educate yourself on the physical appearance and scent of marijuana for future guests before presuming anything that isn't true and accusing them unjustly of violating policies. Furthermore, provide additional ‚Äúvalid‚Äù assertions rather than depending just on what you observe. To avoid misunderstandings with future guests, I urge you to invest in smoke sensors that can identify specific components in both tobacco and marijuana smoke. Overall, the host's ignorance, the useless and indifferent customer service, and the way this whole thing transpired has left me feeling rather frustrated and dissatisfied. Future guests, please be cautious when booking here. | There have been times when I the person I was renting from was fraudulent in they‚Äôre dealings but I have experienced the best response from the Turo support. This has been a 5 star service and I recommend Turo to everyone possible. It‚Äôs service is great!! | Amazing app to make sure you are good ! | Been using Turo for about 4 years now and definitely beats the traditional rental car companies | Turo is great! Saves so much time and saves money. | Everything was exciting from pick up to drop off. No problems locating vehicle at airport that I had never been to. | Turo has been so helpful to me in all of my trips weather business or personal | Being without a vehicle tough but the ease of using Turo makes it so easy to get a vehicle when needed. | Turo is the best rental company ever in my opinion | Nice Turo!!! üëçüëçüëç | I really enjoy this service and have had nothing but positive experiences. The fees are a bit high, but it‚Äôs still a pretty good deal. | I've been using Turo for YEARS and haven't used any other service since. It's a great looking app as well as being very easy to navigate (booking, contacting the host and they send out promo codes from time to time!). Would highly recommend to give it a try as a driver and/or listing your car on there! | I am so happy with using Turo. Three times I‚Äôve rented and been thrilled with the quality of the vehicle. I‚Äôm renting again the first week of May 1-8 through Turo for a trip to see our kid and grandkids in sunny California. | Highly recommended | The app is very user friendly and easy to use. The company is also convenient as are the drivers provided. | Great team to work with. I really appreciate everything you guys do for me. | This app is definitely a game changer!!! | The ease and straightforwardness if Turo makes it my go to for car rentals. I will never lease from a rental car agency again! | My host Alicia was very receptive and was easy to communicate with. They went above and beyond to keep the car running smoothly. We enjoyed driving the BMW convertible. We will use her again in the future. | I use Turo every time I travel. Takes me to all my favorite hiking spots and always have great communication with people I have rented from. Will never use Hertz (or other car rental company) again. | Turo is great, simple to use and convenient | I‚Äôve had nothing but good experiences renting through Turo! | Fast easy and reliable for all my adventures | Turo has really came throw for me in my time of need and I am so great full. | They deny me for no reason they discriminate plus they leak your information definitely wouldn‚Äôt use | Way better than traditional car rental would always recommend turo as the 1st option | I love the fact that I can pick my own vehicle, and I always get the unlimited mileage option. Great APP, easy, reliable and much better than the big auto rental companies. | Extremely happy with using this app to secure a car on trips. Not only is it far more reasonable but the cars are much nicer than the basic car rental. Will always do a Turo rental now! | I had an issue with someone we rented a car from. Customer service was very helpful and gave me a discount for my next rental. Anytime I had a question they have explained everything in a professional manner. | Turo makes renting so painless and simple. No extra or hidden fees. This is my preferred method of renting vehicles | I definitely enjoy using turo for and quick trip around town. So easy and efficient | Nice | very helpful and respectful... always checking in .. i would recommend this to everyone i know | Super easy to use and great prices | If you see reviews about Turo scamming and closing accounts, taking money that didn‚Äôt belong to them and canceling trips in the middle of your already paid booked trip‚Ä¶.. BELIEVE THEM. This app came off as legit at first and then each time I attempted to give them the benefit of the doubt, it always backfired on me. I knew it was just too good to be true. I referred two people to this app also and one of them is going through similar. I attempted to email and reach out and they randomly closed my account out. Not worth it!!!!!! | All other rental companies can forget about it and will never get my business again lol. Turo is affordable convenient whoever created GENIUS | I used Tito once and when the host cancelled hours before pick up time Turo found a new rental for $175 more than the original agreement.  They did not cover that cost nor did the host and Turo had us running in circles to discuss the concerns with customer service that did nothing to help | I have utilized Turo now multiple times and have been very pleased with the result. I truly believe it‚Äôs the best way to rent a car!! Thank you Turo, easy, safe, hassle free, wonderful vehicles to rent and pleasant people to work with! | Easy to use | No hassle | Excellent | Everything went Nice and Smoove | I had an exceptional experience hosting on Turo! The platform provided me with a seamless way to share my vehicle, and the support team was always there to assist. Not only did I earn extra income, but I also met some wonderful renters along the way. Turo made the entire process easy and rewarding. Highly recommended for anyone looking to share their car! | This is a great app. A very easy convenient way to rent a vehicle. I have rented over 10 vehicles and have enjoyed them all. The host were great the cars were awesome and Turo is the best. | It‚Äôs a awesome services!! Incredible experiences!

title: Southwest Airlines
description:
Book a flight in just a few easy steps 
Check in, change or cancel your flights. Plus, add extras like EarlyBird Check-In¬Æ. 

Super-Fast Shopping & Booking
Book a trip in just a few quick taps. Use Face ID¬Æ to make booking even faster! You can also store your credit cards.

Everything you need to Travel
Get the information you need right at your fingertips on the home screen - gate information, boarding position, flight status, and more. 

Boarding Pass on the Go
Get mobile boarding passes for all passengers on your trip 24 hours in advance. Southwest passes have rich color and bold font, which makes seeing your Gate and Boarding Position very clear. Find the details you need quickly: Flight Number, Confirmation Number, Boarding Time, Tier Status, and TSA Pre-Check. Don‚Äôt forget to add your Mobile Boarding Passes to Apple Wallet!

Apple Pay¬Æ
Apple Pay¬Æ is now available as a payment option in the iOS app! This is an additional option to our other available payment methods - PayPal¬Æ or Credit/Debit Cards.

Travel Funds
You can now use flight credits, Southwest LUV Vouchers, and gift cards when changing your flight in the app. Your unused Southwest¬Æ flight credit(s) will show  in ‚ÄòMy Account‚Äô,  within ‚Äòtravel funds‚Äô section.

Inflight Entertainment
Use the app to take you to our Inflight Entertainment Portal1 where you can watch free live TV2, listen to free music from iHeartRadio2, access free on-demand TV episodes, and view free movies. 
 
1Available only on WiFi-enabled aircraft. Limited time offer. Where available. 2Due to licensing restrictions, on WiFi-enabled international flights free live TV and iHeartRadio may not be available for the full duration of flight.

Live Chat 
Contact our Customer Representatives through Live Chat by scrolling down to Contact Us in the navigation drawer and then tap on ‚ÄúChat.‚Äù

Airport Pickup and Drop-off
Thanks to our partnership with Lyft¬Æ, you can now use the app to help you request a Lyft¬Æ! You‚Äôll know key information like estimated time of arrival and estimated price before booking. More of a rental car person? You can do that in the app, too.

Cars, Hotels, and Vacations
Use our app to quickly book all of your travel needs. 

Earn Rewards when you Travel
Sign up for Rapid Rewards¬Æ and earn points on your flights. Did you forget to add your Rapid Rewards¬Æ number during booking? ‚Äì No worries, add it after booking your flight and earn points. You can then use those points to purchase more flights!
releaseNotes: We've made improvements and fixed bugs for a smoother ride.
reviews:
You overbooked my seat last night. I saw a pilot and a flight attendant who took a seats over me. Not cool. | The app is so user friendly and easy to use.  This company makes it so easy to change flights to accommodate a schedule that often changes.  A-Lister for Life. | There is no easy way to find your current flight even if you are logged into the app with your account. You have to search for your reservation and check in every time to see your flight and then get to your boarding pass. Developers of this app, check out Alaska airlines or Delta apps. | I plan to get lots of flights with my companion for free this year!
Great program for frequent travelers!

Thanks | I had this app a while ago and it was fine. Now, it does not work at all. Says it is the wrong login info but it isn‚Äôt. Then it says I have reached the maximum tries and locks me out. I will go back to using the mobile site but what a pain. Grrrr | Early Bird was paid for‚Äîdidn‚Äôt happen. I am not a satisfied customer. | Thanks üëçSouthwest Airlines | Really like the Southwest app. I used it all the time I want to travel. Easy to transfer your boarding pass to your wallet from the southwest app if you have an apple phone. | The agent I chatted with said she added my points. That did not happen | Exceptional app. Easy to use | I have been a loyal southwest flyer for years but that has changed as of today for the last two years every experience we have had with you has been the worst case scenario and I do u destined we can‚Äôt control the weather but the customer service is the absolute worst I have ever experienced in my life you don‚Äôt care about your customers what so ever you just say sorry and move us along I am currently stuck in Orlando Florida and had to pay for another night stay and another days parking because of your airlines incompetence and to top it off you guys wouldn‚Äôt give me my luggage back so I have no clothes and toiletries so we are having to stay in our dirty clothes we wore and walked around in all day and my wife doesn‚Äôt have her medication either so you have lost a long time customer I will never fly with you guys again and I will deter anyone else from doing so also so basically thanks for nothing. | Gay gay gay | Easy to use Southwest app for our trip to puerto rico | I paid for an upgrade in boarding position and was charged but my boarding pass want upgraded to the new boarding group   Now I‚Äôll have to go through the line anyway.  Poorly functioning system!   Won‚Äôt be using this again. | We paid for priority check in and still got boarding passes at the end of A check in | The account creation is one of the most tedious, annoying, and brain rotting experiences I have EVER had with any app. If you can‚Äôt find a unique enough username, you then I have check going back and forth between pages to let the app autogenerate a password. Imm afraid no password will be unique enough for this stupid app. I wish I could get it zero stars, my sanity is gone. Fix this terrible feature | By far the easiest app to use among airlines with the most advanced technology. | There doesn‚Äôt seem to be any way to save the flights on my logged-in account. This app is 10 years old and feels like it. Basically useless | Love SW‚Ä¶..they would ALWAYS be MY Choice‚ÄºÔ∏è‚ÄºÔ∏è | This is my preferred way to fly. Friendly people, on time, and great perks with the SW Visa card. | I love Southwest Airlines. I always choose to fly them online booking flight hotel and car are always easy. | After being notified of a flight change in an existing reservation, I needed to make an adjustment. A few clicks on the app, and the flight was updated to a more convenient flight. We love flying Southwest and the app makes booking (and making changes) easy. | This is a very easy to use app. Everything thing is laid out conveniently. | The app won‚Äôt let me add the boarding pass to apple wallet. Other airline apps work flawlessly. | I only use Southwest Airlines. Been traveling for 18 years with y‚Äôall üòçüòòü•∞ | The Southwest app is easy to navigate. I appreciate the luggage tracking as a new addition. | Several times my flight time has been changed and when I look at your flight schedules my original flight is still listed. When booking a flight I pick a flight based upon the availability of someone taking or picking me up. | I have all the tools I need to maximize my efficiency to fly Southwest. | Although | I‚Äôve not been able to access my Southwest Rewards account since creating it, so I reached out for assistance. Rachel (customer service) was extremely rude and dismissive of my concerns.  She did not allow me to ask questions or give me the opportunity to gain clarity on the instructions she provided.  She was demeaning and dismissive of me and my concerns, and she consistently (and intentionally) cut me off and spoke over me.  

I have always been team American Airlines, but I thought I would give Southwest Airlines a try.  I truly hope Rachel‚Äôs behavior is not indicative of how my family and I will be treated by all Southwest Airlines employees. 

Please go back and listen to our call.  I‚Äôm beyond disappointed in the treatment I received by Rachel. | This website and the associated app both do nothing but frustrate and annoy ( nicest way to put it) every time I try to sign in.  
   Even with all the needed information the site refuses to let myself or my husband sign in.  It ALWAYS ends in having to call and wait to get an operator on the line and once AGAIN reset my password.  And god forbid I try to use a new password with a word similar to any I‚Äôve used in the past.  The English language only has so many words and I‚Äôm running low on options. | Southwest is an amazing airline, very customer service oriented, which says a lot in the same age | I travel back and forth to Texas to visit with my treasured grandsons.  I love the convenience of flying out of a small airport 10 mins from house.  The flight attendants are awesome and generally very helpful. üòéThank Yiu Southwest!! | The cancellation of my original flight was disappointing, but there where several other flights to choose from.I think those folks should be compensated with *A*boarding. Thanks much! | Fix this app already | When I book a flight that‚Äôs the flight I want you come in and change it when it was a direct flight. Now I have a stop on both flights added three hours to each trip, leaving at the crack of dawn on my return trip so I have to get up at 5:30 AM to get to the airport. Not happy with Southwest they‚Äôre really going downhill. | We will fly Southwest to Burbank tomorrow and have already flown to New Orleans via Southwest during February, 2024. Southwest provides excellent service, convenient routes, and dependable times. We will fly Southwest Airlines whenever we are going where Southwest goes. | Great service! | We love to fly southwest we only wish they would fly into South Bend, Indiana! | So easy to use for a 70 year old grandmother! | Southwest is probably the most accommodating airline in existence. in the United States, we have ditched everything else. | The app keeps asking me to enable notifications but that‚Äôs not an option in settings. My phone and the app are updated so I have to assume it‚Äôs an app issue. Other than that the app works well but having notifications pushed to me on things  like delays and cancellations would be super helpful and one of the few notifications I‚Äôd like my phone to make. | I love Southwest will never take a flight with anyone else. I‚Äôve always had the upmost best service. I‚Äôve never had an issue. | Checked my bike bag in Albuquerque that divides into two, along with my folding bike. No problem. When I tried to check exactly the same thing at Reagan National, the clerk made them 3 bages and charged me an extra $125. I am done with Southwest, after flying with them for 25 years | I love it!!!!!   Best way to fly for me!!!!! | Still some bugs on this app.  Cant edit my information properly says I‚Äôm not on this flight, but I am. | Great experience this far!  Very buisness like and professionalism at its best! | Amazing app! I get to see a Southwest title screen (purple flowers on a mountain side/mountains in the background and thats as far as thus trash app will ever load. | 5 Stars All Da Way!! | Best way to travel!

title: National Park Guides - Chimani
description:
Since 2010 Chimani has been the trusted digital companion for planning and exploring the most visited national parks in the United States, Canada, and the United Kingdom - and works without an Internet connection!

(NEW FEATURE): TRIP PLANNING TOOL
‚Ä¢ Curated trip itineraries for over 70 national parks
‚Ä¢ Organize and edit your own trip using our detailed guides
‚Ä¢ Save time and money with all the details needed to plan your trip in advance.

LIVE MAP - REAL-TIME, WAZE-LIKE USER REPORTS
‚Ä¢ Share with others what you're experiencing in the parks.
‚Ä¢ View user reports on wildlife, trees & plants, and natural wonders
‚Ä¢ Let others know about crowds, traffic, parking, hazards, bad weather

DETAILED TRAVEL GUIDES WRITTEN BY LOCAL, TRAVEL WRITERS:
‚Ä¢ Written by professional travel writers (humans), not AI or copied text from the nps.gov website (like our competitors).
‚Ä¢ Includes local tips on all activities, services, and historical sites in each park.
‚Ä¢ Download offline maps for GPS-guided exploration.

DISCOVER OVER 3,000 PARKS THROUGHOUT YOUR ROAD TRIP
‚Ä¢ Find parks nearby with ease while traveling to your national park.
‚Ä¢ Includes every state park, national forest, wildlife refuge, and national monument in the U.S.
‚Ä¢ Read about the history, highlights, activities, and planning tips for each park. 

EARN EXCLUSIVE BADGES BY VISITING PARKS
‚Ä¢ Earn special badges by checking in at parks.
‚Ä¢ Showcase your park visits with "verified" badges.

Chimani currently supports these National Parks in the US, Canada, and United Kingdom:

Acadia National Park
American Samoa National Park
Arches National Park
Badlands National Park
Banff National Park
Big Bend National Park
Biscayne National Park
Black Canyon Of The Gunnison National Park
Bryce Canyon National Park
Canyonlands National Park
Capitol Reef National Park
Carlsbad Caverns National Park
Channel Islands National Park
Congaree National Park
Crater Lake National Park
Cuyahoga Valley National Park
Death Valley National Park
Denali National Park
Dry Tortugas National Park
Everglades National Park
Gates Of The Arctic National Park
Gateway Arch National Park
Glacier Bay National Park
Glacier National Park
Grand Canyon National Park
Grand Teton National Park
Great Basin National Park
Great Sand Dunes National Park
Great Smoky Mountains National Park
Guadalupe Mountains National Park
Haleakala National Park
Hawaii Volcanoes National Park
Hot Springs National Park
Isle Royale National Park
Joshua Tree National Park
Katmai National Park
Kenai Fjords National Park
Kings Canyon National Park
Kobuk Valley National Park
Lake Clark National Park
Lake District National Park
Lassen Volcanic National Park
Mammoth Cave National Park
Mesa Verde National Park
Mount Rainier National Park
North Cascades National Park
Olympic National Park
Petrified Forest National Park
Pinnacles National Park
Redwood National and State Parks
Rocky Mountain National Park
Saguaro National Park
Sequoia National Park
Shenandoah National Park
Theodore Roosevelt National Park
Virgin Islands National Park
Voyageurs National Park
Wind Cave National Park
Wrangell-St Elias National Park
Yellowstone National Park
Yosemite National Park
Zion National Park

Chimani Subscription is available as an annual subscription for $19.99/month, $29.99/quarter, or $59.99/year. You can subscribe and pay through your iTunes account. Your annual subscription will automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Auto-renew can be turned off anytime by going to your Account Settings in iTunes after purchase.

---
COMPATIBILITY
Sign up required to bookmark parks, check in to parks, and back up your data.

SUPPORT
We love hearing from users! Email us at support@chimani.com and get a "wicked fast" response!

LEGAL
Terms of Service: https://www.chimani.com/termsofservice.html
Privacy Policy: https://www.chimani.com/privacy.html

Note: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
releaseNotes: We've turbocharged Chimani with a trip planning wizardry so powerful, it might just replace your favorite park ranger (sorry, Bob). Introducing our latest marvel: a trip-planning tool packed with curated itineraries for 70 national parks, from Acadia's rugged coasts to Yosemite's towering sequoias. Get ready to embark on adventures so well planned, even the squirrels will wonder how you got so savvy. Update now and let the journey begin!
reviews:
Used to use this app for info on parks, what to do etc. Now I go thru pages of stuff, it requires location and notifications. 
Sorry to see this good app go down the tubes. I‚Äôve deleted it. | I got this app for my first camping trip, and I signed up for the free trial and forgot to cancel it before it charged me. I had planned to switch to a cheaper option, but forgot! I email the company and Kerry replied. He was very kind, understood my situation, and helped guide me through cancelling my payment. I plan to keep a less costly subscription for this app, just because the Creator was so kind!
As for the usability of the app, I found it very helpful with planning hikes and for navigation. I can tell the Creator put a lot of thought into creating this app. 5 stars!!! | The free NPS app has very similar content on a much easier to use platform‚Ä¶ and did I mention free? 

The adds for this app were deceiving to make it seem like these guides were free, or at least affordable. But $19.99 per month to access park travel guides, which is what is advertised, is very overpriced. Based on other subscribers‚Äô reviews of the paid content, I‚Äôll pass. Without the $19.99/month subscription, the app offers little to no functionality and is not worth the used space on your phone! Do yourselves a favor and download the NPS app. 

I‚Äôll also add that the developers‚Äô response to some of these reviews and the active deception and hiding of their fees makes me question the morality of the developer‚Ä¶ yet another reason why I‚Äôm not willing to risk $19.99 to give the paid version a shot. I hope you will also think twice before paying the developer! | Paid for the subscription. Verified that I‚Äôm subscribed but it freezes every time that I try to download the map for offline usage and then prompts me to ‚Äústart 3 day trial‚Äù and then just repeats that I‚Äôm already subscribed. Shame. | I got excited after reading Nikon‚Äôs photography challenge. However, when I downloaded the app, they wanted $19.99/month! I do not go to enough parks for that kind of money. It was a little less for 3 months, but still an expensive regular fee. I‚Äôm not asking for anything for free, but this was too much for my budget. Best of luck to them. It looks like it would be a cool way to track park experiences. | The free NPS app has the same content, including links to nearby parks/monuments/trails without adding extra unnecessary information. You can also save the NPS parks for offline use. I mean, if you‚Äôd like to waste at least $19.99 per month, this is an option, I guess. EDIT: The developer responded, saying I‚Äôm putting out misinformation‚Ä¶that the PARK TRAVEL GUIDE app only costs money if you want to access PARK TRAVEL GUIDES. So, thank you Chimani for verifying what I wrote. You DO charge a minimum of $19.99/mo to use the primary functions of your app. LOL EDIT 2: Chimani removed their comment about ‚Äúmisinformation‚Äù and changed their claims YET AGAIN. I don‚Äôt trust a developer who keeps moving the goalposts and using doublespeak to hide their fees. | Very useful,with interesting content | The ‚Äúupdated‚Äù version completely changed all the features that made this a fantastic app and now it‚Äôs almost useless.  The previous map was great: you could sort by type of national park property (or just view them all) and easily see visited vs. unvisited sites. Yes, I‚Äôve had communications as to how I‚Äôm supposed to still be able to do something similar, but let‚Äôs be honest, it doesn‚Äôt come even close to the functionality of the previous version. Oh so sad. I seldom use the app anymore. | Was using this app for nearly 4 years and visited majority of the US while traveling for work. Perfect features for visiting monuments, preserves to National Parks. Absolutely loved this app. 

Once the new upgrade happened, it‚Äôs simple features became a hinderance. Factoring in the pay feature, they had a great system going till they messed it up. 

Hard to imagine messing up a mayonnaise sandwich but I guess anything is possible. | The information provided by this app is generic and not very helpful for selecting somewhere to visit and figuring out what to do there. I think you are better off visiting nps.gov and the many excellent travel blogs for actual useful information. There are more specialized apps that are much more useful for hiking. There is something cheap and tawdry about the app‚Äôs gamification of visiting national parks, as well as the ads appearing on most screens.

UPDATE: I did look at the guides and they are hard to use. Typically, you have a map with many points but few labels, so it‚Äôs hard to know or remember what you are looking at. You can also see lists of hikes, waterfalls, et cetera, but there‚Äôs no way to put together a coherent picture or plan. Information can be out of date, e.g., the Grove of the Patriarchs at Mt. Ranier is closed with no re-opening date. | If I want to record a past visit you can‚Äôt record multiple days at once with drag and drop‚Ä¶would be much easier if you could. | Why did you screw up the map?  I liked to be able to easily see which parks I had been to in an area.  Bring that back!!! | Just like ALL the recent reviews I‚Äôm so upset they ruined one of the Best apps for national Parks.  This app helped us visit 46 national Parks and now it‚Äôs trash. It completely wiped all the tracking we had in place. The map to find parks near you is gone and now they show way to much on the maps so you can‚Äôt actually find the 63 NPs.  

I can‚Äôt understand why they would take something so good and put out this crap.  Look at your user reviews since the update they are all 1 star. 

Bring back the original app!!! | This was the absolute best app for tracking National Parks / Monuments etc. Then the changed the mapping data and its a giant steaming pile of hot garbage now. Sad, I really loved this app. | I am not happy at all with the new version, I will never use guides , you took away the map of the US showing each park and the ones I have already visited a different color. You would simply click on the park and would get a description and another click would take you directly to the National Park page, I wished you would change this app back , I cannot see using this app anymore | Every time I click on Utah it goes to West Virginia. I kinda have an idea of what‚Äôs in the state, but I would also like to see what‚Äôs there and see the info of what‚Äôs in the state for any park weather it state  or National. | For years this has been my go-to national park app. I even bought the lifetime subscription. Ever since the last update to ‚Äúimprove‚Äù their app it‚Äôs straight garbage. Please roll back to the old version until you find developers that can actually build a good UI. The current version isn‚Äôt even a beta version. Please fix this or honestly I‚Äôd like a refund on my subscription. Back to the NPS app for me. | I signed up for the app to get the discounts but there is no information on the app about how to use them. I think the discounts are on the web interface but sometimes they say to use a ‚Äúpromo code‚Äù to get them and then other times mention a ‚ÄúChimani perks card‚Äù which I never received. Anyone know this? | I have been using this app since it was started and now ‚Ä¶ ugh. What happened to the maps? I used to be able to hike in a park, open the map and see where I was. I have told so many lost hikers about this app, but now I can‚Äôt even find the map. What happened?? | Really dissatisfied with the recent update. Previously it was great to be able to see what Parks you‚Äôd visited by type on one of the many map layers that you could select from. | This app makes it impossible to unsubscribe. | No idea how to reach you; tried app support with no luck.   I have been an extremely heavy user of chimani for several years‚Ä¶and loved it.   Now, I neeed to go through multiple steps to load the map‚Ä¶and there doesn‚Äôt seem to be a way to display all the park sites without you grouping them‚Ä¶again, anotherstep I have to go through.  Please, can I have my old simple app back? | Why would you take what was a good app, and turn it into this?!?!  The new map is horrible and the app is much worse now in general | My favorite part of the original app was the way I could sort categories on a map.  I could see what is in the area while I was traveling.  It would also change the graphic colors on parks I have visited on the maps.  This version requires me to know the name of a park before I look up the information.  I hate this new version.  I have been to 50 national Parks & they only appear on a list.  Even worse the update no longer recognizes I paid for the guides. | Every time I switch to my Google Notes app to look up the date I visited a park, this app forces me to log back in and go through the process of finding the park that I was updating. So frustrating! | I‚Äôve been using this app since it started and love it! I track all of my trips and have recorded my past trips, and the guides are helpful. | And the stamp locations? | I tried to find out terms of use for renewals, etc, but the app makes this simple function impossible. Still trying to find this basic user info page after 20 mins. I don‚Äôt want to ‚Äúauto-renew‚Äù as I only plan to use this app for a certain trip in 2021. So... this app lost cred with me right away. | I‚Äôve had Chimani for years and bought a lifetime membership in 2018. Their customer service is outstanding!  Kerry has helped me with a complicated subscription issue and worked everything out for me. I now have one account with all my info. Can‚Äôt wait to use it on our big upcoming trip! | I recently started using the Chimani National Park app and I love it! Very helpful information and a great tool for planning trips to parks we want to visit. Wish I had known about this app years ago. Can‚Äôt wait for more state parks to be added. | I paid 29.99 and didn‚Äôt get anything???? What a waste of money, I want Apple to refund my $$ for this app purchase!! | It‚Äôs a sad  you are forcing people to a subscription model. I Bought the Smoky mountain app and now it will not be supported anymore. | Trails are only visible when zoomed in so far one cannot get the big picture. 
Also it would be nice to be able to highlight individual trails since otherwise it is hard to see which trail is which when there are many intersections | Why doesn‚Äôt the app show the gateway arch or Indiana Dunes as national parks yet? | I use tons of apps, but rarely do reviews, but, with such exemplary support, I have to do this review. 
There was a small problem with my account, caused by me, and they happily rectified it lightning quick. 
I love supporting worthy developers. Thanks! | It might be a good app if you spend the $30 a year subscription, but the free app is worthless.

I wish that in the description the App developer was clear about the subscription costs.  Many apps have a free version that has some things, but this free version is useless

The information you get is absolutely not worth the price of this subscription. All of it you could easily get online or from the literature at the entrance gate of national parks. | Wouldn't store park info before. Now they charge a ridiculous fee for info that can be had for free from other sources. I have deleted this app. | There is absolutely no redeeming feature of this app. The parks themselves provide better and more insight than this ripoff. They stole $30 from me, DO NOT let this happen to you! A complete waste of storage space. | Not free at all.  Will not let you try it out unless you have either sufficient funds on apple store for full year or credit card  on file with apple | I‚Äôve been using this app for many years and find it incredibly useful!  There are a few little things that have been identified in other reviews, so I‚Äôm not going to repeat them.  This app is well worth having and using if you frequent the National Parks - especially if you hike into the parks, beyond the parking lots and congestion.  I spend a lot of time on remote trails, and some not so remote.  There have been several times this app helped me find my way back after a long day on a confusing trail system. I always carry a paper map (as a backup), but there‚Äôs nothing like being able to view your location on a downloaded map of the trail system!  Btw, I even carry a small solar panel to charge my phone.
As with most apps, you MUST use it and familiarize yourself with it to fully benefit from its many features. | This app is great for planning national park trips! I‚Äôve used it on my last five and it always gives great tips and ideas. Download it! | I would pay a small fee but I don‚Äôt want the hassle of. Setting up a subscription and canceling etc. just make it an in app purchase and be done with it | best app for traveling to canyons. | The app work fine on my android phone, but I am unable to download Park guides on the iPad app. | This used to be a free 5 star app. Then they changed their model to a rather expensive pay-for basis. In the meantime I have loaded years of info covering some 37 National Parks and I am now locked out of that data because they now insist I pay a fee to look at MY DATA!

I‚Äôm pretty angry. Not because they need to charge money for what is a pretty good app but they didn't give me chance to get my data or give me free access to the parks I‚Äôd already been to (and provided them info on). My data made this app better but I‚Äôm locked out of it. So when did I go to the Talus Cave at Pinnacles NP, or hike Wheeler Peak at Great Basin? | This app is not user friendly. I paid for the year and I can‚Äôt figure out the trip planning. I downloaded the minimal map and the other one that was supposed to be more detailed, they were the same. This app is a waste of money. | Why on earth would I pay a subscription for what is essentially a database of National Park brochures. I can download these for free on the internet. | Because I had used the free version of the app to plan our park visits, it was easy to decide to pay for the lifetime membership.  The features I like most are the descriptions with photos and maps for hiking.  The app also allows you to easily keep track of parks you have visited - nice if all of the National Parks are on a bucket list.  Customer support is very responsive. | The app was a tremendous assistance while we toured Yellowstone and Grand Teton National Parks.  Real time downloaded info and location identification made our park visits more enjoyable and less work than would have been possible with hard copy maps.  Great purchase.  Bought the lifetime membership to help with future park visits. | We have used the Chimani App over the past couple of years at various National Parks with great results. We purchase a lifetime subscription and are definitely getting out monies worth.

title: Skiplagged: Flight Booking
description:
We are the original and best hidden city booking engine. Find cheap flights and hotel rates you won‚Äôt see anywhere else. Save hundreds of dollars compared to other travel sites.

Discover extraordinary travel deals, set fare alerts, and uncover great hotel rates.

We‚Äôre so good, United Airlines actually sued us for it!

‚Ä¢ Find flights other search engines won‚Äôt show you -- including HIDDEN-CITY flights and arbitrary round-trips
‚Ä¢ Filter flights by duration, number of layovers, takeoff/landing time and more
‚Ä¢ Our powerful search engine pulls in the best deals to save you from having to google flights and check multiple sites
‚Ä¢ Monitor prices for trips you have in the hopper and let us alert you when the best deal is available
‚Ä¢ Book hotels as well, including last-minute hotels and special deals
‚Ä¢ Filter hotels, read reviews and view traveler ratings
‚Ä¢ We now offer car rental as well, so you can use one app as your complete trip planner
‚Ä¢ Our new Stories feature lets you book activities for your vacation - take a brewery tour, rent a kayak, or buy tickets in advance and get your guide to museums and exhibits

The fine print: a HIDDEN-CITY flight is a flight where you get off at the layover rather than the final destination. For example, a flight from New York to San Francisco might be $300, but a similar flight from New York to Seattle with a layover in San Francisco might be $200. If you‚Äôre going to San Francisco we‚Äôll show you both flights, and if you choose the cheaper one, you get off the plane at the layover (San Francisco) rather than going to the final destination (Seattle).

This is perfectly legal and the savings can be significant, but if you‚Äôve never traveled like this before, you should read our HIDDEN-CITY FAQ at¬†http://skiplagged.com/faq

We‚Äôll always show you all the options, so YOU can pick the deal you want!
releaseNotes:
This update includes bug fixes and performance improvements.

Like us? Please leave a review in the App Store! NOW GO FLY
reviews:
I CAN NOT BELIEVE THESE AWESOME PRICES!!! I am blown away!!! I will be flying away more often. Thank you Skiplagged!!! | Makes it so easy and best prices. With money being a little more tight I decided to expand my horizons and fly whatever was the cheapest haha. My friend referred me to this app and I‚Äôm so in love and I‚Äôm telling everyone haha ü§£ I‚Äôve been missing all the good deals for too long ! I‚Äôm trying more budget friendly practices and this is my new go to for flights ! | This is and has been one of the best sites for travel all around the world! The prices and features are great! | I heard great things about this app, I booked 2 separate flights through them and I was charged 40$ from Skiplagged which I‚Äôm not understanding why | I always get very good prices when I book with Skip-lagged. | Love it!! It's easy to use and super fast! | So I used this for the first time and however the company made my reservation landed me with 8 reservations which was a red flag. From there I was told the flag was for fraud. I was told that if I do not continue to the final destination I will be black listed from the airline. It just isn‚Äôt worth it save yourselves. | This is a great site to book a quick flight for cheap price. I will review it again once my son takes his flight. | Useless | If you can travel light & not check bags, this is a legitimate service that Skiplagged provides that will routinely save you money, especially if you‚Äôre willing to #1 travel light, #2 book a couple weeks in advance, #3 not be the type of person that has change your flight multiple times before you actually go. | The unexpected charges upon arrival at the hotel we booked were ridiculous and were not made known to us before arrival. We were told we should‚Äôve booked directly through the hotel instead of a third party (Skiplagged), and we would‚Äôve been made aware of the additional charges. Why allow booking through third parties to begin with if that‚Äôs the case? Why would Skiplag not inform customers? | I have found myself using Skiplagged for years now and saving thousands of dollars on flights. I love that you can find the best deals with the best airlines. I highly recommend to anyone who travels on a budget. | I was in Bratislava, Slovakia and skipedlag got me home to jfk on short notice for 600usd. This is definitely the travelers app to consult | So easy to navigate the site for the best days to book flight for the best rates! | Why was i charged $10 after. | Is this app intended for traveling mice?  Why are the origin and Destination on the top of the search SO FREAKING SMALL??? | This site keeps me on top. | Been using it for years and have had no regrets- even wasting travel credits towards a free flight. | I was given a $10 and was not allowed to use it and was no option to add it at checkout. What‚Äôs up with the false advertising? | It‚Äôs my first time using this App, hope everything will be fine. Many thanks for creators. | I‚Äôm excited to have booked a flight for my nieces 9th birthday, with nonstop to and from; i have anxiety and couldn‚Äôt fathom a layover flight but my brother in law sent me this link and now I'm ready to pack; thanks Skiplagged. | You have a great prices at the right time | I would like this app to give me the option to filter-out flights on certain airplanes. I do not have confidence in Boeing, so it is important to me to be able to easily filter-out Boeing flights. | Skiplagged has saved me at least $1000 in the span of one year. Absolutely changed my life. It‚Äôs a Swiss Army knife for digital nomads. | This App is good for window shopping specifically to see the graphs for pricing. Never make a mistake of purchasing through this App. I booked for SJC to DFW, the ticket after the purchase is for SJC to LGA with a stop over in DFW. When reached out to then they said it‚Äôs called hidden city booking and I should have seen that in the terms or whatever. The problem is I can‚Äôt check in bags because of wrong destination and can‚Äôt cancel the ticket either as there is no refund. | Love frontier thanks for letting me book everytime | Skiplagged is epic for flight and hotel specials. I want take some time to say thank you to the creators of this app and bless you for your works. I saved lots time with this app | This is the best App I have ever used. Thank you! | Best travel site ever! Thank you | As a frequent flyer I am always looking for the best flights. Skiplagged is always the first app I open when booking flights. Such an easy to use app and very great valued ticket prices. I would recommend Skiplagged to anyone flying. | Was charged 9.99 without explanation!!!!! What is this charge for? | WHY BUY PROTECTION ON A FLIGHT IF YOU NEVER REFUND THE MONEY! | The cost of flights have increased since the pandemic.  Skiplagged offers great deals at great prices! | Very grateful to have this booking service!
Many options & great pricing! | The only app I use for booking | This used to be one of my favorite apps, but the latest update isn‚Äôt ‚Äúbug fixes and enhancements‚Äù; it‚Äôs forcing users to permit additional data collection and tracking. There is no option to opt out of this.  There is only the option to press ‚Äúcontinue.‚Äù  I do not want additional tracking, even if they claim they won‚Äôt sell my data.   I have serious concerns about privacy as well as price manipulation (a strategy used by some airline websites, using cookies and similar tools to show higher fares to users who have previously searched for that flight).   Even if Skiplagged isn‚Äôt doing this, I find the forced additional tracking to be extremely disrespectful to users who value privacy and autonomy.   I regret updating the app and wish I could revert to the old version. | Skiplagged charged MORE then the actual cost of the flight. This is not counting the service fee or additional protections I purchased which I am already being refunded for. Now, the issue.

The price of my flight alone and the flight cost listed by the airline have an $86.04 dollar difference. I am currently in talks with them to see where the extra money went on their end. It was canceled same day so I am supposed to get a full refund. Depending on how the issue is resolved, I will update my review. But why is there a difference in the first place? | It‚Äôs not always the cheapest, but most of the time & usually I can find a great deal, even on last minute flights. | So janky. The user interface is embarrassingly elementary. Don‚Äôt give them your info, it‚Äôll be compromised! | Excellent !!! | Great way to get away last minute | Do not book with this app unless you will be put on the no fly list for fraud unfortunately they don‚Äôt tell you this!! | Love this app | Thank you for such a great platform to conveniently get a to. Of information and ways how to save you a ton of money on the same trip.
I truly appreciate you exist. Thank you founders and app developers for such a brilliant idea and great execution. Brilliant work. | Using skiplagged makes so much sense. At your fingertips. Dependable | I love the options and savings available on this app. Salute.

title: TravelSpend: Travel Budget App
description:
TravelSpend is an app to track your spending while traveling the world. It's perfect for you if you are planning your next trip or are already on vacation. If you travel in a group you can share expenses with friends and family to see ‚Äúwho owes who.‚Äù

This app is for travelers like you - no matter if you are a solo traveler on a sabbatical, a couple backpacking together or a group of friends on a weekend holiday.
 
Try it now for free!
(unlimited free expenses)
 
TRACK YOUR TRAVEL EXPENSES
We designed TravelSpend specifically for travelers. It's quick and easy to use and works offline. You can add photos and spread expenses over multiple days.
 
STICK TO YOUR BUDGET
The app will help you keep track of your travel budget and to save money.
 
DON'T WORRY ABOUT CURRENCY EXCHANGE RATES
Add expenses in any currency. They will automatically convert to your home currency.
 
SHARE & SYNC
Invite friends or family and organize your budget together. Your data syncs in real-time across multiple devices. 
 
SPLIT COSTS
Share your trip with your partner or a group of friends and keep track of who owes whom. Split bills, check your balances and settle debts all within TravelSpend.
 
GAIN INSIGHTS FROM YOUR SPENDING
See your spending data visualized. You'll be able to analyze your spending so you can avoid overspending.
 
EXPORT YOUR DATA
To create expense reports you can easily export your spending data to a CSV file anytime. 
 
‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî
 
You can use the app free of charge forever. Some functionality can be activated by purchasing the ‚ÄúPremium‚Äù version.
 
‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî
 
Terms of Service: https://travel-spend.com/terms
Privacy Policy: https://travel-spend.com/privacy_policy
releaseNotes: We fixed a technical problem with accepting trip invites.
reviews:
What a waste. I‚Äôm trying to compare to Tripcoin and the first thing I do is go to enter my first receipt and you have to pay. You would be smart to allow full access for a few days. | I understand not being able to edit more than one trip at a time, but it won‚Äôt even tell you how much you spent on prior trips unless you have premium - it just deletes the data.

Made it pretty unusable for a multi country SE asia trip unless you edit it to all be one trip, and then the data is totally muddled and useless. | Thank you for all the work on this app. I love it! This is exactly what I was looking for. The ability to track all the expenses of a trip from valet tips to coffee to hotels. It works for driving or flying. I cannot say it enough, I love it. | easy to mange and cute emoticons really like that it calculates a lot of stuff for you! | Love this app - I‚Äôve always wanted to track our Trip expenses but somehow after several days the notebook loses its luster - but this works! Thanks for this easy and user friendly solution! | During our planning for a 3 month European adventure we realized that we would need to find a way to record expenses during the trip. We looked in the App Store and came across this App. We downloaded it and immediately started recording the expenses that we had already incurred. We then started recording those expenses that we had not yet incurred but planned (reservations). It was then, on the first day, we realized we had found that tool. We immediately upgraded to the premium lifetime version. 

That was over 3 months ago. We have returned from that trip. Every day, wherever we were, we EASILY entered every transaction creating thorough and comprehensive history of expenses. After we returned we exported the data into a spreadsheet, formatted the data and proceeded to reconcile all our credit card accounts as well as enter the data in Quicken (our household finance management tool). A task that we originally dreaded. The process while not easy was absolutely made easier with the use of this App. During the process, we were able to go back into the App and confirm receipts that we could not even remember what they were by piecing together info we easily recorded in real time months before. The App‚Äôs functionalities to convert multiple currencies and geo locate transactions are invaluable! 

We are pleased that we have a lifetime subscription since we will never travel with out it. Actually, we are constant travelers and already have three other major in the planning stages. We now build trips before we go with all the reservations. We will also use it for short trips. 

While it is exceptional just the way it is now, in the spirt of feedback here is a suggestion. Create a ‚Äúnote field‚Äù to record some general related info that the user may believe is relevant to the transaction. This would be different from the current ‚Äúnote‚Äù field that really functions more like a transaction title field that I believe could be retitled. 

In summary, if you‚Äôre looking for an easy to use but robust expense tracking App, you found a very good one! | We have been traveling for few months and we use the app to keep track of our budget every day since the beginning of our journey. It‚Äô s really well done and simple and intuitive. I recommended it for any one who like to travel like us. In addition the new version is nice upgrade. | We are full time travelers and so I use this app every day. It‚Äôs an excellent app, but I would appreciate being able to see a month view to track spending on a monthly basis in addition to by the trip. I‚Äôd also like the app to keep track of how many days long each trip is. I‚Äôd also like to be able to put in a daily budget and have the app calculate the budget for the trip based on the length of the trip I enter. Thanks! | It‚Äôs absolutely perfect for traveling, gives you your average daily spend. Let‚Äôs you know how much you have left, everything about it‚Äôs great. I even use it now as a college student to do simple budgeting for my daily life | User of paid for 4+ Years. I rarely write reviews.
TravelSpend App meets all my requirements for tracking multi currency travel expenses.
App can be used as simply or comprehensively  as user decides. 
Got immediate practical support from developer today. Thank you- and wish Prosperity again in 2023. | I actually enjoy tracking my expenses with this app! Love how I can split a cost into however many months needed, and that it converts to my home currency. | Downloaded the trial to test it out and input my travel expenses and all my data disappeared without any warning. Unless you want to pay $30+, don‚Äôt bother downloading. | Thank you so much for all of your time and effort creating this application! It has almost every feature you can think of and it is truly an amazing product!! 

Please consider adding the feature for a quick add in regards to expenses. Sometimes while on the go, you just want to add the amount and the title really quickly so you don‚Äôt forget about it later. Then when you have more time go back and put in all the details. I was checking out similar applications and you can check out the feature in Trip Coins app. They‚Äôre lacking several features you have, but they do have the quick add feature. I would recommend adding this to your 2.0 version. 
Also, it looks like they are one of your top competitors. One of the main differences is that their application is free, and yours requires a monthly subscription. I don‚Äôt mind paying, but to attract more customers you might want to think about a promotion or lowering your prices initially. 

Thanks again for creating a great application! Hope to see the quick add in the near future!! | Well thought out travel expenses tracking. Just enough features, without bloat. The team is responsive to suggestions. | I rarely say that about apps. We use this for all of our trips. | I‚Äôve tracked expenses in excel on backpacking trips before and it worked fine, but once I discovered this app, I knew I was never going back. It‚Äôs super easy to quickly jot down any expense right as I do the transaction. And the reporting it pretty neat too. title: JetBlue - Book & manage trips
description:
Take JetBlue everywhere you go! Download our award-winning app to book, manage and check in for your trips, access boarding passes and more. 
 
Day of travel ‚Äì Your day of travel is a breeze with key info, including your boarding pass, right on the home screen.  
 
Manage trips ‚Äì Update your seat selection, add extras or make changes to your itinerary with just a few taps. 
 
Boarding pass ‚Äì Check in and get to your gate quickly without the hassle of printing a boarding pass ‚Äì one less thing to carry on! 
 
My trips ‚Äì Add your upcoming and past itineraries to access everything you need to know. 
 
Book flights ‚Äì Search and book your next trip with ease. 
 
Chat with us ‚Äì Get your questions answered quickly and connect with a JetBlue crewmember through live chat.  
 
Travel Tools ‚Äì Add hotels, vacation rentals, car rentals and extras with Paisly or schedule a shuttle to the airport.  
 
Inflight experience ‚Äì View all of our snacks, drinks and entertainment options. 
 
My TrueBlue ‚Äì Enroll or sign in to TrueBlue to keep track of your TrueBlue points, view your Travel Bank balance (if you have one), request points for past trips and enjoy a more personalized experience. 
 
& More ‚Äì Access our flight tracker, airport maps and other content.
releaseNotes:
‚Ä¢ Various updates.
‚Ä¢ That‚Äôs all, folks.

title: TravelBoast: My Journey Routes
description:
Do you like to travel and do you have Instagram? Excellent! This app will help you to create awesome posts and stories about your travels for your Instagram profile!

It's really simple. Choose transport, enter your route, press the START button, and enjoy a fun animation of your trip. Share your trips with your friends in the language of video maps.

Show off the interesting trips you've taken to your friends and post them on social media. 

-Create your own unique trip routes.
-Choose any transport and hit the road. 
-Save the results as a video.
-Send videos to your friends or post them on social media.

100 unique means of transport await you, including real and imaginary ones. The number of vehicles will regularly increase with each update. Leave comments about vehicles you'd like to take for a spin, but aren't in the app.

Don‚Äôt forget to visit our Instagram profile @TravelBoast
releaseNotes: - Fixed minor errors

title: Last Minute ‚Äì Cheap Flights
description:
Bonus! 15 Best Travel Tips

The best money-saving tip! Departure on a ***, Tuesday or Saturday. 

What are the secrets to booking cheap flights? The real secret to booking cheap flights is geographic pricing. 

Download it now to learn more.

777 airlines worldwide send us last-minute flight deals. Find, compare, and book cheap flights faster than ever before ‚Äì all from one beautiful app. Download the best flight search and booking app now!

„Ç∑ CHEAPEST, QUICKEST & BEST

Need to find cheap flights on the go? Save money and time with our fast & user-friendly app. Search and compare 777 airlines all over the world from wherever you are to find the perfect flights at the lowest fares.

„Ç∑ BEST FLIGHT SEARCH & BOOKING APP

We have won numerous awards as best flight comparison app and are recommended by the fine people at CNN, the New York Times, Mashable, TIME and the Daily Telegraph. With only one tap, you can see which ticket is the cheapest, quickest or best deal. All you have to do is choose and you are ready to travel the world!

„Ç∑ WE DON‚ÄôT CHARGE ANY FEES

We search across all airlines, major travel sites and 100 low-cost carriers worldwide, find the best flight tickets and direct you for free to the companies that sell them. It‚Äôs free! We are an indie app and dedicated to price transparency for all travelers.

„Ç∑ 100% SECURE BOOKING


„Ç∑ HERE‚ÄôS WHY WE ARE #1 APP FOR BOOKING CHEAP FLIGHTS:

‚Äì Book directly from your device
‚Äì Beautiful and easy to use ‚Äì finding flights doesn‚Äôt have to be tricky and dull
‚Äì Not ready to book? Save your results for later, or share them via email or text

‚Äì Find the cheapest travel dates to fly and cheapest airports for your trips! 
‚Äì Filter tickets quickly and easily by stops, departure or arrival time, airlines, airport, ticket type, and travel site
‚Äì Price calendar helps you find the best fares for your budget by showing the average prices on different dates in an interactive calendar

As a result, we find you the very best possible flight deals, thanks to our hardworking robots. Award winner ‚Äì our app has been featured on CNN, the New York Times, Mashable, TIME and the Daily Telegraph.

Download the best flight search and booking app now! It‚Äôs fast, user-friendly & free

title: StudentUniverse: Cheap Travel
description:
The ultimate travel & flight booking app for students & youth‚Äîsave up to 30% off flights! Search, compare and book cheap flights and hotels and get exclusive student discounts with a free student or youth (18-25) membership. Our members saved $3.9 million dollars on flights with us‚Äîjust last year!

Millions of students are already booking cheap flights and saving money with StudentUniverse‚Äîso what are you waiting for?

StudentUniverse allows you to search and compare flights from 220+ major airlines, such as American Airlines, United Airlines, Jetblue, Alaskan Airlines, Delta Air Lines, Air Canada, British Airways, Qatar Airways, Air China, China Eastern, Air Canada, Westjet, Lufthansa, KLM and more. Compare all of these airlines and more on a single search to easily find the best itineraries and cheap flight deals, plus get student discounts across all of your favorite airlines.

Why StudentUniverse?

Student Discounts
We‚Äôre the only flights and hotels app that offers exclusive travel deals for students and young travelers.

Book Flights & Hotels
Search and compare hundreds of airlines, hotels and itineraries to find the best travel deals or last minute flights, all in one place.

Flexible Searches
Flexible schedule? Use our flexible search feature to find the cheapest flights available near the dates you want.

Stay in-the-know
Book in-app
Book your travel straight from your phone.

Need more convincing?
Easily filter your search results by time, price, airline, length of itinerary or other options to make sure you find the best fit.
Sort hotel searches by price, amenities, accommodation type or TripAdvisor rating.
Get access to hidden student flights discounts with a free membership.
Keep track of your plans with your itineraries available in the app anytime you need them.
Enable push notifications for app-only sales and exclusive promo codes to save even more on your next trip.
Easily add travel insurance to protect your trip.
Get the option to fly greener by offsetting your flight‚Äôs carbon emissions with renewable energy certifications.
Save your traveler information to speed up the checkout process.
Find all of our contact information in the app in case you need support or want to make a change to your reservation.

Whether you‚Äôre studying abroad, planning a weekend trip, gearing up for spring break, need a last minute flight or just heading home for the holidays, StudentUniverse gets you cheap flights whenever and wherever you need.

Say hello:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/studentuniverse
Instagram: @studentuniverse
releaseNotes:
Our latest update is helping you get all the things you‚Äôll need for your trip. Forgot to book that luggage when you booked your flight? Now you can add it anytime before your trip - right from the ‚ÄòMy Trips‚Äô tab. So go ahead and add those extras now, or later!
Got some feedback or see a glitch? We‚Äôre here for it! Please send any suggestions you may have on how we can improve our app to appfeedback@studentuniverse.com and we‚Äôll be happy to consider it.

I contacted my bank and the airlines directly who gave me the refund for $1700 for the inconvenience. But these crazy people, not only did they rebilled my account after4 MONTHS with $1700 again, even after telling all the details what happened, they as a merchant straightaway lied to the airlines to finally rebilling the amount from my card again.
