However, since the last update, it‚Äôs been crashing while searching for flights and it‚Äôs now impossible to use. | Just there was an easy way to add trip details to my calendar. I have to do it manually. And when I share my trip info with my gf, she says she has to enter in my email address and confirmation number to view the itinerary‚Äîso many unnecessary steps.

Product owner needs to ask themself why they chose to implement the ability to explore next trip based on user‚Äôs zodiac sign over the ability to add to calendar. Bad choice IMO. | A friend of mine told me that this was a good app to find good prices as a college student. Unfortunately, I haven‚Äôt been able to see if it‚Äôs as great as she told me because it wouldn‚Äôt let me confirm my student status, and I‚Äôm scare of but the tickets without doing that first because what if they raise my prices last minute because of that? What if they end up charging me more claiming that it‚Äôs because I never confirmed my student status? If anyone can help me with that I‚Äôll be more than thankful and happy to change my review | I fly a lot, a lot a lot, I flew booking with student universe too, gave them second chances at thought maybe it‚Äôll save money. NO. Please listen it‚Äôll save you so many headaches, they won‚Äôt and can‚Äôt save you anything. Absolute scam, their whole MO is making customers think they‚Äôre paying less, but they NEVER BOOK YOU WHAT THEY SAY THEY WILL. They always say ‚Äúeconomy‚Äù when you book BUT ITS ACTUALLY ECONOMY LIGHT AT BEST. Not even light, the ones with absolute no carry-on/baggage at all, last second tickets that other companies toss away. If they tell you that going in, whatever, but be prepared to pay an extra $300 USD for every international flight (the whole flight is only $400). There‚Äôs no way to know what flight they‚Äôre booking for you since they lie and say ‚Äúdon‚Äôt know baggage allowance‚Äù and you don‚Äôt know until a few days before when you can check in to your airline‚Ä¶ It‚Äôs so fuqed up who would book an international flight without even a CARRY ON??? The whole thing is so shady, so deceitful, zero transparency. They know what they‚Äôre doing, ridiculous company that scams ‚Äústudents‚Äù without being upfront on what kind of flights are being booked. Their profit margins must be huge but they have zero ethical values. Hopefully they get sued someday, this happens for every. flight. I‚Äôve. Booked. Basically booking.com with less transparency and false assurance of ‚Äúhelping poor students.‚Äùü§¶‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è a lot of you might be like me, false hope it‚Äôll save you something, please I beg you just avoid, you have enough stress on your plate as is. | Way to expensive | I‚Äôve always had a lot of years of student universe. Their stuff are super helpful and quick to rearrange flight plans. Their app is easy to use and I love their prices. | I haven‚Äôt found any relevant deals for me and decided to delete the app because I also didn‚Äôt feel comfortable giving any ID information, but the app simply won‚Äôt give you the option to delete your account! | Love it. Short, Sweet & to the Point. | Easy to sign up but I did not see anywhere to confirm a flight or check-in.  Rates are ridiculously inexpensive! | ^^ | There literally just isn‚Äôt a reason to use StudentUniverse. They add fees with no clear benefit to using their services and terrible assistance. They‚Äôre trying to charge +$700 for a flight change. Save yourself the headache and just book straight through an airline, I‚Äôm not even sure why this company exists. | Twice my booking was cancelled for stupid reason. Won‚Äôt recommend it to anyone. | i‚Äôm looking for newark, nj airport flights and keep showing me La Guardia, NY information why??? | I love this app, not many adds, hustle free and really good prices, if you‚Äôre a student or under 25 years old I‚Äôd highly recommend using this app | I love Student Universe! I book almost every flight with them because they have great deals and I‚Äôve never had any problems. They also have very friendly, quick, and helpful customer service representatives.

title: Citymapper: All Live Transit
description:
Instantly compare your travel options in real-time across all transport modes globally! 

Easily navigate your city with turn-by-turn directions for all your public transportation, walking, cycling and scooter trips.

THOUSANDS OF 5 STAR REVIEWS

* "This is my favorite transit app. Full-featured and a breeze to use. I really appreciate the Uber integration."

* "Only way to get around NYC and Chicago. Easy and accurate. Download this one NOW"

* "I love it. It‚Äôs the best thing since zippers, peanut and jelly and 1 TB thumb drives"

* "Support for the SF Bay Area is particularly impressive because it aggregates all transit systems imaginable (BART, Caltrain, MUNI, VTA, etc.) into one seamless app"

FIND THE BEST ROUTE ‚ñ∫ Simple trip planning combining all transport modes:¬†bus, subway, train, ferry, cabs, ride share, car share, bike share, e-scooters and walking. Discover routes you never knew existed

HIT THE GO BUTTON FOR STEP-BY-STEP DIRECTIONS ‚ñ∫ Turn-by-turn navigation for all your transit, walking, personal cycling, bike shares and scooter trips. Choose between 3 different map views, see the charge levels of e-scooters and e-bikes around you, we even help you avoid no-parking zones. We take care of the logistical thinking so you are free to enjoy the ride

EXPERIENCE ONE-STOP-SHOP MOBILITY ‚ñ∫ Compare cab fares, hail a ride, hop on a shared bike or find the nearest e-scooter all from within the app. Our partners include: Uber, Lyft, JUMP, Lime, Bird, Spin, Skip, Scoot, Citi Bike, JerseryBike, Bluebikes, Indego, CaBi, Divvy, Metro Bike, Breeze, Bay Wheels, Healthy Ride, Relay, BCycle, SA Bike Share, GREENbike, Grid, RTC Bike, BIKETOWN, Biki 

BEAT THE RUSH HOUR CROWD ‚ñ∫ Live wait times and ETA so you'll never miss a bus, train or ferry again. Follow your bus / train as it's approaching on a real-time map, see the best train car to board, get alerted when it's time to get off, and get in and out from the best exit at any subway / train station 

PERSONALIZE YOUR CITY ‚ñ∫ Save Home, Work and your go-to stops or stations for lightning fast trip planning. Subscribe to your favorite subway, train, bus or ferry line for automatic disruption, delay, and status alerts

GET SOCIAL ‚ñ∫ Share your live trip: let friends follow your live trip to know when you'll arrive. Share any location or address: one tap for others to get directions

TRAVEL OFFLINE ‚ñ∫ Access offline the official NYC subway map, Manhattan bus map, Brooklyn bus map, Queens bus map, DC metro map, Muni Metro map, and more

CITY COVERAGE ‚ñ∫ New York City | Chicago | Los Angeles | San Francisco | Washington DC | Boston | Philadelphia | Seattle | Miami | Atlanta | Portland | Denver | Baltimore | San Diego | Minneapolis | Houston | Phoenix | Dallas | Las Vegas | Pittsburgh | Honolulu | Salt Lake City | San Antonio | St. Louis |  Cleveland | Austin   

+ Many more worldwide! See the full list and vote for the next one in the app or at https://citymapper.com/cities

TRANSIT AGENCIES ‚ñ∫ We use open data from transit agencies in the cities we cover, including: MTA | CTA | LA Metro | MBTA | WMATA | SEPTA | NJ Transit | Muni | BART | King Bus | MARTA | LIRR | RTD | TriMet | Metro-North Railroad | PATH | Houston METRO | San Diego MTS | Miami-Dade Transit | Metro Transit | METRA | RTC Bus | TheBus | Port Authority | DART | AC Transit | Sound Transit | UTA | OCTA | VIA | PTD | Metro Transit | RTA | Capital Metro | Broward County Transit Division | NY Waterway Ferries | Washington State Ferries | LBT | Nassau Inter County Express (NICE)| Valley Metro | Metrolink | Santa Monica Big Blue Bus (BBB)

KEEP IN TOUCH ‚ñ∫ If you have questions or feedback or something we may have missed in your city email us at support@citymapper.com


Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/Citymapper

Privacy Policy: https://citymapper.com/privacy
Terms of Service: https://citymapper.com/terms
releaseNotes: This one fixes a few things and improves some very specific trips in some very specific places.
reviews:
So much better than using google maps. If you get stressed about which platform, which train, which exit...then this is the app. | I live in NYC and this is my main form of transit help. It‚Äôs easy to use. You add your home address, work, and favorite place to find a route with a click of a button.

The only issue is that sometimes it gets train arrival times incorrect. In my case, the 7 train never has correct arrival times. For some reason, around midday (mostly around 1:40) at least, it says that the 7 train is going to arrive at my designated station starting 3 pm. 

I have to google maps so I can get on the 7 train, which is twice a week I have to do this. 

Pls fix! | Sometimes the location on what part of the train to enter be inaccurate | Ok Wow this app puts google maps to absolute shame. I‚Äôm a New Yorker who prefers to take the bus when I can (sunlight + cell service!) but NYC bus schedules can be notoriously unreliable depending on traffic, weather, politics of the week. This app has VERY impressive real-time tracking of trains and busses. I haven‚Äôt waited 15 minutes for a train or bus in months now because I check this long before I do google maps. THANK YOU | App no longer works‚Äî won‚Äôt let me change departure location. When I try the screen goes black and the app crashes. I updated it and the same thing happens. | So baffled‚Ä¶ did anybody ask for this??? | Can‚Äôt believe what a wonderful and efficient APP this is!üëçüòä
It works perfect and took me all around the city I was in. | Love Citymapper especially the ‚Äúbest doors‚Äù features. I can stay out of everyone‚Äôs way, deal with public transit snafus with ease, and get where I want to go without unnecessary hassle. | App works great for getting around the city. Only thing that would make it better is allowing me to out multiple stops in and the solving for the best way to do them all. | It was priceless. Helped with the, bus, walking and biking. | Used to be Moovit // I even coined the tagline // CityMapper FTW | I was on a trip to England and I was lost and I relented my you guide recommended me this app. And I haven‚Äôt not used for since then | Great App | I live and travel all over the place, and Citymapper has been the most reliable navigation app I‚Äôve used. Others are fine as well, but I really like their interface, the clean layout showing all the options (walking, transit, cars, etc), and - living mostly in Paris - especially the alerts re service outages in various transit lines. It‚Äôs reliable, works in most major cities (I have used it extensively in Paris, London, and LA personally), and even the free version (with minor footer ads, not obtrusive to the usability) is great. Big fan. | I wish there was a widget or a live activity for a specific station without the entire transit navigation to keep an eye on a specific bus in a specific bus stop. If one is missed the other is shown. This would really help in catching the next bus. | I downloaded this app after coming across a recommendation, but it‚Äôs been a letdown. The app crashes every time I try to start a trip, despite my software being up-to-date and attempting a restart. Unfortunately, Citymapper is unusable at worst and unreliable and buggy at best. | I downloaded and tried Citymapper on a recent trip to Spain. Incredible experience! I quickly found myself preferring Citymapper over other major map apps. I even found it more reliable walking, but the transit options were terrific. Fantastic experience! | Works great in NYC, train times are accurate and offers far more routing choices than google/apple. Goes above and beyond with info about subway exits and Citi bike stations. Unbelievably, it‚Äôs free. Not for place search, but Citymapper is in a class of its own for getting from point to point. | Wow! Incremental updates but it‚Äôs looking so good üëè | And the best part is, it‚Äôs free | Works great but hate the new update. | If you‚Äôve any issues whatsoever with the app, rest assure that NO CUSTOMER SERVICE exists at all! I‚Äôve sent multiple emails (cause that‚Äôs the ONLY way from within the app) and waited forever and NOTHING. I‚Äôm just gonna delete the app and be done with it. 
Advice: Stay away from this service | Trust me when i say that you will definitely need this app when travelling to singapore specially for those who are new to the lion city ü§ç | Google maps is sometimes better. | This will get you anywhere you need to be in the world, as long as there is public transportation. | I cant without this app when I travel!  Would be cool to see to the trip options by price. | Great app especially for newcomers to city. | City mapper is point onüëçüèΩ | Best of best just use it for while and you will realise why it is best. | I‚Äôve tried other apps and they pale in comparison. Citymapper has been my go-to app for all things transit for years. 

I primarily get around by bike, and Citymapper is consistently more accurate, efficient, and sensible with bike routing than Google Maps ever is. 

On public transit, it will give you correct up-to-the-minute information you can rely on. 

Highly recommend this app above the rest | I would be totally lost without CityMapper on my week-long trip to New York City! A must-have for tourists!!! | I‚Äôve taken city mapper in many cities in the states and Europe and it continues to provide the best comprehensive transit information services. It‚Äôs not always perfect, but who amongst us is. It‚Äôs honestly such a gem! | Twice now my travel estimates have been off by 20-25m.  I use this app to figure out the fastest route to any location and avoid any train delays but it‚Äôs useless now. | I started a trip and the Dynamic Island is till showing stops even though the trip needed. I quit the app, and even restarted my phone. This is second time I‚Äôve experienced | Google is a privacy-hostile company. Use Apple Maps instead.

There also needs to be an iPad app. I have wrist pain and it‚Äôs much easier to use bigger screens. 

Lastly, the app should be enabled for Apple Vision Pro. I wanted to plan a route while using it and was very disappointed to see that it was disabled. | Thank you for making things so much easier | L‚Äôapplication n‚Äôarr√™te pas de buger. Mais aussi tr√®s bonne application juste les bug √ßa rend fou et √ßa d√©pense trop d‚Äô√©nergie | And always accurate | Greatest app in NYC for all transportation means. | Saved my life a couple times now :) | This app is a lifesaver! I come from a very rural area and am not used to traveling by metro much. Planned my first trip by metro that would involve multiple transfers and would be traveling alone and was super nervous, but thanks to this app I made it through! Plans out every step of the way (including what platform you need to be on - so helpful!) and updates for accurate train times and reroutes you to avoid delays. Absolutely made this trip possible and stress free for me, cannot recommend enough! | This app was once the best option for transit directions in NYC. Unfortunately recently the app has really gone downhill. Constant crashing, a glitchy interface, and consistently incorrect train information render this app useless. It makes more since to use Apple Maps or Google maps as the information in those apps is actually correct, which is very disappointing. | To whoever created this app, THANK YOU!!!
This is more effective and useful than any other app I have put to use. | This has been my favorite app for years - in fact, I depend on it now. In the past few weeks the app started acting funky and stopped working. I tried changing all my settings but nothing helped. So I deleted the app and downloaded it again. The app won‚Äôt even start, it freezes on a fully green screen. What‚Äôs going on? I will change my rating once I get some support, I wasn‚Äôt even able to get to the support page because the app does not work. All my other apps on my phone work fine, so it‚Äôs not my phone that‚Äôs the problem. Thanks! | I have been using this app for years for free.  Used it all over the UK and now back in the USA and D.C. I find it more accurate information the Metro Systems App and Google map app.

I recommend this app to people I see lost, all the time. | Based on Citymapper I bet my friend drinks for the night that I would beat him to the UWS. Citymapper said I would win handedly and I lost. 1 star. And someone owes me a $100 bar tab. 

The 1 had such a head start. How on earth did the 2 express win. Devastated. | Great already to gooo | I LOVE Citymapper and use it all the time. Unfortunately the latest update seems to have removed widgets from the iOS app. | Worst app for NYC doesnt keep up to date. | I love this app, it always helps me figure out the best way to get around. Especially a city I don‚Äôt know, but even a city I do!

title: Priority Pass‚Ñ¢
description:
Download the Priority PassTM app today to access the original and market-leading airport experiences programme. 
 
Activate your account in the Priority PassTM app in just 2 easy steps, giving yourself access to airport lounges and travel experiences in over 700 airports worldwide. Choose from an ever-growing range of premium experiences ‚Äì from spas to sleeping pods to dining ‚Äì to help elevate every journey into something special.
 
 
‚Ä¢Enjoy contactless entry with your Digital Membership Card

‚Ä¢Stay up to date, check your current membership entitlement and visit history

‚Ä¢Search for lounges and experiences, and save your favourites

‚Ä¢Unlock more with access to additional Travel Services and benefits that enhance your travel journey
 
 
Enrich your airport experience with the Priority PassTM app.
releaseNotes:
Thanks for using Priority Pass!
  
We regularly update the app to make it faster, safer and more engaging for you.
  
Here are a couple of the enhancements you'll find in this latest release:
  
 - Feature enhancements and  bug fixes
reviews:
The website does not say what details are needed for the particular line unless you click it multiple times. I found this difficult to enroll and did not know which plan I was being enrolled to with the card. It was clear as mud. | How do I edit my address?  Edit buttons don‚Äôt work in app. | This application is completely worthless. Will only let you select American Express, which I do not have obviously. Talk about a real disappointment. | No clubs in the most popular airports, and more locations close than open. Perhaps if you fly out of one of the very few airports that still has clubs it makes sense, but a pass for everyone else. The app is fine | I a member of a few and have found Priority to be the best of all lounges including Admiral and United | And now won‚Äôt show up as app on fone. Its there but no widget.  Super irritating | Unable to use the priority pass as a Chase Sapphire member. What a waste of this benefit. | I‚Äôm disappointed.   I‚Äôm here sitting in some miserable gate seats for hours in miserable terminal 5 at ORD.  Swissport Lounge was ‚Äúat capacity‚Äù but then the guys lists off airlines who‚Äôs passengers that do have access.   This is worthless.   This card represents the 2nd class leftovers like the dummies that you see waiting outside a night club because they are ‚Äúat capacity‚Äù and aren‚Äôt on ‚Äúthe list‚Äù.  

I suppose it is a marketing thing to show the world that they can have access to all these lounges to sell it the product, just to get rejected and realize they‚Äôve been duped.  

I‚Äôm going to write a review in every place that I can.  I‚Äôve got 3 hours to kill before my flight and another 16 hour plane ride with WiFi after that.  

Good luck with your business model. | I I joined Capital One Venture X card which says that I can be a member of Priority Pass. It‚Äôs been over a month now, and Priority Pass says they don‚Äôt recognize my card number. I called Priority Pass. They told me to call my bank. I called my bank they told me to call priority pass. This appears to be an unresolved issue and I think it is a scam. Reporting it to Better Business Bureau.
Just received a response from Priority Pass to this complaint. They told me to reach out to Customer Service. My arms are sore from reaching out to their customer service as well as Capital One. Continue to be disappointed in this offer. Deborah Owens. | Attempted to visit this Lounge and while few persons were visible in it we were told that is was all booked and we could not enter.  About 18 people we waiting to enter this vast understaffed facility when we arrived.  

Jeffrey T Skeim
Clearwater, FL | The app used to be great. Now I can see my renewed priority pass card but have no ability to change the expiration date on the credit card attached to reflect the new date. It gives the option to edit but when selected does not allow you to make any changes just exit back out. Also, it does not seem to be showing lounge information for almost any airport and I know there are lounges in some I regularly use. It has become useless. | I was looking forward to setting up my account with the Priority Pass but I‚Äôve struggled to even get the website to recognize my card number and two attempts to call the service number have resulted in calls being ended without being answered. Wish the experience were better, but it‚Äôs been absolutely disappointing | App or their website won‚Äôt let me change billing info. | So many website/app errors | None of the lounges were available because they weren‚Äôt giving Priority Pass access because there‚Äôs not enough tables. | Terrible app. Doesn‚Äôt work. | Great service, ugly new logo | Just tried to get in the lounge in lima, Peru, and was told my pass was not valid. | Priority Pass was involved in a data breach and now we cannot change our passwords through the app. The function simply doesn‚Äôt work | All doesn‚Äôt allow me to activate my account. I enter my membership number and click submit and nothing happens. Try by credit card and same. I just had to delete the app. I see all the bad recent reviews so why keep trying. | This has not been good for a very long time. I can‚Äôt recall the last time I was able to even use it. It‚Äôs a very disappointing (non) perk. | I loved using this pass at the Montego Bay airport. The food options were phenomenal and the space was cozy and relaxing. It was the perfect escape from the loud crowded spaces at the departure gates. I highly recommend priority pass! | I used to absolutely love the benefits of Priority Pass, and would always renew my membership. Now it is not worth it, I do not see much benefit to having it if your travels are primarily within the United States. Most airports nowadays seem to not have Priority Pass supported lounges. It seems that Priority Pass got cheap on us. Also, the app only has a few available airport maps, yet this is a big advertisement for the app. | Changed credit cards and had to get new Priority Pass. Even though old card is expired I can‚Äôt change my old user name to the new card. I tried contacting support to delete account but they were worse than useless. | I‚Äôm unable to update my personal information from my iPhone including my address and card information. I do like that it automatically finds the nearest airport. | Unable to retire e passwalrd or username due to nonfunctional buttons. | So, I keep seeing signs at establishments that have the Priority Pass logo and then once I present my card I'm told it‚Äôs not valid if the card is issued by AMEX or Capital One. THAT‚ÄôS certainly not something that is advertised. | I‚Äôve been a member for two years now and have been able to use the Priority Pass in many airports - almost all the airports I‚Äôve gone through have some PP option. 
The cost compared to what you get is really an outstanding value - definitely recommend to fellow travelers. | Almost no clubs at US airports | Several times we had to wait to get in the lounges. Cabo, twice and in Atlanta 45 minutes wait for one lounge and went to the other and it was a 15 minute wait and all seats were taken had to sit at bar stools. | LAX has no any lounge and it‚Äôs very poor! | Card expired and I cannot update the new expiry date in the app. | If more recent photos could be added would be great. Adding map of the airport to show location and walking time to lounge would make this 5 stars! | Cannot get any help AT All very disappointed traveling today to Denver oil maybe made a mistake with Capital one venture card | I recently had an unpleasant encounter with the front desk attendant at the Cibao airport Priority Club. Upon arrival, I expected to be greeted with warmth and professionalism, but unfortunately, I was met with rudeness and indifference. The attendant seemed disinterested in assisting me and displayed a lack of basic courtesy.

Not only did this tarnish my experience with the club, but it also left a negative impression of the entire establishment. As a frequent traveler, I value exceptional customer service, and this experience fell short of my expectations.

I hope that management takes steps to address this issue and ensure that all staff members embody the level of hospitality expected in such a setting. Until then, I hesitate to recommend this Priority Club to fellow travelers.

Thanks
Juan | It is a good perk to have when you travel but it is dissapointing that some lounges have limited hours, some that dont change their food/menu for months and months and some that you can access only before security check or if you are in transfer, you have to exit, go to lounge and then pass security again and that is what does not make sense because you will ‚Äúsave‚Äù money but waste a lot of time. Not bad anyway | I love this app because it quickly tells me what lounges I can use in any airport! | Half the lounges in this app don‚Äôt accept priority pass and the rest have a quota so you will be often turned away. I feel bad for anyone who actually pays money for this thing 

The priority pass lounges are often cheaper busier versions of nice lounges (Phuket has 3 lounges listed but only the smallest one accepts the card) or none (SFO we walked around for an hour to try all 3 international lounges and none let us in)

Also the map in the app is totally useless ‚Äî it has routing but you can‚Äôt search for a gate or locate yourself! | The Bangalore lounge denied me access because I didn‚Äôt have my physical card with me.
I had this app. I was logged in‚Ä¶ but I couldn‚Äôt find the virtual card. | Why have this pass when nothing is ever available? | No lounges via Priority Pass in LAX. Zero. Nada. Not good. | Holding a chase sapphire  reserve credit card, we travel a lot from LAX. No lounge here. | I have been to several lounges that say they don‚Äôt accept priority pass. For ones that do, the app here often has wrong opening hours or amenity information. 

In some places, Priority Pass is nearly useless anyway since it‚Äôs so over-subscribed. | Information is consistently wrong. Really fun to walk to a lounge and find you don‚Äôt have access, that the times are wrong, etc. Considering that priority pass is a membership you‚Äôd think they would allocate some funding to make sure this app is correct | We were surprised to learn that they would not bring out any more omelets because they were all out. Hot water was also out.  However, I must give a shout out to Alex who went around tables to clear finished items. He works hard to keep the tables clean. We really appreciated his diligence. | Unusable

Just make the card digital already.  It‚Äôs comical that you have to show a physical card at lounges | Friendly staff, very good hospitality! | Zero coverage in many major airports, but options plenty at others.  If your favorite cities around covered, it‚Äôs not much help. | Very crowded at 10 am on Sunday with many small loud children, think of a day care center.  Broccoli salad is excellent.  Services are great. | There are very few lounges available even in the largest airports. I‚Äôve been able to use it twice in five years and I travel every week. That‚Äôs just how useless it is. Two times I encountered lounges that were advertised to accept Priority Pass only to get turned away that they were not accepting Priority Pass for entry at that time. Think twice before accepting that included lounge access via Priority Pass is any benefit (eg, credit card programs). It is not.

title: KKday - Your Travel Companion
description:
‚ñ∫ App-Exclusive Deal: Enjoy a discount when you enter the promo code ""APP5OFF"" during checkout for your first KKday App purchase!

[Your Essential App for All Your Travel Adventures]
KKday is your one-stop travel companion, offering everything you need for your journey. From tickets and private car services to airport transfers, Wi-Fi, SIM cards, accommodations, and outdoor activities, we've got you covered!

[Download the App for Worry-Free Travel]

1. Book Easily: Browse and purchase popular and top travel recommendations on-the-go! 

2. Book and Go: Save time by not having to stand in line to buy tickets! Reserve tickets that are hard to find! 

3. Responsive Customer Service: Help is a click or a call away if you face any issues or have any questions about your booking.

4. E-Tickets: Simply show your electronic voucher on-site to skip the ticket line and enter!

5. Multiple Payment Options: Our secure transaction platform accepts various payment methods, including credit cards (VISA, MasterCard, JCB, UnionPay, American Express), Apple Pay, Alipay, LINE Pay, Octopus, PayMe, and more.

Embark on your next travel adventure with KKday ‚Äì download the app now and start planning your journey!

[Contact Us]
Website : https://www.kkday.com/en 
BlogÔºöhttps://www.kkday.com/en/blog/   
Email : service@kkday.com
releaseNotes: Hey traveler! This update includes minor bug fixes and performance improvements. Thanks for using the KKday app and we wish you happy travels :)
reviews:
Lots of fun activities to do with friends! | I used the app n Thailand to book 2 airport transfers.  One of the was fine.  The other I cancelled in the app well before the cutoff date and it was a hassle to get refunded.  Finally raising a dispute through my cc company worked.  If in Bangkok, bolt is a much better ride app and much cheaper | The eSIM installation did not work.   Link to website was useless. | Smooth and easy! | If you are Chinese its probably great. If you are any other asian speaking traveler, it‚Äôs terrible. The tour was basically a transportation service (üßêKyoto-Nara w/kimono). title: Autio: Road Trip & Travel App
description:
Autio - Audio for Travel
*** Apple App of the Day, Apps We Love, & New & Noteworthy
*** Webby Award Winner for Best Travel App 2022

Ready to take travel to the next level? Autio has 10,000+ location-based audio stories from coast-to-coast. Try your first 5 stories free - no strings attached - then choose a plan for 30 Days, 1 Year, or 3 Years.

Ever curious about the deeper story behind that bronze historical marker you passed on the highway? Autio is an invitation to discover ‚Äî a hands-free experience that delights, informs, & entertains by fostering a deeper connection with the people, places, & histories of the land you are traveling through.

With rave reviews from Forbes, Travel & Leisure, The New York Times, Outside, TechCrunch, & more!


FEATURES:

NARRATED BY YOUR FAVORITE VOICES ‚Äî Many of our stories are narrated by voices you know and love like Kevin Costner, Phil Jackson, John Lithgow, and more.

DISCOVER INTERESTING STORIES ‚Äî Autio notifies you when you‚Äôre in range of new stories you haven‚Äôt heard yet.

ALWAYS SOMETHING NEW ‚Äî New stories are released weekly, so no two trips are ever the same.

NATIONWIDE COVERAGE ‚Äî Unique stories from coast-to-coast.

FOCUS ON WHAT MATTERS ‚Äî Audio stories keep your eyes off your phone and on your beautiful surroundings.


HOW IT WORKS

As you travel, Autio serves up stories based on your geographic location & interests. The audio vignettes, generally 2-3 minutes in length, tell the history around you, painting a multi-dimensional picture you‚Äôre unlikely to get from a history book or visitor's guide. Autio answers the questions we all ask as the odometer turns.


ABOUT AUTIO

Humans are moved by stories. Stories that make us laugh and cry. They move us to come together and do amazing things. Since the dawn of time, stories have been the way in which values and knowledge are passed from one generation to the next ‚Äî each adding their wisdom and experience along the way.

It‚Äôs time to connect with the sum of our experience, to enrich our lives with the stories of today, and to inspire the great storytellers yet to come.
releaseNotes:
Grab your passports: Autio is going to Ireland!


Update your app for thousands of new stories all over the Emerald Isle. And not only that, you can now UPLOAD photos for your favorite stories! That‚Äôs right - thousands of new stories AND the ability to upload photos.


As our Irish friends might say, ‚Äúgive it a lash!‚Äù (try it out!)

‚Äî The Autio Team
reviews:
It‚Äôs so informative and definitely worth listening to while traveling! We recommend it to all our friends! | Well designed app with really interesting stories. It‚Äôs a freemium subscription model, though, which may not be obvious to all. Decent value to me, though. | I guess I‚Äôll post this again?? 

I‚Äôd give this negative stars if I could.

The app has deceptive advertising and poor UX/UI. The stories are not user generated and might as well be someone reading a Wikipedia article about something to you. 

Pressing the pause button skips to the next story and there‚Äôs no way to escape the subscription page, forcing you to close the app. | This was good when it was Hear Here, but it‚Äôs taken a ‚Äúlong march through the institutions‚Äù (iykyk) hard turn into leftist racial lecturing. If I wanted to hear that I‚Äôd walk into Berkeley‚Äôs latest drum circle. I don‚Äôt want to pay to listen to screeching Marxists, that‚Äôs what the university system is for. | I accidentally signed up and now I have something I dont want for a year!
Why can I nit cancel after 1hour, just finding out I have a subscription!  
Boooo! | Notifications don‚Äôt work in CarPlay, and it should suggest stories within a radius of your location. It should also work with Maps to navigate to the point of interest being talked about. All these things were promised in the YouTube video, but don‚Äôt work in CarPlay. I want my money back!! | Unfortunately the app was super glitchy. 
We were disappointed to not be able to use it on our trip! | Many of the names and locations local to us were mispronounced, and some of the stories were not correct. It made me doubt the accuracy of all the stories I was not familiar with. | I love hearing all the stories when I drive but wish there was a little more‚Ä¶
- stories that don‚Äôt repeat 
- stories that align with the direction I‚Äôm driving. 
-stories that are near where I‚Äôm driving and not 100 miles away in a direction that I am not driving
-stories that are told before I‚Äôve passed an area and not 1 hour later
-stories that automatically load into the app so I‚Äôm not playing with the app while I drive

I drive to many unique places. The stories make the places I drive by much more interesting , plus keeps me alert. But the app is also clunky and non intuitive.  So many times I‚Äôve stopped listening because I can‚Äôt mess with the app while I drive. | It will only work sporadically. A waste of money | I love having this app tell me about the places I‚Äôm passing.  The stories are just long enough, super diverse and always interesting.  Can‚Äôt live without it now. | How fun to hear about your own Neighborhood and the places you drive through on your travels!! | Tried using this app via ‚ÄúCar Play‚Äù while traveling through Yellowstone.  Although I had location services turned on to ‚ÄúAlways‚Äù the app failed to update the playlist as I passed new Autio points of interest.  I could only access new content if I opened the app on my phone which defeats the purpose of hands free Car Play. | Little surprises as I drive around. Our family is really enjoying this app! | Love the idea. As soon as I heard about it I downloaded it. Tried out a few of the free stories. They were great. Not overly detailed but good. After I ran out of the free ones I checked out the plans. WAY too expensive for what it is. More than Spotify or so many other apps that honestly provide more value. Too bad but I won‚Äôt be able to use this based on the cost. | I am a trucker LOVE this app I love learning about the different stories and history of the areas I run and just little tid bits and I even have saved some stuff I would love to go see one day!! That I had no idea was there before this app!! Would recommend 10/10!!! | This app now collects data on how you drive in an effort to market car insurance to you.  They have not made clear precisely what data they collect and have not offered a way to prevent such data collection, short of turning of location devices which would completely deprecate the utility of the app.  The privacy description in the App Store should be updated immediately to reflect this, and an opt out function should be clearly defined and provided. | Makes your trip fun! It‚Äôs unique to listen to the history of towns you travel through. | It would be great if there was an unbiased narrative of the history of the sites. But the strong does of political opinions makes this an inaccurate source of the facts. | Not as advertised very few stories even in important areas. Maybe 10 more years of work it may be useful. | Information is very valuable but not always reliable as to the actual site of the incident. | Headed out West and tried the trial - The 5 stories I listened to in the trial seemed like the hero is never Roosevelt or an American explorer. With Autio, the native Americans are always the heroes and the white man/explorers are the villain. Never mind and mentions very little about the exploration or engineering feats achieved at that time. 
An example would be with Mt Rushmore: there is so much more history/how it was done that I wanted to learn about after visiting it. But the focus seemed to be on the Lakota Sioux being forced out.
I can greatly appreciate the history there but I wish that wasn‚Äôt the sole focus. Would love to see the app being more well-rounded. | I have always wondered about the places I pass when driving. Now I know.
Great App | I live in the center of Pennsylvania and there were 5 stories in like a 3 hour radius from my area. The big story from my city was ‚Äúthe courthouse was the place of the Sandusky child sex abuse scandal‚Äù Of course they said some other things but for real! First no one wants to hear about a child sex scandal while hiking. I‚Äôm close to Penn state university. Plenty of nice things they could have talked about. I‚Äôm sure anyone that was involved in that hearing does not want to hear about it highlighting the area while hiking. Poor taste in general. Not a fan of the app at all. Too overpriced for literally nothing. Not nearly enough content. I would give it one stars a thousand times over | I should be able to trust this as historically accurate. I live in Cherokee County Alabama and was surprised that one of "Our Landmarks" was
"The Jeminson-Van de Graaff Mansion", Which is 150 miles in Tuscaloosa, Alabama.
I immediately deleted the app. | I use carplay and the notifications don‚Äôt pop up or make a sound to know that there‚Äôs something nearby.  If I happen to see that there was one on my phone and tap on it, it will start playing.  But it then continues with a bunch of stories that are either way behind me or ahead of me.  I‚Äôd like it to turn off and go back to my music.
Would also be great if there was a setting to just automatically play something when I‚Äôm nearby.  I‚Äôm mostly driving an RV by myself and don‚Äôt like to be distracted by fiddling around with buttons.  
Those 2 adjustments would make it a 5 star. | I recently took a train trip from Tampa to DC.  This app really helped pass the time.  I only wish that there was access to more American History and not just the lesser known stories.  Would love to see some regional on-demand history stories. | Autio finally got the car app working but it‚Äôs just a list, no map integration

Also the stories can be a little dry. I would almost prefer a riff channel where entertaining folks comment on the present gestalt of a place rather than just history. | I love the idea and the stories are really informative and entertaining. We are going on a grand Amtrak trip this summer and a search function would make this perfect. | Do your homework.  Intentionally racist reporting? | It a perfect traveling companion for curious
Road trippers. It‚Äôs fun to learn the history near 
Where you live too! | It‚Äôs a good idea but you only get 5 free stories then you have to pay. Not that many stories where I‚Äôm interested in to make it worth the investment. | We love listening to the stories on the Autio app. Wish this had been around a long time ago. Such a great idea. Makes driving trips much better. | Professionally produced and narrated stories that transport you to another time. Often as I drive through the places narrated in the app, I can almost feel as if I‚Äôm there whether a center or a decade ago. Countless discoveries in my own hometown. Look forward to taking the app on the family road trip. I know the soothing voices of the narrators will keep my daughter entertained for a bit. | I saw this app on Shark Tank and as a truck driver decided to download it. I‚Äôve had the app for about 30 minutes and not only have I learned things around me, I‚Äôve learned things about where I live I never even knew. | I seen this app on Shark Tank. I am wondering if there is a chance in the future that you offer the service for free with ADs. | Why do apps block my password manager or make it difficult to use. I gave up creating a log in when I couldn‚Äôt access 1Password easily. Seems like an interesting idea but too much effort required to try. | Deleted immediately after seeing the monthly subscription option. Give me a one time flat rate or give me nothing. | Excited to hear the rich history in my favorite places but all I heard was the white history. Nothing about the indigenous peoples or miners who lived in the area.  The areas were Colorado Ski Country- keystone, Silverthorne, Dillon. Out of touch! | Exactly the type of information we should all be wanting to absorb when traveling thru parts unknown, or even seemingly known. I‚Äôve learned more about my hometown from Autio then in just being here. I love everything about it. Cool when folks like Kevin Costner and  Phil Jackson drop in with a story even now and again, too. Five big stars! | Great idea but it didn‚Äôt work for me. I got it for a cross country RV trip but didn‚Äôt get to use it even once. Couldn‚Äôt log in. Now I‚Äôm notified that it‚Äôs up for renewal. Difficult to cancel. Waisted $35 of my travel budget on this app. | I love road trips and the stories in Autio have guided me through travels on both the east and west coasts of America. They are entertaining, educational and humorous. The app works seamlessly as you travel from one area to another. Wish Autio was around back in the days when I had an RV! | But we were going on a road trip and I figured, this would be a good investment for some entertainment.  Well, we‚Äôve used it on 3 road trips in the western US and have learned a lot of things you wouldn‚Äôt normally get from a textbook‚Äîand it presents the pieces to you when you‚Äôre right in the area each thing happened!  Pair this with Mike Rowe‚Äôs 10-minute ‚ÄúThe Way I Heard It‚Äù podcast episodes and you‚Äôll keep your brain going on your drive.

This was worth it.  I wish it was just a one time fee and not a subscription, but I get that they have to pay for all the research and all that goes into making this app.  I think it‚Äôs well worth it! | Makes driving much more enjoyable !! | I love this App, it gives you a lot of good information. | I‚Äôm looking forward to hearing stories based on my current location as I drive around.

Update: it still says that I have no saved stories and even though I tell it to update all the time, now both the iPhone CarPlay don‚Äôt show any stories! | I listened to five stories as a free trial.  The copy could be lifted straight from a roadside plaque.  The facts hang there suspended in motes of the driest prose illuminated by scintillating narration but still bloodless.  In this age of ubiquitous brilliant podcasts I need better writing or a well-produced interview.  Even Kevin Costner can‚Äôt make me care about these stories. | We are enjoying this and look forward to using it again but narrators or producers really need to make a quick call to the State Travel board or any state native and get their pronunciation correct.  There were a dozen mispronounced names or words listening to the Utah state stories.  Just a tiny bit of homework would have fixed that and the mispronounced words or names really distracted from the stories.  And it made you doubt the correctness of the facts. | The stories are great and well put together, but the app is only as good as the cell signal. We like it though. | I got a new phone and I am trying to reset my password.  I can reset it with the link they send to my email but can‚Äôt use the new password to log into my phone.  Very frustrating.

title: Klook: Travel, Hotels, Leisure
description:
***Get money off your first booking with this promo code: BetterOnApp***

Download Klook to find deals for the best things to do for anytime, anywhere.

A World of Possibilities
There are nearly half a million travel activities across the world waiting for you on Klook. From sightseeing trips and hotel bookings to immersive cultural experiences, we're here to guide you to your world of joy.

Trusted & Top-rated Activities
Explore handpicked experiences and get local insights for hundreds of destinations. Museums in Singapore? Tour packages in South Korea? Or some family attractions nearby? When you're on Klook, you're seeing the best of every place in your hands.

Experiences Made Easy
We make e-booking fast with instant confirmation and skip-the-line tickets on selected attractions. Whether it‚Äôs chasing waves on a Phuket vacation package, tasting wine in Melbourne or finding out what‚Äôs fun for the weekend in your area, you're just a few taps away from booking whatever makes you happy.

Unlock Gold on Klook Rewards for Exclusive Perks 
- Earn up to 3x more Klook credits
- Get up to US$95 in promo codes 
- Skip the line for premium customer support 
- Early access to top deals
- Special Gold-only prices
You can elevate your Klook experience to Gold when you spend US$380 or make 5 purchases of at least US$30 per year.

And a Whole Lot More
- Budgeting when travelling? Use Klook-exclusive promo codes to save on the best deals 
- Redeem your tickets and e-vouchers or download them for easy offline access
- Save your bucket-list holiday ideas to your wishlist and book later
- Choose from trains, buses, cars and even ferries to get around
- Get movie and event ticket discounts and bundles

Find us and say hello!
- Official website: www.klook.com
- Facebook: @klookglobal
- Twitter: @klooktravel
- Instagram: @klooktravel

Got ideas for us? Let us know at appfeedback@klook.com. Thanks bestie.
releaseNotes:
What small thing brought you joy today? For us, it's you reading this! 

Not much to update this round - just some bug fixes and performance updates.

Oh, but if you're new here, remember to get a discount on your first booking with this promo code!
[BetterOnApp] for residents of all the other countries,  [APP10TW] for residents of Taiwan

Got ideas for us? Let us know at appfeedback@klook.com. Thanks bestie.
reviews:
HORRIBLE. They let me book and experience for 2 hours away from where i stay on Wednesday for a Sunday, confirmed the booking, and send me my confirmation number. So I book travel for the day, and make arrangements. Then Saturday night they cancelled via email to say it‚Äôs overbooked. AVOID AT ALL COSTS | This app is worse than useless. I booked a tour, paid money, then found out 4 days later there was no availability. And since I was counting on this ‚Äúbooking‚Äù all the companies have since sold out as well.

Now get to wait for my money to be returned, for a booking that never existed in the fist place. And of course Klook kept their cut ‚ÄúKlook upgrades cannot be refunded‚Äù. So they just took $10 from me on top of everything else. 

There are better apps that do the same thing, but come through. Don‚Äôt use | I was having problems purchasing tickets to Disneyland website and the app with issue with my debit card and when my cousin send me this app, it was so quick and fast. Now I don‚Äôt have to stress about it anymore. Well done Klook!!! | I was worried I was not able to use my ticket voucher for the next day, but help center syamimi was able to help me and informed me that I can use the voucher until May 18, 2024. Great job on the customer service! | Do not ever use this app for anything it‚Äôll screw up your vacation totally. title: Travel Town - Merge Adventure
description:
Explore Travel Town, where you can combine everything into better and more useful items while you travel the world!

Reveal secrets as you discover yourself and help the friendly people of Travel Town!


TRAVEL TOWN FEATURES:

== Match Objects ==
‚Ä¢ Discover over 500 fantastic objects through hundreds of levels!
‚Ä¢ Freely drag objects around the beautiful world and match 2 of a kind evolve them into more superior items!
‚Ä¢ Fulfil the missions of the townsfolk to unlock more amazing items!

== Meet New Villagers ==
‚Ä¢ Discover 55 villagers who live in Travel Town, and help them restore their seaside town!
‚Ä¢ Match objects to upgrade them and unlock more and more items to support you on your journey!

== Town Building ==
‚Ä¢ A storm has ravaged Travel Town - Collect coins and bring the town back to its former beauty!
‚Ä¢ Discover and upgrade dozens of houses and improve the town beyond your wildest dreams!

Follow Travel Town on Facebook and Instagram for exclusive offers and bonuses!
Facebook: facebook.com/TravelTownGame/
Instagram: instagram.com/traveltowngame/

Terms of Service: https://static.moonactive.net/legal/terms.html
Privacy Notice: https://static.moonactive.net/legal/privacy.html

Questions about the game? Contact us in the game by clicking on Settings > Contact Us
Our support is also ready and waiting at:  https://support.traveltowngame.com/
releaseNotes:
Welcome to the latest update of Travel Town!
We‚Äôve been busy improving the game and addressing bugs for you. 
Enjoy!

title: Flight Tracker +
releaseNotes:
Welcome to the new version! 

With our latest update, you can now view real-time flight status directly on the flight details screen. No more endless refreshing or switching between screens.

We are always available to assist you!
If you have any feedback, comments, or ideas, please don't hesitate to contact us at support@impalastudios.com. 

Thank you for traveling with us, 
The Flight Tracker Team

And lately, the ads have been so long that you have to just shut the app down and reopen it if you want to continue. | Flight Tracker is very precise in tracking all flights including their departures, enroute and arrivals | Like this app. It‚Äôs got everything I want with flight schedules and radar views | The last few flights I tracked this app was way off & take off & landing times. FIX THIS PLZ! | I found my flight in under 10 minutes | I just can‚Äôt make it work for Ethiopian airlines specially the local ones it doesn‚Äôt track it at all | Love how it keeps us updated and the small details such as baggage claim numbers | Even though I had to pay for no ads and live tracking, it is very accurate! Thank you | Tech support was very responsive, and corrected the issues in a timely manner. Flights are easy to search, and display the correct dates. I‚Äôm very satisfied with this app! ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî I subscribe to the Pro version of this app, which used to work well. As of at least yesterday, 1/21/2024, every search for an an Alaska Airlines flight results in ‚ÄúNo Flights Found.‚Äù I uninstalled and reinstalled the app, with no change. Like much of the nation, we‚Äôre under very nasty weather conditions, so I was hoping this app would keep me advised of flight status. However, before the app will ADD a flight to my calendar, it wants full access to my calendar. Thank you. | Super | I love this application | I‚Äôve never written a negative review. I‚Äôm of the opinion if you don‚Äôt like something don‚Äôt use it an move on. This app pushed me to my breaking point. 
I‚Äôve used this app for several years. Loved the ease of use and accuracy. However, since I don‚Äôt travel a ton the only paid option at 50.00/year doesn‚Äôt make sense to me. The ads last about a minute each and you need to watch one or two between adding any new information. So much for updates. | No flights are shown after the last update two years ago. Before this update the app sas üëçüëçüëçüëç. So please fix the issue please. | App stopped tracking flights two days ago. Getting little help from customer service. Was using paid app version. title: Weather - The Weather Channel
description:
The Weather Channel is the World's Most Accurate Forecaster**. In addition to our daily forecasts, hourly details and 24-Hour Future Radar, you also can personalize your weather preferences from skin health to air quality index forecast and more.  

Our live Doppler radar maps, storm watch, and hurricane tracker can warn you ahead of time of severe storms, heavy rain, heat waves, or an incoming flood. Track air quality and wildfires in your area. Severe weather is increasing across the nation - our severe weather alerts have you covered.

Plan up to 15 days in advance with forecasts from the World‚Äôs Most Accurate Weather Forecaster, so you can plan ahead with confidence**. Manage personal weather alerts, so you receive notifications that are important to you.

Download The Weather Channel to get you through storm season, hurricane season & extreme weather warnings.

The Weather Channel Features:

Today‚Äôs Weather Forecast:

- New personalized weather tracking for wherever you are including, uv index, pollen count, humidity & more
-  15-minute forecast for rain intensity up to 7 hours in the future & radar on your homescreen
- Check weather forecasts up to two weeks in advance!
- Prepare for severe storms & hurricane season
- New Air Quality Index forecast

Widget & Homescreen Features:
- Our smart widget offers more weather in detail at a glance and one-tap access to the forecast
- Check your local radar, get severe weather alerts in your area, and check the forecast for the next three hours on your homescreen

Additional Features:
- Detailed information on sunset times and allergy & flu forecasts
- Keep informed with the latest weather news
- Stay prepared during extreme weather events, hurricanes, and earthquakes with live breaking news alerts
---
Upgrade to The Weather Channel Premium for our most comprehensive, dynamic, and precise weather experience available. Exclusive access to:
- Ad-free weather
- 15-minute forecast details
- Advanced 72-Hour Future Radar
- and more!

You can cancel The Weather Channel subscription anytime through your iTunes account settings, or it will automatically renew. This must be done 24 hours before the end of any subscription period to avoid being charged another fee. Subscription payments will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of your purchase and upon commencement of each renewal term. For more information, please see our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

Privacy & Feedback
‚Ä¢Our Privacy Policy can be viewed here: https://weather.com/en-US/twc/privacy-policy
‚Ä¢Our Terms of Use can be viewed here: http://www.weather.com/common/home/legal.html
‚Ä¢If you have any questions or suggestions about our weather service, please do not hesitate to get in touch at iphonesupport@weather.com

**The Weather Channel is the World's Most Accurate Forecaster. ForecastWatch, Global and Regional Weather Forecast Accuracy Overview, 2017-2022, https://forecastwatch.com/AccuracyOverview2017-2022, commissioned by IBM.

*The World's Leading Weather Provider: According to Comscore, The Weather Company, parent of The Weather Channel, is the largest provider of weather forecasts worldwide based on total monthly unique visitors in 2020. Comscore Media Metrix¬Æ, Worldwide Rollup Media Trend, News/Information ‚Äì Weather category incl. [P] Weather Company, The and [M] Weather Channel, The, Jan-Dec. 2020 avg.

The Weather Channel app had an average of over 35 million combined smartphone monthly active users worldwide from March through October 2021 according to internal analytics. Over 2M total 5-star ratings out of over 3.0 million total reviews since January 2018 according to Apple‚Äôs App Store Connect.

The Weather Channel¬Æ is a registered trademark of The Weather Company, LLC 2024
releaseNotes:
We've heard your feedback and added new features including dark mode, full-screen video, and more.  Check back soon for more updates.

Our new design is loaded with insights and features that connect the dots between wellness and weather:
-Help protect your skin health
-Monitor air quality and breathing conditions
-Track pollen, manage your allergies
-Prepare for flu season

Plus, now the app can be personalized
-Prioritize the weather data most helpful to you
-Save and name  all your favorite locations
-See more editorial content that inspires you

Of course, you‚Äôll still have quick access to daily forecasts, hourly details and 24-Hour Future Radar.

What in the weather are you waiting for?
Be a force of nature.

title: eDreams: Flights, hotels, cars
description:
Thinking about travelling? Are you looking for a cheap flight? Download our app and make the trip of your dreams! We will also do the check-in for you, as soon as it is available, so you only have to worry about enjoying your trip.

Our eDreams travel app is the best rated in the travel industry; it has more than 2 million reviews and 18 million users! We'll take care of everything: Finding cheap flights, showing you the best hotels and other accommodations for your stay, negotiating great deals on your rental car or arranging your ride from the airport to your destination. We've got you covered!

Cheap flights

Find cheap flights among our more than 600 airlines, for one way, return or multi-city!
Our wide variety of flights offers you from long distance flights to cheap low cost flights with airlines such as Ryanair, Easyjet, British Airways, United Airlines, Air Europa and more. Book your flights with us and you will be able to download your boarding passes directly from the app, in addition to tracking the status of any flight in real time. You will find the ideal flight and tickets at the cheapest price in our travel app.

Hotels

Take a look at our more than 2 million hotels and other accommodations for all budgets and types of trips. Search, book and compare hotel offers very easily.
You can book hotels like Meli√† Hotels and Resorts, Marriott, Eurostars, NH, Catalonia Hotels & Resorts and much more. Cancellation is free if you change your plans. We also offer discounts of up to 40% less in hotels if you book a flight with us.

Car rental 

Do you want to complete your booking with a car rental? We offer cars from companies such as Hertz, Avis, Europcar, Alamo, Budget and up to 800 car rental agencies. Rent a car anytime, anywhere and travel at your own pace.

Sounds good, right? And that's not all!
Our travel app not only offers you cheap flights, hotel deals, and car rentals for your trips ... download the app and:

- Order your boarding passes for all your flights, and we will check-in as soon as it is available
- follow the status of any flight in real time with our new flight tracker feature
- Create an account and receive real time flight status notifications: gate numbers, baggage belts, delays or cancellations and more
- Check your flight itineraries, booking references or baggage allowances in the My Trips section, even without an internet connection!
- download our free travel guides and discover what to do at your destination, even if you don't have an internet connection

eDreams helps you to  find the best deals on flights, hotels and car rentals. Search, compare and book flight + hotel tickets in our travel app to enjoy a 40% discount.

We strive every day to make your travel dreams come true. If you had a positive experience with our app, would you mind rating us with 5 stars in the App Store? Thank you!
releaseNotes: We take a lot of pride in the work we do and try hard to give you the best travel app possible. That‚Äôs why we're always making improvements and tightening up where needed. With this update you‚Äôll have a better experience with fewer pesky bugs.
reviews:

Non-existent customer service and horribly late flight confirmation times after purchase. One of if not THE worst and most anti-consumer services I‚Äôve ever used. A scam through and through. They should be audited for this‚Ä¶ | First time using this App. I find it very user friendly and fast | Great job | Very good flight | Es una aplicaci√≥n f√°cil y te ayuda a que te sea m√°s c√≥modo tus reservas de vuelo y de hospedajes me encanta | Buen√≠simo | I being having the app for more than 5 years and this is the first time the app is not working I updated and still not working | All looks great money has been deserts lol Driver license #Is from Oregon if more than that let us know | First timer and love it!! | De los mejores motores de b√∫squeda, me ayud√≥ m√°s de lo esperado. | So great and user friendly for our quick flights around the UK | You guys made booking very easy for our trip to Florida | Easy to navigate and lots of good deals found, better than some other places! | I got the best price to travel. I am very happy. | Great prices on eDreams | They take your money and then they send you an email that says your money didn‚Äôt go through. But it did go through. Be careful with these scammers also the email and phone number that is provided does not work. | This company is completely a scam! Do not purchase their PRIME membership! The website and app don‚Äôt work as intended and customer service is a just a joke! Only if I could give them a negative star‚Ä¶ | A month and a half I bought flight tickets using this app, the airline cancelled my flight, I submitted the request to get a refund and still haven't received my money back. How is this possible? I sent proofs of the refund that the airline sent to edreams and I haven't received an answer. Tired of this! I will never use this service again! Scam!

Update 03/22/24: after 35 days I'm still waiting for my money. The airlines confirmed the money was refunded, but edreams won't give me money back with just excuses and excuses. Every customer service representatives proceeded to be highly unhelpful and showed complete disregard for my concerns. They tried to refer me to the airline that the tickets were purchased from (which is idiotic to say the least, a 3rd party is supposed to make things easier but instead of I am doing their job to receive my money). They also refused to refund me for the options that I haven‚Äôt used which only further complicated the whole process. I requested a refund on March 10th and 10 days later there was still no change and my money still weren‚Äôt given back. My flight change was never approved nor was it denied and my original flight came and went. Additionally, I ‚Äúnever got the approval‚Äù by the time of the rebooked flight either. Luckily I could tell when literally no one answered me that I needed to this on my own. Which I know means that ‚Äúservice fee‚Äù to change my flight will still be charged even though they did nothing and actually hurt the user experience trying to enjoy their travel. DO NOT USE, especially if there could be changes to your travels. | Come in handy for last minute trips | E dreams were very good. Seriously! Ty ty!! | Very good customer service

I was hesitant as I was unfamiliar and will use this more often and to plan trips . | Good job | Planning a multi-city trip in Europe and the app has been very easy to use! | Beware that you are only allowed 15kg for checked baggage. Overage is 6 Euros per kilo! Don‚Äôt assume that you are allowed more! | Excellent app, I always find the best price for my trips. | Sin dudar la mejor agencia para comprar mis boletos de viaje.

title: PackPoint Travel Packing List
description:
As Featured On The App Store's "Best New Apps", The Washington Post, BBC, LA Times, Lifehacker, Fast Company's Co.DESIGN, and The Next Web.
"A Travel App That Practically Packs Your Bags For You"

Never Forget Your ______ Again!

PackPoint is an intelligent packing app and packing list builder for serious travelers. PackPoint will tell you what you need to pack based on length of travel, weather at your destination, and any activities planned during your trip.

Punch in the city you're traveling to, the departure date, and the number of nights you'll be staying there.

PRO TIPS:
- Tap and hold to re-order packing list items
- Select "hide checked items" for a minimal packing list as you pack.
- Check out the Customize menu within PackPoint for Premium features
- Swipe left to remove an item from your packing list
- Tap the "+" sign to change quantities for each packing list item
- Check off "Repeat Basics" if you're willing to repeat wearing basics like shirts and pants
- Check off "Laundry" if you will have access to laundry facilities

PackPoint will build a packing list for you that takes into account:
- Business or Leisure travel
- Activities you plan on doing
- What you need for an international trip
- Warm weather clothes
- Cold weather clothes
- An umbrella if the forecast calls for rain

Have a packing app feature request, or feedback? E-mail info@packpnt.com or visit https://ideas.packpnt.com
Like us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/packpoint
Follow us on Twitter https://twitter.com/packpnt @packpnt

title: AAA Mobile
description:
AAA Mobile improves on-the-go access to trusted AAA services including trip planning, discounts and roadside assistance. The mobile version of AAA‚Äôs TripTik¬Æ Travel Planner helps you find AAA Approved and Diamond Rated hotels, restaurants and attractions, and the ability to create and share itineraries between your desktop and mobile devices.

KEY FEATURES INCLUDE:

Maps & Discounts
‚Ä¢ Find more than 59,000 AAA Approved and Diamond Rated hotels and restaurants 
‚Ä¢ Book your next hotel or rental car
‚Ä¢ Receive member discount offers at over 164,000 locations
‚Ä¢ Share saved trips across desktop and mobile devices*
‚Ä¢ Find AAA Approved Auto Repair facilities, AAA office locations, and cheapest gas prices near you

Roadside Assistance*
‚Ä¢ Request Roadside Assistance from the app
‚Ä¢ Get instant battery replacement quotes (not available in all areas)

Passbook* (iPhone only, iOS 6 or higher)
‚Ä¢ Add a scannable AAA membership card to your Passbook

*You must be a current AAA member to use these features. 

Not a member? You can still use our unparalleled trip planner functions. To take full advantage of all the features of this app, Join AAA.

NOTE: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

title: Saily: An eSIM for travel
description:
Navigate the world of connectivity with Saily ‚Äî your gateway to seamless e-SIM services. Say goodbye to physical SIM cards and embrace digital convenience wherever you go. With Saily, you can get internet data with a few taps, avoid costly roaming fees, and travel the world connected. 

What is an eSIM?
An eSIM (or a digital SIM) is embedded into your smartphone but works the same way a physical SIM card does. The difference? You can start using one the moment you realize you need internet data. No shops, queues, or frustration over opening your SIM port ‚Äî just an easy, instant internet connection.

Why choose Saily?

Go online instantly
‚Ä¢ Download, subscribe, install, and welcome aboard! You can now connect to the network and enjoy your internet connection. 
‚Ä¢ Never worry about running out of data in the middle of a hike ‚Äî get an instant top-up with a few taps and experience uninterrupted connectivity. 

Travel the world
‚Ä¢ Get local data plans in over 100 countries and enjoy the convenience of staying connected wherever your adventures take you.
‚Ä¢ Keep your existing phone number and stay reachable. Receive calls as you usually would, regardless of your location.

No strings attached
‚Ä¢ Experience the freedom of no contracts or long-term commitments.
‚Ä¢ Avoid expensive roaming fees and unexpected hidden charges.
‚Ä¢ No need to look for physical shops and overpay for your data.

The perfect holiday partner
‚Ä¢ Set up your eSIM before you even step outside the airport ‚Äî start your holiday stress free, knowing your connectivity is sorted 
‚Ä¢ Be connected while you travel ‚Äî stay in touch with your friends and family wherever you are. 

Seek adventure, not free Wi-Fi
‚Ä¢ Embrace the digital nomad lifestyle. Travel as much as you want and change plans without hassle.
‚Ä¢ Have access to the internet everywhere you go without the need to hunt down free Wi-Fi.

Secure and reliable
‚Ä¢ Created by the security-focused team that brought you NordVPN ‚Äî your digital safety is our top priority. 
‚Ä¢ Enjoy safe transactions and a reliable service.

Experience the future of connectivity. Download Saily now and dive into a world without borders!
reviews: Great app! | Highly recommend this eSIM app, fast, cheap, simple to use:)

title: Packing List Checklist
description:
"All in all, this is exactly what I needed for traveling, and if you travel a lot, something like this is essential." - The Common Ryan

Packing List Checklist is an easy to use app that provides you with a checklist of all the important things to consider and pack before traveling.

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî PICK SUGGESTED ITEMS ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî
 
Get up and running with very little effort by using our Pick Suggested Items feature.

You will be able to pick items from these categories: Essentials, Accessories, Baby, Backpack / Carry On, Beach, Camping, Clothing, Electronics, Food, Healthcare, Makeup, Shoes, Toiletries and many more!

That's it: your list will be ready without any typing involved!

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî SYNC YOUR LISTS ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî
 
Created your list on your iPad but want to check it on your iPhone? Got a new iOS device and want to see your lists there?

With iCloud sync we've got you covered: your lists will be with you on all your iOS devices as long as you are using the same Apple ID in them.

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî SET REMINDERS ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî

Want to make sure that you are not leaving anything behind? Just set up a reminder, get a notification at the right time and relax!

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî MANAGE ITEM QUANTITIES ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî
 
Set the quantities for your Packing List items.
 
‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî TO DO & TO PACK ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî
 
After a lot of research we reached the conclusion that the best way to go through your travel preparation is to distinguish the actions that you need to take before and during travel from the things that you need to pack.
 
That‚Äôs why each list has two sections: To-Do & To Pack.
 
‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî CREATE YOUR OWN CATEGORIES ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî
 
Organize your items by grouping them into different categories.
You will be able to create as many categories as you need, and you can pick an emoji to better differentiate them.
 
‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî REUSE YOUR EXISTING LISTS ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî
 
This is one of the best kept secrets of every seasoned traveller. Keep refining your list, and reach sorcerer-level packing skills. You‚Äôll soon forget why you ever packed for your travels differently in the past!
 
‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî QUESTIONS OR FEEDBACK? ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî
 
We love hearing from you and we read every single email you send us!
Have suggestions? Please, feel free to reach us at info@packingli.st
releaseNotes:
‚Ä¢ Bug fixes

Your opinion matters a lot to us! If you have any feedback please send us an email to info@packingli.st.

title: Moovit: All Transit Options
description:
Moovit is one app for all your urban mobility and transit rides. 

Transportation is an integral part of urban living. Whether you ride the train, subway, bus, light rail, ferry or metro, use dockless scooters, bikes, ride-sharing like Uber or Lyft, getting the best urban mobility information is critical. Enter Moovit! Moovit provides riders with a one-stop-shop journey experience to help them get from point A to B in the easiest and most efficient way. Get train and bus times, maps, and real-time arrival information with ease so that you can plan your trip with confidence. Pay and validate your rides. Find critical alerts and service disruptions for your favorite lines. Get step-by-step directions of optimal route bus, train, metro, bike, scooter or a combination of them. 

Moovit guides more than 930 million users in over 3400 cities throughout the world. Commuters will find updated bus and train times, transit maps, and, where available, real-time line arrivals. Locate nearby bus stops and train stations, travel with on-the-go live navigation guidance, receive get-off alerts when approaching your destination to ensure a smooth ride. That's why Moovit has been named one of the best apps of the year in 2017 by the App Store.

Moovit is your personal assistant for all your transit rides! 

‚ñ∫ Real-time arrivals. View real-time arrival information, which is taken directly from GPS devices positioned on buses and trains. Avoid wasting time guessing train times or bus times.

‚ñ∫ Digital payment. Purchase bus & train tickets and validate your digital pass with a tap (select cities). 

‚ñ∫ Real time alerts. Know about issues ahead of time by receiving service alerts such as emergency or unexpected disruptions, delays, traffic jams, new construction, and more so that you can plan ahead if your bus time or train time changed.

‚ñ∫ Live Directions. Get step-by-step bus directions and other transit directions with live guidance from A-to-B: Know how long you need to walk to your station, view your line's arrival time, receive get-off alerts as you approach your destination, and more. 

‚ñ∫ Visualize Your Stop. Use augmented reality to locate your bus or train stop with "Way Finder".

‚ñ∫ User reports. Moovit‚Äôs users report issues found with stations, line service, and schedules so that we can inform all nearby riders about what‚Äôs going on in their area.

‚ñ∫ Favorite lines, stations, and places. Get easy access to lines, stations, and places you ride and visit all the time. Plus, get real-time updates if/when there are changes to your favorite lines in case your bus time or train time is impacted!

‚ñ∫ Bike routes. Get bike routes in addition to the bus, subway, train, or metro trip plans. If you ride bikes (yours or shared) we can plan a route that includes the train or bus. Moovit will help you plan a trip that meets your transit-needs. Bike docking stations are updated in real-time. Bike trip plans are only available in supported metro areas.

‚ñ∫ Maps view. Interested in seeing the whole picture? View all stations, routes, and lines on the subway or bus map. Additionally, maps are available in PDF for when you‚Äôre offline, or underground on the subway. 

Moovit is the #1 urban mobility app in the world. We‚Äôre proud to collaborate with public transit agencies across the United States, including:
MTA
NJ Transit
MBTA
SEPTA
LA Metro
SFMTA Muni
BART
Caltrain
CTA
Metra
WMATA
MTA Maryland
TriMet
Sound Transit
SARTA
PARTA

You only need one app on your phone to navigate nearby buses and transit in the U.S. and across 112 other countries and in 45 languages. If you‚Äôd like to know bus times and train times all around the world or if you need to find out when the last bus leaves a certain bus stop Moovit has you covered. You ride, we guide!

Contact us: 
* https://support.moovitapp.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=175869
* https://www.facebook.com/moovit
* https://twitter.com/moovit

Terms of Use
https://moovitapp.com/en-us/legal/terms-of-service-en

New! Add an extra stop
Customize your trip by adding an additional stop to your route. Simply tap the + icon next to your destination.
New! Know ahead of time if your line arrival is being delayed due to traffic. Just look for the ‚Äútraffic‚Äù icon near your line.

title: Visit A City
description:
Visit A City - The ultimate travel app for planning your city sightseeing trip:
‚Ä¢ Create a customized itinerary and book your tours and activities with just a few taps.
‚Ä¢ Discover the must-see landmarks, historical sites, and hidden gems of your destination with our comprehensive guide.
‚Ä¢ Browse through a wide range of tours and activities, from guided walking tours to day trips and more.
‚Ä¢ With detailed information and reviews, you can easily find the best experiences to suit your interests.

 
No need for multiple apps, Visit A City has everything you need to make the most of your trip. Download now and start exploring!"
releaseNotes:
Visit A City, the ultimate travel companion, just got even better! We've added new features to enhance your travel experience, including: 
‚Ä¢ Up-to-date attraction information, so you can plan your itinerary with confidence 
‚Ä¢ Purchase tours and tickets directly through the app
‚Ä¢ Smart nearby information gives you suggestions for things to do and see based on your location 
‚Ä¢ Opening hours, so you can make the most of your time in the city
