title: Enterprise Rent-A-Car
description:
Enterprise Rent-A-Car brand is part of the world‚Äôs largest car rental provider. With over 9,500 car rental locations around the world, it has never been easier to rent a car while on the go. The Enterprise car rental app is your free travel planner across the US, Canada, Europe, Latin America and more. Our award-winning customer service and variety of vehicle options from economy to luxury car rental will keep your travel worry-free. As a commitment to your safety, we follow an industry-leading procedure with our Complete Clean Pledge to clean and sanitize every rental car at Enterprise. The Enterprise car rental app allows you to easily find a rental car, view or modify upcoming reservations to extend your travel plans, get directions to your rental car branch or call roadside assistance for 24/7 help on the road. Stay signed into your Enterprise Plus account on the app to make reservations faster and earn points you can redeem for free rental days.

Make a car rental reservation:
‚Ä¢ Find car rental locations near you for your upcoming travel
‚Ä¢ Narrow your search with location and vehicle filters
‚Ä¢ Book long term car rental for extended travel plans
‚Ä¢ Save rental details to make future reservations even faster

Access all your car rental information in one place:
‚Ä¢ Easily view the details and information of your rental car and trip
‚Ä¢ Quickly reference pick-up or drop-off times for your car rental
‚Ä¢ Get directions back to your rental car location

Manage your Enterprise Plus account:
‚Ä¢ Earn points on every dollar spent
‚Ä¢ View your reward points balance
‚Ä¢ Update account details
‚Ä¢ Redeem your reward points toward free rental days

Get help when you need it most:
‚Ä¢ Call roadside assistance or our customer support for help
‚Ä¢ Find car rental branch details including phone number, address and directions

Do you have a favorite Enterprise rental car location?
‚Ä¢ Make a location your ‚Äúfavorite‚Äù in the app
‚Ä¢ Quickly access information to reserve a rental car at your most visited location.

Are you ready for a road trip?
‚Ä¢ Find the best road trip cars ‚Äì choose from a wide selection of cars, trucks, SUV‚Äôs and
vans
‚Ä¢ Reserve a vehicle at any destination with thousands of rental car locations
‚Ä¢ Stay safe with our complete clean pledge. Every vehicle will be cleaned and sanitized.
‚Ä¢ Never get stuck on the road with access to 24/7 roadside assistance

Enterprise is always there when you need us. Now with our rental car app we are making it even easier to experience all the benefits Enterprise has to offer from your mobile phone.


By clicking on "Install", you consent to the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy including access to or storage of performance and usage device & app related data for analytic purposes by Enterprise Rent-A-Car or its third party providers.

"Thank you for using the Enterprise Rent-A-Car app! We update the app regularly so that you can get the most from your car rental experience.

Here's what we did for Enterprise Rent-A-Car version 7.14:
‚Ä¢ Fixed bugs, improved the UI, and did some general cleaning up under the hood."

title: Justfly - Cheap Trip Booking
description:
Plan, book, and manage your travel plans with Justfly ‚Äì Canada‚Äôs fastest growing travel app. From cheap flights and hotels to affordable car rentals, we have every part of your vacation covered. Book your next getaway with transparent pricing, zero hidden fees, and no extra charges. Justfly takes the hassle and unnecessary expenses out of your travel plans ‚Äì giving you more time to soak up the sun (or shred down a mountain).

Developed by a team of dedicated travel specialists, Justfly is the perfect destination for cheap flights, hotels, and car rentals. Find new deals every day with savings for every major airline and affordable flight itineraries curated by our unique software that will take you to popular destinations worldwide.

Justfly is more than just cheap flights. Pick from over 900,000 accommodations ‚Äì from condos, hotels, apartments, and more that you can view on our interactive map. Get in the driver‚Äôs seat and live like a local with rental car locations in over 170 countries with companies including AVIS, Enterprise, and Hertz.

Whether it‚Äôs a flight, hotel, or car rental, you can travel in peace knowing that we have your back with beginning-to-end customer support available 24/7. Justfly makes managing every part of your vacation easy. Simply open up the app and access any of your reservations instantly. Make changes to your booking, add travel insurance, download invoices, and more ‚Äì Justfly has you covered. Stay up to date with schedule changes, travel alerts, and everything in between through our comprehensive travel app.

JUSTFLY FEATURES

CHEAP FLIGHTS GALORE
- Find deals for every major airline that will take you wherever you want to go

title: Kiwi.com: Book Cheap Flights
description:
We hack the system, you fly for less. 

Tired of cross-checking websites, dates, flights and destinations when planning a trip? We offer great travel deals, connecting flights, trains and buses to get you where you want to go. Book tickets and travel for less with Kiwi.com

No hidden fees, no ads, no hassle. Just travel.

Kiwi.com‚Äôs flight search, powered by our Kiwi-Code, gives you the prices airlines won‚Äôt advertise.
-Find the lowest prices for trains, buses and plane tickets.
-Use Deals to get tailored recommendations for cheap flights to popular destinations.
-Set price alerts for a selected route so you don‚Äôt miss out on flight tickets at the best prices.

Use our travel hacks to get the best deals.
-Throwaway ticketing ‚Äì book a cheaper round-trip ticket instead of a more expensive one-way fare.
-Itineraries with self-transfer ‚Äì combine separate flights for a lower price compared to carrier connections, or find itineraries with different modes of transport operated by carriers that don‚Äôt usually cooperate.
-Hidden cities ‚Äì book flights with a layover in your intended destination instead of overpaying for direct plane tickets.

Save all your travel in one place.
-View your itinerary, change details and add extras to your flight booking.
-Access all your boarding documents offline.
-Get instant alerts about the cheapest travel options.

Download our flight scanner app now and get low-cost tickets for your next journey. For questions and feedback, don‚Äôt hesitate to contact us directly at support@kiwi.com.

We‚Äôre here for you!
If you have any issues or questions about your booking, we‚Äôve got your back. Go to our Help & Support articles to find answers to frequently asked questions, get assistance quickly with our chatbot, or reach out to our team directly.

More about Kiwi.com
Website: www.kiwi.com
Instagram: @kiwicom247
Twitter: @kiwicom247
Facebook: www.facebook.com/kiwicom247

Find the best travel deals tailored to you: www.kiwi.com/cheap-flights

Enjoy your travels with Kiwi.com!
releaseNotes: No Wi-Fi? No problem! With our app, you can access all your trip details and documents like boarding passes even offline. Travel with peace of mind, wherever you go.

When I bought flights online it states don‚Äôt worry your party will sit together the airline will assign your seating, which clearly is false information. DO Not BOOK or download this APp. They are a scam and do not do anything to help you. Also their cancellation policy is they will give you 5 dollars credit for your next flight. | I had a return trip from Shanghai to London and then to New York. Air China cancelled its flight, and I called Air China to put me on their flight next day. When I got to the Airport, I was told that my ticket was cancelled. What happened was that Kiwi cancelled my ticket with Air China without informing me. I had to purchase a new ticket myself. When I requested a refund from Kiwi, they stonewalled me, and I had to threaten to sue them before they agreed to issue me a refund, but the refund I finally got was only 20% of my new ticket. | My experience with Kiwi.com was disappointing and I feel it's important to share. I purchased four tickets for my family ‚Äì myself, my wife, our 4-year-old, and our 1-year-old. However, Kiwi.com only booked three tickets, insisting that my 1-year-old would be a lap child. I had paid for four tickets, so this was unacceptable. When I contacted their customer service, they claimed that infants can't have a separate seat and must be on a lap. However, this contradicts the fact that I had paid for a ticket for my infant. They then informed me that my infant should have a full-price ticket, equivalent to an adult ticket, which was $371. I pointed out that the airline's website stated that the price for an infant on a lap is $0. I requested a refund for the infant ticket if they couldn't provide a seat, but they refused. It didn‚Äôt inform me the cancellation; refuse to refund; and offers ridiculous price for reschedule new flight, the new one way flight is the same as my original round-way flight. I have never seen such disguising practice in any business for a long time. AVOID IT LIKE A PLAUGE!!! | I missed my connecting flight with Volaris due to a flight delay with Viva Aurobus and they won‚Äôt assist me with my connecting flight or any reimbursement! You probably won‚Äôt loose money like me. They make me feel like a joke. 

First of all They canceled my baggage service. After that as a human I had to cancel the whole flight. They NEVER refunded my flight and now I‚Äôm $500 damaged.

After talking to the support claiming my money back the informationthat I had was (Sorry. You cancel the trip in a non-refundable ticket)

Well, I just cancel the flight because they cancel my baggage service. And looks like I‚Äôll never see that 500$ again. | Absolute scam canceled my flight (that was booked well in advance) at 4 am week of the flight. Left me no choice but to overpay for a last second flight. I can‚Äôt even get a refund for this until 3 months time I can ‚Äúpossibly‚Äù get reimbursed?! Absurd way to scam an active duty service member during the holidays. Everyone involved with this are fraudulent. If you‚Äôre seeing this spend more money for a better flight through a different vendor, through a different app because it actually save you more money by not getting scammed! | Works worse and worse with time. Out of 3 last flights once they booked a wrong flight telling in the app it‚Äôs correct and twice they screwed up hours (one causing me to loose a flight). To find your flight, you will need to look up the flight number online or in the airline‚Äôs app.

title: Sygic Travel Maps Trip Planner
description:
Discover things to do anywhere you go. Plan detailed trip itineraries. Get around with useful travel guides. An ultimate all-in-one app for every traveler.

ADVANCED TRIP PLANNER
Build a complete day-to-day itinerary for your trip with an easy-to-use trip planner. See estimated travel times and walking distances and keep realistic plans. Invite your friends to collaborate on your trips.

WORLDWIDE OFFLINE MAPS
Buy Sygic Travel Premium to use the app without any internet connection, including unlimited offline maps download and walking navigation.

50 MILLION PLACES
Sights, museums, parks, caf√©s, restaurants, hotels, beaches, waterfalls, caves or even bird observatories. Whether you're a tourist up to sightseeing, out on a shopping trip or a romantic weekend getaway, we've got you covered.

PHOTOS, DESCRIPTIONS, WIKIPEDIA
Popular places come with descriptions, photos, opening hours, admission fees, links and additional data written by professional travel editors or sourced from Wikipedia and other databases.

CITY GUIDES
Get all sorts of useful information about a destination on this new screen. Collections make it easy to discover interesting and popular places, such as "Best Beaches" or "Modern Architecture". Read up on local history, get useful tips on getting around, understand local culture and learn about the dos and don'ts. Insightful guides are available for thousands of cities including London, Paris, New York City, Rome, Barcelona, San Francisco, Las Vegas and other popular destinations.

360¬∞ VIDEOS
Take a look around top sights in exclusive 360¬∞ videos. Over 500 professional videos from Prague, Barcelona, Valencia, Madrid, Granada, Seville, Marrakech, Gran Canaria, Porto, Lisbon, Athens, Istanbul, Cairo, Tel Aviv, Jerusalem, Bethlehem and Vienna. 360¬∞ videos also support Cardboard.

POWERFUL SEARCH AND FILTERS
Find any place by name or address. Use filters to show attractions, museums, shopping malls, restaurants, bars down to art galleries featuring Van Gogh paintings.

TOURS AND ACTIVITIES
Find the best sightseeing tours, cruises, or even local cuisine cooking classes. Buy skip-the-line tickets to top attractions straight from the app.

ACCOMMODATION
Find a hotel, hostel, apartment or b&b. Add it to your trip and see it in your daily itinerary including travel times. Book your accommodation with booking.com straight from the app.

USE ON ALL DEVICES
Your trips will sync automatically between all your devices and our web planner available at https://maps.sygic.com

Using Google Trips? Beware that the trip planning app will be retired on August 5, 2019. Sygic Travel is a great alternative to consider.

SYGIC TRAVEL PREMIUM
Unlock all the features of Sygic Travel on all devices signed in with the same account. You can choose from the following subscription options:

Sygic Travel Premium Monthly Subscription for $3.99*
Sygic Travel Premium Yearly Subscription for $14.99*

You can subscribe and pay through your iTunes account. Payment will be charged to iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription will automatically renew unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renew may be turned off after purchase by going to the 'Manage Subscription' page in settings.

*The price might differ in your local currency due to different taxes and exchange rates.

GET IN TOUCH WITH US
Check out our online travel maps at https://maps.sygic.com
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/SygicTravel
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SygicTravel/
Contact our support team: team@travel.sygic.com
Privacy policy: https://www.sygic.com/company/privacy-policy
Terms of use: https://travel.sygic.com/lp/terms/
releaseNotes:
Performance and stability improvements, including:
- Support for new devices and capabilities (iPhone 14 Pro, Apple Watch Ultra, Stage Manager)
- Map reworked with new rendering library
- Map markers load faster
reviews:
I‚Äôm not going to write a long review or list pros and cons, just some things I don‚Äôt like about the app. 1) Route planning is god awful with no convenient ways to alter them. The route it chose for me to a particular destination was nearly 11 hours vs the 7 hours Sygic and Google routed. You do get transferred to the actual Sygic navigation app for GPS navigation but again that is inconvenient. 2) Even if it was just a summary I‚Äôd like to see my whole trips itinerary instead of just being able to see a single day. 3) I was going to send this note as feedback to them but their feedback email doesn‚Äôt allow you to actually SEND the email. 4) Finally, there have been no updates for over a year, which implies they don‚Äôt really care too much about it.  Maybe I don‚Äôt understand the app well enough but it‚Äôs looking like it was a waste of money. | This app is wonderful. One question. I know Sygic gps navigation does not require Wi-Fi of cellular. Could that be incorporated into Sygic Travel? | In 2016 we were traveling through California‚Äôs vast Anza Borrego dessert and lost cell signals. Scary! We found our way out and I looked for an app that would serve as an offline GPS, rather than adding a cumbersome Garmin device. After installing Sygic I literally could navigate anywhere without the need for a cell signal (other than initially downloading maps). 
     That was the start of my appreciation of the extraordinary value and features of Sygic! It continues to get better with more features  since 2016. We travel about half the year throughout the country in our Class B RV (Ford Transit camper van). Apple Car Play supports both Apple and Google maps, but Sygic through Car Play is our go-to navigation.  We depend on it and the features other navigation does not offer that are too extensive to list here. | Great app. Wonderful for creating day-by-day sightseeing itineraries, which is exactly what I was looking for. But 1 star deduction because it claims to support Family Sharing and yet doesn‚Äôt even show up I‚Äôm my subscriptions list, which makes it impossible to share. | When one doesn‚Äôt understand what it takes to develop an app, you get reviews like the ones who complain about its costs and features for premium version. I did not hesitate one second getting the premium version of this app, it has all-in-one what other apps offer separately or lack functionality. You get trip planning suggestions, tour suggestions and their cost, navigation help and instructions, all the information you need to plan your trip and a lot more! Honestly, this app is a gem and the developers really outdid the features and actually carefully selected what one user NEEDS and can get lots of advantage for. I cannot stress enough how awesome of an app this is. I just downloaded and needed to share my thoughts because I barely buy apps and let alone leave reviews but this one deserves every good review it gets. I applaud for the effort and thoughtfulness of making this app the most convenient one for trip planning I have seen in the app store. Thank you and I really hope you continue making it as awesome as it is and seamless to navigate. Two suggestions as an iPad user would be a calendar view to visualize trips in a calendar format (or calendar integration, which I am still exploring in the app) and an apple pencil/ draw format for note taking as it is easier for me to use but those two suggestions are just that, the app is awesome as is and has a lot of room for growth. | If you are not a premium user you are done this app will not provide any information for free. | I just downloaded the app and planned for my trips, the app is amazing (free version) however, for me as a traveller, I would like to know the admissions/fee of the attractions. I would recommend to add this feature (even if for paid version) and it will be great app ever. | This had a few tourist sites listed. Even if you have zero internet connection you have offline access. Then adding an item to your itinerary is simple and you can start managing the days on the trip so you aren't doing too much or too little. | I used to plan to my trips using trip advisor, however they took away the ability to schedule items within each day of the trip. I tried using Google Trips, Tripline, and any other app that was recommended for trip planning. Sygic is the only one I have tried which had all the options I needed. Some of the features I appreciate include: being able to select multiple types of transportation for each day. If I am trying to plan a route on google maps for a day it won‚Äôt let me switch between using a car and using public transportation. Sygic let‚Äôs me decide for each destination whether I want to drive, take public, transportation, etc. The app also estimates based on the activities and routes how long of a day it will be. Update: User error. Sygic actually uses Apple‚Äôs way of doing their settings so it wasn‚Äôt apparent to the user. title: Trainline: Buy train tickets
description:
Welcome aboard Trainline ‚Äì Europe‚Äôs leading train and bus app.

We‚Äôve made it quick and easy for you to travel across the UK and the rest of Europe by rail and road. You can book great value tickets for Avanti West Coast, GWR, LNER, National Express and more.

You can even plan your international trips by train or bus across 45 countries in Europe and the rest of the world, including the UK, France, Italy, Spain and Germany. 

Plus, you‚Äôre always in control of your trip thanks to our live train times (for UK rail, Trenitalia, Renfe, and SNCF routes), price alerts, Mobile Tickets/etickets and seat selection (where available). 

Why Trainline? 
‚Ä¢ All your train and bus journeys in one place ‚Äì plan an international country-hopping adventure on our app.
‚Ä¢ Compare train and bus options from 220 train and bus companies.
‚Ä¢ Pay in your preferred currency ‚Äì Available in USD, GBP, EUR, AUD, CAD, CHF, and SEK.
‚Ä¢ Buy your tickets with Apple Pay, PayPal, and all major credit cards and debit cards.
‚Ä¢ Add loyalty and discount cards to get benefits from UK rail, Eurostar, SNCF, Thalys and Renfe.
‚Ä¢ Book in advance or on the day of travel, up to 15 minutes before departure.
‚Ä¢ Skip station queues with tickets on your phone on selected routes ‚Äì Buh-bye paper tickets.

Travel Europe effortlessly and book tickets for trips with:

‚Ä¢ Eurostar (UK, France, and the Netherlands)
‚Ä¢ Heathrow Express (UK)
‚Ä¢ Avanti West Coast (UK)
‚Ä¢ GWR (UK)
‚Ä¢ National Express (UK)
‚Ä¢ London Overground (UK)
‚Ä¢ SNCF (France)
‚Ä¢ TGV Lyria (France)
‚Ä¢ Thalys (France)
‚Ä¢ Trenitalia (Italy)
‚Ä¢ Italo (Italy)
‚Ä¢ Renfe (Spain)
‚Ä¢ Alsa (Spain)
‚Ä¢ Deutsche Bahn (Germany)
‚Ä¢ √ñBB (Austria)
‚Ä¢ SBB (Switzerland)
‚Ä¢ NS (the Netherlands)
‚Ä¢ SNCB (Belgium)
‚Ä¢ Flixbus and many, many more‚Ä¶

So, download your FREE Trainline app and get access to live train times, and cheap train and bus tickets across Europe. 

Have a question? Read our FAQs: https://www.thetrainline.com/en/help/

Follow Trainline on social:

‚Ä¢ Facebook: facebook.com/trainline.eu
‚Ä¢ Twitter: twitter.com/trainline_eu
‚Ä¢ Instagram: @trainline
releaseNotes:
The little things matter

This update lays the rails for essential fixes and improvements.

You might not notice any visual changes, but we‚Äôve done some work in the back-end to improve our app‚Äôs performance.
reviews:
We are at the train station and need help, the station says that since I purchased from this company I must call this company.

This company has no phone number to call for help. They have an email, but for immediate needs, email is them akin to snail mail, not possible.  

My advice is to just purchase your ticket through the national rail system for the country you are traveling through. This way, if / when issues arise, you can get immediate help at the station. | First of all, the best value it provides is the convenience to buy tickets in the palm and seamless integration of payment with Apple Pay, and maybe discount tickets sometimes.

But, it has a few serious UX issues need to be addressed. 
1) unable to save companion passengers info. It becomes annoying that every search you have to reenter them.
2) it somehow saves the dates and stations of the last search, and if you are not being careful, you can end up buying the wrong tickets. It happened to us that we end up buying tickets at the spot in the train station, but the tickets are for two days later. Luckily the ticket inspector on the train gave us a break, and we just let the wrong tickets expire.
3) on the return trip, it tries to charge about 9 euros booking fee, so we went to the ticket office, and was able to save 30 euros. The train is about to start in 20 minutes, so ticket agent may be offering a discount, but this is not reflected on Trainline app.
Anyways, I will not use this app anymore for spontaneous tickets. But it could be useful for planned travel when not in a hurry. | Do not use it, the tickets I bought were invalid. And they do not provide refund. | If you the app be careful. I bought my train tickets and in the worse moment in the middle of the trip block my user name. The result: lost of my tickets. Try to get in contact and no answer. So again be careful. | I use OrarioTreni to check and control the time and status of trains in Italy. It has been bought by train line yet TRAINLINE doesn‚Äôt give me the features of OrarioTreni. And on iPhone 15, for some reason I am unable to close the prompt to transfer to TRAINLINE. I‚Äôm so annoyed that the one app I used daily (ORARIOTRENI) is no unavailable to me. 

And train line is not a substitute for me. I‚Äôm sitting on a train now, wanting the live status of my train. It doesn‚Äôt help me‚Ä¶.. | Unlike national rail apps, Trainline prefers to suggest intercity routes rather than big brands like TGV or EuroStar, which makes it exceptionally easy to bypass problems on the track. It‚Äôs helped me many times to bypass cancellations or construction by approaching the city from a different direction. The best part: the route is provided already, and all the tickets can be bought in just one click.

The downside is that this preference for intercity trains with lots of transfers isn‚Äôt ideal if you‚Äôre trying to save time, if you‚Äôre unfamiliar with navigating train stations, or if your train is delayed. If you need direct routes, they can be found on Trainline, but you have to search carefully. | This app is very easy and intuitive‚Ä¶ until you actually have to use it. Do not use this app‚Äî especially if you are traveling in a foreign country!!! It will screw you sideways and make you think it‚Äôs your fault, or that you are crazy. I absolutely never write reviews for anything, but I want to save someone else the trouble. DO NOT USE TRAINLINE TO TRAVEL!!!! | They will not refund money when their app and systems fail. Emails go to spam, app doesn‚Äôt load ticket. It‚Äôs all on the customer. Shame on this company | I downloaded this app and tried to buy a ticket but once I had entered my credit card information I was oddly invited to join a movie service. This I declined, but then was contacted by my credit card company about a fraudulent transaction. I had just been charged 5 pounds by the movie service!!! I was unable to buy the train ticket. This is a shocking experience that they need to fix asap! | Trainline does an exceptionally poor job communicating that when taking trains from EU to UK you need to arrive early and go straight to customs. Because of this I missed my train, along with 20 other people. The station had many attendants ready to handle this, because 20 people miss every train because of this poor messaging. I thus missed my connecting train in London and had to buy a new ticket at 600% the price. Trainline customer support was no help. In fact their phone number just went straight to voice mail regardless of how many times I called, forcing me to use their text chat. | This app worked the first time used it but now I cannot log in or change my password. All that appears is a blank screen after brief flicker. If I try to create a new account, it says that my email already exists. Online chat was of no help. | The app threw in random other stops into my search results so I accidentally booked the  wrong destination station. Could not exchange my or ticket or change it even though I called within minutes of booking it. Ended up wasting 40 euros for a bad and confusing interface and a company that won‚Äôt honor its own exchange  policy. Absolutely terrible and unacceptable. | This made getting around the UK really Easy! | App won‚Äôt let me type in my destination, so I can‚Äôt buy a ticket. Also, no English options, which isn‚Äôt great. | When rescheduling a train trip that only costs $2 more than the original ticket they charge a fee that‚Äôs 60% of the cost of the previous ticket. Price gouging at a level I only see with Ticketmaster. Very predatory business practice. | App functionality is good.  The app does not always assign a seat and that causes near disruption to travel.  No seat is no seat.  Either stand or take another train. | Seriously if there was a points scheme for this app I would be platinum elite. I use this app so much and it‚Äôs so easy to use!!! Also, if you need to change, or refund, it‚Äôs EAAAASY. it‚Äôs my go to train app and it never fails. | I used this company to purchase tickets from Italy to go to Germany and to return. the Italian train was canceled and this company said you can‚Äôt get a refund from us because the trains you had to reschedule in Germany had nothing to do with the trains that I purchased in Italy.
so if you have to reschedule tickets because of one company but they‚Äôre booking everything separately for you, you will be screwed. 
and then they refuse to even give you a refund for their service fees, it‚Äôs ridiculous.

 It says you can easily reschedule and Manage the tickets to their app but you cannot. when you go to click on manage or reschedule it says that you have to call their customer service, the number doesn‚Äôt work, or you have to email them. by that point your travel plans have already been disrupted you will be forced to purchase additional tickets and you won‚Äôt be able to wait for their customer service team to respond to reschedule your tickets.

 This is just ridiculous. Do not ever use this app and I will never be using this app again I‚Äôm gonna use it to find out where the tickets and the trains are but I will never purchase through them again. | Do not download another train app. This app covers Europe with a user interface that is about as good as Uber. | Bestü´°üíö | I used this for multiple tickets in Italy. It was supposed to be 80% refundable but when I tried to change tickets, it said I would receive $0. Do not use it. | If you have any issues with delays or cancellations - good luck. Customer support is useless and they will simply say they are a third party provider and can‚Äôt help you. | Do not trust the bookings. And then no customer service. Lack of ability to make changes even after train delays. Does not link to real train times. This is not good and I do NOT recommend this app to anyone. They are crooks. Book your tickets directly. | We purchased multiple tickets through their system. Some tickets came through email as an attachment for iwallet which worked GREAT. Other tickets came through as a link to the app. These (1) had different train times in the header than for the body of the ticket and (2) didn't always show up on the app but as a download to print or just not at all. 

There seems to be no rhyme or reason to this system. It‚Äôs confusing, inaccurate, and just an all-around frustration for my wife and I.  Zero stars. | Used on a trip thru Europe. Useful for searching the train schedules. Buying tickets thru them is a bad idea. App sometimes changes the stations you are searching (for no apparent reason). Once you purchase, you are out of luck- nice gentlemen at customer service empathized with me because ‚Äòno one likes to lose their money‚Äô but the ticket policies are up to the train and Trainline can do nothing even if the tickets were purchased a few seconds ago.  At least the app could prompt ‚Äòyou are buying tickets to leave in one hour from a station 1000 km from your current location. Are you sure?‚Äô
Wrote off those tickets and bought at the station- cheaper base fare, no ‚Äòservice‚Äô fee, and the machine defaulted to start the trip at the station where I was. Don‚Äôt see any reason to pay extra to buy via the app | Have fun booking a ticket when the price increase out from under you several times in a row. The app doesn't hold the fare during checkout. | Bought a OUIGO train ticket from Paris to Marseille. We arrived on time and expected to have a seat. We went looking for our seat and there‚Äôs no Carriage 18 on this train. It looks like we got the correct train to Marseille which left the station at the exact time we were supposed to be leaving. The train only has 10 carriages and yet our ticket says Carriage 18. There‚Äôs a carriage 8 with our seat number but he showed us a ticket for theirs. So we are now stuck here on this train to Marseille for 3+ hours without a seat at this super hot carriage. Never again!! | Train ticket I got has no seat number, no carriage number, no class of service, etc. All of that info needs to be clearly on the ticket and it‚Äôs not. I had to dig through my e-mail to find that info. | Trainline is not affiliated with any UK rail organisation, and as such, can charge whatever they like with ridiculous terms & conditions. Booking with Trainline means you can pay 2x normal rate, can‚Äôt change your booking and might not have the most up to date schedule. STAY AWAY | Have not used this terrible app since before 2020 and all credit cards have now expired.  Seeking to reserve  train tickets now but never purchased any.  Then magically nonrefundable tickets with incorrect date appear as purchases; no idea why.
Most outrageous flaw is that Apple Pay now appears as valid form of payment though I never added it and obviously it did not exist when i last used this app.
I strongly advise against launching this app until developer corrects these serious bugs.
IMO Trainline is dishonest and unethical. | The app works very well for booking train travel, but I attempted to cancel to pre-booked train tickets that were ‚Äúrefundable‚Äù,  the app malfunctioned in both cases and would not allow me to cancel travel. It referred me to a bad number for customer service, leaving me only email. Since email is only checked every 24 hours, they didn‚Äôt honor the requested cancellation. 

The Trainline contact information does not appear on the website, and the referral number provided by the app was incorrect. As a result, I did not get my refund. when I eventually reached the call center after endless emails, they were of absolutely no help.

If I could give zero stars, I would. | I can use the sign on with Apple just fine on the website but it won‚Äôt log on in the app‚Ä¶. | Tried to book tickets for Europe trip. Unfortunately, an immature app, poor infrastructure, and horrendous customer service resulted in a substantial waste of time and money. ‚ÄúWe are just the reseller‚Äù is what they say to deflect responsibility; actually their business is just reselling, so they should try to do it well. Not the case. | Used this app for my trip to Austria. 
1. It doesn‚Äôt give you all the possible routes. I found faster and better routes by manually playing with the different stations. 
2. When looking to by a ticket routes kept disappearing 
3. When trying to buy a ticket for my son I kept getting a generic error and was about to be late for the train. 
4. Booked a ride which turned out to switch to a bus and that had no indication in the app. 

Would recommend using the trains app which is much better. | I actually forgot my wallet at home in the US and all I had with me for a 6N trip thru London and the UK was my Applewallet. Being able to download the app and buy train tickets right on my phone totally saved me! App was easy to use, schedules were clear‚Äîeven for a visitor! | I have used trainline to make plans for my upcoming trip and it has been a real tragedy 

To start with, The Trainline App runs fast and stable on iPhone BUT they‚Äôd search results shows different price every 10 minutes. It creates an sense of urgency and push you to book .

Second, their prices are 30-100% higher than what I found on the train company website , it is unbelievable how much markup they add. 

Finally, their refund policy is MISLEADING and even deceiving and I have big regrets to put my faith in it. No matter what you choose , economy , premium , smart plus , you name it, they WON‚ÄôT let you claim a refund . It is always ‚Äú non-refundable ‚Äú ,  what I saw at the booking page is refundable , yet at the end , they won‚Äôt give a penny back . I read the policy back and forth with attention, spending my time to choose the best option , yet , I don‚Äôt have the option to change or refund when my travel plan updates , they either show you options of a double price ticket or non refundable.

I sincerely regret it and would warn anyone who wants to use trainline app: it is a rip-off | I‚Äôve used a few websites and booked trains all over Europe. This app is utterly useless to me. It literally does nothing other than give an error message with no further direction or help. Wasted my time. | I don‚Äôt travel that often by train, but when I do I use this app to get tickets. Easy to use timetable to see options, I use Apple Pay and digital tickets, no problems. | Will not process my Amex !!..tried 2 different cards and wouldn‚Äôt take them!!!said could verify information supplied‚Ä¶triple checked correct and still wouldn‚Äôt take it!!! | This app is great, especially if you‚Äôre traveling in UK! | Full stop. | I get an error every time I try to checkout. So annoying, I picked out my train and entered all of my info. I wish it told me at the getting that it wasn‚Äôt going to work | Very easy to navigate and plan.  Actually getting payment to work is impossible.  Tried 4 different ways.  Gave up.  Take care of your customers or someone else will.  ‚úåÔ∏è | I‚Äôve travelled within countries as well as cross-border between Germany, Belgium, UK, and Austria and this worked beautifully everywhere. I love that I can use ApplePay within the app to buy e-tickets including Eurostar and they worked in all the countries where etickets are accepted (UK often requires paper) but between countries as well as within each country without having to look for a ticket kiosk. I only wish it showed which platform the train was departing from but still a must-have app. | A recent trip to Spain gave us the opportunity to use this App. It is an excellent App. Simple, easy to use. 100% reliable. Much‚Ä¶MUCH better than the Amtrak App in the US. | Excellent app for taking trains in Europe. Some features could be a bit more refined, like consistently including carriage and seat numbers on train tickets (for DB trains they are in the confirmation email only) it live platform updates, but all around a must for train travel in Europe (EU + UK) | When I purchased a train ticket, the number on the ticket provide by the app did not match the actual train number that I was to take. Therefore I missed the train. Because it was the last train of the night I had to stay overnight in a hotel. The cost of a taxi to/from the station, hotel and new ticket was significant. 

I emailed the company yet never received a response. 

In conclusion, this app is not accurate. It‚Äôs not reliable. It‚Äôs not responsive and could end up costing you a lot of money. | Wonderful experience | Tried to book tickets but got message

10:14
Well, this is awkward
Sorry! There was a problem at our end of the line. Please try again.
OK

Rebooted several times, reinstalled app both to no avail. Thank goodness for old fashioned telephone call. Presumably works ok on laptop, but that‚Äôs not what I want, nor what worked perfectly well previously. Did inform Trainline so probably will be rectified soon. | The promise made in the app is that you have several hours to cancel for a refund after booking. However, cancellation is technically impossible while the ticket is in a status of ‚Äòcreating‚Äô, which mine was for several hours after my purchase. I needed to cancel and I was unable to do so before the cancellation window expired.

I tried to reach out directly for support but there was no chat or call option easily available. If you are going to use buggy software with your business you need a reachable support team. Very disappointed.

title: Vacation Deals & Cruises
description:
Love to travel and looking for some cheap flights, hotels or cruises? We¬¥ve handpicked the best deals for you to make your vacation planning easier and to save you money. Get the best travel deals in our app - for free!

We have the best travel deals to suit your needs and we also show you which of these deals leave from a departure airport nearby or which hotels deals are available within a certain radius around you. Download our app and you are one click away from having all this information at your fingertips!

Are you an early bird or looking for last minute travel deals, or do you prefer the security of booking ahead? We have both last minute and early bird specials.

So what kind of getaways can you expect with TravelDeals24? Take a peek at what we have to offer:

+ $49 - Direct Roundtrip Flights to Las Vegas
+ $198 ‚Äì City break to Orlando incl. Flights & 3* Accommodation
+ $69 - Cheap Roundtrip Flights to New York through Spring
+ $153 ‚Äì Roundtrip flight tickets to Cancun, Mexico

We gather information and check reviews for all the deals we offer by going onto TripAdvisor, Trivago, and many other trusted travel review sites daily. We make sure you get the best value, so even our cheapest travel deals will still provide great quality for your money.

We put together the best itineraries and trips daily in the app not only within the US & Canada, but also to Mexico, the Caribbean, Cuba, Europe and Asia. With our deals, everybody can afford to travel.

Please consider:
We at TravelDeals24 are not travel agents but independent travel experts who search through every available and trusted travel site for cheap flights, hotels etc. This allows us to give you a truly unbiased overview of only the best travel deals, no matter which websites or apps have them for sale. Since we cut out the middleman, you will never book your deals on our app. Instead, you¬¥ll just book your trip directly on the website where we found the deal.
releaseNotes: A better design for awesome travel deals. We increased the size of pictures so that users get a better impression of hotels, cruises, vacation packages and travel destinations. Bugs that occasionally lead to app crashes have been fixed.

title: Travel Match‚Ñ¢
description:
Welcome to Travel Match, where you can solve Match-3 puzzles and travel the world with vlogger Mia! An amazing journey is waiting for you!

Use your talents to solve exciting puzzles and gain extra props. Let's set off now and visit hundreds of fascinating destinations! Meet Mia's friends, pet, crush and rivals in a story full of twists and turns! Help Mia create more wonderful works and get popular on the Internet!

GAME FEATURES:
- Thousands of innovative levels for both masters and new players!
- Tons of powerful boosters and explosive combinations!
- Unlock unique obstacles such as birds, fridges, ducks, and diamonds!
- Collect unlimited coins and special treasures in bonus levels!
- Compete with other players in Team Battle, Golden Cup, and other tournaments!
- Challenge your friends on Facebook and get to the top of the leaderboard!
- Most importantly, discover interesting locations such as New York, Los Angeles, London, Paris, Sydney, Montreal, Beijing and more!

What are you waiting for? Download Travel Match now and enjoy your adventure!

Travel Match will be updated with more puzzle levels, areas and chapters regularly! Stay tuned for updates and drop us a review!

Need some help? Visit our support page in the Travel Match app or send us a message at info@mounthorse.online.
releaseNotes:

title: TravelBank Expenses and Travel
description:
A smarter way to track expenses, book and manage business travel, and earn rewards. TravelBank is the last business travel and expense app you‚Äôll ever need. Create and submit an expense report, book a flight, hotel, or car ‚Äì all in minutes.

‚Ä¢ Forbes: 6 Travel Apps to Help You Stay Organized While Traveling
‚Ä¢ CNN: 15 Best Travel Apps
‚Ä¢ Fast Company: 15 Apps to Help You Make and Save Money
‚Ä¢ Yahoo Finance: A Better Way to Manage Spend

TravelBank is a free to use app that handles all your business expense and travel needs. Capture receipts on-the-go and we‚Äôll automatically scan them into expenses. Invite your manager to automate approvals and reimbursement, or simply use as a business expense tracker for tax purposes. Find and book flights & hotels based on value, convenience, business amenities, and more. TravelBank is the smartest expense app because it predicts averages for business travel based on real-time data and pricing, while saving your company on travel & expenses costs at the same time.

‚Ä¢ Dreading ‚ÄúExpense Report Friday,‚Äù spending hours painstakingly processing a stack of receipts into an expense report? Snap a picture of each receipt as you get it, then ditch the entire stack. We‚Äôll scan them and automatically turn them into expenses. Turn a collection of expenses into an expense report and submit as often as you like.
‚Ä¢ Automate expenses by syncing your credit card. Advanced machine learning magically pairs receipts with transactions.
‚Ä¢ Receipts stuck in your email? Simply forward them to receipts@travelbank.com and we‚Äôll create expenses out of those too.
‚Ä¢ Find and book the perfect flights and hotels for your trip, knowing you‚Äôll have access to wifi, power and other amenities you need to make your trip productive and comfortable. 
‚Ä¢ See which flights your colleagues are on so you can book the same itinerary and save time.
‚Ä¢ 24/7 customer support for travel bookings with US-based travel agents via phone, email and live chat so you can focus on taking care of business.
‚Ä¢ Flexible policies and rewards for beating benchmarks incentivize better spending decisions.

The only mobile-first expense and travel manager. Get started in minutes for free today.

This app is a joke. | Recently I updated the app and at first it was very slow adding expenses. Soon after I was unable to sign in. title: Allyz TravelSmart
description:
Travel Confidently. Allyz¬Æ TravelSmart gets you immediate access to the information you need while you‚Äôre traveling. Download the app before your next trip to get real-time alerts and updates, easily connect to our 24/7 global assistance line, and access your Allianz Travel Insurance plan on the go.
‚Ä¢ Instantly view your plan details in the palm of your hand.
‚Ä¢ Connect to our 24/7 customer support for help with medical and other travel-related emergencies.
‚Ä¢ File a claim and upload images from your phone for supporting documentation, plus see up to date status.
‚Ä¢ Stay organized with real-time flight updates and boarding gate information.
‚Ä¢ Find local assistance fast in an emergency.

No purchase necessary to download the app. Your use of the Allyz¬Æ TravelSmart app and any and all content thereon is at all times subject to the Terms of Use. Please note that your mobile device must be compatible with international networks to use certain features overseas, such as calls to 24-Hour Hotline Assistance. Message, data and roaming rates and charges may apply to your use of the app and content thereon and be charged by your mobile carrier or other service provider. This application is not a substitute for medical advice or treatment. All plans/claims subject to policy terms, conditions, and exclusions.

AWP USA Inc. and its affiliates, including Jefferson Insurance Company and AGA Service Company d/b/a Allianz Global Assistance, are committed to protecting your privacy. By using the Allyz¬Æ TravelSmart app, including any content thereon, you are consenting to the collection and processing of your personal data under as described in our Privacy Policy.
releaseNotes:
Introducing Allyz¬Æ, your travel companion

The Allianz TravelSmart app is now Allyz¬Æ TravelSmart, with new capabilities and a redesigned look.  

‚Ä¢ Improved automatic policy retrieval and manual policy search
reviews:
I used the  previous version of TravelSmart app and LOVED how it would add new policies after refreshing the app.  The new Allyz TravelSmart app erased all of my stored policies and past claims‚Ä¶ meaning I have to start from scratch and reconstruct my Allianz policies for next two years!  (Yes, I travel a lot!).

I emailed Support and haven‚Äôt received a response.  This new app is not as good as the previous one.  Sorry for the poor review as I really used and liked the earlier version! | Multiple steps required- and then the verify email does not work.  Then I get ‚Äò too many tries‚Äô at that verification.   If I was cynical I‚Äôd say the end result is dissuading me from filing a claim , despite having paid a sizable premium. 
Not impressed. | any trip from 2024 past and future did not move to new version 
i hope they can migrate over | no guidance to provide documents for claim | This insurance has become part of my travel pack. great service fast, response time and affordable. Thanks for Allianz! | I am impressed with how easy it is to buy travel insurance.  The policies rates are fair.  I use only Allianze on my international travel. | Unknown why policy when viewed in app cannot be emailed. Error messaging is not clear at all. | Do not waste your money, our flight got canceled due to maintenance and these scum bags didn‚Äôt even try for a second to assist us in anyway. | Very well designed app and website. Easy to find what I needed. | Especially links to documentation information, they do not work. | I find it very confusing to know how to add things to monitor. Such as a car rental, Airbnb, etc. unless I‚Äôm mistaken and it‚Äôs only for flight, I was told by the agent who signed me up that it was trip insurance to cover my trip and that I would be able to have all of my different items in one location so it would be easier to monitor while traveling abroad. The only thing I could find was to add my airline, not the car rental or where I‚Äôm staying. It would be helpful if it was either easier to find to add these items or if it‚Äôs not already an option if it was added so that all of these things (even if they‚Äôre not completely covered), would be listed under one location instead of having to have different apps for everything. | Looking to waste tons of time? This is the app for you! Nothing works and your policy will be wrong. You will be unable to change it but not for lack of trying. | This is the fourth time we‚Äôve used Allianz travel insurance when traveling international. One of the trips, my husband had to go to the doctor twice because he got very sick. Allianz reimbursed us for his dr visits within a day of turning in the receipts. I was very impressed. | I put the TravelSmart app on my phone so I could have the information on my policy during the trip as the paper print out would have been 55 pages. The policy will not print out even though it shows my information and basic coverage. | Renewed an annual policy and although I was emailed a confirmation, it does not appear as a current policy here on the app. | Nice | App does not allow more than one claim.  I have multiple | I have recently been involved in a accident that has put me through a great deal of stress and without a car for the event i got tickets for. With this happening i am forced to work that date to make money and all this is covered under the insurance i purchased through the event yet they make me feel like im a criminal trying to get refund that i paid insurance for in the event something like idk LIFE happens? They are ridiculous and be very careful with this company i have yet to hear back from them, debating on sueing the company. | I purchased the insurance protection for my round trip to Chile.  I am trying to contact you after four hrs waiting setting on the plane. Did found out that the aircraft is having hydraulic problems, as a former aircraft crew chief, the issue is going to take more than the time that they are telling us. This is unacceptable, I do have the issue now and can‚Äôt wait until tomorrow to file a delay flight. 
Please advise 

Thank you | They lead you to believe that if you can‚Äôt attend an event for any reason you‚Äôll be refunded. Lie lie lie! They rip off innocent people thinking they are covered. | A simple 999 dollar mistake? Bought the insurance, booked the flight. Immediately discovered mistake. The so-called Priceline ‚Äúapp deal‚Äù was non-transferable and non-refundable. Really. Does it being legal make it right? | Easy to use appüëç | My husband and I don‚Äôt travel without Allianz travel insurance; they always on point with everything. Excellent service!

Thank you Mrs. Godson | Slow.  Once you make a change can be cumbersome to RE-engage the policy on the web site. | Password is not being saved to my keychain. Have to enter it manually every time. | Website/app is very easy to use and very self-explanatory. Thank you! | It would be helpful to have concierge services available via the app. | This TravelSmart app doesn‚Äôt update to another Apple device even when signing into the same acct with email and passwordüòû | The coverage is a joke. I do not have any 'pre-existing medical conditions'! This is the basis for a $250 refund. I assume that it would be impossible to get a refund otherwise. Why would I get coverage? The small print is astonishing! I will never get reimbursement for anything. You are a bunch of venal individuals who have no integrity. How do you sleep at night? | I renewed my all trips  policy on July 26th and paid the premium. OnAugust 6th I got an email saying ny policy was expiring in 15 days. I checked the app, and sure enough it showed my policy expiring on the 21st. I then logged in on their site, and no record of my renewal. I checked my credit card and it showed the $715 charge had been paid. After a 20 minute telephone call, I learned that the policy number had changed. The lady on the phone said it takes a while for the update to show up on the app and website. She suggested I delete the app and reinstall it to see if the new policy shows up.   Seems like there could be improvements made on the site and app, so transactions show up more quickly and emails are not sent about an expiring policy, two weeks after they‚Äôve been renewed. | I could not email the policy to myself. That app had a problem. | They created this app so they could get more data from you phone. It is a web based app so it actually just runs off their website. No options to opt out of data harvesting. Deleting this after my show claim. Never buying ticket insurance again. If I can‚Äôt go it is easier to just sell the ticket than deal with this company. | Would not use this company filed a claim for lost luggage the day it happened. They were given every documentation required that I had or was given. Continued to deny they received, even when I showed proof they received thru email and uploaded to their website.  After 4 months of going back and forth, still nothing.  They closed the claim, had it reopened after escalation still nothing.  Spent $1000 on the insurance for trip.  Don‚Äôt waste your money too! | What a rip | Just Thank you for being there | Allianz emails me and tells me that my policy expires in two weeks.   Renew. Now!    But there‚Äôs no apparent way to renew with in the app or on  the web site.    Pretty useless. | Allianz has pulled through for me many times on trips. This app makes it possible to have everything at my fingertips. While it‚Äôs still smart to have hard copies of policies and contact information on trips (in case there is no internet connection), the app really makes it possible to get help in a hurry. Great app!  Thanks for providing wonderful service. | Used Allianz before on our Hawaii trip. Claims 
might seem slightly long but was covered across
the board on everything. You will not be disappointed with this company. | Very easy to use, and such a life saver! I would definitely recommend this event insurance to anyone who has a shadow of a doubt that they may not be able to attend their event. It was easy to file a claim without the app, and even easier and more streamlined WITH the app! | Woman in Customer Service located in India spoke so fast could I could not obtain her name but she did accommodate my email change as requested. | What a help for travel!! | Wasn‚Äôt too sure about Spending the extra amount for the insurance because 1 I wasn‚Äôt sure I would need it and 2 because if I did need it, would it actually pay. I‚Äôm very happy to say that they paid and the process from start to finish was super easy and I got my money in a few days. 

One of my return flights from Fresno to Phoenix was canceled which caused me to miss my connecting flight to El Paso on that Sunday night. I had to stay the night in Phoenix (which the airline paid for) so I missed a day of work and it was not a fun situation.  However, Allianz DEFINITELY came through and I will most definitely by buying insurance from now on! | The company makes it seem like you will get reimbursed if you missed your even no matter what..that was not the case..i missed my event due to work related issues and my claim was denied after they gave me the run around for a month..i wouldn‚Äôt recommend this app and the insurance policies | I have been purchasing travel insurance for years. As of beginning of 2023, this app stopped working. It no longer updates with new policies purchased through the airlines. 
I can find the policy via web, but when the app tries to update it throws an error and asks that we call Allianz. That easy. | It was easy to set upüëçüèº | The biggest downfall of your app is you can‚Äôt find it by typing ‚ÄúAllianz‚Äù into the search box.  All you would need to do is title it ‚ÄúAllianz‚Äù rather than ‚ÄúTravel Smart‚Äù. | App doesn‚Äôt send alerts when policy is about to expire,so you can renew,
How dumb is that?

title: My Disney Experience
description:
The official Walt Disney World¬Æ app! Now it‚Äôs easier than ever to plan & share your vacation details‚Äîat home & on the go.
-Maximize your park time by taking advantage of our new Disney Genie service, which generates a personalized itinerary that guides you through our theme parks with tips that can help you reduce time in lines & take the guesswork out of ‚Äúwhat‚Äôs next.‚Äù
-Quickly access real-time wait times, park hours, Character Greetings, showtimes & more.
-Use the interactive, GPS-enabled map to explore the Resort & easily see the dining options, attractions & more nearest to you.
-Find your way around with step-by-step directions.
-Browse restaurant menus, make dining reservations, modify existing ones & even mobile order meals from select locations.
-Download, edit & share your Disney PhotoPass¬Æ photos & videos throughout your vacation once you‚Äôve purchased Memory Maker.
-Search & filter activities to find exactly what you‚Äôre looking for.
-Keep select Disney Resort hotel reservations, dining plans & activities organized‚Äîall in one spot with My Day & Plans.
-Save time by starting your Disney Resort hotel check-in process right from the app.
-Link a MagicBand+ to your Disney account on the app & unlock enchanting touches of magic.
-Save your parking information at select parking locations with car locator.
-Manage your Disney Resort reservations, tickets, MagicBands & cards & share plans with others.
-Discover official content for Walt Disney World Resort, including our 4 theme parks (Magic Kingdom¬Æ park, Epcot¬Æ, Disney‚Äôs Hollywood Studios¬Æ & Disney‚Äôs Animal Kingdom¬Æ park), 2 water parks (Disney‚Äôs Typhoon Lagoon & Disney‚Äôs Blizzard Beach water parks), Disney Springs¬Æ, select Walt Disney World Resort hotels & ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Have questions, problems, comments or suggestions? Reach out to us at app.support@disneyworld.com.
Connecting to the Internet in the parks: Without a strong Internet signal, wait times, park hours & schedules may not update accurately. You can see if your device is connected properly by checking under Settings.
Note: Some features in this app will require your full name, country, birthdate & email address, as well as access to your location data. If Bluetooth is enabled on your device, this app will also collect your precise location information through beacon technology in order to improve your in-park experience, such as wait times. To facilitate the sign-in process, the app will also require access to your email address, stored within Account Manager.
This app may request access to your camera to capture media & scan barcodes. Some Disney PhotoPass Lenses may use information on your device to detect face & hand coordinates. The app may request access to your external storage to cache certain data for offline browsing.
Optional planning tools may also ask you to provide details about your travel party. Some features in this app include the ability to make purchases & will require a Wi-Fi or mobile carrier data connection. Message, data and roaming rates may apply. Availability subject to handset limitations and features may vary by handset or service provider. Coverage and app stores not available everywhere. Guests must be 18 years or older to make purchases.
Before downloading, please consider that this app contains in-app purchases that cost real money. The app provides you with the option to receive push notifications for information relating to your visit to a Park or a Disney Resort hotel.
Terms of Use: http://disneytermsofuse.com
Privacy Policy: https://disneyprivacycenter.com
Your US State Privacy Rights:  https://privacy.thewaltdisneycompany.com/en/current-privacy-policy/your-us-state-privacy-rights/
Do Not Sell or Share My Personal Information: https://privacy.twdc.com/dnssmpi
Important Info About Disney PhotoPass Lenses: https://disneyworld.disney.go.com/photopass-terms-conditions/#important-notice-about-attribute-lenses
releaseNotes:
With this release, Tip Board can tell you if you are eligible to:
-Move between Walt Disney World Resort theme parks on the same day.
-Choose a Lightning Lane arrival window for select attractions.
-Make individual Lightning Lane purchases.
We also fixed bugs and improved overall app performance.

I get that this is Disney world and it is pricey to be here but there was only like hot dogs, burgers and fajitas. What happened to pizza and chicken tenders!? Then to top it off there is only like 5 or 6 adult rides in the whole park. Magic kingdom is beautiful but it should be specifically stated that it‚Äôs more for younger children families not teens. For all the money my family spent this experience was definitely not worth it. for the price of admission no characters where available for pictures throughout the park‚Ä¶I felt things ran unorganized by staff in certain areas of the park with the rides. title: Lemon8 - Lifestyle Community
description:
Lemon8 is THE destination for sharing and exploring. On Lemon8, photo and video content are refreshing, diverse and informative. Whether you're a fashion enthusiast, beauty lover or looking for a food recipe, travel itinerary, there's something for everyone on Lemon8. All you have to do is browse, record and engage with what you like, and you'll find personalized content just for you. From a shopping haul experience or a book recommendation, Lemon8 has the contents that are guaranteed to make your time worthwhile.

[Find Your Community]
- Lemon8's customized content is specifically made for you. Our "For You" section recommends a personalized feed to you based on your interests. 
-Lemon8 is also a great place for you to express and engage in a free space with other like-minded creatives within the community.

[Create with Ease]
- Fed up of the faff of creating on one app, editing on another, posting on yet one more? With Lemon8, our in-app suite allows you to compose texts, edit photos and videos with ease.
- You'll find a whole library of intuitive templates, stickers, filters and fonts for your photos and videos.
- Say 'goodbye' to jumping between apps to make a single post and, say 'hello' to Lemon8!

[Explore and Discover]
- Use hashtags! Our hashtags not only help your posts get discovered, but also help you easily discover content you like.
- Our campaign features and intuitive search helps you find trending content, top-performing creators and whatever answer you're browsing for.

[Contact Us]
- We want to build Lemon8 into the app you need and desire. Your suggestions make Lemon8 better.
- If you have any feedback, questions or concerns, contact us at any time using the following email: contact@lemon8-app.com

title: IHG Hotels & Rewards
description:
Guest how you guest when you book one of our 6,000+ hotels ‚Äî and earn rewards.  

IHG Hotels & Resorts: 6,000+ destinations. 19 hotel brands. 1 app.
Earn rewards when you book with any of our hotel brands from our IHG One Rewards app. From family-friendly stays at Holiday Inn hotels, to business-ready accommodations at Crowne Plaza hotels, to luxury getaways at Iberostar Beachfront Resorts, we have a brand designed for however you like to stay.

We make booking simple
When you download the IHG One Rewards app, travel becomes a breeze! The app makes everything simple at every point of your journey ‚Äî from booking to check-in and checkout. Quickly book and re-book a hotel in seconds, then add hotels to your Wishlists for future visits. Whenever you‚Äôre ready to find your next destination, you can easily filter hotels by rates, distance, and amenities.

There‚Äôs more! With Wi-Fi Auto Connect, you can automatically connect to free Wi-Fi upon arrival at our hotels. Speaking of arrival, our app allows you to digitally check in (or out) at your hotel, saving you some time in your travels. Want to get a better view of the area around your hotel? Our app can be your guide, where you can see what restaurants, streets, and shops are nearby.

Access everything you need
With the IHG One Rewards app, you can access all your trip details, get trip reminders, modify or cancel your reservations, and view expenses from your current stay. Need directions, parking info, or a list of hotel amenities? The app has you covered.

Get rewarded 
Access exclusive member rates and offers, earn points to use for free nights, and rack up Milestone Rewards like Food & Beverage Rewards and Confirmable Suite Upgrades. With our free and secure app, you can easily keep track of your points and benefits, pay now or later with Points & Cash, and discover more ways to earn and redeem. Not a member yet? Sign up for free in the app to access more perks and exclusive offers.

Travel with ease
Enjoy flexible booking options with free cancellation on most rates. Rest easy with world-class cleaning processes and get notified on the latest travel news. Need help? Chat with us in the app or speak directly with one of our customer care representatives. Whenever, wherever, and however you travel, we‚Äôre here for you.

Connect with us 
Website: https://www.ihg.com 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ihghotels/ and https://www.instagram.com/ihgonerewards/?hl=en 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/IHGOneRewards/ 
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@ihghotels

Our brands 

Holiday Inn¬Æ
Holiday Inn Express¬Æ

voco¬Æ Hotels

Atwell Suites‚Ñ¢

reviews:

This is a scam and quite disturbing! | Often have lots of points but no point rooms available thinking of going to another priority club | Clean and nice rooms, front desk and hotel workers all kind and helpful. Don‚Äôt sign up for a discounted vacation. It‚Äôs a scam scam scam for a timeshare company. You pay 249 bucks for a vacation to book later. But there‚Äôs tons of taxes and fees later to book it. Yuck | Pets allowed filter checkbox should be front & center right below number of persons. See Hotels dot com website. Also on credit card info you should add month number next to month name. Your app has only month name. Maybe it‚Äôs just me, but the booking experience would be 10 times better with these to simple fixes. | These hotels have always been there for me and my family, I continue to depend on staying with IHG anywhere I go on vacation or just going for a weekend trip. Best places, breakfast is a plus for us and the comfortable beds and clean rooms. The hotels are also always clean and I‚Äôm always welcomed when I enter the hotel. That‚Äôs why I recommend any family and friends to stay there. And the prices for staying are outstanding. | Very easy to navigate such as pre booking, perks and all the information needed. Perks are amazing and no hoops to jump through. | The room was excellent. !! Well thought out arrangement and most comfortable bed, sheets and pillows. !! Thank you. !! We will come back again. !! Breakfast was great and Brooke our hostess was the best. !! | All good no problems using this for reservations‚Ä¶ | IHG has always made it very easy to book your hotel stay through them. The app is very user friendly and tells you of any additional fees, for example some locations charge a daily parking fee depending on what city or town you are traveling to, alls you have to do is read! All the information you need to know is told upfront to you. | Love it here clean always | Over many years IHG will not let me have anymore than 1 night on points üëé | Shady business practices with points program | Great Work Always !! | I love IHG as a brand and have stayed in its hotels in multiple countries, but this app is all show and little substance. The details as to which amenities are available are confined to a handful of words and photos focus on glamor shots at the expense of actual information. For instance, a ‚Äú360 degree tour‚Äù of one of its NYC room doesn‚Äôt even show you the bathroom. In addition, most photos of the bathrooms‚Äîwhen they even exist‚Äîshow, again, closeups of the mirror or sink. I live in Asia where bathtubs aren‚Äôt commonly available and like to choose places where I can enjoy them when I travel, but good luck finding out if IHG hotels even have them in most sites. 
Finally, when you tap on a room‚Äôs pics, it redirects you to the entirety of that site‚Äôs photos, from entrance to bars and penthouse photos‚Äînot exactly conducive to making an educated choice about which room you actually want to choose. This is likely a lazy developer‚Äôs choice rather than a strategic move, and it needs fixed immediately.
IHG, your hotels themselves and customer service therein are excellent and feel like a great mix of style and comfort. Please make an app that feels the same, and fulfills its purpose: to give clients the needed information to book a room that fits their needs. Enough with the useless, fancy closeups, unless you‚Äôre selling the towels, and not the room itself. Please list ALL amenities, including bathtubs, and provide more thorough photos that show the tubs or showers in their entirety, not just half-shots that repeatedly show them from midpoint up. | I love IHG it‚Äôs convenient and easy to use. Cleanliness, can‚Äôt get better than that.  Pleasure, always!  This is our favorite hotel chain to stay in when traveling anywhere. | I love the user friendly app to make bookings 24/7 | The app works great. title: OneTravel Flight & Hotel Deals
description:
Get cheap flight deals, hotels and rental cars on-the-go.

Download the OneTravel app and join the happy travelers who book great deals with us every day.

Our app offers cheap travel deals;

‚Ä¢ Across the globe with domestic and international flight deals on over 500 airlines.
‚Ä¢ On the road with rental car deals in 30,000 locations. That's how we roll.
‚Ä¢ To wonderful rooms in a million hotels worldwide. That‚Äôs a lot of little shampoo bottles.

Our app saves you time;

‚Ä¢ Super-quick travel booking. We do fast well.
‚Ä¢ Easily access your trip, even if you booked online.
‚Ä¢ Call our support team 24/7. We're here to help.

Our app has your back, and it‚Äôs watching your wallet, too.
releaseNotes: Bug fixes and enhancements.

And even if after booking you call them and tell them your FF# and the request it to be added to your flight details, they‚Äôll tell you ‚Äúfor sure, ‚Äúit‚Äôs recorded‚Äù, and ‚Äúit‚Äôs been added to your record‚Äù - either because they‚Äôre just lying or are clueless-

title: Places Been - Travel Tracker
description:
Keep track of all countries, states, cities and places that you visited on your trips!

"Places Been" is a travel tracker app that allows you to conveniently search and mark those places, as easy as placing pins on your travel map. Visited places are beautifully displayed with their corresponding country flag on a map.

The app automatically generates a list of all visited countries and states/provinces/regions based on the cities you tagged. It also helps you to keep track of your personal Bucket List - all places that you are still planning to visit and your fav places in the world.
As a bonus you can create your personal Flag Map based on the countries that you visited - similar to a scratchmap!

Complete list of features:
‚Ä¢ Travel tracker: Tagging of visited cities, UNESCO World Heritage Sites, national parks and airports
‚Ä¢ Tracking of visited US American National Park, US National Monuments and Nationalparks of many more countries!
‚Ä¢ More than 8000 commercial airports of the world to track
‚Ä¢ Mark your favorite places and create your bucket list
‚Ä¢ Travel inspiration: Find landmarks and inspiring places for your next trip / in your next destination
‚Ä¢ Extensive offline database containing all cities > 500 inhabitants in the world
‚Ä¢ Complete list of all countries of the world including their flags
‚Ä¢ List of all states, provinces or regions for the following countries: United States (US), Canada (CA), Germany (DE), Austria (AT), Switzerland (CH), Spain (ES), Italy (IT), France (FR), United Kingdom (GB), Australia (AU), Brasil (BR), Portugal (PT), Ireland (IE), Poland (PL), Sweden (SE), Romania (RO) (to be continued)
‚Ä¢ Highlighting of visited countries, continents and states/regions based on tagged places
‚Ä¢ Manage of your own Bucket-List (places you want to visit)
‚Ä¢ Generate your personal Flag Map (flags of visited countries within their country shapes)
‚Ä¢ Stats about the places that you traveled to
‚Ä¢ Import of TripAdvisor My Travel Map / "Where I've Been" Map
‚Ä¢ Share your pinned places and your maps via Twitter, Facebook, Whatsapp with your friends and family
‚Ä¢ View your personal travel map online from any device

Are you a world traveler or do you want to travel the world? Start your travelmap now and remember where you've been and what you've seen!
releaseNotes: Major places update (cruise- and ferryports, new UNESCO 2023 sites, places in Antarctica ...) and bugfixes
reviews:

Now I have NO DATA on either the iPhone or the ipad app.  What a joke.  This was after buying the airports and parks etc.  BEWARE!!!!!!!! | Paid to be allowed to add my own locations, then I can‚Äôt add my own location. What‚Äôs wrong with the server? | Too many additional purchases are required And typos in the names of national monuments. | where‚Äôs niagra falls :population about 80,000 | I purchased the US National Parks but I can‚Äôt figure out how to access it. There‚Äôs no explanation whatever so ever.
