title: Journi Blog - Travel tracker
description:
Journi is the easiest way to capture your life as beautiful timelines with photos, notes, maps and more. Turn them into printed photo books in seconds & easily define which photos are private! Use it offline, create timelines together & sync across all your devices! Make more out of your photos and remember all your life moments with Journi now! It's free.

----------------------------------------------
What others say about Journi:

‚Ä¢ "Makes travel blogging a pleasure" - Cond√© Nast Traveler
‚Ä¢ "Best new app, hot apps, apps we love" - Apple
‚Ä¢ "The best, I can use it offline." - L.A. Times
----------------------------------------------

‚óÜ Your Advantages ‚óÜ 

‚ñ∏ Turn your travel adventures into beautiful stories with photos, text, maps, stamps, weather, flights and more.

‚ñ∏ Order your unique photo book with one click.

‚ñ∏ Decide who can see your stories: Just for you, Secret, Only on request or Public.

‚ñ∏ Use Journi offline, without Internet.

‚ñ∏ Create stories together with friends and have all moments captured in one place.

‚ñ∏ Upload multiple photos at once and let Journi build your story automatically. No matter if it's photos from a past or current adventure, Journi will group them smartly by time and location data.

‚ñ∏ Save your photos for free in full size and high resolution

‚ñ∏ Invite friends to follow or share your journi via iMessage, WhatsApp, Facebook, Email, etc.

‚ñ∏ Explore and search other stories from around the world and get inspired. 

‚ñ∏ Find and navigate to moments using the timeline or the overview map.
 
‚ñ∏ Back-up your journis to Dropbox and Google Drive.
 
‚ñ∏ Journi is optimized for long battery life.

We constantly improve and update the app.

*** MORE ABOUT PREMIUM MEMBERSHIP & PHOTO BOOK***
Get full access to all Journi features by becoming a premium member. Additionally to all the free features this includes the option to save your journis to the cloud, add weather and flight information to your timeline & get access to all 600 stickers. If you choose the yearly membership get 10% off all your photo book orders. 

Choose from 3 Premium Membership plans:

- 1 month for ‚Ç¨9.99
- 6 months for ‚Ç¨43.99
- 1 year for ‚Ç¨53.99

Pricing in other countries may vary and actual charges may be converted to local currency. Should you choose to subscribe to Journi Premium Membership, the purchase will be charged to your iTunes account. Your subscription will be renewed automatically at the end of each term unless cancelled 24 hours prior to the end of the subscription period. You can manage, upgrade, downgrade and cancel it in Account Settings in iTunes.

Photo books start at ‚Ç¨22.99 incl. worldwide shipping. Our books are made in the Alps out of environmental friendly paper that is FSC certified. 
Your photo books are personalized products that are made just for you. Hence they are not replaceable, not returnable and can not be refunded. Please make always sure to carefully check the preview of your book before you place your order. Production and shipping times are between 3-7 days within the EU, 5-10 days for USA and Canada and for all other countries 10-16 days. We are already working on decreasing both delivery times and our CO2 footprint.

Terms and conditions:  https://www.journiapp.com/terms-of-service
Privacy Policy: https://www.journiapp.com/privacy 

------------------------------------------

Visit our website https://journiapp.com to learn more about how Journi makes your travel adventures unforgettable.

For questions, assistance or other inquiries contact: 
Helpcenter - http://journiapp.com/faq 
Facebook - http://facebook.com/journiapp
Email - support@journiapp.com 

We love to hear from you.
releaseNotes:
Introducing:
- New design to edit your photo book much faster
- Pick your favorite title color
- Wall Calendar: Pick your favorite background color
- Performance Improvements 
- Minor issues fixed

Tell us and other users if you like this version by writing a review in the store.
reviews:
February 2024‚Ä¶ another update, another year gone by, and STILL no way to access iCloud Shared Albums. Journi GmbH needs to provide a way to use the standard iOS ‚Äúphoto picker‚Äù so we can access photos in shared albums!! (Please?) When we go on a trip, everybody traveling together puts their favorite photos into a shared album, but shared albums are inaccessible with Journi! I know they have their own ‚Äúshared photos‚Äù solution that they think is sufficient, BUT IT‚ÄôS NOT. (People don‚Äôt want to deal with other apps and ‚Äúspecial instructions‚Äù.) It‚Äôs enough of a challenge to get folks to add photos to an iOS shared album (and that only takes a few taps!) Other apps on the App Store allow access to the built-in shared albums so it‚Äôs not a technical limitation. There have been lots of updates to the app in the years since I initially mentioned this but it continues to be ignored. üò¢ | I have used other methods, but on a three week trip, this was the best. Seamlessly integrated, my photos were entered with my dialogue easily. You do have word limits, which in my case may actually be a good thing! But since my photos overflowed the allotted area ( limited to 10 per post)and made new pages, it allowed me to add more description, which replaced lack of being able to put titles on photos. I saw that as one drawback initially. It makes a book for you, but is quite good initially, and you do have some amount of creative control to move and edit photos. My only frustration with that is that sometimes I would like to swap a photo in a layout to a totally different location, but you are limited to their options. One other thing developers might address is if there is a dialogue box and the chosen preferred layout,  if  the slightest change is made to the dialogue, it changes the whole layout! Back to choosing a layout! All in all, I am very pleased with this app! The quality of the book I had printed was also first rate, if a bit pricey. I will use again, and have recommended to others. | Hello Journi Team,
Do you take under consideration to add more stamps? I would be interested in USA states stamps and also US National Parks stamps. A lot of people travels to USA to visit national parks and different states.

Thanks | Still trying to find an app that allows me to journal, add some photos and share with friends. This on another app that is NOT that. Sigh. Will continue my search. Ciao app‚Äî‚Äî- | Almost exactly what I have been looking for. Great way to share travel experiences and just photos but also narrative and timelines. So much better than overwhelming family and friends with photo dump via text messages. Several enhancements to add to your product development roadmap:
1. It would be amazing if I could share videos and just just photos. 
2. Another suggestion is to add ability to view without downloading the app. So if I share with older relatives who are technologically challenged they could see it without having to go through app download.
3. Dictation capability so descriptions can dictated instead of typing | Daughter went to the trouble to blog her entire trip on this website and then to get the book printed is outrageously expensive. | Well, I guess this is one less travel journal I have now, since you took away the way I sign in (Facebook). I might come back if you decide to put it back, but until then, see you never! üò†üò°üëéüèª | I wanted to love the app.  I joined Journi just days before leaving on my trip and have been stranded with little or no help for 2 weeks. The bot is useless.  When I hear from a person 3 days later, it is another 3 days and 4 request later and then the same runaround again.  There is no online help.  The Journi.zen desk seems to focus on helping you print a book - NOT why I subscribed to upper tier. About to loose any chance of journaling my month long trip and asking for my money back.  Frustrated and disappointed. | My husband, granddaughter & I are on a 10 day trip to London & Paris.  I wanted to be able to document the trip & share the pics & commentary with friends.  Journi gives you that option.  I had a little trouble setting it up but with the help of my granddaughter it is working smoothly.  Friends & family have enjoyed it.  Thank you! | I can‚Äôt travel but my friend and her husband show me it every day of their trip! I appreciate it | I am | I wish Incould add screen shot & videosI to my blogs | If it weren‚Äôt for journi, I would forget so many travel memories that we‚Äôve spent time and money on. And the best part is we can log our photos without being obnoxious on Facebook or Instagram. Just letting our close friend and family follow what we‚Äôre up to. Best app. Have gotten so many traveling friends hooked on Journi. | I absolutely love this app! It‚Äôs amazing to record my highlights of my trips and to share with friends! I love that every Journi has its own settings to share with specific people! I would love to see a common map with colors where you can see all the places you‚Äôve been. 
Also a wishlist would be a great addition and merging moments to days, so it would look a bit more organized. 

Thank you ‚ù§Ô∏è | I really love this app and the ability to share photos with friends & family! But this is 2023- we should be able to share videos as well!! I have several I would like to upload and it‚Äôs not even available in the paid version? I‚Äôm really surprised! Unless I overlooked it.. please help me find it or add it to the features!! | I cannot recommend Journi. Here's the list of negatives after a week of use:

A. No one you invite can follow your travels/see your entries without registering (i.e., giving out their email).
B. There is no web-based way to enter photos or text, only on the phone app. I asked, and they told me so.
C. There is a 1000-character limit to any blog entry you may want to create. That's longer than a Tweet, but insufficient to cover an intricate topic.
D. There is no option for individual captions for photos.
E. Photos of the same general location (in my case, Vienna's Zentralfriedhof) were separated as different entries when I happened to wander 50 yards from where your first photos were taken....even though I uploaded all those photos simultaneously. There is no identifiable mechanism for reuniting those photos into a single entry.
F. AND YET, a photo taken from a plane over the Alps helped to misidentify the location of 6 other photos taken in Vienna. In other words, figuring out the app's use of location data is inconsistent & nightmarish.
G. The premium membership is comparatively expensive, and the payoff is not worth a tiny percentage of the price.

In short, this app is better marketed than it is constructed. Skip it, and try something that is more flexible and whose business model does not involve scarfing up data from your friends and family. | There are so many ways this could be easier. It is frustrating importing pictures when adding to a previous event, arranging photos would be much easier if it was drag and drop, it doesn‚Äôt work with Apple Pencil, there are a little glitches when typing or selecting photos when editing previous events. It feels like it was built around ordering photo books and not journaling.  

TIP: organize everything in advance including your photos, what order you want them in and what you want to write. Going back to edit is clunky. | I‚Äôm looking for an app that will allow me to document my vacation with both photos and narrative. This may be the best I‚Äôve found but I‚Äôm having trouble figuring it all out. 
Is there any documentation show how best to utilize all it‚Äôs features? | Great app!
Waiting for the option to upload videos, and to have custom categories. | Great way to ‚Äútravel along‚Äù with  the actual travelers. | I‚Äôve made about 20+ books through Journi and I‚Äôve been highly satisfied each time. The books are very high quality. Making the books id easy & the App continues to get better each time I use it (more options etc). Finalizing your book & payment/checking out is a breeze too. I highly recommend!!! | I canNOT find my friend‚Äôs journey! | I usually don‚Äôt write reviews, but this app was constantly sending push notifications insisting me to purchase a subscription. Hate it, bad app, this should be forbidden. | Great way too share memories | Went on a family trip and the whole family contributed to the trip journal! Was able to get it printed later. Easy and really useful tool for recording memories | You had one job!

Simply terrible at fetching photos, no matter what source you pick ‚Äî phone, Google, Facebook. It just spins and spins, and never shows any photos.

And when the albums finally do show up ‚Äî like they did by the time I was finished posting this review ‚Äî they are in only in a semi-logical order, even after the latest update. They certainly don‚Äôt follow the order of the platform you are getting them from.

Example: photos from the native iPhone photo app are MOSTLY in reverse date order, with the newest photos at the very bottom of the list. As a profession photographer with over 130,000 photos, this takes a LONG time to scroll down to the most current photos. Not all of the albums in my photo library show up (or at least not in the order created).

When I do open an album it takes FOREVER to show even a single photo ‚Äî on high speed cable internet! I can watch a whole TV episode without one photo showing up. | I love this app very accurate on mapping ur photos love ur app easy to use | I am able to record my memories and it is easy to use. | Love the automatic and clean design layouts. When will the larger size books be available for the US market? I was so excited to see the 11.5‚Äùx11.5‚Äù listed in the print shop several weeks ago, but when I went to create a book today, it is no longer listed. I hope this can be made available soon. As much as I love the simplicity of Journi books, the larger size is worth the extra effort in the other apps. I am also a premium member and the app would not let me add a caption while I was on WiFi saying I was offline. I thought you should be able to work offline with the premium membership. Please bring the larger sizes to the US! | Really loved this for our family road trip.  So easy to post and show others where all we went.  I liked the map feature as well.  Best part was that when I got home, I basically spent 5 minutes to have a photo book made. It came in about 5 days and was gorgeous.  Will definitely use this app again.  Only downside was the book was a bit pricey but for the convenience I feel it was worth it. | When friends and family try to enjoy my blog in a browser on their computer the text overlaps my pictures resulting in an unreadable story and a very bad representation of my beautiful images. It's an experience that's beyond horrible. The developer apparently does not care or does not know how to fix this. Heck, a free Tumblr or Wordpress.com account do a better job in sharing my trips with grand parents and teenagers. Please don't just focus on your app but look at the overall platform which you want to build. | We use this to share our travel journey with loved ones without posting too many pics on social media. | Pictures are clear; showing detail and adding some commentary make the Journi even more enjoyable . | We traveled the country for 9 months and I really wanted a journal app I could print. After quite a bit of searching I ran across Journi. I recently printed our book and I am soooo pleased with it. The quality is top notch, we got it in just a few weeks, and it‚Äôs a book full of memories. Will definitely use the journi app for our yearly scrap books. So much easier. ‚ù§Ô∏è | Planned a 30 day family road trip and wanted an app that would allow me to keep a log of my memories through both words and photos. While very new to Journi I did find some hiccups. We are limited to 10 photos per memory if we could up that to 12-16 that would have been nice not to have to eliminate photos I really wanted to include. Their is no interface with instagram? Not sure why they‚Äôre no capabilities with Instagram? Sharing memories on Instagram would be amazing? Nice to add stamps of the different states of the US instead of just a US stamp. We road tripped through 7 states and it would have been nice to stamp them. 
Loved the ability to creat a book at the end of the trip and to have the ability to edit photos placement with my iPhone was the best compared to all other photo book apps. Thank you for the easy to use photo book app | The reason I live Journi so much is because all of my friends and family can follow me on my trip. And because of the format, it makes them feel as if they were there with me. 
But the best part is that I can create a book about it at the end!! | I found Journi online after moving to Spain about 18 months ago. I knew I would be siteseeing in Europe quite often and wanted to keep a diary of my travels. I find the app excellent for setting up individual trips and it automatically dates and maps the photos. At the end of 2019 I decided I wanted to create a book of my adventures. The app was easy to use and quite efficient. While there are a few things regarding editing I would love to see but really that would possibly take away from the simplicity of the app. Once I set up the book, I was concerned about price and quality. My book was 180‚Ç¨ but when I checked other apps and resources, that was a fair price for 190 page hardcover book. I have a friend I referred the app and he is now sharing his trips with friends. He just ordered a book as well. The quality of the book is great. You can‚Äôt beat Journi. | I share my trip diary and photos with family and friends. They love it. Then once home I do a photo book. I love that it includes my diary. I have 8 now.  From all over the world. | Great app for quick and easy travel journaling. Allows collaboration between different travelers and makes it easy to share with friends and family. Please add video option soon!!!! | First, there is virtually nothing to get you started. Many apps when you run the first time will give you a quick overview. Not Journi. You are left to poke around and hope you figure it out. There is NO IN-APP HELP. The you tube channel has videos, however there is no sound and they chose to record them at a pace that is only helpful if you already know how to use the app. The app would greatly benefit from a brief introduction. For example, when you creat a new Journi it starts you off with a map. I spent 5 minutes trying to get the map to show the correct location. It turns out the app will do this automatically which is nice, but there is no way to know that in advance.

Second, and this is the most limiting in my opinion. There are no photo captions. So, if you add a stop in France and add what Journi calls a ‚Äúmoment‚Äù, you can give the moment a title and description, but if you upload 10 pics, it will just show the grouping of pics with no way to indicate what each pic is. Since the main reason to do a trip journal is to preserve the memories of the trip, I don‚Äôt know why there isn‚Äôt a way to note what the pics are of. Some pics are obvious. But others are not. For example I added pics of specific things during a visit to the Louvre. I have no way to add a description of what the pics are and why I chose those pics out of the hundreds I could have chosen. This one thing will likely lead me to choose another app. FYI I opted for the premium service and it also does not allow for photo captions. | Journi is an app that allows you to create awesome photo books of a recent trip, special event or family vacation. The quality of the photo books is excellent. And the app is easy to use. It allows you to write a description of each photo and select the photos for each page. I am most impressed by the quality of the photos and the arrangement of the books. I have used Journi to make several photo books.  I highly recommend them especially if you are looking for an awesome high quality photo book to capture special memories. Additionally, they are easy to work with and quick turnaround to receive your completed photo book. I encourage everyone to order a photo book or other items from Journi. You won‚Äôt be disappointed. Kathy USA | Love to create blogs to connect with family and friends while traveling. Makes a record for us to remember our trips! | Great way to share your travels with family and friends! | You can‚Äôt delete items. | I‚Äôm really having a hard time trying to create past Journals. Every time I attempt to upload photos to a new Journi event from iPhoto‚Äôs, it freezes or it just continuously searches forever wher I just give up. 

Also, I wish their was a search feature for a specific key word or date when looking for past trips to upload. 

Right now I‚Äôm giving this app a 3 star review due to the issue of uploading photos to create a Journi event. | Journi app is amazing. I rarely recommend things, but some are very worthy!  We recently took a trip to Israel. I wanted an app to blog our trip, allow others to follow us daily and align photos with events effortlessly. (I just knew I would not take time later to do it.) This app hit the spot.  And it was 100% accomplished from my phone. I took pics with a WiFi enabled camera and uploaded them at the end of everyday. Our family and friends could follow our trip.  Journi also has the ability to print a book.... with photos and comments all ready organized. So easy. I received the book today. It was made well and exceeded my expectations.  If you are taking any kind of trip I very highly recommend Journi. | Perfectly laid out. Liked watching the arrow move from one day to the next and how pictures and descriptions are there. | Great app. Switched from polar steps for my Japan trip when deciding to use both at the same time to see which one worked faster and more convenient. If anyone is listening please add a feature that allows current selected pictures to be shown for a moment when editing or adding so you won‚Äôt accidentally select them twice. | I was living abroad for a year and used Journi as a blog to update my family and then to turn into a photo book at the end. Because I had posted for an entire year it was a little expensive to get the book. That being said it worked great as a blog and the book is wonderful just won‚Äôt use it again for long trips like that. | I‚Äôm apparently not technologically advanced enough to figure out how to work this program üò¢

title: CheckMyTrip ‚Äì Travel Itinerary
description:
CheckMyTrip is your digital travel assistant, bringing you flight information and alerts, travel services and extras to get you smoothly from door to door. And it‚Äôs free.‚Äã‚Äã

Ideal for both business and leisure travelers, CheckMyTrip will help you travel smooth, reduce stress and stay on top of your travel plans.‚Äã

SMART TRIP ITINERARIES‚Äã
- Real-time updates of your flight bookings for FREE, including delays, cancellations and terminal changes plus layover times‚Äã
- View your trip in a master itinerary with all your booking, including flight, accommodation, car rental and rail, both online and off‚Äã

ADDING TRIPS IS EASY‚Äã
3 simple ways to add and organize your itinerary details.‚Äã
- Forward booking confirmation e-mails to trips@checkmytrip.com‚Äã
- Ask your assistant to import the trip automatically by using your booking reference number‚Äã
- Send the trip details to your assistant to create the trip for you‚Äã

DIGITAL ASSISTANT‚Äã
Your personal travel assistant to help you at every step of your trip.‚Äã
- Flight delay, cancellation, boarding gate notifications‚Äã
- 5-day weather forecast ‚Äã
- Travel rules & restrictions‚Äã
- Search and reserve airport transfer and lounge‚Äã
- Recommendations for local activities

We respect your privacy. Check our privacy policy. https://info.checkmytrip.com/privacy-policy‚Äã

By downloading the app, you accept the Terms & Conditions of use. https://info.checkmytrip.com/terms-and-conditions/‚Äã

Contact us: If you have any question, please contact us by e-mail at feedback@checkmytrip.com‚Äã
‚Äã
**IMPORTANT REMINDER**‚Äã

CHECKMYTRIP IS NOT A TRAVEL BOOKING AGENCY‚Äã

 We only display information related to the trip details you add to your CheckMyTrip account. To modify, cancel or source additional information about your air, hotel, car, rail, taxi, parking, tour and activity booking, contact the provider directly for assistance.‚Äã

title: Polarsteps - Travel Tracker
description:
Plan, track, and relive your travels. Record your route automatically, keeping your phone in your pocket and eyes on the world.

Over 5 million explorers have chosen Polarsteps to create and capture their adventures. This all-in-one travel app shows you the world‚Äôs most enticing travel destinations, gives you insider tips and plots your route, locations and photos when the journey is underway. The result? A beautiful digital world map that is unique to you! As well as the chance to turn it all into a hardback Travel Book when you‚Äôre done. And it doesn‚Äôt stop there...

Doesn‚Äôt drain your battery, works offline and you have full privacy control.

PLAN

‚ñ† Polarsteps Guides, created by our travel-loving editors and other explorers like you, show you the best of the world (as well as giving you top tips for once you get there).
‚ñ† Itinerary Planner to build your dream (editable) itinerary.
‚ñ† Transport Planner helping you get from A to B with clear transport options between destinations.

TRACK

‚ñ† Automatically track and plot your path on a digital world map (that grows fuller as your passport does).
‚ñ† Add photos, video, and thoughts to your steps along the way making your memories all the more vivid.
‚ñ† Save spots that you love so that you can always find your way back.

SHARE

‚ñ† Leave tips for the traveling community on where to go and what to see.
‚ñ† Share your journey with friends and family if you want to. Or keep it to yourself. You have full privacy controls.
‚ñ† Follow others and share in their adventures.

RELIVE

‚ñ† Retrace your steps ‚Äì scrolling through places, photos, and your travel stats.
‚ñ† Create a unique Travel Book filled with your pictures and stories with the touch of a button.

WHAT THE PRESS ARE SAYING ABOUT POLARSTEPS

"The Polarsteps app replaces your travel journal, making it easier and more beautiful." - National Geographic

"Polarsteps helps you track and share your journeys in an easy and visually appealing way." - The Next Web

"Polarsteps' resulting travel log is impressive, and is the source of a severe case of itchy feet in your correspondent." - TechCrunch

FEEDBACK

Questions, thoughts, or feedback? We'd love to hear what you think about Polarsteps. Get in touch via support@polarsteps.com.
releaseNotes: Keep track of all your connections in one place! We created one re-designed central hub for followers, the people you follow and friend suggestions! Lastly, as always, we also fixed some bugs.
reviews:
Our daughter is traveling alone in SE Asia and this has been such a wonderful way for her to regularly update all close family and friends with photos, commentary, and maps all in one spot. | Can‚Äôt believe how well put together this is. I put in all my trips and it shows the pattern and rolls up all the statistics in a nice clean dashboard. It really is a marvel to behold. Best app I‚Äôve come across in quite some time. | Let me drag and drop steps wherever I want, make the location search better by allowing actual addresses. And I can‚Äôt seem to change whether a distance is set to a flight or driving. Do better! | Useless app just collecting all the pictures from your gallery and pretending it to be a trip. Not user friendly at all | It so easy to journal your trip and keep all the love ones up to date. | I love the app but the UX is kinda not good for example I can‚Äôt search for a specific location in the guide section  i have to go back and forth google maps to see where it is located on the map , also in the search bar it says search people & place when it shows up it turns to trip , this is UX disaster. Overall make locations searchable | So fun to follow friends on their two-year adventure from Oregon to Antarctica and back - in their custom van! | Recently downloaded the app and was really happy with how it tracked my trip to remote areas in Antarctica.  However, as a whole, this app is frustrating and disappointing to me as a lifetime traveler.  To see it reflecting the sum total of my travels as 2% of the world is not only inaccurate but insulting.  The app should add a means to record lifetime travel or its usefulness is only in the moment during travel or as a means to look back only at recent travel.  

Adding a checklist of countries, cities or the like to capture a user‚Äôs full travel history would make it a more fulfilling experience as a user.  I do like how it uses location data from photos in the phone, that too is limited to relatively recent history. | Great app for allowing new puppy owners to track the travels of their new puppy in real time! | This app is simply brilliant! It‚Äôs a real journal of your travels, step by step. | I love this app. It‚Äôs so fun to see my journey develop over 4 years of travel and beyond | Since joining it has kept me current with my brother‚Äôs journey | I always enjoy traveling yet keeping up on these travels can be a bit challenging.  With Polorsteps, I can revisit my specific trip, exact places, comments and photos.  Additionally, I appreciate the ability to track all travel experiences across the globe.  Highly recommend | This is the number 1 app for travel. I can used for free, #1 #1. | I love polar steps and use it to keep a personal record of my overseas and at home travels. It‚Äôs easy to use and I really like the map feature. Highly recommend. | I absolutely love this app, I have been using it to track my travels for years now and it‚Äôs my favorite! It is so cool to go back and look at the maps it makes! | I absolutely love this app.  I have been tracking my trips - I don‚Äôt forget things and my friends can see my adventures! | I have been using polarsteps for about 7 weeks now to track my travels. I loved it at first and had no issues, however in the last few weeks I CONSTANTLY have issues uploading videos. I've tried uploading videos on wifi & data, it still comes up with an error though. Not sure I'll continue using it if this bug persits. | I use Polarsteps for all my travels - it's not just great to share your trip with friends and families, but also to keep your trip documented for later. It's an amazing memory and I love going back to past trips and see what we've been doing. But most importantly, the photobook which you can create is absolutely fantastic. The quality and the design are just perfect. I've ordered about 5 photobooks already and love them all! It is so easy and fast to create that you actually do it. Would 100% recommend!! | I‚Äôve been traveling for a month and found out about this from a fellow traveler. It‚Äôs brilliant in concept but I cannot get it to track my current trip. It synced all of my trips from 7 years ago from my photos with all gps location details, and attached photos to those locations. But the point of me using it is for my current trip and it is just a blank slat. Does not import my photos, location, or dates at all. I‚Äôve done everything I can think of, went into a deep dive in my iOS settings, went through the trip settings, my account settings, read through pretty much the ENTIRE help center, scoured Reddit, updated my phone, deleted my account and reinstalled it, restarted my phone etc and NOTHING WORKS!! It wants me to add everything manually down to the date I flew and the location I flew into and then the next place I stayed etc but at no point does it ever finally pick up in syncing to fill the info in. I ended the trips, restarted the trip, every thing I can possibly think of and NOTHING works. What is the point in using this for your friends and family to track your travels if it only syncs trip details after you arrive back home?!?! The only trips it syncs are ones where I‚Äôve ended AND flown back to my home location. Otherwise this stupid thing is WORTHLESS and you might as well just post on social media because it will be endlessly less frustrating!!! | I documented a month long trip through Scotland after I returned home and the result was impressive. It would have been even better had I known about and used the app during the trip. The browser interface for sharing & viewing the trip works well; navigation would be aided if trip steps could be collapsed to a single line showing just the step name. A native iPad UI for the app would also be great as would a built-in airplay option. I could go on with feature requests but for a free app with no advertising Polarsteps shines as is. | we be to arrive where we started and know the place for the first time. | I have been using Polarsteps since its Beta phase and I love it. I like that my trip posts can be private or public. The app is easy to use. The book editing can be a little time consuming but the final product is of first rate quality. | Polarsteps is awesome!   I have used both the app & website versions for years and can‚Äôt say enough good things about them.  It just keeps getting better all the time.  

The team behind PolarSteps is committed to providing a seamless experience for everyone.  I recently encountered an issue, contacted them, and the problem was corrected quickly & perfectly.  

If you are considering PolarSteps, don‚Äôt hesitate to try it‚Ä¶..you won‚Äôt be disappointed! | Absolutely the best travel tracker app I‚Äôve found. Best way to save all of the memories from your journeys and even convert them into a high quality photo book. | I have three trips that were taken years ago that still show I am traveling. I have tried numerous times to go in and change the end date. I have deleted the app. I am only working on my iPhone. I can‚Äôt understand why I can‚Äôt get it to end the trip. | Amazing app if you‚Äôre into traveling really easy to use. | We are | Great app which is intuitive, easy and highly functional, however the photo book process and options needs work‚Ä¶merger with Shutterfly or Mixbook(?) | I love this app and the concept of documenting your travel. I also love the idea of being able to make a book at the end. But the app is insanely glitchy!!! There have been several instances where I added all my photos and wrote out paragraphs of text, just for Polarsteps to delete parts of it after posting. For example, I just wrote out many paragraphs detailing a day of my trip, and polar steps deleted everything but the first couple sentences. There is no archive and no way of retrieving the lost text. Another time, I uploaded many photos and the app only actually uploaded one. I had to delete the step entirely and try again. 
Love this concept, PLEASE fix this app!!!!!! | I learned about Polarsteps from a fellow American I just happened to meet in Izmir, Turkey, and he told me he was using the app as his  travel blog, so I downloaded it and followed him. Actually, now that I think about it, I started using it that same day in 2018! And I never stopped. How do I remember such details? Because my experience is forever recorded in the app, complete with pictures, maps, and real time experiences. Polarsteps is so easy and intuitive, I have used it for every trip i‚Äôve taken since then. At least 20-30 trips, many them abroad. It is so fun to go back through my past adventures and relive the details. Travel is something so special to me, and I want to remember everything I did, as well as keep my friends and family informed in real time. Polarsteps helps me so that. I highly recommend it. | I gotta tell you, PolarSteps is the bomb-diggity of travel apps! üåç‚úàÔ∏è Seriously, it‚Äôs like having your personal travel guru right in your pocket. I‚Äôve been on the app since the beginning and I‚Äôve happily carried PolarSteps around the globe with me.

One thing that totally rocks about PolarSteps is their overall travel statistics. It‚Äôs like looking at your own travel r√©sum√© - you can see how many countries you‚Äôve conquered, how many miles you‚Äôve trekked, and even the time you‚Äôve spent in transit (Jetsetter badge, anyone?). It‚Äôs perfect for impressing your friends with your travel street cred.

But wait, there‚Äôs more! The interactive global map is where the real magic happens. You can zoom in on the exact spots you‚Äôve been, and it‚Äôs like reliving your adventures all over again. It‚Äôs like having a digital scrapbook that you can share with your peeps, complete with photos and notes.

Plus, the app is super user-friendly. You don‚Äôt have to be a tech whiz to navigate it. Whether you‚Äôre a seasoned globetrotter or just planning your first big trip, PolarSteps has got you covered. It‚Äôs the ultimate travel sidekick, and it‚Äôs all about making your journeys cooler than a polar bear‚Äôs toenails. üêß‚ùÑÔ∏è

So, if you‚Äôre into tracking your adventures and reliving the good times, PolarSteps is the way to go. It‚Äôs the app that turns your travels into epic stories. Happy adventuring, my fellow wanderlusters! üåüüåèüåü | Love this App! Wonderful to make a book of your trip! They do an awesome job making your book! | There is a bug where I cannot follow the trips that have been shared with me. When I click a friend‚Äôs link, it takes me to the app homepage. Even when I search for that person, it says they have no trips. It works fine on the web version so it must be an app issue. No way to contact support either. | Nice to see friends on their trips | Splendid app to track friends from all over the world as they travel! | I‚Äôd like to start off by saying that I absolutely love the step tracking features in this app. It‚Äôs like the perfect digital journal for my trips. There are just a few features that irk me when trying to use the newer features. I don‚Äôt understand why, if you can load predicted routes using roam to rio, we can‚Äôt just use the predicted route as an actual one in step tracking. I hate having to use the steps suggested when tracking is on, but the straight lines look sooo bad in the finished trip map. Why can‚Äôt I just say, ‚Äúyes I took the exact route suggested by roam to rio, use that for the map‚Äù? The tracked steps are always random and sometimes skip major sections so it doesn‚Äôt follow our route.

 And I want to buy one of the travel books so badly because I spent so much time documenting my trip in this app that there‚Äôs no way I‚Äôm creating a book in another one, but the features to edit the layout are extremely limited. Only getting to fit 4 photos on a page with a 400 page limit is so hard! If I have a long trip or I want a more photos I‚Äôm unable to fit everything I want to show. I took a 2 month trip and was so excited to print the book only to realize that I‚Äôd have to pick like 4 photos for each step and they don‚Äôt fit onto the page very efficiently. I would gladly drop the $200 for a large travel book if I could actually control the page layouts.

Finally, is there any plan to incorporate the 3D globe that androids have for the iPhone app. I love being able to look at all the steps on the globe on my friends phones but it‚Äôs just a flat, non-interactive map on the iPhone. Again, I love the app and I use it all the time, I just wish it had a few more features to make documentation easier. | This is a wonderful app because it allows us as travelers to keep our family and friends abreast of our travels. It‚Äôs almost like they‚Äôre being there with us I would highly recommend it. | My family and I followed my daughter and her friends on PolarSteps as they traveled through Europe after college graduation. The graduates loved posting multiple photos on PolarSteps and journaling about their journey. They also felt more comfortable posting multiple photos on PolarSteps than on Instagram. | What a great way to record a trip. I tend to take a lot of pictures and I appreciate that I am not limited in what I post, nor am I limited in how much I choose to write. Unfortunately I cannot provide captions for specific pictures. 
Combining a live map of where we are at any specific time is fantastic.
I hope I can make their work worthwhile with picture books ordered after the trip. Great business model idea - I hope it pans out! | I have been using Polar Steps for more than 5 years and my Italy Trip on the app was ruined. The location services are always active and there has been internet access during the whole trip but my steps were not recorded. So basically day one and day 8, no exact routes or anything.

Thanks for that. | Whenever my friend goes on a trip I have the worst time signing in to follow. Get stuck in loop of new password not recognized. | been loving this app. makes keeping my friends and family so easy and fun. I do wish there was a feature where i could turn off the live location without going private or followers only just for safety reasons. | This app is something I have imagined before and wished existed. With a few UI thibgs and some other flow improvements this app could be near perfect in what it does and delivers. 

My only wish is that users were more in control of the privacy settings, and that there were more ways you could manage the way the data is stored and used. | The application give me the feeling to travel from my house in the USA with my family in Europe.  I can follow them through the countries and beautiful photos they take. Thank you | Love keeping up with my granddaughterüôÉ | We just came back from a one month trip. We used Polarsteps and shared with our friends. They all said it‚Äôs fantastic. They read every what we wrote at every stop and the pictures we posted from different places. It‚Äôs a good thing to remain for us as a fond memory and a travel log. We may review those pleasant experiences at any time. Will recommend all my friends to try it. | Great App. Communication with the teachers and pictures of places they were visiting was Fantastic.üèÜ
Thank you very much!!!
The Dittrich Family | I have used this app for a number of trips and love it! I recommend to all my friends traveling. We have also ordered the travel books the app created. It makes for a great coffee table book! | Now that I can no longer actually walk these paths, climb these hills, smell these early mornings, it‚Äôs wonderful to have Joan and Tye do it in my place. They can help me re-live times that are specially vivid now. Images add themselves to my own, and actually re-enliven memory. Delightful.

title: Sam's Club
description:
Sam‚Äôs Club 
Enjoy all your membership perks with the Sam‚Äôs Club app.

Save time and shop easier every day with the Sam‚Äôs Club app. Make the most of your membership with these best-loved exclusives, including free Pickup, Scan & Go, Pharmacy and Free Shipping for Plus members. Save even more with Instant Savings and track your Plus Cash Rewards. Use the tabs at the bottom to find Home, Scan & Go, Account and more.

Scan & Go‚Ñ¢ Checkout
Now you can pay for gas with the Scan & Go‚Ñ¢ feature to save time at the pump. In the club, shop contact free and skip the checkout line. Just shop, scan and pay, all in the app.

Pickup
Shop in the app, then schedule a free Pickup time that works best for you. We‚Äôll have your order ready when you arrive.

Your Lists 
Start your cart and easily reorder your favorite products, directly in the app.

Pharmacy 
Transfer prescriptions, request refills and manage prescriptions for the whole family for maximum convenience.

Membership Card
Quickly find your membership card in your account and access other membership details.
 
Shipping
Shop and ship directly to your home or workplace ‚Äì Plus members get free shipping. 

Download the app and get the most from the club today.

title: ID90 Travel
description:
The ID90 Travel app is the easiest, fastest way for travel & tourism employees and their families to travel. Find and book hotels, all-inclusive resorts, cruises, rental cars and more at VIP rates the general public can‚Äôt access. 

Over 1,000,000 hotels around the world, 22 major cruise lines, the 5 biggest rental car brands, and growing‚Ä¶ and always 100% free to use for airline, tourism and travel employees.
releaseNotes: Our latest app update is packed with enhancements. From bug fixes to improved user experience and even better navigation, we‚Äôve got you covered in this update. Plus, select airlines will now have the opportunity to work with their coworkers to earn additional credits on hotel stays around the world.

title: SAP Concur
description:
If you use Concur¬Æ Travel, Concur¬Æ Expense, or Concur¬Æ Invoice at work, then download this companion app to your iPhone or iPad to manage your travel and expenses when you‚Äôre on the go! 

With the SAP¬Æ Concur¬Æ mobile app, you can:
‚Ä¢ Review and approve expense reports, invoices, and travel requests
‚Ä¢ Snap a photo of your receipt and instantly add it to your expense report
‚Ä¢ Book a flight or rail ticket, reserve hotel rooms, or rent a car 
‚Ä¢ Update or add new attendees to meeting invites
‚Ä¢ Get hotel suggestions based on your preferences
‚Ä¢ Capture and track mileage automatically
‚Ä¢ Integrate your itinerary with TripIt to get real-time travel alerts and updates

*This is a companion mobile app for existing users of SAP Concur solutions.*
releaseNotes:
NEW FEATURES
‚Ä¢ Regular Expense users can view and move e-Receipts to report while acting on behalf of another user.
REMOVALS
‚Ä¢ We will stop supporting iOS 15 on the upcoming version of our app (v10.10)

Clearly ther engineers didn‚Äôt train the AI or test the app. | I like it | Takes to long to open | Since the last update, the app won‚Äôt let me log into my concur‚Ä¶ but on my computer on a web browser, I can log in just fine. | Concur made a lot of things simpler - especially after working in Asia where paper receipts and excels dominated, but the app, which is very ok with generally useable functionality seems to have gotten worse. Won‚Äôt login on or update. | Overall, I like it for the expediency with my group, but every time I start one I have to tap around and tap around and then finally I figure out how to submit it | Two pay periods in a row I have not received reimbursement for what has been submitted and approved timely. While he webpage has its issues I don‚Äôt trust this app at all. | On the mobile app when you get a credit on a hotel bill you can not proceed with the credit. There‚Äôs not minus on the key pad. title: Lowfare Airlines Flight Deals

title: Funliday - Travel Planner
description:
Funliday is a trip planning app that makes your trip easier!!
-- Featured on the „ÄåApp store home page„Äç
-- Featured in „ÄåBest New Apps„Äç

Fun + Holiday = Funliday
The best trip planning App in the world!!!

Funliday is a trip planning app that makes your trip easier, helps you and your travel companions to manage your trips, find local attractions, get directions, collaborate with travel companions. Funliday provides thousands of destinations, you can easily explore all of the places you are interested in and simply add them to the itinerary. You can also organize schedules and routes, as well as co-editing with travel companions.

------Key Features-------
* Edit together with others in the same trip. 
* Explore attractions all over the world.
* Organize your trip with ease.
* Offers offline trips (except maps).
* Provides driving/walking/public transit directions.
* Add attractions to Funliday in iOS Safari with share extension.
* Share your trip itinerary by email , WhatsApp and Line.

Like it, love it? Leave us feedback and a rating to let us know! We're all ears for your suggestions on how to improve, so if you've got any (or even if you just want to say hi!), drop us a message at willie@funliday.com. Have fun on your holiday!
releaseNotes: Bug fixes and performance improvements
reviews:
Always happy with the user interface, very handy with estimated driving time and easy to share itinerary with friends. I tried google trip and I‚Äôm just not as impressed. I recently ran into problems not being able to add scenic spots to my itinerary, sent them a user feedback with details, they responded quickly and resolved it within 2 days. I rarely see app that attentive to user feedbacks. Great job Funliday! | Love how I can share and others get to be able to input to the itinerary such an awesome app. | This is truly the best trip planning app. I‚Äôve been using this for a few years now for every trip. Back then I literally tried 10 or so apps and none of them did what I needed. This one had a couple glitches, but it was so close to great and was still the best so I stuck with it. Customer service also fixed/enhanced some items quickly at my request. Now, the app works perfectly and does exactly what I need it to do. I tell everyone about it! Thank you for making this app! Also, I looove that you can share it with friends/family and they can make real-time updates to it as well! | This app used to work really well and was amazing for planning trips.  I used to be able to look up places and attractions easily and add them to my plans for each day but now adding attractions takes a long time to load.  Also, the app used to quickly determine transportation time based on whatever transportation mode I selected, and now it never figures it out.  Finally, I used to be able to easily move and rearrange the order of places to visit but now everything gets messed up when I try to do that.  When I first started using it I would have given it 5 stars but now I would give it zero if I could.  This app used to be perfect and now it is basically useless. | This app is great as everyone traveling in the group can see the plans on a given day. However, it‚Äôs difficult to have more than one activity in a day because it doesn‚Äôt let you set a start time for anything but the first activity. After that it assumes you are going directly to the next place. A little annoying as trips frequently have down time in between. | This is the first time using the app and am planning two trips simultaneously. I like it for the most part, once I figured it out it got easier. I am not able to edit the days, my travel partner imputed the wrong start date so that‚Äôs something I have to work around. Overall a pretty cool way for everyone to add to the itinerary and make the most of the trip!! | If I‚Äôm planning a trip to multiple cities it would be super useful to search and select a city vs a specific attraction. I thought at first this is what would happen when I selected a day and a map came up. Nothing happens when you do that. You can roam around in the map, but there is no ability to simply select a city as a way point. | I typically like using this app over TripIt. I like that it routes my activities on the maps and gives me allotted times of days depending on my duration. I like that it‚Äôs color coded by day. I like that it shows the drive time from one place to another. However....I would LOVE this app if it could Integrate our flights and hotel information and information of attractions, like tripit does. I would also like to edit an attraction by clicking it and assigning times by the minute. | ÊÑüË¨ùË®≠Ë®àÈÄôÂÄãËªüÈ´îÔºÅÂîØ‰∏ÄÁæé‰∏≠‰∏çË∂≥ÁöÑÂú∞ÊñπÊòØ‰∏çÁü•ÈÅìÁÇ∫‰ªÄÈ∫ºÊØèÊ¨°ÈõªËÖ¶Á∂≤È†ÅÁâàÁöÑËµ∑ÂßãÊó•ÊúüÁ∏ΩÊòØÊØîappÁâàÁöÑÊó•ÊúüÊèêÂâç‰∏ÄÂ§©Âë¢ÔºüÔºàÊòØÂõ†ÁÇ∫Á≥ªÁµ±Ëá™ÂãïË™øÊï¥ÁÇ∫Âè∞ÁÅ£ÊôÇÂçÄÂóéÔºüÔºâ | I‚Äôve been using Google Trips and it did a lot of things well, but it‚Äôs itinerary mapping features are lacking and this app has been very useful in completing the job Google left undone. There is room for improvement here but in general very useful. | Â¶ÇÊûúÈôÑËøëÊôØÈªûËÉΩ‰ª•ÔºàÂÅáÂ¶ÇÊúâÂâç‰∏ÄÁ≠ÜË≥áÊñôÁöÑË©±Ôºâ‰∏ä‰∏ÄÁ≠ÜË≥áÊñôÁöÑÈôÑËøëÊôØÈªûÂÅöÊêúÁ¥¢ÁöÑË©±Â∞±ÊúÉÊõ¥Â•Ω‰∫Ü„ÄÇÂæÄÂæÄ‰ΩøÁî®ËÄÖÂèØËÉΩÂú®ÊóÖÁ®ãÂâçÂ∞±Ë¶èÂäÉÔºÅ | Easy to use! Thanks for the help in planning our family reunion!! | This was the best app to help with planning my vacation! I tell everyone to get it now! | Really good interface, nice functionality. | Super easy to arrange your travel schedule with your friends or family even your enemy! Lol nice app!! | As an avid traveler, I am VERY impressed with all this app has to offer and the hours it will save me with all of its amazing features! | Edit: My travel partner contacted the app developers and got an almost-immediate response.  They fixed the invite so that we were able to share the trip and though currently only the primary trip planner can make changes, that fix is coming. I'm excited to see what can be remedied. 

Well, I like the idea and the format, but there were a couple issues.  First I successfully was invited by a friend but when I attempted to invite her on the trip I had already set up, she never got the invite. Also, in an attempt to circumvent that I was going to add all of my itinerary to her trip but the app states I don't have permission to edit while not allowing her the option to grant permission. :-/ | Good app | It's super convenient to combine all the info together and google map. I love it's flexibility, can work offline and super easy to share with others. | Overall this app is excellent for creating a trip itinerary--using the app is fairly intuitive, and only takes a little while (10 min for me?) to figure out what you really need to start planning your trip. I especially appreciate the integration with Google maps (I think that's what it uses), and how you can save specific addresses (even residential ones) with nicknames (aliases). The developers have a good product with great potential :)

There are only two issues preventing me from giving the app 5 stars:
1) The travel time estimation feature for public transit in Japan (the area for which I am planning) doesn't work. As of this writing, the app only estimates driving time between locations (and sometimes walking times...but that's not exactly realistic when I need to go 30-40 km as quickly as possible). If this feature worked, it would help me greatly in realistically planning how many places I can actually visit in a day. 
2) The pop-up notification asking me to turn on location services comes up too often. Every single time I want to search or add a destination, it reminds me to turn location on. I prefer having it off, because having all the "nearby places" listed is distracting (and irrelevant right now, since I'm in a different country than the trip I'm planning for). Having the pop-up appear only when the app is opened would make for a much smoother, less annoying user experience. 

Aside from those two areas for improvement, I am really impressed with this app and thankful to the creators! | ÈÇÑÁÆóÂ•ΩÁî®ÁöÑappÔºå‰ΩÜÊúâ‰∏Ä‰∫õÂ∞èÂäüËÉΩ‰∏çÊòØÈÇ£È∫ºÈ†ÜÊâã„ÄÇ | I never could get this app to work. Very complicated and not at all useful. | ÈùûÂ∏∏Â•ΩÁî®ÁöÑË¶èÂäÉËªüÈ´îÔºåÂæàÈÅ©Âêà | Really useful!! | Overall it's a good app, user friendly.
One way it can be better is by letting us to add some notes into it rather than just adding location of here and there..
looking forward for improvements..
=] | This app is so cool. It really helpful for me, and help to efficiently manage my trip a lot. Even a short trip, I could be easy to handle it and change my schedule. Just a very easy step, I can set up my trip schedule, and search new hot spot.

title: Cleartrip Flights, Hotels, Bus
description:
Join the bandwagon of 2.5 crore+ travellers & grab great deals on Flights, Hotels & Buses.

Trying to find Flights & looking for Hotels nearby? Or simply delaying your trip due to excuses? For every problem of the undecided traveller, there‚Äôs one solution : Cleartrip. Get up to 15% off on Domestic Flights along with Hassle free cancellations on bookings. Avail up to 25% off on your Hotel booking & Cancel For No Reason only on Cleartrip.

Let us help you find, plan, & book holidays (and business travel) more quickly & easily.

What makes us awesome:

Shortlist flights as per your budget, or fly your preferred route

Reschedule your travel dates or domestic airlines for free up to 24 hours before departure with CT Flex!

Cancel or reschedule your domestic flights for FREE up to 24 hours before departure with CT Flexmax!

See fares ¬± 3 days from any date, and set individual filters for each date

Special Fares for Seniors, Students, Armed Forces

International Travel Insurance & Medi Cancel Refund

Industry-first hotel offering Cancel For No Reason, only on Cleartrip. Enjoy an instant full refund even just before check-in. Give no reason when you cancel!


Book Flight Tickets Online

- Cheapest flight tickets & travel offers from leading banks

- Enjoy our best-in-class domestic flight offers

- Get unlimited discounts for online flight tickets

- Choose from popular domestic and international airlines 


Book Hotels Online 

- Reserve your favourite hotel at lowest prices!

- No need to compromise on hotel booking: Get the best rates

- Check out best hotels in Goa, Couple friendly hotels in Ooty, hill view hotels in Manali & more

- Choose from most trusted brands 

- Choose from over 400,000 hotels across 15,000 cities


Launching exclusively on Cleartrip! Cancel For No Reason right up to check-in time with an instant full refund on hotel cancellations.

- Find the perfect hotel using filters and personalised searches

- Compare user ratings and reviews for all hotels

- Find hotels by location, landmark, or other point of interest

- View room type, occupants, inclusions, and more - all before you pay. So no more clicking back to confirm what you're paying for.


Introducing Buses on Cleartrip 

- Book buses at flat 10% off & enjoy zero convenience fee. Use Code: CTBUS on your ride.

- Save big on bus bookings on Cleartrip

- Grab bus tickets at the cheapest rates

- Cheap buses available

- Avail sleeper buses at the lowest rates

- Get discounts on Intercity bus rides


Best Getaways, Staycation & Workation Options

- From work to vacation, we have the best getaways lined up for you


Convenient payment options

- Cleartrip supports secure, 3D payments that comply with the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS)

- Paying for your bookings is easy with any credit/debit card, via NetBanking, UPI, EMI options and all other popular payment options

- A secure stored-card feature - Expressway - allows for the saving of traveller details, and the saving of a preferred card for faster check-outs.


Visit our website: cleartrip.com to know more about Cleartrip.

Stay connected with us on our social handles.

title: TripBFF - Solo Travel Friends
description:
Are you tired of exploring the world alone? Do you crave the company of like-minded travelers who share your passion for adventure? Look no further than TripBFF, an app designed to connect you with travel friends, unlock exciting experiences, and create memories that will last a lifetime.

TripBFF is not just another travel app‚Äîit's your gateway to a community of solo travelers who are ready to embark on incredible journeys with you. Whether you're a solo traveler seeking friendships or looking to expand your circle, TripBFF has you covered.

With TripBFF, finding travel friends has never been easier. Simply create a profile highlighting your interests, travel preferences, and destination wishlist, and let the app's powerful algorithm do the rest. Discover fellow adventurers who share your wanderlust, connect with them, and embark on amazing trips together. Whether you're backpacking through Southeast Asia or exploring the cultural treasures of Europe, TripBFF helps you build genuine connections with like-minded individuals.

But that's not all‚ÄîTripBFF is filled with travel tips and insights. Browse through lots of user-generated content, including travel guides, packing hacks, and insider recommendations. From hidden gems off the beaten path to must-try local cuisine, TripBFF's community is here to help you make the most of your adventures.

Planning to study abroad or embark on a work exchange program? With our interests feature, TripBFF is the perfect platform to connect with fellow travelers experiencing the same thing from around the world. Coordinate travel plans, share tips on navigating new cities, and form study groups or networking circles to maximize your international experience.

Stay connected with your travel friends and make group chats to discuss itineraries, share exciting updates, or coordinate meetups. The possibilities are endless when you have a global network of travel buddies at your fingertips.

Don't let the fear of solo travel hold you back. Download TripBFF today and unlock a world of incredible adventures, unforgettable experiences, and lifelong friendships. Travel is better with friends, and TripBFF is here to make your journey extraordinary.

TripBFF subscription: TripBFF+.

TripBFF+ plans:

Monthly: $5.99
Annual: $49.99

Payments and Renewal:

Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.
Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period.
You can manage or turn off auto-renew in your Account settings at any time after purchase
No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active period and we are not liable for the cost of your subscription if your account is banned due to violating our terms and service.
Terms of use: https://tripbff.com/terms
Privacy policy: https://tripbff.com/privacy

- minor bug fixes

title: Singapore Airlines
description:
Get ready for a greater experience from booking to boarding and beyond with the SingaporeAir app.

From user experience to personalised features, our app is designed to be fast, intuitive and a delight to use.  

More features will be progressively added in future updates, but here are some key functions you can enjoy now:  

1. Explore, be inspired and get the latest deals on the go 
Where to next? Discover the latest fare deals to your favourite destinations. Planning your next destination has never been easier.      

2. Search, book and manage your flights
Search and book flights to your next getaway with Singapore Airlines or one of our many airline partners. You can now use your KrisFlyer miles, Apple Pay and Alipay to book your flights and preferred seats. Receive updates on your upcoming trips and pre-select your inflight meals and entertainment. After that, all you need to do is sit back and relax.

3. Skip the check-in queues 
To prepare for your trip, stay updated on the latest entry requirements with our travel advisory. Skip the queues at the airport, check in and download your boarding pass* on our app before departure. Select your seats and browse our digital menu to see what‚Äôs served onboard.

If you are departing from Singapore Changi Airport, generate your baggage tags on our app* during check-in and track the status of your baggage. Simply scan your mobile boarding pass at the check-in kiosks to print your baggage tags and proceed to the automated bag drop counters to deposit your checked bag. 

4. Manage your KrisFlyer account
Log in to your KrisFlyer account to keep track of your KrisFlyer miles balance and expiry, transaction statements and PPS value. PPS Club members can also connect with our customer support team via PPS Connect**. 

5. Experience the future of flying
Find out what‚Äôs playing on our award-winning KrisWorld inflight entertainment system. Curate playlists on your app and pick up right where you last left off between flights, or view your flight‚Äôs progress***.  

*Subject to regulatory requirements 
**This service is currently only available for registered PPS Club members with valid Singapore mobile numbers 
*** This feature is available on A350 and selected Boeing 777-300ER aircrafts 

Please also note that by downloading the SingaporeAir app, you agree to the terms and conditions, including the privacy policy, which can be found at http://www.singaporeair.com/en_UK/terms-conditions/ and http://www.singaporeair.com/en_UK/privacy-policy/
releaseNotes:
Others:
- Miscellaneous updates and improvements

title: Frontier Airlines
description:
Frontier‚Äôs mobile app makes traveling easier than ever before! Wanna skip the lines? Use our mobile boarding pass and go straight to the security checkpoint. Need to add a bag or select your seat? This app makes it easy. Now you can add you bag or seat after you make your initial booking and even after checking in. On the go, but need to book a flight? Shop our low, low fares here. Want a stretch seat, a checked and/or a carry-on bag?  THE WORKS makes them available at one low price which includes refundability and no change fees. Wanna‚Äô know the status of your flight? Get up-to-the-minute flight information here.

Features:

¬∑ Mobile Boarding Pass
¬∑ Mobile Check In
¬∑ Book a Flight
¬∑ Check Flight Status
¬∑ Interactive Route Map
¬∑ ‚Ä¶and much more!
releaseNotes: Bug fixes, miscellaneous updates, and improvements.

What was supposed to be an 8:30am flight has been delayed going on 2 hours now, they made 40-ish people put their carry-on bags under the plane because of weight distribution issues, and even admitted they overbooked the flight and wanted volunteers who could wait until 10 PM TONIGHT for a new flight. Not only that, they did maintenance that no one was aware of until we were all on the plane, soon getting a text at 9am that we would be delayed. I sit, now typing this at 10:00am after having deboarded the plane because they kept us on too long. I understand they need to check the plane is functioning properly for us, but at no time was this issue directly communicated until we got off the plane. The lack of communication truly is appalling and I wish we were told why these things were happening more clearly. | thanks frontier ,i just hope i will have easy fly round trip. | Worst Airline experience of my life. App is equally useless. Please please listen to me and do no fly this sham company. I will never try to save a buck and use these fools again. Also going to look through all the mutual funds in my retirement account and make sure they do not invest in this company or their parents or affiliated brands.  If there was a review option for less than one star or negative stars I would smash it. | So very frustrated with Chat!!! A few weeks ago, I asked to speak to a resolution specialist (after ‚Äúchatting‚Äù for 15 minutes) and was never transferred!!!!!!
I strongly suggest either give the option freely OR better yet, allow customer to speak to a LIVE human being!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! | They can‚Äôt get it right | There‚Äôs no ‚Äòback button‚Äô hence no way to review everything you‚Äôve selected before having to pay for it. Some things aren‚Äôt explained when looking at flight info. If you try to confirm your selected info, the app will start you all over again. Pain | No phone numbers....no customer service! No texting and no emails to let you know your flight has been delayed...They just are totally horrible...Maybe it's the airline industry in a nutshell..... | I had to make reservation about 10 times thru website and now phone app.  2 hrs.  Very disappointed and could not speak with anyone.  The BOT does not answer or understand issue. | Not easy to navigate. Stalling several times. | Every time you update they take more information. | I had booked the same flight with three other buddies flying out out Las Vegas to STL at around 6 am. I lost my phone in a taxi cab drivers car which was never returned (not frontiers fault) they were cleared to take the flight but told me I was unable to board because they had overbooked the flight!! somehow me not having my phone meant I couldn‚Äôt get on the same exact flight even though I had all my credentials. So I had to stay in the airport for 17 straight hours to wait for the next flight out to STL. All of this because frontier wanted to sell more tickets while a few others get screwed. They made no accommodations for me, no refund or anything. The front desk lady is just throwing luggage on the conveyer belt one suitcase topples over and she just throws it back on. 4.7 stars is an absolute joke I know for a fact that even spirit airlines is miles ahead of frontier.  Oh and the kicker is they charged me $20 for some unknown reason 3 days later. Will never fly with this airline again. Steer clear!! | Hands down- best flight pricing! | We are being charged $197 for two carry on bags and an overweight checked bag and the wait time to speak to someone is forever and we never got a person. Terrible customer service at the airport with the issue. | NEVER AGIAN will I fly on this amateur unprofessional ‚Äúairline.‚Äù  President: Barry L. Biffle should be fired or hang himself. I tried to check in one hour before my flight and there was NO ONE at the check in desk. They all decided to leave at the same time to go to the gate. I missed my flight and the next one wasn‚Äôt for 2 day so I booked with United. | Trying to book trip on ‚Äúupgraded‚Äù app and when it asks to select a bundle, the continue without bundle doesn‚Äôt work. There‚Äôs no way to scroll the pop up asking ‚Äúif sure (or something similar)‚Äù. Useless app as far as I‚Äôm concerned. | The change to the app means my Known Redress no. is no longer attaching to my ticket, so I don‚Äôt expect my boarding pass will show TSA Pre-check. I can‚Äôt check yet since the boarding passes aren‚Äôt issued until a few days before the flight. I don‚Äôt like that the updated app changes this feature. | Me encanta esta aplicaci√≥n puedo hacer mis vuelos directos y econ√≥micos. Displays old boarding passes from weeks ago. Have to check in 1 person at a time AND retype paper #s. And it goes on and on. Just junk | I have a known TSA number‚Ä¶. For some reason it did not show up when I added our names to the reservation.  I had it on there before and had TSA precheck.  Your app would not let me add it. | After selecting my add on options, there was no notification of the cost of taxes and added fees until after I paid. Those charges increased to cost by 50%

Additionally, while I am making my selections, I am told that I have 24 hours to cancel. However after I do pay, I am told that the payment is nonrefundable. 

Either this app is very unclear or simply bad for customers. | I‚Äôve never been happy with my results from frontier | Great app | Been screwed three times by Frontier Airlines, but they are a monopoly. Wrote Frontier, no reply, wrote Federal Government, no reply, if there was any other choice I‚Äôd take it. | Spent over an hour trying to check my flyer miles tried online chat called useless numbers I am going to the airport but don‚Äôt have high hopes pathetic customer support | They will intentionally place you and your family member in different areas if you did not pay to sit together just so you can give them more money. With paying a extra $160 for one bag and $80 to sit t with your family you might as well go with Delta. That‚Äôs what I‚Äôll be doing from now on. Stranding people in airports with no alternative but to rent cars and drive at late night even they cancel flights.  Offering nothing and having no customer service. title: Travelers Mobile
description:
From billing to policy details to managing policies and checking claim status, the things you need from Travelers is here in the all new MyTravelers mobile app. 

- Quickly access agent contact information 
- Download auto insurance ID cards
- Pay your bill or sign up for Autopay
- Track roadside assistance 
- Manage or update your policy(ies)
- File and check claim status
releaseNotes:
- Introduced a fix to now correctly display pending and completed status of New Policy To Do List items.
- Inform users when they are completed with their New Policy To Do List if they return back to their To Do List after it has been completed.
- Minor UI enhancements after the points of damage are selected.
- Bug fix to allow a person to file claims while located in a future time zone outside of the United States.

I have never gotten a check back from an insurance company.  We are totally happy with switching to Travelers! | I just downloaded it and after signing in it just does nothing. | I can see my renewal price but can‚Äôt find the renewal documents to see the breakdown by car and category. | In February I received a notice from you stating my auto insurance was going to be cancelled for lack of payment.  I NEVER RECEIVED A Bill.
The notice stated I could send a minimum payment to keep the policy active.  To avoid any further confusion, I payed the entire balance of $1290.
On March 20, 2024, I received another notice of cancellation for non payment of a thirty dollar late charge for a Bill I NEVER RECEIVED.
I have never been late on any bill, and you can check my credit score to confirm this.  
If this is not rectified, next year I will find another auto and home insurance company.
I have a big family.
