title: Tokyo Travel Guide and Map
description:
Offline Maps and much more! Discover new places and insider tips. Collect, save and organize them as you like. And have the best trip ever!
 
With us, traveling got easier and even more fun. Here‚Äôs what you get ‚Äì the shortest possible version:
 
‚Ä¢ Free offline maps ‚Äì no roaming, no hustle
‚Ä¢ Multifunctional lists to plan and organize your trip
‚Ä¢ Insider tips and places to discover
 
We let you discover new places, beautiful spots and insider tips at the touch of a button. Collect your personal best-of and save it for later. You will experience your best journeys yet with detailed offline maps and in-depth travel content on your mobile travel companion.
 
And here‚Äôs why 5+ million travelers love our apps:
  
CLEAR AND CONCISE MAPS
Never get lost again. See your location on the map via GPS, no internet connection is required. Find streets, addresses or attractions and get pointed in the walking direction.
 
IN-DEPTH TRAVEL CONTENT
You‚Äôll never have to buy another guide book. Our Guides features pictures as well as comprehensive and up-to-date information is available for thousands of places and attractions.
 
SEARCH AND DISCOVER
Search a specific place by name or browse by categories like restaurants, attractions, hotels, architecture, shops, bars, etc.
 
PLAN TRIPS AND CUSTOMIZE MAPS
Book the hotel for your next city tour right within the app. Remember and save all the places you would like to visit. Create new or individual ones. Mark them with different colors or add notes to them. 
 
SHARE WITH FRIENDS
Create your own reviews and ratings of your favorite places. Share these tips and recommendations with friends and other travelers.
 
SAVE ROAMING FEES
Maps and guide content are stored on directly your device so you can access them at any time even without an internet connection. An internet connection is of course required for initial downloading of data or booking hotels.
releaseNotes: We added "Sign in with Apple" as authentication method and fixed some bugs!
reviews: First link I clicked on. To Timeout.jp kept popping up with a fake google prize drawing. Deleted. | All the guides are for small towns in the US like in Alabama?! What is with this? | It seems to be a useful map app, but some points of interest aren't listed, even well known ones like Sanrio Puroland. I'd figure with a map app specifically for Tokyo, it would have all shops, restaurants, and POI. My Google Maps app shows more places than this one. It'd be a 5-star app if all places had info on it. | We used this every day during our 5 days in Tokyo to plan the major sights and track our progress. The offline feature is key for foreign visitors. | I've used Ulmon maps many times for multiple cities in multiple countries, and I can't say just how much they've helped me to get right to where I was going. You almost miss the adventure of getting lost! | Everything you  need to plan a trip to tokyo | I like the combo of articles and great maps | This app dinged me with review requests at several critical moments while I was trying to find my way around Tokyo. So I felt compelled to write a review about how underwhelming it was. I needed a good offline map with street names, but this is really only good when you know the places you want to go. The UI was a little clunky and I would have appreciated the ability to see all my pins on the map. | I've never been to Tokyo before, and I found this quite useful. There is no navigation, but the maps are quite accurate, and it's easy to plot out your course using the phone's GPS. You can locate and save locations to an easily accessible list, and make multiple lists. Free wifi is VERY limited in Tokyo (Starbucks is your friend!) so this was essential. One caveat, using it to navigate for prolonged periods is obviously a rapid power drain. My strategy has been to use this app, google maps when I have wifi, and a good paper map to reduce power consumption. Add street names, and I'll add a star. | The beat way to plan your trip.  You can mark your spots and plan ahead, then you can rely on the app without internet | Zoom into the street level of places like Tokyo, and the names of the streets and blocks are all blank except for the main, larger roads and highways. Pretty worthless if you ask me. | I have used these apps in Europe and Japan and I can't recommend them enough, especially for Japan where you can get lost 10 times a day. Never again! | These guides are very helpful and the maps are easy to use and up to date. | So far the best free offline Tokyo map. | Saves me multiple times from getting lost. It'll be even better if you guys would create maps for more cities, because I'm moving to only using Ulmon for navigation purposes but it doesn't have all the cities.  Keep up the good work! | Very useful | This app the best!!! Worked amazingly while in Tokyo!! | This app is very unstable and keeps crashing on my iPhone 5 running iOS 7. Very frustrating. Unless fixed there is no reason to bother installing it. | Quite simply, this is an awesome app.  It got me all around Tokyo with ease, unhooked from the Net yet always knowing my location  and direction.  Thank you! | Great app, I can sync the spots I want to visit in Tokyo to my iPad and back to my iPhone. This is the app to use in Tokyo I think. | Great app! The gps works with out and cell phone service so that you can find what you need with out having to get an expensive overseas phone plan. Plus it has a list of all of the mister donuts. | So far I am enjoying this app in preparation for my trip to Tokyo. | I really love this app. navigate the crazy streets of tokyo without turning on data roaming. I travel to tokyo at least once. year and this last trip with this ulmon tokyo app made everything so much easier and better.

title: AudleyTravel
description:
The Audley Travel Companion is now available on your mobile phone and tablet. Enjoy easy access to your Audley Travel itinerary when you are on- and off-line so you can see exactly what you are doing each day of your trip. You can also keep a travel journal, send virtual postcards and share your experiences via social media.
 - All of your flights, transfers and accommodation details in one convenient place
 - Find your activities and recommended things to do
 - Browse maps (can be downloaded for use offline during your trip)
 - Keep a travel journal and share with friends and family on Facebook and other social media channels
 - Works offline ‚Äì no internet connection required

Please send us your feedback so that we can continue to develop the app.
releaseNotes:
We‚Äôre always making changes and improvements to the app. To make sure you don‚Äôt miss a thing, just keep your Updates turned on.
This version contains bug fixes and stability improvements.
reviews:
Easy to use and understand. Thank you! | Great for having everything you need all in one place. | Easy to navigate which makes it convenient. | We are doing Thai and Cambodia trip.
The outline in the book provided is pretty straight forward.  Had a little hiccup first stop at Bangkok airport, a call placed and within few minutes the issue was solved.
The places chosen to visit have been extraordinary exquisite.  There is time to rest /catch your breath between sites | The app is a convenient reminder of the trip itinerary | Very helpful with itinerary of course, but more importantly links to maps, directions, food in the vicinity, numbers/contacts and so much more. I LOVE having this tool for our Laos trip | Though I didn‚Äôt use all that often it was always close at hand and could give me an immediate update re weather. 
I don‚Äôt use apps that much but was pleased. Those that use them a lot should be very happy. | We turned to AudleyTravel several years ago when traveling to Peru with a disabled friend. After that great experience, we knew we could turn to them when too little time was left to us to plan our African journey. Jeremy took careful notes on our preferences and developed a terrific itinerary, fitting in many key spots while leaving enough time for self exploration.  AudleyTravel representatives/affiliates in Africa were wonderful- guesthouse owners and local guides specifically.  A couple of small requests were dealt with efficiently and helpfully while we were in Africa. Thus a really special trip!!  We look forward to our next adventure with them! | So impressed with the AudleyTravel app! Very user friendly and helps prepare you for each day‚Äôs adventure ü§ó | Really enjoying this app to keep us on target for our trip goals! | This is so handy to have electronically, I‚Äôve used it on several trips and love it! | We haven‚Äôt gone on our trip yet, but I feel much better prepared to enjoy it more fully from using this app. I look forward to keeping a journal with photos of our travels.  We are going to many places and Audrey has given us a variety of options for our free time .  Great app! | Terrific to have access while out an about and not needing to carry of printed guide. | Especially helpful for providing flight updates and information on where to board, etc. | Audley is a 5 star company! | Very useful while traveling!! | Excellent. | Thorough, in depth and covers more than I would have expected.  Top notch app which I am sure we will use every day. Excellent! | Very useful for keeping up to date on my travel and excursions itineraries by just looking on my cell. Highly recommended. | I found this app extremely useful during our trip to Vietnam and Thailand. We can always open it and get a quick insight of the itinerary and the tours for any day. 
It would be even greater if you can get the restaurant suggestions too. 
Nice tool! | This is a phenomenal app with so much information about every travel topic you could think of.  Plus there are fabulous pictures and room to write your memories underneath.
However I can‚Äôt get the site on my iPhone only on my iPad which is heavy to travel with.  Can someone help me with this?  iPad and iPhone are not talking to each other.üò© | .... making Itinerary and trip details immediately accessible!  No paper! | The Audley trip app was very user friendly.  It helps keep the pictures organized by day and locations. Notes were easy to add. | I love the Audley App,  everything at my fingertips to see pictures, details & plans for each day. | That‚Äôs what I like about it if you don‚Äôt want to spend money on data | We‚Äôre at our gate 3 hours early.  Ready to go!  Thank you Audley for all the arrangements. | Talia helped us arrange the trip of a lifetime (at least so far...) that included 3 locations in Spain, uniting all 3 of our family groups in 3 locations in Morocco, and providing a delightful stay for 2 of our family groups in Lisbon. My personal favorite experiences were in Barcelona, Spain and Lisbon, Portugal (both for fantastic food, great explorations, and fascinating histories.... explained clearly by local private tour guides arranged by Audley). Even though we all spent a night in desert tents in Morocco, (even riding dromedaries!) 2 of the family groups are seriously considering returning to the Moroccan desert for a longer, more in depth experience! | Everything in one place. I didn‚Äôt realize how useful it is until I started using it. Really made the trip foolproof. | I relied totally on this app for our month-long trip to Africa. And it was a lifesaver!!!

NJepp | We have done 3 previous trips with Audley and every time the trip has gone flawlessly. On our India trip we had to leave early due to a family emergency and Audley took great care in changing all of our plans. Thanks again to the best travel arranger. | Great way to keep track of your trip and where you go each and every day without consulting the travel book supplied.
Way to go Audley!! | The Audley app is really helpful, keeping all necessary information at my fingertips at all times. It is great to be able to upload additional documents, as well - e.g., travel insurance docs (if purchased elsewhere), and other relevant docs one may have. It is also really handy to have contact information immediately at hand, should it be needed. The app simply reflects a solid company - I‚Äôm very happy to have chosen Audley. | The Audley travel app was very helpful in quickly looking up information on our daily travel itinerary. | I have personally researched and curated our family trips for years. I was skeptical and hesitant to use a travel agent. Now,I wonder why I haven‚Äôt done this sooner!!!!! The itinerary was perfect. Audley was an incredible travel partner!!! | Detailed, informative, and flexible- adaptable and personable itinerary and great reference throughout the trip! | Guides and tours have been excellent. 
Aveni de Oliveira really knows the birds of Igua√ßu even by exact habitat and sound.  
  Our setup in Buenas Aires and also in Igua√ßu has been good for location, service and general quality. | Nailed it. Well done. | This app works better than the last one.    Nice to have all my info in such a convenient format | Well designed app, very helpful & easy to access. | I love the audley app and the audley team. Huge attention to detail and a lot of thought went into the app as well | Great app to have on a trip. Contains all the information you need to have a worry-free trip. Otherwise we highly recommend the App and Audley Travel Company as well! | Came in very handy on our long trip. | Making it really easy to plan for our trip | Excellent, all the trip info in one easy to use app! | Love the convenience.

title: FlixBus & FlixTrain
description:
The FlixBus and FlixTrain mobile app. Book cheap bus and train* tickets for all of Europe, Turkey, Brazil and the USA. Download the bus and train app now! 

*Train trips are available in Germany and Sweden 

 

Travelling with FlixBus and FlixTrain is easy! Just download the free app and give it a try. For bookworms who‚Äôd like more details, here are some tips to get you started. 

 

BOOKING 

Choose your desired connection, enter your passenger information, choose your preferred payment method, and pay for your ticket. The advantages of booking through the app: 


- Your app is your ticket - no need to print anything 

- You have access to special offers only available through the app 

 

INFORMATION ON YOUR TRIP 

You can access your trip information and ticket anytime and follow the location of your bus or train easily. Let the app guide you to your stop. 

Important information, such as delays or changes concerning the trip, will be shared with you via push notification or a text message, so you won‚Äôt miss any information. Very important: don‚Äôt forget to allow push notifications! 

 

LUGGAGE 

Every ticket includes 1 free handbag on board and 1 free suitcase/travel bag. Unlike flights or other means of transportation, you can easily and affordably bring more luggage with you on the bus or train by purchasing additional luggage. Bicycle spaces are also available ‚Äì just choose the option you need during the booking process. Our bus drivers and train staff are happy to help you stow them away. You can find more information concerning rules and costs in our FAQs. 

 

COMFORT ON BOARD 

With FlixBus, you are guaranteed a seat with a comfortable and adjustable backrest, extra legroom, and, of course, we have toilets on board. During the trip, you can use our free Wi-Fi and buy some snacks and drinks from our drivers. 

With every FlixTrain ticket, you are guaranteed a seat free of charge, private power outlets, toilets on board and a high-speed ride to your destination! 

More information about our services on the bus and train can be found in our FAQs. 

 

Doesn‚Äôt it sound Flix-tastic? See you on board!
releaseNotes:
Just saying Hi with some performance improvements.
Have a great day and happy traveling!

title: Tours & Travel - Multidaze

With Tours & Travel you will get:

- +5,000 FREE Travel Guides

title: Township
description:
Township is a unique blend of city building and farming! 

Build your dream town! Harvest crops, process them at your facilities, and sell goods to develop your town. Trade with distant islands. Open restaurants, cinemas and other community buildings to give life in your town special flavor. Explore the mine to get resources and find ancient artifacts. Run your own zoo and collect animals from around the world. 
Are you ready to build your dream? Let‚Äôs get started! 

Township features: 
‚óè Different buildings and decorations you can use to create your dream town 
‚óè Various crops to grow and later process at your factories 
‚óè Fun, charismatic townspeople with orders you need to fill 
‚óè Your town's mine packed with ancient artifacts to discover and collect
‚óè Exotic goods brought from the islands
‚óè A zoo to build where you can even breed animals 
‚óè Famous landmarks you can use to decorate your town, like the Statue of Liberty, Big Ben, and many more! 
‚óè Play with your Facebook and Game Center friends or make new friends in the game community! 

Township is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this option, simply turn it off in your device's "Restrictions" menu. 

*You need an internet connection to play the game and enable social interaction, competitions, and other features.* 

Enjoying Township? Learn more about the game! 
Facebook: www.facebook.com/TownshipMobile 
Twitter: twitter.com/township_mobile 

Questions? Contact our Tech Support by sending an email to township@playrix.com or check our Web Support Portal: https://playrix.helpshift.com/webchat/a/township/?p=web&contact=1 

Privacy Policy: 
https://playrix.com/en/privacy/index.html
Terms of Service:
https://playrix.com/en/terms/index.html
releaseNotes:
Get ready for a new update!
It's spring in Township!

Camping Trip
* Go camping in the mountains in a new merge event! Enjoy thematic items, unlock rewards, and win a new upgradable decoration!

Season Adventures
* It's time for Easter! Spruce up your town with thematic decorations and make sure to win all the best rewards, like the Easter Cow outfit!
* Get ready to rock in the new season adventure! Enjoy the new Record Station and Music Express skins, as well as the Rock 'n' Roll Sheep outfit!

Land of Wasps
* Help Rachel and Ellen find the legendary sun orchid! Solve all the mysteries of the jungle and unlock a unique decoration!

Also
* Enjoy haute cuisine with the new French Restaurant!
* Check out 10 temporary Easter decorations before they vanish from the store!

The crops only took about 10-15 to grow. Not including the wheat. So basically the game is your making your own town!! But when you get to upper levels of the game, like 10 and above, everything goes to slow motion. The community buildings now take about 12 hours! For someone who is COMPLETELY impatient this is not acceptable.  But I often leave it alone and sleep on it. (Not literally) And to build buildings you need to have supplies. Which often come from trains. And when I think about it, it only comes from trains. And you need EVEN MORE supplies to fill the trains! Like what? And then each time you send off the train the time increases for it to come back with supplies. I‚Äôm on level 14 and the most time it has taken is 1 hour and 10 mins. Once you have planted EVEN more crops, and you have set for your houses and community building to build, you food mill is working, the animals are eating, and your helicopters are off, and your train is off, ( which I know sounds like that would take a while, it really doesn‚Äôt) you have NOTHING to do. These things need to be fixed, but I‚Äôll still play the game. I would only recommend if you NEED to have something to do sometimes. Thanks! | I love this game so much because it‚Äôs so much fun and you never have extra time to play other games | This game is my hyper fixation right now and I love killing time playing it!! | False advertisement is a crime. Class A Misdemeanor to be technical. | I know stars and title is a contradiction but hear me out.  I have been playing the game for 8 years. In the beginning I really enjoyed and met some really nice people. I am sure you will like it to.

Just beware, here is my beef. Playrix has figured out a way to get you to spend more money than required for this game. The side games are at an impossible level to complete.  Example: how to you clear 30 piece of one object and 8 of another with only 12 moves. Therefore you Must use your Tcash to extend the moves to see if you can clear to the next level. This has happened several times.  Then you have the explosions next to the object to clear and they don‚Äôt thus wasting your moves to do something that should have been cleared. Not to mention it used to be 3 moves to pull up a treasure chest now it‚Äôs 4 moves and most of your lives so you will Never finish the side story. And the last one you are suppose to clear a certain color of 25 and it only drops 8 the entire time.

I know waiting this long to say something is on me but I thought it was a fluke and all others were giving positive feedback like I would have/was.  I thought it would not be to bad but with the past year or more it‚Äôs gotten worse. I don‚Äôt think it will go back to be an extremely enjoyable game. And it‚Äôs annoying that companies are squeezing every dime out of it users. I am the type if the game is good and doesn‚Äôt force you to purchase; I don‚Äôt mind buying extra to support the game. But with this type of tactics makes me want to be a less than casual player.

Shame on you Playrix. All I can ask is please be mindful and do better. | Like it but I‚Äôm 72 it‚Äôs a little confusing to me | I don‚Äôt know why but it‚Äôs sooo addicting and fun | Member of the park | something weird happened. title: Travel Altimeter & Elevation
description:
View your altitude or elevation on stunning landscapes that adjust with the time of day. The barometer lets you track your altitude changes based on the change of pressure. Just set your reference pressure and altitude in order to use the Altimeter for seeing the difference in elevation of two points. Great for hiking and other outdoor activities. The Compass shows your real-time orientation in this elevation app.

5-Star Reviews:
"I love this app, wherever I go snowmobiling or hiking I always use it."

"This app really works well. I enjoy checking the altitude wherever I am. Nice!"

A simple and uncluttered interface to read:
‚Ä¢ Altitude or Elevation
‚Ä¢ Latitude
‚Ä¢ Longitude

Features
‚Ä¢ Highest GPS accuracy for your device
‚Ä¢ Ground elevation from topographical map values
‚Ä¢ View in feet or meters
‚Ä¢ Built-in flashlight

Sharing
‚Ä¢ Share screenshots with beautiful backgrounds
‚Ä¢ Share on Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, Email, or text message

Use the Custom Background upgrade to take a photo from the top of a mountain and take a screenshot with your altitude overlaid to show your family & friends.

Backgrounds (In-App purchases):
‚Ä¢ Meadow landscape (Illustrated)
‚Ä¢ Cityscape (Illustrated)
‚Ä¢ Mountains (Illustrated)
‚Ä¢ Abstract
‚Ä¢ Choose Your Own

Note: Many customers with high altitude illnesses or sensitivities, such as chronic lung disease, asthma, COPD, & emphysema find this app useful for avoiding high altitudes. It is also used by hikers and climbers who want to avoid high-altitude cerebral edema (HACE) and high-altitude pulmonary edema (HAPE). However, the altitude shown is potentially subject to large inaccuracies and this app should NOT be used as a primary device for determining altitude for medical reasons.

title: Grubhub: Food Delivery
description:
When in doubt, go for takeout‚ÄîGrubhub has it all! Order food delivery from thousands of restaurants, including local spots and national chains, and get groceries delivered too. Prefer pickup? No problem. Know the fees upfront and track orders from Grubhub delivery partners in real time‚Äîthe only surprise is just how easy takeout can be. 

ORDER FROM THOUSANDS OF RESTAURANTS
With Grubhub, you can order takeout from your favorite local restaurants and everyone‚Äôs favorite chains. There are so many good eats out there, but you obviously deserve the best. Grubhub makes it easier to choose your next meal with restaurant ratings and reviews. French fries, pizza, burritos, burgers, sushi, donuts‚Äîit‚Äôs all here, whenever a craving strikes. 

GET GROCERIES DELIVERED TOO
Think beyond your breakfast, lunch, and dinner orders. Grubhub offers the ultimate convenience with grocery delivery, in addition to restaurant takeout. Order milk, bread, snacks, and frozen foods, as well as household essentials like paper towels and laundry detergent, from local convenience stores.  

EXPECT TO SEE THE FEES UPFRONT
Grubhub gives it to you straight. See the delivery fee upfront, before you start crafting the perfect food order. Pay your way with credit cards, Grubhub gift cards, or Venmo.

SKIP DELIVERY FEES
The key is Grubhub+. Sign up for unlimited $0 delivery fees, and enjoy exclusive offers and rewards as a Grubhub+ member.* Try Grubhub+ free for 30 days, then level up for just $9.99/month. The truth is, food tastes even better when you spend less on delivery. See details below.

TRACK DELIVERY IN REAL TIME
Grubhub puts your delivery on the map. Track eligible orders in real time, from the restaurant to your front door, and know the moment your bacon-egg-and-cheese arrives. Every delivery is a special delivery with Grubhub. 

COUNT ON THE GRUBHUB GUARANTEE
Get your food delivered on time and at the lowest price. Guaranteed, or we‚Äôll make it right. See details: grubhub.com/guarantee

YOU DO YOU AND GRUBHUB DELIVERS
Grubhub serves up a personalized app experience, so you can reorder that feast you‚Äôre still thinking about from two months ago. Order sauce on the side, go for extra pickles, lose the onions‚ÄîGrubhub gets you. Are you a regular? Get rewarded when you come back for more at the same restaurants. You can also plan ahead by pre-ordering food for pickup or delivery. 

ORDER FROM NATIONAL RESTAURANTS
Sometimes you need a sure thing, and that‚Äôs why Grubhub partners with national restaurants to offer the takeout food you know and love. Get delivery from Applebee‚Äôs, Arby‚Äôs, Buffalo Wild Wings, Burger King, Chick-fil-A, Chipotle, Denny‚Äôs, Dunkin‚Äô, Five Guys, IHOP, McDonald‚Äôs, KFC, Panda Express, Panera, Papa John‚Äôs, Popeyes, Shake Shack, Subway, Taco Bell, Wendy‚Äôs, White Castle, and more.

GET SUPPORT WHEN YOU NEED IT
Burning questions? Delivery crisis? Grubhub customer support is here for you 24/7. 

*$0 delivery fees applicable on orders with a $12+ subtotal from Grubhub+ restaurants only. Grubhub+ is an automatically renewing membership service requiring recurring payments. After your free trial ends, your free trial will convert to a paid Grubhub+ membership and Grubhub will automatically charge you each month at the then-current rate (currently $9.99) plus tax until you cancel. See terms: https://lp.grubhub.com/legal/plus/
releaseNotes: This update has it all: performance improvements, bug fixes, pizzas (well you can order them at least), and more. Don't believe it? Update and see.

title: easyJet: Travel App
description:
Wherever you‚Äôre going, take us with you.

Search, book and manage your flights all from the palm of your hand.

SEARCH & BOOK CHEAP FLIGHTS ‚Äì Booking a trip to your favourite European location has never been easier with the easyJet app. You can also use Apple Pay or a saved payment card to check out swiftly and securely.

MANAGE FLIGHT BOOKINGS - Keep track of your easyJet flight bookings all in one place. Change your flights, manage delays and disruption, plus add seats, baggage, sports equipment and more.

EASYJET HOLIDAYS BOOKINGS ‚Äì Add your easyJet holiday booking to get instant access to all the information you need for your package holiday, including hotels & accommodation, airport transfers and other important information. You can also view your holiday countdown to build the holiday excitement.

WORLDWIDE ‚Äì The world is now at your fingertips. Let us take you within and beyond Europe flying with easyJet and one of our carefully selected Airline partners.

MOBILE BOARDING PASSES ‚Äì Use your mobile boarding pass to travel through the airport quickly, speed up boarding and reduce paper waste. You can store up to eight boarding passes per flight, which will be available offline, so you'll not need a data connection. For even more convenience, you can also save your boarding passes to Apple Wallet. Visit https://www.easyjet.com/en/mobile-app/mobile-boarding-passes for more details.

FLIGHT TRACKER ‚Äì Track your plane's location in real-time. Plus, check the latest arrival and departure information with live updates direct from easyJet‚Äôs Control Centre. You also see your plane‚Äôs journey, live in the air, with the addition of the FlightRadar24 map.

FLIGHT NOTIFICATIONS ‚Äì We'll notify you of any important flight changes as soon as we know, remind you when it's time to check-in, tell you your boarding gate and inform you of your baggage reclaim belt.

TRIP WIDGET ‚Äì Wherever you‚Äôre going, we'll be with you every step of your journey. Whether it‚Äôs a reminder to check in, check your baggage allowance or download your boarding pass, we‚Äôll let you know.

TRIP ANCILLARIES AND PARTNERS ‚Äì Manage your extras all in one place. Easily add excursions, insurance, car hire, and parking to make your trip seamless. Plus, save money by purchasing in-flight vouchers in advance or even pre-order onboard products from our Bistro and Boutique range.

VOICE SEARCH ‚Äì Why not try our voice search feature to search for your next flight? Using the latest voice recognition technology you can find flight options by simply saying the destination, dates of travel and airports you want to fly from - all completely hands-free, making booking a flight easier and more accessible.

LOOK & BOOK ‚Äì Search for a flight using just a photo of your perfect holiday destination! Simply upload a screenshot of your ideal destination and we'll tell you where it is and which flights will get you there!

CABIN BAG SIZER ‚Äì Our handy bag sizing tool uses augmented reality to check whether your cabin bag fits within the maximum dimensions to take on board.

ADD TO SIRI ‚Äì Create a Siri shortcut directly from your Itinerary screen to view your trip quickly and easily anytime.

ACCESSIBILITY ‚Äì Our app works with your phone's screen reader functionality to audibly describe what is featured and happening on each screen, making your booking and trip management navigation easy and simple.
releaseNotes:
In this version of the app we continue to improve the app's look and feel to further improve your easyJet app experience. 

We have also made it easier to download all your boarding passes to the app with on simple tap.

If you have feedback or new feature ideas then you can reach us direct on app.feedback.iphone@easyjet.com.

title: WiFi Map: eSIM, Internet, VPN
description:
WiFi Map is an all-in-one app that will come in handy whenever you're on travel.

#1 App for Travellers in 100+ countries

Always find a free WiFi hotspot around. WiFi Map will navigate you to the nearest shared hotspots, show passwords, and let you connect to the internet in a few taps.
‚Ä¢ millions of shared WiFi hotspots
‚Ä¢ offline regions to find WiFi without the internet
‚Ä¢ detailed map with hotspots and POIs
‚Ä¢ guided navigation to public WiFi
‚Ä¢ speed testing capabilities

eSIM
Stay online even without a Wi-Fi nearby. Get our eSIM now and access the internet wherever you go.
‚Ä¢ Internet in 70+ countries
‚Ä¢ 30 days validity
‚Ä¢ 1GB, 3GB, 5GB and 10GB available packages
‚Ä¢ fast refill
‚Ä¢ High speed 4G and LTE networks
‚Ä¢ no contract
‚Ä¢ activation in a few taps

VPN
Secure your internet connection when using public hotspots. Select from dozens of VPN servers and enjoy fast, secure, and reliable internet access to your favourite services.

Handy Widgets
Meet small but useful widgets that contain all the information you may need while traveling. Find actual rates, calculate tips, keep an eye on the weather, and time from a single app.
‚Ä¢ currency rates converter
‚Ä¢ world clock
‚Ä¢ tips calculator
‚Ä¢ local weather
‚Ä¢ and more

WiFi Map offers a subscription plan that gives you more functionality including downloadable offline regions, fast and secure VPN, and completely disabled ads.
‚Ä¢ Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
‚Ä¢ Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period

‚Ä¢ Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
‚Ä¢ Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable

title: Flight Tracker & Radar
description:
Flight Tracker ‚Äì follow planes routes around the world in real-time. Tap on the plane and see where it‚Äôs going and it's destination. No matter it's just your hobby or you'd like to follow your friends and family members ‚Äì¬†the app does it's job!

Free features:
- Limited number of planes around (free unlimited usage)
- See Route (free unlimited usage)
- Map Design (free unlimited usage)
- Compass (free unlimited usage)

Features with limited usage:
- Add to ‚ÄúMy Flights‚Äù (limited usage, unlimited available for premium users only)
- Search Flights (limited usage, unlimited available for premium users only)
- Planes Design (limited usage, unlimited available for premium users only)

Premium features:
- Unlimited number of flights and planes around (available for premium users only)
- Measurement Units (available for premium users only)

Are you ready to give it a go?

Subscription information about pricing and terms:

The app is based on freemium model: it's absolutely free to use. However, you can subscribe for unlimited access to all features with unlimited usage. We provide different options. The longer period ‚Äì the profitable subscription.

*Pricing in countries may vary and actual charges may be converted to your local currency depending on the country of residence.
*Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase.
*Subscription will be automatically renewed. Auto-renew can be turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
*Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal.
*Subscriptions may be managed by you and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's iTunes Account Settings.

For more information please visit the link https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT202039

title: AARP Now
description:
Access your digital membership card from day one by downloading AARP Now. As a member, you can access your digital card anytime from the My Account tab and join AARP or renew your membership with a tap. The app also gives you access to relevant news stories, local and online events, and nearby member benefits including limited time member offers. Also, join AARP Rewards and sync to the Health app or your favorite fitness tracker and start earning points today.

Make the most of your membership by downloading AARP Now today!

DIGITAL CARD/MEMBERSHIP

Get instant access to your digital membership card, add your card to your Apple Wallet, join AARP, or renew your membership in seconds. Plus, manage your account on the go!

NEWS

Catch up on the latest news in just a few minutes; the AARP Now App features daily stories written with you and your mobile lifestyle in mind. Share news articles with your friends and join the conversation!

EVENTS

Explore hundreds of local events and online virtual events, from career workshops and movie showings to kid-friendly events, and quickly register for them right from the app.

MEMBER DISCOUNTS

Search for benefits and discounts in your neighborhood. Offers are added monthly.

GAMES

Access AARP Games, wherever you are! From Word & Trivia Games to Arcade Games to Solitaire & Mahjongg, there's something for everyone.

NOTIFICATIONS

Receive news alerts, reminders for upcoming events or when benefits you have saved are nearby. You can easily manage your notifications in My Account > Notifications.

AARP REWARDS

Get more from AARP Now with the AARP Rewards program! Earn Rewards points for downloading the app and visiting the app each day, plus synchronize your favorite fitness tracker or the Health app to get even more points for steps, swimming, and cycling.

NOT AN AARP MEMBER?

No problem! Non-members are welcome to download the app, join AARP Rewards, and learn more about how AARP is protecting and improving the lives of the 50 plus.

If there are AARP services or information you are unable to find in the app, we encourage you to visit aarp.org on your mobile phone to access them on the go!

You can‚Äôt get your booking to make changes. | Your cite is difficult to maneuver! | I really like the AARP app however it is very frustrating to use. In this day and age it‚Äôs ridiculous that this app seems to be stuck in the past. Older people are way more tech savvy now. Please catch up to us. In no particular order here are the things I have found so far that have created this frustration. For reference purposes, I have the iPhone 15 pro max. So it‚Äôs a new phone using an outdated app. 

1. If you turn the phone to landscape mode, either whatever you were reading freezes or it returns to the app home screen. 

2. Same with playing a game.  If you turn the phone you have to restart whatever game you were playing.

3. If the phone goes in sleep mode, you have to restart the whole process of going to that game again. 

4. Some games just don‚Äôt work at all. They open but you can‚Äôt play them.
 
5. Even when reading an article, if your phone goes into sleep mode while reading, when you wake the phone, the app goes back to the home screen and you have to find the article again. 

5. Why can‚Äôt we save an article to read later? I literally have to send an article to myself via email so that I can read it another time.

6. When anything is open, the word ‚ÄúDone‚Äù appears at the top left of my phone. Please get rid of this and just put a back arrow so we can choose to just stay on this page and go back to the Home Screen ourselves. 

7. I have not used this app yet on my iPad, but from what I‚Äôve read in other reviews that is also a nightmare experience. I use my phone for the most part. But if this is the case, please, please have your app designer fix these flaws. This app shouldn‚Äôt be so frustrating to use.

Let‚Äôs see if they actually respond and do something about this or just send a canned response and do nothing. This is what appears to happen when reading older reviews complaining of these very same issues I have just written about. Reviews that are 3 and 4 years old stating the same issues.

title: Trip Agent Travel Assistant
description:
This mobile application is offered to you courtesy of your tour operator or travel agent. 

It works 100% OFFLINE and includes: 

- All your trip details: transportation, accommodation, activities, tours, etc.
- Flights mobile check-in, real-time flight status & alerts
- Interactive airport maps
- Accommodation details
- Travel documents
- Daily itinerary
- Travel agency contact info
- and more...
releaseNotes:
We‚Äôre always making changes and improvements to the app. To make sure you don‚Äôt miss a thing, just keep your Updates turned on.
This version contains bug fixes and stability improvements.
reviews:
Great app very helpful when using a trip planner | We are using this app for traveling to Asia, and it has everything in one place and is very easy to use! | This is the first time I‚Äôm using this app on vacation. Our tour company provided it and it is so convenient to be able to check it on my phone at any time to be reminded of our day today, itinerary. | This app is easy to use and has access to all docs provided by Enchanting Travels for our trip. | Easy to use.  Extremely helpful! | I love the ease of use, the guide that offers options on places to go and things to do. | This app was super helpful during our European Family vacation. | My Travel agent recommended it. | Our travel agent Shakita was amazing. Made our experience so easy. | I love having the ability to have and accessing important information that‚Äôs needed for my trip in one place. | Love how convenient it is, everything in one place! | The app was very nice once we got the hang of using it. I would like more clarity on excursions we paid for in advance versus optional excursions. Otherwise it was great. | As a traveler, I love this. 
As a travel agent, I love being able to offer this. 

I‚Äôve tested others that may make a proposal easier/prettier, but for in-trip features, this wins.
Having a map available off-line with the hotel location (though I wish I could change the color of the icon) and any other important addresses I‚Äôve added is so useful. 
I often get notified of flight changes from this app before I hear from the airline directly. | I love this app. I love that it doesn‚Äôt use data and it can easily navigate you to your destinations. It helped us stay organized and reminded us when we needed to leave on time for our upcoming plans. | This app is awesome. Everything you need to know at the tip of ur fingers | This app is a game changer for keeping all the details and documents together in one place for a trip! So easy to navigate and use - now I don‚Äôt want to go on a trip without it! | So convenient ! | App don‚Äôt work can‚Äôt sign in! | I just think this app is the best I have ever used.

title: Hotwire: Last Minute Hotels
description:
Save even more with exclusive, last-minute travel deals in the Hotwire app. Hot Rate¬Æ deals make booking travel easy, exciting, and affordable!

1. You pick the star-rating, location, amenities, and price.
2. We reveal your top-notch, deeply-discounted hotel right after booking.
3. Done and done.

We've added new ways for you to hack your trip and get the best deal, available only on the app: 

‚Ä¢  Discounted pricing and app-only coupons. Saving cash looks good on you. 
‚Ä¢  Draw your ideal neighborhood. Circle a specific location on the map, and we‚Äôll find you a Hot Rate¬Æ Hotel right there. 
‚Ä¢  Sync with your schedule. You can add trip details directly to your calendar in a matter of seconds.

The Hotwire app packs in everything our customers love about our site‚Äîand more‚Äîincluding:

‚Ä¢  Unbeatable deals up to the last minute. Hotwire is the go-to app for booking money-saving, unforgettable trips. Book weeks in advance or the day of. Either way, Hotwire has you covered. 
‚Ä¢  Thousands of hotels to choose from. Think: trendy, boutique properties and iconic brands like Fairmont, Hyatt, and Marriott. 
‚Ä¢  Get 1 of 2 Hot Rate¬Æ Hotels. Hacking your Hot Rate¬Æ just got easier in the app. We‚Äôll show two hotels, and you‚Äôre guaranteed to stay at one of them. 
‚Ä¢  Our low price guarantee. Book with confidence‚Äîour rates won‚Äôt be beat. 
‚Ä¢  24/7 customer service. Message our team with any questions, day or night. 

NEW iOS 14 Features!  

DEAL WIDGET: Plan a last-minute getaway in just a few taps with Hotwire‚Äôs new deal widget! Check out top weekend deals near you, right from your home screen. Just add the widget and enable location services to get goin‚Äô. 

APP CLIP: New to Hotwire? Try out our App Clip, available via Hotwire.com on your mobile device. See app-exclusive features, including hotel reviews, and quickly book using Apple Pay. The App Clip will also keep your reservation details on your home screen for up to 10 days. Can‚Äôt get enough? You can also easily download the full Hotwire app!

title: Airalo: eSIM Travel & Internet
description:
Stay connected wherever you travel. With an Airalo eSIM (digital SIM), you can connect to the internet in 200+ countries and regions worldwide and save up to 10x on roaming fees.

What is an eSIM?
An eSIM is an embedded SIM card. It's built into your phone's hardware and serves the same function as a physical SIM. But it works 100% digitally.

Instead of dealing with a physical SIM card, you can purchase an eSIM, install it on your device, and instantly connect to a mobile network at your destination. No physical SIM cards, spotty Wi-Fi, or surprise roaming fees ‚Äî just easy, affordable, flexible connectivity.  

What is an Airalo eSIM plan?
An Airalo eSIM plan gives you access to mobile data, call, and text services. You can choose a prepaid local, regional, or global eSIM plan to get online in 200+ countries and regions worldwide. Simply download an eSIM, install it on your device, and connect to a mobile network when you arrive at your destination!

How does it work?
1. Install the Airalo app.
2. Purchase an eSIM plan. Airalo has eSIMs for 200+ countries and regions.
3. Install the eSIM. This only takes a few minutes to complete.
4. Connect to a local network. Turn on your eSIM and connect to the internet when you arrive.
It's that easy!

Available for 200+ countries and regions, including: 
‚Ä¢ United States
‚Ä¢ United Kingdom
‚Ä¢ Turkey
‚Ä¢ Italy
‚Ä¢ France
‚Ä¢ Spain
‚Ä¢ Japan
‚Ä¢ Germany
‚Ä¢ Canada
‚Ä¢ Thailand
‚Ä¢ Portugal
‚Ä¢ Morocco
‚Ä¢ Colombia
‚Ä¢ India
‚Ä¢ South Africa
‚Ä¢ Ireland
‚Ä¢ Mexico
‚Ä¢ Egypt
‚Ä¢ Dominican Republic
‚Ä¢ Chile

Why Airalo?
‚Ä¢ Stay connected in 200+ countries and regions.
‚Ä¢ Install and activate an eSIM in minutes.
‚Ä¢ Affordable eSIM plans with no hidden fees.
‚Ä¢ Choose from local, regional, and global eSIMs.
‚Ä¢ Call, text, and access data with a Discover+ global eSIM.
‚Ä¢ Track and top up data on the go.
‚Ä¢ Earn cashback rewards with every eSIM purchase.
‚Ä¢ In a jam? Our support team is available 24/7.

Why travelers love eSIMs:
‚Ä¢ Easy, affordable, instant connectivity.
‚Ä¢ 100% digital. No need to fuss with physical SIM cards or Wi-Fi devices.
‚Ä¢ No hidden fees or surprise roaming charges.
‚Ä¢ Store multiple eSIMs on a single device.
‚Ä¢ Add and switch eSIM plans on the go.
‚Ä¢ Keep your existing number for 2FA authentications.
‚Ä¢ Stay connected wherever you travel.

eSIM FAQ
What does an Airalo eSIM plan come with?
‚Ä¢ An Airalo package comes with data (e.g., 1GB, 3GB, 5GB, etc.) valid for a specified time period (e.g., 7 days, 15 days, 30 days, etc.). If you run out of data or your validity period expires, you can top up your eSIM or download a new one right from the Airalo app.

How much does it cost?
‚Ä¢ eSIMs from Airalo start from US$4.50 for 1GB of data.

Does an eSIM come with a number?
‚Ä¢ Some eSIMs, including our Global Discover+ eSIM, come with a phone number so you can call, text, and access data. Check your eSIM's description for details. 

What devices are ready?
‚Ä¢ You can find a regularly updated list of eSIM-compatible devices at this link:
https://www.airalo.com/help/about-airalo/what-devices-support-esim

Who is Airalo best for?
‚Ä¢ Anyone who travels, whether it's for business or vacation.
‚Ä¢ Digital nomads who need to stay connected to work while abroad.
‚Ä¢ Crew members (e.g., seafarers, flight attendants, etc.) who need to stay connected while they travel.

Can I use my SIM card at the same time?
You sure can. Most devices allow you to use multiple SIMs and/or eSIMs simultaneously. You can keep your primary line active to receive text messages, calls, and 2FA authentication (but remember, they'll be subject to roaming fees).

Happy travels!
‚Äì
Learn more about eSIMs and Airalo:
Airalo Website: www.airalo.com
Airalo Blog: www.airalo.com/blog
Help Center: www.airalo.com/help  

Join the Airalo community! 
Follow @airalocom on Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, Twitter, and LinkedIn.

Privacy Policy
www.airalo.com/more-info/privacy-policy 
Terms & Conditions
www.airalo.com/more-info/terms-conditions
releaseNotes:
Say ‚ÄúAlo‚Äù to our new update! The Airalo team is always working hard to make your experience even better. Here‚Äôs what‚Äôs new:

- We‚Äôve squashed bugs and made UI/UX improvements to enhance your experience.

Questions or comments? Feel free to contact us at support@airalo.com.
