title: ON THE TRIP A Traveler's Guide
description:
‚ÄúMaking every destination a museum like experience‚Äù
ON THE TRIP will expand the possibilities of your travels.

This travel guide will deepen your understanding of cultural heritages, festivals, and even culture such as Zen and sushi.

-Mobile
You no longer need a guide book.
At a shrine, at a temple, at an art festival, all you have to do is download our guide and the GPS function will help guide you through your journey.

-Audio
Exactly like an audio guide from a museum, you don‚Äôt have to constantly be looking at your smartphone to absorb the information and story of our guides. You can concentrate on what is in front of you.

-Culture
Not only spot guides.
What is Zen? How do you eat Soba? What is the history of this place? These are all questions that can be answered by our free to use culture guides.
releaseNotes: Minor update.
reviews:
This guide is something completely new. You know how most temples only have 1 paragraph of explanation and after awhile all of them start to feel the same? This guide brings their stories to life right in front you your eyes‚Äî or ears I guess haha listening to the stories of these temples, museums, and towns you go to will take the two dimensional pamphlets and brochures and make you feel as if you have walked back in time- 
Two thumbs up üëçüèΩüëçüèΩ

title: Royal Caribbean International
description:
Explore cruises ‚Äì from Europe to Alaska, the Caribbean to Asia ‚Äì and book with just a few taps. Tackle all your travel planning, too. Find and book great deals on flights, explore transportation and lodging options, and plan your entire journey.  



Learn more about our brands, ships, and destinations by watching exciting videos. And learn about the benefits of our loyalty program, the Crown & Anchor¬Æ Society. Enroll with a simple tap or track your tier and benefits if you‚Äôre already a member.  


Vacation planning, redefined 



Once you‚Äôre booked on a cruise, plan your entire vacation from the app. Reserve shore excursions for every port, purchase or upgrade beverage packages for endless toasts, and internet packages to stay connected while at sea, though the app is free to use on ship Wi-Fi.  



Put together the perfect spa day... or days... and make dining reservations at distinctive specialty restaurants. Explore other pre-cruise deals in the arcade, check out VIP Passes and make your cruise truly special with gifts and gear. And don‚Äôt forget to link reservations with your travel party so you can make plans together.  


Set sail like a pro 


As your cruise approaches, use the app to check-in and qualify for the fastest boarding experience. Before you head to the terminal on boarding day, begin your mandatory safety briefing and access your set sail pass.  


To plan all the fun, find all the shows and activities in the Daily Planner and build your personalized calendar. We‚Äôll even remind you with a notification when you have plans.  


Be sure to smile for the camera because you‚Äôll be able to view, purchase and download your photos right from the app (on select ships). Find your way around with detailed deck maps and chat with your travel party through group or 1-on-1 chats. Track your onboard expenses in the app (or not... you‚Äôll be on vacation, after all) and learn how to book your next cruise while onboard for the best deals. 


After your cruise, you can continue to track your loyalty status and perks, keep up with the latest and greatest from our family of brands in the video library, and start planning and booking your next cruise. Because we know this won‚Äôt be your last!  


More than a cruise app 

Make sure you turn on auto-updates, so you can keep up with all the ways we improve the app for all your travel needs. Features may vary from ship to ship. App is free to download and use. In-app purchases available. Once onboard, connect to your ship's guest Wi-Fi. No internet package required. 



We continue to develop and enhance the app and are looking for your ideas and feedback. Email AppFeedback@rccl.com and tell us what you‚Äôd like to see in the future.
releaseNotes: With this release, we introduced a shopping cart to make cruise planning easier. For ships with My Photos, we improved the experience for loyalty guests and for ordering prints. We also improved performance, made feature enhancements, and fixed bugs. Make sure you turn on auto-updates, so you can keep up with all of the ways we improve the app.
reviews:
Still a lot of bugs to work out. Problems occur when trying to book entertainment, doesn‚Äôt always fully book, will act like it, then later you‚Äôll get an email saying your reservation failed. And by then the thing is ‚Äúsold out.‚Äù Unlimited dining pass purchasers should have the ability to reserve dinner options before booking. It‚Äôs 2024, why is this not possible yet. It‚Äôs now harder to browse other sailings you aren‚Äôt booked for, they moved it around a bit and now it‚Äôs harder to find. Sometimes the app won‚Äôt work on WiFi for my wife. | Sooo confusing & hard to find info such as excursions you purchase. Too many links | Royal Caribbean is hosting a charter, booked only through travel agents.
I had booked an air to see airplane ticket two months ago through Royal Caribbean. 
Never did they inform me was it canceled 
Nor did they give back my money,  yet.
two months prior to this review,February 3. They let me know that, their royal Caribbean agent was new, explaining she didn‚Äôt know procedure, which is not to book air if it‚Äôs a charter sail. They are to redirect me to my Travel agent, which she did not do. 
Had I not been looking to purchase insurance, I would never have known I did not have airline tickets.  I have a receipt, flight information, seats assigned and, of course, money taken out of my account.
Because of this, I have to buy airline tickets for much more than what was originally purchased two months ago as the sail date is just around the corner. 
They‚Äôre sorry but that‚Äôs it. 
They explained that they would give me a $50 credit for my inconvenience however upon calling to redeem my credit, they tell me it‚Äôs not there. 
I had just done this two days ago with Maria. They‚Äôre supervisor. 
That woman is unfindable, imagine that? 
My recommendation is to NOT use this company for anything.
If you do, deal with one person and one person only. 
Do not rely on anything they say, as I‚Äôve been on the phone for seven  plus hours. 
They said it takes time to return your money up to two billing cycles. I found that interesting as they canceled a port, which we had rented a cabana.
That money came back the very next day after their informing me via email.
One would think after receiving emails from them that they would have naturally given me an email regarding my cancellation.
They‚Äôve told me to go kick rocks, and no one can seem to help me.
I‚Äôm still waiting for my money. | I would have liked to know when the on board entertainment became available to select via an alert on my phone. | It should always have home at every frame | Couldn‚Äôt find any list of mock tails.  Accessible excursions not available in all ports | Why can I not see the excursion I booked for my Iceland cruise in my calendar or daily planner | The app will not let me add to my calendar and I‚Äôm  a week out.  It would be nice to start planning this late into having to board the ship. | Drink packages are way overpriced | I am booked on a Royal Caribbean 9 night eastern Caribbean cruise leaving in 10 days. This cruise is not showing up on the RC app on my phone but it is on my ipad. Very frustrating. | Muy f√°cil y amigable | This app is so awesome. I love the communication feature on the app. You can communicate with your group or mate on the ship if you‚Äôre in different areas while at sea. Also you can book excursions and pay for any other services you may need ( eg. drink packages, internet etc. ) | We have taken 9 Royal cruises and enjoyed each one. We enjoy the Oasis class ships layout as there is so much to choose from for the entire family!  The food and entertainment is always over the top.
Best relaxing vacations out there!! | There should be an option to pay with cash once you check in not credit card only poor service on that part | Our room attendant, Elmer, he was absolutely amazing and was so wonderful to us and especially to our children!! He remembered all our names! 
Our dinnner table ( SILK table 807-Victor and Lax) waiters were also unbelievably great!! 10‚Äôs!!!‚Äîall across the board! Our daughters  and us will forever have the fondest memories because of these people! Thank you Royal Caribbean and to those special people üíôü§ç‚ù§Ô∏èüõ≥Ô∏è | This has been a great site for the family in planning and while we are on our cruise. Royal Caribbean does a very nice job or organizing things. This is why this is the third time we have done a Spring Break trip with them. | Does it | It‚Äôs a joke how bad this app is. | Just came back from a cruise on the 15th of March. Had an amazing time | The itineraries for the excursions should include all information from the start of the trip to the finish. For example, how far each destination is, and approximately how long you will be at each destination.
Also, reviews of each excursion fro clients that booked it.

PS Lose the nickname section because I tried 7 nicknames before any of them worked. | I cannot find even my room because your decks are incorrect!!!! I have cabin #8172. I went to deck 8, no number shown. My agent can see no problem! Fix this! | The app lacks lots of things but this key. | 10 min from drop off to board ship!   Fast fast fast | Difficult to find information regarding my upcoming cruise.  Can't even find what deck our room is on. | I am writing this review to express my dissatisfaction with the Royal Caribbean Line (RCL) App, which has significantly impacted my experience in a negative way. Despite the potential for a seamless and user-friendly digital interface, the app proves to be clumsy, awkward, and poorly laid out. Navigating through the app is far from intuitive, which makes what should be a straightforward process overly complicated and time-consuming.

Moreover, the app‚Äôs performance is below acceptable standards. It frequently freezes, which not only disrupts the user experience but also causes significant inconvenience, especially when trying to access critical information or services promptly. This issue seems to be compounded by the lackluster internet service provided, which far from meets the expectations set by today‚Äôs technological standards. The slow and unreliable connection adds to the frustration, making the use of the app more torturous than pleasurable.

The combination of these issues considerably detracts from the overall user experience and falls short of the high standards expected from a renowned company like Royal Caribbean. An app designed to enhance the customer‚Äôs experience should not be a source of stress or inconvenience. | Check in checked out how about keeping the app running to verify status | The phone app works.  I like having my planned sea day activities and excursions posted on the app ahead of the sail date. | App hardly stays connected. Rarely connects on cellular. Difficult to use prior to cruise for planning. | Well there be new features to this app I am looking for crown and anchor future So can add my on board preference Also see what my onboard benefits are Also see how many drinks I have left each day Also see menu from all restaurants before boarding so I can see if I want a specialty restaurant or not Also nice if it can save my personal information so I do not have to enter it for each cruise princes has it saved on there system witch makes it nice and fast I have those new futures can be added | This is our favorite cruise line. | Took my first cruise as a gift for our wedding anniversary. 
Turned out to be the best way to vacation. | Excellent service which you would expect. More importantly it was the above and beyond actions of the staff that helped us out. I am on insulin and when I got to Aruba, I found out that I had left my medication in the hotel before we got on board. The medical staff tracked down a source of my medication, and it was purchased at a very reasonable price and delivered to the ship!
The second was a little more mundane. I misplaced my glasses, left them at the pool area I thought, and after telling the guest services department, they had all the glasses that were lost sent there, and mine were in the ‚Äúpile‚Äù. 
Food was excellent , and the weight staff was very accommodating to some special requests. 
The chef in our section was excellent, we had made a comment about the French onion, soup, and in a polite way, was not a up to our taste ‚Äúbuds‚Äù. 
He made us a special batch for our table and I would have to say, and we have an experienced 3 star dining in New York City, the soup could compete with any of them.
Thank you Royal Caribbean for a wonderful experience. I am sure we will book another cruise based on the performance of the staff and crew in accommodating us. | Booked a cruise for 2025, I need to change the dates & ship but can‚Äôt find any dates that far out on here. Also being charged $100 per person to change & it‚Äôs a year from now, that‚Äôs ridiculous I don‚Äôt think I will ever cruise with Royal Caribbean ever again. Not very happy with this app or service I‚Äôm receiving or anything at all!!! | Made a mistake in the health questionnaire said I was pregnant won‚Äôt let me fix it | We are enjoying the meals, especially dinner on Royal Caribbean. We have cruised Disney, Princess and celebrity and food is best on Royal Caribbean. Service rated high too on these ships. We are going two times on Royal this year and have booked on the Icon for next March. | Having the app is handy having all of my information right at my fingertips. Having a search bar on the app would be very helpful instead of having to check every topic to find what I am specifically looking for. | I was very disappointed when I and my wife were there and told we couldn‚Äôt sail while we were there since 11;30 in the morning we had to wait and see everyone embarking with no food . For a small stipulation of residency card.  However my money was good for you guys to keep!! I‚Äôm a Florida resident and you guys still felt it was justified to take my money!! I want my money back or there is legitimate reasons for a class action suit.. how you respond will justify my reason! | I love technology‚Ä¶.when it works. Repeatedly, cruise goers are told to check-in as soon as possible. It‚Äôs particularly frustrating when the app fails and gives you pithy but useless error messages like ‚Äúcheck-in has checked-out. Try again later.‚Äù Can you imagine if the Southwest app regularly failed to allow flight check-ins? Do better RC. | We have sailed 15 cruises 12 on Carnival, 2 on Celebrity and now our First time on RC

The internet connection has been horrible. 
Paid for weekly use, try probably 10-15 times a day and only able to connect MAYBE 1 time a day for a few minutes then drop out. 

I have had to use my international roam rates with my own carrier to make required calls and have been charged $ 50 as of tonight. 

I should have cancelled your service on day 1. It is non functional from our state room, dinner lounge, or pool deck. 

Sign me up as extremely disappointed and ask for a full refund. Rob OBrien room 8564 
3/16-3/23

Please respond or this will be our last cruise on RC | This is my first review of an app, but this one is bad enough to warrant it. Know that your experience with the app will have a dramatic impact on your cruise since it‚Äôs one of the only ways to understand what‚Äôs going on during your vacation. 

I found the navigation very confusing and it isn‚Äôt always clear what is clickable or how specific information will be organized. Good example is kids club hours which isn‚Äôt listed under activities. When I did find the information it wasn‚Äôt accurate which I reported to guest services and it is evidentially up to the ship to keep updated. 

The chat function was persistently glitchy with some messages not appearing for everyone in our group or being very delayed and notifications were inconsistent. When it worked it was helpful, but hard to trust.

This feels like an app that was lead by the UX designers with very little input from the product or engineering orgs. For something this central to their guest‚Äôs experience it was very disappointing and I felt a step backwards from publishing the hard copy Cruise Compasses of the past.

Tip: if your ship keeps the same time zone as your departure port be sure to turn off automatic updates of time zones under General -> Date & Time -> Automatic Updates. This will save you a LOT of confusion and/or missed appointments with your phone being out of sync with ship time. Disappointing that this isn‚Äôt communicated more clearly or better yet suggested by an app notification. | The app is terrible. Trying to link reservations is not working at all neither do the drink packages‚Ä¶.. | This the first time I have planned to travel on Royal Caribbean and I am very disappointed with the service I have received with staff when trying to arrange dining with family etc.  As terrible as Norwegians reputation was/is.  I never had the issues as I have so far with Royal Caribbean.  I hope that I find service different once we are aboard. | I have called several times for help with different questions regarding our cruise and the customer service is always very helpful. | I reserved a cruise with two cabins, but only one cabin showed up in the app. And they are telling me to pay for the cruise on the app. Waited on the phone with them for 20 minutes for them to put it on the app, and the phone call got disconnected. Not sure if everything is paid for or not. Sigh. | Functions poorly most if the time. | Royal Caribbean is a Fortune 500 company‚Ä¶but this ISN‚ÄôT an application that reflects it! 
Royal Caribbean should seriously consider a major overhaul for this app! As a former spouse of an IT director at a Fortune 100 company, there are only two reasons for such a poor application. One, Royal does not invest enough in the IT department and it‚Äôs employees, or two, the IT department needs some better management. 
It is ridiculous passengers onboard cannot reserve spa appointments on the cruise they are on. 
But, the main complaint from the World cruisers is the speed of this App!! It‚Äôs painful SLOW!! UNACCEPTABLE!!
ROYAL CARIBBEAN‚Ä¶COME ON! YOU CAN AND SHOULD DO BETTER!! | The app is very user friendly and very helpful when it worked. However, while we were onboard, it was not reliable at all. At least 2 out of 3 times I tried to use it, it would not come up. I had purchased the internet package which you would think would help. Others in our party didn‚Äôt purchase the Internet package and the app was just as bad for them as it was for me. This is a very helpful tool to use while on your ship and even if nothing else worked on our devices, this should always be assessable. It helps you know what is going on or coming up next, helps you find your way around the ship if you get turned around and you can communicate with others in your party regardless of having purchased the WiFi package. I‚Äôve given it 2 instead of a 1 only because when it worked it was great. Overall very disappointing. | Great cruise line and great app Works great with your planning for your trip Can‚Äôt wait for our next trip in 4 weeks
Can‚Äôt wait to see Perfect Day new area | La mejor compa√±√≠a de cruceros. Los mejores! | Last September my family ( of 12 ) were booked on a Bermuda cruise. The night before Royal Caribbean announced that we would be going to Nova Scotia instead. Since we were looking forward to warm water & and sand, we canceled. Just a moment ago Royal Caribbean announced that the cruise destination for my upcoming trip on in April has changed.
Very frustrating!

title: Hertz Rental Car, EV, SUV, Van
description:
Book a car rental with the new and improved Hertz Rent-a-Car iPhone App. Pick your rental car from our extensive selection, including economy cars, electric cars, SUVs, vans, and even sports cars! Explore all the options to your heart‚Äôs content in our new iOS App!

Whether you are traveling for business, or going on a family vacation, you can save time, get on the road faster, and unlock the power to reserve, modify, and review your reservations with a few swipes of your finger! Spend less time in lines so you can get to your destination quicker! Our free Hertz App has added flexibility, to make sure that your car rental experience is quick, easy, and always meets your needs!!
Download the Hertz¬Æ App to get immediate access to:
‚Ä¢ Search for rental cars and Hertz locations in popular cities.
‚Ä¢ Use the Map-view to browse rental car availability at multiple Hertz locations.
‚Ä¢ Skip the hassle of other car rental apps with Hertz‚Äôs one-touch log-in and easy browsing experience.
‚Ä¢ Rent a car with our easy checkout, you‚Äôll be done in seconds.
‚Ä¢ Enjoy effortless mobile navigation with menus.
‚Ä¢ Pick up where you left off, by using your previous searches.
‚Ä¢ Get access to exclusive offers and content with Hertz Gold Plus Rewards¬Æ.
‚Ä¢ And much more‚Ä¶

What benefits do you get with the Hertz Gold Plus Rewards program?
‚Ä¢ Earn Hertz Rewards points, unlock perks, and score exclusive benefits to earn free rental car days, free upgrades, and more.
‚Ä¢ Sign up is 100% free, helping you start earning rewards faster.
‚Ä¢ Enjoy a personalized in-app experience with your name, member number, status, and rewards points balance all in one convenient location.
‚Ä¢ See upcoming reservations at log-in or access your complete Hertz car rental history to make new bookings and help you complete expense reports.
‚Ä¢ Easily review or modify upcoming car rentals with a few swipes.
‚Ä¢ Redeem, request, and exchange Hertz Rewards points to pay for your car rental directly from the app.
‚Ä¢ Save, modify, and update your preferred payment method with ease - Store work and personal credit cards to make everything super easy!

Did You Know?

As a result of creating top-tier customer experiences, Hertz was honored with several loyalty awards in 2020 and 2021.

Hertz Gold Plus Rewards was voted 9-time winner for Best Car Rental Rewards Program in 2020 by FlyerTalk and 8-time winner for the Best Travel and Loyalty Program ‚Äì Women‚Äôs Choice Award in 2021. Additionally, Hertz Gold Plus Rewards was awarded Platinum status for Customer Loyalty Innovation and Transformation, and Silver status for Technology and Trends by Loyalty360 in 2021.
Thank you for being the motivation for Hertz to achieve these great awards:

‚Ä¢ Women‚Äôs Choice Award ‚Äì Best Car Rental Loyalty Program
‚Ä¢ Ethisphere Institute Award - World‚Äôs Most Ethical Company - 2020
‚Ä¢ Recommend Readers‚Äô Choice Award ‚Äì Best Car Rental Company (9x Winner)
‚Ä¢ FlyerTalk Awards ‚Äì Best Car Rental Loyalty Program (8x Winner)
‚Ä¢ AAA Discounts and Rewards ‚Äì Outstanding AAA Partner of the Year (2x Winner)
‚Ä¢ Trazee Awards ‚Äì Favorite Car Rental Company
‚Ä¢ Global Traveler Award ‚Äì Best Car Rental Company (6x Winner)
‚Ä¢ Bitacora Award ‚Äì Best National Car Rental Company (7x Winner)
‚Ä¢ Annual World Travel Awards ‚Äì Favorite Car Rental Company
‚Ä¢ And many more.

Learn More About Hertz Car Rental:
Hertz is much more than a car rental company. Our business prides itself on dedication to customers' changing needs by offering a wide variety of vehicles and services. We boast a rich history of significant first steps, ambitious ideas and innovation that has formed our company into the reputable brand it is today.

Discover why millions of customers every year choose Hertz to rent a car.
releaseNotes:
- Search in popular cities, and use the map view to browse the Hertz locations, showing availability in multiple locations
- New Shop & Book experience

Trying to change corporate code or discount code entry is a challenge. I am trying to rent a car using points and still haven‚Äôt figured out how to do that. No option given at time of making reservation for toll pass, no offer or reminder to get one when picking up rental. Would appreciate an actual phone call to me at 978-836-7571 to get this rectified. Thank you, Tammy Belanger. | This app doesn‚Äôt work but neither does the website nor frankly, the service. And when you request help the site crashes or sends you into an endless loop. | I have spent three hours online or on Hertz lame phone system for gold members.  terrible! | Not user friendly, unable to change account information and doesn‚Äôt allow all the options that website/ desktop offers. | Hertz works tries to make their rewards program sound appealing, but they put so many restrictions, the points are all but useless.  For example, you cannot rent a car for 7 days, pay for five with cash and then pay for two days with points.  Many locations don‚Äôt accept points.  Or they limit you to a one day points rental.  I‚Äôve been a gold member for 20+ years.  I‚Äôm tired of being treated so poorly.  I‚Äôll take my business elsewhere. | The Moment I got to ATL hertz location that had my car and they gave me a upgrade when I got back they filled up my car for free! title: AllTrails: Hike, Bike & Run
description:
Find your way outside with the 2023 iPhone App of the Year

Whether you hike, bike, run, or walk, AllTrails is your companion and guide to the outdoors. Find detailed reviews and inspiration from a community of trail-goers like you. We‚Äôll help you plan, live, and share your outdoor adventures.

AllTrails offers more than a running app or fitness activity tracker. It‚Äôs built on the idea that the outside isn‚Äôt a place to seek, but rather a part of us all. Custom route planning helps you search for dog-friendly, kid-friendly, stroller-friendly, or wheelchair-friendly trails, and more.

‚óÜ Discover trails: Search over 400,000 trails around the world by location, interest, skill level, and more.
‚óÜ Plan your next adventure: Get in-depth trail info, from reviews to conditions to GPS driving directions ‚Äî and save your favorite trails for later.
‚óÜ Stay on course: Stick to your planned route or chart your own course with confidence when you navigate on the trail.
‚óÜ Grow your community: Celebrate outdoor adventures and find inspiration by connecting with trail-goers like you.
‚óÜ Share your outdoor adventures: Easily post trails and activities on Facebook, Instagram, or WhatsApp.

Discover trails that fit your nature. Trails for workout planners, hikers, walkers, mountain bikers, trail runners, and casual cyclists. Whether you‚Äôre pushing your limits or pushing a stroller, there‚Äôs something out there for everyone. Let AllTrails help you find it.

‚ñ∫ Do more outdoors with AllTrails+ ‚ñ∫
Spend less time figuring out where you want to be, and more time enjoying where you are. With offline maps, wrong-turn alerts, and extra safety and planning features, your annual subscription gives you more tools for more adventures.

‚óÜ Search by distance from you to find the closest trails.
‚óÜ Stay informed with live route planner details like air quality, pollen, and light pollution.
‚óÜ Unplug completely or pack a backup with printed maps.
‚óÜ Download offline maps ahead of time and track your GPS location, even with no cell service.
‚óÜ Keep loved ones in the loop with Live Share.
‚óÜ Prepare for the hills ahead: Follow topo maps and trail maps in 3D.
‚óÜ Focus on the view, not the map, with wrong-turn alerts.
‚óÜ Get satellite weather with real-time map details.
‚óÜ Record your activity with stats and photos of your favorite hiking trails.
‚óÜ Stay on track: Automatically export your records to the Apple Health app.
‚óÜ Give back: AllTrails donates a portion of every subscription to 1% for the Planet.
‚óÜ Explore ad-free: Remove occasional ads by subscribing.

Whether you‚Äôre geocaching in a national park, browsing bucket-list mountain bike routes, or planning a trail run to clear your head, AllTrails+ makes the great outdoors even greater.
releaseNotes:
New AllTrails+ feature: Share your live activity
Now you can can let friends follow your adventures in real time while you‚Äôre on the trail

I pray the developer will fix this issue and recreate so one can have better options and respond to emails and stop the billing payments! Good luck to anyone who might try to download this and look for yourself and see find the option to to unsubscribe! How they keep billing me idk I haven‚Äôt found it and I keep begging them and still right now I beg you help me resolve my issue trying to stop being billed for a service I‚Äôve never used let alone can‚Äôt undo on the $ issues ! Thanks a lot ! | Love this app! Especially when I‚Äôm visiting a new place to hike, the reviews and ratings of the trails are helpful in picking what I want to do for the day and what matches my level of activity the best. | Buy subscription on AllTrails website then app doesn‚Äôt acknowledge.  Need to fix app.  Only wants you to buy through Apple Store with the higher price.  Terrible service | I absolutely love this app I found so many trails for me and my family and perfect fishing spots thank you all trails | AllTrails charged me through PayPal somehow, and did not notify me that they would do so until the day of the charge. They insist it was charged through Apple, but I have provided receipts show it did not do so. Customer service is now ignoring me and my request for a refund.

Update: they responded finally, only to tell me they can‚Äôt find my account and to dispute through PayPal. Thanks I guess? | Helps me track how far i can run and calculate the time i run as well, great app tracking my fitness progress | Don‚Äôt use push notifications for advertising. title: TREBEL Music - Download Songs
description:
TREBEL Music is a free music app that allows you to listen to your favorite music offline, on-demand, and anytime!

Free truly means free, no subscription, no credit card required.

Search for your favorite track, artist or album; alternatively, browse curated playlists from our team. Download the music you want, make and share playlists, and listen whenever without limits.

Choose from new releases or all-time favorites, music for your every mood: Hip Hop, Pop, EDM, Rap, Country, Latin, R&B, Reggaeton and more.


iOS 14.0 or GREATER REQUIRED.


Key TREBEL Music features:
‚Ä¢ Play offline (no data or Wi-Fi connection needed after downloading music)
‚Ä¢ Uninterrupted listening: annoying audio ads will not interrupt your music
‚Ä¢ Listen on-demand with unlimited skips: choose the songs you want to play
‚Ä¢ Listen off-screen: lock your screen or multitask while listening
‚Ä¢ Song ID: identify the song playing around you with just one tap
‚Ä¢ Unlimited music downloads enabled by caching technology


Please send questions to: hello@trebelmusic.com


Like the app? Rate us 5 stars and hit us up on Instagram @trebelmusic

---

Downloading free music on TREBEL is as easy as tapping a button. No more stream-ripping YouTube videos or wasting time on old school torrent sites to get the music you love.



We‚Äôre working hard to get more free music content for offline play, so keep checking back if you can‚Äôt find the song you want.


TREBEL is a licensed service with the best music in the world from Universal Music Group, Warner Music Group, Sony Music, and The Orchard.



HIT US UP BELOW!
Instagram: @trebelmusic
Reddit: r/Trebel
Twitter: @trebelmusic
Facebook: @trebelapp
www.trebel.io
releaseNotes:
Shake up your soundtrack with our new and improved discovery tools. Swipe through our smart, immersive ‚ÄúDiscover‚Äù section and meet your new musical obsession, or find the perfect songs for every mood with our Instant Playlist Creator. 

Turn Off the Ads and Turn Up the Music with TREBEL PASS. Find it in your wallet! 

Make Music Better with TREBEL.

title: Universal Studios Hollywood‚Ñ¢
description:
Whether you‚Äôre planning your visit or already in the middle of the best day in L.A., the Universal Studios Hollywood App is the ultimate must-have. Tap in to purchase tickets, access planning tools, unlock exclusive experiences, book delicious dining reservations, and even order your favorite foods on the go! 


Get all of this and more in the palm of your hand with the Universal Studios Hollywood App.
 
Navigate Our Universe: From attraction wait times to nearby dining options and everything in between, you can find it all on our dynamic digital park map.
 
Join a Virtual Line: Use Virtual Line Access to choose a return time and save your spot in line at select attractions throughout Universal Studios Hollywood. 


Unlock More Interactive Play: With your Power-Up BandTM and the Universal Studios Hollywood App, you can track your score as you complete Key Challenges, defeat Bowser Jr., collect digital coins, and more throughout SUPER NINTENDO WORLD‚Ñ¢.


Ordering Food is Deliciously Easy: With Mobile Food & Drink Ordering, you can now order ahead at select locations. That means less time waiting in line and more time enjoying delicious delights! 


Access Your Universal Studios Hollywood Wallet: Link your tickets and add a payment method to ensure an even more seamless visit! For a contactless experience, you can access your tickets on the go and even assign specific tickets to people within your Travel Party.
 
Dine On Your Time: Make dining reservations at select locations within Universal CityWalk at Universal Studios Hollywood. From classic culinary favorites to show-stopping desserts, you‚Äôll find something for everyone to enjoy!  


Plus, you can access additional features designed to ensure you have the smoothest visit possible. Virtual Assistant, Parking Reminders, Favorites, and more are available only in the Universal Studios Hollywood App.
releaseNotes:
With Version 6.0, we are excited to introduce one of the most significant updates to the Universal Studios Hollywood App ever. This release brings exciting new features that will enhance every aspect of your visit by empowering you with more relevant information, increasing accessibility, and more, along with a stunning new design.  

‚Ä¢ New Visual Design: Version 6.0 will feel refreshingly new yet instantly familiar. With this new design approach, even more relevant information is available to you ‚Äì empowering you to have more control over your visit with fewer taps.
  
‚Ä¢ Redesigned Map: The map has been completely rebuilt from the ground up. This new experience allows you to filter, sort, and browse even more relevant information in greater detail.  

‚Ä¢ Reimagined Wallet: Your Universal Wallet is where you can link your tickets and store payment information, making for a seamless payment experience. You can also assign tickets and other extras to specific individuals with Travel Party.   

‚Ä¢ Introducing Favorites: Quickly find your favorite attractions, shows, and more with a personalized list and map view. 

‚Ä¢ Increased Accessibility: The Universal Studios Hollywood App will now display content based on the preferred font size set on your device.

The app is fantastic. I can see wait times, view restaurants, create an account, and view my annual pass. I can also see my SUPER NINTENDO WORLD at Universal Studios Hollywood badges and achievements clearly in the built-in mini-app, and switch between SUPER NINTENDO WORLD at Universal Studios Hollywood accounts. However, there is no link to book a time to join the queue for Toadstool Cafe. Instead, I either have to go the park and scan the QR code near the entrance to either SUPER NINTENDO WORLD or Toadstool Cafe, or watch a YouTube video of someone getting near the QR code and scan it in the video to book at home before I enter the park. In my opinion, allowing guests to book beforehand via a link in the app will reduce stress and time-slots for the day filling up by the time you scan. For example, I can book Saturday at 1:00 P.M. on Friday at home via the in-app link, versus scanning at either entrance on Saturday and realizing all times are filled up that day.

There are other minor inconveniences with app. Otherwise, it‚Äôs great.

title: Lufthansa
description:
Book flights, reserve seats and manage your boarding passes ‚Äì the Lufthansa app offers you all this and much more. The Lufthansa app: your mobile travel companion for smooth and seamless journeys with Lufthansa Group Network Airlines.
With push notifications and real-time flight information, relevant flight status updates and offers will be sent directly to your smartphone. This way you‚Äôll be up to speed throughout your entire flight.
The Lufthansa app keeps you informed during your journey, from the moment you book your flight to when you arrive and even after you have landed, ensuring everything runs as smoothly as possible. With your personal profile, you can conveniently manage your data and personalized services.
In short: With the Lufthansa app, you‚Äôre well taken care of during your travels.
The key features of the Lufthansa app:

Before the flight
‚Ä¢	Book flights, reserve seats and add baggage: Book your desired flight and rent a car if you need to. You can also reserve or change your seat and add extra baggage.

‚Ä¢	Online check-in: Use the Lufthansa app to check in for all flights operated by Lufthansa Group Network Airlines. You will receive your digital flight ticket on your smartphone and can conveniently access your mobile boarding pass from the app.
‚Ä¢	Travel ID and Lufthansa Miles and More: With the new digital wallet, you can store multiple payment methods in your Travel ID account, allowing for seamless and easy payment any time and from anywhere. Use your Travel ID or Lufthansa Miles & More login for personalized services. For a greater level of convenience, you can save your personal information in the Lufthansa app.
‚Ä¢	Real-time information and flight status: Your personal travel assistant provides you with important flight details and updates about your trip starting 24 hours before your flight departure. You‚Äôll receive push notifications for check-in and the flight status and any gate changes will be displayed clearly on your home screen. This way you are able to keep track of your flights and prepare for them accordingly so you can start your trip feeling as relaxed as possible.
During the flight
‚Ä¢	Flight ticket and onboard services: With the Lufthansa app, you always have your mobile boarding pass and onboard services at your fingertips ‚Äì even when you‚Äôre offline. Access all relevant flight information as needed and always stay informed about any changes, without having to ask the flight crew.
After the flight
‚Ä¢	Track baggage: Your digital travel companion is still there to support you even after you‚Äôve landed. Conveniently track your checked-in baggage in the smartphone app and stay informed about the next parts of your journey.
The Lufthansa app is the complete solution for a smooth travel experience. Conveniently book your flights and rental cars via the app, receive automatic notifications and updates about upcoming flights, and manage your personal data conveniently on the go.
Download the Lufthansa app now and enjoy your trip! Your personal travel assistant is there for you before, during and after your flight.
Find out about our flight offers at lufthansa.com and follow us on Instagram, Facebook, YouTube and X to stay up to date with the latest news.
If you have any questions or need support, please do not hesitate to contact us. You can get in touch with us at lufthansa.com/xx/en/help-and-contact.

title: NS Travel Planner
description:
About the NS app
The free NS app is your ideal travelling companion. It lets you plan your entire journey to any address in the Netherlands and keep up to date with the latest travel information and any disruptions as you go. You can also easily check where you can hire a public transport bicycle or shared car in your area, or quickly find the nearest P+R if you are travelling partly by car. See how crowded it is on the train and have your tickets quickly on hand. Everything to help you get going by whatever transport suits you best today.

Why traveling with the NS app
+ Best app in the Public Transport category
+ over 2 million users
+ Quick, safe and easy payment
+ The ‚ÄúNearby me‚Äù feature lets you see exactly which forms of transport are available in the neighbourhood, from train, bus, tram and metro to public transport bicycles and shared cars. All in a single overview. So it‚Äôs the easy way to plan your entire door-to-door journey.
+ Arrange it all easily in Mijn NS. You can check your balance, access your journey information, simply change your travel class and view and change your season tickets.

Feedback
Every journey starts with the NS app. That‚Äôs why we‚Äôre always improving the app with new functions that will help you with your journey even more. If you have any questions, tips or other feedback, let us know in the app. That will let us make the app experience even better!
releaseNotes:
Every journey starts in the NS app. That is why we keep improving the app with larger and smaller changes that help you on your way even more.

If you have any questions or suggestions, let us know in the app.

Enjoy your trip!
reviews:
Instructies om kaartje in je Apple wallet te lade of kaartje te printen zijn erg onduidelijk. | Luckily there are enough English cognates to make it out | I would like to see a link to the NS train schedules when purchasing an Eticket.  Now that I have my ticket , which train do I have to catch to get to the airport on time ? | It is impossible to plan a trip between any 2 destinations. No matter what you select it says no trips available | Removed the departures tab and greatly reduced the options in the latest update. I‚Äôm really not sure why this was done? | The NS app of the Dutch railways has a serious security issue: after one logs in with username and password it offers no option to log out. As a result any outsider who gets their hands on the phone and can open the app and find personal information like one‚Äôs pre purchased tickets with dates of travel on the app. This is unacceptable and needs to be addressed soonest. Now, while it is true that one can login from the app to one‚Äôs  NS website account and log out again, that does not take away from the fact that once one is logged into the NS app without being logged in to NE website, the security issue I described above still exists. By contrast well designed railway apps like that of the SSB of Switzerland do have an option to log out the app so no one without a username and password can log in. 

This issue is especially serious for international travelers who, if the travel infrequently to the Netherlands, unlike Dutch public transport travelers will be unlikely to have their public transport card  and means of pay (the OV chip card) which makes it easy to buy tickets and do without the NS app. | Works like a charm. Updated my platform instantly. Highly recommend even if you do not take NS very often. | Unable to use eticket in offline mode? | Very easy to plan and buy tickets. | Bij uitvallen van treinen is het onmogelijk gebruik te maken van de NS app. De app update niet je reisplan en geeft dus verkeerde informatie. For ticket purchases you are directed to an outside payment processor and have type in your information everytime. You can‚Äôt even save your cc info.  Very cumbersome. | This app is set up very well for international travelers. It‚Äôs very easy to navigate the app in English and purchase tickets. I was at ease using this app. | Add Apple Pay please. Would make it even easier | Why do I have to download an app? When you want to pay it redirects you immediately to the bank app (after you choose to pay with the app). | This saved me from the hard to use kiosk at Amsterdam Muiderpoort. | I use the day a few times a week and generally it's the best way to plan public transport. I would live to see a possibility to adjust the amount I'm willing to walk to reach the train station. Update: the developer responded with an irrelevant answer, which I won‚Äôt bother refuting. This error is posted many times throughout the reviews and not once is it answered (I waded through seeking an answer before submitting a negative review). Sorry, app is useless. | Plase fix this issue | Eg (some, if not all) notifications are in Dutch. | Same problem as prior person. Can‚Äôt log on. Get an error to try later. So essentially, the website and app are useless | Makkelijker dan ik dacht, vooral na wat gedoe op de website met verwijzingen, gekochte kaartje nog niet gebruikt, hoop dat het werkt! | Hi, I don‚Äôt want to give the app a bad review because everything is just working and its good:) but sadly every time i try to login it says it ‚Äúdoesn‚Äôt work and that i need to try later‚Äù but i‚Äôm trying now for like 4 days and i know for 100% sure my password is correct and its quit annoying I hope you guys know what to do because I have exams in 2 weeksüòï but guys have a great dayüíï | I bought a train ticket on the app and when I tried to scan it in the train station, it wouldn‚Äôt work. A waste of my money and time. | Every time I click on ‚Äúreserve a bike spot‚Äù when booking a train ticket, a browser pops up and says hyperlink not valid. Even if I try to log in to my account, it still doesn‚Äôt work. I can only do it on NS.nl and on my computer. On the smartphone version of NS.nl, while booking a place for bike, Google Captcha will show up on top of the page and it‚Äôs not impossible to scroll up to verify the Captcha. So many bugs. Please fix. | Why is the process of buying tickets and retrieving them so convoluted | I think there must be a simple with to connect personal ov chip card with the app do that you can simple check in and out with you phone.  It sounds simple but would be one of the best feature. | App Store says its available in English and Dutch. But there‚Äôs nothing in English, which is bizarrely provincial given how many expats are living in NL and using NS services. Additionally the app indicated amex is accepted, however it is not. The payment screen does not display in English! | Great app that looks and works perfectly. It only misses Apple Watch support, just like the NS International app. | By far this is the best app I have ever tried for using public transportation in any country. | This app is brilliant and extremely accurate! Not only kept me on time but also able to time a different train of needed. I wouldn't live with out it! If you travel get it! | Tried to use an e-ticket, but the check in scanner doesn‚Äôt work with the QR code because there is also an NFC reader built into it, causing the Apple Pay screen to appear. | This app is easy to use and much more comprehensive than the transit support in maps (or google maps). All the information you need is right at your fingertips. The only minor issue is that the disruption information is only in Dutch (I just copy/paste into google translate). | Well, I selected English in settings, but the disruptions only shows Dutch, so this was not helpful for me. I'm hoping for an update to correct this. | This is a must have app for traveling in The Netherlands.  It provides all you need to plan for train travel in that country to include ticket purchasing.  Great for business travel in NL! | On iPad the multiple stacking panels are a waste of screen real estate and the narrow strips make it difficult and confusing to find information. Actually the better will be to have translation, but maps also helps a lot, especially because I don't remember all roads :) Please, keep trying to support more languages | While many expats appreciate and rely on this service; half is done in English, half is not. | My train was canceled and the app did not notify me, even though it has in the past and all my notifications are on. Now I'm late for work!! | Doesn't find stops,
Crashes on picking stations | Very helpful app | Bad app can not plan trip in advance only for same day | Voor de update van vandaag werkte alles prima. Na de update werkt bijna niets meer. Ik kan niet eens meer een reis plannen -.- | Thank you for updating the reverse to-from icon!!! This small change makes a world of difference for the everyday commuter. 

It would be great to have:

- English for disruptions.
- submission for lost items or reporting incidents

Thanks!! | Completely useless. Judging from the reviews, the developers have been sitting on their butts, doing nothing for more than a month. | Geeft sinds de update continue een foutmelding over een API-error en is onbruikbaar. Totaal waardeloos tot men deze fout herstelt. | App is no longer usefull due to API network failure. You are un able to plan a trip.  Can't even look up departure times. The app just crashes. Will give 5 stars once it's fixed.

title: Cooking Live: Restaurant diary
description:
Hello everyone! My name is Jane and I need your help! I travel around the world and create a blog about local restaurants and cuisine. And I see that big corporations press talented local cooks and their restaurants! Let's take matters into our own hands and give them back their zest for life!

Are you into cooking games and designing games? Then welcome to Cooking Live! Feel like a star Chef in the world of crazy cooking!

Be careful! This game is total cooking madness! Tasty fried eggs, juicy burgers, great pizza... You'll never be bored with this recipe selection. Make food to feel your cooking fever! But making food isn't everything. You also have to handle a serious cooking craze when an influx of customers arrives! Complete an order for a customer in time before they leave the restaurant!

Every restaurant and diner dash around the world could use the help of an interior designer! Hone your skills in the world of design and make bold choices from your options for furniture and style. You can change your selection at any time.

As you develop your business, you'll face an increased number of customers. Modernize your kitchen equipment, complete orders in time, and amaze customers with even more tasty dishes!

Features of Cooking Live:
- Classic restaurant games and time management games gameplay.
- Hundreds of fun levels for all tastes: you need to cook great pizza, juicy burgers, and lots more!
- Travel around the world looking for new interesting cafes and blog content.
- Interior design. A wide range of furniture and decor means you can make every restaurant one of a kind.
- Interesting, lively characters with their own personalities and stories.
- A unique plot. Create a blog, challenge opponents to a cook-off, immerse yourself in thrilling cooking stories, and help your friends and subscribers all over the world bring taste back to their lives!

Cooking Live combines elements of business games about restoring and developing the restaurant and food games. Progress through the plot step by step and unlock new themed cafe shops and beautiful locations. Whether it's a pizzeria, bakery, or diner dash, every chef has their own unique taste and their own recipes and stories. Learn them all ‚Äî join the game right now! Show off your cooking fever and help save every cozy diner dash from the hands of soulless corporations!

Do you have any problems or suggestions?
E-mail us at support@matryoshka.com
We make sure to carefully read all our e-mails!
Sincerely, Matryoshka Games Team
releaseNotes: - Fixed numerous bugs and optimized game performance for smoother and more responsive gameplay.

I shouldn‚Äôt finish the game and get an infinity ‚ôæÔ∏è symbol. | ‚≠ïÔ∏è There are so many food sale games like these (ÈÄôÈ°ûÈÅäÊà≤ÔºåÂ§öÂ¶ÇÁπÅÊòüÔºâ„ÄÇBut ‰ΩÜÈÄô‰∏ÄÊ¨°ÁöÑÈÅäÊà≤„ÄÅÂä†‰∏ä‰ªòÈå¢ÁöÑÈ†ÖÁõÆ„ÄÇÈÅäÊà≤‰∏≠ÊúâÊï∏Â≠∏ Ôºàmathematics) ÁöÑ +-x„ÄåÂä†„ÄÅÊ∏õ„ÄÅ‰πò„ÄÅÈô§„Äç„ÄÇ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏èüëçüëçüëç„ÄÇËÆìÊàëÈÇ£‰∏ÄÂÄãË∫´ÁÇ∫„ÄåÂ§ßÈÜ´ÁîüÊïôÊéà„ÄçÁöÑÂ∏•Âì•ËÄÅÂÖ¨Ôºàmy handsome great professor Doctorhushsnd Ôºâ„ÄÅÂêåÊÑèËÆìÂõõÂÄãÂ∞èÂ≠©‰∏ÄËµ∑‰æÜÁé©„ÄÇÊÅ≠Âñú‰Ω†ÂÄëÁöÑÂâµÊÑè„ÄÅcongratulations | pretty fun game so far :‚Äô) | It‚Äôs fun because I love the cooking part of the game it‚Äôs cool üòé | There I was TRYING to play this game, while biting down on my jaw to prevent my screams of frustration, and YOU interrupted asking me to rate the game.  I was just going to go ahead minding my own business and leave you to yours but you had to step inside my bubble so here goes.  The game play is pretty basic and simple.  Customers come in and their orders are displayed over their head (think pictogram).  You are behind the counter, cooking up the order and swiping the food out to them when it‚Äôs ready.  You need to serve a set number of customers and earn a predetermined amount.  Easy peasy.  What isn‚Äôt quite as easy is putting up with ALL the ads you are subjected to.  At the end of each round, roughly 20-30 seconds of gameplay, you are forced to watch an ad for another game.  Now it doesn‚Äôt matter how many times you click ‚Äòdone‚Äô, indicating that you are NOT going to get that game, the ad plays on.  Okay so good little captive audience here (SO NOT!) I let the ad play on and then when it LOOKS LIKE they are going to return control of your tablet to you up pops the dregs of the ad you thought you had finished watching.  This time, in the corner of the screen, there is a countdown clock where they spend the next 20/30 seconds giving you a chance to realize you really did want to get that game.

So finally all tricks and ads are behind you.  You played a round of their game and then they forced you to watch an ad for additional ‚Äòfree‚Äô games you can get so it‚Äôs your turn to get to play another round of the game.  Not so fast Bucky boy!!  There‚Äôs ANOTHER, full length, ad you have to suffer through. Oh did I say suffer, y‚Äôall know I meant to say sit through.  Anyway, it‚Äôs the same ‚Äòtricks are for kids‚Äô nonsense that you just went through.  Are you FREAKING kidding me?? You have to watch four times as many ads compared to the actual time you get to spend playing this game!!  Ahhh, but SPENDING is a very key word for this situation.

You see, the developer(s) figured out that there aren‚Äôt too many people in the world willing to CONSTANTLY waste their time sitting through multiple ads for things they don‚Äôt want.  They have the solution and it‚Äôs surprisingly inexpensively priced.  For just simple ad removal a mere $2.99 will make this game so much more fun, theoretically speaking cuz I have not ponied up for my glass of kool-aid.  If you are the type who thinks ahead, and you see yourself playing a lot of this game then you will probably want to go for package two.  For the low, low price of $6.99 you will still get the ads removed but you also get a healthy bundle of gems.  I think it may have been 500 gems but to be perfectly honest, I forgot while writing this review and realize I don‚Äôt care.  

So there you have it folks.  A relatively fun game, if you‚Äôre looking for something REALLY SIMPLE, but spoiled by the sheer number of ads you are forced to watch.  If you don‚Äôt mind being charged for removing the ads, which the developer not only CHOSE to put in between game rounds but DOUBLED DOWN on the decision to make paying for the ads seem almost like a blessing.  It‚Äôs like paying the playground bully to stop beating you up every day.  But hey, that‚Äôs just my personal opinion on the matter.  I thought of a different way to avoid all the ads, with the accompanying wasted downtime.  Yes, that‚Äôs right‚Ä¶simply remove the game from my tablet. Problem solved and I have done my civic duty by writing this review and letting folks know exactly to expect.  Have a blessed day and hopefully, you will enjoy whichever decision you make. | This game is super fun 2 play! I love designing restaurants and serving food. Just only one complaint‚Ä¶
I hate the ads. I see this one romance ad over and over, it‚Äôs really annoying. But besides that, it‚Äôs an awesome game! | This a very good game | Updated: 3/9/24

title: Babbel - Language Learning
description:
Millions of people are learning languages with Babbel ‚Äî the language app built by language experts. Why Babbel? Our short, interactive lessons rethink old-school language education to get you speaking a new language with confidence!


BABBEL WORKS:

‚Ä¢ Efficacy backed by researchers at Yale University: 
100% of study participants improved their oral proficiency in 3 months*

‚Ä¢ After 10 hours with Babbel, Michigan State University researchers found:
96% of learners saw better test scores on grammar and vocabulary
73% of study participants became better speakers**

====================

Our language experts build every language course tailored to your native language. This way you learn Spanish and 13 more languages quickly and effectively.

TRY BABBEL ‚Äì DOWNLOAD THE APP AND TAKE A FREE LESSON

====================

LEARN 14 LANGUAGES:

It's not just a Spanish learning app! Learn French, Italian, German, Portuguese, Russian, Polish, Turkish, Norwegian, Danish, Swedish, Dutch, Indonesian, and English.

====================

Why are Americans learning languages with the Babbel language app?

SHORT, EFFECTIVE LESSONS
Easy to fit language lessons into your day

LESSONS FOR EVERY SITUATION
For travel, work, and more

LISTEN, SPEAK, WRITE
Well-rounded language practice

PERFECT YOUR PRONUNCIATION
Sophisticated speech-recognition technology

RETAIN WHAT YOU LEARN
Review feature that‚Äôs optimized to help you retain knowledge

LEARN GRAMMAR IN CONTEXT
Useful tips & tricks as you learn

OVER 5,000 LANGUAGE COURSES
Learn Spanish and 13 other languages with in-depth content, including more than 60,000 language lessons

OFFLINE MODE
Download lessons and learn anywhere

====================

Read Babbel Magazine to get tips, tricks, and interesting facts about how to learn languages:
* Babbel Magazine: https://www.babbel.com/en/magazine

Follow us on social media for tips on language learning!
* Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/babbelusa
* Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Babbel.usa

====================

You will need a subscription in order to get access to the full learning materials for one language. Each subscription will be automatically renewed unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current payment period. Your iTunes account will be automatically charged at the same price for renewal within the 24-hour period prior to the end of the current payment period unless you change your subscription preferences in your iTunes Account Settings. When a subscription is canceled, access to the app‚Äôs courses and features will expire at the end of the current payment period.

You'll get access to all courses for the following durations:

1 month
3 months
6 months
12 months

Privacy policy: https://about.babbel.com/en/privacy/
Terms of use: https://about.babbel.com/en/terms/

CONTACT US:

Ideas, comments, or feedback? Email us at support-mobile@babbel.com


START YOUR LANGUAGE LEARNING JOURNEY TODAY:

Learn Spanish (Latin American or Spain)
Learn French
Learn Italian
Learn English (American or British)
Learn German
Learn Russian
Learn Polish
Learn Portuguese
Learn Turkish
Learn Norwegian
Learn Danish
Learn Swedish
Learn Dutch
Learn Indonesian



*Based on a study conducted with Babbel users learning Spanish. Van Deusen-Scholl, N., Lubrano, M.J. (both Yale University) & Sporn, Z. (Babbel), 2019. "Measuring Babbel‚Äôs Efficacy in Developing Oral Proficiency."

**Based on a study conducted with Babbel users learning Spanish. Loewen, S., Isbell (both Michigan State University) & Sporn. Z (Babbel), 2018. ‚ÄúLearning Spanish with Babbel: Oral Proficiency Outcome in App-Based Foreign Language Learning‚Äù.
releaseNotes:
You learn from us, and we learn from you. We take your feedback seriously and never stop trying to improve our app. And you know what, we've just released the latest version. Fewer bugs, and more upgrades to your favorite courses!

Questions? Email us at support-mobile@babbel.com
reviews:

I found it frustrating to only be directed to their FAQ type files and an bot that I couldn‚Äôt communicate with. It was over the weekend. However, finally they contacted me by email and have been working very hard to help me. I will review how I like using the program later as I haven‚Äôt been able to use it. | Useless. Tried every fix online to get audio. iOS 17, iPhone 14 so not my phone. Just the app. No way to contact them. | This app is terrible. It doesn‚Äôt start off with simple vocabulary like the days of the week or even numbers or months of the year. It starts speaking in sentences and picks words to get you to memorize. The structure is all wrong for a beginner. If I could get my money back I would. | Once one gets past the beginning stages of a new language, this application is not that useful. BTW, I‚Äôm mostly using the Spanish language module. Coverage of verbs is spotty, and the structure of the application is such that it makes it difficult to go back and review previously learned material. For example, the available review options have almost no connection to the lesson plan, so don‚Äôt really constitute a review at all. It‚Äôs the same entry level material over and over again. There must be better options available out there‚Ä¶ I won‚Äôt be renewing the Babbel subscription again | So much focus on pronouns, no focus on real words / necessary things to say. I finished it very quickly and then when I was done, all the other lessons were locked. So I just pressed my phones home button, took it out of my recent tabs, and didn‚Äôt play it for a week. I think I‚Äôd like it better if at least a bit more lessons were free. It allows one lesson, and a review and that‚Äôs it. I don‚Äôt really think I can commit to subscribing to an app I just got. I don‚Äôt want to come off as harsh. I would love this app if the subscription was needed later on or optional. I‚Äôve deleted the app now since my parents didn‚Äôt want to buy me lessons. I don‚Äôt mind it since I wasn‚Äôt very invested in the app. I recommend this if you can pay for lessons. I love the way it teaches you and if you can pay, its wonderful. But thank you for reading this and this is just my honest opinion and no hate here was intended. | I started using babble just a few months ago to try and learn Spanish as a new skill. It‚Äôs very fun and rewarding babble has many tools to help you learn quickly with listening, talking, reading, and writing. I am excited to keep going | Couldn‚Äôt get past the dumb beginner levels. ‚ÄúPlacement alghorithms‚Äù STINK.

And after trying it for 2 weeks, I am more and more despondent that my cell phone is crowded with beginner levels and won‚Äôt let me mark them complete, or get rid of them or go on to more advanced things!!!!!! 

Dumb dumb dumb dumb. | Many good things about the teaching style but it gets the English translations wrong, wrong, wrong. That‚Äôs why I left Babbel the first time. Looks like I might dump it again. It‚Äôs very frustrating. | I‚Äôve used other learning apps but I like this one better. It‚Äôs not a timed event video game. It makes sense the way that I learn. | Most of the program works but it keeps telling me to review the lesson and the review feature doesn‚Äôt work. I feel ripped off. | I‚Äôm writing 4/5 stars because i haven‚Äôt actually used the app due to my schedule, but i have gone through more language learning apps such as duolingo but it isn‚Äôt good enough to help me learn fluent french so i‚Äôm hoping Babbel will offer better and more fluent education. üòäüòÅüëç | They only give you oneLesson and it‚Äôs not even good They make you pay for the rest and it‚Äôs downright awful. It‚Äôs so glitchy and I‚Äôm sorry for saying this, but it is so y‚Äôall. I‚Äôm so sorry but don‚Äôt download this. | Bagus dan gampang dipelajari | There should be tracking of things wrong then review it should not keep going forward when it‚Äôs obvious you haven‚Äôt learned | La aplicaci√≥n tiene un m√©todo que articula
La gram√°tica con las habilidades comunicativas. Me gusta que no gamifica sino que se centra en la adquisici√≥n de vocabulario y conceptos que de verdad se requieren. Lastimosamente el identificador de voz es in√∫til. Mi esposa y yo adquirimos los planes y ambos nos sucede que as√≠ pronunciemos mal o hasta en espa√±ol, la aplicaci√≥n toma la respuesta como correcta. Esto es muy decepcionante si quieres mejorar la pronunciaci√≥n. Es una l√°stima porque los contenidos y textos son muy adecuados. | I love this app. Not only can I learn at my own pace (and review as often as is necessary) there is a variety of practices to help me general and apply my skills. | Teaching to much at one time.  It‚Äôs hard to retain.  Not enough repetition | Please don‚Äôt pay for this. The microphone doesn‚Äôt work and doesn‚Äôt pick up your speech when it asks you to dictate back. I wish there was a refund option‚Ä¶ | Accessible and very workable | I hadn‚Äôt logged on for awhile and am disappointed at the amount of typing/ unscrambling scrambled words that is required now. It‚Äôs cumbersome to do on a phone and a very slow way for me to learn. I just need to get used to hearing Spanish conversations. I also preferred that before I could bypass the rote repetition of words with the microphone. (My pronunciation is okay‚Ä¶ but I need to hear/ interact with more conversations. | I was taking free Spanish lessons with Duolingo for a complete year. I heard Babbel was better, and I purchased a year subscription, I had really enjoyed learning at Duolingo. I do not find Babbel fun at all. Whatever I learned at Duolingo the language appears to be so so much different on Babbel and the teaching technique is not fun at Babbel. And I can‚Äôt get a hold of anyone to help. 3/24/24- it‚Äôs been over 2.5 months now since I‚Äôve been using Babbel. Like I said in last review, I am NOT a fan of Babble. The learning on Duolingo was so much more fun, I enjoyed coming back daily, now, not so much. Also, I try to get on daily, if only to review, I don‚Äôt like the teaching technique through babble so I prefer to review more often, I didn‚Äôt realize it, but babble doesn‚Äôt give me credit for only reviewing! Which means it doesn‚Äôt count a review day towards positive action in learning! If I could woo back to Duolingo, and get credit from babble I would in a heartbeat, let me politely say, I dislike babble, a lot!! I want to learn Spanish, but I want to enjoy the learning process, sad meüòî I do want to add I like that Babble provides Spanish listening skills and games, that is a real plus, perhaps learn from Duolingo, then when you know a lot of the words, go to babble, too bad there isn‚Äôt some kind of way they could combine techniques!  I think ü§î | This app you have to pay to be able to do more levels. But why would you have to pay when a bunch more apps are free. It‚Äôs confusing when other apps can and will teach you more in only 1 lesson. Honestly its not worth it and I regret signing up. I believe you should NOT get this app if you dont want to pay. | Goes too fast. Not sure I am learning. | It is good but the reason I don‚Äôt give it 5 stars is the streak system is bugged. It randomly resets and gets rid of your streak. | I CAN ONLY DO ONE LESSON UNLESS I PAY A SUBSCRIPTION!! | I‚Äôm doing intermediate courses. I watch a lot of French tv shows and now I understand about half of what‚Äôs being said without subtitles. Considering how fast the actors speak I think that‚Äôs pretty good.  I also actually understand the imperfect tense which I didn‚Äôt after minoring in French in college. The app makes it pretty painless and the reviews ensure you retain what you learn. | Babbel starts out okay, but then the lessons become incredibly difficult. Makes learning very hard. The way the lessons are taught is almost pointless. Other apps have much more repetition. I can‚Äôt even get a hold of customer service to show I‚Äôve been paying for my subscription this entire time, so I should have full use of the services‚Ä¶ even though I took a long break from using the app. Don‚Äôt go through Babbel their lessons are wonderful but their customer service and billing is horrible. | Overall a pretty good app, but the speaking lessons are a pain on this iPad.
