I  like it very much however there are places where I am  left hanging and don‚Äôt know where to go. I‚Äôve had that experience three times and I quit the lesson. This time I took a picture of it.

title: Splitwise
description:
Splitwise is the easiest way to share expenses with friends and family and stop stressing about ‚Äúwho owes who‚Äù. Millions of people around the world use Splitwise to organize group bills for households, trips, and more. Our mission is to reduce the stress and awkwardness that money places on our most important relationships.
 
Splitwise is great for:
- Roommates splitting rent and apartment bills
- Group trips around the world
- Splitting a vacation house for skiing or at the beach
- Weddings and bachelor/bachelorette parties
- Couples sharing relationship costs
- Friends and co-workers who go out to lunch or dinner together frequently
- Loans and IOUS between friends 
- And so much more
 
Splitwise is simple to use:
- Create groups or private friendships for any splitting situation
- Add expenses, IOUs, or informal debts in any currency, with support for offline entry
- Expenses are backed up online so everyone can log in, view their balances, and add expenses
- Keep track of who should pay next, or settle up by recording cash payments or using our integrations
 
We also have powerful features that can handle almost any money sharing situation. Here are some of our industry-leading features:
- Multi-platform support for smartphones and web
- Simplify debts into the easiest repayment plan
- Expense categorization
- Calculate group totals
- Export to CSV
- Comment directly on expenses
- Split expenses equally or unequally by percentages, shares, or exact amounts
- Add informal debts and IOUs
- Create bills that reccur monthly, weekly, yearly, fortnightly
- Add multiple payers on a single expense
- See total balances with a person across multiple groups and private expenses
- Custom user avatars
- Cover photos for groups 
- Activity feed and push notifications help you stay on top of changes
- View your edit history for changes to an expense
- Any deleted group or bill can be restored easily
- World-class customer support
- Pay back using our integrated payments: Venmo and PayPal (US only), Paytm (India only)
- 100+ currencies and growing
- 7+ supported languages

Endorsements:
‚ÄúMakes it easy to split everything from your dinner bill to rent.‚Äù - NY Times
"Fundamental for tracking finances. As good as WhatsApp for containing awkwardness." ‚Äì The Financial Times
‚ÄúI never fight with roommates over bills because of this genius expense-splitting app‚Äù- Business Insider
‚ÄúThe Single Best App You Can Download for Group Trips of Any Kind‚Äù - Thrillist
‚ÄúLife Changing! I don‚Äôt review many things, but this app has seriously improved my quality of life. It has saved my sanity when it comes to splitting utilities, mortgage, groceries, dog expenses...the list goes on. No more saving receipts, making spreadsheets, and manually calculating each month. So handy for group trips/weekends, too! THANK YOU!!‚Äù ‚Äì Courtney via the App Store

We offer in-app purchases for ‚ÄúSplitwise Pro‚Äù, the benefits of which are described below. The subscription amount will be charged to your App Store account and will vary by plan and country. You‚Äôll see the total price before completing your first payment. If you don‚Äôt choose to purchase ‚ÄúSplitwise Pro‚Äù, you can continue using Splitwise for free.

Premium Subscription Service ‚ÄúSplitwise Pro‚Äù:
1. Store high-resolution receipts in the cloud (10GB cloud storage)
2. OCR integration for scanning and itemizing receipts
3. Backups to JSON, downloadable from our website
4. Convert expenses to different currencies using our Open Exchange Rates integration
5. Access to ‚Äúspending by category‚Äù budgeting tools and other charts
6. Search full expense history

‚ÄúSplitwise Pro‚Äù subscriptions purchased in-app renew monthly or yearly depending on your plan. Plan pricing may vary by country. To avoid renewal, you must turn off auto-renew at least 24 hours before your subscription ends. You can turn off auto-renew at any time by visiting the App Store.

Terms of Service and Privacy Policy: https://www.splitwise.com/terms
releaseNotes: Various fixes and improvements.
reviews:
I have been an avid user of Splitwise for almost a decade. Never had any issues until this week, when I apparently hit the maximum number of expenses on the free plan per day - FOUR. No communication about this change except a paywall. Reaching out to support they said ‚Äúoh letting you know in the app is the best way to inform you‚Äù. No, telling loyal customers in a static written format is the best way. Four expenses per day is absolutely absurd. This app is now useless to me unless I can afford to pay monthly or yearly for this app. You | The new transition is a betrayal to loyal customers since the inception. This is utterly ridiculous and disappointing experience!!
I hope they stop being a money hungry company. | Needs an option to created a group without adding people with their contact information.

There needs to be an option to create a group and just have option to add multiple people under same account. I don‚Äôt want to add everyone as friends, sometimes I just want to track things on my end. | This app makes splitting bills at my daughter‚Äôs 8-person house at college a breeze. | Suddenly paying bills got easy. | This app is useless now with the new update. I‚Äôd rather spend extra time making a Google sheet than to support cash-grabbing decisions like this one. | I‚Äôm frustrated about the new limitations of free user.  I can understanding the want to increase revenue, but the current methodology makes the app legitimately unusable.  It seems to only allow 3 expenses per day or so.  That‚Äôs ridiculous. | This was an incredible app but their new structure tries to coerce/torture you into paying for Pro. Now it‚Äôs hardly useable. Would not recommend the free version any longer.

Update ‚Äî Venmo released a ‚ÄúGroups‚Äù feature as a Splitwise alternative which is great! | Limiting the number of transactions I can add in a day if I'm not a subscriber? Man you really are desperate in this recession. Guess what: Splid and excel do the same thing so sayonara. | Can not add more than 6 expenses in a day. | We use Splitwise for our charter sailing vacations and it is th perfect tool to keep our expenses equal.  Highly recommend it. | As the rest of the reviews explain in detail, they took a great app and ruined it with subscription pricing.
A one-time fee could be reasonable, but a monthly subscription for an app that most don‚Äôt use every month is terrible. | Expense limits really ruined this app, not worth it for casual users anymore. A bummer because this was the best group expense app I‚Äôve seen. | Used to make use of this app religiously whenever going on trips with friends, but now it barely lets you add a transaction or two before forcing you to wait and is limited to letting you add less than 5 a day. Terrible business practice to remove basic functionality and hide it behind a paywall that does not offer much besides an opportunity to restore the app to the way it used to be for free. It‚Äôs insulting to the point that I would rather not use the app even if it was technically better than every other alternative. | Instead of adding features to make upgrading to pro incentivizing, they have decided to remove features for free users. No thank you. | Splitwise ASSUMES a user‚Äôs Venmo account uses the same email that is bound to that user‚Äôs Splitwise account. How dare any app make such a tragic assumption like that in regard to finances. I had a botched group ski trip with 11 people, many of which were new users. When it came to pay via Venmo, it is not obvious if it correctly connected to that user‚Äôs Venmo account or not. It just warns you ‚Äúhey we have no idea because we are making a dumb assumption. Double check‚Äù. But this warning is is NOT the solution, it‚Äôs the red flag of a glaring issue. Half of our group ended up sending payments to incorrect Venmo accounts because of this. No we don‚Äôt want to use Splitwise pay. And it‚Äôs ridiculous to expect every group member of a group to have to verify the email of the other individuals they have to pay. It‚Äôs such a tedious and redundant thing to ask of users. Instead‚Ä¶ Splitwise should be forcing a user to enter their Venmo @accountHandle to their account before they can accept payments. | App has become unusable. Switched to Splid! | Limiting the number of expenses to like 3/day is insane with the amount of competition they have. Deleting app | Couldn‚Äôt directly add guest. I tried to add guest to my travel group without going to contacts but couldn‚Äôt. That did for me. | The new Splitwise update is so frustrating since  it is trying to act like venmo and makes you set up a bank account now | Awesome concept that is super helpful for group trips and splitting bills up. Absolutely wild and unfortunate business decision they made to start charging for more than 4 expenses per day. There‚Äôs plenty of free alternatives to use instead that you can use | I had never heard of Splitwise until a friend recommended that our group use it.  It was unclear to everyone how to use it, so some members used Splitwise Pay and some did not because they were unsure about connecting bank accounts to a platform they had never heard of.  Now some of the funds are sitting in the Splitwise Pay platform and people haven‚Äôt gotten paid, which has made a huge mess of the calculations.  I contacted to support but have not received a response.  There was never an instruction saying ‚ÄúEVERYONE IN YOUR GROUP NEEDS TO USE SPLITWISE PAY OR NO ONE CAN USE IT.‚Äù  To Splitwise support:  PLEASE REPLY TO MY SUPPORT REQUEST!‚Äù | App is great but useless without monthly fee. | Can‚Äôt do anything without a pop up ad, sad to see after so many great years. | Used to love splitwise

Opened it for the first time in a while for a recent trip and free years are now limited to 3 expenses per day and a 10 second wait for each of those even!

Will be deleting the app after these final expenses are tallied. | This used to be THE app to have for big group trips to manage all expenses. The new limit on expenses per day has made the app unusable. Current looking for alternatives. | Do not trust this app! They are gathering way too much personal data without any secure ways of protecting it. | This app is amazing and comes in handy | Used to be my go to app for traveling. I understand that the app needs to make money. I am ok with having to wait a few a seconds before adding a new expense. But the new daily cap for expenses is too much. Venmo now has a similar group feature to Splitwise that‚Äôs free. Will be saying goodbye after this trip. | There are too many free alternatives for them to be limiting us to 4 purchases a day. Makes the app unusable. Moving on to Venmo/tricount. | Don‚Äôt bother unless you need Pro for something (you don‚Äôt). There are plenty of tools online that do the same thing for free. | Why would you add a paywall to the very function of your app that makes it viable. I used this app for everything and now I have a limit. Lost a loyal user | Love the app. Willing to pay per group, but I only use the app a few times a year. Doesn‚Äôt make sense to have a monthly subscription. Total bummer about the daily transaction limits. Completely arbitrary and unfortunate mod to push for pro subs. | The features on this app are being adopted by Venmo. Meanwhile, this app (Splitwise) is adding new ads, new barriers for use, etc. just to be annoying to get you to upgrade. Splitwise was a cool idea but they (Splitwise) is making it more difficult to use‚Ä¶ no brainer that I‚Äôm just going to use Venmo which offers all the same features with no charge and no annoying ads. | This app used to be amazing, super helpful, and perfect. Now that they‚Äôre trying to monetize off of their users by adding a daily limit and ads and what not it ruins the whole app. I will no longer be using this app, and I found another app that does the same exact thing, but everything is free with no ads and no limits. | 3 transactions?? 10 minute wait?? id rather use a free excel/google sheet | I signed up for pro, despite paying for the feature they aren‚Äôt showing up even after logging in and out & redownloading the app. | I could not have imagined how an app with such little functionality to begin with could take away so much of it and stick it behind a paywall. If they think I will pay this much money to not do basic addition, they are out of their minds. I couldn‚Äôt delete this app fast enough. Only redownloaded to write this review when they asked for feedback. Don‚Äôt put the entire free app behind a paywall, come up with some extra features and then maybe we‚Äôll talk. | I‚Äôve used splitwise for YEARS for group trips and splitting expenses with roommates. They‚Äôve now limited the amount of expenses you can submit per day to only 4 per day, and they force you to you stare at their subscribe screen for 10 seconds before they even let you add an expense. Literally fire the Product Manager who suggested this. I understand that Splitwise is a company that‚Äôs been around for a while and now needs to monetize, but this is not the way. I‚Äôm now looking for a different  app to use to settle up my most recent trip since we all want to pay each other back asap (we have to pay our credit card bills) but it would take us over a week to input all of our expenses with Splitwise‚Äôs daily limits. I have 30 expenses to add that I couldn‚Äôt add on the trip because I didn‚Äôt have wifi. With the 4 expense per day limit, it would take me 8 days to add them all. Ridiculous. Splitwise, change this immediately. At least give us the decency of a limit of 10 or something. 4/day is a slap in the face to your long time users. | I was able to split an expense between only select and exclude others. Very helpful! | I was a loyal user of Splitwise throughout the years and I got at least 10 people hooked up on it.
I know the times are hard, but limiting daily transactions is a bad decision to make. I‚Äôm unable to understand why did this happen, and why did you make such a mistake knowing that the users won‚Äôt like it. As a fellow developer and product manager, I can‚Äôt understand why would you want to make your loyal user base suffer like this.

There are better alternatives out there I‚Äôm sure. Even if there‚Äôs not, someone will make it and steal all your users eventually. | My daughter swears by it, but it‚Äôs so confusing to me. The totals almost never look right ‚Ä¶ I‚Äôm really trying to give it a chance but the aggravation of trying to figure out always gives me a headache! It‚Äôs a good idea‚Ä¶ but definitely doesn‚Äôt simplify the process other than to ‚Äúhopefully‚Äù make your debtors aware that they owe you money. | I don‚Äôt like it, it isn‚Äôt user friendly | The app is a basic calculator. Are you kidding? Easiest app deletion ever. | Looking for other better app now. | Disappointed to see the downfall of another app to a monetization push. Used to be my go-to for splitting travel expenses amongst friends but the 3 expense/day limit and 10 second wait time makes this unusable. Tip for the developer: add features to the Pro version of an app rather than removing them from the free version- you‚Äôre gonna lose users. RIP Splitwise, thanks for the good memories. Time to fire up Google sheets‚Ä¶ | You guys have a fantastic app that makes everything very easy. But your recent limits on transaction and mandatory 10 second adds for pro are really scaring people away. At this rate, a competitor is going to snap up your user base because people are sick of them. Already, friends prefer to use venmoed new group feature for convenience. I like your app, and I just hope you don't get buried because of this. | Used to be the best app, now they got greedy and want you to pay for their pro app.   They limit to 4 expenses or less a day lately.  It takes several days to settle expenses after a trip with these limits.  Very disappointing.  I‚Äôm fine watching adds if I must. But limits that then you can‚Äôt use the app at all is outrageous!  Will switch to using Venmo as they added expense tracking in that directly now. | I've been using splitwise for a long time (years now), but now it has been rendered completely useless due to the 3 expenses a day limit. It's an absolute inconvenience. More than happy to use a different product. | You can only add two expenses with a free account, so that‚Äôs how many stars they get.

title: Travelex Travel Money
description:
The safer way to spend and transfer money abroad. Easily top up your Travelex Money card, check your balance, recent transactions and order cash for delivery or collect from one of our stores.
 
Accessing foreign currency while away has never been safer or easier. Whether you‚Äôre buying Dollars in real time, or quickly purchasing Euros before a city break‚Äîthe Travelex Money app offers total peace of mind, with all your cash safely stored on a secure card.
 
The Travelex Money App is the perfect travel companion for anyone looking to go on holiday, explore the world or do business in new places.
 
By downloading the Travelex Travel Money Card, you are choosing a faster, safer way to spend while you travel. Here are some of the features you can enjoy:
 
‚óè Top up your card with your choice of 15 available currencies: British pounds, Euros, US dollars, Australian dollars, Canadian dollars, New Zealand dollars, South African rand, Turkish lira, Swiss franc, UAE dirham, Mexican peso, Polish zloty, Czech koruna, Swedish krona and Japanese yen.
‚óè Lock-in your exchange rates.
‚óè Use your card across millions of locations, wherever Mastercard Prepaid is accepted.

‚ÄîA wide range of benefits in one travel app‚Äî

‚óè Free Wi-Fi access worldwide
‚óè 24/7 global assistance to replace your card or provide you with emergency cash
‚óè No ATM charges overseas*
‚óè Platinum benefits from our partners

‚ÄîInternational cash exchange at your fingertips‚Äî

Order cash in the app to lock in our very best rates on your foreign currency. Whether you‚Äôre looking for Pounds to Euros or one of our other 40+ currencies, we can deliver to your home or you can pick up from us in store.
All created by the experts in foreign exchange, Travelex.
 
‚ÄîWant to get in touch?‚Äî
 
Email us at Helpdesk.OnlineTravelMoney@travelex.com Tweet us at @TravelexUK
 
Find us on Facebook at facebook.com/TravelexUK
 
If you have any feedback on the experience of our app, we‚Äôd love to hear it; email us at mobile@travelex.com
*Although Travelex does not charge ATM fees, please check the ATM before using as some operators may charge their own fees.
releaseNotes:
In this latest update, we've prioritised your security, added exciting new features, and resolved those pesky bugs that may have been causing inconvenience. 

Enjoy peace of mind with enhanced security measures, explore a range of fresh features, and experience a smoother app performance.
reviews:

I learned my lesson. This is the worst experience in my life. I won‚Äôt be using this for sure. THERE ARE MUCH BETTER EXCHANGE WAYS. AVOID THIS GUYS! | Hi

I have just sent over 2 hours just to put money on to my card.
When I try to do on your website it kept saying that my post code was invalid what is going on .
I try that site for over 1 hours and still didn‚Äôt work 
I will never used you guys again | reloading card is usually an adventure - it is always painfully slow, but sometimes it times out, and to make matters worse I‚Äôve had it complete the transaction even though it timed and and gave me an error message - so be careful when reloading because getting a time-out error message may not mean the card didn‚Äôt get reloaded | The app was great for the whole 2 weeks it was working. Now it hasn‚Äôt worked for months. I will be canceling my card soon because of all the issues. | When is the App going to be fixed. I‚Äôve called the customer service number repeatedly and they offer to assist me with my balance and reloading but I don‚Äôt want to reload if your system still isn‚Äôt secure. | When will this app go back online - US student in Europe and unable to add money to account. | Tells me there is an update, but it can‚Äôt find the server. Now I can‚Äôt  do anything with the app. | App is back online, however the update won‚Äôt work so I am unable to reload my card and access the app. | Seems like every time I turn around there is a problem with this app. Can‚Äôt put money into a card because their system is down. You have to jump through hoops to try and put money on it seems like. And now the app in general is just down? With no explanation whatsoever than a one sentence blurb in the explanation of what the app is. I‚Äôm just glad it wasn‚Äôt down while on my last trip so that I could keep up with my funds while on vacation. I‚Äôm not happy now though that I can‚Äôt just use the app to check my account for what I had left. Plus there‚Äôs not even any explanation that they are working on the app in hopes to have it working again. I love the convenience of this card and the app, when it works! | Used my money card previously with no problem. Have tried repeatedly over last few days to load card and nothing but ‚ÄúOops‚Äù error message.  Internet site inaccessible too, with ‚ÄúPlanned Maintenance‚Äù screen stating currency purchasing is temporarily unavailable.  Perhaps the least reliable service I have ever dealt with for such an allegedly big name in currency services. | If you are downloading this app. I would like to say I‚Äôm sorry for your loss in time and money. I have had this card for about a year and have not been able to use it. There is a penalty fee for not using the card so I have lost most of the money that I put into the account. 
I have made multiple calls and had to be transferred to multiple people each time repeating the same information and security questions.

Only now was I informed that we have to transfer the money to the country currency for each country traveled every time. | The app locked me out.  Customer service was of no help.  5 days later I was able to register on the website, and can now use the app.  Very disappointed so far. | Uses very confusing terms, like purse, move money, etc.  While trying to figure out how to load more money onto card, inadvertently changed currency with no confirmation screen.  When we changed back to the original currency, we had lost $33.  Tried to call customer service and got a call center in the Philippines.  After having to do two security verifications, call was dropped twice. After two hours of explaining and going through security process six times, was told there was nothing they could do.  Beware and hope you don‚Äôt need customer support! | This card has been so wonderful and having the ability to reload it as we go had made our trip worry free. | Trying to register my card but it‚Äôs not working. Never using Travelex again. | no matter how good of service you have on your phone, this app takes ages to load ANYTHING | I can‚Äôt say enough good things about the Travelex card and app.

In addition to getting bank rate currency values the only fee I encountered was $9.95USD to set up the card. 

Whilst traveling I was able to store multiple currencies. Convert for no charge and add funds on the go. No scammy exchange places, no ripoffs, no atms fees for cash. 

This card has earned a valued place in my passport holder and will be my go to travel card here on out! | Garbage app -- does not work for reloading. Only good for viewing balances. Have contacted app team twice, no response. | Slow 
Lost connections several times
Used valuable travel time watching the spinny thing and then Oops, error | I got it before coming out to the UK, it has worked everywhere I have shopped and eaten at. Reloading it is easy also. Recommend it for its contactless use also for ease of use. | What country we can use for | Easy to use. Thank you!!! | It took ten times to reload the card. It never told me what was the error or cause for the rejections. I kept trying until it finally accepted my payment >( | If we have leftover money that is eligible to go on the Travelex Money Card, can we bring the physical money into one of any of the stores/airport locations to have it put back on the card? If so, is their a limit ex)100,000 of each 
Please explain in depth on how this could possibly work | This is my first time using a money card for travel! It has been a great option for us! Very easy to use and so convenient! | When I log on it shows no balance or activity on my card. That is frustrating when your in a foreign country and it is your primary source of money and spending. So we have to keep a close eye on how much we think we have spent and guess at when to reload. Reloading is also cumbersome because even after logging in you have to supply a lot of the information again like passport details and credit card even though you checked the save my info. Hopefully this is a short technical difficulty with the app because it is frustrating. | Very easy to upload money to this card.  Excellent for my son‚Äôs internship abroad. | I downloaded the app before leaving. In Italy altogether for 18 days, the balance has not recalculated since the 2nd or 3rd day. Had to call the number in back of card to get the balance, likely incurring a phone charge. Can find no discussion of this issue. What do the experts suggest I do? | Stopped working and had to reinstall within a few days. Massive pain. | Bugs, won‚Äôt save your information. When I get home I‚Äôm canceling this piece of #%#. | Slow. Had to delete and reinstall to work | Before leaving on my trip I set up the app with no issues. Upon arriving at my destination and needing to reload my card I had to redo everything in the app as if I was setting it up again for the first time. Face ID didn‚Äôt work, all my credit card details missing (both travelex card and my Amex) | This app is easy to use, convenient and secure. I was able to reload my card without any problems. Feel very secure in this app. | I don‚Äôt like the fact that every time I load the card I need to enter ALL of my info every single time. | On your phone! | It would be fantastic if Travelex cards or the app supported Apple Pay. Otherwise a good service and app. | So easy to use. 
No question about security of the currency. | I was on the phone with 4 different people somewhere offshore who wasted 34 minutes of my time asking me the same thing over and over and over again to finally tell me they couldn‚Äôt help me! If you want to test your patience you should get this card. Test your limits! | I love Travelex and how simple it is to use when traveling, however the app never loads for me ever (I have an iPhone X with all software updates). I have to log in through safari to get anything done and see my account. Travelex is good but the app is terrible. Fair warning. | I can‚Äôt believe an international money app could be this bad. I can‚Äôt even log in | New Face ID works.....sort of....after verifying all it does is spin to finish logging in and it never quits spinning so you‚Äôre never logged in to use the app. Prior to that, I attempted to reload funds....never able to do that either. | This APP is very unstable. Basically, it does not work!! | Frustrating app. I had to call for password support although my password fit their criteria. Took 1 hour to sort. 
The debit is handy instead of an Oyster card, and it‚Äôs ok for purchases, restaurants etc. but honestly cash is way easier. Especially as taxis add fees, ATMs sometimes do, even though the card is supposed to be no fees. There‚Äôs fees every time you turn around. 
I intend to keep it with a low balance only, and use it as an Oyster card ONLY. | The TravelEx app and its ‚Äúbug fixes‚Äù do not a) load properly and b) work on iPhone.

The card is OK (not great) and the app is useless. | I recently traveled to the UK from the United States. I purchase this card at the US Bank in Cincinnati Ohio. A number of things went wrong.

The lady at the counter got my birthday wrong, it took three days for them to fix it. I then proceeded to upload the amount of $600 onto my travelex card and Travelex withdrew the money from my checking account, however, it never uploaded the money onto the travelex card. This was done through the app.

Customer service was extremely unhelpful.

However, the lady at US Bank in Cincinnati did put 100 pounds onto the travelex card because of the issues I was having. This was great. However, I still am out $600 until it gets returned back onto my debit card.

Finally after 7 Days, the money was finally returned back into my checking account.

Technical support team, the manager at U.S. Bank in Cincinnati, and even the CEO of Travelex was unaware of why this situation happened. They all seemed to be very helpful in the beginning and concerned about my issue, but when it came down to taking action on fixing this issue, they were all on helpful. And yes, this is including the CEO, all very unhelpful on fixing the problem.

Finally after seven days when my money was returned into my checking account, I was advised the best way to upload money onto the card was NOT through the app but through the website.

I proceeded to upload 50 pounds from my checking account, and 100 pounds from a credit card. The same thing happened.

The money was withdrawn from my personal accounts, but not one penny had been uploaded onto the travelex card. 

I then proceeded to email the CEO and the bank manager at the Cincinnati US Bank branch, and I got no response.

I then proceeded to call the international line that‚Äôs located on the back of the Travelex card, but they were closed.

I then proceeded to call the US number on the back of the travelex card and I spoke with customer care; They put me on hold to reach the tech support people, however, they were closed. When I begin to ask when am I supposed to do about being in a foreign country having these kinds of troubles, the lady did not respond and just hung up on me; ended the phone call.

I will also note, that I was kind, friendly, and patient with each person that I spoke with over the phone, however not one person was helpful. And I still have over $200 pending withdraw from my personal accounts.

I highly recommend not using this card or this service of Travelex. I cannot make this up. If you want to save yourself from major problems while traveling, I highly recommend not using this service. 

I am not here to recommend any other service, or sell you on a bad experience, I am simply looking out for your well-being and letting you know my bad-experience that I had with customer care, and all the way up to the CEO of the company. | I went to Europe with the card and app. The card worked fine but every time I tried to reload it, the app wouldn‚Äôt work. It kept saying it had an ‚Äúerror‚Äù. Meanwhile in order to add more money to the card, you have to give so much personal information (like your SSN, etc.) all for an error! So I‚Äôm going to give you what might as well be my fingerprint for an app that doesn‚Äôt do what it‚Äôs meant to do? Makes no sense to me. I sent two emails to their ‚Äúcustomer service‚Äù about the reloading issue, and it is now almost A MONTH LATER and they still have not replied. Save yourself the stress and do not download the app. üëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëé | This app won‚Äôt let me reload my card, the login takes a comically long time and the general design is atrocious. One of the most aggravating apps I‚Äôve engaged with. | Loading money from the app is the reason I got this card but it doesn‚Äôt work. I was told that I have to wait 24 hours to reload the card, but it still will not reload through the app. Use the website to reload your instead of this app. | Nearly impossible to reload the card and when it says ‚Äúoops a problem occurred‚Äù it places a hold on your account that you are using to reload the card with. Just awful all the way around! Definitely do not recommend!!! | The only reason they get 1 star is because I can‚Äôt give them a fraction of a star. The app has not been working for over a week now making it very inconvenient to reload. After this trip I will be closing my account as it has not been user friendly at any point of my 3+ years as a client. I tried travelex, I tried...

title: Universal Orlando Resort
description:
Whether you‚Äôre planning a future visit or already in the middle of your adventure, the Universal Orlando Resort App is the ultimate must-have. Tap in to purchase tickets, access planning tools, unlock exclusive experiences, book delicious dining reservations, and even order your favorite foods on the go!

Get all of this and more in the palm of your hand with the Universal Orlando Resort App.

Access Your Universal Orlando Wallet: Link your tickets and add a payment method to ensure an even more seamless visit! For a contactless experience, you can access your tickets on the go and even assign specific tickets to people within your Travel Party.

Ordering Food is Deliciously Easy: With Mobile Food & Drink Ordering, you can order ahead at select locations. That means less time waiting in line and more time enjoying delicious delights!

Dine On Your Time: Make dining reservations at select locations throughout Universal Orlando Resort. From classic culinary favorites to show-stopping desserts, you‚Äôll find something for everyone to enjoy.

Unlock Connected Gameplay: Are you ready to complete the challenge? Level up to Super-Villain stardom with connected gameplay at Illumination‚Äôs Villain-Con Minion Blast. Sync with your blaster to customize your experience, track your score, opt into special missions, and earn achievements!

Navigate Our Universe: From attraction wait times to nearby dining options and everything in between, you can find it all on our dynamic digital park map.

Plus, you can access additional features designed to ensure you have the smoothest visit possible. Virtual Assistant, Parking Reminders, Universal Pay, and more are available only in the Universal Orlando Resort App.
releaseNotes:
With Version 6.0, we are excited to introduce one of the most significant updates to the Universal Orlando Resort App ever. This release brings exciting new features that will enhance every aspect of your visit by empowering you with more relevant information, increasing accessibility, and more, along with a stunning new design.

New Visual Design: Version 6.0 will feel refreshingly new yet instantly familiar. With this new design approach, even more relevant information is available to you ‚Äì empowering you to have more control over your visit with fewer taps.

Redesigned Map: The map has been completely rebuilt from the ground up. This new experience allows you to filter, sort, and browse even more relevant information in greater detail.

Reimagined Wallet: Your Universal Orlando Resort Wallet is where you can link your tickets and store payment information, making for a seamless payment experience. You can now assign tickets and other extras to specific individuals with Travel Party.

Enhanced Accessibility: The Universal Orlando App will now display content based on the preferred font size set on your device.

title: Clime: NOAA Weather Radar Live
description:
Real-time radar images, severe weather alerts, accurate weather forecasts and much more - precise & timely to help keep you safe!
 
STAY INFORMED:
- Radar overlay shows the areas of rain, snow & mixed precipitation in high resolution and vivid colors right on the interactive map;
- Precipitation map provides precipitation forecast for the next 24 hours; 
- Satellite map illustrates the cloud cover;
- Choose background maps (standard, hybrid, satellite), search locations, add them to bookmarks and stay out of harm‚Äôs way.

KEEP YOURSELF SAFE:
- Read weather alerts with all the details you might need; 
- Receive push notifications whenever there‚Äôs a weather alert for the bookmarked location (tornadoes, hurricanes, freeze warnings, and more);
- Monitor important National Weather Service watches, warnings and alerts in the form of interactive polygons on the map. Tap one to see the full alert text.

VIEW WEATHER DETAILS:
- 24-hour and 7-day forecast;
- Current, today‚Äôs min & max and "Feels Like" temperature;
- Pressure, humidity, wind speed, visibility, dew point info;
- Chance of Precipitation;
- Sunrise & sunset time.

Coverage Info:

Radar images: the US (Continental US, Alaska (except northern), Hawaii, Northern Mariana Islands and Puerto Rico), Mexico (northern), Canada (southern), Australia, the UK, Ireland, Germany, France, the Netherlands, Italy (northern and north-western), Denmark, Austria, Sweden, Finland, Spain, Portugal, Switzerland, Norway, Poland, Andorra, Japan and more. See the full list on the developer‚Äôs website.
Precipitation, temperature, satellite maps; wind map; snow depth forecast; hurricane, wildfire, lightning trackers; detailed weather info, precipitation alerts: most of the world.
NWS watches, warnings: the US only. 
Governmental severe weather warnings: Australia, Austria, Belgium, Canada, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Japan, Latvia, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, UK.

Get Premium:
- Severe weather alerts for all saved locations
- Hurricane tracker
- Advanced precipitation forecast
- Lightning tracker
- Temperature map
- Rain alerts
- Air quality index
- Wildfire tracking
- RainScope
- Hourly forecast
- 14-day forecast
- Animated wind map
- Snow depth forecast 
- No ads

Subscription payments will be charged to your App Store account at confirmation of your purchase. Subscriptions will automatically renew and you will be charged unless auto-renew is turned off or unless you cancel at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription or trial period. Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when you purchase a premium subscription during the free trial period. The cost of renewal depends on the Subscription Plan you choose. 
Subscriptions and auto-renewal may be managed by going to Account Settings after purchase or by contacting Customer Support.

Clime Weather Service, LLC is a part of the Apalon family of brands. See more at Apalon.com. 
Privacy Policy: https://climeradar.com/privacyPolicy
Terms: https://climeradar.com/terms
releaseNotes:
When it comes to outwitting the weather, performance and stability matter. With this update, you'll be even more sure to get the weather info you need when you need it.
As always, we appreciate your continued support!
reviews:

But the recent decision by the developer to increase the cost to almost $15 a month (33 percent) is ridiculously expensive. 

It‚Äôs a great app but the cost no longer makes it reasonable to keep paying for. 

Goodbye. | This app by far has the best n reliable weather forecast n all kinds of added features for  anywhere and any time ! | Kil√≥metros d La Habana playa hasta reparto electrico | My other weather app just went radical, so I‚Äôm hoping I can now depend on this. I WILL NEVER EVER USE ANYTHING THAT HAS THE CLIME NAME AND DEVELOPERS AGAIN. YOU ARE AS BAD AS THE IAP PURCHASES. And I will write again. | Sometimes it works! Sometimes it doesn't! Sometimes you can resurrect it with an app delete/reinstall! Sometimes (like right now) the widget is completely gone and you can't even re-add it to your Home Screen on your phone! But it shows up on an iPad of the same OS version!

I'm out. Tho it did just renew (before they decided to play "What are we charging for it today?") so I have a while until it stops "working" I guess. I enjoyed this app for several years but I‚Äôm sorry, a $50 increase is ludicrous. | This is without a doubt, the most accurate app I have had at 6800ft!   Just a little improvement for snow vs rain in a timely manner.  Like it‚Äôs been snowing not raining today!  So glad for this terrific app!üëçüèª | Regularly doesn‚Äôt load, regularly doesn‚Äôt show accurate weather especially compared to other free apps, price is ridiculous for the actual limited value you receive. I had originally signed up for this app for and agreed upon $19.99 a year to be able to access all features and happily paid for the last few years, but noticed the huge price increase to $69.99 when I was managing my subscriptions. Since I have not gotten a reason why it‚Äôs worth so much more, I have cancelled my subscription and suggest others double check theirs to make sure there are no surprises at renewal time. | in app purchase and advertisements ü§Æ | Easy to view, takes a bit more than common sense to get the details | Maybe the change preceded Bending Spoon‚Äôs takeover, I can‚Äôt be sure, but I checked today and found my annual subscription renewal in July will cost 6 times what it had been. Kind of follows what they‚Äôve done with Evernote ‚Äî and now I need to check Robokiller which they also just bought. Bending Spoons is bad news!

No brainer, my Clime renewal is canceled. | Have had this App over 10 years. Features I used disappeared or changed so stopped using it. Thanks for raising the price of Subscription X2, brought it to my attention. Now I no longer have Subscription. | Just bad. Too many ads. Doesn‚Äôt update radar | In a world where we pay for literally everything. There is no point in paying for this. It‚Äôs a good service but so expensive. Might as well just look up radar on your phone. | Excellent app with accurate information. $2.99 per week was steep but not ridiculous. $5.99 per week is too much. | Used to use this app frequently for work purposes as a third opinion on the weather.  According to your app currently, there isn‚Äôt one single lightning bolt on the entire earth‚Ä¶ i doubt that. | Cancel immediately! | An apparently new data manager of this program has put up a wall demanding acceptance of changed terms and conditions (massive data hoovering that would embarrass Zuckerberg and mandatory binding arbitration of disputes, which always favor the business) or stop using the program. title: Ryanair
description:
With this App at your fingertips, Europe is at your feet.

We‚Äôre Ryanair, so of course you‚Äôll find the lowest fares in Europe on our app. But you‚Äôll also get handy extras like being able to check in while you‚Äôre on the move, a mobile boarding pass delivered straight to your phone and a choice of in-flight extras in one quick click.

So why are you still reading? Download it now and get flying!
releaseNotes: We are always working hard to improve your experience on the Ryanair app. In this release, we have improved usability issues and fixed general bugs.
reviews:
The app works well, other than the fact that they try to sell you all kinds of extras so you keep closing unnecessary windows during your purchase, which is annoying and confusing. 

Their company policy though is just terrible: I just bought 12 airplane tickets with them, and I made a mistake in one of the passengers‚Äô last name, which I caught immediately, so I contacted customer support and they want me to pay ‚Ç¨125 to fix it!
No one has been able (or wanted to) help me by chat, and to try to connect to a supervisor I need to call a UK number, which for me is international, so probably not worth it.

If is unlikely that me and my team will use RyanAir ever again. | Their policies are made for customers to responsible for all issues even their fault. I highly doubt they make those tech glitches on purpose, then they have reason to charge you as fines. $180 tickets when reservation made, $460 is the final bill so far. It might charge me more because It‚Äôs a round trip and I haven‚Äôt fully the 2nd trip yet. I did everything strictly followed their detections. | All the payment methods didn‚Äôt work. Credit cards, Apple Pay, or PayPal. None of them worked. | It will not let me pick Atlanta | It declines my payment and then cancels my booking. Used the chat feature, waited, got a representative, and then they just ended the chat without providing any assistance and then I was placed back in queue to wait again. Booked with another airline since it was too much hassle. | Say what you will about the airline‚Äîtheir app design is just dreadful. The frequency with which the app does not find a booking automatically and the slowness of the Retrieve Booking feature are disappointing at best. However, the shortcomings that is most egregious is the fragility of the booking flow! Should the user‚Äîand prospective customer‚Äîhave the temerity to switch apps for a few seconds to verify their plans comport with something in an e-mail or calendar, the booking flow is aborted, forcing the user to start over from zero. Note that this is not a question of five minutes inactivity, or even three: thirty seconds is all it takes. That such an obvious use case is ignored is‚Ä¶a shame.

(Using the Sign-in with Apple feature is another disaster, but I shall not further digress here‚Ä¶)

Running an airline is hard, but designing a decent booking app is‚Ä¶well, not nearly as hard.  Software design isn‚Äôt easy, but surely Ryanair could do better if they put forth a modicum of effort. | I have been booking my flights through their app and each time I book my flights, an our or two later they will block my flights stating I bought from a third party and I need to verify my documents. It‚Äôs strange considering I purchased the tickets through their own app. I am trying to pay the small fee to verify my documents and the app keeps on rejecting it. I have tried calling customer support multiple times and no luck. | The app would not let me check in before my flight even though I tried multiple days before and hours before. Then I was charged for late check in at the airport because their app didn‚Äôt work! Terrible service. | Application does not accept payments or make reservations.  Clearly just an email harvesting scam that was never intended to work. | Flight delayed by over 90 mins. Gate was changed 5 times (yes five). Ryanair app didn't update any gate changes correctly or in a timely manner. | Everything was okay making the initial flight bookings with the App; However, when i tried to check-in on my return flight using the Ryanair App and website they were both down/not working. As i wasn‚Äôt able to check-in, I arrived at the airport and needed Ryanair employees to issue my flight ticket, but since I couldn‚Äôt check in online they made me pay for my airline tickets again (for the seats I already paid for). As i was with my family and in a foreign country, and it was the only flight back i had to pay. This is also called Criminal Extortion. In spite of my complaints to Ryanair, they didn‚Äôt care that their website was down, apparently I needed to take screenshots and find a phone number to call.

Either way, beware of using this App. If it‚Äôs down or not working Ryanair is happy to extort you for more money. They accepted no responsibility for their site being down.

Issue wasn‚Äôt my phone either, as i was able to make other payments, uber pickup, etc.  without any issues on my phone all that morning/afternoon. Also, I had all the appropriate software updates and whatnot. | It‚Äôs all about you fckng updates! It‚Äôs annoying | This would be a nice simple and generally functional app if it were not for the fact that I get frequent notifications for promotions and special offers. There is no way to turn them off so I am deleting the app. Shame on you Ryanair. | Service nul | This app abuses the notification system to send ads and promotions. Would be nice to keep them turned on for actually useful things like flight information updates, but that isn‚Äôt really possible unless you enjoy being spammed. | I would like everyone to know before using this app that every single step along the way of getting tickets (to even cancelling/changing times because they messed up my flight time) has been a complete failure on Ryanair‚Äôs side of things, and I am utterly disappointed and frustrated that no matter what flight I use with them, nothing ever works. I went through Skyscanner to get a connecting flight from Menorca to Barcelona and then from Barcelona to Sevilla, and one would think you would need the later flight to be from Barcelona to Sevilla, but no, despite the fact that I triple checked the time of the first flight, Ryanair decided with their bountiful knowledge and wisdom and common sense to schedule the ‚Äúfirst‚Äù flight several hours after the second. How does this work? Not sure! Ask Ryanair. If I could get a refund, I would. Until then, I‚Äôll warn you all to never use this awful app. | Was trying to check in ahead of time but it would only give me the option to select a luggage that is up-charged, even though the receipt had already said I paid for my luggage. Was charged an extra $124 because I didn‚Äôt ‚Äúcheck in‚Äù ahead of time. Then was told by the check in counter that both of my bags were okay in size, only to have to pay an additional 48‚Ç¨ at the gate because my bag was ‚Äúover sized‚Äù. Also, the representative at the gate stated that I need to make my bag smaller and when I said I could not she said ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt feel like arguing right now‚Äù. 
Terrible service ): | Booked a flight, a few hours to boarding, but was unable to get my boarding pass. When you book with a third party booking Company, to get the boarding pass printed, the app throws up a webpage window for you to add extended verification. Ended up in a endless loop. No way to get the boarding pass. When I finally got it to work in a real browser, it was too close to takeoff and I would have to find a Ryan air sales assistant counter and pay a fine.

Also Absolutely sinister pricing structure, swiping thru pages of extra optional fees - only booked Ryanair due to the great timing and end airport. Pricing was not important.

Rebooked in the SAS app - which is great by the way. | I already paid for two checked bags, as it‚Äôs shown in my receipt, and in the process iof checking in , it was requested to specify if I would carry checked bags.
Please clarify this.
My receipt said for each of us
Vivian‚Ä¶ checked bag (20kg)
Luis‚Ä¶‚Ä¶.checked bag (20kg) | I‚Äôve been trying to find a link for wheelchair assistance for hours. Unless you pay for a specific seat, I guess I don‚Äôt have the option. | All functions of app can be completed online with no risk of personal information being leaked. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP. You still will not get your boarding pass. | The app crashes when switching the app to find  your passport number or other information. It also does not tell you when you‚Äôve already purchased additional bags. Instead, it tries to upswell you even more check-in bags. Bad app and customer-hostile company. | Ryanair site is designed to constantly upsell. | No Los Angeles no US no Philippines | I remember when we had to print our tickets and I‚Äôd have to run around the city looking for a printer. The app is so much easier and I love the check in process online. Ryanair is definitely up to speed when it comes to tech üíØ | APP would not allow us to change seats. And chat thru the APP did not work. Wouldn‚Äôt fly Ryanair if I had ANY other airline choice. | Useless app. Why are we forced to download it. To justify building it? Waste of resources | I am a first time customer. My receipt 3 months ago has line item charge for carry on and small bag. Why create a sense of uncertainty by offering charges for same baggage at check in time. I suggest getting smarter about previous related purchase and make effort to assess if additional service & charge is warranted exercise. | I avoid Ryan as much as possible. One reason is the confusing check in process which is designed to make you buy services you may not need. It‚Äôs their business model, but it‚Äôs incredibly frustrating and makes me take other carriers whenever I can. | Company ask to get early. Long lines and you get to the counter to check in an they do not let you check in because your plane do not depart within 2 hours. Then, they send you to make again a lane of 30 min wait. What a disaster planning with the airline | I just paid 62 Euro per person to check into a flight that was paid for long in advance. I was not aware that phone check in is now mandatory or else stiff fines. Terrible terrible policy | Great app!!!!!!!!!!!!!! | I wish I knew about 3rd party issues for booking | Extremely complicated check in process. The opposite of many airlines They try to sell you everything up the the ladt click and you probably need ten clicks to get to a check in with high possibilities of errors. When the ticket is cheaper YOU are the product. Remember | Working good user frendly | They make you take multiple pictures and charge for ‚Äúverification ‚Äú. It took multiple tried. They charged me twice even though I had attempts left. I only booked their flights because no other airlines were available. 
I have many years of programming experience. I have seen so user unfriendly app as their ‚Äúverification ‚Äú. | I paid to check my bag in advance when booking . I received a notice that had to check in online to avoid a fee in the airport. The app will not allow you to check in without paying for bags, even though I already paid for bags. I had to pay for bags a second time and will need to fight for a refund in the airport.  Insane!!! | I was not able to move forward with the check in unless I selected a seat and it made me pay for that. I would have happily taken a random seat | The app doesn‚Äôt pull already selected preferences correctly at the checkin time. It should provide an option, ‚Äú keep the existing selection‚Äù | Clunky app to check-in with limited information about what you already have paid for. Not very customer friendly. We fly RyanAir as a last resort. | I have to allow access to my camera to verify my identity but I don‚Äôt have the ability through the app to even access or give access to the camera. This is extortion of the highest order in order for them to charge more fees for check-in ‚Ç¨55 is ridiculous to check in. | The fact that we have to install an app to check in is so stupid.  They should let us check in online. | Should be an example of how not to run an airline an embarrassment to the Irish | It's easy and cheap to make this experience straightforward | You asked me for an expiration date on my Polish identity card. It doesn‚Äôt have one DJ ce when you are as old as I am78 they give a card without expiry date. | I hate Ryanair and since it‚Äôs between them and Wizz air I had no choice. Thank goodness I‚Äôm still young and can figure this stuff out. I feel bad for old people | Ryanair is generally very inventive about scamming its customers but their app takes it to a new level. The app kept failing when I tried to use it to check in for a flight. The I got to the gate and they refused to check me in for free and charged me ‚Ç¨165 for check in. Told me that I should have called customer support when the app didn‚Äôt work!!! | Most frustrating asinine airline ever that does everything it can to complicate the flying experience, frustrate its passengers and generally provide the worst traveling experience ever. | Horrible use of app. Redundant and useless | I paid for a checked bag and doesn‚Äôt appears in my ticket

title: Pilot Flying J: myRewards Plus
description:
Get more where it matters in the myRewards Plus‚Ñ¢ app. Plus up your stop and earn more points faster, save more money, and enjoy more convenience on the road.

Locations

Use Trip Planner to plan your route and ensure you have the fuel, supplies and amenities you need to get from A to B and everywhere in between.

Filter locations by amenities, parking availability, fuel type, restaurants & food offerings, and more.

View each location‚Äôs full list of amenities, including fuel types and fuel prices, Service Centers and Roadside Assistance, number of showers, number of parking spaces, restaurants & food offerings, store hours and more.

Rewards

Get access to exclusive offers every day. Users can refer friends and earn free rewards. Plus you‚Äôll receive an offer for a free meal for your birthday.

Track your Pilot Drink Club status. Your 10th Pilot fountain or coffee is free.

Professional drivers earn free showers when you fuel and can track your shower credits in the app.

Track your myRewards balance/savings and redeem for discounts at checkout.

Mobile Fueling

Save time at the pump with Mobile Fueling. Choose the diesel lane that‚Äôs likely to open first, store your payment cards in our safe and secure mobile wallet, and activate the pump with a simple and unique code.

Showers Reservations

Reserve your shower in the app when you arrive at a location. Get in line before even stepping into the store; you‚Äôll be notified in the app when your shower is ready.

Parking

See the number of General, real-time Prime Parking‚Ñ¢ and Live Parking, and RV parking spots that are available at each location. Reserve your spot ahead of time so you have the peace of mind knowing there is a spot waiting for you at your destination.

Profile

View and email up to 18 months of digital receipts in the app for all transactions.

Receive important news and information in your Message Center. You‚Äôll receive updates on store status, exclusive and limited time offers, tips & tricks for the app, and more.

Learn more about the myRewards Plus‚Ñ¢ app and the myRewards¬Æ loyalty program at www.pilotflyingj.com/app.

If you would like to submit a Do Not Sell My Personal Information request, please visit privacy.pilotflyingj.com.

Touch ID and Face ID are registered trademarks of Apple Inc.
releaseNotes: We've made several minor improvements and bug fixes to speed up your app performance. Keep your app updated to enjoy the latest features. As always, if you have any feedback, we're all ears! We're committed to continuously improving the app to serve you better.
reviews:
Crashes so often mobile fueling always down | This app is an absolute joke. I‚Äôve never encountered such incompetence in my entire life. I tried to create an account multiple times using different emails, and guess what? It was an exercise in futility. The app kept throwing errors at me like confetti at a failed party.

I followed every single instruction to the letter, but the app apparently has its own twisted logic that makes it impossible for normal human beings to sign up. It‚Äôs like they designed it specifically to torture people who just want to use their services.

The user experience? Non-existent. And don‚Äôt get me started on the functionality. Oh wait, what functionality? It‚Äôs as useful as a screen door on a submarine.

Save yourself the headache and frustration. Don‚Äôt waste your time on this dumpster fire of an app. I wouldn‚Äôt recommend it to my worst enemy. Do yourself a favor and find something else that actually works and respects your time. | Cannot sign into account. Keeps giving error message and no matter how many times I reset my password it does the same thing. Worthless app. | I have way too many issues with this app never communicating with the servers. I have alot of stresses as a truck driver and getting fuel with this app is one of them. | This app is terrible! Always crashes on me, logs me out. Fuel in the app never works, I waste 5 minutes trying to set everything up and then it crashes at the end, 90% of the time I use it. I‚Äôm at the point where I dread using this app! | I have an older phone and cannot download the New version so I can not get all my points for Fueling why try to fix what was not broken. | This app doesn‚Äôt work, at least half of the time. It either says ‚Äúsomething went wrong‚Äù and won‚Äôt log me in. I usually have to reboot the app. At that point, sometimes it will work‚Ä¶sometimes it won‚Äôt. As of the last 3 days, I open the app, to get fuel. Now it says ‚ÄúMobil fueling unavailable‚Äù. I‚Äôm sick of it and about to the point of deleting it. title: Spirit Airlines
description:
Our newly redesigned app has been enhanced to provide a more dynamic relevant experience where you can stay informed and use more self-serve capabilities. Its only the beginning, more to come! 

Ready for More Go? With the Spirit Airlines app, easily manage all your trips in one place. Book your next getaway, check-in for your flight, get your boarding pass, and receive flight status updates when you actually need them. Travel faster and lighter than ever before with your new travel app companion. 

My Trips
- Get the information you need right at your fingertips with all your upcoming trips in one place. Quickly see your flight status, gate/terminal, seat assignment, and much more!  
- Get notified when it‚Äôs time to check-in so you‚Äôre ready to go the next day 
- Access your boarding pass and move hassle-free through the airport
- Need to make a change? Quickly update your seats, add bags or options to your trip

Book Flights
- Find and quickly book your next getaway with ease 

Flight Status
- Stay up-to-date with the latest flight notifications informing you of any impacting changes
- Easily check flight statuses so you know when your family and friends are arriving 

My Account 
- Sign up for Free Spirit¬Æ to start earning points immediately and use for award travel
- View your member number, tier status and track your point balance
- See points required to achieve next tier status
- Personalize your profile with your own avatar
releaseNotes:
Continued to improve our app and fixed user reported issues.

Please contact us at https://www.spirit.com/s/contact-us with feedback or questions.

title: Vacation Countdown App
description:
This FREE Vacation Countdown App gives you the EXACT date and time until you embark on your adventurous journey! Just input the starting date and time along with your special trip destination and watch the magic happen.

Going surfing in Hawaii? Sightseeing in Paris? Exploring the Grand Canyon? Hiking in Colorado or Skiing in Switzerland? This app was specifically made for you!

More than one trip coming up? Great news globetrotter- set up a second and third countdown easily!

Some of our incredible FEATURES:

CUSTOM BACKGROUND THEME:¬†
Set your favorite background theme from our many exciting choices or use your very own image! Some of our Beautiful BACKGROUND PICTURES include:
‚ÅÉ	A Lush Hawaiian Waterfall (ideal for trips to the tropics)
‚ÅÉ	Stunning Beach Scenes
‚ÅÉ	An Adventurous Hiking Trail
‚ÅÉ	A Pure White Snow Landscape
‚ÅÉ	A Picturesque Sunset
‚ÅÉ	An exciting mountain scenery with a clear blue lake
‚ÅÉ	A rare desert landscape with desert vegetation
‚ÅÉ	A Calm campground with tents
‚ÅÉ	An unforgettable honeymoon theme
‚ÅÉ	A map of Europe
‚ÅÉ	The icon is Las Vegas sign
‚ÅÉ	The powerful Statue of Liberty in New York
‚ÅÉ	A sights theme with different sights in Italy, France, London and other exciting places!
‚ÅÉ	An adventurous Mountain Valley
‚ÅÉ	Italian Vineyard landscape for wine tasting trips
‚ÅÉ	A fun Cruise Ship theme
‚ÅÉ	Exciting Theme Park / Amusement Park
‚ÅÉ	The world famous Eiffel Tower in Paris, France
‚ÅÉ	The picturesque Mount Fuji In Japan
‚ÅÉ	The Spanish Steps in Rome, Italy
‚ÅÉ	The magnificent Yosemite National Park
‚ÅÉ	The famous Kangaroo sign in Australia
‚ÅÉ	Famous white Buildings and amazing ocean view in Santorini Greece Island
‚ÅÉ	The Picture perfect Taj Mahal in India
‚ÅÉ	The Talk Big Ben tower and red telephone booth in London, UK
‚ÅÉ	The Massive Golden Gate Bridge in San Francisco, USA
‚ÅÉ	The Remarkable Great Wall of China
‚ÅÉ	The Tequila Mexican beach
‚ÅÉ	Adventurous New Zealand
‚ÅÉ	Trendy Los Angeles
‚ÅÉ	Seoul in Korea
‚ÅÉ	Majestic Blue Lake
‚ÅÉ	Massive Sand dunes

QUOTE OF THE DAY:
‚ÅÉ	Get inspired! Our vacation Quote of the day feature serves you a daily fresh vacation quote. You can even share the quote with your friends!

CHOOSE YOUR FAVORITE COUNTDOWN STYLE
‚ÅÉ	Display or hide a cute suitcase icon along with your destination and official vacation start date with our Classic Countdown Design!
‚ÅÉ	Our Modern Countdown Design keeps it clean with just the remaining time until your adventure displayed in clean boxes in the middle of your screen!
‚ÅÉ	You hold the power. You can always choose which units you want to see. Weeks/Days/Hours/Minutes/Seconds. Which ones will you pick?

VACATION PACKING CHECKLIST
‚ÅÉ	Dont forget your vacation essentials! Our packing list feature makes sure you remember which items you need to back for your trip. Never miss a detail again!

VACATION GAMES
‚ÅÉ	Keep yourself entertained with our fun and educational ‚ÄúGeography‚Äù , ‚ÄúFlags of The World‚Äù , ‚ÄúUSA‚Äù , ‚ÄúEurope‚Äù , ‚ÄúAustralia‚Äù , ‚ÄúNew Zealand‚Äù , ‚ÄúFlorida‚Äù and ‚ÄúHawaii‚Äù themes games while counting down the ways until your special strip!

SHARE THE EXCITEMENT - SHARE YOUR COUNTDOWN
‚ÅÉ	Tell your friends about your amazing trip! Share your countdown via Facebook, WhatsApp, Email, and many more options!
releaseNotes:
More content to get ready for your next vacation.
Updates and Bug fixes for current iOS version.

title: Transit ‚Ä¢ Subway & Bus Times
description:
Transit is your real-time urban travel companion. Open the app to instantly see accurate next departure times, track buses and trains near you on the map, and see upcoming transit schedules. Use the trip planner to quickly compare trips - including options like bus and bike, or metro and subway. Get alerted about service disruptions and delays for your favorite lines, and save frequently used locations for trip directions in a tap. 

HERE‚ÄôS WHAT THEY‚ÄôRE SAYING
"Gives you the best route to where you want to go" - New York Times
‚ÄúYou won't realize how much time you can save planning until you use this app‚Äù - LA Times
‚ÄúKiller app‚Äù - Wall Street Journal
"MBTA has a favorite transit app ‚Äî and it's called Transit" - Boston Globe
‚ÄúA one-stop-shop‚Äù - Washington Post

AND HERE‚ÄôS THE WORD FROM PUBLIC TRANSIT RIDERS
‚ÄúYour app was the deciding factor in selling my car.‚Äù
‚ÄúBlows Google Maps out of the water.‚Äù
‚ÄúThe head of our local transit agency recommended this app over the one her agency created.‚Äù

 6 GREAT THINGS ABOUT TRANSIT:

1) THE BEST REAL-TIME DATA
The app uses the best transit agency data sources like MTA Bus Time, MTA Train Time, NJ Transit MyBus, SF MUNI Next Bus, CTA Bus Tracker, WMATA Next Arrivals, SEPTA Real-Time and many more. We combine that data with our fancy ETA prediction engine so that you get the most accurate real-time info possible for all transit modes -  including buses, subways, trains, streetcars, metros, ferries, ridehail and more. Prefer to travel on two wheels? With GPS, you can see live bikeshare and scooter locations right on the map. 

2) TRAVEL OFFLINE
Bus schedules, stop locations, subway maps and even our trip planner are available offline.

3) POWERFUL TRIP PLANNING
See fast and easy trips combining buses, subways and trains ‚Äì the app even suggests routes that combine multiple options in one trip like bus + bike or scooter + metro. You‚Äôll find great trip plans that you never even considered! Don‚Äôt like to walk a lot or use a certain mode or transit agency? Personalize your travel in the settings.  

4) GO: OUR STEP-BY-STEP NAVIGATOR*
Receive departure alarms to catch your bus or train, and get alerted when it‚Äôs time to get off or transfer. When using GO, you‚Äôll also crowdsource more accurate info and real-time ETAs for other passengers‚Äì and rack up points and thank yous for being the most helpful rider on your line.  

5) User Reports
See what other riders have to say! With millions of users contributing, you‚Äôll get helpful info on crowding levels, on-time performance, the closest subway exits, and more.

6) Easy Payments
Pay your transit fare and buy bikeshare passes directly in the app in over 75 cities. 

*continued use of GPS running in the background can decrease battery life.

300+ CITIES INCLUDING:

Atlanta, Austin, Baltimore, Boston, Buffalo, Charlotte, Chicago, Cincinnati, Cleveland, Columbus, Dallas, Denver, Detroit, Hartford, Honolulu, Houston, Kansas City, Las Vegas, Los Angeles, Louisville, Madison, Miami, Milwaukee, Minneapolis, Nashville, New Orleans, New York City, Orlando, Philadelphia, Phoenix, Pittsburgh, Providence, Portland, Sacramento, Salt Lake City, San Antonio, San Diego, San Francisco, St. Louis, Tampa, Washington D.C.

1000+ PUBLIC TRANSIT AGENCIES INCLUDING:

AC Transit, Atlanta Streetcar (MARTA), Bee-Line, Big Blue Bus, Caltrain, Cap Metro, CATS, CDTA, CTA, CT Transit, DART, DC Metro (WMATA), DDOT, GCRTA, HART, Houston Metro, KCATA, King County Metro Transit, LA DOT, LA Metro,LBT, LIRR, Lynx, MCTS, MDOT MTA, Metra, Metrolink, MetroNorth, Miami Dade Transit, MTA BUS, NCTD, New Jersey Transit (NJT), NFTA, NICE, NYC MTA Subway, OCTA, PACE, PRT, Ride-On, RTD, SEPTA, SF BART, SF Muni, Sound Transit, SORTA (Metro), St. Louis Metro, TANK, TheBus, Tri-Met, UTA, Valley Metro, Via

SEE ALL SUPPORTED CITIES & COUNTRIES: TRANSITAPP.COM/REGION

**Questions or feedback? Browse our help pages: help.transitapp.com, email us: info@transitapp.com, or find us on X: @transitapp**
releaseNotes:
Spring is peeping out of the curtains and keeping us on our toes. One day we‚Äôre sunbathing on the mountain. The next day we‚Äôre wringing melted snow out of our wool socks and defanging the icicles in our beards.

As the mercury meter hops around like a jack-in-the-box, we‚Äôre bringing you a weatherproofed wagon of minor improvements, including:

- Better bicycle trip plans. You‚Äôll now see a wider variety of options with fewer overlapping legs/zigzagging portions. We‚Äôll also favour trip legs with bike paths and lightly-trafficked roads even more than before
- Tweaks that make your GO live activities easier to peep at from the Dynamic Island
- Added bathtub plugs and caulking to leaky strings in the UI, everything is pixel perfect now

Anything else? Yes, but you‚Äôll have to wait until the next update!

Rate us five stars to ask Helios and his solar horses for five more solar eclipses.

title: Alaska Airlines
description:
Travel light at each stage of your journey with our companion mobile app. Explore options, book trips, check in, and move hassle-free through airports. Find all the flight information that matters to you, as you need it. 

Features of our travel app:

‚Ä¢ Book a flight using your percentage off code. You can use your miles too!
‚Ä¢ Make sure to sign into your account; for easy access to all of your upcoming trips, view your balance, track your miles towards elite status, add credit cards and billing address
‚Ä¢ Pre-order your Fruit & Cheese plate in Main Cabin and First Class (there's other goodies to choose from too)
‚Ä¢ Add your Mileage Plan or TSA precheck numbers to your flight. How? Tap on your name on your flight or during check-in
‚Ä¢ Never miss an important push notifications with Message center. Where you can find messages about flight delays, gate changes, and more
‚Ä¢ Cancel your flight easily by tapping the 3 dots on the trip list
‚Ä¢ Purchase a seat upgrade using Apple Pay (before check-in only)
‚Ä¢ Check-in up to 24 hours before your flight
‚Ä¢ Add your boarding pass, Mileage Plan and Lounge card to Apple Wallet for easy access
‚Ä¢ Share your boarding pass, and flight details with family and friends
‚Ä¢ Keep an eye on First Class and Standby wait lists
‚Ä¢ Change to an earlier or later flight starting at 24 hours before your flight
‚Ä¢ Add flight details to your iPhone‚Äôs calendar
‚Ä¢ Track flights taken by friends and family
‚Ä¢ Look up schedules

You can find additional information about the Alaska Air travel app by visiting alaskaair.com/mobile.

Thanks for sending us feedback at iphoneapp@alaskaair.com. We are listening, and welcome your suggestions.
releaseNotes:
For this release we‚Äôve fixed a few UI issues and squashed a few more bugs.

Thanks for flying with us, and thanks for your help finding bugs. Please keep sending us feedback‚Äîwe're always listening.
reviews:
Alaska app is easy to use, makes options very clear, even to change to another flight. | One of the best apps to book and manage your travel booking | Inlov the app. Wish prices weren‚Äôt as higher for tickets/baggage!!!Glad there‚Äôs routes to where I need. So far better experience than previously encountered. | Went through the whole process of booking a flight for my toddler grandson, whose mother separately purchased her own ticket, only to receive a message that I have to use the main website, not the app to make such  a booking for a  child.  Alaska wasted my time. | You have always been great to me either booking or flying! Keep up the good work but watch those door plugs! | My husband and I flew our first time with Alaska and it was great!! We were so happy to have a nonstop flight from Nashville to Portland!! The crew was very friendly and helpful and everything went smoothly. Thank you for excellent service! 
Mark and Carolyn | The app makes it so easy and gives a traveler, peace of mind and keeping their trips organized. | Easy Peazy!!! | Today was the first flight (after several) when I could understand the attendants‚Äô complete announcements! I am a native English-speaker, but on my last few Alaska flights, the attendants‚Äô announcements were delivered so fast that some words weren‚Äôt clearly pronounced. Todays flight from Walla2 to Seattle was much different. I could understand every word that each attendant spoke, and I thanked each of them. The young man was not even a native English-speaker! Bravo to both of them! As a student of languages, I worry that passengers who aren‚Äôt native English speakers won‚Äôt be able to understand the announcements when they are spoken fast, (Esp when I myself had trouble understanding).That can be an added stress when traveling.  Thank you for all you do! | Love the flight attendants and service. | Alaska Airlines is a great airline! | The options and ability to pre order are great features. Thank you AK Air! | Alaska Air always out do themselves and is definitely my preferred airline carrier. | Check in was amazingly easy! | Had a smooth and simple online check in process | Yes | Very efficient and great service . | The check in process was seamless using the Alaska Airlines app. | It is so easy to use & helps make traveling so much easier. | Price could be better | Really annoys me that they make it impossible me to access your wallet funds on the app. You have to go to the website to look up your funds which so annoying. Definitely a dark pattern user experience and a business decision to stop people from using their funds. | Had to start all over again. | Personal & website services are exceptional. | I love this app very simple to use. | The app is intuitive, beyond easy and allowed me to share my itinerary with my family and business associates. | Easy to navigate!!! | Needs improvement on user interface and data input. I then hit cancel that says you cannot check in so I hit next and it continued thinking it would not change my seats. When I finished, it showed me in the premium seats. I hope it didn‚Äôt charge my credit card as I would be very disappointed in the almost devious action. | After all these years :-( | Very awesome program. Makes setting up everything about your flight really easy.  Provides lots of peace of mind | Is this for real? You can do almost nothing in this app; resign yourself to the fact you will be on another device using a browser.

Oh for fun, after you get an account, they make you make another account with another user name if you also want a mileage account. It‚Äôs a big advantage when trying to book, catch or meet a flight! | I can't find a way to sign into my account after signing out of my wife's, the app continues to default back to her account. | Every time I need to book a trip the app makes it so easy. | Took me a perchance click after 5 minutes to find the CheckIn. Please browse other flights apps and learn about smooth user experience. Have to scroll back to trips to find code for flight/booking, would it kill you to have options displayed on checkin page. | I‚Äôm a Alaska card holder and they charge for my luggage | Took Alaska once and cost me over 6 hours out of my day with 3 different technical issues | Had a great time! Thank the captain for the wings! Love them will keep them for ever | So Thanful! üßöüèº‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è‚úàÔ∏èüßöüèº‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è | Seat selection was problematic trying to coordinate with other travelers | The app is often not up to date with your latest flight information. I find many of the design decisions counter-intuitive. title: OsmAnd Maps Travel & Navigate
releaseNotes:
‚Ä¢ Record and track your metrics with external sensors including Bicycle speed, Bicycle Cadence, Bicycle Distance, Heart rate and temperature
‚Ä¢ Now you can view map directly on your CarPlay dashboard
‚Ä¢ Added Night theme for a comfortable viewing experience in low light conditions
‚Ä¢ Discover travel guides by "Wikivoyage"
‚Ä¢ Improved dialogs for adding notes and uploading notes and POIs to OpenStreetMap
‚Ä¢ Easily restore your plugin settings to the installation defaults with a new 'Reset to Default' option
‚Ä¢ Added a "Screen orientation" option to set your preferred orientation without automatic switching
‚Ä¢ Added a separate button to switch 3D Mode directly on CarPlay screen
‚Ä¢ Minimum and maximum elevation information has been added to navigation routes in addition to uphill and downhill
‚Ä¢ Improved track coloring in Slope mode with new symmetric gradient 
‚Ä¢ Favorite folders now store default appearance that are applied automatically to each added point
‚Ä¢ Fixed the "Radius ruler" center point mismatching with the map center 
‚Ä¢ Added "Read article" button for Wikipedia POIs context menu
‚Ä¢ Fixed issue with importing GPX file to favorites
‚Ä¢ Fixed issue with the calendar event for parking position
‚Ä¢ Fixed crash with removing color from pallet
