They tried to make it seem like it was our fault but it was not. We asked several people to try and even people at the train station. No one could get it to download our purchased tickets. We had to board train so we bought new tickets. I complained and sent new tickets but never heard from company again.  I will never use this APP again and recommend you don‚Äôt either!! | Makes booking travel throughout Italy a piece of cake!  Removes all confusion, frustration, and doubts. | Me cambiaron de asiento tres veces y yo compr√© clase E.Confort y esto no es nada confortable para un viaje de 4:30 horas. 
Saludos 
Crisolda S√°nchez | Great | Why can‚Äôt I set 1st class and other settings as a default.  Need to be able to sort by duration and save multiple routes 
Also I tried to buy tickets last night and it failed | Bought a train ticket from their app from Frankfurt to Amsterdam. Decided to upgrade to first class so that I would have enough room for me and my luggage and I could enjoy the trip and scenery. When I boarded I sat in the first class cabin but I did not have a reserved seat. At the next stop someone said I was sitting in their seat so I moved me and my 45kg of luggage with me to a new seat. Next stop someone asked me to move again only this time there were no seats left!!

I ended up standing up with my bags right next to the bathrooms for two hours! I could not even see the windows to see any scenery. It just could not have been worse. I have written to them asking for a refund for the ‚Äúfirst class‚Äù portion of my ticket since they apparently sold me something they did not have. | Truthfully doesn‚Äôt deserve more than 3 stars. Refunds are nightmare as others have stated. Great in terms of booking travel even last minute HOWEVER it ALWAYS gets the track number WRONG. Always check the screens at whatever station you‚Äôre at!!! When the track number has been posted, you think the app would update it to the correct number.. it doesn‚Äôt. This alone is the most frustrating thing and it needs to be immediately fixed or don‚Äôt put a track number in the first place since it‚Äôs never correct!!! | My connection was canceled to Rome terminal and the app never updated or gave options for rebooking another train. | ÿßŸÅÿ∂ŸÑ ŸÖŸÉÿßŸÜ ŸÑÿ¥ÿ±ÿßÿ° ÿ™ÿ∞ÿßŸÉÿ± Ÿàÿßÿ∂ŸÖŸÜŸáÿß | the tickets are 3-5 times more expensive than just regular tickets. just go to the office and buy them, the staffs will help you with cheaper tickets. the app isnt that detailed on directions either so i missed my flight. they "encouraged" us to get insurance yet when my trains were delayed, they didnt give back any refund. | This app made searching for transportation so easy & streamlined our adventures!! | Seems very informative. I haven‚Äôt actually bought a ticket yet:) | Allows you to pick senior discount, but does not give it to you | I had my bus cancel the trip 2 days beforehand. I never got an email or any notice of this cancellation and when trying to get a refund from the bus company they told me to contact Omio, since Omio took my money. I contacted Omio and was told that I needed to get in contact with the bus company for my refund which makes no sense. Seeing as Omio is the one I gave my money to they are the one‚Äôs supposed to refund me. Thank god it was only $14 wasted, but my time and effort was overall wasted. 

Their customer service is horrible, they just send you an email and want to rush you off the phone. No real solutions, they just have you running in circles to get your money back. | Easy to use! | The  Omio app makes booking a train as easy as possible. And provides ongoing information and reminders about your travels.  It‚Äôs so good that there there have been two occasions I was running late and bordered a train without a ticket and used the app to get a ticket just as the train was departing. | I purchased tickets very easily using Omio two months ago for our trip to Germany and Austria.  I was initially impressed with the ease of booking, but the trip so far has not gone as planned.

I bought tickets from Salzburg to Leogang which was supposed to be straightforward but first I could not access the tickets - the link that said "download here" did not work.  I had to go to the office to get the tickets.  Also, the railway was having service done and we had to get off that train and get on a bus for a bit and get back on the train.  It was very confusing for us and although not Omio's fault, the company did not update us for this, nor did they offer any additional information.

I also had purchased tickets to get from leogang to Berlin.  There were two transfers, I was able to print them easily.  A week before the trip I received an email from the rail company √ñBB (not Omio) that my journey was no longer possible.  Omio had no update for me on the app, so again I was confused.  I emailed for customer support and received no assistance, that they could not help via email snd I would have to call.  Since I am out of the country, I opted to wait until my arrival and again received help from OBB.

Furthermore, my printed ticket and info on the app had no details on the trains, just the general names and departure times of the trains.  When we got on our final ICE train, we boarded first class and took two seats, as we had two first class tickets.  Eventually people boarded the train and said we were in their seats.  So we asked the conductor and showed our tickets and he said we were supposed to reserve our seats.  I read and re-read the app and absolutely nowhere could I find anything mentioning this.  It was incredibly frustrating to have to be moved.  

Finally, Omio should offer clear information on how to find updates and details - such as platform numbers - so that users can be aware ahead of time what they need to know in order to travel.  

Honestly, the OBB app was much easier to use and was more helpful. | Thank god I tested this before I left. It‚Äôs supposed to work offline, but it doesn‚Äôt. 1. You have to be online to make sure your tickets are there. 2. If you put it on airplane mode and try to open a ticket that you loaded ahead of time, the app crashes! You should download all your tickets/barcode ahead of time and save it locally on your phone. If you don‚Äôt have good data or Wi-Fi, this app will be useless to you on the road. | So far it works great.  However, when visiting from another country, and Italian is not your native language, and your not familiar with the location, it makes it challenging to trust the routes it is given you after you submitted your locations and times of arrival and departure.  Side note, I‚Äôm English speaking from the United States of America and visiting Italy for the first time.

title: Disneyland¬Æ
description:
Download the official app for the Disneyland¬Æ Resort! Enhance your next visit with an enchanting mobile experience. Buy your tickets, use the complimentary Disney Genie service planning tool, browse maps, locate Disney Characters appearing throughout the parks and much more!

Make your theme park visit easier and more fun by taking advantage of our complimentary new Disney Genie service, which grants you a personalized itinerary that seamlessly maps out your special day with updates that continue during your visit.
Create your very own personal Tip Board to track estimated wait times for your favorite experiences and more.
Quickly access current estimated wait times and forecasted wait times for attractions, check park hours, find Character Greetings, view showtimes and more.
Buy park tickets* and make park reservations with the app and show your barcode at the gate for admission when you first get to the park! No e-tickets to print out.
Order Ahead and Save Time: Enjoy mobile food and beverage ordering at select dining locations.
Make Dining Plans: Browse restaurant menus and make dining reservations right on your device. Then, conveniently check in for your reservation via the app at participating locations. No reservation? You can add your party to the mobile walk-up list at select restaurants (subject to availability).
View Disney PhotoPass¬Æ photos: Enjoy unlimited digital downloads of your photos taken on select days by our professionally trained Disney PhotoPass photographers at magical must have iconic locations and select attractions when you purchase Disney PhotoPass+ or Disney Genie+ service. Don‚Äôt forget to ask your Disney PhotoPass photographers for Magic Shots to add those extra shots only available from Disney PhotoPass¬Æ service. ‚Ä†
Save time at the Hotels of the Disneyland Resort: Manage your hotel reservations, start your check-in process, get reservation updates and more!
Exploring Made Easy: Find what you‚Äôre looking for quickly with GPS-enabled maps that show your location and the attractions, restaurants, shops and more near you.
A Must-Have for Magic Key holders: Link your Magic Key pass to access your discounts at select dining and merchandise locations. Show your Magic Key pass via the Disneyland app when you arrive!
 Locate Favorite Characters: You‚Äôll magically know when and where Disney Characters are appearing in the parks.
The Details You Need: See park hours, schedules, accessibility information and descriptions for attractions, dining and more.

*U.S. and Japan residents only.

**Legacy Passholders: Don‚Äôt forget to bring your Passport and valid photo ID!

You‚Äôll still need to show a valid Annual Passport card for Passholder discounts and more.

‚Ä†Disney PhotoPass is subject to the Disney PhotoPass terms and expiration policy.

Note: Some app features require location data or for you to register by providing your full name, country, birthdate and email address in order to use them. If Bluetooth is enabled on your device, this app will also collect your precise location information through beacon technology in order to improve your in-park experience, such as wait times. Optional planning tools may also ask you about your travel party or allow you to save a credit card to your profile for online purchases.

This app provides you with the option to receive push notifications for information relating to your visit to a Park or stay at a Disney Resort hotel.

Features include the ability to make purchases and require a Wi-Fi or mobile carrier data connection. Must be 18 years or older to make purchases.

Terms of Use: http://disneytermsofuse.com/
Privacy Policy: https://disneyprivacycenter.com/
Your US State Privacy Rights:  https://privacy.thewaltdisneycompany.com/en/current-privacy-policy/your-us-state-privacy-rights/
Do Not Sell or Share My Personal Information: https://privacy.twdc.com/dnssmpi
releaseNotes: In this release we fixed bugs and improved overall app performance.

title: Flightview - Flight Tracker
description:
Free Flight tracking app from the leaders in real-time flight information.  Track upcoming and in-air flights, and receive status alerts via push notification.  Check gate assignments, delays and cancellations and use the attractive flight map to see a flight's progress. Forward your itinerary confirmation emails and Flightview will automatically load them into your Trips.  See your Trips across mobile devices and at www.Flightview.com.  View a North American airport delay map with radar weather overlay. Wherever life takes you, count on Flightview to help you travel smarter!

  "Easy-to-use app that should be an essential for air travelers" - Practical Travel Gear
 
  "I highly recommend this App, even if you only fly a few times a year it would be incredibly useful." - AppShouter

  "There are a lot of flight tracking apps for the iPhone - but most of them sell for $4.99 to $9.99. FlightView is significantly cheaper - and even more reliable. The new app also has a great user interface. It's easy to use, has great visuals and makes information easily available for the on-the-go users." - Fresh Apps


Flight Tracking Features:
 ‚Ä¢ Track flights on a map showing flight path and current radar weather
 ‚Ä¢ My Home page gives an easy view into your home airport's current status and your next trip
 ‚Ä¢ Flight Status Push Alerts for flights stored in My Trips
 ‚Ä¢ View terminal, gate and baggage claim information
 ‚Ä¢ See where the plane for your flight is coming from and check its status via Aircraft's Previous Flight 
 ‚Ä¢ Driving Directions to Airport integration with iPhone Maps
 ‚Ä¢ Easily find alternative flights by viewing flight schedules between cities
 ‚Ä¢ Search flights up to 350 days in the future and save them
 ‚Ä¢ See My Next Trip information on the iOS 'Today' view

My Trips Features:
 ‚Ä¢ Forward your itinerary confirmation email to Trips@Flightview.com, and it will be automatically loaded into your My Trips on your device
 ‚Ä¢ Trips are synced between devices and with www.Flightview.com so you can quickly reference their statuses everywhere
 ‚Ä¢ Add notes to flights or trips, such as car rental and hotel reservation numbers, and keep all of your day-of-travel information in one place
 ‚Ä¢ While in-flight, review your saved itineraries in Airplane mode

Airport Delay Information Features:
 ‚Ä¢ View a color-coded map of airport delays in the US & Canada with weather overlay to see how your travel plans could be affected
 ‚Ä¢ View list of airports suffering the Biggest Departure Delays right now 
 ‚Ä¢ View Flightview's proprietary Airport Delay Index for 180 major airports in the US and Canada
 ‚Ä¢ View FAA Airport Closures & Delay Programs for major airports in the US

Calendar Integration:
 ‚Ä¢ Post your Flight or the Flights within a Trip to your iPhone Calendar 

Sharing Features:
 ‚Ä¢ Share trip itineraries via email or share flights via email or SMS/text
 ‚Ä¢ Post your Trip Itinerary or Flight Information on Facebook
 ‚Ä¢ Login to Flightview using Facebook login

Weather Features:
 ‚Ä¢ View current weather conditions at arrival and departure airports on the Flight Details screen
 ‚Ä¢ 7-Day Weather forecast so you can see the weather forecast for both ends of your trip

Other Great Features:
 ‚Ä¢ Call an airline reservation number directly from the Flight Details screen
 ‚Ä¢ In the Help section, read the Frequently Asked Questions and their answers, Flight Tracking Tips, Flight Status definitions and Flight Tracking terms

Tired of Ads?
 ‚Ä¢ If you would like to avoid seeing ads, then check out our Flightview plus application in the paid section of the App Store - no ads there!
releaseNotes: Minor bug fixes and improvements
reviews:
Information very accurate and clear! Love the updated duration of the flight, and the ongoing map tracker to show where the flight is at as I check it periodically! üíñüåüüëçüèª | I have used the free version if Flightview for a number of years and until recently have been reasonably satisfied. But now instead of just having banner ads at the bottom of the screen, Flightview has started playing full screen video ads that I cannot skip. Not only can I not skip the video, I can‚Äôt even close the ad immediately  after the video stops! FORGET THAT! I‚Äôm NOT going to download an app that I don‚Äôt want just to close an ad so I can get back to business. I don‚Äôt use the app often enough to pay for the ad-free version so I‚Äôll delete it and try something else! | I use it every day.  Excellent!  Vital flight information in real time | Paid subscription, only works on 1 device. 2nd one show ads. Says I can use the 2 devices. Emailed multiple times, never a reply. 
Searching for a new app, the ads are like no other app I have used, last 60 seconds minimum and can‚Äôt hit skip | How does this get fixed? | Impossible, frustrating, the wheels fell off this app. | App popped up an ad telling me very loudly and at a really bad time that my phone was out of storage (I have 192 GB available) and wanted me to ‚Äúclick here.‚Äù  Who knows what it would have done.  Bye FlightView. | Unable to add flights to calendar which was one of the best parts of the app. The app now requests full calendar access and refuses to add flights to calendar when I give ‚Äúadd events only‚Äù access which is all it should need. Their website does not provide a way to contact them and emails  their prior support email address go unanswered. | This used to be my favorite flight tracker but it seems to have a bug. It does not sync with my calendar like it used to. Please fix this. | Before was amazing but now have a lot of advertising. No good. | This used to be the best travel app for flight tracking but the ads, which you can‚Äôt skip, make this much less helpful if you‚Äôre trying to use it for making flight changes based on delays. I‚Äôd rather pay for ad free content than being forced to watch something of absolutely no interest. | I have used this app for many years and since the day it was launched. In my opinion,
It‚Äôs the most reliable app I have used vs the others of similar use. I use it for all flights I need to track. I understand the need to get advertisers to support the expenses of keeping it updated, yet I wish the ads can be shortened as they sometimes come up when I‚Äôm urgently needing to look up a flight status, and I‚Äôm not able to close ad screen. It is till the best of the best apps out there. Job well done! | This used to be a great app, even with ads. Now they got these obnoxious ads that use your speaker and create a huge nuisance when you‚Äôre in a meeting or with a group of people. And it‚Äôs almost impossible to close the ad without closing the whole app. I am looking for a new app. | Then they start asking all crazy questions we all used too! Don‚Äôt bother. | Uninstall | Great up to the minute info on flights. This is my go to app to get the best & most current info re any airline. | This is a great app.  I help friends to & from the airport and this app is ‚Äúspot-on‚Äù in helping with the timing and updates.  I have recommended it to my of my friends. | It does everything I need it to do.  Sometimes it‚Äôs not in real time but it‚Äôs still helpful. | Too many long apps about kid games. Kids are not tracking flights. | I travel weekly and used the app to track some of my flights. I flew this week from DFW to IAD to BOS. The App did not provide accurate information. We were still at the gate, and the app showed in Air. Sometime the gate information are not correct. Today my daughter flew from PBI to ATL to BOS, the app is showing she is still in PBI but she was in fact about to land to ATL. I would not trust the reliability of this app for my travel. | I work in the airline industry and this app enables me to set up specific flights that I have to work on for the day. 

Very up to date! 

Always recommend this app | These ads are out of control. And now if I set my phone down and wait through them, I can‚Äôt even close out the ad and resume my search. Have to close out the app. I‚Äôll give it another week, but other than that, I‚Äôll probably delete. Been using this app for 4 years now, and the ads are doing me in. | Would like to be able to give it less than 1 star. I used to swear by this app and highly recommended it. Now it‚Äôs just become an app for ads. Literally every 2-3 clicks and you have to suffer through another one. Very pricey to remove ads on here. Should‚Äôve just made it a paid app and not waste everyone‚Äôs time trying to watch a loved ones flight. There are much better apps with less headache. Recommend looking elsewhere. | Used to love this app. Will be deleting it now. Not going to watch an ad for a game that‚Äôs over a MINUTE long before you can find a way to get back to business. | The app is a complete waste of time now. It is so laden with advertisements that it becomes absolutely frustrating to even work with like everything today. They want money to be add free. Goodbye FlightView. Do not bother downloading this app. It has become a waste. | I‚Äôm a worrier mom. Whenever my sons and/or family are flying somewhere, this app gives me comfort being able to know they are safe and that they arrive at their destination without issues. It‚Äôs extremely accurate and gives my heart peace. | Love this app but recently every time I use it, game ads cut in and app locks up no matter how long I wait. Have deleted and downloaded app but still does it. | A superb App just got better. Well done! | Have used for past 5 - 6 years. Now I get a game of some sort on my screen and can‚Äôt escape back to FlightView. | Ill stick to use the carrier apps from now on, the ads are excessive and take way too long. | I like the core functionality of this app and have used it a number of years but recent versions have intrusive, long, obnoxious, noisy extremely annoying full screen ads that display at the most inconvenient times.  You  have to wait an excruciatingly long time before they allow you to dismiss them.  They reflect poorly on the developer and Apple and make the app trashy.

If you‚Äôre on the phone discussing your travel plans with another person there is nothing more annoying than a noisy ad interrupting your conversation.  

The choice of ad vendor and the irrelevance and repetition of the ads are good reason to find an alternative app and to never purchase from the parties who placed the ads.  

Without these ads I‚Äôd give the app 5 stars.  With them I‚Äôm giving 2. | Have used this app for several years and find it very helpful when doing ride sharing.   Recently ads started interfering with getting flight info.  When you are in quick need of flight info and access is essentially blocked by an ad it is EXTREMELY counter productive and frustrating.  I‚Äôm out.  Need to look at alternative trackers.  Should NOT have to pay to remove pop ups from this type of app!!! | Use this app since 2014. Too many ads recently. Rushed in the airport to find gate info and ada cannot be closed. Bye! | This app used to be GREAT! However, now you will be BOMBARDED with full-screen adverts that have no way to dismiss!! | We are still waiting at the gate in DFW for them to bring in our plane. For the past 45 minutes, the app has said we‚Äôve already departed. | This app used to be a great way to quickly find info about your flight. No longer. Annoying ads pop up in the middle of trying to figure the status of your flight.  I will be checking on my flight info for connections, etc and very annoying ads pop up, stopping you cold from finding out where your flight is. To make matters even worse, several times I can‚Äôt get the ad to go away. I have to close the app and reopen it. Well, so much for that. Will be deleting app. | Ads pop up constantly and there isn‚Äôt any way to remove them. The app just displays an ad until I shut down and restart my phone. So annoying. | Constant ads and even worse interrupts any audio being played every time you open in. Irritating | This used to be a great app. Now you cannot see the status of a flight without setting up a trip | In app ads are fine on a free product. Unfortunately FlightView has started using very intrusive ads that take over the entire screen and obscure the button to close the ad. This affects the usability of the app and has earned a lower rating | Love this app | This app is very useful and accurate. | I have used this for years but now it is nothing but constant popups that you cannot close and must let it run for a minute or more. Worthless if you need a quick check on flights while traveling. I suppose they expect us to now pay for it to be able to use it. I refuse and have a better app with no ads. This one is history. | Basically good reliable tracking information.  Has an intuitive interface.  It‚Äôs the ‚Äògo to‚Äô tracking app for many transportation businesses. | About the only airline I use domestically is Southwest. There are usually delays. For about 3 years I‚Äôve noticed this app has never picked up any of them. Looks like Southwest does not share on-time info.

Not to mention ads are beyond intrusive, redirecting to a website when attempting to close the full screen ad. | Awesome app. Shows real time gate information before most airports/airlines post it. Especially at LHR! 

Also shows inbound flight information which is useful for cross tracking your in kind aircraft in FR24. | I have been using this app since before 2017. I have been quite satisfied because I can follow the flight path in real time as the plane flies over land and sea. It signals me when the plane departs, arrives, and any delays. Multi-carriers are available also. If there‚Äôs a re-routing that takes place, the map changes also. Love it! | While some non-invasive ads should be allowed, some on this site are absolutely obnoxious, preventing access for minute‚Äôs rendering the app pretty much useless. Waste of time. | Used to use this all the time but now, my travel is occasional so paying for a subscription wouldn‚Äôt make sense. I‚Äôm good with ads supporting the use but the adds are long and many times they freeze on the screen and you can‚Äôt get past them so while I want to support it, the long duration adds make it pretty frustrating. | This app use to be great. But not anymore because of the long ads that take forever. Just use Flight Radar 24. It‚Äôs way more convenient and doesn‚Äôt have the long ads playing forever.

title: TravelStorys Audio Guides
description:
Deepen your travel experiences with this award-winning mobile audio tour app! The content triggers automatically (hands-free!) as you approach story sites.

Whether it‚Äôs the riveting 10 Crucial Days of the American Revolution, the amazing antler-growing cycles of moose and elk, the indelible impact of Civil Rights activists, or the must-be-remembered cultures of Native American tribes, you‚Äôll learn something new in every TravelStorys tour. All of our self-guided mobile tours include high-quality audio, text, images, and user-friendly, interactive maps.

With more than 220 walking, biking, driving, and paddling tours (and many more on the way!), this location-aware app works both offline and inside your pocket, allowing you to truly enjoy your surroundings. Simply download a tour to your device before you head out ‚Äî and enjoy!

You can also take full TravelStorys tours remotely from anywhere in the world, either for fun or for trip-planning, by tapping on the story sites on the tours‚Äô interactive maps. Or, use the ‚ÄúPlay All Stories‚Äù feature to listen to the tours podcast-style.

With TravelStorys, you can explore places like:

- A1A Scenic Byway
- Boston‚Äôs Freedom Trail
- Civil War battle sites
- Grand Canyon National Park
- Grand Teton National Park
- Great Smoky Mountains National Park
- Hemingway Highways
- Hudson River Valley, NY
- Jackson Hole, WY
- Revolutionary War battle sites and troop-movement routes
- Route 66
- Wind River Indian Reservation
- Yellowstone National Park
- Yosemite National ParkPlus many major cities, small and mid-sized towns, and more!

New tours added each month!

In addition to TravelStorys‚Äô many free, high-quality tours, we also offer several premium tours, containing more extensive, in-depth content, via in-app purchases.

This app uses GPS technology. Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
releaseNotes: This update includes bug fixes.
reviews: I was very impressed with the app. I‚Äôm a member of a historical society and was wondering if it would be advantageous for our small community. I like it. Thanks | Such a fun travel guide to bring along on trips. | The stories were great | The audio tour on my phone tied with GPS was fantastic. I plan on using this app forever. So far 21 states in 10 weeks and I just found this app. | We‚Äôve used the TravelStorys app on many vacations and love it. But when I went today to download new TravelStorys for our upcoming vacation, the app will not even successfully open. (I do have the most updated version.) Please fix it soon! | It was great to have the narrated background of each spot along the leisurely drive through the gardens. The weather was perfect and it was not too busy, so we had plenty of time to savor the scenery. | Congratulations on this program. What a great informative program. Thank you so much. | I really enjoy hearing these well done histories as I travel. | I really dig this app. It‚Äôs very relaxing | My husband and I loved travelstories. Super helpful. We wish we have this for every every place we visit | We really enjoyed all the TravelStorys tours that are offered in the Jackson area! | We are really enjoying this app. Did Teton national park today. And this app helped us find the cool things to see (but I don‚Äôt think it mentioned much about signal mountain summit before the turn, I think we took it in our own and then the app told us some things while in route to the summit). It would be nice if there was a way to go back to any music we are playing after the app tells us something. I always had to go manually push play on the music we were playing. | We look forward to more fun travel with this app. Very educational . Don‚Äôt leave home without it! | Absolutely wonderful! Thank you so much! | Really wonderful enhancement to a special place in the Great Salt Lake region. Worked well and synced accurately to position on the trail. Learned a lot, became more inspired, and very nicely done. Thank you! | We enjoyed hearing about each area and it helped keep us on track. | Made our trip fun! It was informative especially helpful when we didn‚Äôt have to read signs or a tour book. | Park was so much more enjoyable with this audio guide. Provided helpful logistical information as well as very informative facts about the flora and fauna and geologic formations we were seeing. Will definitely buy the other guides as we get to the parks | Great information | We love driving audio tours, so glad we tried this one for garden of the gods! | Very easy to understand. | We use this, the garden of the gods and the tour around pikes Peak. It was unbelievable! Highly recommend. | The info was up to date and very relevant! | Fantastic app, very informative | Quite informative about the plants and animals and the interaction with the environment. Gave an enormous amount of information about this unique landscape and its geological past. | Driving through the Garden of the Gods we were able to hear all about them.  Even details like ‚Äúlook for wildlife‚Äù‚Ä¶ as we saw wildlife.  It was wonderful to hear about the past and the ideas for the future of the Garden of the Gods. | I have used this app several times and it absolutely makes the trip 10x better. There are interesting facts and helpful tips on where to stop throughout your journey. | Excellent narration, and good advice! | I love the historical information. | We used this app to tour both loops of Yellowstone. It was so invaluable to us, as there is very little cell service/gps in the park. We trusted the recommended stops and were not disappointed one time. Very cool how it even knows if you‚Äôve backtracked and will provide additional information. We named our guide Bill, and were glad he was along the ride with us! | Great job! We loved the Garden of the Gods experience! | Great help in traveling through this spectacular Park! | User friendly, loved it! | My husband and I love TravelStories! It‚Äôs the first thing we check when visiting a new place. We recommend the app to all our friends when traveling for such a informative and fun way to learn about a new place. | üëçüèª | What a great tool to hear the history! | So glad to have found this app. Used it at Piles Peak and Garden of the Gods. Love it! | It was breath taking, I‚Äôll do it again | The app was really helpful for our drive. We only had an hour to spend here and the app made it an interesting drive. | Awesome | The guided tour info, was terrific. We had been through  a number of times, in past years. It was great hearing the history and facts, about the the many sections, of the gardens. | Good combination of park information and history and ‚Äúfun facts‚Äù. | We used this for our vacation in the national parks!!! | We loved hearing about the history of the area we were traveling in! Made the trip excellent!!! | What a fun way to learn about an area while driving through | I wish I would‚Äôve found this app sooner. It gives great history! I love that it tracks your drive and auto plays when you drive past an area of interest/ historical/ cultural significance. | We live around the Highway of Legends it is so helpful when we have company and take them in this drive to have the information of where we‚Äôre at!  Don‚Äôt really care for the music in between.. but .. cool app. | Had fun using this on my last trip. Looking forward to my next adventure. | We used this app in the lower portion of Yellowstone. Downloaded map in advance because very little service in park. We were amazed at how the app knew where we were and would chime in with fun facts, history and even a little comedy. It was automatic so we didn‚Äôt have to stop and press any buttons to get the info. Very cool. | Works through CarPlay and it‚Äôs like having a guide riding along.

title: Day One Journal: Private Diary
description:
Apple‚Äôs App of the Year with over 15 million downloads and 200,000 5-star ratings globally, Day One has reinvented journaling, letting you record your life as you live it. Securely save audio, video, photos, notes, and more wherever you are, whenever you want. 

‚ÄúDay One creates something so rare it feels almost sacred: A completely private digital space.‚Äù ‚Äì New York Times

‚ÄúDay One makes keeping a journal delightfully easy.‚Äù ‚Äì Wired

WHY DAY ONE?

Day One is the original digital journal app. A decade of updates and feature additions make it the most private, trusted, and easiest-to-use journaling app in the world. 

SIMPLE TO USE, EASY TO LOVE
‚Ä¢ Beautiful, award-winning design
‚Ä¢ Unlimited text entries 
‚Ä¢ Powerful rich text formatting with markdown
‚Ä¢ Different journals for every aspect of your life*

PRIVATE AND SECURE 
‚Ä¢ Automatic backups keep your journal entries safe
‚Ä¢ End-to-end encryption, which is a fancy way of saying your entries are 100% private
‚Ä¢ Journal entries stay secure with passcode, TouchID, or FaceID
‚Ä¢ Export options (pdf, plain text, etc.) ensure your entries always stay yours

FORM A HABIT & STAY CONSISTENT 
‚Ä¢ Streaks and calendar view help keep your momentum going 
‚Ä¢ Programmable reminders through text message or phone notifications
‚Ä¢ Unique, daily journal prompts help eliminate writer‚Äôs cramp 
‚Ä¢ Customizable templates save time and add organization to entries
‚Ä¢ Today view provides a summary of where you‚Äôve been and what you‚Äôve done
‚Ä¢ Integrates with the Health app to track mindfulness minutes


MORE THAN WORDS
‚Ä¢ Unlimited photos and video*
‚Ä¢ Auto-importer for your Instagram posts*
‚Ä¢ Handwritten entries or drawings*
‚Ä¢ Voice recording and transcription*

JOURNAL FROM WHEREVER, WHENEVER
‚Ä¢ Cross-platform apps available on iPhone, Apple Watch, iPad, and Mac 
‚Ä¢ The ability to text or email entries straight to your journal

BUILT FOR REMINISCING
‚Ä¢ On This Day feature allows you to revisit past memories
‚Ä¢ Tags, favorites, and search filters make it easy to find what you‚Äôre looking for
‚Ä¢ Map view quickly shows all the places you‚Äôve journaled from
‚Ä¢ Print capabilities turn your digital journal into a premium physical book 

TYPE LESS, PRESERVE MORE
‚Ä¢ Time, date, weather, moon phase, and more are automatically added to every entry
‚Ä¢ IFTTT applets allow importing data from Spotify, YouTube, Strava, Fitbit, Facebook, Twitter, and more
‚Ä¢¬†Siri Shortcuts provides a powerful way to automate more of your journaling
‚Ä¢¬†Share sheet allows you to add content from other apps, like Apple Photos and Safari

*Day One is FREE to use forever with unlimited entries. Additional features, including unlimited photos, videos, and audio recordings are available with a Day One Premium membership. 
Start a free trial today. 

Privacy Policy: https://dayoneapp.com/privacy-policy/

Terms of Use: https://dayoneapp.com/terms-of-use/

For technical assistance or other inquiries: https://dayoneapp.com/contact/
releaseNotes:
Improvements
‚Ä¢ Users with a large number of entries may have experienced occasional delays when opening the side menu. Improved side menu opening performance and reduced delay.
‚Ä¢ Improved performance when moving an entry from one journal to another.
‚Ä¢ Implemented numerous new sync performance enhancements behind the scenes.

Fixes
‚Ä¢ Addressed an issue where the ‚Äúhow it works‚Äù blue text button within the Journal Sharing modal failed to expand correctly in certain languages.
‚Ä¢ Fixed an issue where the Sign In button would remain in the navigation bar after signing in.
‚Ä¢ When users with a significant amount of media attempted to press the cloud button, it would crash. Resolved the crash.
reviews:
The recording of your life will become invaluable later in life. This app‚Äôs feature makes it easy to do that. The ability to sync between devices is a win over apples basic journal app. | This is the best digital journal app I‚Äôve found I love being able to see what days I‚Äôve journaled and it‚Äôs a great way to try to journal every day! | Emailed DayOne Journal to cancel as I‚Äôm not getting anywhere w/ Apple to cancel through the App Store ‚Ä¶ and DayOne is the ONLY app I have that has not responded because all I go was a bot.  They gave me an email (through the app) but the automatic generated email, send you back to App Store or the bot.  You will get NO WHERE trying to stop this subscription.  If you purchase this, and lose your appleid and apple can‚Äôt seem to help you w/ that either (that‚Äôs another story) ‚Ä¶  be prepared to pay for this app for the rest of your life or until your cc expires. | Features of the Journal program can‚Äôt be beat. Have used it for years and have never had a problem. When I‚Äôve had questions customer support can‚Äôt be beat. | Been using several years and it‚Äôs been great for me. | Ggggg | Every day, I think about the things I am grateful for and it reminds me of the good in my life. Moments of positivity. | Great app. Easy to navigate and use. | I downloaded this app over the weekend. I have been using Day One (original) for 5 years. I was so excited to use the new and improved version; however, it is constantly (and by constantly, I mean with each and every use) crashing. No matter what I try to do (write a new entry, look at historical entries etc) or where I try to do it (iPhone vs iPad), the app freezes, and the only way to fix the issue is to close the app and go back in. Further, even when I am typing on the new app, there is a big lag in the words. Please please please fix this. This app would be perfect if only it didn't freeze all the time! | Best journaling app ever!!! | I‚Äôve been using DayOne for years.
I love it!
It is easy to keep track of my life and look back over the years to see how far I‚Äôve come.
10/10 recommend and I often give a subscription of this as a gift to family and friends. | I keep about 12 sub journals concurrently with salient topics.  It has become a lifesaver for me as well as an easy way to check on a particular subject.

When I suffered with serious digestive issues, I started one titled Gastrointestinal.  Appointments with my gastroenterologist were very disappointing because he would say, ‚ÄúNo coffee.‚Äù  Then when I read his notes concerning our office visits he would reiterate that the colonoscopies were unremarkable but I was described as labile.
     That really made me angry.  Of course I‚Äôm labile, if you were going through what I‚Äôm dealing with you would be labile, too!   I was actually contemplating how I could leave this plant without it looking like suicide.  It was that bad. 
     I thought, ‚ÄúOK, Buddy, you are about to get some journal entries.‚Äù  I copied about four horrendous days of entries and gave them to the receptionist for him to read before my next appointment.  They became part of my health record so they couldn‚Äôt be ignored.  
    Outcome:  he ordered an upper GI, lower GI and stool sample.  At last I was heard.  Result:  no pancreatic digestive enzymes and I needed supplementation.  I was normal at last after years of agony.
     If you have a chronic condition and are being gaslighted, I urge you to keep a journal on the symptoms and and how they are impacting your life.  Tell your story and be honest and graphic.  Dates and times and related events are important and helpful for diagnosis. | I have been using this app since 2015. I got as a Starbucks app download when they used to do an app of the week. It is hands down the best journaling app. Intuitive layout and clean design. | Layout and ease of use are top notch! | Day One provides space and encouragement for more than a memoir, a diary or a daily journal.

With a provocative prompt for each day and the possibility to include images, it offers space for musing and personalizing life as we live it.

It is beautifully formatted, allowing search, dating and recall to happen easily.  Also, when one runs into a snag (and I have) help is readily available.  I have found it to be clear and effective.

If I could afford it, I would readily choose to update my Day One to premium.  Although I cannot, using Day One on a primary level is a delight this daily user would not miss.

Day One helps me grow!  Thank you to those who created it, maintain it and update it!  I'm beyond grateful. | The free app has great features. Great for journaling or just marking where you were at a time and place. Tagging entries allows you to sort by topics. More features on the paid app, which I‚Äôve upgraded to | I played with the free version for a short while and was satisfied with what I saw.

With that, I purchased the premium, and since have experienced numerous quirks which have caused me to alter my opinion.

Far too frequently I have received ‚Äúare you happy with your experience?‚Äù pop ups as I‚Äôm trying to utilize the app which appear in inconvenient locations (like over something I‚Äôm reading or trying to write)..and if that was annoying enough,..they have seldom worked, or went away, literally blocking my screen!!

Other times,..things I‚Äôve clicked on direct to other places on the app I was not intending to see!

I would not be concerned about any of this had I not paid!

So unless they correct these bugs soon, I‚Äôll be cancelling my subscription and would greatly warn anyone from paying for the premium package. | Changed my life | I have been using Day One for 3 years. This app is honestly so well designed. I tell people about it all the time because I have nothing but good things to say. There are so many features that I love about it! Just so incredibly well designed. I saw that Apple came out with a Journaling app but it doesn‚Äôt even come close to how perfectly developed this app is. 10 stars for me. | This app has more bugs that a dead tree that fell over five years ago. I do not exaggerate when I say that every single action that is possible in Day One is either affected by a significantly noticeable bug or design that is so poor that using the feature is an immense frustration. It stuns me that Apple has put this app on the Editor‚Äôs Choice list. Day One is nothing except absolute frustration. I hate almost everything about it. Name one feature and I will write you a medium length essay about what is wrong with it. At one point I started to write a blog post about the near-endless list of deficiencies and bugs in Day One, but after spending close to 8 hours on the project and not getting even halfway to posting I had to give up. I don‚Äôt have 20+ hours to sink into a blog post about this app. I‚Äôd need to quit my job to find the time needed to document all of the problems. This app is extraordinary in the worst way possible. | I love this app, so easy to use. It certainly give me the opportunity to keep track of my journey. | I‚Äôve struggled for so long to keep a consistent journal routine. I try and I try but never manage to make it longer than a few weeks before I‚Äôve given up on writing. Day One was recommended by a guest on The Tim Ferriss Show, so I decided to check it out. I‚Äôve never loved something so much in my life. Writing has become part of my daily routine. The journal categories allow you to compartmentalize so many things and the fact that you can make notes on your phone to deep dive into later on the PC is just phenomenal. I can take create an entry while walking at the park and make quick notes of a podcast I‚Äôm listening to, then recall and complete the whole idea when I get home. If thoughts start creeping in while laying bed and I‚Äôm having difficulty falling asleep, again I can make a quick entry to dump the idea from my brain, and sleep comfortably knowing I can address the next morning on the pc. There‚Äôs just so much utility with this app. I love it. If I ever become a famous writer, this will be mentioned as one of my favorite and most valuable purchases of all time. | I have successfully logged over 4150 straight days entries, after being very inconsistent with a written journal. Don‚Äôt use many of the very advanced features, because it‚Äôs main function as a journal works so well. Records where you were, the weather and so much more automatically. I keep one journal for each car, and a Journal of ‚Äúthings‚Äù where I photo any warrenty item with the receipt. Has come in very handy! Do miss the widget that showed how many words you entered over the last 50 days, great for finding days you only started an entry. | An outstanding, practical and very meaningful Journal App, thank you. | Omg! I finally found a good journal app, I own a IPhone and recently they added a journal app I haven‚Äôt used to it but I‚Äôve read some of the reviews and wasn‚Äôt convinced but this APP! I didn‚Äôt need to read any reviews! I started using it last year and I fell in love although I wish we could add more photos, I understand I have to pay but other that that it‚Äôs totally worth getting! I love this app. Especially when I‚Äôm out and need to write and don‚Äôt have my journal with me this helps me so much! 

Thank you guys it‚Äôs helped me so much with my mental health love yaüíñ | I write a lot and I tend to have ‚Äújournals‚Äù all over the place.  I decided recently to convert all the many to a single journal.  I was surprised how difficult that small task would end up being.  

Here are the things I really like about Day One -

‚Äî can use across all my devices with ease
‚Äî I am able to copy, forward and even create PDFs of my entries when needed - this was a big let down with the apple journal app‚Ä¶ I started using that until I realized that you cannot copy or export anything once it is in their app. 
‚Äî picture tagging - love that the app automatically goes to the pictures with the same date(s) as the journal entry.  Makes it so simple.
‚Äî hashtag capability - makes this easy to organize my journal in a way my mind works
‚Äîautomatically imports instagram posts (now, we just need it to do the same for facebook - that‚Äôs where I posted a lot of my stuff before) 

Enhancements I would like to see:
‚Äîfacebook post integration
‚Äîbible app integration would be AMAZING | Wonderful, intuitive, simple:  all the features I could want for keeping a Journal and notes on my readings. Free version is great for keeping 1 journal, paid version is well worth the money to create new journals for each and every book I read! | I love this app, so much. But recently when I try to scroll or upload a picture, it freezes. | I‚Äôve owned this app since 2013; and was asked to import from ‚ÄúClassic‚Äù to this one.  This version has a recurring price to it, versus the old one being free forever, and the old one no longer lets me pull up my entries.  

Apple‚Äôs new Journal app doesn‚Äôt have a recurring cost, and hesitant to pay a recurring price for an app that I can‚Äôt keep fully unlocked long term.  I have apps that I have purchased from 2009 still kicking just fine without monthly or yearly subscription fees. | I honestly think it‚Äôs fabulous! I love the audio option. I also love I love the ability to attach easily. I am not a technology person so to able to have to option to be fancy is nice but it‚Äôs also simple. I find it an excellent way to start a book you didn‚Äôt even know you writing! | Journaling was never really my thing. Then one day I happened upon this App and I really love it. This app makes it possible for my private thought to be kept just that Private. I‚Äôm able to add pictures and if I forget to log in I get a reminders. This is a beautiful app and I‚Äôm glad I gave it a try. | This app is trash‚Ä¶. I will not recommend. Go researxh another journal app. This app is not it. Before i renew my subscription, i will be deleting this app for sure. This year. | Nobody wants a subscription to everything. Typically you‚Äôd subscribe to something that gives you consistent new content and value. A lot of these apps expect you to subscribe just to keep using them, and I‚Äôd rather just not. | Selectable font/size. Auto sort by date. Easy typing, *most* markdown support. Slow but sure sync. Collapsible sidebar. Easy journaing, other tools. (E.g., images, reminders, etc.). I use it as my scratchpad too (separate folder from journal; a touch away). Run by Automattic: good folks. E2E encryption. (!important!) | I thought this was a journal just to write how you‚Äôre feeling. But realized I can use this as a common place book. Jotting down movie quotes I like, ideas that come to mind, clipping photos and art, siting life lessons or inspirational quotes, anything really. 

I love this. | Love the features and the design being simple and intuitive. 
It‚Äôs a savior for me. | I have been using this app since the first of the year on the recommendation of my brother. I recently got a shared journal too. However last week I was scammed and lost access to my Apple ID. The scammers locked me out of it. I had to get a new id. I wrote to the support email explaining the situation and got back a template email with links to their FAQs- and said they only give individual support to those who pay. You call that good customer service? I don‚Äôt. I won‚Äôt be using their app again. I heard from the developer but I am still not satisfied. In fact, I am very angry. Any link you provide to offer help is a link to the help page. Option 1 is the Help guides which are links to articles and tutorials. Option 2 is the DayOne forum, but In order to write to the forum you must have an account on Wordpress-something I don‚Äôt care to have- even if the first year is free. The only other option on the page is for premium users, of which I was one but cannot use it because I lost the use of my AppleID. As I said above, I won‚Äôt be back. I found another solution for my needs. Have a nice life! | Not happy | Will have let it lapse after a year of loving it. I am just too poor, living on social security. | Easy to use and fun so far.
A little glitchy at times. | I have been a Day one user since the early days when they were trying to get off of their feet. I became a plus user as a grandfather. Now the app is making me either log out and delete everything and re-login and upload everything or I have to delete the app and reinstall it for it to notice that I‚Äôm a plus user. I tried to write customer service but they told me I am not a premium user I am a free user so there‚Äôs not much help for me. I guess I will  have to download everything and just leave Day One. that‚Äôs the problem with putting your life online. If a company changes something then It could adversely affect you. | Love this app a great way for me to type out anything on my chest and helps me journal better and more | One Day is the best for journaling!  I love the fact that you can attach photos!  I was in a dark place in life and was told to journal my thoughts before bed each day but was too lazy actually write on paper ( True Statement üôÉ) BUT with One Day you can type out your thoughts and it‚Äôs faster, easier, on your device to ensure you don‚Äôt have to keep up with a journal, and it has helped me tremendously! | I had a very, very good run going several years ago. For some reason, my 144 days of diary entries disappeared one day, and I couldn‚Äôt do anything to restore them.

This broke a habit I had fought hard to pick up. I had brainstorming going on in some of those 144 entries‚Äîstory ideas I wanted to revisit and expand on. They‚Äôre long gone now, and I‚Äôm just now getting over the anger, frustration, and sadness of all my lost material.

That being said, I can‚Äôt rate this app less than three stars. It‚Äôs still a neat little app. | the version without premium is still very good | The latest update with the shared journal feature is fantastic! However, I've noticed a limitation that affects its usability for me. Currently, they're only able to comment, leaving us to work on the journal separately rather than collaboratively. Adding the option for friends to edit entries would greatly enhance our ability to work on the journal together. Thank you for considering this feature addition! | I‚Äôve been a day one user for three years and it‚Äôs still the best app for the job. I love how easily it sinks across my devices. It also improves your typing and grammar but you don‚Äôt even work at it, you just get on the habit over time. Overall you should get this app because it‚Äôs a helpful app that gets me to sleep every night and brings myself up looking at the good parts of my day. | Best journal out there. Give it a shot. | This app has helped me reshape my life. Day One has amazing features that make journaling something I look forward to every day, rather than feeling like a chore.

title: Miles - Travel, Shop, Get Cash
description:
Miles is a universal rewards app that gives anyone the ability to earn miles automatically for all modes of transportation. The Miles app goes beyond airline miles, credit card points, or regular reward programs. We reward you with miles, our version of points, for any way you get from point A to point B. Whether you drive, walk, bike, or ride the train, we'll reward you miles for each mile traveled. For greener forms of travel, or healthier forms. you will be rewarded even further. 

You have the flexibility to redeem the miles you've earned for exclusive rewards, gift cards, top deals, credit, discounts, and savings from amazing brands such as HP, Garmin, Pandora, Chewy, Home Chef, Buffalo Wild Wings, Wayfair, Sam's Club, Booking.com, and many more. Get rewarded with the best deals and savings from our popular brand partners that can't be found anywhere else.

Additionally, your miles can be used to enter gift card and product raffles from exciting brands, or you can donate them to charities to help feed the hungry, contribute to cancer foundations, and more.

We've created a frequent flyer program for all transportation encompassing your daily commute and travel. Miles delivers value and savings for every mile traveled, across every mode of travel, anywhere in the world. Whether by car (as a driver or passenger), train, subway, bus, boat, bicycle, or by walking, the Miles app effortlessly rewards your travel - regardless of where your journey takes you.

Miles rewards you for your daily travel by offering various activity challenges that include walking, running, or biking to earn special Amazon.com gift cards. Make every mile traveled count and get rewarded for taking more sustainable modes of transportation. Download Miles today to start getting rewarded and save money!

Here's how it works:

1. Download the app
2. Register an account
3. Set Location Services to Always

After that, just log in occasionally to claim your miles. 

There are also plenty of ways to earn bonus miles in the app!
2x miles for greener travel
3x miles for healthier travel
Special promo codes

Redeem your miles for rewards, gift cards, raffles:
The Miles app will keep track of all your miles and you can redeem exclusive rewards using those miles in the app. You can use the rewards instantly or at a later date. You will find rewards that can be used online or at a physical location from merchants using exclusive promo codes, coupon codes, links, QR codes, or barcodes across the following categories:

‚Ä¢ Retail
‚Ä¢ Shopping
‚Ä¢ Dining
‚Ä¢ Groceries
‚Ä¢ Household
‚Ä¢ Health and Beauty
‚Ä¢ Electronics
‚Ä¢ Travel
‚Ä¢ Kids
‚Ä¢ Auto
‚Ä¢ Other

Buzz about Miles:
"Finally there's a way to get recognized for all the travel you do ‚Äî even if it's just a walk around the corner. It adds up." - Mashable

"Miles gives you reward miles for almost everything" - TechCrunch

"It's a great way of adding value to the travel you otherwise wouldn't be rewarded for." - The Points Guy

Why users love the Miles app:
"I spend nothing to earn miles and redeem them for products I love. Simple and easy to use." - Paula T.

"Miles is for everyone - doesn't matter if you take a transit, drive, use rideshare, bike or simply walk." - Bank P.

Thanks for being a Miles user! Need help? Reach us at support@getmiles.com.

App Privacy Policy:
https://www.getmiles.com/mobile-privacy

App Terms of Use: 
https://www.getmiles.com/mobile-tos
releaseNotes:
In this version:
‚Ä¢ Fixes and enhancements

In other recent releases:
‚Ä¢ Introducing 'Survey & Earn'. Take surveys to earn hundreds of miles! New surveys, everyday!
‚Ä¢ Tag your trips with a purpose for extra bonus miles!

Let us know your feedback! Love the improvements and love the app? Rate us! Your feedback helps us go the extra Mile(s). Happy Earning and Redeeming!

title: Road Trip Planner Viewer
description:
RTP Viewer allows you to view Road Trip Planner files on your Apple device.¬† Create and edit your files with Road Trip Planner for iOS or OS X, and then anyone can view the files with this app. 

Road Trip Planner Viewer is free, does not require any subscription and respects your privacy by not collecting any of your data.

While you can edit the files with this app, you cannot save your edits.  Our iOS app Road Trip Planner at the App Store is virtually identical to this app and allows you to save your edits. ¬†

Contact us for more information or bug reports.

Multiple sample files are available, including an informative Route 66 sample file.

For more info on Road Trip Planner tap or click the Support URL.
releaseNotes: Bug fixes and interface enhancements.
reviews:

title: AccuWeather: Weather Alerts
description:
AccuWeather‚Äôs trusted free weather forecast app is at your fingertips

Internationally recognized by the World Meteorological Organization with awards making AccuWeather one of the best weather apps:
‚ÄúBest User Interface and Data Representation‚Äù
‚ÄúBest Weather Warnings‚Äù
‚ÄúBest Design and Presentation of Information, User-Friendliness; Access and Customization‚Äù 


Weather Forecasts You Can Depend On

-  Live weather forecasts - including MinuteCast¬Æ forecasts for Minute by Minute¬Æ precipitation updates
-  Local weather - including severe weather alerts, temperature, precipitation, and allergy outlooks for your day 
-  WinterCast‚Ñ¢: winter weather forecasts - giving you advanced warnings of snowfall probabilities and accumulation
-  Daily forecasts - include rain probability, cloud coverage, wind, live radar, air quality index, snowfall, and even UV index
-  Advanced weather radar - gives you up to the minute views of storm tracking, snow, rain, ice, temperature changes, and much more
-  RealFeel¬Æ & RealFeel Shade Temperature‚Ñ¢ technology - helping you get a better sense of how the weather actually feels

Live weather with Weather Alerts

The AccuWeather forecasting and severe weather alerts you know and trust. From local weather updates to WinterCast snow alerts, get the weather forecast you can rely on. With in-depth weather news, forecast updates, free weather alerts, plus today‚Äôs forecast and much more. Find out what makes AccuWeather the best as a trusted, free weather app. It‚Äôs the weather tracker you need!

Advanced Weather Radar
Setting the standard for free weather radar:
-  The accurate weather radar you know from AccuWeather
-  Weather watches and warnings for your local area
-  RealVue‚Ñ¢ and Enhanced RealVue‚Ñ¢ satellite imagery looking at weather patterns from space
-  Weather radar views for water vapor, rainfall, sustained winds, and even storm surges
-  Timely tropical storm radar tracking to see where and when storms might hit
-  Current conditions maps shows temperature and RealFeel in and around your area
-  5-day precipitation outlook to see what rain, snow, and ice could be in your area
-  24-hour snowfall forecast shows detailed maps with snow accumulation and winter weather
-  Temperature contour maps show how the temperature will change over the next day

For over 10 years, the AccuWeather app has brought you the weather

Whether you're on the East Coast, Pacific Northwest, Southern Coast, or West Coast this free weather app can show you snow, wind, cold, rain and more! Stay prepared with our local weather and live forecasts. From extreme humidity, severe storms, allergy info, air quality index, snow storms, and ice alerts, get live updates that matter to you. Local weather forecasts are the AccuWeather specialty. 

Our weather tracker & live radar gives you Superior Accuracy‚Ñ¢

Severe weather warnings, today‚Äôs temperature, free weather radar maps & more!

-  Get local forecasts and personalize the app depending on where you are in the world
-  Go beyond today‚Äôs weather and look 45 days ahead to ensure that you‚Äôre prepared for any weather
-  Try the MinuteCast feature for the most up to date live Minute by Minute weather forecast
-  Weather alerts, storm alerts, and more! Get trending videos from AccuWeather‚Äôs dedicated news team
-  Weather forecasting your way - a weather tracker that can filter and customize according to your preferences

Download the AccuWeather app today for free and enjoy award-winning Superior Accuracy in weather forecasting on your iPhone, Apple Watch, or other Apple device. More than just a daily forecast, try the best weather app and get more from your forecast.
releaseNotes: In our effort to become your ideal weather app, we fixed a few bugs and optimized performance to give you an even more seamless experience.
reviews:
Still the best weather app. | We need better Radar options please, 24 hr and 72, and a way to slow down the 5 day would be wonderful.. and then it would be 5 ‚≠êÔ∏è | We received a subscription renewal notice with no way of selecting how to cancel the subscription. we find this to be confusing if not deceiving. | This app is never right | It‚Äôs pretty accurate better than weather bug | I don‚Äôt care how accurate it is.  Any time you want to look at something there is a 3-5s delay while an add is forced on you.  Easily the worst Ad experience with a free app.  Much easier to just have a shortcut to the website if AccuWeather is that important.  

Also‚Ä¶$4 per month to get rid of Ads?  That is insane.  Maybe a one time $4 fee, but $48 per year to not have ads on a weather app?  Who checks weather often enough to justify that?

I personally won‚Äôt use app or website just based on principle. | Weather prediction today is worse than it was 20 years ago! And now we have to watch ads to get inaccurate data?! What a joke, weather prediction is terrible! | Dark mode location search doesn‚Äôt work right.  Black text with a black background is hard to see. | Not the greatest you vacant change locations  otherwise it‚Äôs all right | I purchased Premium years ago, then it merged with standard ..no free for all with Ads.  Pay again?  No, I don't like feeling swindled and waiting for ads to load when I'm working in the field. Solid product but prefer features on other apps | I‚Äôve had this app for years. I‚Äôm pretty sure most of these weather apps pull from the same resources, so I don‚Äôt think there is really much I can comment on with regard to accuracy. The layout is intuitive, and it works for me. My only complaint, which must be recent, has to do with night (dark) mode - one of the display choices.  I‚Äôm unable to see the text when searching for locations when the app is in dark mode. The backgrounded is grey, but for some reason the font color turns black when I try to search for new locations. It‚Äôs literally impossible to see the names of the locations. I hope the developers are aware of the glitch, and fix it in the next update. | I have used Accuweather for several years now, and it has always been my favorite weather app. However I started having issues with it in early 2024. Have deleted and reinstalled it with no resolution. I really don‚Äôt want to find another app, but if I can‚Äôt figure out why it won‚Äôt work, I will have to find a new weather app. üò¢
Even with my location services on, it won‚Äôt find my location, and it won‚Äôt allow me to search for other areas, like where my son is in college.  Worked fine until the latest update. | Largely inaccurate like all the other apps. The radar is only a guess‚Äîit changes drastically as the current time approaches. Same for the forecast‚Äîtypically only good for the same day. After that it simply goes by historical average. | Ever since the last couple of updates, it seems to me that it takes longer to load than before. Has anyone else brought this up? | Minute cast says no rain for 120 minutes. It's storming like crazy currently. Fail. Update- once again the widget is just a blank white square. Uninstalled and installed back. Same issue. It‚Äôs upsetting to pay to be a ‚Äúpremium member‚Äù and this happens every other month. Advise getting a different app. | Used to be a good app. Now they keep locking features behind more layers of pay walls. Find something else that isn‚Äôt trying to take you for as much money as possible. | Easy and accurate | App stopped working a couple updates ago and now no longer finds new places. Useless | Where did the widget go? | My local weather reports no rain in the last 24 hours. Well, the city center was flooded with a foot deep problem last nite around 8pm. Your app took note and continued to give probability figures that appear exactly as are listed. I‚Äôll rely on this information. Thanks for your hard work in supplying info. 
One suggestion.  With the radical changes in weather patterns, it would be great to access an anual graph of conditions ( temp and rainfall) going back a few years. Just to observe any trends to anticipate. | Then you have to watch a commercial.  I‚Äôve used the app for over 10 years and it‚Äôs just gotten progressively worse.  The final straw was requiring me to view a commercial to see the hourly forecast.  Deleted the app right there and got a different weather app. | Do not depend on this app if you need to really know whether or not you will get 6‚Äù of snow or a trace. Do not depend on this app to tell you if it is really going to freeze hard or stay at 35F during the night. A weather rock is about as good- if it‚Äôs wet it‚Äôs raining. | Update-2 - 03/25/24. The app is still great, but I‚Äôve lowered my 5 star rating due to AccuWeather‚Äôs sharp pricing practices. Features previously included in the Premium package have been ever-so-slightly changed / ‚Äúimproved‚Äù, and then used to create a Premium-Plus pay level. AccuWeather‚Äôs statement that the information is still available in chart format is weak since AccuWeather‚Äôs graph format is so intuitively easy to read and comprehend, versus the chart format‚Äôs numbers and percentages only. Further, for anyone who has multiple devices on competing operating systems must pay double - even though registered under the same email address. Many apps are set up to allow pay-once, use on ‚Äúx‚Äù number of multiple devices. If you are new to AccuWeather, think long and hard before committing to pay for the service. Their sharp business practices will likely continue since they‚Äôve shown a proclivity of trying to wring more money out of existing users. UPDATE - 07/19/20. New interface - love it. Clean, intuitive, still information rich, and controls simplified to get you where you want quickly. Good job Accuweather. Team Now, don‚Äôt sell out to Weather Channel/IBM like so many others have. OLDER: I‚Äôve been a user of AccuWeather for several years, both the desktop version and the mobile versions (Android and iPhone) and it is brilliantly done. There is depth of information for the weather geek, simple to read and understand screens for the quick forecast, and much in between. Their Minute forecast for precipitation start/stop for the upcoming 120 minutes is spot on -- amazingly accurate for your exact location. Highly recommend it. | My other weather apps are now my go-to apps. | Worthless | Up to date information. Great features! | App is supposed to be getting better but as changes are made things are slowing down.  Now future radar seems to have disappeared. 

Given my complains, why would I subscribe? | The weather fluctuates so much with this app. The radar was the best out there until they started charging for future radar. | Can‚Äôt see forecast on radar. App is essentially worthless now. I‚Äôll go back to the Weather Channel. | Radar setting is set to "BOTH", so it should show PAST radar and FUTURE radar. The only thing it shows is the PAST up until NOW. No future radar since latest update. Used this app for years. Might be time to find another app if this is how it's going to be. | Looks like the last update removed the forward looking radar. I don‚Äôt care what already happened, I was there when it happened. I like seeing the forecasted radar but if you removed that, I‚Äôll go somewhere else. | For years this was my go-to app for weather. But one of the last updates took away future radar. What's the point in using this now? I want to know what's going to happen - not what's in the past. And a note to the developer: I would gladly pay for this app if it were a 1-time thing & not a subscription. | Seriously, my iPhone widgets are frequently broken. Their support says they know and just wait for another update. It‚Äôs ridiculous that whatever is in your program brakes whenever iOS makes an update. I‚Äôm not going to pay an additional $5 for it. | Search results aren't working. No matter what city I type in or zip code, it returns "no results found".

*update* This issue still hasn't resolved even after uninstalling / reinstalling, and waiting for an update that fixes or at least a response to the issue. I'm uninstalling the app and canceling my subscription. You should look at Windy as the model for community involvement. | I noticed the app no longer forecasts future radar unless premium is elected. I live in the Midwest and knowing where heavy weather is moving in from is extremely important. Tornados can be fatal.

Your organization is a greedy abomination, putting money above the safety of the average citizen. I‚Äùll find another weather app that is run by honest folks. Hope you go out of business. | Your radar now only goes up to the present time. It use to go to about an hour past, which showed where the weather was going to be in the future. What happened?

Thank you,
Mike King | This use to be a great app and I used it frequently, however, now you have decided that you want money in order to get a decent app that will let me know what the weather is. I noticed today now the reader doesn‚Äôt give me the future radar only the past. I will not pay you $4.00 dollars a month to get the weather when I can get it free on tv. I guess I will have to delete this app as I cannot afford to pay you in order to see what is happening in my neighborhood. | After update widget doesn‚Äôt work! | Slow to load, less than information unless you pay for premium, and ads. | If anybody likes full screen pop up ads when selecting options from the home page, this is the app for you. | I was just looking for a decent, free weather app. This wasn‚Äôt that! The app was set to the correct location and said ZERO chance of rain but my friend and I were being held hostage in a tack room while it poured rain and hailed! We‚Äôd just turned horses out and had to scramble to bring the now frantic animals back in. Uninstalled!!! | Your app is Jicky at best. Whenever I need to know what the weather is doing your Jicky app always freezes and places my family and my life in jeopardy. I have deleted your app and I hope that maybe somebody with your organization will fix it before you kill someone. | When I could just go online or get a different app that shows me the same stuff + surf for free | I think it‚Äôs disgusting how much you raised the price of this app. Absolute corporate greed. So disgusted that I‚Äôm deleting the app off my phone. | AccuWeather would be my go-to app because it is much more accurate than Apple's Weather app, but it doesn't work with my Apple Watch.  I can't imagine why! | I like this app, been using it for years now. | I used to love your AccuWeather App! Then you changed the hourly forecast to a line graph! | Updates to an app or its navigation dynamics are usually helpful.  The recent revisions to your app have made me go searching for an app easier to use.  Disappointing. | Not sure what is up with this app, but it‚Äôs worse than the weatherman lately. It‚Äôs literally pouring outside. The Apple app says rain for 33 min and AccuWeather says no rain. | Upgrade screen needs an X to close. Have to close app to use.

title: T Life (T-Mobile Tuesdays)
description:
Meet T Life, the new app that brings together your connected world‚Äîand the home of T-Mobile Tuesdays and Magenta Status.

Magenta Status:
Premium benefits. Brands you love. Get your VIP vibes.
-No hoops to jump through.  Status from day one.
-15% off all Hilton brands and an upgrade to Hilton Honors Silver.
- Hassle-free rental car returns with free refueling at Dollar Rental.
-25% off concert tickets nationwide
-And so much more.

T-Mobile Tuesdays:
Get free stuff and exclusive perks, just for being a customer.
-Now with even more thankings every Tuesday
- Score deals every Tuesday from popular brands for food, fashion, entertainment, and essentials.
- Enjoy weekly savings on fuel and earn cash back on dining.
- Save on hotels, car rentals, and amusement parks.
- Enter for a chance to win epic prizes.



T-Mobile Home Internet:
- Set up your Wi-Fi Gateway.
- View your network connection status, monitor signal strength, and if your connection needs a boost, find the ideal gateway location using the interactive placement assistant.
- Manage and monitor all your connected devices, including setting screen-time limits.

SyncUP KIDS‚Ñ¢ Watch:
- See and set up step goals.
- Get virtual boundary, low battery, and turned-off alerts, and enable School Mode.

App is mostly a waste of time. | The Tuesdays section hasn‚Äôt worked since the launch of this app. | I don‚Äôt understand the point of this new app, bring back t-mobile Tuesdays | This app, and apparently all other T-Mobile apps, are either new or have been recently upgraded, and they will not work with anything earlier than iOS 16.0. So, if you‚Äôre using an older model iPad or phone, you are out of luck. The older apps will not work, and you‚Äôll get instructions to upgrade. However, when you download the newer version, you‚Äôll repeatedly be instructed to download the app again. It‚Äôs hard to believe that no one at T-Mobile thought about this before abandoning the earlier versions of the apps, which had been working just fine. | Used to work great before it became t-life. Now it‚Äôs nothing but problems.

title: Avis - Car Rental
description:
Need to rent a car on the go? The Avis Car Rental app has you covered. Exclusive to the Avis app, Avis Preferred members gain access to all features as well as exchanging or upgrading your car upon arriving at the rental location, quickly returning your car, locking and unlocking your car and more real-time rental features. Find your nearest Avis Car Rental locations, hours of operation, addresses and phone numbers at any time.

Avis Preferred members can also earn points by opting in upon check out. With the Avis app, you can make, modify or cancel reservations 24/7. Using the Avis app will also provide access to getting a receipt, viewing and reviewing past rentals and contacting Roadside Assistance for immediate help.

By tapping the Install button or by downloading the Avis App published by Avis Rent A Car System LLC, you consent to the installation of the Avis App and to its future updates and upgrades. You can withdraw your consent at any time by uninstalling the app. To request assistance with the removal or disabling of the Avis App, please contact us.

You acknowledge and understand and agree that the Avis App (including any updates or upgrades) may cause your device to automatically communicate with Avis‚Äô servers to deliver the functionality described above and to record location-based information and usage metrics, (ii) affect app-related preferences or data stored in your device, and (iii) collect personal information as set out in our Privacy Notice at https://www.avis.com/privacy and in the Avis App Terms of Use at https://www.avis.com/mobiletou. The Avis App delivers push notifications. You may turn push notifications off in the ‚ÄúPreferences‚Äù tab.

Contact us at:
avis.com/mobilefeedback
Or contact us at 
Avis Rent A Car System LLC
Phone: 1-800-352-7900
Email: custserv@avis.com
Write: P.O. Box 699000
Tulsa, OK 74169-900

title: Carnival HUB
description:
Use the Carnival HUB app to share your cruise countdown with friends, then explore and book shore excursions, spa treatments, drink packages and more. When the time comes, you may also check-in and obtain your boarding documents.

As you board your ship, connect to Carnival‚Äôs Wi-Fi to view what‚Äôs happening, weather, dining menus and more! Onboard internet purchase is NOT required to use the Carnival HUB app.

Before your cruise:
‚Ä¢   Load up on excursions, drink packages, spa treatments and more
‚Ä¢   Check-in and prepare your boarding documents
‚Ä¢   Share your cruise countdown with friends and family

Once on board:
‚Ä¢   Chat to connect with family and friends on board. (Low, flat activation fee applies.)
‚Ä¢   Day-by-day schedule of hundreds of onboard events
‚Ä¢   Choose your favorite events and get reminders
‚Ä¢   Open times of food and drinks venues
‚Ä¢   Daily restaurant menus
‚Ä¢   Searchable deck plans with key areas highlighted
‚Ä¢   Itinerary details, including current ship time, arrival/departure times for upcoming ports of call  
‚Ä¢   Real-time information on guests‚Äô current Sail & Sign shipboard account balance
‚Ä¢   Weather for each day of your sailing
‚Ä¢   Find information like dining attire easily
‚Ä¢   Ability to view and purchase shore excursions
‚Ä¢   Order food and beverages for delivery almost anywhere on board (Fees apply.)
‚Ä¢   Check into a virtual queue and skip the line! We'll simply notify you when it's your turn

Go ahead. Download it now. Your vacation deserves it.
