I was aboard the carnival freedom 3/21-3/25. Firstly I had the worst server in the dining room who literally rolled her eyes at me when I was asking about food options for my 10 month old daughter.  So I complained to the person in charge in the dining room and he said he would handle it and get us a different table for the next night well then I guess that server was reprimanded and then proceeded to ask me about the issues and make things very awkward for my family and myself.  

Secondly the food options other than the man dining room for dinner were limited.  Everything closed around 3ish everyday and didn‚Äôt open again accept the buffet.

After this experience there were no food places opened until late. And the remainder of the trip the entire back of the ship was closed including the track the basket ball hoops the mini golf annd  adults only pool and hot tubs. 

Proceed to Sunday trying to make the best of the trip and none of the arcade ticket machines were working and it took over 3 hours to get someone to help us get the machine fixed so my daughter could get her prizes.

. title: Grab: Taxi Ride, Food Delivery
description:
Get everything you need with Grab ‚Äî the leading ride-hailing, taxi, food delivery, and grocery app in  Southeast Asia.


We offer essential everyday services to over 670 million people across Singapore, Indonesia, Malaysia, Thailand, Philippines, Vietnam, Cambodia, and Myanmar. 


Grab offers various ride-hailing options, including 4-wheel and 2-wheel rides, and taxi booking. There‚Äôs also a diverse range of services including food order delivery from restaurants, prompt package delivery, and groceries from supermarkets, making it a leading delivery platform. 


From ride-hailing to food and grocery delivery, Grab is your one-stop app for all your everyday needs in Southeast Asia.


Book a ride for any occasion and budget
Order a ride on Grab, the top ride-hailing and taxi app in Southeast Asia. Choose from a variety of transport modes, including cars, motorbikes, and buses, and get matched with a professional driver in minutes.


Food delivery for any craving
GrabFood: a leading food delivery app that allows you to easily order food from your favourite restaurants and get it delivered to your doorstep, making it convenient and hassle-free 


Conveniently order food and groceries for delivery
GrabMart is a convenient food delivery app that allows you to order groceries and handpicked fresh produce from your favourite supermarket. 




Secure and seamless cashless payments
GrabPay: A safe and secure mobile wallet where you can easily pay for Grab services, such as food and grocery delivery and taxis, as well as at local merchants 


Reliable on-demand package delivery
GrabExpress: Order affordable, fast, and reliable courier service with insurance for your items


Rewards for using Grab
GrabRewards: Order food, ride and earn reward points for every dollar you spend and use them to redeem deals in the GrabRewards catalog


Grab is the only ride-hailing and food-delivery app you need. Whether you are searching for a taxi app, express food delivery, or grocery delivery, Grab has got you covered.


In addition to our renowned ride-hailing, taxi, and food delivery services, we also strive to promote economic empowerment for everyone in the region. We provide financial services such as wealth management, lending, cashless payments, and insurance.


Find out more about us at www.grab.com.
Grab offers the ability for users to receive personalized targeted advertising, offers, and updates from Grab and its partners and communications/advertising from certain third-party apps based on activity on your devices. Users may exercise opt-out choices under the Privacy and Consent Management sections within Settings within the app. For further details, you may refer to our Privacy Policy at www.grab.com/privacy.
releaseNotes:
Did you know that a bee's wings beat 190 times a second? That's 11,400 times a minute! Impressive, isn't it?

But don't think all bugs are impressive. The only thing app bugs do is interfere with our experience. That's why our engineers beat them all the time.

Update to 5.299 now to get the bee-tter version of Grab app.

I have tried numerous times over multiple hours, and it declines to use my card saying ‚Äúpayment unsuccessful, try again later‚Äù. 

As a result of this, I can‚Äôt order rides or food.

title: Upside: Cash Back - Gas & Food
description:
Unlock Cash Back with the free Upside App!




Upside gets you cash back on daily essentials like gas, groceries, and dining. It's designed to reward you for simply being yourself, allowing you to indulge in more of what you love. With over 50,000 participating gas stations, grocery stores, and restaurants, cash back opportunities are always just around the corner. 




Users earn an average of 8% cash back on groceries and dining‚Äîthat‚Äôs on TOP of your current credit card rewards - even on debit card purchases!




And yes ‚Äî it‚Äôs real cash back. No confusing rewards, points, or credits. Just actual money you can transfer straight to your bank account or PayPal. You can also cash out your earnings as an e-gift card to retailers you love, like Amazon, Walmart, and so many more.
 


With Upside, you can earn up to 25¬¢/gal cash back on gas, up to 45% back at restaurants, and up to 30% back at grocery stores. These earnings add up quickly ‚Äî frequent users earn an average of $340 per year just for adding Upside to their normal routine. 





HOW IT WORKS
(1) Claim your offer through the app
(2) Pay as usual with any credit or debit card
(3) Either Check In, or scan receipts
(4) Cash out whenever you want!




Here are a few places where you can earn cash back with Upside: 




GAS
Phillips 66, Shell, Valero, Circle K, Marathon, Chevron, Exxon, Mobil, TA, 7-Eleven, Love‚Äôs, BP, Casey‚Äôs, Sunoco, and more






RESTAURANTS
Papa John‚Äôs, Dairy Queen, Domino's, Marco's, Arby's, Checkers, KFC, Popeyes, Rally's
Taco Bell, Primanti Bros, Wendy‚Äôs, and more






GROCERY STORES
Cardenas, Carlie C's, Coborn's, Gelson's, Piggly Wiggly, Price Chopper, Save A Lot, Schnucks, Fresh Foods IGA, Geissler's, Acme, and more




Download Upside to earn cash back on your essentials.
releaseNotes: We've been hard at work to help you earn the smart way. Fixed some bugs and added even more places where you can earn cash back.
reviews:
I really enjoy using Upside. It makes shopping more fun and you get bonus points to go towards gift cards and benefits. What an awesome app; everybody should try it! | The app works most of the time. McDonald‚Äôs has problems and will not let me post receipts. I am frequently given the loading screen after pressing submit receipt only for it to go back to the receipt photo I just submitted on an endless loop. Needless to say, I‚Äôll be eating elsewhere. Hope McDonald‚Äôs gets on top of that. | Updated review. The developer sent a response with a link that I can use to report missing cash back - not mentioned anywhere in my original review. There is a buried link on down their page that gives the same instructions I‚Äôve been following to try to get logged back in‚Ä¶ changing the password. I‚Äôve literally done that process a dozen times and still nothing. Come on folks. I‚Äôd better!!
‚Äî
This is a good app, and I love the idea of cash back. It‚Äôs relatively simple to operate and the cash back methods are pretty straightforward. However, it seems that every time the app upgrades, there is a MAJOR problem getting back into the newer version. The upgrades tends to logout the user (me) and logging back in just doesn‚Äôt happen. I‚Äôve been trying for two days now and it will NOT accept me email or password. There is a link to have them email me a link to reset the password, but even that often does not work, and when it does work, I never receive an email link. And, yes, I‚Äôve checked my junk folder. There is simply no response. Experience with this app has taught me to wait for them to issue an update to the newest version‚Ä¶ typically within a week. This sort of annoyance should be worked out BEFORE the release. | Super easy to use at places I go to all of the time. | The extra savings is great. Love that groceries and restaurants use it too | Earned $120 to Amazon! Great app especially if you are on the road a lot! | So far I‚Äôve had this app on my phone for about a year and a half now and over half of the gas purchases that I made with this app have failed for no reason at all and I‚Äôve used the same card at the same gas pumps in sometimes you get credit, and sometimes you don‚Äôt and they never give you a reason as why you didn‚Äôt receive credit, it just says, expired, expired so I‚Äôm giving this app three star they need to fix the bugs on this app. I‚Äôm about to do a cash out on it if I don‚Äôt receive anything, I‚Äôm gonna give this app one star so far it‚Äôs not really worth it. | In this day and age it is really good to get something back on something I use every day. Thus is why I gave upside only 3 stars. | THIS APP DORS NOT HAVE A SECTUON FOR GROCERIES!  Had and restaurants, but NOT GROCERIES!  If I am wrong please explain her after a year of using it there is no GROCERY option! | Earn cash back on something we have to spend $$ on anyway. | I love that I get kick backs on gas. We mow, so it helps out so much. I only wish it helped with all gas stations. | I love the choice of rewards upside gives. | My app hasn‚Äôt been working for over 3 months | ùë®ùíëùíëùíçùíö ùëºùíëùíîùíäùíÖùíÜ ùë∑ùíìùíêùíéùíê ùë™ùíêùíÖùíÜ ‚Äúùëµùë®ùëªùüêùüêùüêùüêùüï‚Äù ùíòùíâùíäùíçùíÜ ùíîùíäùíàùíèùíñùíë ùíïùíê ùíàùíÜùíï $ùüìùüé. It does what it says it does. I've saved $40 on gas so far, and this app is free. So that's very nice. But it's a very frustrating app to use. The app works fine until it's time to actually prove to it that you filled up at the gas station with the offer you ‚Äúclaimed‚Äù. The app instructs you to tap a button that doesn't exist on the screen in order to ‚Äúarrive" at the gas station. So I looked it up online and people say you have to log out and log back in. Then it prompts you with the option to "upload receipt‚Äù which is what I do. But now the scanning technology which scans your receipt on the app doesn't work anymore! So I have to upload a pic instead. 
Logging out and logging back in after you've claimed your offer is what makes it eventually work, but not every time. Sometimes I have to wait a few hours after I've completed the transaction before logging out and logging back in will prompt the option to "upload receipt", which appears to be the only way I can prove to Upside I completed the transaction. 
It always works eventually, and I've saved $40 so far so that really is nice, but the app is buggy and has these issues. I really hope they fix it, it would be a dream to have this app finally just be smooth throughout the whole experience. But as of now it is a chore, they do make you work a bit for the savings. | You scammers, you want my credit card information?????? For what?????
If I upload a receipt is not enough????
And if you make charges to my credit card then who‚Äôs fault?????  Me because I gave you my information.

This is a real scam | Who doesn‚Äôt love saving money? You can‚Äôt lose with this app. Not only are you saving money from groceries and gas purchases you are going to make anyway, you are getting free money in cash back after those purchases are processed through the app. I‚Äôve saved hundreds of dollars and only wished I had started using this app earlier. It‚Äôs the one thing that isn‚Äôt too good to be true. | Love love this app | Can‚Äôt even cash out. Asks me to verify a link in my email to cash out. I click the link and it takes me to the App Store to download the app even though it‚Äôs already installed. No work around. | It won‚Äôt even let me log in to use üòí everytime I tried to use a different way to set up and account it wouldn‚Äôt get past that screen, or it would say I‚Äôve already got an email set up. | It never accepts when I pay then it expires and I don‚Äôt get the cash back | I enjoy the app, I wish it worked more gas stations. | I have had upside for about a year maybe more. At first it was ok now and then I would get a little bit of cash back. Maybe a couple bucks once in a while it would say there was an issue with my receipt. I didn‚Äôt pay it much attention but now every time I scan a receipt it takes forever to process then once it does process it gets rejected saying there was an issue found with my receipt. It either say date didn‚Äôt match or station didn‚Äôt match. I have a citgo card so that‚Äôs the only station I go to and I always scan my receipt right at the pump as soon as I am done pumping my gas. Waste of time. Not recommended. | Absolutely love this app | I really didn‚Äôt think this app was legit until I started using the app and man was I wrong it really does help you save and put money aside for rainy days I would recommend this app to anyone and everyone‚Ä¶ | Been using this app since 2018. Love it | Started out good. I don‚Äôt know if I got too many users, more than it could handle, but suddenly prices are not updated and the app is super glitchy. definitely done driving out of my way based on what the app says because it‚Äôs been wrong more than right lately, and customer service is non existent | App requires approval from the gas station which gets denied almost half the time. I highly suggest it. | Upside you guys rock I actually get cash back for the gallons I pay at gas stations I love it | Not sure what‚Äôs going on but my last 4 submissions now say expired. 

I cashed out once for $10. Now I see nothing more than a penny or two per gallon. 

Meanwhile,  they‚Äôve sold my info to God knows who.
Don‚Äôt fool yourself. Your info is a commodity to them | Great app I‚Äôm cashing out at $59 due to the fact that I lost $54 credit prior and had to re enroll on a new account. | I use this app for gas and convenience stores and I like it.  I keep seeing groceries as a category in your ads, but even after updating it never appears on my app.  FRUSTRATING!! | New user, cannot add payment info. 
Cannot reach anyone from support. | I‚Äôve tried over FOUR times to submit on their HELP mobile contact, because I did not receive my $29 IHOP digital coupon. title: Match and Meet - Dating app
description:
Match&Meet is a unique dating application where you can chat with like-minded people in a special chat that instantly translates messages into your native language.

Take a short psychological test and find out your best match. Find attractive people close to you who share the same interests, and get to know them before meeting in real life. Our free dating app will help you communicate without boundaries and find the right match online. Join thousands of single people looking for a real relationship. 

3 Reasons to download the Match&Meet app:

1. Meet interesting users nearby
2. Explore people according to interests before dating online
3. Find the right match for yourself

What else can you do with Match&Meet?

1. View photos, browse through photo albums
2. Like and comment on the best photos
3. Add the most interesting profiles to your favorites
4. Translate messages into your native language and understand all chats
5. Reply to all messages in a polite and friendly way

Looking to make new friends in your city?

Find new friends in your city to chat online, meet in person, and have a great time! Match&Meet  is available in the most cosmopolitan cities around the world, with a large community of singles looking for a date or relationship.

How to use the Match&Meet app?

- Just download the Match&Meet app on your mobile phone or tablet
- Start chatting in real-time right now

Welcome to Match&Meet! A fascinating world of real live communication!

Discover a new form of online dating without any language barriers. Match&Meet will help you find the best matches according to your location, interests, and preferences. Start meaningful relationships with nearby people and chat before meeting. 

Match&Meet is an innovative dating app that allows you to meet new people without any limits! Explore your matches anywhere in the world, and communicate in any language.

Online dating made simple.

Connect with relevant users who share the same interests as you, understand them in any language, and enjoy chat with your matches. Match&Meet provides a unique way to get to know fellow singles. Start chatting with people who share the same interests and locations as you!

User protection

We strictly prohibit all forms of profanity, nudity, and obscenity. Match&Meet users can report bad behavior at any time by contacting us at support@corp.loka.world.

Match&Meet is free to download. If you want to get the most from the app, you can subscribe to our optional subscription product They Stream Premium (monthly - $14.99,  3-monthly - $29.99, 6-monthly - $49.99, 12-monthly - $69.99). The prices may vary per country and are subject to change without notice.

* if you choose to use our free trial, any unused portion of the free trial period will be forfeited when you purchase a subscription to that publication

title: MakeMyTrip Flight, Hotel, Bus
description:
Your super travel app to fulfil all your travel needs and requirements!

The MakeMyTrip travel booking app caters to world travellers and is the perfect place to book hotels, flight tickets, buses, hourly rooms, cabs, train tickets, visa, etc. Download the travel app and be ready to enhance your holiday experience.

Avail super exclusive offers on flight booking, domestic & international trips, corporate hotels, holiday packages & more. Manage all your bookings, keep track of your travels and avail many other perks - all in just a few taps. With our ticket booking app, get the flexibility of reserving your stays @ 1 INR and paying the full amount later with an easy refund and cancellation policy.

TRUSTED BY 5 CRORES + CUSTOMERS
OVER 50 MILLION MONTHLY ACTIVE USERS

 Flight Bookings

The best flight offers are right here! Take a soothing break to your favourite destination and avail super-saver offers.

Hotel Bookings

The hotel booking experience just got upgraded with the MMT app. From luxury accommodations to budget properties, choose from a wide range of hotels, guesthouses and hostels and make your travel a memory to remember forever.

Hourly Hotels

It‚Äôs time to enjoy extra comfort and convenience on hotel booking with hourly hotels

‚óè	Book hotel on hourly room basis and save huge on accommodation

Holiday Packages

Travel the world like never before

‚óè	Book holidays packages to Dubai, Paris, Malaysia, Indonesia, etc. and avail easy EMI options on travel packages
‚óè	Book honeymoon packages, adventure packages & more to best-selling destinations and grab lowest prices

Why book with Us?

‚óè	Get additional discount on Signup & have a great ticket booking experience
‚óè	Book domestic cheap flights and get best flight deals and discounts
‚óè	Compare hotels and book homestays at most reasonable prices available
‚óè	Avail easy cancellation & refund policy as you book flight tickets, cheap hotels and more
‚óè	Enjoy best resorts, buses & more in just a few clicks on our ticket booking app
‚óè	Book quick and hassle-free tourist visa with us
‚óè	Enjoy 24*7 customer support

title: Shaka Maui Audio Tour Guide
description:
Change the way you see Maui with Shaka Guide. Get all the benefits of a guided tour from an app! Along the way, you‚Äôll get directions as you drive, hear stories about the places you‚Äôre visiting, and listen to Hawaiian music. The app features six GPS audio tours of the island, including three ROAD TO HANA tours ‚Äî the Classic, Loop, and Reverse! 

Each Shaka Guide tour visits popular attractions, beaches, hikes, scenic spots, and cultural sites. All tours are made locally in Hawaii with hours of audio narration that plays automatically as your drive.

The app works completely offline. This means that even in remote parts of the island without wifi or data, we‚Äôll still get you where you need to go! Shaka Guide tours never expire ‚Äî use them more than once or break them up into multiple days. 

Change the way you see Hawaii with Shaka Guide! Check out the Maui tours below. 

CLASSIC ROAD TO HANA TOUR 
*Most Popular Tour* 10+ hours, 32 stops
Your Maui experience is not complete without Shaka Guide‚Äôs Classic Road to Hana Tour. Let this app guide you the entire 64+ miles of Hana Highway. On this epic journey you‚Äôll discover:

- Little-known waterfalls
- Great hiking trails
- Off-the-beaten-path swimming holes
- Beautiful white, and black sand beaches
- Enchanting stories about Hawaii

Popular Stops: 
‚Ä¢ Twin Falls 
‚Ä¢ Waianapanapa State Park 
‚Ä¢ Hana Town 
‚Ä¢ Seven Sacred Pools aka the Pools at Oheo
‚Ä¢ Pipiwai Trail 

LOOP ROAD TO HANA TOUR 
& 
REVERSE ROAD TO HANA TOUR
10+ hours, 37 stops
Similar to the Classic tour except these tours take you around the island allowing you to see the untamed backroad to Hana! The Loop and Reverse tours make the same stops, but start in opposite directions.
 
Popular Stops: 
‚Ä¢ Backroad to Hana 
‚Ä¢ Waianapanapa State Park 
‚Ä¢ Hana Town 
‚Ä¢ Seven Sacred Pools aka the Pools at Oheo
‚Ä¢ Pipiwai Trail 

SUNRISE AT HALEAKALA NATIONAL PARK 
&
SUNSET & STARGAZING AT HALEAKALA NATIONAL PARK 
3+ hours, 10 stops
These tours take you to the summit of Mount Haleakala and back stopping at the best viewpoints and hikes along the way. As you drive, listen to stories about the park's history and Hawaiian legends like Maui, da‚Äô Hawaiian Superman! 

Popular Stops: 
‚Ä¢ Red Hill Overlook - Haleakala Summit
‚Ä¢ Sliding Sands Trail 
‚Ä¢ Leleiwi Overlook
‚Ä¢ Halemau'u Crater Hike
‚Ä¢ Makawao Town

WEST MAUI COASTLINE TOUR
6+ hours, 17 stops
Drive through the historic town of Lahaina and the famous resorts of Kaanapali and Kapalua before visiting an awesome blowhole! Then come with us as we wind around the West Maui Mountains along coastal cliffs, finishing the tour in the lush Iao Valley.

Popular Stops: 
‚Ä¢ Lahaina 
‚Ä¢ Kaanapali Beach 
‚Ä¢ Kapalua 
‚Ä¢ Olowalu Petroglyphs
‚Ä¢ Nakalele Blowhole 

Check out a complete list of stops for each tour in the app! 
 
BUY THE ISLAND BUNDLE, GET ALL 6 MAUI TOURS 
When you buy the island bundle you‚Äôll get ALL SIX Maui tours for more than 50% off the retail price. 

WHAT CUSTOMERS ARE SAYING 
- ‚ÄúBest Road to Hana tour app‚Äù
- ‚ÄúVery enjoyable, cost-effective Maui tour guide‚Äù
- ‚ÄúBest money ever spent!‚Äù
- ‚ÄúCouldn't have navigated without it‚Äù
- ‚ÄúRoad to AMAZING!!‚Äù

DOWNLOADING THE TOURS
It‚Äôs important that you download the tours (preferably in wifi) before you go. Make sure the tour is completely downloaded and you‚Äôll have no problem using the tours offline. 

BATTERY USAGE
The app uses your GPS only when necessary. Please remember that continual use of your GPS can dramatically deplete your battery. Be sure to pack a car charger for your tour.  

IPAD NOTICE
You can use an iPad to take the tour, however, wifi-only iPads without GPS capability will not work. 

ABOUT SHAKA GUIDE
At Shaka Guide our goal is to connect people with places. We love Hawaii. Not just for its beauty, but also for its rich history and culture. We believe that every destination has a story and we want to tell it. In Hawaii, we have over 20 audio tours that do just that ‚Äî share the stories of the islands.

The history provided was informative and the hawaiian music in between stops was the best and really added to our Hawaiian experience.  This app saved us a ton of money vs paying for a tour, if you have the the stomach to drive the road yourself, this app is a must. Mahalo | If you‚Äôve never driven on the road to Hana, this app is a must have. So much fun and things we saw that we would never seen without the app. | Just finished the road to Hana and can‚Äôt believe how awesome this self guided tour was. The experience was so immersive and UNIQUE. I cant wait to do another trip just to try this app out again. A++++ 100 stars! | Great tour, very informative. Needed a little more direction for the sea arch. | This is our first time on the road to Hana and we decided to drive it ourselves and not take a tour bus because it is A LOT cheaper but we didn‚Äôt know where the sights on the road were.  I‚Äôm soooooo glad I found this app.  The guide was very insightful and extremely easy to follow.  You get more than a tour, you get the music, very well told stories and the history told to you along with some humor.  You won‚Äôt miss a thing with this app. | I‚Äôm not one to purchase these type of things. But I am on Maui during the wildfires. I did the road to Hana. I‚Äôm traveling by myself and this tour guide was great. Told you where to stop things you would never even know about. Told you where not to stop. Kept you on track for timing sake. Plays music the whole time. The tour guide tells you stories in history about the area. I did not feel alone on my road to Hana. There was great space between the stories, so it didn‚Äôt ramble on they would pause, play some music and come back to the story. This is worth purchasing and was put together by Local‚Äôs! | We really love Shaka Guide tour. This is Our second time to purchase this app. We got the Shaka Oahu Bundle tour first, then this Shaka Maui Bundle tour. Best self guided tour ive found. You can‚Äôt miss any attraction on the island/s and will even suggest some good eats along the way. Shaka is so entertaining and we learned a lot about the Hawaiian cultures and legends. And we really appreciate the Hawaiian background music as well. So worth it! Mahalo Shaka! | We enjoyed the guided tour with directions, suggestions, hints, and jokes.  Loved the history lesson on the way back.  You might have a book, but you don‚Äôt want to look at a book when you could instead be looking at the beauty of the Road to Hana. | Traveling with my large family in 3 cars, the recommendations were RIGHT on for all ages (5yo-80yo). Been to Hana numerous times, but never before like this ü§ô | We had the best day on the Road to Hana using the Shaka app! We felt like we had a tour guide in the car with us giving us turn by turn directions. We felt like we had an inside scoop on hidden stops to see. We loved the Venus Pools at the end of the trip! We had a great day and highly recommend using the app. Mahalo! | Excellent tour filled with interesting information. I enjoyed the thematic Hawaiian music scattered throughout the listening tour. I couldn‚Äôt imagine doing the Road to Hana without this app! The narrator told us where we were, where to park, what there was to eat, where the bathrooms were and how long until the next bathroom, what costs a fee and what is free, and so much more! Use this app! | Husband 100 % against against buying this tour and then he fell in love with it on the road to Hana. Highly recommend to anyone traveling  Maui. We did Classic road to Hana, west Maui tour, and sunset Haleakala. We loved all of the history, stories,music. Made the trips so much better. We got to see and experience sights that we would not have know about on our own. | What a wonderful app! So glad our friend recommended it! Such great detail and wonderful stories! | AMAZING. this app is perfect. I recommend all the stops he tells you to stop at. It‚Äôs so detailed and interesting. My 18&20 year old sons were waiting. Yo be tortured by a tour and this app but ended up loving it and super interested in everything he said. Great great experience | Fantastic tour guide + history lesson!

title: New York Subway MTA Map
description:
New York Subway uses the official MTA subway map and includes a helpful transit route planner. With over 12 million downloads worldwide this NYC subway map is free to download and will help you navigate around New York using the subway system.



Features:



Official MTA maps of the New York Subway.
Including all 5 NYC boroughs - Manhattan, Brooklyn, Queens, Bronx and Staten Island.
Easy-to-use transit route planner to get you from A to B on the subway.
Works offline for help even without an internet connection.
Service Status from MTA shows live information about delays with alerts sent straight to your phone.*
Countdown Clocks for each subway station to check when the next train is due.
Search for any subway station on the map or find the nearest station to your location from anywhere in New York.
Plan routes to Points of Interest including Empire State Building, New York Botanical Garden and Times Square.
Favorite your routes for quick access when on the move.
Favorite your Home and Work stations for up to date station, line and route information

E & E Alerts show any out of service elevators and escalators as well as an estimate for when they will return to service.
Travel Guide



VIP Features:



Did you know that not all of the subway operates 24 hours a day? Get first and last train times for every day of the week.**
Enhance your route planner with tips on the best car to board to be nearest the exit or platform when you‚Äôre changing service.**
Advertising helps fund the development of this app, but you can help us out by going Ad-Free.


Mapway make transit apps for cities all around the world with over 55 million downloads. If you‚Äôre visiting London, Paris or Berlin make sure you check out our other apps available to download for free.



Plan. Route. Relax.





*Whilst we endeavor that service status notifications are delivered in a timely manner we can‚Äôt guarantee this 100% of the time. There may be occasions when this isn‚Äôt available due to technical reasons outside of our control.



**Available for most, but not all stations.



New York Subway VIP available as an in-app subscription: $3.99 monthly or $9.99 annually, or as a one-off purchase of $23.99.      

Cancel at any time, for any reason. Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.    

Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, at the cost of your chosen price tier. Subscriptions can be managed and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to Account Settings in your iTunes Account.   

Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when a subscription to that publication is purchased, where applicable. Read our terms in full at https://www.mapway.com/terms-conditions/
releaseNotes:
Thank you for downloading the app. We regularly update the app to make it better for you. 

This update includes some bug fixes and performance improvements.
To make sure you don‚Äôt miss a thing, just keep your updates turned on.

Got a question? Tap Support in the About section in the app.

I can't think of a worse possible time to force users to sit through an ad than when they desperately need the info on the other side of that ad instantly. developers, find better placement for your ads!! | It shows you an ad while you‚Äôre trying to look up if a train that‚Äôs coming goes to where you need it to. The length of the ads needs to be trimmed down as well. | The amount, frequency, and length of ads make the app annoying to use at best and completely unusable at worst. The UI is outdated and looks old. I‚Äôm convinced they make the unpaid version unusable so you‚Äôre willing to shell out yet another monthly subscription for an app that gives no unique information and offers nothing special. | Don‚Äôt take ads that take up the whole screen.  It defeats the purpose of the ap | Full screen video ads popup as I'm trying to quickly look up directions or stop info while riding. What‚Äôs the point | The adds and games are very annoying , need expeditious acccess to app when traveling thru subway system  . | All the pop up ads are so annoying and make this piece of garbage app unusable | I‚Äôve been trying to get to the train schedule and I can‚Äôt because constant ad videos show up!!! | It looked like a virus came through my last subway app. A red flag popped up and warned that my phone memory is running low and I have to click on their arrow to fix it.

title: Scout Maps & Safer Navigation
description:
Introducing Scout Maps: Your Trusted Co-Pilot, Safety Coach, and Personal Driver Assistant!
Scout will help you to navigate faster, easier, and safer!

Scout Maps is redefining what it means to drive smarter and safer on the road ‚Äî with real-time, AI-enhanced safety guidance through live traffic reports, speed limit change alerts, and curated navigation tips. Change gears for a driving experience that puts you in the driver's seat with up-to-the-moment map information from a community of over a million editors, GPS voice navigation and route directions, school zone warnings, and gridlock-avoiding traffic alerts... all of which will save you time, money and minimize accident risk for your entire family.

Drive safer - Learn more about your driving habits and understand your driving behavior! Find out how often you speed, hard brake, accelerate, and more!  

Navigate easily ‚Äì Keep your eyes on the road and hands on the wheel and get where you need to go with the turn-by-turn GPS voice directions. 

Explore the world ‚Äì Discover places to dine, shop, walk, get gas, and more.

Keep in touch ‚Äì Share your ETA easily with your friends and family in a single tap. 

Beat traffic ‚Äì Real-time traffic and live speed updates help you find the best and quickest route to avoid gridlock.

Do it your way ‚Äì Save your customized route preferences, and favorite map views and schedule personalized commute departure alerts for home and work.

Make a pit stop ‚Äì Discover new places along your route for the cheapest gas, restaurants for a bite to eat, cafes to sip a coffee or other amenities.

Never get lost ‚Äì Scout, powered by OpenStreetMap (OSM), provides the most up-to-date map information with updates from a community of more than 1.6 million editors. 

Park and walk ‚Äì Use Scout after arrival, the app easily will help you to navigate even on foot. 

Got feedback? - We want to hear from you! If you want to report a problem or just share your opinion, don‚Äôt hesitate, to write us - scout@telenav.com.

Thank you for being with Scout Mobile!

Please keep in mind:
Continued use of GPS running in the background can decrease battery life.
Scout‚Äôs map and search coverage are currently for the USA only.
releaseNotes:
In the new release, we improved the map! 

Also we added Personalized Driving Insights:
‚Ä¢ Gain insights into your driving habits with our Safety Score featured during an active navigation session 
‚Ä¢ Identify areas needing improvement, from speeding to phone distraction.

More amazing improvements and features will come soon!

 
If you want to report a problem or just share your opinion, don‚Äôt hesitate, write us - scout@telenav.com.

Thank you for being with Scout Mobile and thanks for your great feedback! We hear and value your opinion

Sincerely,
Captain P  Princeton‚Äô73 | Because it‚Äôs acting Im in San Jose when I‚Äôm in Palmdale | I used to love this app I don‚Äôt use it very often, but when I needed it, it was available. Over the last six months when I‚Äôve gone to use it, the App will start navigation, and then just turn off! Which means I would have to pull over re-enter the address and then try to drive and watch my phone for navigation completely useless at this point please get this fixed!! | Apart from losing my address book, the current version of scout ‚Äúhangs‚Äù on profile. Half the time it can not find what I‚Äôm searching for and a lot of times it takes me on the longest route for some place that‚Äôs fairly close by. | The gps works well. Support was good. Now they are ending support for their sister product Scout link. They took my $15 for a year of service of scout link now they won‚Äôt refund me the rest of my unused subscription. So buyer beware before giving them a dime. | I would rather use a paper map than this app! | Sends me on wild goose chases. Sometimes when i could take a street one way down i directs me in a maze of going many miles away only to com back almost right next where i started. Needs to more user friendly. Used to love it. Because it advises me in advance what the next turn is-not when I am 5‚Äô from the turn! Keep up the good work. üòä | I specifically told it to take one route and it was trying to send me on one of the other route obtains. And kept trying to redirect me!  Ugh!  It‚Äôs so frustrating!!   üòî üò© | Difficult to use! | This app, which I use all the time at home in NV, has gotten us lost TWICE in the same day in AZ. | App is no longer working says no internet connection when there is one | It used to make me go around in circles I was loosing time and money.

The visuals were faded and gray black and white only, as if I had some long outdated app. 

I think I‚Äôll be looking for something else. | Have to fiddle all the time. Application not detected on phone?  I‚Äôm in the app on phone. All software up to date. 

Maps?  Not there unless you fiddle. 

A pain in the butt. | as you idiot makers should know, gas is super expensive right now. Signed,

title: Pack Master
description:
Can you pack it all in? Are you an expert packer? Only the smartest travelers can visit every country. Be the leader of the pack!

What is more refreshing than the feeling of a nice, perfectly organized suitcase? Relive that relaxing feeling over and over again as you get ready to travel with Pack Master. Your one simple challenge is to fill your suitcase with the myriad objects provided. All at once easy and increasingly frustrating.

We aren‚Äôt just dealing with clothes here. Oh no. You‚Äôll have to cram much more than that into a minimal amount of space. We are talking shoes, plants, crowns, snorkels; wait, is that a bowling ball?? So, yes, basically anything your brain could think of. 

Travel around the world to international cities and solve special puzzles created specifically for each of them. Organization is key since your suitcases are not the boring rectangles you are used to. We will strain the limits of your imagination as you try to fit the pieces into cases of all shapes and sizes. 

Hundreds of levels of cramming craziness
Fill your passport with stamps from around the world
11 exotic locales with unique, fun objects
Perfect for the plane. No Wifi required!

Travel smarter and pack cleaner. Pack Master will help organize your brain as you organize your suitcase.


Visit https://lionstudios.cc/contact-us/ if have any feedback, need help on beating a level or have any awesome ideas you would like to see in the game!

Follow us to get news and updates on this and our other Award Winning titles:
https://lionstudios.cc/
Facebook.com/LionStudios.cc
Instagram.com/LionStudioscc
Twitter.com/LionStudiosCC
Youtube.com/c/LionStudiosCC
releaseNotes: Bug Fixes
reviews:
The amount of ADS in this game is ridiculous. An ad every time you pass a level! How do you expect people to invest their time when most of their playing experience is watching ads? 

I do want to say that I really enjoy the game. But the ads makes rip my hair out. Please, at least space out the ads or something! | This game is cool in theory but it‚Äôs way too easy and not satisfying because you rarely ever fill the suitcase all the way. | why is there an ad after EVERY SINGLE SUITCASE?! BRO WHAT THE F- | This game seemed like it would be fun however, there was WAY TOO MANY ADS! I understand that that‚Äôs where a lot of you make most of your money with these games but without people playing them people wouldn‚Äôt purchase advertising space with you. An ad every few rounds is one thing but every one is maddening. I‚Äôm sure the thought process is that the more we assault them with them, the more likely they will buy the game so as not to have to deal with them. Game is great but it‚Äôs ruined by the sheer amount of ads you get. | I really like the design of this game. Even the little app icon is adorable. the items are cute, love the colors, layout, etc. There‚Äôs even confetti when you complete a level which I think is a nice touch.

I really like this concept for a game as well. Something about sorting games is very calming and a good way to take a break.

The only (and I mean ONLY) issue with this game is the amount of ads. I know a lot of these games are marketed towards children who don‚Äôt know any different, but for anyone trying to play a game as simple as this, with levels as easy and short as they are, having an ad after every single level is nauseating. 

I, and a lot of other people as well, would love to play games like this if there wasn‚Äôt the constant worry about getting repetitive ads. I am completely aware of the need for ads to keep free applications sustainable, but there should at least be some incentive to watch them or reward for it. i have no issue with ads, but rather the frequency. If you give the player even half as many ads, I and others would probably be more inclined to keep playing. 

Keeping ads lower might actually increase profit as people won‚Äôt delete the game (like I have), meaning your players will want to play longer, and new people won‚Äôt be turned away by it.

This is an issue I see very prevalently and I would LOVE to see a change in this type of development soon.

TL;DR: Lovely game, very cute, too many ads to actually enjoy the experience. | Every single round is an ad. Gross waste. You‚Äôll watch ads longer you‚Äôll actually play. | Literally unplayable because there is a 10 sec ad after every single level. title: Mobile Passport by Airside
description:
Mobile Passport Control (MPC)
Effective February 1, 2022, this app provides a redirect to the CBP MPC App for the submission of passport and travel entry information to U.S. Customs and Border Protection (CBP).

Background
The award-winning Mobile Passport App by Airside was launched in 2014 as the first app authorized by U.S. Customs and Border Protection (U.S. CBP) to streamline the international customs process at most major U.S. airports and cruise ports.
A record 10M U.S. and Canadian passport holders trusted the app for quickly entering the United States.

Airside Digital ID App
The Mobile Passport App by Airside was just the beginning. This app also provides a link to the Airside Digital ID App for new mobile ID services when traveling with American Airlines, renting your dream apartment, showing your health pass and more.
Store your verified passports and driver‚Äôs licenses and other ID documents for free. You decide if, how, and with whom to share your ID. Save time with your digital ID.

RushMyPassport 
Airside and Expedited Travel partnered to create a combined service offering of the Mobile Passport App and RushMyPassport online passport application services with the U.S. Department of State. To prepare for future trips, travelers can find a direct link to RushMyPassport on the home screen of the Mobile Passport App, and complete the administrative work, digitally, without an in-person visit to a passport office or enrollment center.
Additional services include form-fill automation for application completion, biometric passport photo services, full-tracking visibility throughout the approval process, and free assistance from passport specialists.

For more information about the expedited passport and renewal offerings, please visit: https://mobilepassport.rushmypassport.com.

FAQs: https://mobilepassport.us/faq/
Terms of Use: https://www.mobilepassport.us/terms
Privacy Policy: https://www.mobilepassport.us/privacy
releaseNotes: + minor fixes

A great initiative by CBP but the app is developed by a private third party. Initially 100% free, it is now subject to a $14.95 subscription fee. title: Planes Live - Flight Tracker
description:
Planes Live Free is a simple yet powerful flight tracking tool that lets you watch the planes online all over the world and get up-to-date information on flights instantly! Track the flights of your family members or beloved ones as if you were traveling with them and find the best time to pick them up at the airport. 

Whether you are a professional pilot or an aviation enthusiast, you'll definitely appreciate our flight tracker - the simple, clean and informative interface coupled with powerful functionality!

FEATURES

* Track planes and biplanes online all over the world
* Get notified about the flight schedule changes with handy alerts: be aware of the flight status, canceled flights, new departure and arrival time and more
* Search for particular flights, airports, ‚Äãand locations
* Get detailed information on flights: from aircraft characteristics and picture to its route and schedule
* Find up-to-date airport information that covers accurate departures and arrivals schedule, airport timezone and local time, its location and weather forecast
* Add airports and locations to "My Places" to access them instantly!
* Check weather forecast for a particular location or airport
* Spot planes and airports near you: select the desirable distance and enjoy the show!
* Apply smart filters to track a particular airplane model or an airline company, watch the planes of selected altitude, speed or airport.

PREMIUM FEATURES
* Weather Overlays
* Unlimited number of alerts
* 2x faster data update
* Terminal, Check In, Gate and Baggage info
* No Ads

* Subscriptions will automatically renew and payment will be charged to your iTunes account unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. The cost of the renewal depends on your Subscription Plan. Our standard Subscription Plans are:
- 1 week subscription with 3-day free trial ($4.99 USD)
- 1 year subscription ($39.99 USD)
For other currencies, the price corresponds to the same price tier on the App Store Pricing Matrix. 

Subscription payments will be charged to your App Store account at confirmation of your purchase. Subscriptions will automatically renew and you will be charged unless auto-renew is turned off or unless you cancel at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription or trial period. Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when you purchase a premium subscription during the free trial period. The cost of renewal depends on the Subscription Plan you choose. 
Subscriptions and auto-renewal may be managed by going to Account Settings after purchase or by contacting Customer Support.

–°overage zone:
- Europe: up to 95% of the continent.
- South America: up to 90% of ADS-B coverage for airplanes.
- North America: close to 100% coverage of transmitter-enabled airplanes; 100% of data delivered with a delay of up to 5 minutes.
- Africa: major coverage of South Africa; partial coverage of the rest of the continent.
- Australia: 100% coverage.
- Asia: coverage of mainly densely populated areas.
- Oceania: 100% coverage.

Together with our partners, we are constantly working on improving the coverage.

Important Notice:
The airline tracker app uses data from several providers, which is collected from aircraft, equipped with ADS-B transmitters. ADS-B is not used by all airlines or aircraft. Due to technical limitations on how flight data is collected, ‚Äãit might be incomplete in some cases. We are working to improve this situation.

Privacy Policy:¬†https://planeslive.com/privacyPolicy
Terms:¬†https://planeslive.com/terms

title: Super.com - Travel, Save, Earn
description:
On the hunt to spend less and keep more cash in your pocket? Let Super.com do the work for you. 

Unlike other apps out there, we‚Äôre a one-stop shop for unbeatable deals, rewards and cashback on everything you need. Whether it‚Äôs the essentials, like gas and groceries, or the extras, like travel and shopping. You can even build your credit and borrow cash when you need it, too. What does that mean for you? Less time searching and more time saving.

Product highlights:

SUPER TRAVEL
For travelers on a budget - get the convenience, security and savings you deserve. Say goodbye to endless searches, and hello to booking with ease and speed. We‚Äôre talking 50% savings on over 500K hotels worldwide, 24/7 customer service and more. Trust us, you won‚Äôt want to miss out on these must-have travel deals.

SUPER PAY
Power up your wallet. Get cash on demand with no credit check or interest, stress-free spending by linking your debit card, cashback on everyday purchases, plus it can help you boost your credit score*. That‚Äôs a whole lotta benefits for one low monthly fee. 

*Terms apply. Your credit scores are determined by several factors. Responsible use of this product may help build your credit.
releaseNotes: We update the app regularly so that we can make it better for you. Get the latest version for all of the available Super features. This version includes several bug fixes and performance improvements. Thanks for using Super!

title: Weworld - Match, Chat, Travel
description:
Weworld connects you to people in different countries. Make international friends, learn about different cultures, and enjoy life more!

[Why Weworld?]
For various purposes such as looking for friends of foreigner, cross cultural communication, language exchange, chat with penpals, making travel partners and meeting with expats.
"I'm happy to find new friends worldwide. It's always a lot of fun to share cultures and traditions." (Korean, 22)
"I'm a backpack traveler. I want to make a travel companion. I love to meet new people while traveling cause I think it's the best way to learn the local life." (Spanish, 20)
"I‚Äôm a geek on Asian cultures and languages, love anime and reading manga. I like to chat with Asian girls." (French, 31)
"I‚Äôm learning English and Chinese. I plan to study abroad and someday I want to work overseas." (Italian, 16)
"I‚Äôm interested to improve my English and growing my vocabulary, chat with natives, make online friend and pen pal." (Russian, 26)
"I want to practice Japanese, German and Portuguese. I want to make foreign friends who is native speaker." (Thai, 27)
"It is a nice opportunity to learn different countries and culture. Conventional social network is bored." (German, 36)

[Worldwide Connection]
Weworld is used in 217 countries and regions. TOP 15 nationalities are : Brazilian, Mexican, American, Thai, Japanese, Indian, Chinese, Taiwanese, Italian, Korean, Russian, Polish, German, French, Dutch.

[International Only]
Your Info won‚Äôt be shown to people who are same nationality as you.

[Teen Safety]
You can connect and chat with only users in same age group. Enjoy!

[How to Match]
Swiping pictures to the right indicates that you want to connect.
Swiping pictures to the left indicates that you aren't interested.
If they swipe right too then‚Ä¶

[Weworld Premium]
+ See who wants to connect with you.
+ Be the top profile in favorite countries.
+ Unlimited, Swipe as much as you want.
---------------------------
If you choose to purchase Weworld Premium, payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.
Your subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period, and your account will be charged for renewal within the 24 hours prior to the end of the current period.
Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your iTune & App Store Settings after purchase. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period.
All personal data is handled under the Weworld's Terms of Use & Privacy Policy. More details can be found here: https://www.weworld.app/legal/
The following conditions apply when using the in-app purchases:
https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

title: Pogo - Travel Planner
description:
Pogo - Plan on the Go ‚Äî Plan a trip and find the best things to do in one simple, fun and beautiful app.

‚Äì Save everything in one place

Say goodbye to travel stuff splattered across notes, emails, Instagram and WhatsApp. With Pogo, you can save everything for a trip on one Pinboard. From places and notes to documents and checklists. 

- Book a Stay with Booking.com

Find a place you like the look of in Pogo? Simply view in Booking.com to save the hassle of searching around. When you're done, jump right back into your Pinboard and continue planning your trip.

- View a personalised map with all your Pins

Tap on 'Map View' and see a personalised Map of all the pins you've got saved in your Pinboard. When you arrive at your destination it makes planning where to go and what to do so much easier.

‚Äì¬†Discover tried and tested recommendations

Fed up of spending countless hours scouring the web, looking for the best things to do? With Pogo, it's easy to discover personalised and authentic recommendations from like-minded travellers.

‚Äì¬†Share your travel tips and plan together

Make tedious trip planning group chats a thing of the past. With Pogo, you can easily invite others to a Pinboard to plan a trip together. So you can all add stuff, see what's on the agenda, and vote for your favourites.


‚Äî ABOUT POGO

Pogo was started with the mission to help fellow travel lovers make the most of every moment they get away. 

From our experience ‚Äî and by talking to lots of people in the travel community ‚Äî we realised that although travelling is great, sometimes stuff can get in the way of having a good time.

The unnecessary hassle of organising a trip. The pains of deciding where to go and what to do. Stuff going wrong whilst you're away. 

We exist to help you escape this bad stuff. So you're free to have a more mindful, authentic and memorable trip.

Our mobile app provides a home for all of your travel plans. So you can get inspiration, organise a trip and protect yourself all in one place.
releaseNotes:
We‚Äôve got a BIG update for you, the Pogo Community, that really hope you love:

- Book Hotels - We‚Äôve implemented the ability to book hotels directly in Pogo. No need to leave the app.
- Hotel Liking - Hotel research has never been easier. Like a hotel? Simply swipe it to the right in the list or double tap a hotel in Map View.
- Offline Mode - Upon opening Pogo for the first time on this version, a copy of your Pinboards will be kept on your phone so you don‚Äôt need Wifi/Data to access all your Pinboards when travelling.
- Bug fixes - As usual we‚Äôve also done some other bug fixes that have been kindly fed back to us from our users. Thank you all for you feedback, it helps a lot.

Please feel free to get in touch with us at hello@pogo.travel with your thoughts or feedback. We love hearing from you and we‚Äôre working hard on implementing all the features you guys are eager to have in Pogo.

Until next time,

The Pogo Team
reviews:
I‚Äôve tested out a couple of different trip planning apps and I really like the idea of Pogo the best so far, but I‚Äôve been playing around with it for about 10 min and have had to close it out and reopen at least 5 times because it freezes. Has a lot of potential, but definitely needs work! Hope it improves quickly! | I love and miss the layout and design of pluto i was obsessed! But pogo is good as well! I love the detail and i love planning trips with this app! | The idea is there and I love the search and find option but the app is slow and anytime I click to view a category the app freezes or restarts. You‚Äôd think that exiting the app would fix that problem, but it‚Äôs just rinse and repeat and still freezes when trying to view the categories. Which really makes it more hassle than what it‚Äôs worth. | THE REBRAND IS SO BAD, I‚Äôm devastated. Pluto was one of my favorite apps and I can‚Äôt stand using the new version. The old branding was unique, beautiful and had character, not to mention the usability and functionality was also amazing. Was this rebrand tested with literally any users?? It could not have gotten positive responses. | Sorry, but the new branding is horrendous. I LOVED the old Pluto, and had it proudly on my home screen. The new logo, name, everything is so awful I‚Äôm tempted to delete the app altogether. I know rebranding takes time, effort, and money, but this was not the way to go, in my honest opinion. It feels like a cheap imitation of a popular social app, instead of embracing the unique beauty that was the old app. | I am not sure how this app received so many great reviews. It was very difficult to navigate. the flow didn‚Äôt make sense. I just was not impressed overall. | Tbh I never write reviews especially for an APP üíÄBUT I‚Äôm planning a road trip soon and super exited so I wanted something to help keep me organized ‚ú®it‚Äôs actually pretty good and cute and neat it‚Äôs like Pinterest in a way . I‚Äôm not a bot either :) thanks Pluto ! | The aesthetic of this app is incredible. 

One HUGE thing I wish it had is an actual
itinerary in date/time order. You can save everything in this app but it won‚Äôt show you a timeline like other travel apps do. 
Add that and a widget for your home screen, and I wouldn‚Äôt need any other app for travel. 

Unfortunately right now it doesn‚Äôt work 100% alone for me, I still use TripIt for the itinerary timeline feature. | I was looking for an app that would allow me to collaborate trip ideas with my friends. With very few reviews, I was uncertain, but decided to give Pluto a try and I‚Äôm so glad I did! 
So far the user experience is top notch. The app is running very smoothly, no lags or glitches. It‚Äôs very intuitive and user-friendly, and in minutes I was easily able to navigate myself around, start a trip and invite my friend to collaborate. 
A few suggestions:
When initially walking through the first steps, I would like to be able to pick a region to travel, not just a specific state or city. For instance, I wanted to be able to say Pacific Northwest, but that wasn‚Äôt an option. Also, I would like to be able to create my own categories within the trip. 

Solid five stars for usability and of course that it‚Äôs free. | i‚Äôve been on the hunt for a travel/itinerary app that was easy on the eyes and incredibly user friendly! | I normally look at Pinterest or YouTube to look up things to do. I love that they already have popular things to try. | Awesome app for planning our holiday! there were lots of things I look for - but until now, I haven‚Äôt seen them all in one place. 
The app is very easy to use. You can also save ideas and places to eat. 
And also it served you up inspiration from the app‚Äôs recommendations. Top marks! | This app is off to a great start, they definitely have more to add, but I‚Äôm enjoying the flexibility and functionality they have now. It‚Äôs allowed me to share the plan with my friends and family going on a trip together. Also it allowed us to collaborate on the plan so that everyone has input on what we are doing on the trip so no one feels left out. | The app crashes as soon as you open it

title: Chrono Travelers
description:
Start playing Chrono Travelers today! Step into a near-futuristic open world, where the convergence of ancient celestial spirits and cutting-edge technology paints a realm of wonder and enigma. Venture forth with your companions to explore this vast realm, challenge bosses powered by futuristic tech and the essence of the stars, and uncover the hidden mysteries.

A World Without Boundaries
From bustling metropolises to ancient relics, traverse every corner of this expansive realm at will. Encounters with various celestial beings and mysterious tech may pave the way for new, exhilarating adventures.

Spirit Combat Dynamics
Harness the powers of the spirits. Each spirit boasts unique skills and attributes. Using them strategically will be your ticket to triumph in combat.

Summon the Gods
Call upon gods to boost your strength in battle. Each god brings unique powers and a cool look. They'll stand by you to overcome tough challenges.

Tailor Your Persona
In this futuristic setting, battles aren't the only allure. Personalize your character with bespoke attire and gear, showcasing your distinct style and flair.

Socialize & Conquer
Team up with players globally to challenge formidable bosses and share in the joys of exploration. In this boundless realm, camaraderie extends beyond the battlefield; forge profound bonds and cherish the deep connections you build.

As you stand atop the peaks of the world, gazing over a land where the old meets the new, its allure may captivate you indefinitely. But remember, your quest to unravel every enigma and stand united with your companions against all odds is paramount.

Forge ahead, chrono travelers, for your adventure has just begun!

title: Paris Travel Guide and Map
description:
Offline Maps and much more! Discover new places and insider tips. Collect, save and organize them as you like. And have the best trip ever!
 
With us, traveling got easier and even more fun. Here‚Äôs what you get ‚Äì the shortest possible version:
 
‚Ä¢ Free offline maps ‚Äì no roaming, no hustle
‚Ä¢ Insider tips and places to discover
‚Ä¢ Multifunctional lists to plan and organize your trip
 
We let you discover new places, beautiful spots and insider tips at the touch of a button. Collect your personal best-of and save it for later. You will experience your best journeys yet with detailed offline maps and in-depth travel content on your mobile travel companion.
 
And here‚Äôs why 5+ million travelers love our apps:
  
CLEAR AND CONCISE MAPS
Never get lost again. See your location on the map via GPS, no internet connection is required. Find streets, addresses or attractions and get pointed in the walking direction.
 
IN-DEPTH TRAVEL CONTENT
You‚Äôll never have to buy another guide book. Our Guides features pictures as well as comprehensive and up-to-date information is available for thousands of places and attractions.
 
SEARCH AND DISCOVER
Search a specific place by name or browse by categories like restaurants, architecture, hotels, shops, bars, etc.
 
PLAN TRIPS AND CUSTOMIZE MAPS
Book the hotel for your next city tour right within the app. Remember and save all the places you would like to visit. Create new or individual ones. Mark them with different colors or add notes to them. 
 
SAVE ROAMING FEES
Maps and guide content are stored on directly your device so you can access them at any time even without an internet connection. An internet connection is of course required for initial downloading of data or booking hotels.

BACKUP AND SYNC
Create a user account and login from any of your iOS devices. So all your personal content is right where you want it to be.

It also tells you where the Metro is located and what cafes and restaurants and monuments are nearby. Indispensable! | If you are going to visit Paris (and surrounding areas) then you need this app! 
So basically, you get a map that looks a lot like Google Maps. It's complete with locations, road names, and even the entire metro system which was extremely useful for me! 
You are also able to create a "list" of restaurants, attractions, custom locations, etc, and save it all so that you know exactly where you're going in advanced. 
My ONLY problem with this app is that it won't show you turn by turn directions which shouldn't be an issue if you're good with directions.
It also gives you recommendations of places to check out based on categories you can choose from like night clubs, shopping, the best food, and stuff like that. 
All in all, I heavily relied on this app during my week in Paris (It was literally my bible) and I couldn't have been happier with how it turned out. It didn't drain my battery either! Thank you to the creators, I truly love this app. 

PS: if you ever get lost, your smart phone should still show your gps location on the maps app even without service. It should be easy to use this app once you find yourself. 
Also, the metros will take you to almost every landmark in Paris with minimal walking so I'd invest in a "carnet" of 10 tickets at the metro. | Super nice I can plan my future trip to Paris. It‚Äôs super cool that you can make lists and notes I really like it.

title: iplan.ai - AI Travel Planner
description:
Creating an itinerary with iplan.ai is fast and easy. In just a few seconds you can get a tailor-made itinerary for any kind of trip and budget, including road trips and group travels. You will be able to make any changes and share your itinerary with others.

With iplan.ai, you can plan and manage a trip in one place. Organize your day by adding your favorite places to visit, managing routes, or creating your own minute-based itinerary. 

We‚Äôll create your smart itinerary with the help of artificial intelligence

- View plans on a travel map (like Roadtrippers and Wanderlog)
- Get directions on your favorite application (Google map, Apple map, Waze)
- Rearrange the order of places, pin your favorite to your timeline
- We have tailor-made inventories to meet your needs and budget, from a large suitcase for long trips with family to a carry-on back bag for short solo trips.
- Add things-to-do from top guides with 1 click (like Tripadvisor and Google Trips/Google Travel)
- Access your trip plans offline
- Suggest the best restaurant along the way

****Join now and start planning your next trip****

We will ask you a set of questions about your next travel destination, like, how many days will you stay? with whom will you travel?, and what are your interests?

****Your itinerary will be ready in a matter of seconds****

We will create an itinerary and a minute-by-minute daily route plan, based on your needs and preferences, and then you will be able to edit, change, and collaborate with friends to customize your plan even further to your taste. 

****You are in control**** 

Move, modify, or remove anything you want. the more you use iplan.ai the more we understand your tastes and create a more efficient itinerary for you 
Install the application today and enjoy your trip
releaseNotes:

Check out our fresh app icon ‚Äì a modern twist to match your evolving style!

Unlock Premium with Discounts:
Subscribe monthly or yearly for exclusive features at a huge discount. Elevate your experience!

We've fine-tuned performance for a smoother ride. Enjoy a more reliable app!

title: Photo Map - Travel Tracker
description:
-- LET YOUR PHOTOS TELL THE STORY --
You've been to a lot of places and taken a lot of pictures. Photo Map uses your photo library to tell the story of the places you've visited and the adventures you've had.

-- REDISCOVER YOUR FAVORITE TRIPS --
Photo Map automatically scans your Photo Library to find photos from each of your trips. Rediscover your epic journeys and weekend escapes by state, country, province, or territory.

-- HIGHLIGHT YOUR FAVORITE MEMORIES --
Highlight your favorite photo from each trip or stop on your journey. Frame each photo in the unmistakable outline of the place it was taken.

-- SHARE YOUR STORY WITH CUSTOMIZABLE MAPS --
Your photos tell the perfect story of your journey. Tell the world where you went and what you did by sharing an image of your map.

-- FIND INSPIRATION AND FILL OUT YOUR MAP --
There's hundreds of places to visit, and you're just getting started. Find the inspiration you need to book your next adventure!
releaseNotes: Bug fixes & Improvements
reviews:
It scans you recent photos for location and you can‚Äôt just select from you photos yourself. The scanning will take ages if you have lots of pictures in your camera roll. I actually could never get it to entirely load even on fast WiFi and letting it sit for 30+ min. Why can‚Äôt it just not scan the photos and allow us to select what we want? Or have that as an option? I already knew what photos I wanted to use for each location I don‚Äôt want help selecting them! Plus my location is not on for all of my photos so then it wasn‚Äôt detecting the places I‚Äôve actually been. There‚Äôs no good way to do that just let us do it our selves! I was disappointed as I liked the general idea but the execution was not good. | Will you be adding the Caribbean islands? | ü•∫ü•∫ | Love the concept but can‚Äôt get my photos to save | Would give  5 stars but Aruba is missing. Please add | Wish it worked across devices but this is the only app that visually does what I want | Need to add Singapore | I was looking for an app to mark where I've been and thought, " wouldn't it be cool if there was one where I could use my own pictures?"  Not only does this app do that, it does it so well!

It's easy to use and I like it so much I upgraded. | Even though the Location data is correct on the photos, it does not see it in the list to pick a photo . Thank you very much! :) | I love to travel and be able to keep up with where I have been and where I haven‚Äôt!

However when in a country or state it won‚Äôt scroll up to list the rest of the places or if I‚Äôm trying to select a picture it won‚Äôt let me scroll up either. I deleted the app and the downloaded again but it didn‚Äôt help | For some reason it will show up on the map like when I put the photo in and click the checkmark it doesn‚Äôt show up on the map itself so it‚Äôs good but just doesn‚Äôt work. | Easy to use;  well designed. | It basically only scans your ‚ÄúRecents‚Äù folder. I have 70,000 photos synced from my computer and this didn‚Äôt include any of them. So it shows I‚Äôve only been to 2 states when in fact I‚Äôve been to 30+ and several countries. | I love this app but I am a bit confused because an entire piece of Africa is missing half of Somalia is just not on the map the area called Somaliland | I can‚Äôt even upload a freaking picture app is stupid | It would be cool if the user could rename the maps titles and add multiple maps for group travel vs personal tracking | Wouldn‚Äôt place any of my 460 pictures?? | We really like this app for sharing where we‚Äôve been because it includes photos and makes cool maps!! | This is an excellent app, which provides a great way to visualize your travels. You can select a photo, but it doesn‚Äôt show up in the map on my iPad Pro 12.9 M1 ( It works on my M1 MacBook Air though) | It keeps glitching and going to the beginning. | Best app ever | Beautifully designed and built app. No useless features, just a really easy, fun way to track travel. | This app was exactly what I was looking for. Perfectly perfect!! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!! | I downloaded this on the way home from a road trip- wow!  What a fantastic app.  I had a lot of fun tracking our trips and adding pictures.  Will continue to use this app for years to come! | I love this app! It is very easy to change the photo selected by the program or to adjust the picture that was selected. I second the idea of using photo dates to re-create a trip itinerary. We do many road trips and it would be awesome to see each journey outlined are highlighted in someway. Thank you. You have done an excellent job with this app and I‚Äôm excited to see your future improvements. | I upload 9pics for 9differents states because thats all i have. but i dodnt know how to check out or proceed the process looks like no option. Please can somebody help me. Thanks!
