title: Flighty ‚Äì Live Flight Tracker
description:
"Truly phenomenal" NYTimes ‚Ä¢ iPhone App of The Year 2023 Finalist ‚Ä¢ Apple Design Award 2023 ‚Ä¢ Made for passengers first

LIMITED TIME: Pro is free on your 1st flight. No credit card. No trial.

‚ñ∂ INDUSTRY-FIRST FEATURES
- 25-hour where's my plane
- private friends/family following
- pilot-grade FAA integration (direct data feed)
- delay forecast
- taxi times
- ground radar
- proximity radar

‚ñ∂ FULLY AUTOMATED
- calendar sync
- TripIt sync
- email forwarding
- Flighty Friends: private sharing with friends

‚ñ∂ PILOT-GRADE DATA
- live-streaming
- actual flight plans
- commercial data ‚Äì same source used by your pilot
- FAA advisories, warnings, and delays
- your tail number with birthday and type
- pilot flight timetable
- proximity radar - see flights around you
- ground radar - radar even while taxiing

‚ñ∂ PREDICT DELAYS
- Alerts for late or canceled inbound aircraft
- Alerts for airport weather or traffic
- Delay forecast

‚ñ∂ ASSISTANTS
- Morning-Of Assistant - wake up informed
- Check In Assistant - your reservation number and check in link at the right time
- Connection Assistant - make tight connections a breeze

‚ñ∂ WORLDWIDE + LIVE + UNLIMITED
- every airline
- every flight
- 24/7/365 live global coverage

‚ñ∂ FLIGHTY FRIENDS
- Often sharing with Family and Friends? Invite them to see your flights and never manually share again!
- Picking someone up, excited for a friend to visit, meeting a colleague? Share your live flight status with one tap.

‚ñ∂ WHATS FREE?
- no ads
- unlimited flights
- Flighty Friends
- live data
- weather
- actual flight route
- aircraft model and image
- personal flight log and map
- personal all-time and annual stats
- Apple Watch app
- iCloud backup & sync
- historical flight lookup limited to past 365 days (due to costs)
- lock screen widgets (limited refresh for costs)

‚ñ∂ WHATS PRO?
- industry's fastest push alerts
- 25-hour where's my plane
- live inbound plane tracking
- live lock screen widgets
- pilot-grade FAA delay alerts
- unlimited past flight lookup
- delay predictions
- arrival forecast
- TripIt sync
- calendar sync
- email forwarding
- Apple Watch complications
- tail number
- taxi times
- and more

Pro is included on your first flight. No trial required.

flightyapp.com/privacy
flightyapp.com/terms
releaseNotes:
# Spring Cleaning and Prep For A Big Year

- Fix Apple Watch Face freezing on Friends' Flights
- Fix Lock Screen Widget lacking Friends' Flights
- Fix app performance for users with many past flights
- Exclude cargo planes from images
- Add big warning if iCloud Sync malfunctions
- Improve failed email import copy
- Enlarge paywall X tap area
- Refresh ‚ÄúWelcome Back‚Äù helper when you reinstall
- Fix diverted PRN flights
- Fix Brazil tail number format
developer: Global Flight, Airport, & Airline Status Tracker LLC
reviews:
I first heard of this app in apple‚Äôs WWDC,It has a lot of unique features and everything you need to know about your flight. | good app but unusable without paying $50 per year

limited sync functionality with old emails and poor non ios compatibility like with my computer | Peace of mind being able to track loved ones‚Äô flights. Super helpful and easy to use. | They are so clearly paying MacRumors, Macstories, 9to5, Mac Power Users, Upgrade, and more soooo much money to lie for them. The app doesn‚Äôt work nearly as well as these terrible podcasters claim it does. Widgets are never updating properly, Apple Watch complications are not updating properly, and I have now taken four flights with the app, while being subscribed, and not once has the live activity shown up three hours or even two hours before the fight. I don‚Äôt know how I got it to show at all the first couple of flights, but right now I‚Äôm not able to get it to show anything and I‚Äôm about to fly in 2 1/2 hours. No live activity there. My phone is at 80%, not in low power mode and I just don‚Äôt know how much money they want me to pay until the Apple properly work.

Still doesn‚Äôt work well in Asia. Stop stealing our money! | While the app is beautiful and generally works really well, it triggers SO many notifications due to the limited options for types of notifications in the app. It would be much better if you could have radio button options for each individual notification option instead of them being grouped. 

As others have said, there is overall great value to this app and I won‚Äôt be going anywhere. But I cannot offer more than 3 stars due to the notification issue I previously stated. I‚Äôve been emailing the developer for years pleading for change. | Occasional traveler here. This app saved our bacon by notifying me that our plane had been changed for an upcoming flight which could impact our seat locations. Sure enough, one of our three seats had been moved about ten rows away. Thanks to this timely alert we were able to avoid a last minute stressful "what-the-what?" at the airport. I am a first time user of this app and totally sold on its usefulness. | THe app is good. But sometimes, pro features such as flight forecast doesn't appear and says insufficent data. I will update to 5 start once that is fixed. | Flighty is a fun way to track you flights the colorful interface makes it an amazing app for anybody flying the use of live activities and the Apple Watch are amazing though the price could be cheaper but still it is a great app keep up the good work | Love | Great app | I signed up for a premium family membership after seeing rave reviews. I‚Äôve reported numerous data issues over the past month and none have been resolved. Every flight I‚Äôve taken with LATAM is incorrect in some way, having never updated upon landing (only estimates show in the app). One even has the wrong aircraft information ‚Äî I‚Äôve reported this three times to no avail. Also, older flights from the 00s that I took on Continental are incorrectly showing as Copa Airlines.

These issues need to be resolved, particularly regarding LATAM flights I took this month (Google/flightaware have correct info) or I will not be renewing my membership. | This app has all the information, and even when there‚Äôs problems they warn you instead of blocking you behind flighty pro. Gets info to me faster than the airline. | Love this app! So helpful to track your flights, and especially love the Flighty passport. Suggestion for future updates- would love if there was an option to share your Flighty passport with all the previous flights with your Flighty friends. | This really is a well thought out app. And, they continue to improve with slight tweaks on usability ‚Äì which just impresses me.
I have a family subscription which shares it around, and I‚Äôm happy to pay the monthly fee. The app is just really really that good. | Love the app and all the statistics you can get over the years. Wish I had Pro features but $50/yr or $250 for life is kind of a lot | If you fly a lot, a must have | Best apps for flights tracking | 10/5 stars!!! I love this app and it is worth it! It always notifies me of delays, plane changes, gate changes well before the attendants or gate agents tell me something. It‚Äôs nice to feel like you have the same if not better information than them when you‚Äôre sitting on the plane waiting for ‚Äúmaintenance updates‚Äù which sometimes can take hours. | You should warn users in China that the app doesn‚Äôt work before accepting money from us.

All the podcasters like Macrumors, Macstories, MacPowerUsers, Upgrade, and more are lying buttholes that deserve to have their shows deleted. | Flighty is very helpful - when it works. Unfortunately I frequently have to delete it and start all over again to get full functionality. | I‚Äôm incredibly ocd about my flighty I love seeing the airports I‚Äôve been to, how far I‚Äôve traveled, planes I‚Äôve taken etc. however the private aviation tracking on the app is terrible flight aware blows flighty out of the water in this regard. Just add an option to put in tail number it‚Äôs that simple. | Being an airline pilot I need timely information as to my flights, and I have used many apps; FLIGHTY is hands down the best app I have ever used in tracking my flights. Paying the yearly fee is a no brainer if you are an avid flyer.  So without hesitation I would highly recommend FLIGHTY!!! | –†–∞—Å—á–µ—Ç –¥–ª–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–ª–µ—Ç–æ–≤ –æ—Å—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤–ª—è–µ—Ç—Å—è –±–µ–∑ —É—á–µ—Ç–∞ —á–∞—Å–æ–≤—ã—Ö –ø–æ—è—Å–æ–≤. | Trains!? | I fly all of the time and use multiple airlines whose apps all have one issue or the other. Flighty covers those gaps, gives all of the details I could possibly want, and give me some fun historical data too. It lets me know updates at least 10 minutes ahead of most apps and sometimes hours before (looking at you delta for baggage claim details). If you fly a lot you need this, if not the airline apps may be enough for you. | This application is an essential application for anyone who travels. The application provides information sooner than airports, in more detail, and gives you a way to look at historic information about your own travels. Not only this, but they offer the option for purchase the application as a one-time purchase. I‚Äôd encourage you to use a subscription so that development continues, but having the option is great to encourage any type of user to use the application. Finally, it‚Äôs share features are really valuable. My parents will sometimes be traveling and I can share information with them about their flights, helping them navigate the challenges of flying without a ton of hassle. 

I recommend this app to any traveler, whether you‚Äôre a road warrior or just going on a yearly family vacation. | This is a great app, however is too costly.it would be nice to plug in flight that friend and family do as free reaaearch | Good app. Great UX. Decent accuracy. | I love tracking my flights. Where I‚Äôve been throughout the year, how many miles and hours flown . Is super cool | This is a decent app and useful. I‚Äôd even pay a few bucks to buy the app, maybe even $10. But $4/week is nuts. And $250 for the flat one time price honestly seems like a joke. That‚Äôs like what a license for Microsoft office was before Office 365. 

I‚Äôm tired of the subscription model for everything. | I ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS APP!!! I use Flighty every week as I travel for work and vacation A LOT and I can‚Äôt express how much flighty has helped me with timings! Before downloading flighty about 2 years ago I was missing flights but never since I downloaded it. The updated timing on flights is faster than flash! Wether there is a delay or the flight departure is earlier, flighty got you along with the exact gate and terminal the flight is in and no problem if it changes because flighty updates it in a few seconds and guess what they also tell you when you should start walking to the gate which is incredible !!! One of my favorite features on Flighty is being able to see how old the aircraft is, THAT IS VERY VERY HELPFUL, I try to avoid any plane over around 22 years old since they have poor entertainment systems and not as comfortable seats. The UI on this app is simply amazing, I want to congratulate the developers because they did a very amazing job creating this masterpiece of an app. 

A small but very helpful feature for the future:

One feature I would like to see on the app as a very frequent user is being able to see a turbulence satellite such as the Turbulence forecast app, that way if the turbulence is bad I will be able to avoid it and purchase a flight with less turbulence. 

Thank you very much for helping me to never miss a flight again FLIGHTY TEAM!! Keep doing what you guys are doing :)) | Flighty is the best app for staying updated with flight infomation.  As a crew member, I have multiple flights a day and the information and updates are always quick and correct. I wish I could get my money back. | I‚Äôm a crew member and was told about this app. I used basics then sprung for whole package. The free version is very useful but the premium is peak. | Love the way the app looks and works, even on just the free tier. However for sharing flight info it‚Äôd be nice to be able to have some privacy settings so you can generate a link that just has the basic flight info without anything like your name or profile picture on it. | It's a very useful and not too complex application. The fact that you pay for it and they don't fix stubborn bugs for years is just incredibly annoying. Why is the "where's my plane" section clipped most of the time to the point that you have to use a competing app to get the same info? The list of little things goes on and on. How hard is it that it's ignored for years? | I was sitting on the plane waiting to depart and the second we started moving I got a notification from the app. This is much faster than the other travel apps I use. | It won‚Äôt let me expand it like the others - any reason why? Also doesn‚Äôt tell me where my plane will fly next. | Great app for every aviation lover that loves to keep up with their travels | My son is a flight attendant and he gives me all of his flight numbers so that I can track him to wherever he is going. This is one of the best applications I have ever used and I highly, highly recommend anyone who wants to check where someone is flying to use this app. | Super helpful | I‚Äôm a very frequent traveler and this app has changed my life. Automatically finding my flights from my calendar and pushing very valuable information. My flight wasn‚Äôt delayed yet, but the inbound was, and I really appreciate knowing about it. I also love the live activity showing my gate and countdown till departure. | Love being able to track my flight and the fact I can see past flights on this app. I‚Äôm glad I found it some years ago. Keep up the great work developers. | It wasn‚Äôt able to track flights by Ethiopian airlines its just says reported to be still at gate , whereas on flight24 and flight tracker its tracks it good, but on flightly i tested it with multiple flights by ET no difference, when the other platforms cant make accurate tracking they at least notify by estimated arrival time | When the app works it‚Äôs great. Sadly on my travels to Dubai Bangkok Taipei and Sapporo only Taipei displayed useful info. The rest all reported no or incorrect information. Disappointed as I paid for this and it doesn‚Äôt really work 90% of the time. I wonder if the rave reviews are all US based which is fine but market yourself as a US only app. Thanks. | Love love love this App !! I love and breath Flightly ! It is so useful and use it daily . 
ONLY thing I wish they had is to be able to add my flight info straight on my Apple Watch instead of my iPhone ! Please developer if you can make that happen ,, I‚Äôll make a new review on my YouTube channel regarding this amazing app ! Otherwise GREAT APP ! Very satisfied and sooo useful thank you ! @Flywithshelly | I flew with Thai AirAsia and apart from Flight no an date/time, which is available elsewhere, there is no information. No gate number. No delay notice. Nothing that I paid for pro features has been delivered. So it is totally useless for me. Maybe it is only for USA? | The app looks super legit but after hours of using it I still can't figure out how to navigate it. Everything's laid out in an obscure way and the flights that I put in from last week are not in my "passport history" for some reason. Is there even an account associated with the app? It's like everything I spent a lot of time manually adding isn't there anymore. The idea is awesome and I like the features but you should be able to see friends previous flights by viewing their profile, instead of just the ones coming up. If it was more social in that regard the app would be a lot better. | If I only ever flew United I wouldn‚Äôt bother as their app and tracking is awesome and in some ways better than Flighty. But I have found it useful for other airlines whose apps are not so hot (eg AA).

title: AirAsia MOVE: Flights & Hotels
description:
Introducing the AirAsia MOVE app - Your Ultimate Travel and Lifestyle Companion!

Get ready to go all the way with the AirAsia MOVE app, previously known as the airasia Superapp. Whether you're searching for the best deals, cheap flights, or exploring new horizons in Asia or around the world, this all-in-one app has got you covered.

Elevate your trips and your way of living with a wide range of products and services, along with great deals and promotions now!
 
Key Features:
Flight booking:
- Find your flights and cheap tickets at your fingertips.
- Flight finder and booking made easy with our user-friendly interface.
- Find cheap flight tickets at affordable prices from AirAsia and over 700 other airlines, such as Scoot, Cebu Pacific, Thai Airways, Bangkok Airways, and more.
- Unlock exclusive airplane ticket deals and flight promos for your dream destinations.
- Book flights and access your e-ticket and boarding pass hassle-free.

Hotel rooms:
- Book affordable hotel rooms at your preferred destinations with airasia hotels.
- Choose from a variety of options, including budget hotels, city hotels, beach resorts, luxury stays, and more!
- Whether it's for your vacation, honeymoon, or business trip, you'll discover the ideal room at a cheap hotel price.
- Enjoy the best hotel deals and accommodations for a comfortable stay from over 900,000 hotels worldwide.

SNAP, your best hotel + flight deals:
- Enjoy ultimate convenience with SNAP deals, the best travel combo package offered in the app.
- Book affordable AirAsia flight and hotel packages and travel with ease.
- Choose from a variety of budget-friendly hotel + flight combos or flight + hotel packages for your greatest vacation!
- Ideal for families, solo adventurers or luxury seekers.
- Discover the best hotel + flight promos tailored to your preferences.

*Ride your way: 
- Book a ride with airasia ride, our e-hailing and taxi app, at your most convenient time.
- Customize your ride schedule to match your convenience.
- Pre-book your airport rides up to 3 days in advance for peace of mind during your airport transfers.
- Choose from a variety of ride options to suit your preferences, including taxis, private cars, minivans, and more.
- Explore affordable taxi fares and other ride prices for your local trip or an intercity journey. 
- Arrive safely at your destination and enjoy your comfortable ride with our professional drivers.
- Share your ride details with your friends and family through a tracking link to assure them of your safety.
- Enjoy a seamless ride booking experience anytime, anywhere, with just a few taps!

Spend and save more:
- Earn airasia points with airasia rewards from every transaction made on the AirAsia MOVE app.
- Collect points to redeem products and services within the app. The more you spend, the more you can save!
- Redeem points for your discounts and exclusive offers like flight tickets, hotels, taxi, and more.

Last but not least, do note that some features and promotions are only available in specific countries. 

Download the AirAsia MOVE app now to experience a better way of travel and lifestyle and start your next adventure!

*Only available in specific countries.
releaseNotes:
We continually improve the app to make it better for you. This release contains bug fixes and performance improvements.

Update to the latest airasia MOVE App today!

title: misterb&b - Gay Travel
description:
Experience a more welcoming world with misterb&b.
Search over 1 million listings from private rooms to LGBTQ-friendly hotels in 200 countries. misterb&b helps you create the perfect gaycation. Book cozy apartments, private rooms, friendly gay bnb, beautiful villas and find competitively priced hotel accommodations. You can even host LGBTQ travelers and earn extra income all while enjoying the comfort and security of knowing that you are traveling with like-minded individuals. 
 
‚Ä¢ Travel safely & get useful insider tips from LGBTQ hosts
‚Ä¢ Connect with other misterb&b travelers during your trip
‚Ä¢ Secure payment & 24/7 assistance
‚Ä¢ Support LGBTQ non profit when you book
‚Ä¢ Read over 270,000+ reviews from gay travelers
‚Ä¢ Discreet invoicing and billing
‚Ä¢ Largest gay travel community in the world founded in 2013
‚Ä¢ Now featuring gay hotels and gay-friendly hotels 
‚Ä¢ misterb&b is rated Excellent on Trustpilot, the world‚Äôs most reliable used-powered review platform
‚Ä¢ First LGTBQ app to be named the ‚ÄúApp of the day‚Äù by Apple

FEEL WELCOME, WHEREVER YOU STAY
1 million listings from private rooms to LGBTQ-friendly hotels in 200 countries.
Choose from an entire place, private room, shared room and even gay hotels and gay-friendly hotels. Prices range from budget to five-star villas.

HOST GAY TRAVELERS
Earn extra income renting your extra space & sharing what makes your city great. Make new friends by welcoming LGTBQ travelers from around the globe. Listing your place on misterb&b is free, secure and gives you access to a huge network of like-minded travelers!

POPULAR GAY DESTINATIONS
‚Ä¢ Paris ‚Äì the city of light and the capital of French excellence, including the Marais gay district 
‚Ä¢ New York ‚Äì legendary queer metropolis ignited the LGBTQ equal rights movement in the late 1960s
‚Ä¢ Barcelona ‚Äì the beach and the beautiful art, a favorite European LGBTQ destination 
‚Ä¢ London ‚Äì is calling, perfect for gays and lesbians craving the ultimate British invasion 
‚Ä¢ More!

FOR GAY TRAVELERS
‚Ä¢ 310,000 welcoming hosts, including full-flats, private rooms, shared rooms, vacation homes, apartments, gay hotels and other unique places to stay
‚Ä¢ Filter by price, beautiful photos, in depth descriptions, over 270,000 reviews, WiFi, pool, and other things important to you
‚Ä¢ Find your last-minute stay with 'Instant Booking' functionality or book far in advance

WHY CHOOSE US
misterb&b imagines and helps create a world where anyone can feel welcome, fostering greater connections and amazing experiences. misterb&b is making the experience of being an LGBTQ traveler even more exciting! 

Explore the world. Experience your pride.

"Gay Travel Revolution" - CNN

misterb&b / mister b&b /  mister b&b / mrb&b / Mr B&B / Mister B and B / misterbandb / mister bb is not affiliated, endorsed, or otherwise associated with Airbnb.
releaseNotes: App optimization and bugs fixed.
reviews:
Great app to find a friendly place to stay. | Great app, nice way to connect with others with similar interests! | So good | Casey & Eddie are the ultimate in hosts. They are very friendly and their home is so welcoming. 
Comfortable room and all the amenities anyone would want. Super clean. 
I would stay again anytime! | Enjoy the booking process, follow-up and convenience! | I loved my first MisterB&B trip, and I‚Äôm excited to use this app again for future travel. It‚Äôs great for finding places to stay with kind and like-minded folks. | This was my 2nd time at Tony‚Äôs place and I would love to return in the future. Tony is a great guy and a wonderful host: laid back, responsive, relaxed‚Ä¶and a extraordinary photographer. The house is filled with his photography and other very cool art. Love the design of the house. The pool and hot tubs are a big plus. | Es muy f√°cil , buena calidad y adem√°s muchas opciones. 
Adoro esta aplicaci√≥n | Saludos | Tony, the host, was courteous and helpful. His welcome was warm and engaging. The accommodations were clean and comfortable. The shared spaces were plentiful and well appointed and stocked. Throughout our stay Tony was always available and checked in on us to make sure we were ok and if we needed anything. The other guests were delightful and social. Great location to multiple activities and functions. We highly recommend for your stay in the Phoenix area. | It would be nice to find or have them implement‚Ä¶‚Ä¶.. I would like an audio cue from the app when I receive a request for a booking or when I receive a message from a guest. | PLEASE! I dont want notifications. My only feedback would be to have more services (food/drink) available during the week day. So far the best üíûüíû | Really good to find a place. Prices are good. | I attempted to book a weekend trip through this app. After I had successfully completed the booking I noticed I was being charged monthly for an ‚Äúin-app app‚Äù social network. When I called to cancel the new monthly subscription they had stuck into my reservation‚Ä¶ the lady helping me cancelled my entire reservation! She didn‚Äôt tell me either‚Ä¶ So I landed in Miami with no place to stay. Based on this experience I wouldn‚Äôt ever use this app again. Which is a shame because I like supporting my community. But I don‚Äôt appreciate blatant hidden charges or huge administrative mistakes. | Humans travelen are happier than  persons with their boring routene go en on . So I Aim for the future to do Mr b& b care stays for humans on mi local area at mi home . | Enjoying the social and connection benefits of this app. | Contacted support, they said they don‚Äôt know why, can‚Äôt activate it and need to resolve the issue with their legal team. A MONTH! It‚Äôs just unacceptable. French customer service is always the worst | They have great places, at much more reasonable prices and the booking process is so much simpler than with other sites.   I love it! | They charge you before you get a place to stay, and if the host doesn‚Äôt accept your request, that charge will be there, so you‚Äôll have to request another place to stay and they‚Äôll charge again!  Also once you put your credit card information, they don‚Äôt give you the option to remove that credit card, and they‚Äôll make some random charges, also they have a monthly subscription called WEERE PRO that they will sign you up even if you don‚Äôt request it or sign up for, try other app where you can rent a place to stay at a better price with no hidden fees and subscriptions. | Great resource for the queer wayfarer | App gets slow and sometimes a saved password doesn‚Äôt work either on app or website. I have tried to book for months and mostly declined the request or don‚Äôt even respond. Sometimes feels like this is a dating app where picky people are. I don‚Äôt face these issues on other booking apps and even got good reviews. Traveled around the world for years now and as a gay man I don‚Äôt feel like this is any better than a bad dating app experience. 

Additionally the Weere feature is stressful as well. | Wow | I tried using the app to find LGBTQ friendly places to stay. However, in more than three tripes, I have requested multiple listings and all of them either not reply or simply decline for no reason. And finally I got accepted on my request, the host immediately said they cannot accommodate me if my train is going to arrive late to check in. Late as in 9pm. And misterb&b refuse to issue me a full refund and asks me to try to find another reservation instead. After all of this experience, I wouldn‚Äôt recommend using this app at all since it‚Äôs not reliable and you cannot get a refund. It‚Äôs not worth it and who knows how these hosts pick and choose who they accept. I don‚Äôt need that kind of discrimination when I travel. | Look forward for to using the service | Such attention to detail and accuracy in their listings! | But you don‚Äôt even prompt my phone to autofill with my card info. The easier it is for your customers to spend money, the more likely they are to do it | It‚Äôs nice to have a unique service like this that supports the specific clientele | markus was a great host! great location | Recently had a trip to London, UK. Found. Great host | I usually try and book with MBNB to support the community, but over half the time I get frustrated and go to AirBnB. The hosts don‚Äôt reply, or they have an unexpected event that they are unavailable but forgot to remove the dates. It is sad. | No review | We booked a room through them. We had a pet emergency the night before we were to go I explained that I did not want to cancel but reschedule. They did not care and made no attempt to work with us. They took our money. The hosts were no different. I would not recommend Mr B&B and I would be very careful who you book with as you could lose your money as we did. | Disappointed to not get my full deposit back even tho I cancelled the reservation a month+ before the check in date. | Have used it many times and it has worked out well. | Love it | This was the worst experience that I had as a guest. I stayed at a place hosted by Alban in Paris. The place was really dirty, smelled like pee, no bed sheets and with flies, yes flies. Alban the host admitted the that he didn‚Äôt clean up the place at all before I arrived. He admitted all this in a written message within the Mister B&B messaging platform and Mister B&B didn‚Äôt do anything about that because it was more than 48 hours after I stayed there. I tried to submit the inquiry before the 48 hours but they don‚Äôt have an easy way to contact customer support form their app. I had to find an email from the finance department to submit it from some place very hidden in their website. I just found an email from the finance department and I sent the message to them. Anyhow, I end up leaving Alban‚Äôs place because it was very dirty and I got an Airbnb. Alban said that he was going to reimburse but didn‚Äôt reimburse anything at the end and Mister B&B basically said that it‚Äôs not their problem given that they sent the payment to Alban already. Watch out with the places that you find here, and if you need to file a claim, good luck with finding an email to contact their customer support team. Actually I don‚Äôt think they might have a customer support team in place and Alban if you are seeing this, you are a BIG SCAMMER and so are you Mister B&B, life will take care of this. | Place was amazing.  Clean and well appointed.  It was a pleasure working with Adam.  Couldn‚Äôt have asked for a better experience. | Avoid! Horrible ordeal. Made a reservation, listing host cancelled but still charged my credit card $2,365. And again $15 for God knows what. Had to cancel my credit card. It took me 3 months, 14 phone calls and more than 7 hours lost time to get my money back! No real apology or gift certificate to rectify the terrible and unfair situation. Just wow | Very easy to navigate | This apartment was perfectly located and just the right place to explore and then come home to regroup! | Five Stars! | The only time I get guest when the price is extremely lowered and discounted on top of that when offered 24/hr access to amenities, spa service options, pick and up and drop off if need to be and giving all the hottest tips when going out. | Nope. Not going to happen. Delete. | Discouraging. As a queer woman, I was excited to see something like this. The description says ‚Äúlgbt‚Äù but it‚Äôs literally got ‚Äúmister‚Äù in the title. You left out the L and the B. ü•≤ | Do not use. This is not a safe place for gay men but a place for predators. Shame on misterbnb. | Had an incredible weekend!  Courtney is a great host!  Staff was pleasant and welcoming‚Ä¶Hi David!  Breakfast was excellent and a wonderful variety day to day!  The lemon-blueberry pancakes were top notch! Would stay every year!
